# notes:                
40001001	Dore uko ibisekuruza bya Yezu Kristo ukomoka kuri Dawidi no kuri Aburahamu bikurikirana :
40001002	Aburahamu yabyaye Izaki , Izaki abyara Yakobo , Yakobo abyara Yuda n'abavandimwe be .
40001003	Yuda abyara Perēsi na Zera ababyaranye na Tamari , Perēsi abyara Hesironi , Hesironi abyara Aramu ,
40001004	Aramu abyara Aminadabu , Aminadabu abyara Nahasoni , Nahasoni abyara Salumoni .
40001005	Salumoni abyara Bowazi amubyaranye na Rahabu , Bowazi abyara Obedi amubyaranye na Ruti , Obedi abyara Yese .
40001006	Yese abyara Umwami Dawidi . Dawidi yabyaye Salomo amubyaranye na muka Uriya .
40001007	Salomo abyara Robowamu , Robowamu abyara Abiya , Abiya abyara Asa .
40001008	Asa abyara Yozafati , Yozafati abyara Yoramu , Yoramu abyara Uziya .
40001009	Uziya abyara Yotamu , Yotamu abyara Ahazi , Ahazi abyara Hezekiya .
40001010	Hezekiya abyara Manase , Manase abyara Amoni , Amoni abyara Yosiya .
40001011	Yosiya abyara Yekoniya n'abavandimwe be , babayeho igihe Abayuda bajyanwaga ho iminyago i Babiloni .
40001012	Nyuma y'aho bajyaniwe i Babiloni , Yekoniya yabyaye Salatiyeli , Salatiyeli abyara Zerubabeli .
40001013	Zerubabeli abyara Abiyudi , Abiyudi abyara Eliyakimu , Eliyakimu abyara Azori .
40001014	Azori abyara Sadoki , Sadoki abyara Akimu , Akimu abyara Elihudi .
40001015	Elihudi abyara Eleyazari , Eleyazari abyara Matani , Matani abyara Yakobo .
40001016	Yakobo abyara Yozefu umugabo wa Mariya , ari na we nyina wa Yezu witwa Kristo .
40001017	Kuva kuri Aburahamu kugeza kuri Dawidi hari ibisekuruza cumi na bine , kuva kuri Dawidi kugeza bajyanywe i Babiloni na byo ni cumi na bine , no kuva bajyanywe i Babiloni kugeza kuri Kristo ni cumi na bine .
40001018	Dore uko byagenze mu ivuka rya Yezu Kristo . Nyina Mariya wari warasabwe na Yozefu , yasamye inda bitewe na Mwuka Muziranenge kandi atari yabana n'umugabo we .
40001019	Yozefu akaba umuntu w'intungane , ntiyashaka kumukoza isoni , ni bwo yigiriye inama yo kumubenga rwihishwa .
40001020	Akiri muri ibyo umumarayika wa Nyagasani amubonekera mu nzozi , aramubwira ati : “ Yozefu mwene Dawidi , witinya kuzana umugeni wawe Mariya , kuko iyo nda yayisamye bitewe na Mwuka Muziranenge .
40001021	Azabyara umuhungu umwite Yezu , kuko ari we uzakiza abantu be ibyaha . ”
40001022	Byose byabereye kugira ngo bibe nk'uko Nyagasani yari yaratumye umuhanuzi kubivuga ati :
40001023	“ Dore umukobwa wisugi azasama inda , azabyara umwana wumuhungu , bazamwita Emanweli . ” ( Risobanurwa ngo “ Imana iri kumwe natwe . ” )
40001024	Yozefu akangutse abigenza uko umumarayika wa Nyagasani yari yamutegetse , azana umugeni we .
40001025	Ariko ntibaryamana kugeza igihe yabyariye umwana w'umuhungu . Uwo mwana Yozefu amwita Yezu .
40002001	Yezu amaze kuvukira i Betelehemu mu ntara ya Yudeya ku ngoma y'Umwami Herodi , haza abahanga mu by'inyenyeri baturutse iburasirazuba bagera i Yeruzalemu .
40002002	Barabaza bati : “ Umwami w'Abayahudi uherutse kuvuka ari hehe ? Twabonye inyenyeri ye turi iburasirazuba , none twari tuje kumuramya . ”
40002003	Umwami Herodi yumvise ibyo ahagarika umutima , we n'abaturage bose b'i Yeruzalemu .
40002004	Nuko akoranya abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko bose b'Abisiraheli , ababaza aho Kristo yajyaga kuzavukira .
40002005	Baramusubiza bati : “ Ni i Betelehemu mu ntara ya Yudeya , kuko ari ko byanditswe n'umuhanuzi ngo :
40002006	‘ Nawe Betelehemu yo mu Buyuda , ntabwo uri uwinyuma mu butegetsi bwu Buyuda , kuko muri wowe hazaturuka umutegetsi , azaba umushumba wubwoko bwanjye bwAbisiraheli . ’ ”
40002007	Nuko Herodi atumiza ba bahanga arabihererana , ababaza neza igihe baboneye ya nyenyeri .
40002008	Nuko abatuma i Betelehemu avuga ati : “ Nimugende mubaririze neza iby'uwo mwana . Nimumubona muzabimenyeshe , nanjye njye kumuramya . ”
40002009	Bamaze kumva amagambo y'umwami baragenda . Ni bwo iyo nyenyeri bari babonye bakiri iburasirazuba ibagiye imbere , irinda igera hejuru y'aho umwana ari irahahagarara .
40002010	Babonye iyo nyenyeri barishima cyane .
40002011	Nuko binjira mu nzu basanga umwana ari kumwe na nyina Mariya , bamwikubita imbere baramuramya . Bahambura ibintu bazanye bifite agaciro barabimutura . Byari izahabu n'ububani n'imibavu y'igiciro .
40002012	Nuko Imana imaze kubaburira mu nzozi ngo be gusubira kwa Herodi , baherako banyura indi nzira basubira mu gihugu cyabo .
40002013	Bamaze kugenda umumarayika wa Nyagasani abonekera Yozefu mu nzozi , aramubwira ati : “ Byuka ujyane umwana na nyina muhungire mu gihugu cya Misiri , mugumeyo kugeza igihe nzakubwirira , kuko Herodi agiye gushaka umwana ngo amwice . ”
40002014	Iryo joro Yozefu arabyuka , ajyana umwana na nyina bajya mu Misiri .
40002015	Bagumayo kugeza igihe Herodi apfiriye . Ibyo byabereyeho kugira ngo bibe uko Nyagasani yari yaravuze atumye umuhanuzi ati : “ Umwana wanjye naramuhamagaye ngo ave mu Misiri . ”
40002016	Herodi abonye ko ba bahanga bamutengushye ararakara cyane . Nuko yohereza abantu kwica abana b'abahungu bose b'i Betelehemu n'abo mu mirenge yose ihakikije , bamaze imyaka ibiri cyangwa batarayigezaho , agereranyije n'igihe ba bahanga bari bamubwiye ko ari bwo babonye ya nyenyeri .
40002017	Bityo biba uko byavuzwe n'umuhanuzi Yeremiya agira ati :
40002018	“ Induru yumvikaniye i Rama , humvikanye namarira numuborogo mwinshi . Rasheli araririra abana be , yanze guhozwa kuko batakiriho . ”
40002019	Nuko Herodi amaze gupfa , umumarayika wa Nyagasani abonekera Yozefu mu nzozi akiri mu Misiri ,
40002020	aramubwira ati : “ Byuka ufate umwana na nyina musubire mu gihugu cya Isiraheli , kuko abashakaga kwica uwo mwana batakiriho . ”
40002021	Yozefu arabyuka ajyana umwana na nyina , bagerana mu gihugu cya Isiraheli .
40002022	Ariko yumvise ko Arikelawo mwene Herodi yabaye Umwami w'i Yudeya asimbuye se , atinya kujyayo . Ni ko kuburirwa ari mu nzozi ngo ajye mu ntara ya Galileya .
40002023	Nuko ajyayo atura mu mujyi witwa Nazareti , kugira ngo bibe nk'uko byavuzwe n'abahanuzi ngo : “ Azitwa Umunyanazareti . ”
40003001	Icyo gihe Yohani Mubatiza atunguka mu butayu bwo muri Yudeya atangaza ati :
40003002	“ Nimwihane kuko ubwami bw'ijuru bwegereje ! ”
40003003	Yohani uwo ni we wari waravuzwe n'umuhanuzi Ezayi ngo :
40003004	Yohani yambaraga umwambaro uboheshejwe ubwoya bw'ingamiya , awukenyeje umukandara w'uruhu . Yatungwaga n'isanane n'ubuki bw'ubuhura .
40003005	Abaturage b'i Yeruzalemu n'abo mu ntara yose ya Yudeya n'abo mu karere kose kegereye uruzi rwa Yorodani baramusangaga ,
40003006	akababatiriza mu ruzi rwa Yorodani , bemerera mu ruhame ibyaha byabo .
40003007	Yohani abonye Abafarizayi n'Abasaduseyi benshi baje kubatizwa arababwira ati : “ Mwa rubyaro rw'impiri mwe , ni nde wabagiriye inama yo guhunga uburakari bw'Imana bwegereje ?
40003008	Nuko rero nk'uko igiti cyera imbuto , abe ari ko namwe mugira imigenzereze yerekana ko mwihannye ,
40003009	kandi ntimukirate muti : ‘ Turi bene Aburahamu . ’ Erega ndahamya ko no muri aya mabuye Imana ibasha kuremamo bene Aburahamu !
40003010	Ndetse n'ubu intorezo irabanguye kugira ngo iteme ibiti ibihereye ku mizi . Nuko rero igiti cyose kitera imbuto nziza kigiye gutemwa gitwikwe .
40003011	Jyewe ndababatirisha amazi kugira ngo mwihane , ariko nyuma yanjye hagiye kuza undusha ububasha , ntibinkwiriye no kumukuramo inkweto . We azababatirisha Mwuka Muziranenge n'umuriro .
40003012	Dore afashe urutaro ngo agosore impeke azihunike mu kigega , naho umurama awucanishe umuriro utazima . ”
40003013	Nyuma Yezu ava muri Galileya ajya kuri Yorodani , asanga Yohani ngo amubatize .
40003014	Ariko Yohani aramuhakanira ati : “ Ni jye wari ukwiriye kubatizwa nawe , none ni wowe unsanze ? ”
40003015	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Emera ubikore kuko ari byo bikwiye , kugira ngo tuboneze ibyo Imana ishaka . ” Yohani aherako aremera .
40003016	Yezu amaze kubatizwa ahita ava mu mazi . Muri ako kanya ijuru rirakinguka , abona Mwuka w'Imana amumanukiraho asa n'inuma .
40003017	Nuko humvikana ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru ati : “ Uyu ni Umwana wanjye nkunda cyane , ni we nishimira . ”
40004001	Nuko Yezu ajyanwa na Mwuka w'Imana mu butayu , kugira ngo ahageragerezwe na Satani .
40004002	Ahamara iminsi mirongo ine n'amajoro mirongo ine yigomwa kurya , hanyuma arasonza .
40004003	Umushukanyi aramwegera aramubwira ati : “ Niba uri Umwana w'Imana tegeka ko aya mabuye ahinduka imigati . ”
40004004	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Biranditswe ngo ‘ Umuntu ntatungwa n'ibyokurya gusa , ahubwo atungwa n'ijambo ryose Imana ivuga . ’ ”
40004005	Satani amujyana i Yeruzalemu umujyi Imana yitoranyirije , amuhagarika ku munara w'Ingoro y'Imana ,
40004006	aramubwira ati : “ Niba uri Umwana w'Imana simbuka ugwe hasi , kuko byanditswe ngo
40004007	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Biranditswe kandi ngo ‘ Ntukagerageze Nyagasani Imana yawe . ’ ”
40004008	Nuko Satani arongera amujyana mu mpinga y'umusozi muremure cyane , amwereka ibihugu byose byo ku isi n'icyubahiro cyabyo ,
40004009	aramubwira ati : “ Biriya byose ndabiguha , nunyikubita imbere ukandamya . ”
40004010	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Genda Satani , kuko byanditswe ngo ‘ Uzaramye Nyagasani Imana yawe , abe ari we wenyine uyoboka . ’ ”
40004011	Satani amusiga aho , haza abamarayika baramukorera .
40004012	Yezu yumvise ko Yohani yafunzwe ajya muri Galileya .
40004013	Ntiyaguma i Nazareti , ajya kuba i Kafarinawumu ku nkombe y'ikiyaga , mu ntara ya Zabuloni na Nafutali .
40004014	Kwari ukugira ngo bibe nk'uko byavuzwe n'umuhanuzi Ezayi ngo :
40004015	“ Nimwumve ntara ya Zabuloni niya Nafutali , ahagana ku nyanja no hakurya ya Yorodani , aho ni ho Galileya ituwe nabanyamahanga .
40004016	Abantu bāri mu mwijima bigunze , babonye umucyo mwinshi . Abāri mu gihugu cyacuze umwijima wurupfu bigunze , urumuri rwarabamurikiye . ”
40004017	Kuva ubwo Yezu atangira gutangaza ati : “ Nimwihane kuko ubwami bw'ijuru bwegereje . ”
40004018	Yezu agenda ahakikiye ikiyaga cya Galileya , abona abarobyi babiri bava inda imwe , Simoni witwa Petero na Andereya , barobesha umutego w'amafi mu kiyaga .
40004019	Arababwira ati : “ Nimunkurikire nzabagira abarobyi b'abantu . ”
40004020	Bahita basiga aho imitego yabo baramukurikira .
40004021	Yigiye imbere gato abona abandi bavandimwe babiri , Yakobo na Yohani bari hamwe na se Zebedeyi mu bwato , batunganya imitego barobeshaga . Na bo Yezu arabahamagara .
40004022	Ako kanya basiga se n'ubwato bwabo , baramukurikira .
40004023	Nuko Yezu azenguruka Galileya yose yigishiriza abantu mu nsengero zabo , abatangariza Ubutumwa bwiza bw'ubwami bw'ijuru , kandi akiza abantu indwara zose n'ubumuga bwose .
40004024	Ibye byamamara cyane mu gihugu cya Siriya , bamuzanira abantu bose barwaye indwara z'amoko atari amwe , imbabare n'abahanzweho , abanyagicuri n'ibimuga maze arabakiza .
40004025	Nuko imbaga y'abantu iramukurikira , bamwe baturutse muri Galileya no mu ntara yitwa Dekapoli , abandi baturutse i Yeruzalemu no muri Yudeya no hakurya ya Yorodani .
40005001	Yezu abonye ya mbaga y'abantu benshi azamuka umusozi , amaze kwicara abigishwa be baramwegera .
40005002	Atangira kubigisha agira ati :
40005003	“ Hahirwa abafite imitima ikeneye Imana , kuko ubwami bw'ijuru ari ubwabo .
40005004	Hahirwa abashavuye , kuko ari bo bazahozwa .
40005005	Hahirwa abagwaneza , kuko ari bo bazaragwa isi .
40005006	Hahirwa abafite inzara n'inyota byo gutunganira Imana , kuko ari bo bazahazwa .
40005007	Hahirwa abanyambabazi , kuko ari bo bazazigirirwa .
40005008	Hahirwa abafite imitima iboneye , kuko ari bo bazabona Imana .
40005009	Hahirwa abazana amahoro mu bantu , kuko ari bo bazitwa abana b'Imana .
40005010	Hahirwa abatotezwa bahōrwa gukora ibyo Imana ishaka , kuko ubwami bw'ijuru ari ubwabo .
40005011	“ Murahirwa iyo babatuka , bakabatoteza , bakababeshyera ibibi byinshi ari jye babahōra .
40005012	Mujye mwishima kandi munezerwe , kuko muzabona ingororano ishyitse mu ijuru . Ni ko batotezaga abahanuzi b'Imana bababanjirije .
40005013	“ Muri umunyu w'isi . Ariko se iyo umunyu wamaze gukayuka wakongera kuryoshywa n'iki ? Nta cyo uba ukimaze , ahubwo ujugunywa hanze abantu bakawukandagira .
40005014	“ Muri urumuri rw'isi . Umujyi wubatse mu mpinga y'umusozi ntushobora kwihisha ,
40005015	kandi nta wacana itara ngo aryubikeho akabindi , ahubwo aritereka ahirengeye maze rikamurikira abari mu nzu bose .
40005016	Mube ari ko mumurikira abantu , kugira ngo barebe ibyiza mukora bahimbaze So uri mu ijuru .
40005017	“ Ntimwibwire ko nazanywe no kuvanaho Amategeko cyangwa ibyanditswe n'abahanuzi . Sinazanywe no kubivanaho , ahubwo nazanywe no kubisohoza .
40005018	Ndababwira nkomeje ko nta kanyuguti habe n'akadomo na kamwe ko mu Mategeko kazavaho , kugeza ubwo byose bizaba birangiye , ijuru n'isi bigashira .
40005019	Umuntu wese uzaca ku itegeko rimwe , naho ryaba rito muri ayo yose , akigisha abantu kugenza nka we , azagirwa uwa nyuma mu bwami bw'ijuru . Ariko uzayumvira akayigisha abandi , azitwa mukuru mu bwami bw'ijuru .
40005020	Reka mbabwire , nimudatunganira Imana kurenza abigishamategeko n'Abafarizayi , ntabwo muzinjira mu bwami bw'ijuru .
40005021	“ Mwumvise ko aba kera babwiwe ngo : ‘ Ntukice ’ , kuko uwishe umuntu azashyirwa mu rubanza .
40005022	Ariko jyewe ndababwira ko umuntu wese urakarira mugenzi we azashyirwa mu rubanza . Kandi umuntu wese ubwira mugenzi we ati : ‘ Uri igicucu ’ , aba akwiye kubibarizwa mu rukiko rw'ikirenga , naho ubwira mugenzi we ati : ‘ Wa kigoryi we ! ’ aba ari uwo gushyirwa mu nyenga y'umuriro .
40005023	Noneho nujyana ituro ryawe ku rutambiro kuritura Imana , wahagera ukibuka ko mugenzi wawe afite icyo apfa nawe ,
40005024	uzasige ituro ryawe aho imbere y'urutambiro , maze ubanze ugende wigorore na we , ubone kuza utange ituro ryawe .
40005025	“ Nujyana mu rukiko n'uwo muburana , wigorore na we mukiri mu nzira kugira ngo atagushyikiriza umucamanza , na we akaguha umuporisi akagushyira muri gereza .
40005026	Ndakubwira nkomeje ko utazavamo utabanje gutanga amafaranga baguciye yose , hatabuze na rimwe .
40005027	“ Mwumvise ko byavuzwe ngo : ‘ Ntugasambane . ’
40005028	Ariko jyewe ndababwira yuko umuntu wese ureba umugore akamurarikira , mu bitekerezo bye aba amaze gusambana na we .
40005029	Nuko rero ijisho ryawe ry'iburyo niba ryakugusha mu cyaha , urinogore urite . Icyakubera cyiza ni ukubura rumwe mu ngingo zawe , aho kugira ngo umubiri wawe wose utabwe mu nyenga y'umuriro .
40005030	Niba ikiganza cyawe cy'iburyo cyakugusha mu cyaha , ugice ugite . Icyakubera cyiza ni ukubura rumwe mu ngingo zawe , aho kugira ngo umubiri wawe wose utabwe mu nyenga y'umuriro .
40005031	“ Byavuzwe kandi ko ‘ Ushaka kwirukana umugore we agomba kumuha urwandiko rwemeza ko amusenze . ’
40005032	Ariko jyewe ndababwira ko umuntu wese wirukana umugore we , bitavuye ku kubana kutemewe n'Amategeko , nyuma agacyurwa n'undi mugabo , aba amugize umusambanyi . Byongeye kandi ucyura umugore wirukanywe , na we aba asambanye .
40005033	“ Mwumvise ko aba kera babwiwe ngo ‘ Ntukarahire ibinyoma , ahubwo uzajye uhigura imihigo wahigiye Nyagasani . ’
40005034	Ariko jyewe ndababwira kutarahira rwose , kwaba kurahira mushingiye ku ijuru kuko ari intebe ya cyami y'Imana ,
40005035	cyangwa ku isi kuko ari yo kabaho ikandagizaho ibirenge , cyangwa kuri Yeruzalemu kuko ari umurwa w'Umwami ukomeye .
40005036	Ndetse ntuzanarahire ushingiye indahiro ku mutwe wawe , kuko utabasha guhindura agasatsi kawe na kamwe ngo kabe umweru cyangwa kirabure .
40005037	Mujye muvuga gusa muti : ‘ Yego , ni byo ’ , cyangwa se muhakane muti : ‘ Oya , si byo ’ . Ibindi umuntu agerekaho byose biba biturutse kuri Sekibi .
40005038	“ Mwumvise ko byavuzwe ngo : ‘ Umennye undi ijisho na we barimumene ’ , kandi ngo : ‘ Ukuye undi iryinyo na we barimukure . ’
40005039	Ariko jyewe ndababwira kutitura inabi mwagiriwe . Ahubwo umuntu nagukubita urushyi mu musaya w'iburyo , umuhe n'undi musaya .
40005040	Byongeye kandi umuntu nashaka kuguhuguza ishati uyimuhe , ugerekeho n'ikote .
40005041	Nihagira uguhata kumwakira umutwaro ngo uwutware kirometero imwe , uzongereho n'iya kabiri .
40005042	Ugusabye umuhe , kandi ushaka kugira icyo agutira ntukamwiyame .
40005043	“ Mwumvise ko byavuzwe ngo : ‘ Ujye ukunda mugenzi wawe , kandi wange umwanzi wawe . ’
40005044	Ariko jyewe ndababwira nti : ‘ Mukunde n'abanzi banyu kandi musabire ababatoteza . ’
40005045	Ibyo mubikorere kugira ngo mube abana nyakuri ba So uri mu ijuru , kuko avusha izuba rye ku beza no ku babi , kandi akagusha n'imvura ye ku ntungane no ku bagome .
40005046	Niba mukunda ababakunda gusa , ubwo se mukwiriye ngororano ki ? Mbese abasoresha bo ntibabigenza batyo ?
40005047	Kandi niba muramutsa incuti zanyu gusa , muba murushije iki abandi bantu ? Mbese abatazi Imana bo ntibabigenza batyo ?
40005048	Mube intungane nk'uko So uri mu ijuru ari intungane .
40006001	“ Ibikorwa byiza byanyu murajye mwirinda kubikorera imbere y'abantu kugira ngo babarebe , mutazivutsa ingororano ya So uri mu ijuru .
40006002	“ Igihe uhaye umukene imfashanyo ntukabyamamaze nk'uko abantu b'indyarya babigenza , bari mu nsengero no mu mayira kugira ngo abantu babashime . Ndababwira nkomeje ko ingororano yabo baba bamaze kuyishyikira .
40006003	Ahubwo wowe igihe uhaye umukene imfashanyo , ntihakagire n'inyoni ibimenya .
40006004	Bityo ibyo umuhaye bizabe ibanga . Nuko So we umenya ibiri mu ibanga azakwitura .
40006005	“ Igihe musenga ntimukamere nk'abantu b'indyarya , bakunda gusenga bahagaze mu nsengero no mu mahuriro y'inzira kugira ngo abantu bababone . Ndababwira nkomeje ko ingororano yabo baba bamaze kuyishyikira .
40006006	Ahubwo wowe igihe usenga ujye winjira mu cyumba cyawe ukinge , maze usenge So uba ahatagaragara . Nuko So we umenya ibiri mu ibanga azakwitura .
40006007	“ Igihe musenga ntimugatondagure amagambo atagira icyo avuga , nk'uko abatazi Imana babigenza bibwira ko bazasubizwa kubera amagambo menshi .
40006008	Ntimukagenze nka bo , kuko So aba azi icyo mukeneye mutarakimusaba .
40006009	Nuko rero mujye musenga muti :
40006010	ubwami bwawe nibuze . Ibyo ushaka bibe ari byo bikorwa ku isi , nkuko bikorwa mu ijuru .
40006011	Uduhe none ifunguro ridukwiriye .
40006012	Utubabarire ibyo twagucumuyeho , nkuko natwe tubabarira abaducumuyeho .
40006013	Ntutureke ngo tugwe mu byadushuka , ahubwo udukize ikibi , [ kuko ubwami nubushobozi nikuzo ari ibyawe iteka ryose . Amina . ] ’

40010030	Naho mwe , n'imisatsi yanyu yose irabaze .
40010031	Nuko rero ntimugatinye kuko mwe murusha kure agaciro ibishwi byinshi .
40010032	“ Umuntu wese uzanyemera imbere y'abantu , nanjye nzamwemera imbere ya Data uri mu ijuru .
40010033	Ariko uzanyihakanira imbere y'abantu , nanjye nzamwihakanira imbere ya Data uri mu ijuru .
40010034	“ Ntimutekereze ko naje kuzana amahoro ku isi . Sinaje kuzana amahoro ahubwo ni inkota .
40010035	Naje gutandukanya umuhungu na se , umukobwa na nyina , umukazana na nyirabukwe .
40010036	Nuko rero abanzi b'umuntu bazaba abo mu rugo rwe .
40010037	“ Ukunda se cyangwa nyina akabandutisha ntakwiriye kuba uwanjye . Ukunda umuhungu we cyangwa umukobwa we akabandutisha , na we ntakwiriye kuba uwanjye .
40010038	Udatwara umusaraba we ngo ankurikire ntakwiriye kuba uwanjye .
40010039	Uwihambira ku buzima bwe azabubura , nyamara uwemera kubuhara ari jye azira azabusubirana .
40010040	“ Ubakira ni jye aba yakiriye , kandi unyakira aba yakiriye Uwantumye .
40010041	Uwakira umuhanuzi kuko ari umuntu watumwe n'Imana , azahabwa ingororano iteganyirijwe abahanuzi . Uwakira kandi umuntu utunganiye Imana kuko ayitunganiye , azahabwa ingororano iteganyirijwe intungane .
40010042	Uzaha umwe muri aba boroheje nibura agakombe k'amazi afutse yo kunywa , ayamuhereye ko ari umwigishwa wanjye , ndababwira nkomeje ko atazabura kugororerwa . ”
40011001	Yezu amaze guha abigishwa be cumi na babiri ayo mabwiriza , aherako ajya kwigisha no kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza mu mijyi y'iwabo .
40011002	Ubwo Yohani yari muri gereza yumvise ibyo Kristo akora , amutumaho abigishwa be
40011003	kumubaza bati : “ Mbese ni wowe wa wundi ugomba kuza , cyangwa se dutegereze undi ? ”
40011004	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Mugende mutekerereze Yohani ibyo mwiyumviye n'ibyo mwiboneye muti :
40011005	‘ Impumyi zirahumuka , abamugaye baragenda , ababembe barakira , ibipfamatwi birumva , abapfuye barazuka , n'abakene baragezwaho Ubutumwa bwiza ! ’
40011006	Hahirwa rero umuntu wese utazareka kunyizera . ”
40011007	Abo bigishwa ba Yohani batirimutse aho , Yezu atangira kubwira rubanda ibyerekeye Yohani , arababaza ati : “ Mwagiye mu butayu kureba iki ? Mbese ni urubingo ruhungabanywa n'umuyaga ?
40011008	None se mwagiye kureba iki ? Ese ni umuntu wambaye imyambaro y'agaciro ? Oya , abambaye imyambaro y'agaciro ni abibera mu ngoro z'abami .
40011009	None se nyine mwagiye kureba iki ? Ese ni umuhanuzi ? Ni we koko ndetse aruta umuhanuzi !
40011010	Yohani uwo ni we Ibyanditswe bivuga , aho Imana igira iti : ‘ Dore nohereje intumwa yanjye mbere yawe kugira ngo igutunganyirize inzira . ’
40011011	“ Ndababwira nkomeje ko mu bana b'abantu hatigeze habaho uruta Yohani Mubatiza , nyamara umuto mu bwami bw'ijuru aramuruta .
40011012	Kuva igihe Yohani Mubatiza yigishaga kugeza ubu ubwami bw'ijuru buraharanirwa , ab'intwari bakaba ari bo babwegukana .
40011013	Ibyanditswe n'abahanuzi bose no mu Mategeko , byakomeje guhanura ibyabwo kugeza igihe cya Yohani .
40011014	Mushatse kandi kubyemera , Yohani uwo ni we Eliya wagombaga kuza .
40011015	Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve !
40011016	“ Mbese abantu b'iki gihe nabagereranya n'iki ? Ni nk'abana bicaye mu masoko bahamagarana bati :
40011017	‘ Twateye imbyino z'umunezero ntimwabyina ! Duteye iz'ishavu ntimwarira ! ’
40011018	Yohani yaje yigomwa kurya no kunywa baravuga bati : ‘ Yahanzweho ! ’
40011019	Naho Umwana w'umuntu aje arya kandi anywa baravuga bati : ‘ Mbega igisahiranda cy'igisinzi , cy'incuti y'abasoresha n'abanyabyaha ! ’ Nyamara ubwenge bw'Imana bugaragazwa n'icyo bwakoze . ”
40011020	Nuko Yezu atangira gutonganya abo mu mijyi yakoreyemo ibitangaza byinshi , kuko banze kwihana . Aravuga ati :
40011021	“ Mwa bantu b'i Korazini mwe , muzabona ishyano ! Namwe bantu b'i Betsayida , muzabona ishyano ! Ibitangaza Imana yakoreye muri mwe iyo bikorerwa i Tiri n'i Sidoni , kuva kera abaho baba barambaye imyambaro igaragaza akababaro kandi bakisiga ivu , bagaragaza ko bihannye .
40011022	Nyamara reka mbabwire : ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , ab'i Tiri n'i Sidoni bazahanishwa igihano kidakaze nk'icyanyu .
40011023	Namwe bantu b'i Kafarinawumu , ese muragira ngo muzashyirwa hejuru mugere ku ijuru ? Reka da ! Ahubwo muzamanurwa mugere ikuzimu , kuko ibitangaza Imana yakoreye iwanyu iyo bikorerwa i Sodoma , Sodoma iba igihagaze kugeza n'ubu .
40011024	Reka mbabwire : ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , abo mu karere ka Sodoma bazahanishwa igihano kidakaze nk'icyanyu . ”
40011025	Uwo mwanya Yezu aravuga ati : “ Ndagushimiye Data Nyir'ijuru n'isi , kuko ibyo wabihishe abanyabwenge n'abahanga , ukabihishurira abaciye bugufi .
40011026	Yego Data , uko ni ko biri kuko ari byo wishimiye .
40011027	“ Ibintu byose nabyeguriwe na Data . Ntawe uzi Umwana w'Imana keretse Se , kandi ntawe uzi Se keretse Umwana we n'abo uwo Mwana we ashatse kumuhishurira .
40011028	“ Mwese abarushye n'abaremerewe nimunsange mbaruhure !
40011029	Mwikorere umutwaro wanjye kandi mundebereho , kuko ndi umugwaneza nkaba niyoroshya . Bityo muzagira ituze mu mutima ,
40011030	kuko umutwaro mbakorera utavunanye kandi umuzigo mbahambirira nturemere . ”
40012001	Icyo gihe Yezu anyura mu mirima y'ingano ari ku isabato , abigishwa be bari bashonje maze batangira guca amahundo bararya .
40012002	Abafarizayi babibonye baramubwira bati : “ Dore abigishwa bawe barakora ibidakwiriye gukorwa ku isabato . ”
40012003	Yezu arababaza ati : “ Mbese ntimwasomye ibyo Dawidi yakoze igihe we n'abo bari kumwe bari bashonje ?
40012004	Icyo gihe yinjiye mu Nzu y'Imana , we n'abo bari kumwe barya imigati yatuwe Imana kandi batari babyemerewe , kuko yari igenewe abatambyi bonyine .
40012005	Cyangwa se ntimwasomye mu Mategeko ko iyo abatambyi bafashe igihe mu Ngoro y'Imana ku isabato , bica itegeko rigenga isabato kandi ntibibabere icyaha ?
40012006	Reka mbabwire ko hano hari uruta Ingoro y'Imana .
40012007	Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : ‘ Icyo mbashakaho si ibitambo , ahubwo ni uko mugira impuhwe . ’ Iyo musobanukirwa iryo jambo ntimwashyize abere mu rubanza ,
40012008	kuko Umwana w'umuntu ari we mugenga w'isabato . ”
40012009	Yezu avayo ajya mu rusengero rwabo ,
40012010	aho hakaba umuntu unyunyutse ikiganza . Nuko babaza Yezu bati : “ Mbese biremewe gukiza umurwayi ku isabato ? ” Ibyo babivugiraga kugira ngo babone icyo bamurega .
40012011	Na we arababaza ati : “ Ni nde muri mwe waba afite intama imwe , maze ikagwa mu rwobo ku munsi w'isabato ntajye kuyikuramo ?
40012012	Nyamara ukuntu umuntu arusha intama agaciro ! Nuko rero mumenye ko byemewe kugira neza ku munsi w'isabato . ”
40012013	Yezu ni ko kubwira uwo muntu ati : “ Rambura ikiganza . ” Arakirambura maze cyongera kuba kizima nk'ikindi .
40012014	Abafarizayi basohotse bahuza umugambi ngo bashake uko bamwica .
40012015	Yezu abimenye ava aho hantu aragenda . Abantu benshi baramukurikira , abarwayi bose akabakiza .
40012016	Abihanangiriza akomeje ngo be kumwamamaza .

40012018	“ Dore umugaragu wanjye nitoranyirije , ndamukunda cyane ni we nishimira . Nzamushyiramo Mwuka wanjye , azatangariza amahanga ubutabera .
40012019	Ntazatongana kandi ntazasakuza , ntazarangurura ijwi rye mu mayira .
40012020	Urubingo ruvunitse ntazaruhwanya , itara rigicumbeka ntazarizimya , kugeza igihe azaba atumye ubutabera butsinda .
40012021	Bityo amahanga yose azamwiringira . ”
40012022	Nuko bamuzanira umuntu wahanzweho , akaba impumyi n'ikiragi , Yezu aramukiza ku buryo yahumutse kandi akavuga .

40012024	Abafarizayi babyumvise baravuga bati : “ Uriya mugabo nta wundi umuha ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani , keretse Bēlizebuli umutware wazo . ”
40012025	Yezu amenye ibyo batekereza arababwira ati : “ Iyo igihugu gisubiranyemo kirasenyuka , kandi iyo umujyi usubiranyemo ntukomera , n'umuryango na wo ni uko .
40012026	None se niba Satani amenesha Satani , ntiyaba yiciyemo ibice ? Ubwo se ubwami bwe bwakomera bute ?
40012027	Ikindi kandi , mbese niba ari Bēlizebuli umpa ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo ze , bene wanyu bo ubwo bubasha babuhabwa na nde ? Ubwo babikora ni bo bazatuma mutsindwa n'urubanza .
40012028	Noneho kubera ko ari Mwuka w'Imana utuma menesha ingabo za Satani , ni ukuvuga ko ubwami bwayo bubagezeho .
40012029	“ Mbese umuntu yabasha ate kwigabiza urugo rw'umunyamaboko kugira ngo amusahure ibyo atunze , atabanje kumuboha ? Ubwo ni bwo yasahura urugo rwe .
40012030	“ Utari mu ruhande rwanjye aba andwanya , kandi udakoranyiriza hamwe nanjye aba atatanya .
40012031	Ni cyo gituma mbabwira ko nta cyaha abantu batazababarirwa naho kwaba gutuka Imana , ariko umuntu wese uzatuka Mwuka Muziranenge ntazababarirwa .
40012032	Umuntu wese uzavuga nabi Umwana w'umuntu azababarirwa , ariko uzavuga nabi Mwuka Muziranenge ntazababarirwa , haba muri iki gihe , haba no mu gihe kizaza .

40012035	Umuntu mwiza akura ibyiza mu migambi ye myiza , naho umuntu mubi agakura ibibi mu migambi ye mibi .

40012040	Nk'uko Yonasi yamaze iminsi itatu n'amajoro atatu mu nda y'igifi , ni ko n'Umwana w'umuntu azamara iminsi itatu n'amajoro atatu mu nda y'isi .
40012041	Ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , ab'i Ninive bazahagurukira ab'iki gihe maze bababuranye babatsinde , kuko bitaye ku byo Yonasi yabatangarije bakihana , kandi rero hano hari uruta Yonasi .
40012042	Ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , wa mwamikazi waturutse mu majyepfo azahagurukira ab'iki gihe maze ababuranye abatsinde , kuko we yavuye iyo bigwa akaza kumva amagambo y'ubwenge bwa Salomo , kandi rero hano hari uruta Salomo .
40012043	“ Iyo ingabo ya Satani ivuye mu muntu izerera ku gasi ishaka aho yaruhukira , yahabura
40012044	ikibwira iti : ‘ Reka nsubire mu nzu yanjye navuyemo . ’ Yagerayo igasanga nta muntu urimo , ikubuye iteguye .
40012045	Nuko ikajya kuzana izindi ngabo ndwi ziyitambukije ubugome , zose zikinjirana zigatura muri uwo muntu . Nuko imibereho ye ya nyuma ikarusha iya mbere kuba mibi . Uko ni ko bizaba ku bantu babi b'iki gihe . ”
40012046	Igihe Yezu akiganira na rubanda , nyina n'abavandimwe be baba barahageze , baguma hanze bashaka kuvugana na we . [

40013001	Uwo munsi Yezu ava imuhira , ajya ku kiyaga yicara ku nkombe .

40013005	Izindi zigwa ku gasi zihita zimera , kuko ubutaka ari bugufi .
40013006	Izuba ricanye rirazotsa ziruma , kuko zidafite aho zishorera imizi .
40013007	Izindi zigwa mu mahwa , amahwa azirengaho maze ziragwingira .

40013009	Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve ! ”
40013010	Nuko abigishwa be baramwegera baramubaza bati : “ Ni iki gituma wigisha abantu ukoresheje imigani ? ”

40013013	Naho abandi igituma mbabwira nkoresheje imigani ni uko bareba ariko ntibabone , batega amatwi ariko ntibumve kandi ntibasobanukirwe .
40013014	Bityo biba nk'uko byavuzwe n'umuhanuzi Ezayi ngo :
40013015	Erega aba ni abantu binangiye ! Biziba amatwi , bahunza amaso , kugira ngo be kubona , be no kumva , kandi be gusobanukirwa , kugira ngo batangarukira nkabakiza . ’
40013016	Mwebwe murahirwa kuko amaso yanyu areba , n'amatwi yanyu akaba yumva .
40013017	Ndababwira nkomeje ko abahanuzi benshi n'intungane nyinshi bashatse kureba ibyo mureba ntibabibona , kandi bashatse kumva ibyo mwumva ntibabyumva .
40013018	“ Nimutege amatwi rero mwumve iby'uwo mugani w'umubibyi .
40013019	Umuntu wese wumva Ijambo ry'ubwami bw'ijuru ntarisobanukirwe , ahwanye na ha handi ku nzira imbuto zaguye , maze Sekibi akaza agasahura icyabibwe mu mutima we .
40013020	Aho zabibwe ku gasi ni nk'umuntu wumva Ijambo ry'Imana , ako kanya akaryakirana ubwuzu ,
40013021	nyamara ntatume rishorera imizi muri we , bityo akarimarana igihe gito . Iyo habaye ingorane cyangwa gutotezwa ahōrwa Ijambo ry'Imana , ahita acika intege .
40013022	Aho zabibwe mu mahwa ni nk'umuntu wumva Ijambo ry'Imana , nyamara guhagarikwa umutima n'iby'isi no gushukwa n'ubukungu , bikarenga kuri iryo Jambo rikaba nk'imbuto zarumbye .
40013023	Aho zabibwe mu butaka bwiza ni nk'umuntu wumva Ijambo ry'Imana akarisobanukirwa akera imbuto , umwe ijana , undi mirongo itandatu , undi mirongo itatu . ”
40013024	Yezu abaha ikindi kigereranyo ati : “ Iby'ubwami bw'ijuru wabigereranya n'umuntu wari warabibye imbuto nziza mu murima we .
40013025	Igihe abantu basinziriye , umwanzi araza abiba urukungu hagati mu ngano .
40013026	Nuko imyaka ibaye imigengararo , urukungu ruramenyekana .

40013028	Arabasubiza ati : ‘ Ibyo ni umwanzi wabikoze . ’ Abagaragu bati : ‘ Mbese urashaka ko tujya kururandura ? ’
40013029	Na we ati : ‘ Oya , mutarurandurana n'ingano .
40013030	Nimureke bikurane byombi kugeza igihe cy'isarura , ni bwo nzabwira abasaruzi nti : Mubanze murundanye urukungu , muruhambiremo imiba muyitwike , maze ingano muzihunike mu kigega cyanjye . ’ ”
40013031	Yezu yongera kubaha ikigereranyo ati : “ Ubwami bw'ijuru wabugereranya n'akabuto kitwa sinapi , umuntu yabibye mu murima we .
40013032	Karutwa n'izindi mbuto zose , nyamara kamara kumera kagasumba ibindi bihingwa kakangana n'igiti , inyoni zikaza zikarika mu mashami yacyo . ”
40013033	Arongera abaha n'ikindi kigereranyo ati : “ Ubwami bw'ijuru wabugereranya n'umusemburo umugore yafashe , akawuvanga n'ibyibo bitatu by'ifu kugeza ubwo yose itutumbye . ”
40013034	Ibyo byose Yezu yabibwiraga rubanda akoresheje imigani . Nta cyo yababwiraga adakoresheje imigani .
40013035	Kwari ukugira ngo bibe nk'uko byavuzwe n'umuhanuzi ngo :
40013036	Nuko Yezu asezera kuri rubanda asubira imuhira . Abigishwa be bajya aho ari baramubwira bati : “ Dusobanurire cya kigereranyo cy'urukungu rwabibwe mu murima . ”
40013037	Nuko arababwira ati : “ Ubiba imbuto nziza ni Umwana w'umuntu ,

40013039	Umwanzi warubibye ni Satani . Isarura ryo ni imperuka y'isi , naho abasaruzi ni abamarayika .
40013040	Nk'uko barundarunda urukungu bakarutwika , ni ko bizamera ku mperuka y'isi .
40013041	Umwana w'umuntu azatuma abamarayika be , batoratore abatera abandi gukora ibyaha n'inkozi z'ibibi , babakure mu bwami bwe
40013042	maze babarohe mu itanura ry'umuriro , aho bazarira kandi bagahekenya amenyo .
40013043	Ubwo abatunganiye Imana bazarabagirana nk'izuba mu bwami bwa Se . Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve !
40013044	“ Iby'ubwami bw'ijuru wabigereranya n'ikintu cy'agaciro gihishwe mu murima , umuntu yakigwaho akongera akagihisha maze akagenda yamazwe n'ibyishimo , ku buryo agurisha ibyo afite byose akagaruka kugura uwo murima .
40013045	“ Na none iby'ubwami bw'ijuru wabigereranya n'umucuruzi washakaga amasaro y'agahebuzo .
40013046	Nuko abonye rimwe ry'igiciro kinini , aragenda agurisha ibye byose ararigura .
40013047	“ Byongeye kandi , iby'ubwami bw'ijuru wabigereranya n'umutego w'amafi banaze mu kiyaga , ugafata amafi y'amoko yose .
40013048	Iyo umaze kūzura bawukururira ku nkombe , bakicara bakajonjora amafi , ameza bakayashyira mu bitebo , amabi bakayajugunya .
40013049	Uko ni ko bizamera ku mperuka y'isi , abamarayika bazaza bajonjore ababi babakure mu ntungane ,
40013050	babarohe mu itanura ry'umuriro aho bazarira kandi bagahekenya amenyo . ”
40013051	Nuko arababaza ati : “ Ibyo byose murabyumvise ? ” Bati : “ Yee . ”
40013052	Arababwira ati : “ Noneho rero umwigishamategeko wese wigishijwe iby'ubwami bw'ijuru , wamugereranya na nyir'urugo ukora mu byo atunze , akazana ibintu bimwe bishya n'ibindi bya kera . ”
40013053	Nuko Yezu amaze kubacira iyo migani , arahava
40013054	ajya mu mujyi w'iwabo maze yigishiriza mu rusengero rwaho . Baratangara cyane bati : “ Mbese ubwenge afite n'ibitangaza akora abikura he ?
40013055	Mbese si umwana wa wa mubaji ? Ese nyina ntiyitwa Mariya ? Mbese abavandimwe be si Yakobo na Yozefu na Simoni na Yuda ?
40013056	Mbese bashiki be bose ntiduturanye ? None se biriya akora byose abikura he ? ”
40013057	Ibyo bituma batamwemera . Yezu ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Nta handi umuhanuzi asuzugurwa , uretse mu karere k'iwabo n'iwe mu rugo . ”
40013058	Nuko aho ntiyahakorera ibitangaza byinshi kubera ko batamwemeye .
40014001	Muri icyo gihe Herodi umutegetsi w'intara ya Galileya yumva ibya Yezu .
40014002	Nuko abwira abo mu rugo rwe ati : “ Uriya muntu ni Yohani Mubatiza wazutse ! Ni cyo gituma afite ububasha bwo gukora ibitangaza . ”

41001001	Ngiyi intangiriro y'Ubutumwa bwiza bwerekeye Yezu Kristo Umwana w'Imana .
41001002	Byanditswe mu gitabo cy'umuhanuzi Ezayi ngo :
41001003	Nimwumve ijwi ryurangururira mu butayu ati : ‘ Nimutunganye inzira ya Nyagasani , muringanize aho azanyura . ’ ”
41001004	Yohani yatungutse mu butayu atangaza ko abantu bagomba kwihana bakabatizwa , kugira ngo bababarirwe ibyaha .
41001005	Icyo gihe abaturage bo mu ntara yose ya Yudeya n'abo mu murwa wayo wa Yeruzalemu bose basangaga Yohani , akababatiriza mu ruzi rwa Yorodani , bemerera mu ruhame ibyaha byabo .
41001006	Yohani yambaraga umwambaro uboheshejwe ubwoya bw'ingamiya , akawukenyeza umukandara w'uruhu . Yatungwaga n'isanane n'ubuki bw'ubuhura ,
41001007	akajya atangaza ati : “ Nyuma yanjye hagiye kuza undusha ububasha , ntibinkwiriye no kunama ngo mbe napfundura udushumi tw'inkweto ze .
41001008	Jyewe ndababatirisha amazi , ariko we azababatirisha Mwuka Muziranenge . ”
41001009	Muri iyo minsi Yezu ava i Nazareti yo muri Galileya , maze Yohani amubatiriza muri Yorodani .
41001010	Yezu akiva mu mazi abona ijuru rirakingutse , na Mwuka w'Imana amumanukiraho asa n'inuma .
41001011	Nuko humvikana ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru ati : “ Uri Umwana wanjye nkunda cyane , ni wowe nishimira . ”
41001012	Mwuka w'Imana aherako amujyana mu butayu ,
41001013	ahamara iminsi mirongo ine ageragezwa na Satani . Yahabanaga n'inyamaswa , abamarayika ari bo bamukorera .
41001014	Yohani amaze gufungwa , Yezu ajya muri Galileya yamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana agira ati :
41001015	“ Igihe kirageze , ubwami bw'Imana buregereje . Nimwihane maze mwemere Ubutumwa bwiza . ”
41001016	Nuko Yezu anyura iruhande rw'ikiyaga cya Galileya , abona Simoni n'umuvandimwe we Andereya barobesha imitego y'amafi mu kiyaga , kuko bari abarobyi .
41001017	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nimunkurikire nzabagira abarobyi b'abantu . ”
41001018	Bahita basiga aho imitego yabo baramukurikira .
41001019	Yigiye imbere ho gato abona Yakobo na Yohani bene Zebedeyi . Na bo bari mu bwato batunganya imitego barobeshaga .
41001020	Ako kanya Yezu arabahamagara . Nuko basiga se Zebedeyi n'abakozi be mu bwato baramukurikira .
41001021	Nuko bagera i Kafarinawumu . Ku munsi w'isabato Yezu ajya mu rusengero rw'Abayahudi atangira kwigisha .
41001022	Abaho batangazwa cyane n'imyigishirize ye , kuko atigishaga nk'abigishamategeko , ahubwo we yigishaga nk'ufite ubushobozi .
41001023	Ako kanya mu rusengero haboneka umuntu wahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani , avuga aranguruye ati :
41001024	“ Yezu w'i Nazareti , uradushakaho iki ? Mbese wazanywe no kuturimbura ? Nzi uwo uri we , ni wowe Muziranenge wavuye ku Mana . ”
41001025	Yezu acyaha iyo ngabo ya Satani ati : “ Ceceka muvemo ! ”
41001026	Nuko itigisa uwo muntu bikabije maze imuvamo ivuza induru .
41001027	Bose barumirwa bigeza aho babazanya bati : “ Ibi ni ibiki ? Mbega inyigisho nshya ! Arategekana ububasha ingabo za Satani na zo zikamwumvira ! ”
41001028	Bidatinze inkuru ye yamamara mu karere kose ka Galileya .
41001029	Bakiva mu rusengero Yezu ajya kwa Simoni na Andereya , ari kumwe na Yakobo na Yohani .
41001030	Bagezeyo basanga nyirabukwe wa Simoni aryamye ahinda umuriro . Ako kanya babwira Yezu iby'uburwayi bwe .
41001031	Yezu aramusanga , amufata ukuboko aramwegura . Nuko umuriro urazima , arabyuka arabazimanira .
41001032	Nimugoroba izuba rirenze , abantu bamuzanira abarwayi bose n'abahanzweho n'ingabo za Satani .
41001033	Abaturage b'umujyi bose bari bateraniye ku irembo .
41001034	Nuko akiza abantu benshi bari barwaye indwara zitari zimwe , amenesha n'ingabo nyinshi za Satani zari mu bantu . Ariko ntiyazikundira kuvuga kuko zari zamumenye .
41001035	Bukeye bwaho Yezu abyuka kare mu rukerera , ajya ahantu hiherereye arasenga .
41001036	Simoni na bagenzi be bajya kumushaka .
41001037	Bamubonye baramubwira bati : “ Abantu bose baragushaka . ”
41001038	Arabasubiza ati : “ Ahubwo nimuze tujye mu yindi misozi idukikije , na ho namamazeyo Ubutumwa bwiza kuko ari cyo cyanzanye . ”
41001039	Nuko azenguruka Galileya yose avuga Ubutumwa bwiza , abutangariza mu nsengero zaho kandi amenesha ingabo za Satani zari mu bantu .
41001040	Nuko umuntu urwaye ibibembe asanga Yezu aramupfukamira , aramubwira ati : “ Ubishatse wankiza . ”
41001041	Yezu amugirira impuhwe , arambura ukuboko amukoraho agira ati : “ Ndabishaka kira . ”
41001042	Ako kanya ibibembe bimushiraho arakira .
41001043	Yezu ahita amusezerera amwihanangiriza ati :
41001044	“ Uramenye ntugire uwo ubibwira . Icyakora ujye kwiyereka umutambyi maze uture igitambo cyo guhumanurwa nk'uko Musa yabitegetse , bibabere icyemezo cy'uko wakize . ”
41001045	Nyamara uwo muntu akimara kuva aho atangira kubyamamaza , abibwira umuhisi n'umugenzi bigeza aho Yezu yari atakigenda mu mijyi ku mugaragaro , ahubwo akigumira mu gasozi ahantu hadatuwe , akaba ari ho abantu bamusanga baturutse hirya no hino .
41002001	Hashize iminsi mike Yezu agaruka i Kafarinawumu , abantu bamenya ko ari imuhira .
41002002	Hateranira abantu benshi buzura mu nzu , ku buryo nta kanya na busa kabonekaga haba no mu muryango . Yezu atangira kubabwira Ijambo ry'Imana .
41002003	Haza abantu bamuzaniye umuntu umugaye ahetswe na bane muri bo .
41002004	Basanga badashoboye kumugeza aho Yezu ari kuko hari abantu benshi . Nuko basambura igisenge cy'inzu aharinganiye n'aho Yezu yari ari , maze mu cyuho baciye bamanuriramo ingobyi uwo muntu umugaye yari ahetswemo .
41002005	Yezu abonye ukwizera kwabo abwira uwo murwayi ati : “ Mwana wanjye , ibyaha byawe urabibabariwe . ”
41002006	Bamwe mu bigishamategeko bari bicaye aho barabazanya bati :
41002007	“ Uriya atewe n'iki kuvuga atyo ? Aratuka Imana ! Ni nde ubasha kubabarira abantu ibyaha uretse Imana yonyine ? ”
41002008	Ako kanya Yezu amenya ibyo batekereza , ni ko kubabaza ati : “ Ni iki kibateye gutekereza mutyo ?
41002009	Icyoroshye ni ikihe , ari ukubwira uyu muntu umugaye ngo ‘ Ibyaha byawe urabibabariwe ’ , cyangwa ngo ‘ Byuka ufate ingobyi yawe ugende ? ’
41002010	Nyamara ndagira ngo mumenye ko ku isi Umwana w'umuntu afite ubushobozi bwo kubabarira abantu ibyaha . ” Nuko abwira uwo muntu umugaye ati :
41002011	“ Ndagutegetse , byuka ufate ingobyi yawe witahire . ”
41002012	Ako kanya arabyuka afata ingobyi ye , asohoka abantu bose bamureba ku buryo bose batangaye cyane , basingiza Imana bati : “ Nta na rimwe twigeze tubona ibintu nk'ibi ! ”
41002013	Yezu asubira ku Kiyaga cya Galileya , maze imbaga y'abantu irahamusanga arabigisha .
41002014	Nuko ahise abona Levi mwene Alufeyi , yicaye ku biro by'imisoro . Aramubwira ati : “ Nkurikira ! ” Levi aherako arahaguruka aramukurikira .
41002015	Igihe Yezu n'abigishwa be bari kwa Levi bafungura , abasoresha benshi n'abandi banyabyaha baraza basangira na bo , kuko mu bamukurikiraga , bene nk'abo bari benshi !
41002016	Abigishamategeko bo mu Bafarizayi babonye Yezu asangira n'abasoresha n'abanyabyaha , babaza abigishwa be bati : “ Kuki asangira n'abasoresha n'abanyabyaha ? ”
41002017	Yezu abyumvise arababwira ati : “ Abazima si bo bakenera umuvuzi , ahubwo abarwayi ni bo bamukenera . Sinazanywe no guhamagara intungane , ahubwo naje guhamagara abanyabyaha . ”
41002018	Igihe kimwe abigishwa ba Yohani Mubatiza n'Abafarizayi bari bigomwe kurya , maze abantu basanga Yezu baramubaza bati : “ Kuki abigishwa ba Yohani n'ab'Abafarizayi bigomwa kurya , naho abawe ntibabikore ? ”
41002019	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Mbese mu bukwe abasangwa bashobora kwigomwa kurya , umukwe akiri kumwe na bo ? Oya , igihe cyose bakiri kumwe ntibashobora kwigomwa kurya .
41002020	Nyamara igihe kizagera umukwe avanwe muri bo , ni bwo bazigomwa kurya .
41002021	“ Ntawe utera ikiremo gishya ku mwenda ushaje . Uwabikora , ikiremo gishya cyawukurura ukarushaho gushishimuka .
41002022	Nta n'usuka inzoga y'umubira mu mpago z'impu zishaje . Uwabikora , impago zaturika zikangirika inzoga igasandara . Ahubwo inzoga y'umubira bayisuka mu mpago zikiri nshya . ”
41002023	Igihe kimwe Yezu anyuze mu mirima y'ingano ku isabato , abigishwa be bagenda baca amahundo .
41002024	Nuko Abafarizayi babwira Yezu bati : “ Dorere , kuki bakora ibidakwiriye gukorwa ku isabato ? ”
41002025	Yezu arababaza ati : “ Mbese ntimwigeze musoma ibyo Dawidi yakoze , igihe we n'abo bari kumwe bari bashonje cyane ?
41002026	Icyo gihe yinjiye mu Nzu y'Imana arya imigati yatuwe Imana , kandi nta wemererwaga kuyirya uretse abatambyi . Ariko Dawidi yayiriyeho ahaho n'abo bari kumwe . Ibyo byabaye igihe Abiyatari yari Umutambyi mukuru . ”
41002027	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Isabato yabereyeho abantu , abantu si bo babereyeho isabato .
41002028	Nuko rero Umwana w'umuntu ni we ugenga n'isabato . ”
41003001	Yezu asubiye mu rusengero ahasanga umuntu wari unyunyutse ikiganza .
41003002	Bagenzura Yezu ngo barebe ko amukiza ku isabato , kugira ngo babone icyo bamurega .
41003003	Yezu abwira uwo muntu wari unyunyutse ikiganza ati : “ Haguruka ujye hariya hagati . ”
41003004	Nuko arababaza ati : “ Mbese hemewe iki ku munsi w'isabato , kugira neza cyangwa se kugira nabi ? Gukiza umuntu cyangwa kumwica ? ” Baricecekera .
41003005	Yezu abararanganyamo amaso arakaye , kandi atewe agahinda n'uko imitima yabo inangiye . Nuko abwira uwo muntu ati : “ Rambura ikiganza . ” Arakirambura maze cyongera kuba kizima .
41003006	Abafarizayi basohotse , ako kanya bahuza umugambi n'abo mu ishyaka rya Herodi , kugira ngo bashake uko bamwica .
41003007	Nuko Yezu n'abigishwa be bagenda bagana ku kiyaga , imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu iramukurikira . Bari baturutse muri Galileya no muri Yudeya ,
41003008	baturutse n'i Yeruzalemu no mu ntara ya Idumeya no hakurya ya Yorodani , no mu karere ka Tiri na Sidoni . Bazanywe n'uko bumvise ibyo Yezu yakoraga .
41003009	Nuko abwira abigishwa be kumwegereza ubwato ngo ajyemo rubanda rutamuniganaho ,
41003010	kuko yari yakijije abantu benshi bigatuma abari barwaye bose bamwisukaho kugira ngo bamukoreho .
41003011	Ingabo za Satani na zo iyo zabonaga Yezu , zituraga hasi imbere ye zikarangurura ziti : “ Uri Umwana w'Imana . ”
41003012	Na we akazibuza azihanangiriza ngo ze kumwamamaza .
41003013	Hanyuma Yezu azamuka umusozi , maze ahamagara abo yishakiye baramusanga .
41003014	Nuko atoranya muri bo cumi na babiri kugira ngo babane na we , ajye abohereza kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza ,
41003015	abaha n'ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani .
41003016	Abo cumi na babiri yatoranyije ni aba : Simoni Petero ,
41003017	na Yakobo na Yohani bene Zebedeyi ari bo yahimbye Bowanerige ( ni ukuvuga “ abakubita nk'inkuba ” ) ,
41003018	na Andereya na Filipo na Barutolomayo , na Matayo na Tomasi na Yakobo mwene Alufeyi , na Tadeyo na Simoni w'umurwanashyaka w'igihugu ,
41003019	na Yuda Isikariyoti wa wundi wagambaniye Yezu .
41003020	Hanyuma Yezu agaruka imuhira , imbaga y'abantu yongera guterana , bigeza aho we n'abigishwa be babura uko bafungura .
41003021	Bene wabo babimenye baza kuhamuvana , kuko bavugaga bati : “ Yasaze . ”
41003022	Abigishamategeko bari bavuye i Yeruzalemu baravuga bati : “ Yahanzweho na Bēlizebuli ” , kandi bati : “ Ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani abuhabwa n'uwo mutware wazo . ”
41003023	Yezu arabahamagara maze abaha urugero ati : “ Satani ashobora ate kumenesha Satani ?
41003024	Iyo igihugu gisubiranyemo ntigishobora gukomera .
41003025	Byongeye kandi iyo umuryango usubiranyemo , ntushobora gukomera .
41003026	Nuko rero niba Satani ubwe yirwanya , aba yiciyemo ibice ntashobore gukomera , ibye bikaba birangiye .
41003027	“ Ntawe ubasha kwigabiza urugo rw'umunyamaboko ngo amusahure ibyo atunze keretse abanje kumuboha , ubwo ni bwo yasahura urugo rwe .
41003028	“ Ndababwira nkomeje ko ibyaha byose abantu bakoze , ndetse n'ibyo batutse Imana byose bazabibabarirwa .
41003029	Ariko uzatuka Mwuka Muziranenge ntabwo azababarirwa bibaho . Azabarwaho icyaha gihoraho iteka ryose . ”
41003030	Icyateye Yezu kuvuga ibyo ni uko bari bavuze ngo yahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani .
41003031	Nyina wa Yezu n'abavandimwe be baraza bahagarara hanze , bamutumaho .
41003032	Abantu benshi bari bicaye bamukikije baramubwira bati : “ Yewe , nyoko n'abavandimwe bawe bari hanze baragushaka . ”
41003033	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Mama n'abavandimwe banjye ni bande ? ”
41003034	Nuko araranganya amaso mu bari bicaye bamukikije , aravuga ati : “ Mama n'abavandimwe banjye ni aba :
41003035	umuntu wese ukora ibyo Imana ishaka ni we murumuna wanjye , ni we mushiki wanjye , ni na we mama . ”
41004001	Yezu yongera kwigishiriza ku nkombe y'ikiyaga . Imbaga y'abantu iramukikiza bituma ajya mu bwato yicaramo , abantu bose baguma imusozi .
41004002	Nuko abigisha ibintu byinshi akoresheje imigani ati :
41004003	“ Nimutege amatwi : umuntu yagiye kubiba ,
41004004	igihe abiba imbuto zimwe zigenda zigwa ku nzira , hanyuma inyoni ziraza zirazitoragura .
41004005	Izindi zigwa ku gasi zihita zimera , kuko ubutaka ari bugufi .
41004006	Izuba ricanye rirazotsa ziruma , kuko zidafite aho zishorera imizi .
41004007	Izindi zigwa mu mahwa , amahwa azirengaho ziragwingira ntizera .
41004008	Izindi zigwa mu butaka bwiza , ziramera zirakura maze zirera . Zimwe zera imbuto mirongo itatu , izindi mirongo itandatu , izindi ijana . ”
41004009	Nuko Yezu aravuga ati : “ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve ! ”
41004010	Yezu asigaye wenyine , abari kumwe na we barimo ba bandi cumi na babiri , bamusobanuza iby'imigani ye .
41004011	Nuko arababwira ati : “ Mwebwe mwahawe kumenya ibanga ry'ubwami bw'Imana , naho abandi byose babimenyeshwa n'imigani ,
41004012	kugira ngo
41004013	Nuko yongera kubabwira ati : “ Ese ko mutumvise uwo mugani , iyindi yose muzayimenya mute ?
41004014	Imbuto umubibyi abiba ni Ijambo ry'Imana .
41004015	Imbuto zaguye ku nzira zigereranywa n'abantu bumva iryo Jambo , maze ako kanya Satani akaza agakuraho Ijambo ryabibwe muri bo .
41004016	Izabibwe ku gasi ni nk'abantu bumva Ijambo ry'Imana , ako kanya bakaryakirana ubwuzu ,
41004017	nyamara ntibatume rishorera imizi muri bo , bityo bakarimarana igihe gito . Iyo habaye ingorane cyangwa gutotezwa bahōrwa Ijambo ry'Imana , bahita bacika intege .
41004018	Abandi ni nk'izabibwe mu mahwa . Ni abumva Ijambo ry'Imana ,
41004019	nyamara guhagarikwa umutima n'iby'isi no gushukwa n'ubukungu , no gutwarwa n'irari ry'ibindi bintu byose bikarenga kuri iryo Jambo , rikaba nk'imbuto zarumbye .
41004020	Naho abagereranywa n'izabibwe mu butaka bwiza , ni abumva Ijambo ry'Imana bakaryakira bakera imbuto , bamwe mirongo itatu , abandi mirongo itandatu , abandi ijana . ”
41004021	Yezu arababaza ati : “ Mbese hari uwacana itara akaryubikaho akabindi , cyangwa akaritereka munsi y'igitanda , ahubwo ntiyaritereka ahirengeye ?
41004022	Nta gihishwe kitazahishurwa , nta n'ibanga ritazashyirwa ahagaragara .
41004023	Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve ! ”
41004024	Arongera arababwira ati : “ Murajye mwitondera ibyo mwumva . Akebo mugeramo ni ko namwe muzagererwamo , ndetse muzarushirizwaho .
41004025	Ufite azongererwa , naho udafite na busa azakwa n'utwo yaririragaho . ”
41004026	Yezu arongera aravuga ati : “ Iby'ubwami bw'Imana wabigereranya n'umuntu utera imbuto mu murima .
41004027	Yasinzira cyangwa yaba maso ijoro n'amanywa , izo mbuto ziramera zigakura atazi uko bigenda .
41004028	Ubutaka ubwabwo ni bwo bwera imyaka : habanza ingemwe zigakura zikaba imigengararo , hanyuma na yo ikaba amahundo arimo impeke zeze .
41004029	Nuko imyaka yamara kwera , nyir'umurima agahita ategeka ko bazana imihoro ngo bayisarure , kuko ari igihe . ”
41004030	Yezu yongera kuvuga ati : “ Mbese ubwami bw'Imana twabugereranya n'iki , cyangwa twabacira uwuhe mugani wo kubwerekana ?
41004031	Twabugereranya n'akabuto kitwa sinapi , igihe bagatera kaba karutwa n'izindi mbuto zose zo ku isi .
41004032	Nyamara iyo bamaze kugatera karamera kagakura , kagasumba ibihingwa byose kakagaba amashami manini , inyoni zikaza kugamamo . ”
41004033	Nuko Yezu akomeza kubabwira Ijambo ry'Imana , akoresha imigani myinshi nk'iyo ku rugero bashoboye kumva .
41004034	Nta cyo yababwiraga adakoresheje imigani , ariko abigishwa be akabasobanurira byose biherereye .
41004035	Uwo munsi bugorobye , Yezu abwira abigishwa be ati : “ Twambuke dufate hakurya . ”
41004036	Basiga rubanda aho bamujyana muri bwa bwato yarimo , n'andi mato aramuherekeza .
41004037	Nuko haza inkubi y'umuyaga , umuhengeri w'amazi utangira kwiroha mu bwato bwenda gusendera .
41004038	Yezu we yari aryamye inyuma mu bwato , yiseguye agasego asinziriye . Abigishwa be baramukangura baramubwira bati : “ Mwigisha , nta cyo bikubwiye ko tugiye gushira ? ”
41004039	Nuko arakanguka maze acyaha umuyaga , abwira n'ikiyaga ati : “ Tuza ! Gwa neza ! ” Umuyaga urahosha haba ituze ryinshi .
41004040	Hanyuma arababaza ati : “ Ni iki cyabateye ubwoba bungana butyo ? Mbese n'ubu ntimurizera ? ”
41004041	Abigishwa be bakuka umutima barabazanya bati : “ Uyu ni muntu ki utegeka umuyaga n'ikiyaga bikamwumvira ? ”
41005001	Yezu afata hakurya y'ikiyaga mu ntara y'Abanyagerasa .
41005002	Yezu akigera imusozi , umuntu aza amusanga aturutse mu irimbi . Uwo muntu yari ahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani .
41005003	Yiberaga mu irimbi kandi nta muntu n'umwe wari ugishobora kumuboha , haba no kumubohesha iminyururu .
41005004	Akenshi bamubohaga amaguru bakoresheje ibyuma , n'amaboko bakoresheje iminyururu , noneho iminyururu akayituraguritsa , n'ibyuma akabicagagura . Nta muntu wari ukimushobora .
41005005	Ijoro n'amanywa yazereraga mu irimbi no ku misozi , avuza induru kandi yikebesha amabuye .
41005006	Akiri kure abona Yezu , aza yiruka aramupfukamira .
41005007	Maze avuga cyane aranguruye ijwi ati : “ Uranshakaho iki , Yezu Mwana w'Imana Isumbabyose ? Girira Imana we kunyica urubozo ! ”
41005008	Ibyo byatewe n'uko Yezu yari ategetse ati : “ Ngabo ya Satani , va muri uwo muntu ! ”
41005009	Yezu abaza uwo muntu ati : “ Witwa nde ? ” Aramusubiza ati : “ Nitwa Giteronyamwinshi , kuko turi benshi cyane . ”
41005010	Nuko yinginga Yezu cyane ngo ye kumenesha izo ngabo za Satani mu gihugu .
41005011	Hafi aho ku musozi hari umugana munini w'ingurube zarishaga .
41005012	Izo ngabo za Satani zinginga Yezu ziti : “ Tureke twigire muri ziriya ngurube tuziberemo ! ”
41005013	Arazemerera . Nuko ziva muri uwo muntu zinjira mu ngurube , maze umugana wose ucuncumuka ku gacuri wiroha mu kiyaga . Izo ngurube zose uko zari nk'ibihumbi bibiri zirarohama .
41005014	Abashumba bazo barahunga , iyo nkuru bayikwiza mu mujyi no mu byaro . Abaturage bahita baza kureba ibibaye ibyo ari byo .
41005015	Bageze aho Yezu ari , babona wa muntu wari warahanzweho na cya gitero nyamwinshi cy'ingabo za Satani , basanga yicaye yambaye , yagaruye ubwenge bibatera ubwoba .
41005016	Ababibonye babatekerereza ibyabaye kuri uwo muntu wari warahanzweho , n'ibyabaye kuri za ngurube .
41005017	Baherako binginga Yezu ngo abavire ku musozi .
41005018	Yezu agiye mu bwato , uwari warahanzweho aramwinginga ngo bijyanire .
41005019	Yezu ntiyamwemerera ahubwo aramubwira ati : “ Subira imuhira usange bene wanyu , ubatekerereze ibyo Nyagasani yagukoreye byose n'impuhwe yakugiriye . ”
41005020	Nuko uwo muntu aragenda , atangira kwamamaza muri ako karere ka Dekapoli ibyo Yezu yamukoreye byose , abantu bose baratangara .
41005021	Hanyuma Yezu ajya mu bwato asubira hakurya . Imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu yongera guteranira aho ari , ku nkombe y'ikiyaga .
41005022	Haza umuntu witwaga Yayiro , wari umwe mu batware b'urusengero rw'Abayahudi . Abonye Yezu aramupfukamira ,
41005023	aramwinginga cyane ati : “ Umukobwa wanjye arenda gupfa . Ndakwinginze ngwino umurambikeho ibiganza , kugira ngo akire ye gupfa . ”
41005024	Nuko barajyana . Yezu aherekezwa n'abantu benshi bagenda bamubyiganiraho .
41005025	Muri bo hari umugore wari urwaye indwara yo kuva , ayimaranye imyaka cumi n'ibiri .
41005026	Yarababaraga cyane , biturutse no ku baganga benshi yivujeho . Ibintu bimushiraho ntibyagira icyo bimumarira , ahubwo arushaho kumererwa nabi .
41005027	Yumvise ibyo bavugaga kuri Yezu , araza aca mu kivunge cy'abantu , amuturuka inyuma akora ku mwitero we
41005028	kuko yibwiraga ati : “ Ninkora ku myambaro ye ndakira . ”
41005029	Amaraso ahita akama , maze yumva mu mubiri we akize ya ndwara .
41005030	Ako kanya Yezu yiyumvamo ko hari imbaraga zimuvuyemo , arahindukira areba abantu , arababaza ati : “ Ni nde ukoze ku myambaro yanjye ? ”
41005031	Abigishwa be baramusubiza bati : “ Dorere ! Abantu barakubyiganiraho nawe ukabaza ngo ‘ Ni nde unkozeho ? ’ ”
41005032	Yezu abararanganyamo amaso , kugira ngo arebe uwabikoze uwo ari we .
41005033	Wa mugore ashya ubwoba ahinda umushyitsi , kuko yari azi ibimaze kumubaho . Araza amwikubita imbere , amubwiza ukuri kose .
41005034	Yezu ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Mwana wanjye , ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije . Genda amahoro kandi ukire icyo cyago ! ”
41005035	Akivuga atyo haza intumwa zibwira wa mutware w'urusengero ziti : “ Ko umukobwa wawe amaze gupfa , uraruhiriza iki umwigisha ? ”
41005036	Ariko Yezu yirengagiza ibyo bavuze , abwira uwo mutware w'urusengero ati : “ Witinya , nyizera gusa ! ”
41005037	Nuko ntiyagira uwo akundira kujyana na we , uretse Petero , na ba bavandimwe Yakobo na Yohani .
41005038	Bageze mu rugo rw'uwo mutware w'urusengero , Yezu ahasanga urusaku rw'abarira n'abacura imiborogo .
41005039	Yinjiye mu nzu arababaza ati : “ Ni iki gitumye musakuza ? Murarizwa n'iki ? Umwana ntiyapfuye , ahubwo arasinziriye . ”
41005040	Baramuseka cyane . Yezu ni ko guhēza abantu bose , ajyana n'ababyeyi b'umwana n'abari kumwe na we , bajya aho umwana ari .
41005041	Amufata ukuboko aramubwira ati : “ Talita kumi ” , ni ukuvuga ngo “ Mukobwa , byuka ! ”
41005042	Ako kanya uwo mukobwa arabyuka atangira kugenda , abantu barumirwa . Yari amaze imyaka cumi n'ibiri avutse .
41005043	Yezu arabihanangiriza ngo be kugira uwo bamenyesha ibibaye , kandi ababwira kugaburira uwo mwana .
41006001	Yezu ava aho ngaho ajya mu mujyi w'iwabo . Abigishwa be bajyana na we .
41006002	Isabato igeze ajya kwigishiriza mu rusengero . Abenshi bamwumvise baratangara cyane bati : “ Mbese biriya byose abikomora he ? Ubu bwenge yahawe ni bwenge ki ? Ibi bitangaza byo abikora ate ?
41006003	Mbese si we wa mubaji mwene Mariya , akaba n'umuvandimwe wa Yakobo na Yozefu , na Yuda na Simoni ? Ese bashiki be bo ntiduturanye ? ” Ibyo bituma batamwemera .
41006004	Nuko Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nta handi umuhanuzi asuzugurwa uretse mu karere k'iwabo no muri bene wabo , n'iwe mu rugo . ”

41006014	Umwami Herodi yumva ibya Yezu , kandi koko izina rye ryari rimaze kwamamara hose . Bamwe baravugaga bati : “ Ni Yohani Mubatiza wazutse ! Ni cyo gituma afite ububasha bwo gukora ibitangaza . ”
41006015	Abandi bakavuga bati : “ Ni Eliya . ” Naho abandi bati : “ Ni umuhanuzi kimwe n'abahanuzi ba kera . ”

41006019	Kubera iyo mpamvu Herodiya arwara Yohani inzika , agashaka uko yamwicisha nyamara ntabishobore .
41006020	Herodi yatinyaga Yohani akajya amurengera , kuko yari azi ko ari intungane akaba n'umuziranenge . Yakundaga kumwumva nubwo yamubwiraga ibimubangamiye .
41006021	Nuko Herodi atumira abatware be n'abakuru b'abasirikari n'abanyacyubahiro bo muri Galileya , mu munsi mukuru wo kwibuka ivuka rye . Noneho Herodiya abona ko ari cyo gihe cyo kwihimūra .
41006022	Umukobwa we araza arabyina , binyura Herodi n'abatumirwa be . Umwami Herodi ni ko kubwira uwo mukobwa ati : “ Nsaba icyo ushaka cyose ndakiguha . ”

41006024	Nuko uwo mukobwa arasohoka , abaza nyina ati : “ Nsabe iki ? ” Undi ati : “ Saba igihanga cya Yohani Mubatiza . ”

41006026	Umwami agira agahinda kenshi , nyamara kubera ko yari yabirahiriye imbere y'abatumirwa be yanga kukimwima .

41006028	akizana ku mbehe . Agiha uwo mukobwa , na we agishyikiriza nyina .
41006029	Abigishwa ba Yohani bumvise ibyabaye , baraza bajyana umurambo we bawushyingura mu mva .

41006032	Nuko bajya mu bwato bajya kwiherera ahantu hadatuwe .
41006033	Benshi mu bababonye bagenda barabamenya . Nuko bava mu mijyi yaho yose , bariruka banyura iy'ubutaka , babatanga kuhagera .

41006042	Nuko bose bararya barahaga .

41006046	Amaze kubasezerera azamuka umusozi ajya gusenga .

41007004	N'iyo bavuye mu isoko , ntabwo barya batabanje kwitera amazi . Bafite n'indi mihango baziririza basigiwe na ba sekuruza , nk'iyo koza ibikombe n'ibibindi n'inzabya z'umuringa [ n'ibitanda ] babihumanura .

41007019	Si mu mutima kiba kigiye ahubwo kiba kigiye mu nda , nyuma kikamuvamo kinyuze epfo . ” Bityo Yezu yemezaga ko nta byokurya bihumanya .
41007020	Arongera aravuga ati : “ Ikiva mu muntu ni cyo kimuhumanya ,
41007021	kuko mu mitima yabantu ari ho hava imigambi mibi : ubusambanyi nubujura nubwicanyi , nirari nubugome nuburiganya , no kwiyandarika nishyari , no gutukana nubwirasi nubugoryi . kuko mu mitima yabantu ari ho hava imigambi mibi : ubusambanyi nubujura nubwicanyi , nirari nubugome nuburiganya , no kwiyandarika nishyari , no gutukana nubwirasi nubugoryi .

41007024	Nuko Yezu arahaguruka ajya mu karere gahereranye n'umujyi wa Tiri , yinjira mu nzu . Ntiyashakaga ko hagira ubimenya , ariko ntiyashobora kwihisha .
41007025	Umugore wari ufite akana k'agakobwa kahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani , yumvise ibya Yezu ahita aza amwikubita imbere .

41008027	Nyuma Yezu ajyana n'abigishwa be mu mirenge yo hafi y'i Kayizariya ya Filipo . Bakiri mu nzira abaza abigishwa be ati : “ Abantu bavuga ko ndi nde ? ”

41008030	Yezu arabihanangiriza ngo be kugira uwo bahingukiriza ibye .
41008031	Yezu atangira kwigisha abigishwa be ko ari ngombwa ko Umwana w'umuntu ababazwa cyane , akangwa n'abakuru b'imiryango n'abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko , bakamwica maze iminsi itatu yashira akazuka .
41008032	Ayo magambo Yezu yayavugaga yeruye . Nuko Petero aramwihererana , atangira kumuhana .
41008033	Yezu arahindukira areba abigishwa be , maze acyaha Petero ati : “ Mva iruhande Satani , kuko ibitekerezo byawe bitavuye ku Mana , ahubwo ari iby'abantu . ”
41008034	Noneho Yezu ahamagara rubanda n'abigishwa be , arababwira ati : “ Ushaka kunyoboka wese nareke kwiyitaho , ahubwo atware umusaraba we ankurikire .
41008035	Ushaka gukiza ubuzima bwe azabubura , naho uhara ubuzima bwe ari jye ahōrwa kandi ahōrwa Ubutumwa bwiza , azaba abukijije .
41008036	Mbese umuntu byamumarira iki kwigarurira isi yose , ariko akaba yivukije ubugingo bwe ?
41008037	Cyangwa se ubugingo bw'umuntu yabugurana iki ?
41008038	Umuntu wese ugira isoni zo kunyemera no kwemera inyigisho zanjye imbere y'abantu b'iki gihe b'abasambanyi n'abagizi ba nabi , Umwana w'umuntu na we azagira isoni zo kumwemera igihe azaba aje afite ikuzo rya Se , ashagawe n'abamarayika baziranenge . ”
41009001	Arongera arababwira ati : “ Ndababwira nkomeje ko bamwe mu bari aha , batazapfa batabonye ubwami bw'Imana buje bufite ububasha . ”
41009002	Iminsi itandatu ishize Yezu ajyana Petero na Yakobo na Yohani , bihererana mu mpinga y'umusozi muremure . Nuko ahinduka bamureba ,
41009003	imyambaro ye irererana ku buryo nta mumeshi wo ku isi wayeza atyo .
41009004	Bagiye kubona babona Eliya na Musa baganira na Yezu .
41009005	Petero abwira Yezu ati : “ Mwigisha , ko ari nta ko bisa kwibera hano ! Reka twubake utuzu dutatu tw'ingando , kamwe kabe akawe , akandi aka Musa , naho akandi kabe aka Eliya . ”
41009006	Ubwo kwari ukubura icyo avuga kubera ubwoba bwinshi bagize .
41009007	Nuko igicu kirabatwikīra , bumva ijwi ry'uvugira muri icyo gicu ati : “ Uyu ni Umwana wanjye nkunda cyane , nimumutege amatwi ! ”
41009008	Bigeze aho abigishwa bakebuka hirya no hino , basanga nta n'umwe ukiri kumwe na bo , uretse Yezu wenyine .
41009009	Bakimanuka umusozi arabihanangiriza ati : “ Ntimugire uwo mubwira ibyo mwabonye , kugeza igihe Umwana w'umuntu azaba amaze kuzuka . ”
41009010	Iryo jambo bakomeza kurizirikana , babazanya icyo kuzuka bishaka kuvuga .
41009011	Nuko babaza Yezu bati : “ Kuki abigishamategeko bavuga ko Eliya agomba kubanza kuza ? ”
41009012	Arabasubiza ati : “ Ni koko Eliya agomba kubanza kuza , kugira ngo atunganye byose . None ni iki gituma Ibyanditswe bihamya ko Umwana w'umuntu agomba kubabazwa cyane , agasuzugurwa n'abantu ?
41009013	Reka mbabwire : koko Eliya yaraje kandi abantu bamugiriye uko bishakiye nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga . ”
41009014	Bageze aho abigishwa bari bahasanga imbaga nyamwinshi ibakikije , n'abigishamategeko bajya impaka na bo .
41009015	Abantu bamubonye bose birabatangaza cyane , biruka bajya kumuramutsa .
41009016	Arababaza ati : “ Nsanze mujya impaka na bariya ku byerekeye iki ? ”
41009017	Umwe mu bari aho aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , nari nakuzaniye umuhungu wanjye , kuko yahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani itera uburagi .
41009018	Aho imufatiye hose imutura hasi , umwana akazana ifuro , agahekenya amenyo akagagara . Nasabye abigishwa bawe kuyimenesha ntibabishobora . ”
41009019	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Yemwe bantu b'iki gihe mutizera Imana , nzabana namwe ngeze ryari ? Nzabihanganira ngeze ryari ? Ngaho nimumunzanire ! ”
41009020	Baramuzana . Umwana akirabukwa Yezu , iyo ngabo ya Satani iramutigisa maze aragwa , yigaragura hasi azana ifuro .
41009021	Yezu abaza se w'uwo mwana ati : “ Ibi abimaranye igihe kingana iki ? ” Undi ati : “ Byamufashe akiri muto .
41009022	Ni kenshi ingabo ya Satani yamutuye mu muriro no mu mazi , igira ngo imwice . None niba hari icyo wabasha gukora , nyamuneka utugirire impuhwe udutabare ! ”
41009023	Yezu ati : “ Ugize ngo iki ? Uvuze ngo niba hari icyo nabasha gukora … ! Erega byose bishobokera uwizera Imana ! ”
41009024	Ako kanya se w'umwana avuga cyane ati : “ Ndizeye ! Ngoboka unkize kutizera ! ”
41009025	Yezu abonye abantu benshi bahuruye , acyaha iyo ngabo ya Satani arayibwira ati : “ Ngabo ya Satani utera kutavuga no kutumva , ndagutegetse va muri uyu mwana kandi ntuzamugarukemo ukundi ! ”
41009026	Nuko imaze kuvuza induru no kumutigisa bikabije imuvamo . Umwana asigara ameze nk'uwapfuye , bituma benshi bavuga bati : “ Yanogotse . ”
41009027	Ariko Yezu amufata ukuboko aramubyutsa , arahagarara .
41009028	Yezu ageze imuhira abigishwa be bamubaza biherereye bati : “ Kuki twe tutabashije kuyimenesha ? ”
41009029	Arabasubiza ati : “ Bene iyo ngabo ntimeneshwa n'ikindi kitari ugusenga . ”
41009030	Bava aho ngaho banyura muri Galileya , ariko Yezu ntiyashakaga ko hagira ubimenya ,
41009031	kuko yigishaga abigishwa be agira ati : “ Umwana w'umuntu azagabizwa abantu bamwice , maze iminsi itatu nishira azuke . ”
41009032	Abigishwa be ntibasobanukirwa iryo jambo , kandi ntibatinyuka kumusobanuza .
41009033	Baza i Kafarinawumu . Bageze imuhira Yezu arababaza ati : “ Igihe mwari mu nzira mwajyaga impaka zerekeye iki ? ”
41009034	Baricecekera kuko mu nzira bahoze biburanya , bibaza umukuru muri bo .
41009035	Nuko Yezu aricara arembuza ba bandi cumi na babiri , arababwira ati : “ Nihagira ushaka kuba uw'imbere muri mwe , abanze yigire uw'inyuma abe n'umugaragu wa bose . ”
41009036	Ni ko kuzana umwana amushyira hagati yabo , aramuhobera arababwira ati :
41009037	“ Umuntu wese wakīra umwe muri aba bana kubera jye ni jye aba yakiriye , kandi unyakiriye si jye aba yakiriye , ahubwo aba yakiriye Uwantumye . ”
41009038	Nuko Yohani abwira Yezu ati : “ Mwigisha , twabonye umuntu umenesha ingabo za Satani mu izina ryawe , turamubuza kuko atari uwo muri twe . ”
41009039	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ntimukamubuze , kuko nta wakora igitangaza mu izina ryanjye kandi ngo ahite amvuga nabi .
41009040	Burya utaturwanya aba ari uwacu .
41009041	Umuntu wese uzaza mu izina ryanjye , akabaha nibura igikombe cy'amazi yo kunywa ayabahereye ko muri abanjye , ndababwira nkomeje ko atazabura kugororerwa .
41009042	“ Nihagira ugusha mu cyaha umwe muri aba bato banyemera , icyaruta kuri we ni uko bamuhambira urusyo ku ijosi , bakamuroha mu kiyaga .
41009043	Niba ikiganza cyawe cyakugusha mu cyaha ugice . Icyaruta ni uko wakwinjira ahari ubugingo buhoraho ufite ikiganza kimwe , aho kujya mu nyenga y'umuriro utazima ufite ibiganza byombi . [
41009044	Aho hantu , inyo z'abapfu ntizishiraho kandi umuriro ubatwika ntuzima . ]
41009045	Niba ikirenge cyawe cyakugusha mu cyaha ugice . Icyaruta ni uko wakwinjira ahari ubugingo buhoraho ufite ikirenge kimwe , aho kurohwa muri ya nyenga ufite ibirenge byombi . [
41009046	Aho hantu , inyo z'abapfu ntizishiraho kandi umuriro ubatwika ntuzima . ]
41009047	Niba ijisho ryawe ryakugusha mu cyaha urinogore . Icyaruta ni uko wakwinjira mu bwami bw'Imana ufite ijisho rimwe , aho kurohwa mu nyenga y'umuriro ufite amaso yombi .
41009048	Aho hantu , inyo z'abapfu ntizishiraho kandi umuriro ubatwika ntuzima .
41009049	Koko buri muntu , umunyu azawusābishwamo n'umuriro .
41009050	Umunyu ni ingirakamaro , ariko se iyo wakayutse mwakongera kuwuryoshya mute ? Nuko mugire umunyu muri mwe kandi mubane mu mahoro ! ”
41010001	Hanyuma Yezu ava aho ngaho ajya mu ntara ya Yudeya , n'iburasirazuba bw'uruzi rwa Yorodani . Imbaga y'abantu yongera gukoranira aho ari , asubira kubigisha nk'uko yabimenyereye .
41010002	Abafarizayi bazanwa no kumutegera mu byo avuga . Baramubaza bati : “ Mbese biremewe ko umugabo yirukana umugore we ? ”
41010003	Na we arababaza ati : “ Musa yabategetse iki ? ”
41010004	Baramusubiza bati : “ Musa yahaye umugabo uruhushya rwo kwirukana umugore we , amaze kumuha urwandiko rwemeza ko amusenze . ”
41010005	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Icyatumye Musa abandikira iryo tegeko ni uko imitima yanyu inangiye .
41010006	Ariko mbere na mbere , igihe Imana yaremaga yaremye abantu , umugabo n'umugore .
41010007	‘ Ni cyo gituma umugabo azasiga se na nyina akabana n'umugore we akaramata ,
41010008	bombi bakaba umuntu umwe ’ , ku buryo baba batakiri babiri ahubwo baba babaye umuntu umwe .
41010009	Nuko rero ntihakagire umuntu utandukanya abo Imana yafatanyije . ”
41010010	Bageze imuhira abigishwa bongera kumusobanuza ibyo yavuze .
41010011	Arababwira ati : “ Umugabo wese wirukana umugore we maze akazana undi , aba asambanye kandi akaba ahemukiye umugore we wa mbere .
41010012	N'umugore wahukana n'umugabo we agashaka undi mugabo , aba asambanye . ”
41010013	Abantu bazanira Yezu abana bato ngo abakoreho , maze abigishwa be barabacyaha .
41010014	Yezu abibonye biramurakaza , arababwira ati : “ Nimureke abana bato bansange , mwibabuza kuko ubwami bw'Imana ari ubw'abameze nka bo .
41010015	Ndababwira nkomeje ko utākira ubwami bw'Imana nk'uko umwana muto abwākira , atazabwinjiramo bibaho . ”
41010016	Nuko ahobera abo bana , abarambikaho ibiganza abaha umugisha .
41010017	Yezu agihaguruka aho umuntu aza yiruka , amupfukama imbere aramubaza ati : “ Mwigisha mwiza , nakora iki kugira ngo mpabwe ubugingo buhoraho ? ”
41010018	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Unyitiye iki mwiza ? Nta mwiza n'umwe ubaho uretse Imana yonyine .
41010019	Uzi Amategeko ngo ntukice , ntugasambane , ntukibe , ntukabeshyere abandi , ntugahuguze , ujye wubaha so na nyoko . ”
41010020	Undi ati : “ Mwigisha , ayo yose narayakurikije kuva mu buto bwanjye . ”
41010021	Nuko Yezu amwitegereje aramukunda . Ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Icyakora ushigaje kimwe , genda ugurishe ibyo utunze byose ibivuyemo ubihe abakene , ni bwo uzaba ufite ubutunzi mu ijuru , maze uze unkurikire . ”
41010022	Uwo muntu yumvise iryo jambo arasuherwa , agenda ashavuye kuko yari afite ibintu byinshi .
41010023	Yezu areba abigishwa be arababwira ati : “ Mbega ukuntu biruhije abakungu kwinjira mu bwami bw'Imana ! ”
41010024	Abigishwa be bumvise ibyo baratangara . Nuko Yezu yungamo ati : “ Bana banjye , mbega ukuntu biruhanyije kwinjira mu bwami bw'Imana ! .
41010025	Icyoroshye ni uko ingamiya yanyura mu mwenge w'urushinge , kuruta ko umukungu yakwinjira mu bwami bw'Imana . ”
41010026	Abigishwa be barushaho gutangara , barabazanya bati : “ Noneho se ni nde ubasha kurokoka ? ”
41010027	Yezu arabitegereza arababwira ati : “ Koko ku bantu ni ibidashoboka , ariko ku Mana si ko biri kuko yo byose biyishobokera . ”
41010028	Nuko Petero aramubwira ati : “ Twebwe twasize byose turagukurikira . ”
41010029	Yezu ati : “ Ndababwira nkomeje ko umuntu wese wasize urugo cyangwa abavandimwe , cyangwa nyina cyangwa se , cyangwa abana cyangwa amasambu kubera jye n'Ubutumwa bwiza ,
41010030	muri iki gihe uwo muntu azahabwa ibiruta ibyo incuro ijana . Azahabwa ingo n'abavandimwe na ba nyina n'abana n'amasambu , icyakora azanatotezwa , no mu gihe kizaza azahabwa ubugingo buhoraho .
41010031	Ikindi kandi hari benshi mu b'imbere bazaba ab'inyuma , na benshi mu b'inyuma babe ab'imbere . ”
41010032	Ubwo bari mu nzira bagana i Yeruzalemu , Yezu ajya imbere y'abigishwa be . Bari bahagaritse umutima cyane , abandi babakurikiye na bo bari bafite ubwoba . Yezu yongera kwihererana n'abigishwa be cumi na babiri , atangira kubabwira ibigiye kumubaho ati :
41010033	“ Dore tugiye i Yeruzalemu , Umwana w'umuntu azashyikirizwa abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko , bamucire urubanza rwo gupfa . Bazamugabiza abanyamahanga
41010034	bamushinyagurire , bamuvundereze amacandwe , bamukubite ibiboko bamwice , maze iminsi itatu nishira azuke . ”
41010035	Hanyuma Yakobo na Yohani bene Zebedeyi baramwegera , baramubwira bati : “ Mwigisha , turashaka ko wadukorera icyo tugusaba . ”
41010036	Arababaza ati : “ Murashaka ko mbakorera iki ? ”

41010038	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Ntabwo muzi icyo musaba . Mbese mwashobora kunywera ku gikombe cy'umubabaro ngomba kunywa ? Ese mwashobora kubatizwa mu mubabaro kimwe nanjye ? ”
41010039	Baramusubiza bati : “ Twabishobora . ” Nuko Yezu arababwira ati : “ Ni koko igikombe cyanjye muzakinyweraho , n'ukuntu nzabatizwa ni ko muzabatizwa ,
41010040	naho gutanga ibyicaro iburyo cyangwa ibumoso bwanjye , si jye ubigaba ahubwo bifite ababigenewe . ”
41010041	Bagenzi babo uko ari icumi babyumvise , batangira kurakarira Yakobo na Yohani .
41010042	Yezu arabarembuza arababwira ati : “ Muzi ko abahawe gutegeka amahanga bayatwaza igitugu , kandi n'abakomeye bo muri yo bakayabuza epfo na ruguru .
41010043	Ariko muri mwe ntibikagende bityo . Ahubwo ushaka kuba mukuru muri mwe agomba kujya abakorera ,
41010044	kandi ushaka kuba uw'imbere muri mwe agomba kuba umugaragu wa bose .
41010045	Umwana w'umuntu na we ntiyazanywe no gukorerwa , ahubwo yazanywe no gukorera abandi no kubapfira kugira ngo abe incungu ya benshi . ”
41010046	Hanyuma bagera i Yeriko . Nuko Yezu n'abigishwa be bahavana n'imbaga y'abantu benshi . Basanga umuntu w'impumyi witwaga Barutimeyo mwene Timeyo , yicaye iruhande rw'inzira asabiriza .
41010047	Yumvise ko Yezu w'i Nazareti aje , arangurura ijwi ati : “ Yezu Mwene Dawidi , ngirira impuhwe ! ”

41011010	Hasingizwe ingoma y'umubyeyi wacu Dawidi igiye kuza ! Mu ijuru nibasingize Imana bati : ‘ Hozana ! ’ ”
41011011	Nuko Yezu ageze i Yeruzalemu , yinjira mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana . Amaze kuzenguruka no kureba ibintu byose kandi abonye ko bugorobye , arasohoka ajyana na ba bandi cumi na babiri bajya i Betaniya .
41011012	Bukeye bwaho bavuye i Betaniya , Yezu arasonza .

41011016	kandi abuza abikoreraga ibintu kunyura mu rugo rw'Ingoro .
41011017	Nuko arabigisha ati : “ Mbese Ibyanditswe ntibivuga ngo : ‘ Inzu yanjye izitwa Inzu isengerwamo n'amahanga yose ’ ? Ariko mwe mwayigize indiri y'abajura . ”

41011019	Bumaze kwira Yezu n'abigishwa be bava mu murwa .
41011020	Kare mu gitondo banyura hafi ya cya giti cy'umutini , basanga cyaraye cyumye cyose guhera mu mizi .

41011025	N'igihe muhagaze musenga , mujye mubabarira uwo mwaba mufite icyo mupfa , kugira ngo namwe So uri mu ijuru abababarire ibyo mumucumuraho . [
41011026	Naho nimutababarira abandi , So uri mu ijuru na we ntazabababarira ibyo mumucumuraho . ] ”
41011027	Nyuma y'ibyo basubira i Yeruzalemu . Ubwo Yezu yagendagendaga mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko n'abakuru b'imiryango barahamusanga .

41011030	Mbese Yohani yatumwe n'Imana kubatiza , cyangwa yatumwe n'abantu ? Nimunsubize . ”
