41011033	Nuko basubiza Yezu bati : “ Ntitubizi . ” Yezu ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Nanjye rero simbabwiye aho nkura ubushobozi bwo gukora ibyo nkora . ”
41012001	Hanyuma Yezu atangira kubigisha abaciriye imigani , agira ati : “ Habayeho umugabo wateye ibiti by'imizabibu mu murima we , awuzengurutsa uruzitiro , ashyiramo urwengero yubakamo n'umunara w'abararirizi , maze uwo murima awātira abahinzi . Birangiye ajya mu rugendo .
41012002	Igihe kigeze atuma umugaragu kuri ba bahinzi , kugira ngo bamuhe icyatamurima ku mbuto z'imizabibu .
41012003	Baramusumira baramuhondagura , bamwohereza amāra masa .
41012004	Nyir'imizabibu yongera kubatumaho undi mugaragu , na we bamurema uruguma mu mutwe , bamukorera ibya mfura mbi .
41012005	Nuko yohereza undi na we baramwica . Nyuma yohereza abandi benshi , bamwe barabakubita abandi barabica .
41012006	“ Umuntu yari asigaranye ni umwe gusa , ni umwana we yakundaga cyane . Incuro ya nyuma aba ari we abatumaho yibwira ati : ‘ Umwana wanjye ntibazamwubahuka . ’
41012007	Abahinzi ngo babone uwo mwana baravugana bati : ‘ Dore uwarazwe ibintu araje ! Nimuze tumwice maze byose bizabe ibyacu . ’
41012008	Baramusumira baramwica , bamujugunya inyuma y'uruzitiro .
41012009	“ Mbese mubona nyir'imizabibu azakora iki ? Azaza atsembe abo bahinzi , imizabibu ayishyiremo abandi .
41012010	Mbese ntimwasomye Ibyanditswe ? Biravuga ngo :
41012011	Ibyo ni Nyagasani wabikoze , none bitubereye igitangaza ! ’ ”
41012012	Ba bakuru bumvise neza ko uwo mugani ari bo werekezagaho , bashaka uko bafata Yezu ariko batinya rubanda . Nuko bamusiga aho barigendera .
41012013	Hanyuma bamutumaho bamwe mu Bafarizayi n'abo mu ishyaka rya Herodi , kugira ngo bamufatire mu byo avuga .
41012014	Bakihagera baramubwira bati : “ Mwigisha , tuzi ko uri umunyakuri kandi ko nta cyo utinya , kuko ufata abantu bose kimwe , ukigisha inzira y'Imana mu kuri . Mbese ni ngombwa ko dutanga umusoro w'umwami w'i Roma , cyangwa si ngombwa ? Tuwutange , cyangwa twe kuwutanga ? ” .
41012015	Ariko kuko Yezu yari azi uburyarya bwabo , arababaza ati : “ Kuki muntega iyo mitego ? Nimunzanire igiceri ndebe . ”
41012016	Bakimuzaniye arababaza ati : “ Iyi shusho n'iri zina biriho ni ibya nde ? ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Ni iby'umwami w'i Roma . ”
41012017	Yezu ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Iby'umwami w'i Roma mubihe umwami w'i Roma , n'iby'Imana mubihe Imana . ” Avuze atyo baramutangarira cyane .
41012018	Abasaduseyi ( abo ni bo bavuga ko kuzuka bitabaho ) basanga Yezu baramubwira bati :
41012019	“ Mwigisha , Musa yatwandikiye iri tegeko ngo , umuntu napfa asize umugore batabyaranye , umugabo wabo ajye amucyura acikure nyakwigendera .
41012020	Habayeho rero abavandimwe barindwi . Uwa mbere ashaka umugore maze apfa batabyaranye .
41012021	Uwa kabiri acyura uwo mupfakazi , na we apfa batabyaranye . N'uwa gatatu bigenda bityo .
41012022	Bose uko ari barindwi bapfa ntawe umubyayeho umwana . Amaherezo , umugore na we arapfa .
41012023	Mbese igihe abantu bazazuka , uwo mugore azaba muka nde ko bose uko ari barindwi bazaba baramutunze ? ”
41012024	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Mwarayobye , kuko mutamenye Ibyanditswe ntimumenye n'ububasha bw'Imana .
41012025	Erega igihe abapfuye bazazuka ntawe uzagira umugore , nta n'uzagira umugabo . Ahubwo bazamera nk'abamarayika bo mu ijuru .
41012026	Ku byerekeye izuka ry'abapfuye , mbese ntimwasomye mu gitabo cya Musa igihe yari ku gihuru cyaka umuriro , ko Imana yamubwiye iti : ‘ Ndi Imana ya Aburahamu n'Imana ya Izaki n'Imana ya Yakobo ’ ?
41012027	Erega Imana si iy'abapfuye , ahubwo ni iy'abazima ! Mwarayobye cyane . ”
41012028	Umwe mu bigishamategeko aramwegera yumva bajya izo mpaka . Abonye ko Yezu abashubije neza aramubaza ati : “ Itegeko riruta ayandi yose ni irihe ? ”
41012029	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Irya mbere ni iri : ‘ Isiraheli we , tega amatwi ! Nyagasani , Nyagasani wenyine ni we Mana yacu .
41012030	Ukunde Nyagasani Imana yawe n'umutima wawe wose n'ubuzima bwawe bwose , n'ubwenge bwawe bwose n'imbaraga zawe zose . ’
41012031	Irya kabiri ni iri : ‘ Ujye ukunda mugenzi wawe nk'uko wikunda . ’ Nta rindi tegeko riruta ayo yombi . ”
41012032	Uwo mwigishamategeko aramubwira ati : “ Ni koko Mwigisha , uvuze ukuri . Imana ni imwe rukumbi , nta yindi mana ibaho .
41012033	Koko kandi umuntu akwiriye kuyikundisha umutima we wose n'ubwenge bwe bwose n'imbaraga ze zose , no gukunda mugenzi we nk'uko yikunda . Ibyo biruta ibitambo byose , ari ibisanzwe , ari n'ibikongorwa n'umuriro . ”
41012034	Yezu abonye amushubije neza aramubwira ati : “ Ntabwo uri kure y'ubwami bw'Imana . ” Nuko ntihagira undi uhangara kugira ikindi amubaza .
41012035	Igihe Yezu yigishirizaga mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , abaza abantu ati : “ Ni iki gituma abigishamategeko bavuga ko Kristo ari umwana wa Dawidi ?
41012036	Dawidi ubwe abihishuriwe na Mwuka Muziranenge , yaravuze ati : Abumvaga Yezu bari benshi kandi bamwumvanaga umunezero .
41012037	None se ubwo Dawidi ubwe yita Kristo umwami we , Kristo yaba ate kandi umwana we ? ” Abumvaga Yezu bari benshi kandi bamwumvanaga umunezero .
41012038	Mu nyigisho ze Yezu yaravuze ati : “ Murajye mwirinda abigishamategeko bakunda gutembera bambaye amakanzu meza , no kubona baramukirizwa aho abantu bateraniye .
41012039	Bakunda kandi guhabwa intebe z'icyubahiro mu nsengero n'ibyicaro by'imbere aho batumiwe .
41012040	Barya ingo z'abapfakazi , nyamara bakiha kuvuga amasengesho y'urudaca . Abo bazacirwa urubanza rukaze kurusha abandi . ”
41012041	Yezu yari yicaye mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana ahateganye n'ububiko bashyiragamo amaturo , yitegereza uko rubanda batura . Abona abakire benshi bashyiramo menshi .
41012042	Nuko haza umupfakazi w'umukene , ashyiramo uduceri tubiri gusa .
41012043	Yezu ahamagara abigishwa be arababwira ati : “ Ndababwira nkomeje ko uriya mupfakazi w'umukene arushije abandi bose gutura .
41012044	Bariya bose batanze ku bibasagutse , naho we yatanze ibyari bimutunze byose . ”
41013001	Yezu asohotse mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , umwe mu bigishwa be aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , irebere nawe ! Mbega inzu yubakishijwe amabuye meza ! Mbega imyubakire y'agatangaza ! ”
41013002	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ntureba iyi nyubako y'agatangaza ? Nta buye rizasigara rigeretse ku rindi , byose bizasenywa ! ”
41013003	Nuko Yezu yicara ku Musozi w'Iminzenze ahateganye n'Ingoro y'Imana , ari kumwe na Petero na Yakobo na Yohani na Andereya biherereye . Baramubaza bati :
41013004	“ Tubwire igihe ibyo bizabera , n'ikimenyetso kizerekana ko igihe cyabyo byose kigeze . ”
41013005	Yezu afata ijambo ati : “ Muramenye ntihazagire ubayobya ,
41013006	kuko hazaduka benshi biyita izina ryanjye bavuga bati : ‘ Ni jye Kristo ’ , kandi bazayobya benshi .
41013007	Nimwumva urusaku rw'intambara ziri hafi n'amakuru y'intambara za kure , ntibizabakure umutima . Ibyo bizagomba kuba ariko si byo herezo .
41013008	Igihugu kizarwana n'ikindi , kandi umwami atere undi mwami . Hazaba imitingito y'isi hirya no hino , hatere n'inzara . Ibyo bizaba bimeze nk'imigendo ibanziriza ibise by'umugore .
41013009	“ Namwe ubwanyu , muramenye ! Bazabajyana mu nkiko no mu nsengero zabo babakubite . Muzanahagarikwa imbere y'abami n'abandi bategetsi babampōra , bityo muzaba abagabo bo guhamya ibyanjye .
41013010	Icyakora ni ngombwa ko Ubutumwa bwiza bubanza kwamamazwa mu bihugu byose .
41013011	Byongeye kandi igihe bazabarega mu nkiko , ntimuzahagarike umutima mbere y'igihe mwibaza ibyo muzireguza , kuko igihe nikigera muzahabwa icyo mukwiriye kuvuga . Si mwe muzaba mwivugira , ahubwo ni Mwuka Muziranenge uzavuga .
41013012	Umuntu azicisha umuvandimwe we , umubyeyi na we azicisha umwana we , n'abana bazagomera ababyeyi babo babicishe .
41013013	Muzangwa n'abantu bose babampōra , ariko uzihangana akageza ku munsi w'imperuka azarokoka .
41013014	“ Nimubona cya ‘ Giterashozi kirimbuzi ’ gihagaze aho kitagomba kuba — usoma ibi abyumve neza — icyo gihe abazaba bari muri Yudeya bazahungire mu misozi .
41013015	Uzaba ari hejuru y'inzu , aramenye ntazamanuke ngo yinjire mu nzu agire icyo avanamo .
41013016	N'uzaba ari mu murima ntazasubire imuhira gushaka umwitero we .
41013017	Hagowe abazaba batwite cyangwa bonsa muri iyo minsi !
41013018	Musabe Imana ibyo bye kuzaba mu mezi y'imbeho ,
41013019	kuko muri iyo minsi hazaba amakuba akabije atigeze abaho kuva isi yaremwa kugeza ubu , kandi atazongera kubaho ukundi .
41013020	Iyo Nyagasani atagabanya iyo minsi , nta wari kuzarokoka . Ariko kubera abo yitoranyirije , iyo minsi yarayigabanyije .
41013021	Icyo gihe rero , nihagira ubabwira ati : ‘ Dore nguyu Kristo ’ , cyangwa ati : ‘ Nguriya ’ , ntimuzabyemere .
41013022	Hazaduka abiyita Kristo n'abiyita abahanuzi . Bazerekana ibimenyetso bakore n'ibitangaza , ku buryo bayobya abo Imana yitoranyirije bibaye ibishoboka .
41013023	Mwebwe rero murabe maso , ibyo byose mbaye mbibabwiye bitaraba .
41013024	“ Ariko muri iyo minsi , nyuma y'iyo mibabaro , izuba rizijima n'ukwezi kwe kumurika ,
41013025	inyenyeri zihanantuke ku ijuru , n'ibinyabubasha byo mu ijuru bihungabane .
41013026	Ubwo ni bwo abantu bazabona Umwana w'umuntu aje mu bicu , afite ububasha bwinshi n'ikuzo .
41013027	Ni bwo azatuma abamarayika gukoranya abo yitoranyirije babavane iburasirazuba n'iburengerazuba , mu majyaruguru no mu majyepfo , kugera aho isi n'ijuru bigarukira .
41013028	“ Murebere ku giti cy'umutini kibabere urugero : iyo mubonye amashami yacyo atoshye akameraho ibibabi , mumenya ko impeshyi yegereje .
41013029	Ni na ko rero igihe muzabona ibyo nababwiye bibaye , muzamenya ko Umwana w'umuntu ari hafi , ndetse ko ageze ku irembo .
41013030	Ndababwira nkomeje ko ab'iki gihe batazashira ibyo byose bitabaye .
41013031	Ijuru n'isi bizashira , ariko amagambo yanjye azahoraho .
41013032	“ Icyakora , umunsi n'isaha bizaberaho ntawe ubizi , habe n'abamarayika bo mu ijuru cyangwa Umwana w'Imana , bizwi na Data wenyine .
41013033	Muramenye rero mube maso [ musenge , ] kuko mutazi igihe ibyo byose bizabera .
41013034	Byagereranywa n'umuntu wagiye mu rugendo agasigira abagaragu urugo rwe , buri wese amugeneye icyo agomba gukora , agategeka n'umurinzi w'irembo kuba maso .
41013035	Murabe maso rero kuko mutazi igihe nyir'urugo azahindukirira , haba mu matarama cyangwa mu gicuku , cyangwa mu nkoko cyangwa umuseke utambitse .
41013036	Muramenye atazabatungura agasanga musinziriye .
41013037	Ibyo mbabwiye ndabibwira bose : mube maso ! ”
41014001	Hari hasigaye iminsi ibiri ngo habe umunsi mukuru wa Pasika y'Abayahudi , n'iminsi mikuru y'imigati idasembuye . Abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko bashakaga uko bafata Yezu bakoresheje amayeri , kugira ngo bamwicishe .
41014002	Icyakora bakavuga bati : “ Ntituzamufate mu minsi mikuru , kugira ngo rubanda badatera imidugararo . ”
41014003	Igihe Yezu yari i Betaniya kwa Simoni umubembe afungura , haje umugore azanye icupa ryuzuye amarashi yitwa naridi , amininnye kandi ahenda cyane . Nuko amena iryo cupa , amarashi ayasuka mu mutwe wa Yezu .
41014004	Bamwe mu bari aho bararakara baravugana bati : “ Ariya marashi ayapfushirije iki ubusa ?
41014005	Mbese ntiyari kugurishwa amafaranga arenga igihembo cy'imibyizi magana atatu , agahabwa abakene ? ” Nuko batonganya uwo mugore cyane .
41014006	Ariko Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nimumureke ! Muramuhora iki kandi icyo ankoreye ari cyiza ?
41014007	Abakene muhorana na bo aho mwashakira mwabagirira neza , naho jye ntituzahorana .
41014008	Akoze ibyo ashoboye nubwo igihe kitaragera , ansīze amarashi ku mubiri antegurira guhambwa .
41014009	Ndababwira nkomeje ko ku isi yose aho Ubutumwa bwiza buzamamazwa , ibyo uyu mugore angiriye bizavugwa , abantu babimwibukireho . ”
41014010	Yuda Isikariyoti , umwe mu bigishwa cumi na babiri , ajya kuvugana n'abakuru bo mu batambyi uburyo yabashyikiriza Yezu .
41014011	Babyumvise baranezerwa , bamusezeranya amafaranga bazamuha . Nuko Yuda atangira kwiga uko yamubashyikiriza n'igihe yabikorera .
41014012	Umunsi wa mbere w'Iminsi mikuru y'Imigati idasembuye , ari wo baryagaho umwana w'intama wa Pasika , abigishwa ba Yezu baramubaza bati : “ Ni hehe ushaka ko tujya kugutegurira ifunguro rya Pasika ? ”
41014013	Yezu atuma babiri mu bigishwa be ati : “ Nimujye mu mujyi , murahura n'umugabo wikoreye ikibindi cy'amazi mumukurikire .
41014014	Inzu ari bujyemo mubwire nyirayo muti : ‘ Umwigisha akudutumyeho ngo utwereke icyumba wamuteguriye , aho ari busangirire n'abigishwa be ifunguro rya Pasika . ’
41014015	Na we ari bubereke icyumba kigari mu igorofa yo hejuru kirimo ibyicaro kandi giteguye , abe ari ho mudutunganyiriza ifunguro rya Pasika . ”
41014016	Ba bigishwa baragenda bajya mu mujyi basanga bimeze nk'uko yabibabwiye , maze bategura ifunguro rya Pasika .
41014017	Bugorobye Yezu azana n'abigishwa be cumi na babiri .
41014018	Nuko mu gihe bafungura Yezu aravuga at : i “ Ndababwira nkomeje ko umwe muri mwe dusangira agiye kungambanira . ”
41014019	Batangira kubabara no kumubaza umwe umwe bati : “ Mbese ni jye ? ”
41014020	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Ni umwe muri mwe cumi na babiri , uwo duhuriza intoki ku mbehe .
41014021	Koko Umwana w'umuntu agiye kwicwa nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga kuri we . Nyamara ugiye kumugambanira azabona ishyano , icyari kuba cyiza kuri uwo muntu ni iyo aba ataravutse . ”
41014022	Igihe bafunguraga Yezu afata umugati , amaze gushimira Imana arawumanyura , arawubahereza ati : “ Nimwakire , uyu ni umubiri wanjye . ”
41014023	Afata n'igikombe ashimira Imana , arakibahereza banywaho bose .
41014024	Nuko arababwira ati : “ Aya ni amaraso yanjye ahamya Isezerano Imana igiranye n'abayo , amenwe ku bw'abantu benshi .
41014025	Ndababwira nkomeje ko ntazongera kunywa divayi , kugeza igihe nzanywera divayi nshya mu bwami bw'Imana . ”
41014026	Nuko bamaze kuririmba , barasohoka bajya ku Musozi w'Iminzenze .
41014027	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Ibigiye kumbaho biri bubace intege mwese , ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo ‘ Nzica umushumba , intama zitatane . ’
41014028	Ariko nimara kuzuka muzansanga muri Galileya . ”
41014029	Petero aramubwira ati : “ Ibigiye kukubaho naho bose byabaca intege , jye nta cyo biri buntware ! ”
41014030	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ndakubwira nkomeje ko muri iri joro , inkoko ijya kubika kabiri umaze kunyihakana gatatu . ”
41014031	Ariko Petero we arushaho kwemeza ati : “ Naho byatuma mpfana nawe , sindi bukwihakane na gato ! ” Abandi bose na bo bavuga batyo .
41014032	Hanyuma bajya ahantu hitwa Getsemani . Bahageze Yezu abwira abigishwa be ati : “ Nimube mwicaye hano igihe nsenga . ”
41014033	Ajyana na Petero na Yakobo na Yohani , atangira guhagarika umutima no gushavura cyane .
41014034	Arababwira ati : “ Agahinda mfite karenda kunyica . Nimugume hano mube maso . ”
41014035	Nuko yigira imbere gato yikubita hasi yubamye , arasenga ngo niba bishoboka icyo gihe cy'umubabaro kitamugeraho .
41014036	Aravuga ati : “ Aba ” , ni ukuvuga ngo : “ Data byose biragushobokera . ” Igiza kure yanjye iki gikombe cy'umubabaro . Nyamara ntibibe uko nshaka , ahubwo bibe uko ushaka . ”
41014037	Hanyuma araza asanga abigishwa be basinziriye , abaza Petero ati : “ Simoni , urisinziriye ? Ese nturuhije uba maso n'isaha imwe ?
41014038	Mube maso kandi musenge , kugira ngo mutagwa mu bishuko . Umutima w'umuntu ugira imigambi myiza , ariko umubiri wo ugira intege nke . ”
41014039	Asubirayo yongera gusenga , avuga amagambo nk'aya mbere .
41014040	Ahindukiye asanga na none basinziriye , kuko amaso yabo yari aremerewe n'ibitotsi , maze babura icyo bamusubiza .
41014041	Agarutse ubwa gatatu arababaza ati : “ Mbese muracyasinziriye ? Muriruhukiye ? Yemwe , igihe kirageze , Umwana w'umuntu agabijwe abanyabyaha .
41014042	Nimuhaguruke tugende dore ungambanira araje . ”
41014043	Uwo mwanya akivuga ibyo , Yuda umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri aba araje . Yari kumwe n'igitero cy'abantu bitwaje inkota n'amahiri , boherejwe n'abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko n'abakuru b'imiryango .
41014044	Uwamugambaniraga yari yabahaye ikimenyetso ati : “ Uwo nza kuramutsa nkamusoma araba ari we , mumufate mumujyane mumurinze cyane . ”
41014045	Ako kanya Yuda asanga Yezu aramusuhuza ati : “ Mwiriwe Mwigisha . ” Nuko aramusoma .
41014046	Nuko ba bantu bahita basumira Yezu , baramufata .
41014047	Umuntu umwe mu bari aho akura inkota , ayikubita umugaragu w'Umutambyi mukuru amuca ugutwi .
41014048	Yezu arababaza ati : “ Kuki muje kumfata mwitwaje inkota n'amahiri nk'abagiye gufata igisambo ?
41014049	Iminsi yose nari kumwe namwe mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana nigisha , ntimwamfashe . Ariko ibi bibereyeho kugira ngo bibe nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga . ”
41014050	Abigishwa be bose baramutererana barahunga .
41014051	Umusore umwe yari amukurikiye yifubitse umwenda , baramufata arabacika ,
41014052	basigarana umwenda we ahunga yambaye ubusa .
41014053	Nuko bajyana Yezu ku Mutambyi mukuru , abakuru bose bo mu batambyi n'abakuru b'imiryango n'abigishamategeko barahakoranira .
41014054	Ubwo Petero amukurikirira kure , aza kugera mu rugo rw'Umutambyi mukuru , yicara ku ikome hamwe n'abakozi baho , arota .
41014055	Abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abandi bose bagize urukiko rw'ikirenga , bashakaga icyakwicisha Yezu bakakibura .
41014056	Icyakora habonetse benshi bamushinja ibinyoma , ariko bavugaga ibinyuranye .
41014057	Bamwe barahaguruka bamushinja ibinyoma bati :
41014058	“ Twamwumvise avuga ngo ‘ Nzasenya iyi Ngoro yubatswe n'abantu , maze mu minsi itatu nubake indi itubatswe n'abantu . ’ ”
41014059	Nyamara no kuri iyo ngingo ibirego byabo ntibyari bihuye .
41014060	Noneho Umutambyi mukuru arahaguruka ahagarara mu ruhame . Abaza Yezu ati : “ Ko nta cyo usubiza ku byo aba bantu bagushinja ? ”
41014061	Yezu aricecekera ntiyagira icyo asubiza . Nuko Umutambyi mukuru yongera kumubaza ati : “ Harya ni wowe Kristo Umwana wa Nyir'ugusingizwa ? ”
41014062	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ndi we . Byongeye kandi , muzabona Umwana w'umuntu yicaye ku ntebe ya cyami iburyo bw'Imana Nyirububasha , munamubone aje ku bicu byo ku ijuru . ”
41014063	Umutambyi mukuru ni ko gushishimura imyambaro ye kugira ngo agaragaze ko bimushegeshe , maze aravuga ati : “ Turacyashaka abagabo b'iki se kandi ?
41014064	Mwiyumviye uko atuka Imana ! Murabitekerezaho iki ? ” Bose bamucira urwo gupfa .
41014065	Nuko bamwe batangira kumuvundereza amacandwe , bamupfuka mu maso , bamutera amakofi bamubwira ngo : “ Ngaho hanura ! ” Abakozi baho na bo baramufata bamukubita inshyi .
41014066	Icyo gihe Petero yari hanze mu rugo . Nuko haza umwe mu baja b'Umutambyi mukuru ,
41014067	abonye Petero yota aramwitegereza , aramubwira ati : “ Nawe wari kumwe na Yezu w'i Nazareti ! ”
41014068	Petero aramuhakanira ati : “ Sinumva na busa icyo ushaka kuvuga ! ” Maze arasohoka ageze ku marembo [ inkoko irabika ] .
41014069	Wa muja yongeye kumubona abwira abari aho ati : “ Uyu ni umwe muri bo . ”
41014070	Petero yongera guhakana . Hashize akanya abari aho bongera kumubwira bati : “ Ni ukuri nawe uri uwo muri bo , koko uri Umunyagalileya ! ”
41014071	Nuko Petero atangira kwivuma no gucurikiranya indahiro ati : “ Uwo muntu muvuga simuzi ! ”
41014072	Ako kanya inkoko ibika ubwa kabiri . Petero ni ko kwibuka ijambo Yezu yari yamubwiye ati : “ Inkoko irajya kubika kabiri umaze kunyihakana gatatu . ” Nuko araturika ararira .
41015001	Igitondo gitangaje abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abakuru b'imiryango n'abigishamategeko , mbese abagize urukiko rw'ikirenga bose , bateranira hamwe mu nama . Bamaze kuboha Yezu , baramujyana bamushyikiriza Pilato .
41015002	Nuko Pilato aramubaza ati : “ Ni wowe mwami w'Abayahudi ? ” Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Urabyivugiye . ”
41015003	Abakuru bo mu batambyi bamurega ibirego byinshi .
41015004	Pilato yongera kumubaza ati : “ Ko nta cyo usubiza ? Ese ntiwumva ko ibyo bakurega ari byinshi ? ”
41015005	Yezu ntiyongera kugira icyo asubiza , Pilato abibonye aratangara .
41015006	Ku munsi mukuru wa Pasika , Pilato yari amenyereye kurekurira abantu imfungwa imwe bamusabaga .
41015007	Icyo gihe muri gereza hari abari barishe abantu mu myivumbagatanyo yo kugomera Abanyaroma , muri abo hari uwitwaga Baraba .
41015008	Rubanda ni ko kuzamuka basanga Pilato , bamusaba kubagenzereza nk'uko yari asanzwe abigira .
41015009	Arababaza ati : “ Murashaka ko mbarekurira umwami w'Abayahudi ? ”
41015010	Pilato yari azi ko abakuru bo mu batambyi bamugabije Yezu babitewe n'ishyari .
41015011	Ariko abakuru bo mu batambyi boshya rubanda gusaba Pilato ngo abarekurire Baraba .
41015012	Pilato yongera kubabaza ati : “ None se uwo mwita umwami w'Abayahudi mugire nte ? ”

41015015	Pilato ashaka gushimisha rubanda , abarekurira Baraba . Ategeka ko Yezu abambwa ku musaraba bamaze kumukubita ibiboko .
41015016	Abasirikari bamujyana mu gikari cy'ingoro y'umutegetsi , bahakoranyiriza abandi basirikari bose .
41015017	Bambika Yezu umwitero w'umutuku wijimye , bazingazinga ikamba ry'amahwa bararimutamiriza .
41015018	Biha kumuramya bati : “ Urakarama Mwami w'Abayahudi ! ”
41015019	Bamara umwanya bamukubita ikibingo mu mutwe , bakamuvundereza amacandwe , maze bagapfukama ngo baramuramya .
41015020	Nuko bamaze kumushinyagurira batyo , bamwambura wa mwitero utukura bamusubiza imyambaro ye . Baramusohokana bajya kumubamba ku musaraba .
41015021	Bakigenda bahura n'umuntu w'i Sirene witwaga Simoni , se wa Alegisanderi na Rufo ava mu cyaro . Abasirikari bamuhatira gutwara umusaraba wa Yezu .
41015022	Bajyana Yezu ahitwa i Gologota , bisobanurwa ngo “ ahitiriwe igihanga . ”
41015023	Bamuha divayi ivanzemo umuti wo koroshya uburibwe , ariko arayanga .
41015024	Nuko bamubamba ku musaraba , bigabanya imyambaro ye bakoresheje ubufindo , kugira ngo buri wese amenye iyo ari bujyane .
41015025	Igihe bamubambaga ku musaraba hari isaa tatu .
41015026	Itangazo ry'icyo yaregwaga ryari ryanditswe ngo “ Umwami w'Abayahudi . ”
41015027	Yari abambanywe n'abambuzi babiri , umwe iburyo undi ibumoso . [

41016001	Isabato ishize , Mariya w'i Magadala na Salome na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo , bagura amavuta ahumura neza kugira ngo bajye gusīga umurambo wa Yezu .

42002021	Iminsi umunani ishize , igihe cy'imihango yo gukeba umwana kigeze bamwita Yezu , ari ryo zina umumarayika yari yaravuze nyina atarasama inda .

42002023	nk'uko byanditswe mu Mategeko ya Nyagasani ngo “ Umuhungu wese w'impfura azegurirwa Nyagasani . ”
42002024	Bari bajyanywe kandi no gutura igitambo cy'ibyana by'inuma bibiri , cyangwa intungura ebyiri nk'uko byanditswe mu Mategeko ya Nyagasani .
42002025	I Yeruzalemu hari umuntu witwa Simeyoni , akaba umugabo utunganiye Imana kandi akayubaha . Yari ategereje Uzazanira Abisiraheli agakiza . Mwuka Muziranenge yari kumwe na we ,
42002026	kandi yari yaramuhishuriye ko atazapfa atabanje kubona Kristo wa Nyagasani .
42002027	Nuko Simeyoni ajyanwa na Mwuka mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana . Ababyeyi b'umwana Yezu bari bamujyanyeyo kugira ngo bamukorere imihango itegetswe .
42002028	Simeyoni aramuterura ashimira Imana ati :
42002029	“ Databuja , washohoje ibyo wansezeranyije , none undeke nigendere amahoro .
42002030	Niboneye namaso yanjye agakiza kawe ,
42002031	ako wageneye amahanga yose .

42002035	bityo ibitekerezo bihishwe mu mitima ya benshi bishyirwe ahagaragara . Nawe kandi bizakubera nk'inkota ikwahuranyije umutima . ”
42002036	Hariho n'umuhanuzikazi witwaga Ana , umukobwa wa Fanuweli wo mu muryango wa Ashēri . Yari ageze mu za bukuru kandi yari yaramaranye n'umugabo we imyaka irindwi ,
42002037	maze arapfakara . Amara imyaka mirongo inani n'ine adasiba mu rugo rw'Ingoro akorera Imana ijoro n'amanywa , yigomwa kurya kandi asenga .

42002043	Iminsi mikuru irangiye ababyeyi barataha , ariko umwana Yezu yisigarira i Yeruzalemu bo batabizi .
42002044	Bagenda urugendo rw'umunsi wose bakeka ko ari mu bantu bagendanaga . Hanyuma batangira kumushakira muri bene wabo no mu bandi bari baziranye .
42002045	Nuko batamubonye basubira i Yeruzalemu bamushaka .
42002046	Nyuma y'iminsi itatu bamubona mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , yicaye hamwe n'abigisha abateze amatwi , ababaza n'ibibazo .
42002047	Abamwumvaga bose batangazwaga n'ubwenge bwe n'ibyo yabasubizaga .
42002048	Ababyeyi be bamubonye barumirwa . Nyina aramubaza ati : “ Mwana wanjye , watugenje ute ? Dore jye na so ntaho tutagushakiye duhagaritse umutima ! ”
42002049	Arabasubiza ati : “ Ariko se mwanshakiraga iki ? Ese ntimwari muzi ko ngomba kuba mu Nzu ya Data ? ”

42002052	Uko Yezu yakuraga ni ko yungukaga ubwenge kandi ashimwa n'Imana n'abantu .
42003001	Mu mwaka wa cumi n'itanu umwami w'i Roma witwa Tiberi ari ku ngoma , Ponsiyo Pilato yategekaga i Yudeya , Herodi akaba umutegetsi ushinzwe Galileya , Filipo umuvandimwe we ashinzwe intara ya Itureya n'iya Tirakoniti , naho Lizaniya we ashinzwe ahitwa Abilene ,

42003003	Aherako agenda uturere twose duhereranye n'uruzi rwa Yorodani , atangaza ko abantu bagomba kwihana bakabatizwa , kugira ngo bababarirwe ibyaha .

42003008	Nuko rero nk'uko igiti cyera imbuto , abe ari ko namwe mugira imigenzereze yerekana ko mwihannye , kandi ntimukirate muti : ‘ Turi bene Aburahamu . ’ Erega ndahamya ko no muri aya mabuye Imana ibasha kuremamo bene Aburahamu !
42003009	Ndetse n'ubu intorezo irabanguye ngo iteme ibiti ibihereye ku mizi , bityo rero igiti cyose kitera imbuto nziza kigiye gutemwa gitwikwe . ”
42003010	Rubanda ni ko kumubaza bati : “ None se tubigenze dute ? ”

42003014	Abasirikari na bo baramubaza bati : “ Naho se twe bite ? ” Yohani ati : “ Ntimukagire uwo mwambura ibye cyangwa ngo mumurege ibinyoma , ahubwo munyurwe n'ibihembo byanyu . ”
42003015	Nuko rubanda bagumya gutegereza ibigiye kuba , bose bibaza niba Yohani yaba ari Kristo .
42003016	Yohani ni ko kubabwira bose ati : “ Jyewe ndababatirisha amazi ariko hagiye kuza undusha ububasha , ntibinkwiriye no gupfundura udushumi tw'inkweto ze . We azababatirisha Mwuka Muziranenge n'umuriro .
42003017	Dore afashe urutaro ngo agosore , impeke azihunike mu kigega naho umurama awucanishe umuriro utazima . ”

42003019	Acyaha kandi n'Umutegetsi Herodi ku byerekeye Herodiya , umugore w'umuvandimwe we yari atunze , no ku byerekeye ibindi bibi byinshi yari yarakoze .
42003020	Nuko ibyo byose Herodi abigerekaho no gushyirisha Yohani muri gereza .
42003021	Mu gihe rubanda rwose babatizwaga , Yezu na we arabatizwa . Agisenga ijuru rirakinguka ,
42003022	Mwuka Muziranenge amumanukiraho asa n'inuma . Nuko humvikana ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru ati : “ Uri Umwana wanjye nkunda cyane , ni wowe nishimira . ”

42004001	Yezu ava kuri Yorodani yuzuye Mwuka Muziranenge , maze ajyanwa na Mwuka mu butayu .

42004003	Satani ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Niba uri Umwana w'Imana , tegeka iri buye rihinduke umugati . ”
42004004	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Biranditswe ngo ‘ Umuntu ntatungwa n'ibyokurya gusa . ’ ”

42004028	Abari mu rusengero bose bumvise ibyo bararakara cyane ,

42004030	Ariko we abaca mu myanya y'intoki arigendera .

42004034	“ Ayi ! Yezu w'i Nazareti uradushakaho iki ? Mbese wazanywe no kuturimbura ? Nzi uwo uri we , ni wowe Muziranenge wavuye ku Mana . ”

42005001	Igihe kimwe Yezu yari ahagaze ku kiyaga cya Genezareti , abantu benshi bamwisukaho kugira ngo bumve Ijambo ry'Imana .

42005037	Nta n'usuka inzoga y'umubira mu mpago z'impu zishaje . Uwabikora , igihe iyo nzoga ibira yaturitsa impago igasandara , impago na zo zikangirika .

42006001	Ku munsi w'isabato Yezu anyura mu mirima y'ingano , abigishwa be baca amahundo bayavungira mu biganza bararya .
42006002	Bamwe mu Bafarizayi barababaza bati : “ Kuki mukora ibidakwiriye gukorwa ku isabato ? ”
42006003	Yezu na we arababaza ati : “ Mbese ntimwigeze musoma ibyo Dawidi yakoze , igihe we n'abo bari kumwe bari bashonje ?
42006004	Yinjiye mu Nzu y'Imana afata imigati yatuwe Imana , ararya ahaho n'abo bari kumwe , kandi nta wemererwaga kuyirya uretse abatambyi bonyine . ”
42006005	Yezu yungamo ati : “ Umwana w'umuntu ni we Mugenga w'isabato . ”
42006006	Ku yindi sabato Yezu yinjira mu rusengero maze atangira kwigisha . Hari umuntu unyunyutse ikiganza cy'iburyo .
42006007	Abigishamategeko n'Abafarizayi bagenzura Yezu ngo barebe ko amukiza ku isabato , kugira ngo babone icyo bamurega .
42006008	Ariko Yezu amenya ibyo batekereza , ni ko kubwira uwo muntu unyunyutse ikiganza ati : “ Haguruka uhagarare hariya hagati . ” Nuko abigenza atyo .
42006009	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Hari icyo mbabaza . Mbese hemewe iki ku munsi w'isabato , kugira neza cyangwa kugira nabi ? Gukiza umuntu , cyangwa kumwica ? ”
42006010	Bose abararanganyamo amaso maze abwira uwo muntu ati : “ Rambura ikiganza . ” Nuko arakirambura cyongera kuba kizima .
42006011	Ariko ba bandi bo barabisha , bajya inama y'icyo bakora kuri Yezu .
42006012	Muri iyo minsi Yezu ajya ku musozi gusenga , akesha ijoro asenga Imana .
42006013	Bukeye ahamagara abigishwa be , atoranyamo cumi na babiri abita Intumwa ze . Ni bo aba :
42006014	Simoni yise Petero n'umuvandimwe we Andereya , na Yakobo na Yohani na Filipo na Barutolomayo ,
42006015	na Matayo na Tomasi , na Yakobo mwene Alufeyi na Simoni wiswe umurwanashyaka ,
42006016	na Yuda mwene Yakobo na Yuda Isikariyoti wa wundi wabaye umugambanyi .
42006017	Yezu amanukana na bo ahagarara ahantu h'itaba , hari n'abandi bigishwa be benshi cyane , hari n'imbaga y'abantu baturutse muri Yudeya yose n'i Yeruzalemu , no mu mijyi yo mu nkuka z'inyanja , uwa Tiri n'uwa Sidoni .
42006018	Bari bazanywe no kumva Yezu kandi ngo abakize indwara . Ababaga bahanzweho na bo yarabakizaga .
42006019	Abantu bose bamaraniraga kumukoraho , kuko ububasha bwamuturukagamo bukabakiza bose .
42006020	Yezu yubura amaso yitegereza abigishwa be , aravuga ati :
42006021	Murahirwa mwebwe mushonje ubu , kuko muzahazwa . Murahirwa mwebwe murira ubu , kuko muzaseka .
42006022	“ Murahirwa igihe cyose abantu babanga , bakabigizayo bakabatuka , bakababeshyera babahōra Umwana w'umuntu .
42006023	Umunsi babagenje batyo muzishime muhimbarwe , kuko muzabona ingororano ishyitse mu ijuru . Ni na ko n'ubundi ba sekuruza bagenzaga abahanuzi b'Imana .
42006024	Ariko muzabona ishyano mwebwe abakungahaye ubu , kuko mumaze gushyikira ibibahagije !
42006025	Muzabona ishyano mwebwe abijuse ubu , kuko muzasonza . Muzabona ishyano mwebwe abaseka ubu , kuko muzashavura kandi mukarira .
42006026	“ Muzabona ishyano igihe abantu bose babavuga neza . Uko ni ko na ba sekuruza bagenzerezaga abahanurabinyoma . ”
42006027	“ Reka mbabwire mwe munyumva , mukunde abanzi banyu , mugirire neza ababanga ,
42006028	mwifurize umugisha ababavuma kandi musabire ababagirira nabi .
42006029	Nihagira ugukubita urushyi umuhe n'undi musaya . Nihagira ukwambura ikote umureke atware n'ishati .
42006030	Umuntu wese ugusabye umuhe , kandi ukwambuye ikintu cyawe ntuzakimwake ukundi .
42006031	Uko mwifuza ko abandi babagirira abe ari ko namwe mubagirira .
42006032	“ Niba mukunda ababakunda gusa , muzashimirwa iki ? Abanyabyaha na bo bakunda ababakunda .
42006033	Niba kandi mugirira neza ababagirira neza gusa , muzashimirwa iki ? Abanyabyaha na bo ni ko babigenza .
42006034	Niba kandi muguriza abo mwizeye ko bazabishyura gusa , muzashimirwa iki ? Abanyabyaha na bo baguriza abandi banyabyaha , biringiye ko bazasubizwa ibihwanye n'ibyabo .
42006035	Ahubwo mukunde abanzi banyu mubagirire neza , kandi mubagurize nta cyo mwiringiye kuzishyurwa . Nuko muzabona ingororano ishyitse kandi muzaba abana b'Isumbabyose , yo igirira neza indashima n'abagizi ba nabi .
42006036	Nimujye mugira impuhwe nk'uko Imana So izigira . ”
42006037	“ Ntimukihe gucira abandi imanza namwe mutazazicirwa . Ntimukagereke ibibi ku bandi namwe mutazabigerekwaho . Ahubwo mubabarire abandi namwe muzababarirwa .
42006038	Mutange namwe muzahabwa , akebo gashyitse , gatsindagiye , gacugushije ndetse gasesekaye ni ko bazabagereramo . Akebo mugeramo ni ko muzagererwamo . ”
42006039	Yungamo abaha ikigereranyo ati : “ Mbese impumyi ibasha kurandata indi mpumyi ? Ubwo se zombi ntizagwa mu rwobo ?
42006040	Nta mwigishwa uruta umwigisha we , ariko uwakwiga binonosoye yazagera gusa ku rugero rw'umwigisha we .
42006041	“ Kuki ushishikazwa n'agatotsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzi wawe , kandi ukirengagiza umugogo uri mu ryawe ?
42006042	Wabasha ute kubwira mugenzi wawe uti : ‘ Mugenzi wanjye , reka ngutokore agatotsi kakuri mu jisho ’ , kandi nawe ubwawe utareba umugogo uri mu ryawe ? Wa ndyarya we , banza witokore umugogo ukuri mu jisho , ubone gutokora agatotsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzi wawe ! ”
42006043	“ Nta giti cyiza cyera imbuto mbi , kandi nta giti kibi cyera imbuto nziza .
42006044	Buri giti ukibwirwa n'imbuto cyera . Nta wasoroma imbuto z'umutini ku mutobotobo , cyangwa iz'umuzabibu ku mufatangwe .
42006045	Umuntu mwiza akura ibyiza mu migambi ye myiza , naho umuntu mubi agakura ibibi mu migambi ye mibi . Erega akuzuye umutima ni ko gasesekara ku munwa ! ”
42006046	“ Ni iki kibatera guhora mumpamagara muti ‘ Nyagasani , Nyagasani ’ , nyamara mudakora ibyo mvuga ?
42006047	Umuntu wese unsanga akumva ibyo mvuga kandi akabikurikiza , dore uko namugereranya :
42006048	ni nk'umuntu wagiye kubaka inzu agacukura cyane , agatangirira urufatiro ku rutare . Nuko igihe uruzi rukutse , umuvumba utemba kuri iyo nzu ntiyanyeganyega , kubera ko yubatse neza .
42006049	Ariko uwumva ibyo mvuga ntabikurikize , yagereranywa n'umuntu wubatse inzu ku butaka nta rufatiro . Umuvumba uraza uyikubitaho ihita iriduka . Mbega ngo aho yari iri harahinduka itongo ! ”
42007001	Yezu amaze kubwira abantu ibyo byose , ajya mu mujyi wa Kafarinawumu .
42007002	Hariyo umukapiteni w'Umunyaroma wari ufite umugaragu yakundaga cyane . Uwo mugaragu yari arwaye agiye gupfa .
42007003	Uwo mukapiteni ngo yumve ibyo bavuga kuri Yezu , amutumaho bamwe mu bakuru b'Abayahudi , amusaba kuza kumukiriza umugaragu .
42007004	Bageze aho Yezu ari baramwinginga cyane bati : " “ Birakwiye ko uwo muntu wamugoboka ,
42007005	kuko twebwe Abayahudi adukunda kandi ni we watwubakiye urusengero . ”
42007006	Nuko Yezu ajyana na bo maze igihe bageze hafi y'urugo , wa mukapiteni atuma incuti kumubwira ngo : “ Nyagasani wikwirushya , ntibinkwiye ko winjira iwanjye .
42007007	Kuza kukwishakira na byo nasanze bitankwiye , ahubwo tegeka gusa , umugaragu wanjye arakira .
42007008	Erega nanjye ndi umuntu utegekwa , kandi mfite abasirikari ntegeka . Iyo mbwiye umwe muri bo nti ‘ Genda ’ , aragenda , nabwira undi nti ‘ Ngwino ’ , akaza , nabwira n'umugaragu wanjye nti ‘ Kora iki ’ , akagikora . ”
42007009	Yezu abyumvise atyo atangarira uwo muntu , arahindukira abwira imbaga y'abantu yari imukurikiye ati : “ Reka mbabwire : no mu Bisiraheli sinigeze mbona ufite ukwizera kugeze aha ! ”
42007010	Abatumwe bahindukiye basanga wa mugaragu yakize .
42007011	Nyuma y'ibyo Yezu ajya mu mujyi witwa Nayini , ashagawe n'abigishwa be n'imbaga y'abantu .
42007012	Ageze bugufi bw'irembo ry'umujyi , ahura n'abatwaye umurambo . Uwapfuye yari umuhungu w'ikinege , nyina akaba umupfakazi . Imbaga y'abantu benshi bo mu mujyi bari kumwe n'uwo mupfakazi .
42007013	Nyagasani amubonye amugirira impuhwe , maze aramubwira ati : “ Wirira ! ”
42007014	Nuko yegera ingobyi umurambo warimo ayikoraho , abahetsi barahagarara . Aravuga ati : “ Musore , ndagutegetse byuka ! ”
42007015	Uwari wapfuye areguka atangira kuvuga . Nuko Yezu amushyikiriza nyina .
42007016	Abari aho bose baratinya maze basingiza Imana bati : “ Umuhanuzi ukomeye yabonetse muri twe ” , kandi bati : “ Imana yagendereye abantu bayo . ”
42007017	Inkuru y'ibyo Yezu yakoze ikwira muri Yudeya yose no mu karere kose kahakikije .
42007018	Abigishwa ba Yohani bamumenyesha ibyo byose . Yohani ni ko guhamagara babiri muri bo ,
42007019	abatuma kuri Nyagasani ngo bamubaze bati : “ Mbese ni wowe wa wundi ugomba kuza , cyangwa dutegereze undi ? ”
42007020	Bageze aho Yezu ari baramubwira bati : “ Yohani Mubatiza yadutumye kukubaza niba ari wowe wa wundi ugomba kuza , cyangwa niba tugomba gutegereza undi ? ”
42007021	Icyo gihe basanga Yezu akiza abantu benshi indwara n'ububabare n'ingabo za Satani , ahumura n'impumyi nyinshi .
42007022	Hanyuma asubiza izo ntumwa ati : “ Mugende mutekerereze Yohani ibyo mwiboneye n'ibyo mwiyumviye muti ‘ Impumyi zirahumuka , abamugaye baragenda , ababembe barakira , ibipfamatwi birumva , abapfuye barazuka , n'abakene baragezwaho Ubutumwa bwiza ! ’
42007023	Hahirwa rero umuntu wese utazareka kunyizera . ”
42007024	Intumwa za Yohani zimaze kugenda , Yezu atangira kubwira rubanda ibyerekeye Yohani , arababaza ati : “ Mwagiye mu butayu kureba iki ? Mbese ni urubingo ruhungabanywa n'umuyaga ?
42007025	None se mwagiye kureba iki ? Ese ni umuntu wambaye imyambaro y'agaciro ? Oya , abambaye imyambaro y'akataraboneka bakanadamarara , ni abibera mu ngoro z'abami .
42007026	None se nyine mwagiye kureba iki ? Ese ni umuhanuzi ? Ni we koko , ndetse aruta umuhanuzi !
42007027	Yohani uwo ni we Ibyanditswe bivuga , aho Imana igira iti : ‘ Dore nohereje intumwa yanjye mbere yawe , kugira ngo igutunganyirize inzira . ’
42007028	Reka mbabwire : mu bana b'abantu ntawe uruta Yohani , nyamara umuto mu bwami bw'Imana aramuruta . ”
42007029	Abantu bose bamwumvise barimo n'abasoresha , biyemeje kumvira Imana . Ni cyo cyatumye basanga Yohani ngo ababatize .
42007030	Ibiri amambu Abafarizayi n'abahanga mu by'Amategeko , banze imigambi Imana yari ibafitiye , ntibasanga Yohani ngo ababatize .
42007031	Yezu arakomeza ati : “ Mbese abantu b'iki gihe nabagereranya n'iki ? Mbese bameze nka ba nde ?
42007032	Ni nk'abana bicaye mu isoko bahamagarana bati : ‘ Twateye imbyino z'umunezero ntimwabyina ! Duteye iz'ishavu ntimwarira ! ’
42007033	Yohani Mubatiza yaje yigomwa kurya no kunywa inzoga muravuga muti : ‘ Yahanzweho ! ’
42007034	Naho Umwana w'umuntu aje arya anywa muravuga muti : ‘ Mbega igisahiranda cy'igisinzi , cy'incuti y'abasoresha n'abanyabyaha ! ’
42007035	Nyamara ubwenge bw'Imana bugaragazwa n'abagengwa na bwo bose . ”
42007036	Umwe mu Bafarizayi atumira Yezu ngo basangire . Bageze iwe bajya ku meza .
42007037	Muri uwo mujyi hari umugore w'umunyabyaha . Amenye ko Yezu ari ku meza kwa wa Mufarizayi , azana icupa ryuzuye amarashi .
42007038	Ahagarara inyuma ya Yezu ahagana ku birenge arira , amarira atonyangira ku birenge bya Yezu maze abihanaguza umusatsi we , agumya kubisomagura no kubisīga ya marashi .
42007039	Umufarizayi wari watumiye Yezu abonye ibyo , ni ko kwibwira ati : “ Iyaba uyu muntu yari umuhanuzi koko , aba yamenye uriya mugore umukozeho uwo ari we n'icyo ari cyo , ko ari umunyabyaha . ”
42007040	Yezu afata ijambo ati : “ Simoni , mfite icyo nkubwira . ” Simoni ati : “ Mwigisha , mbwira . ”
42007041	Yezu ati : “ Tuvuge ko abantu babiri bārimo umwenda w'uwabagurije . Umwe yari amurimo ungana n'igihembo cy'imibyizi magana atanu , naho undi ay'imibyizi mirongo itanu .
42007042	Abonye ko nta wari ufite icyo yamwishyura , bombi abarekera imyenda yabo . None se ni uwuhe muri abo uzarushaho kumukunda ? ”
42007043	Simoni aramusubiza ati : “ Ndatekereza ko ari uwo yarekeye umwenda munini . ” Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Ubivuze uko biri . ”
42007044	Nuko akebuka wa mugore maze abaza Simoni ati : “ Urabona uyu mugore ? Ninjiye iwawe ntiwampa amazi yo koga ibirenge , ariko we yansutseho amarira ku birenge maze abihanaguza umusatsi we .
42007045	Ntiwandamukije unsoma , ariko we kuva aho ngereye aha ntiyahwemye kunsoma ibirenge .
42007046	Ntiwansīze amavuta mu mutwe , ariko we yansīze amarashi ku birenge .
42007047	Ni yo mpamvu nkubwira ko amaze kubabarirwa ibyaha bye byinshi , urukundo rwe rwinshi ni rwo rubigaragaza . Naho ubabariwe bike , urukundo rwe ruba ruke . ”
42007048	Yezu ni ko kubwira uwo mugore ati : “ Ibyaha byawe urabibabariwe . ”
42007049	Abatumirwa bari kumwe ku meza batangira kwibaza bati : “ Uyu ni muntu ki ugeza n'aho kubabarira ibyaha ? ”
42007050	Ariko Yezu abwira uwo mugore ati : “ Ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije , genda amahoro . ”
42008001	Nyuma y'ibyo Yezu anyura mu mijyi no mu byaro , atangaza Ubutumwa bwiza bwerekeye ubwami bw'Imana . Ba bigishwa be cumi na babiri bagendanaga na we ,
42008002	hamwe n'abagore bamwe yari yarakijije indwara , abandi akabameneshamo ingabo za Satani . Abo ni Mariya w'i Magadala wari wameneshejwemo ingabo ndwi za Satani ,
42008003	na Yowana muka Shuza umunyabintu wa Herodi , na Suzana n'abandi benshi , batangaga ku byabo ngo bafashe Yezu n'abigishwa be .
42008004	Imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu irakorana , bari baturutse muri buri mujyi bagana aho Yezu ari . Nuko abacira uyu mugani ati :
42008005	“ Habayeho umuntu wagiye kubiba , igihe abiba imbuto zimwe zigenda zigwa ku nzira , hanyuma abantu barazikandagira n'inyoni zirazitoragura .
42008006	Izindi zigwa ku gasi , ngo zimare kumera ziruma kuko zabuze amazi .
42008007	Izindi zigwa mu mahwa , amahwa azirengaho ziragwingira .
42008008	Izindi zigwa mu butaka bwiza , zirakura zera imbuto ijana rumwe rumwe . ” Yezu amaze kuvuga atyo avuga cyane ati : “ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve ! ”
42008009	Abigishwa be bamubaza icyo uwo mugani ushaka kuvuga .
42008010	Arabasubiza ati : “ Mwebwe mwahawe kumenya amabanga y'ubwami bw'Imana , naho abandi babimenyeshwa n'imigani kugira ngo
42008011	“ Dore icyo uwo mugani uvuga : imbuto zibibwa ni Ijambo ry'Imana .
42008012	Imbuto zaguye ku nzira zigereranywa n'abantu bumva iryo Jambo , nyuma Satani akaza akarikura mu mitima yabo , kugira ngo bataryemera ngo bakizwe .
42008013	Izaguye ku gasi ni nk'abantu bumva Ijambo ry'Imana , bakaryakirana ubwuzu ariko ntibashinge imizi . Baryemera igihe gito , nyuma bahura n'ibibagerageza bakarireka .
42008014	Izaguye mu mahwa ni nk'abumva iryo Jambo , maze guhagarika umutima no kwishakira ubukungu , no kwishimisha mu by'ubuzima bikarirengaho , bakamera nk'imbuto zarumbye .
42008015	Naho izaguye mu butaka bwiza ni nk'abumva iryo Jambo n'umutima mwiza uboneye , bakarikomeza ntibacogore , bakera imbuto .
42008016	“ Ntawe ucana itara ngo aryubikeho akabindi cyangwa ngo arishyire munsi y'igitanda . Ahubwo aritereka ahirengeye kugira ngo abinjira bose basange habona .
42008017	Nta gihishwe kitazahishurwa , nta n'ibanga ritazamenyekana ngo rishyirwe ahagaragara .
42008018	“ Murajye mwitondera uburyo mwumva ibyo mbabwira . Ufite azongererwa , naho udafite na busa azakwa n'utwo yaririragaho . ”
42008019	Abavandimwe ba Yezu na nyina bajya aho ari , ariko ntibabasha kumugeraho kubera ikivunge cy'abantu .
42008020	Bamwe babimenyesha Yezu bati : “ Nyoko n'abavandimwe bawe bahagaze hanze kandi baragushaka . ”
42008021	Arabasubiza ati : “ Mama n'abavandimwe banjye ni abumva Ijambo ry'Imana bakarikurikiza . ”
42008022	Igihe kimwe Yezu yajyanye mu bwato n'abigishwa be , arababwira ati : “ Twambuke dufate hakurya . ” Nuko baragenda .
42008023	Bacyambuka ikiyaga Yezu arisinzirira . Nuko haza inkubi y'umuyaga , ubwato bwuzura amazi ku buryo bendaga kurohama .
42008024	Begera Yezu baramukangura bati : “ Mwigisha , mwigisha , turashize ! ” Nuko arakanguka , maze acyaha umuyaga n'umuhengeri w'amazi , byose birahosha haba ituze .
42008025	Hanyuma arababaza ati : “ Mbese ntimunyizera ? ” Bagira ubwoba barumirwa , barabazanya bati : “ Uyu ni muntu ki , utegeka n'imiyaga n'amazi bikamwumvira ? ”
42008026	Bomokera mu ntara y'Abanyagerasa , hakurya y'ikiyaga cya Galileya .
42008027	Yezu akigera imusozi , umuntu wahanzweho ava mu mujyi aza amusanga . Hari hashize igihe atacyikoza umwambaro , atagitaha no mu rugo ahubwo yibera mu irimbi .
42008028	Akibona Yezu induru ayiha umunwa , yikubita hasi imbere ye avuga aranguruye ati : “ Uranshakaho iki Yezu Mwana w'Imana Isumbabyose ? Ndakwinginze we kunyica urubozo . ”
42008029	Ibyo byatewe n'uko Yezu yari ategetse ingabo ya Satani kumuvamo . Iyo ngabo yamuhangagaho kenshi , bigatuma bamurinda bamubohesheje iminyururu amaguru n'amaboko , ariko izo ngoyi akazituritsa maze ikamubuyereza ahantu hadatuwe .
42008030	Yezu aramubaza ati : “ Witwa nde ? ” Aramusubiza ati : “ Nitwa Giteronyamwinshi . ” Ibyo abivugira ko yari yarahanzweho n'ingabo za Satani nyinshi .
42008031	Zinginga Yezu ngo atazohereza ikuzimu .
42008032	Hafi aho ku musozi hari umugana w'ingurube nyinshi zarishaga . Izo ngabo za Satani zinginga Yezu ngo azireke zinjire mu ngurube , arazemerera .
42008033	Nuko ziva muri uwo muntu zinjira mu ngurube , maze umukumbi wose ucuncumuka ku gacuri , wiroha mu kiyaga urarohama .
42008034	Abashumba bazo babonye ibibaye barahunga , iyo nkuru bayikwiza mu mujyi no mu byaro .
42008035	Abaturage bajya kwirebera ibyabaye . Bageze aho Yezu ari babona wa muntu ingabo za Satani zavuyemo , yicaye hasi iruhande rwa Yezu , yambaye yagaruye ubwenge bibatera ubwoba .
42008036	Abari babyiboneye babatekerereza ukuntu uwo wari wahanzweho yakize .
42008037	Noneho abaturage bose b'iyo ntara y'Abanyagerasa basaba Yezu kubavira aho , kubera ko ubwoba bwari bwabatashye . Yezu ajya mu bwato ngo agende ,
42008038	uwameneshejwemo ingabo za Satani asaba Yezu ngo bigumanire . Ariko Yezu aramusezerera agira ati :
42008039	“ Subira iwanyu ubatekerereze ibyo Imana yagukoreye byose . ” Nuko uwo muntu aragenda , yamamaza mu mujyi wose ibyo Yezu yamukoreye .
42008040	Yezu agarutse imbaga y'abantu iramwakira , kuko bose bari bamutegereje .
42008041	Haza umugabo witwaga Yayiro , wari umutware w'urusengero rw'Abayahudi . Yikubita imbere ya Yezu amusaba kuza iwe .
42008042	Amubwira ko umukobwa we w'ikinege w'imyaka nka cumi n'ibiri asamba . Akigenda rubanda nyamwinshi bamuniganagaho .
42008043	Muri abo bantu harimo umugore wari urwaye indwara yo kuva , ayimaranye imyaka cumi n'ibiri . [ Yari yaratagaguje utwe twose mu baganga , ariko ] nta wari warashoboye kumukiza .
42008044	Yegera Yezu amuturutse inyuma maze akora ku ncunda z'umwitero we . Ako kanya amaraso arakama .
42008045	Yezu arabaza ati : “ Ni nde unkozeho ? ” Bose barahakana maze Petero aravuga ati : “ Mwigisha , ese ntubona ko abantu benshi bagukikije bakaba bakubyiga ? ”
42008046	Ariko Yezu aravuga ati : “ Hari uwankozeho kuko numvise hari ububasha bumvuyemo . ”
42008047	Wa mugore abonye ko yamenyekanye , ni ko kuza ahinda umushyitsi yikubita imbere ya Yezu , amutekerereza icyatumye amukoraho n'ukuntu yahise akira , abari aho bose barabyumva .
42008048	Yezu ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Mwana wanjye , ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije , genda amahoro . ”
42008049	Akivuga atyo haza intumwa ibwira wa mutware w'urusengero iti : “ Umukobwa wawe amaze gupfa , ntiwirirwe urushya umwigisha . ”
42008050	Yezu abyumvise abwira Yayiro ati : “ Witinya , nyizera gusa arakira . ”
42008051	Ageze mu rugo ntiyareka hari uwinjirana na we , uretse Petero na Yohani na Yakobo , na se na nyina b'umwana .
42008052	Bose barariraga bashavujwe n'uwo mwana . Yezu ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Mwirira , ntiyapfuye ahubwo arasinziriye . ”
42008053	Baramuseka , kuko bari bazi ko umwana yapfuye .
42008054	Nuko Yezu amufata ukuboko aramuhamagara ati : “ Mwana , byuka ! ”
42008055	Umukobwa agarura akuka aba muzima , maze ahita abyuka . Yezu ategeka ko bamugaburira .
42008056	Ababyeyi ibyishimo birabasāba , nyamara Yezu arabihanangiriza ngo be kugira uwo bamenyesha ibibaye .
42009001	Yezu akoranya ba bandi cumi na babiri , abaha ububasha n'ubushobozi bwo kumenesha ingabo zose za Satani , no gukiza indwara .
42009002	Abatuma gutangaza iby'ubwami bw'Imana no gukiza abarwayi .
42009003	Nuko arababwira ati : “ Ntimugire icyo mujyana yaba inkoni cyangwa umufuka , yaba impamba cyangwa amafaranga , ndetse ntimugomba no kujyana amakanzu abiri .
42009004	Urugo muzabonamo icumbi muzarugumemo kugeza igihe muzahavira .
42009005	Umujyi muzageramo ntibabakire muzawuvemo muhunguye umukungugu wo mu birenge byanyu , kugira ngo bibabere icyemezo cy'icyaha cyabo . ”
42009006	Bafata urugendo banyura mu mirenge yose , bahageza Ubutumwa bwiza kandi bakiza abarwayi .
42009007	Herodi umutegetsi w'intara ya Galileya yumvise ibyabaye byose , biramuyobera kuko bamwe bavugaga ko ari Yohani wazutse ,
42009008	abandi bakavuga ko ari Eliya wagarutse , naho abandi ngo ni umwe mu bahanuzi ba kera wazutse .
42009009	Herodi we akavuga ati : “ Ko Yohani namuciye igihanga , uwo ni nde kandi numva bavugaho ibyo ngibyo ? ” Bituma Herodi yifuza kubona Yezu .
42009010	Intumwa za Yezu zigarutse zimutekerereza ibyo zari zakoze . Nuko Yezu arazijyana yihererana na zo ahagana mu mujyi witwa Betsayida .
42009011	Imbaga y'abantu imenye ko yagiyeyo baramukurikira , Yezu arabakira ababwira iby'ubwami bw'Imana , kandi n'abarwayi arabakiza .
42009012	Ba bandi cumi na babiri babonye ko umunsi uciye ikibu , baramwegera baramubwira bati : “ Sezerera abantu kugira ngo bajye mu nsisiro no mu mihana ya bugufi bacumbikeyo , kandi bashakeyo icyo bafungura kuko aha hantu turi hadatuwe . ”
42009013	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Ahubwo mube ari mwe mubafungurira . ” Baramubwira bati : “ Dufite imigati itarenga itanu n'amafi abiri , keretse ahari twajya guhahira aba bantu bose ibyokurya ! ”
42009014	Abagabo bonyine bari aho bari nk'ibihumbi bitanu . Yezu ni ko kubwira abigishwa be ati : “ Mubicaze mu byiciro , buri cyiciro kigizwe n'abantu nka mirongo itanu . ”
42009015	Abigishwa babigenza batyo bose barabicaza .
42009016	Yezu afata iyo migati itanu n'amafi abiri , areba ku ijuru , ashimira Imana , arabimanyura abiha abigishwa be , na bo babikwiza iyo mbaga .
42009017	Nuko bose bararya barahaga , maze bateranya utumanyu dusagutse twuzura inkangara cumi n'ebyiri .
42009018	Igihe kimwe Yezu yari ahiherereye asenga , abigishwa bari kumwe na we maze arababaza ati : “ Abantu bavuga ko ndi nde ? ”
42009019	Baramusubiza bati : “ Bamwe bavuga ko uri Yohani Mubatiza , abandi ngo uri Eliya , naho abandi ngo uri umwe mu bahanuzi ba kera wazutse . ”
42009020	Nuko Yezu arababaza ati : “ Mwebwe se muvuga ko ndi nde ? ” Petero aramusubiza ati : “ Uri Kristo wavuye ku Mana . ”
42009021	Yezu arabihanangiriza ngo ntibagire uwo babihingukiriza .
42009022	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Ni ngombwa ko Umwana w'umuntu ababazwa cyane , akangwa n'abakuru b'imiryango n'abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abigishamategeko , bakamwica maze ku munsi wa gatatu akazuka . ”
42009023	Nuko bose arababwira ati : “ Ushaka kunyoboka wese nareke kwiyitaho , ahubwo atware umusaraba we uko bukeye ankurikire .
42009024	Ushaka gukiza ubuzima bwe azabubura , naho uhara ubuzima bwe ari jye ahōrwa azaba abukijije .
42009025	Mbese umuntu byamumarira iki kwigarurira isi yose , ariko akaba yivukije ubugingo bwe akarimbuka ?
42009026	Umuntu wese ugira isoni zo kunyemera no kwemera inyigisho zanjye , Umwana w'umuntu na we azagira isoni zo kumwemera , igihe azaba aje afite ikuzo rye n'irya se n'iry'abamarayika baziranenge .
42009027	Ndababwiza ukuri , bamwe mu bari aha ntibazapfa batabonye ubwami bw'Imana . ”
42009028	Hashize nk'iminsi umunani Yezu avuze ibyo , ajyana Petero na Yohani na Yakobo mu mpinga y'umusozi gusenga .
42009029	Nuko agisenga mu maso he hahinduka ukundi , imyambaro ye iba urwererane rumena amaso .
42009030	Bagiye kubona babona abagabo babiri ari bo Musa na Eliya baganira na Yezu .
42009031	Baboneka bafite ikuzo , bavugana na we ibyerekeye uko agiye kujya i Yeruzalemu ngo agweyo , asohoze umurimo wamuzanye .
42009032	Petero n'abari kumwe na we bari batwawe n'ibitotsi . Bakangutse babona ikuzo rya Yezu n'abo bombi bari kumwe na we .
42009033	Abo bagabo bagiye gutandukana na Yezu , Petero aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , ko ari nta ko bisa kwibera hano ! Reka twubake utuzu dutatu tw'ingando , kamwe kabe akawe , akandi aka Musa , naho akandi kabe aka Eliya . ” Icyakora ntiyari azi icyo avuga .
42009034	Akivuga atyo igicu kirabatwikīra . Abigishwa babibonye bagira ubwoba .
42009035	Ako kanya bumva ijwi ry'uvugira muri icyo gicu ati : “ Uyu ni Umwana wanjye nitoranyirije , nimumutege amatwi ! ”
42009036	Iryo jwi rimaze kuvuga , abigishwa babona Yezu wenyine . Muri iyo minsi baryumaho , ntibagira icyo bahingutsa ku byo bari babonye .
42009037	Bukeye bwaho Yezu n'abigishwa be bamanuka wa musozi , imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu iramusanganira .
42009038	Nuko umuntu mu bari aho avuga cyane aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , ndakwinginze ngo undebere uyu muhungu wanjye w'ikinege .
42009039	Haba ubwo ingabo ya Satani imwegura akavuza induru , maze ikamutigisa cyane ikamuzanisha ifuro , ikamuvamo biruhanyije imaze kumuvunagura .
42009040	Nasabye abigishwa bawe kuyimenesha ntibabishobora . ”
42009041	Yezu arasubiza ati : “ Yemwe bantu b'iki gihe mutizera Imana kandi mugoryamye , nzabana namwe ngeze ryari ? Nzabihanganira ngeze ryari ? Ngaho zana uwo mwana wawe hano . ”
42009042	Igihe uwo mwana acyegera Yezu ahangwaho . Ingabo ya Satani imutura hasi iramutigisa . Yezu aherako arayicyaha , akiza uwo mwana maze amusubiza se .
42009043	Nuko bose babonye ububasha buhebuje bw'Imana barumirwa . Mu gihe bose bagitangarira ibyo byose Yezu yakoraga , abwira abigishwa be ati :
42009044	“ Nimutege amatwi ibyo ngiye kubabwira . Dore Umwana w'umuntu agiye kuzagabizwa abantu . ”
42009045	Abigishwa be ntibumva iryo jambo , bari barihishwe ngo batavaho barisobanukirwa kandi ntibatinyuka kumusobanuza icyo rivuga .
42009046	Nyuma batangira kujya impaka bibaza umukuru muri bo .
42009047	Yezu amenye ibyo batekereza azana umwana amuhagarika iruhande rwe ,
42009048	maze arababwira ati : “ Umuntu wese wakira uyu mwana kubera jye ni jye aba yakiriye , kandi unyakiriye aba yakiriye Uwantumye . Umuto muri mwe mwese ni we mukuru . ”
42009049	Nuko Yohani abwira Yezu ati : “ Mwigisha , twabonye umuntu umenesha ingabo za Satani mu izina ryawe , turamubuza kuko atari uwo muri twe . ”
42009050	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ntimukamubuze , burya utabarwanya aba ari uwanyu . ”
42009051	Igihe cya Yezu cyo kujyanwa agasubira mu ijuru cyari cyegereje , maze agambirira bidakuka kujya i Yeruzalemu .
42009052	Yohereza integuza ngo zimubanzirize kuri umwe mu mirenge y'Abanyasamariya , zimwitegure .
42009053	Ariko abaho babonye ko yerekeje i Yeruzalemu banga kumwakira .
42009054	Abigishwa be Yakobo na Yohani , babibonye baramubaza bati : “ Nyagasani , urashaka ko dutegeka umuriro ngo uve mu ijuru ubatsembe ? ”
42009055	Yezu arabahindukirana arabatwama .
42009056	Bava aho berekeza ku wundi murenge .
42009057	Nuko bakigenda umuntu umwe abwira Yezu ati : “ Nzagukurikira aho uzajya hose . ”
42009058	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Za nyiramuhari zigira amasenga zibamo , n'inyoni zigira ibyari , nyamara Umwana w'umuntu ntagira aho aruhukira . ”
42009059	Abwira undi ati : “ Nkurikira . ” Na we aramusubiza ati : “ Reka mbanze njye gushyingura data . ”
42009060	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Reka abapfu bahambe abapfu babo , naho wowe jya gutangaza iby'ubwami bw'Imana . ”
42009061	Undi muntu aramubwira ati : “ Databuja , ndaza kugukurikira , ariko reka mbanze njye gusezera ku b'imuhira . ”
42009062	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Ufashe isuka nyuma akarangara , ntabwo akwiye ubwami bw'Imana . ”
42010001	Nyuma y'ibyo Nyagasani Yezu atoranya abandi bigishwa mirongo irindwi na babiri , abatuma babiri babiri kumubanziriza mu mijyi yose n'ahantu hose yari agiye kujya .
42010002	Arababwira ati : “ Imyaka yeze ari myinshi nyamara abasaruzi ni bake . Nuko rero nimusabe Nyir'imyaka yohereze abasaruzi mu murima we .
42010003	Nimugende ! Dore mbatumye nk'abana b'intama hagati y'impyisi .
42010004	Muramenye ntimugire icyo mujyana , cyaba agasaho k'amafaranga cyangwa umufuka cyangwa inkweto , kandi mwirinde guhera muri hobe hobe .
42010005	Inzu yose muzinjiramo mujye mubanza muvuge muti : ‘ Amahoro y'Imana abe muri uru rugo ! ’
42010006	Niba muri rwo hari umunyamahoro , amahoro mubifurije azagumana na we , bitabaye bityo ayo mahoro azabagarukire .
42010007	Mugume muri iyo nzu murye kandi munywe ibyo babafunguriye , kuko umukozi akwiye guhemberwa umurimo we . Ntimugahore muva mu icumbi mujya mu rindi .
42010008	Umujyi muzinjiramo bakabakira mujye mufungura ibyo babahereje .
42010009	Mukize abarwayi baho kandi mubabwire muti : ‘ Ubwami bw'Imana burabegereye . ’
42010010	Umujyi muzinjiramo ntibabakīre , muzawuvemo munyure mu mihanda yawo muvuga muti
42010011	‘ Umukungugu wo mu mujyi wanyu wafashe mu birenge byacu , turawuhunguye ngo tuwubasigire ube ari wo uzabashinja . Ibyo ari byo byose mumenye ko ubwami bw'Imana bwegereje . ’
42010012	Reka mbabwire : ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , ab'i Sodoma bazahanishwa igihano kidakaze nk'icy'abatuye uwo mujyi .
42010013	“ Mwa bantu b'i Korazini mwe , muzabona ishyano ! Namwe bantu b'i Betsayida , muzabona ishyano ! Ibitangaza Imana yakoreye muri mwe iyo bikorerwa i Tiri n'i Sidoni , kuva kera abaho baba barambaye imyambaro igaragaza akababaro kandi bakicara mu ivu , bagaragaza ko bihannye .
42010014	Ni cyo gituma ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , ab'i Tiri n'i Sidoni bazahanishwa igihano kidakaze nk'icyanyu .
42010015	Namwe bantu b'i Kafarinawumu , ese muragira ngo muzashyirwa hejuru mugere ku ijuru ? Reka da ! Ahubwo muzamanurwa mugere ikuzimu . ”
42010016	Yezu yungamo ati : “ Bigishwa banjye , umuntu wese ubumva ni jye aba yumvise , kandi ubamagana ni jye aba yamaganye , n'unyamagana aba yamaganye Uwantumye . ”
42010017	Nuko abo mirongo irindwi na babiri bagarukana ibyishimo , baravuga bati : “ Nyagasani , n'ingabo za Satani ziratwumvira iyo tuzitegetse mu izina ryawe . ”
42010018	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nabonye Satani ahanuka mu ijuru nk'umurabyo .
42010019	Dore nabahaye ubushobozi bwo kuribata inzoka kimwe n'indyanishamurizo , no gutsinda ububasha bwose bwa Satani kandi nta kizagira icyo kibatwara . .
42010020	Ibyo ari byo byose ntimwishimire ko ingabo za Satani zibumvira , ahubwo mwishimire ko amazina yanyu yanditswe mu ijuru . ”
42010021	Uwo mwanya Yezu asābwa n'ibyishimo bivuye kuri Mwuka Muziranenge , aravuga ati : “ Ndagushimye Data Nyir'ijuru n'isi , kuko ibyo wabihishe abanyabwenge n'abahanga , ukabihishurira abaciye bugufi . Yego Data , uko ni ko biri kuko ari byo wishimiye . ”
42010022	“ Ibintu byose nabyeguriwe na Data . Ntawe uzi Umwana w'Imana uwo ari we keretse Se , kandi ntawe uzi Se keretse Umwana we n'abo uwo Mwana we ashatse kumuhishurira . ”
42010023	Nuko Yezu yihererana n'abigishwa be arababwira ati : “ Hahirwa abareba ibyo mureba !
42010024	Ndababwira ko abahanuzi n'abami benshi bashatse kureba ibyo mureba ntibabibona , kandi bashatse kumva ibyo mwumva ntibabyumva . ”
42010025	Nuko umwe mu bahanga mu by'Amategeko ahagurutswa no kumutegera mu byo avuga , aramubaza ati : “ Mwigisha , nakora iki kugira ngo mpabwe ubugingo buhoraho ? ”
42010026	Yezu aramubaza ati : “ Mu Mategeko handitswe iki ? Wasomyemo iki ? ”
42010027	Undi aramusubiza ati : “ Ukunde Nyagasani Imana yawe n'umutima wawe wose , n'ubuzima bwawe bwose n'imbaraga zawe zose n'ubwenge bwawe bwose , kandi ujye ukunda mugenzi wawe nk'uko wikunda . ”
42010028	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Usubije neza , nugenza utyo uzabaho . ”
42010029	Uwo muhanga mu by'Amategeko ashatse kwikura mu isoni abaza Yezu ati : “ Ariko se , mugenzi wanjye ni uwuhe ? ”
42010030	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Umugabo yakuviriye i Yeruzalemu amanuka ajya i Yeriko , agwa mu gico cy'abajura baramwambura , baramuhondagura barigendera , bamusiga ari intere .
42010031	Umutambyi aza kumanuka anyura aho ngaho , abonye uwo muntu yicira hirya .
42010032	Haza kunyura n'Umulevi , na we amubonye biba bityo .
42010033	Ariko Umunyasamariya wari ku rugendo anyuze aho , aramubona amugirira impuhwe .
42010034	Ni ko kumwegera amupfuka ibikomere , amwomoza amavuta na divayi . Hanyuma amushyira ku ndogobe yagenderagaho , amujyana mu icumbi aramurwaza .
42010035	Bukeye aha nyir'icumbi ibikoroto bibiri by'ifeza , aramubwira ati : ‘ Uyu muntu umurwaze , maze ibindi uzamutangaho na byo nzabikwishyura ngarutse . ’ ”
42010036	Nuko Yezu abaza wa muhanga mu by'Amategeko ati : “ None se muri abo bantu uko ari batatu , uratekereza ko ari uwuhe wabaye mugenzi w'uwo muntu waguye mu gico cy'abajura ? ”
42010037	Aramusubiza ati : “ Ni uwamugiriye neza . ” Yezu ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Genda nawe ujye ugenza utyo ! ”
42010038	Yezu yari mu rugendo hamwe n'abigishwa be agera ahantu ku murenge , maze umukobwa witwa Marita amwakira imuhira .
42010039	Murumuna we witwaga Mariya yari yicaye hasi , yegereye Nyagasani yumva ibyo avuga .
42010040	Marita we yari ahugiye mu mirimo myinshi . Nuko asanga Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mbese ntibikubabaje kubona murumuna wanjye amparira imirimo ? Mubwire aze amfashe . ”
42010041	Nyagasani aramusubiza ati : “ Marita ! Marita ! Uhagaritse umutima kandi urahihibikana muri byinshi ,
42010042	nyamara ikintu cya ngombwa ni kimwe gusa , Mariya ni cyo yahisemo kandi ntazacyamburwa . ”
42011001	Igihe kimwe Yezu yari ahantu asenga . Arangije umwe mu bigishwa be aramubwira ati : “ Nyagasani , Yohani Mubatiza yigishije abigishwa be gusenga , natwe twigishe gusenga . ”
42011002	Arababwira ati : “ Igihe musenga mujye muvuga muti :
42011003	Buri munsi ujye uduha ifunguro ridukwiriye .
42011004	Utubabarire ibyaha byacu , kuko natwe ubwacu tubabarira abatugiriye nabi bose . Kandi ntutureke ngo tugwe mu byadushuka . ’ ”
42011005	Yezu yungamo ati : “ Nk'umwe muri mwe afite incuti , akayigana mu gicuku akayibwira ati : ‘ Mugenzi wanjye , nguriza imigati itatu ,
42011006	incuti yanjye igeze imuhira ivuye mu rugendo , none nta cyo mfite nyizimanira . ’
42011007	Nuko undi akamusubiza yibereye mu nzu ati : ‘ Windushya ! Dore twamaze gukinga jye n'abana banjye twaryamye , sinshobora kubyuka ngo nyiguhe . ’
42011008	Ndababwira ko naho uwo muntu atabyuka ngo agire icyo amuha kubera ubucuti , amaherezo yaza kumuha icyo ashaka cyose kuko yamurembeje amusaba .
42011009	“ Nuko rero musabe muzahabwa , mushake muzabona , mukomange muzakingurirwa .
42011010	Usabye wese ni we uhabwa , ushatse ni we ubona , kandi n'ukomanze ni we ukingurirwa .
42011011	Mwa babyeyi mwe , ni nde muri mwe waha umwana we inzoka igihe amusabye ifi ,
42011012	cyangwa se akamuha ingonokera igihe amusabye igi ?
42011013	None se ko muzi guha abana banyu ibyiza kandi muri babi , So uri mu ijuru ntazarushaho guha Mwuka Muziranenge abamumusabye ? ”
42011014	Igihe kimwe Yezu yameneshaga ingabo ya Satani yari yaragize umuntu ikiragi . Nuko iyo ngabo imuvuyemo uwo muntu aravuga . Rubanda baratangara cyane .
42011015	Icyakora bamwe baravuga bati : “ Ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani abuhabwa na Bēlizebuli umutware wazo . ”
42011016	Abandi bo bamwakaga ikimenyetso kibemeza ko yatumwe n'Imana , ariko ari umutego bamutega .
42011017	Yezu yari azi ibyo batekereza , ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Iyo igihugu gisubiranyemo kirasenyuka , amazu yacyo akariduka akagwirirana .
42011018	Ese niba Satani ubwe yirwanyije ubwami bwe bwakomera bute , ko muvuze ngo ni Bēlizebuli unshoboza kumenesha ingabo ze ?
42011019	Niba se ari Bēlizebuli umpa ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani , bene wanyu bo ni nde ubaha ubwo bubasha ? Ubwo babikora ni bo bazatuma mutsindwa n'urubanza .
42011020	Noneho kubera ko ari Imana impa ububasha bwo kumenesha ingabo za Satani , ni ukuvuga ko ubwami bwayo bubagezeho .
42011021	“ Umunyamaboko ufite intwaro iyo arinze urugo rwe , ibye biba amahoro .
42011022	Ariko umurusha amaboko iyo ahahingutse akamutsinda , amwambura intwaro yari yizeye maze ibyo amutwaye akabigabira abandi .
42011023	“ Utari mu ruhande rwanjye aba andwanya , kandi udakoranyiriza hamwe nanjye aba atatanya .
42011024	“ Igihe ingabo ya Satani ivuye mu muntu izerera ku gasi ishaka aho yaruhukira , yahabura ikibwira iti : ‘ Reka nsubire mu nzu yanjye navuyemo . ’
42011025	Yagerayo igasanga ikubuye , iteguye .
42011026	Nuko ikajya kuzana izindi ngabo ndwi ziyitambukije ubugome , zose zikinjirana zigatura muri uwo muntu . Bityo imibereho ye ya nyuma ikarusha iya mbere kuba mibi . ”
42011027	Yezu akimara kuvuga , umugore wo muri iyo mbaga avuga cyane , aramubwira ati : “ Hahirwa inda yakubyaye n'amabere yakonkeje ! ”
42011028	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ahubwo hahirwa abumva Ijambo ry'Imana bakarikurikiza . ”
42011029	Abantu bamaze kugwira iruhande rwa Yezu , afata ijambo aravuga ati : “ Abantu b'iki gihe ni babi . Banshakaho ikimenyetso gitangaje , nyamara nta kimenyetso kindi bazahabwa kitari icya Yonasi .
42011030	Nk'uko Yonasi yabereye ab'i Ninive ikimenyetso , ni ko n'Umwana w'umuntu azabera ab'iki gihe ikimenyetso .
42011031	Ku munsi Imana izaca imanza , wa mwamikazi waturutse mu majyepfo azahagurukira ab'iki gihe maze ababuranye abatsinde , kuko we yavuye iyo bigwa akaza kumva amagambo y'ubwenge bwa Salomo , kandi rero hano hari uruta Salomo .

42011033	“ Ntawe ucanira itara kurihisha [ cyangwa ngo aryubikeho akabindi ] , ahubwo aritereka ahirengeye kugira ngo rimurikire abaje mu nzu .

42011035	Nuko wirinde , urumuri rwawe rutazima .
42011036	Niba rero umubiri wawe wose umurikiwe ntihabe n'agace kawo kari mu mwijima , uzaba uri mu mucyo rwose nk'umurikiwe n'itara . ”

42011039	Nyagasani Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mwebwe Bafarizayi dore uko muteye : mumeze nk'ibikombe n'amasahane boza inyuma gusa , kuko imbere mwuzuye ubwambuzi n'ubugizi bwa nabi .
42011040	Mwa bapfu mwe , ese iyaremye inyuma si na yo yaremye imbere ?
42011041	Mujye muha abakene ku biri mu bikombe no ku masahane , ni bwo ibyanyu byose bizaba bisukuye .
42011042	“ Muzabona ishyano Bafarizayi , mwe mutanga na kimwe cya cumi cy'isogi n'icy'inyabutongo , n'icy'utundi tuboga twose duhumuza ibyokurya , nyamara mugacisha ukubiri n'ubutabera n'urukundo rw'Imana . Ibyo ni byo mwagombaga gukora mutaretse n'ibyo bindi .
42011043	“ Muzabona ishyano Bafarizayi , mwe mukunda kwicazwa mu myanya y'icyubahiro mu nsengero no kuramukirizwa ku karubanda .

42011047	Muzabona ishyano kuko mwubakira imva z'abahanuzi , kandi ari ba sokuruza babishe .
42011048	Bityo muba mwemeje ko mushima ibyo ba sokuruza bakoze . Bo bishe abahanuzi , naho mwe mububakira imva .
42011049	Ni cyo cyatumye Imana izi byose ivuga iti : ‘ Nzabatumaho abahanuzi n'Intumwa zanjye , nyamara bazica bamwe batoteze abandi . ’

42011051	uhereye ku maraso y'Abeli kugeza ku ya Zakariya , batsinze hagati y'urutambiro n'Ingoro y'Imana . Ni ukuri , ndababwira ko ab'iki gihe ari bo bazayaryozwa .
42011052	“ Muzabona ishyano mwebwe bahanga mu by'Amategeko , kuko mwatwaye urufunguzo rwo kumenya , ubwanyu ntimwinjira n'abashaka kwinjira mukabakumīra . ”

42012001	Icyo gihe abantu bageze ku bihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bamaze gukorana ku buryo bakandagiranaga . Nuko Yezu atangira kubwira abigishwa be ati : “ Murajye mwirinda umusemburo w'Abafarizayi , ni ukuvuga uburyarya bwabo .
42012002	Nta gihishwe kitazahishurwa kandi nta banga ritazamenyekana .
42012003	Ni cyo gituma ibyo mwavuze rwihishwa bizumvikana ku mugaragaro , kandi ibyo mwavugiye ahiherereye mwongorerana , bizatangarizwa ahirengeye .
42012004	“ Ncuti zanjye , reka mbabwire : ntimugatinye abica umubiri ntibashobore kugira ikindi barenzaho .

42012011	“ Mu gihe bazabajyana mu nsengero imbere y'abatware n'abacamanza , ntimuzahagarike umutima mwibaza uburyo mugiye kwiregura , cyangwa icyo mugiye kuvuga .
42012012	Igihe nikigera Mwuka Muziranenge azababwira icyo mukwiriye kuvuga . ”

42012020	Ariko Imana iramubwira iti : ‘ Waba umupfu ! Ko uri bupfe iri joro , ibyo wahunitse bizaba ibya nde ? ’ ”

42012022	Yezu abwira abigishwa be ati : “ Reka mbabwire rero ku byerekeye ubuzima : ntimukabunze imitima mwibaza ikizabatunga cyangwa icyo muzambara .
42012023	Burya ubuzima buruta ibyokurya , n'umubiri ukaruta imyambaro .
42012024	Mwitegereze ibyiyoni : ntibibiba ntibinasarura , ntibigira ibigega cyangwa ububiko , nyamara kandi Imana irabigaburira . Mbese ntimurusha ibisiga agaciro ?
42012025	Ni nde muri mwe wakongēra nibura akanya na gato ku gihe azamara , kubera ko yabungije imitima ?
42012026	Ubwo ibyoroshye nk'ibyo birenze ububasha bwanyu , ni iki gituma mubunza imitima ku bindi ?
42012027	Mwitegereze ukuntu indabyo zikura : nta murimo zikora nta n'imyenda ziboha , nyamara mbabwiye ko na Salomo mu bukire bwe bwose atigeze arimba nka rumwe muri zo .
42012028	None se mwa bantu bafite ukwizera guke mwe , ubwo Imana yambika ityo ibyatsi byo mu gasozi biba biriho none ejo bakabicana , ntizabarushirizaho cyane ?
42012029	“ Ntimugaharanire ibyo murya n'ibyo munywa , ngo mube ari byo muhozaho umutima .
42012030	Ibyo byose abanyamahanga batazi Imana ni byo baharanira , naho mwe So azi ko mubikeneye .
42012031	Ahubwo muharanire ubwami bwe , bityo n'ibyo bindi na byo muzabihabwa .
42012032	“ Mwa bushyo buto bw'Imana mwe , mwitinya kuko So yishimiye kubagabira ubwami bwe .
42012033	Mugurishe ibyo mutunze mubitange ho imfashanyo . Mwidodere imifuka idasaza yo kubikamo , mwirundanyirize mu ijuru ubukungu butazashira . Ni ho abajura batagera , habe n'inyenzi ngo zigire icyo zihangiza .
42012034	Aho ubukungu bwanyu buri , ni ho muzahoza umutima . ”
42012035	“ Muhore mukenyeye nk'abari ku kazi , kandi amatara yanyu agumye yake .

42012037	Hahirwa abagaragu shebuja azasanga bari maso ! Ndababwira nkomeje ko na we azakenyera , abahe ibyicaro maze abahereze .
42012038	Naho yaza mu gicuku cyangwa mu nkoko , agasanga bari maso baba bafite amahirwe .
42012039	Murabizi , iyaba nyir'urugo yamenyaga isaha umujura azira , ntiyatuma acukura inzu ye !
42012040	Namwe rero muhore mwiteguye , kuko Umwana w'umuntu azaza igihe mudakeka . ”
42012041	Petero aravuga ati : “ Nyagasani , mbese ni twe twenyine uhaye icyo kigereranyo , cyangwa ni abantu bose ? ”
42012042	Nyagasani Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Mubirebye , ni nde munyagikari w'indahemuka kandi uzi ubwenge , shebuja azashinga kujya aha bagenzi be ifunguro bagenewe mu gihe gikwiye ?
42012043	Ni uwo shebuja azasanga akora ibyo yamushinze , uwo mugaragu azaba ahiriwe .
42012044	Ndababwiza ukuri ko azamwegurira ibyo afite byose .

42012051	Mbese mutekereza ko naje kuzana amahoro ku isi ? Oya . Ahubwo ndababwira ko ibyanjye bituma abantu bicamo ibice .
42012052	Kuva ubu ni ko bizaba mu rugo rw'abantu batanu : batatu bazarwanya babiri , na babiri barwanye batatu .
42012053	Bazicamo ibice , umugabo arwanye umuhungu we n'umuhungu arwanye se , umugore arwanye umukobwa we n'umukobwa arwanye nyina , umugore arwanye umukazana we n'umukazana arwanye nyirabukwe . ”

42012059	Reka nkubwire : ntuzavamo utabanje gutanga amafaranga baguciye yose hatabuze na rimwe . ”

42014013	Ahubwo nugira umunsi mukuru ujye utumira abakene n'abamugaye , abacumbagira n'impumyi .

42014018	Nuko bose batangira guhimba impamvu zo kubyangirira . Uwa mbere ati : ‘ Naguze umurima none ngomba kujya kuwureba , ndagusaba kumbabarira . ’

42014020	Naho undi ati : ‘ Narongoye none simbasha kuza . ’

42014022	Umugaragu aragaruka aravuga ati : ‘ Databuja nakoze ibyo wategetse , ariko haracyari imyanya . ’
42014023	Shebuja aramubwira ati : ‘ Ongera ujye mu mayira yose no mu mihōra , maze uhāte abantu baze urugo rwanjye rwuzure .
42014024	Ndababwira ko nta n'umwe muri ba bagabo nari natumiye uzangerera ku meza . ’ ”
42014025	Abantu benshi bari bashagaye Yezu , maze arahindukira arababwira ati :
42014026	“ Umuntu wese unsanga ntankunde cyane kuruta uko akunda se na nyina , n'umugore n'abana n'abavandimwe be , ndetse na we ubwe ntankunde nk'uko yikunda , ntiyabasha kuba umwigishwa wanjye .
42014027	Byongeye kandi umuntu wese utikorera umusaraba we ngo ankurikire , ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanjye .
42014028	“ Mbese ni nde muri mwe washaka kubaka inzu y'igorofa , ntabanze kwicara ngo abare amafaranga azayitangaho , kugira ngo arebe niba afite ayayuzuza ?

42014030	bavuga bati : ‘ Dore umuntu watangiye kubaka none ananiwe kuzuza ! ’
42014031	“ Cyangwa se umwami waba afite ingabo ibihumbi icumi , agaterwa n'undi mwami ufite ingabo ibihumbi makumyabiri , ntiyabanza kwicara ngo arebe niba yashobora kumurwanya ?
42014032	Asanze bidashoboka yakohereza intumwa kuri uwo mwami akiri kure , kugira ngo amubaze icyo bakora ngo babane mu mahoro . ”

42015001	Abasoresha n'abandi banyabyaha bose bakundaga kwegera Yezu kugira ngo bamwumve .

42015005	Iyo ayibonye arishima akayiterera ku bitugu ,
42015006	akayitahana iwe . Nuko agakoranya incuti n'abaturanyi , akababwira ati : ‘ Twishimane kuko nabonye intama yanjye yari yazimiye ! ’
42015007	Reka mbabwire : ni na ko mu ijuru bishimira umunyabyaha umwe wihannye , kuruta uko bishimira abantu b'intungane mirongo cyenda n'icyenda badakeneye kwihana .
42015008	“ Cyangwa ni nde mugore waba afite ibikoroto icumi by'ifeza kimwe kigatakara , ntacane itara ngo akubure inzu , agishake yitonze kugeza igihe akibonye ?
42015009	Iyo akibonye akoranya incuti n'abaturanyi akavuga ati : ‘ Twishimane kuko nabonye igikoroto nari natakaje . ’
42015010	Reka mbabwire : ni na ko mu ikoraniro ry'abamarayika b'Imana bishimira umunyabyaha umwe wihannye . ”
42015011	Maze Yezu aravuga ati : “ Habayeho umugabo akagira abahungu babiri .
42015012	Umunsi umwe umutoya abwira se ati : ‘ Data , mpa umunani wangeneye ! ’ Nuko bombi se abaha iminani yabo .
42015013	Hashize iminsi mike , umutoya agurisha umunani we wose yigira mu gihugu cya kure . Ahageze yiyandarika mu maraha , ibye abipfusha ubusa .

42015015	Nuko ajya gusaba akazi ku muturage wo muri icyo gihugu , amwohereza mu isambu ye kuragira ingurube .
42015016	Yifuzaga kwicisha isari ibyo bagaburiraga ingurube , ariko ntihagire ubimuha .
42015017	Nyuma aza kwisubiraho agira ati : ‘ N'ukuntu abakozi ba data ari benshi bakarya bagasigaza ! Nyamara jyewe inzara ikaba insinze hano !

42015019	singikwiriye kwitwa umwana wawe . Ungire gusa nk'umwe mu bakozi bawe . ” ’
42015020	Nuko arahaguruka ajya kwa se . “ Se amurabutswe akiri kure yumva impuhwe ziramusābye , ariruka ajya kumusanganira , maze aramuhobera aramusoma .
42015021	Uwo muhungu abwira se ati : ‘ Data , nacumuye ku Mana nawe ngucumuraho . Singikwiye kwitwa umwana wawe … ’
42015022	Ariko se abwira abagaragu be ati : ‘ Nimubangukane ikanzu irusha izindi ubwiza muyimwambike . Mumwambike n'impeta ku rutoki n'inkweto mu birenge .
42015023	Muzane cya kimasa cy'umushishe mukibage , maze turye tunezerwe !
42015024	Uyu mwana wanjye yari yarapfuye none yazutse , yari yarabuze none yabonetse . ’ Nuko batangira ibirori .
42015025	“ Icyo gihe umuhungu mukuru w'uwo mubyeyi yari mu murima . Atashye agere hafi y'urugo , yumva urusaku rw'abaririmba n'ababyina .

42015027	Aramusubiza ati : ‘ Ni murumuna wawe wagarutse none se yamubagiye cya kimasa cy'umushishe , kuko yongeye kumubona ari muzima . ’
42015028	“ Undi ararakara cyane yigumira hanze . Se ni ko gusohoka amwingingira kwinjira .
42015029	Nuko abwira se ati : ‘ Reba nawe ! Uzi imyaka yose maze ngukorera . Nta tegeko ryawe na rimwe narenzeho , nyamara ntiwigeze umpa n'agahene ngo nishimane n'incuti zanjye .
42015030	None uriya muhungu wawe wamaze ibyawe abisangira n'indaya , igihe abungutse uba ari we ubagira ikimasa cy'umushishe ! ’
42015031	Se aramusubiza ati : ‘ Mwana wanjye , wowe turahorana n'ibyo mfite byose ni ibyawe .
42015032	Ariko byari ngombwa rwose ko twishima tukanezerwa , kuko murumuna wawe uriya yari yarapfuye none yazutse , yari yarabuze none yabonetse . ’ ”
42016001	Yezu abwira abigishwa be ati : “ Habayeho umuntu w'umukungu wari ufite umugaragu yashinze ibintu bye . Baza kumuregera uwo mugaragu ngo aramutagaguriza ibintu .

42016003	Uwo munyabintu aribaza ati : ‘ Ubu se mbigenje nte ko databuja agiye kunyaga ? Guhinga sinabishobora ! Gusabiriza byantera isoni !

42016005	Nuko abari bafite imyenda ya shebuja , agenda abahamagara umwe umwe . Abaza uwa mbere ati : ‘ Harya databuja akwishyuza ibingana iki ? ’

42016010	Ugira umurava mu tuntu duto , no mu bikomeye azawugira . Naho uhemuka mu tuntu duto , no mu bikomeye azahemuka .
42016011	Niba rero mutagize umurava mu matindi y'amafaranga , ni nde uzabaragiza ibifite agaciro k'ukuri ?
42016012	Niba kandi mutagize umurava mugenga iby'abandi , ni nde uzabaha ibyo mwagenewe ubwanyu ?
42016013	“ Nta mugaragu ushobora gukorera ba shebuja babiri . Iyo adakunze umwe ngo yange undi , ayoboka umwe agasuzugura undi . Nuko rero ntimushobora kuba abagaragu b'Imana ngo mube n'abagaragu b'amafaranga . ”
42016014	Abafarizayi bumvise ibyo byose bagira Yezu urw'amenyo , kuko bakundaga amafaranga .
42016015	Yezu ni ko kubabwira ati : “ Mwebwe mwigira intungane imbere y'abantu nyamara Imana izi imitima yanyu , kuko icyo abantu baha agaciro kiba kigayitse ku Mana .
42016016	“ Kuyoborwa n'Amategeko n'ibyanditswe n'abahanuzi byagarukiye kuri Yohani Mubatiza . Kuva ubwo hatangira gutangazwa Ubutumwa bwiza bwerekeye ubwami bw'Imana , kandi buri wese aharanira kubugeramo .
42016017	Icyakora icyoroshye ni uko ijuru n'isi byashira , aho kugira ngo Amategeko aveho n'akadomo na kamwe .

42016020	Hakaba n'umutindi witwaga Lazaro wari waramazwe n'ibisebe . Yahoraga aryamye ku irembo ry'uwo mukungu .
42016021	Yifuzaga guhazwa n'utuvungukira tuva ku meza y'uwo mukungu . Byongeye kandi , imbwa na zo zarazaga zikarigata ibisebe bye .
42016022	“ Igihe kiza kugera uwo mutindi arapfa , maze abamarayika bamujyana aho Aburahamu ari , na we amwakira bya kibyeyi aramwiyegereza . Wa mukungu na we aza gupfa baramuhamba .
42016023	Ageze ikuzimu arababara cyane , yubuye amaso abonera kure Aburahamu ari kumwe na Lazaro .
42016024	Nuko arangurura ijwi ati : ‘ Mubyeyi Aburahamu , mbabarira wohereze Lazaro akoze urutoki mu mazi , ambobereze ururimi kuko mbabazwa cyane n'uyu muriro . ’

42016026	Uretse n'ibyo hagati yacu namwe hari imanga ndende , yashyiriweho gutanga imbere abari hano bashaka kujya aho , ikabuza n'abari aho kuza hano . ’

42017024	Nk'uko umurabyo urabya ukamurikira ijuru kuva mu ruhande rumwe ukagera mu rundi , uko ni ko bizagenda ku munsi Umwana w'umuntu azazaho .

43001010	Yari ku isi kandi isi yabayeho kubera we , nyamara isi ntiyamumenya .
43001011	Yaje mu bye ariko abe ntibamwakira .
