43001013	Kuba abana b'Imana ntibiva ku buryo busanzwe bwo kubyara , cyangwa ngo biterwe n'icyifuzo cy'umubiri cyangwa n'ubushake bw'umuntu , ahubwo babyarwa n'Imana .
43001014	Jambo yabaye umuntu aba hagati muri twe , yuzuye ubuntu n'ukuri . Nuko tubona ikuzo rye , ari ryo kuzo Umwana w'ikinege akomora kuri Se .
43001015	Yohani ahamya ibye ararangurura ati : “ Nguyu uwo navugaga nti : ‘ Uje nyuma yanjye aranduta kuko yahozeho mbere yanjye . ’ ”
43001016	Twese twahawe ku migisha ye isendereye , kandi tugirirwa ubuntu bugeretse ku bundi .
43001017	Amategeko yanyujijwe kuri Musa , naho ubuntu n'ukuri byo byaje binyujijwe kuri Yezu Kristo .
43001018	Nta muntu wigeze abona Imana , ahubwo Umwana w'ikinege uhorana na Se ni we wayimenyekanishije .
43001019	Dore ibyo Yohani yahamije , ubwo Abayahudi b'i Yeruzalemu batumaga abatambyi n'Abalevi kumubaza bati : “ Uri nde ? ”
43001020	Abasubiza atishisha aranaberurira ati “ Si jye Kristo . ”
43001021	Nuko baramubaza bati : “ None se uri nde ? Ese uri Eliya ? ” Ati : “ Sindi we . ” Baramubaza ati : “ Mbese uri wa Muhanuzi ? ” Ati : “ Oya . ”
43001022	Noneho baramubaza bati : “ None se uri nde kugira ngo tubone icyo dusubiza abadutumye ? Ese ibyawe ubivugaho iki ? ”
43001023	Arabasubiza ati :
43001024	Abari batumwe bari abo mu Bafarizayi .
43001025	Nuko baramubaza bati : “ Kuki ubatiza niba utari Kristo cyangwa Eliya , cyangwa wa Muhanuzi ? ”
43001026	Yohani arabasubiza ati : “ Jyewe mbatirisha amazi , nyamara muri mwe hari uwo mutazi .
43001027	Yaje nyuma yanjye , ariko ntibinkwiriye no gupfundura agashumi k'urukweto rwe . ”
43001028	Ibyo byabereye i Betaniya , iburasirazuba bw'uruzi rwa Yorodani aho Yohani yabatirizaga .
43001029	Bukeye Yohani abona Yezu aje amusanga , maze aravuga ati : “ Dore Umwana w'intama w'Imana ukuraho ibyaha by'abantu bo ku isi !
43001030	Uyu ni we navugaga nti : ‘ Nyuma yanjye haje umuntu unduta , kuko yahozeho mbere yanjye . ’
43001031	Nanjye mbere sinari nzi uwo ari we , ariko icyatumye nza mbatirisha amazi kwari ukugira ngo agaragarizwe Abisiraheli . ”
43001032	Nuko Yohani arahamya ati : “ Nabonye Mwuka w'Imana amanuka ava mu ijuru asa n'inuma , maze aguma kuri we .
43001033	Jye sinari nzi uwo ari we , ariko Imana yantumye kubatirisha amazi yari yarambwiye iti : ‘ Uwo uzabona Mwuka amumanukiyeho maze akamugumaho , ni we ubatirisha Mwuka Muziranenge . ’
43001034	Narabyiboneye none ndahamya ko uwo ari we Mwana w'Imana . ”
43001035	Bukeye Yohani akaba ahagararanye na babiri mu bigishwa be .
43001036	Abonye Yezu ahita aravuga ati : “ Dore Umwana w'intama w'Imana ! ”
43001037	Bumvise avuga atyo , abo bigishwa bombi bahita bakurikira Yezu .
43001038	Yezu arahindukira abona bamukurikiye , arababaza ati : “ Murashaka iki ? ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Rabi ( risobanurwa ngo ‘ Mwigisha ’ ) , ucumbitse he ? ”
43001039	Arabasubiza ati : “ Nimuze muharebe ! ” Nuko baragenda babona aho yari acumbitse , maze uwo munsi bagumana na we . Hari mu masaa kumi .
43001040	Andereya uva inda imwe na Simoni Petero , yari umwe muri babiri bumvise ibyo Yohani avuze maze bagakurikira Yezu .
43001041	Uwo abanza gushaka umuvandimwe we Simoni , amubonye aramubwira ati : “ Twabonye Mesiya ” ( risobanurwa ngo “ Kristo ” ) ,
43001042	maze amugeza kuri Yezu . Yezu amwitegereje aravuga ati : “ Uri Simoni mwene Yohani , ariko uzitwa Kefa . ” Kefa risobanurwa ngo “ Petero ” .
43001043	Bukeye Yezu yiyemeza kujya muri Galileya , ahura na Filipo aramubwira ati : “ Nkurikira ! ”
43001044	Filipo yari uw'i Betsayida , iwabo wa Andereya na Petero .
43001045	Filipo abona Natanayeli aramubwira ati : “ Twabonye wa muntu uvugwa mu Mategeko yanditswe na Musa no mu byanditswe n'abahanuzi . Uwo ni Yezu mwene Yozefu w'i Nazareti . ”
43001046	Nuko Natanayeli aramubaza ati : “ Mbese hari ikintu cyiza cyakomoka i Nazareti ? ” Filipo aramusubiza ati : “ Ngwino urebe ! ”
43001047	Yezu abonye Natanayeli aje amusanga aravuga ati : “ Dore Umwisiraheli nyakuri utagira uburiganya . ”
43001048	Natanayeli aramubaza ati : “ Wamenye ute ? ” Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Filipo ataraguhamagara , igihe wari munsi y'igiti cy'umutini nari nakubonye . ”
43001049	Natanayeli aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , koko ni wowe Mwana w'Imana , ni wowe Mwami w'Abisiraheli . ”
43001050	Yezu ati : “ Mbese unyemejwe n'uko nkubwiye nti ‘ Nakubonye munsi y'umutini ? ’ Uzabona ibiruta ibyo . ”
43001051	Nuko yungamo ati : “ Ndakubwira nkomeje ko uzabona ijuru rikingutse , ubone n'abamarayika b'Imana bazamukira kandi bamanukira ku Mwana w'umuntu . ”
43002001	Ku munsi wa gatatu haba ubukwe i Kana ho muri Galileya , na nyina wa Yezu yari aburimo ,
43002002	Yezu n'abigishwa be na bo bari babutumiwemo .
43002003	Nuko nyina wa Yezu abonye ko divayi ishize aramubwira ati : “ Nta divayi bagifite . ”
43002004	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Mubyeyi , ibyo ubinzanyemo ute ? Igihe cyanjye ntikiragera . ”
43002005	Nyina abwira abahereza ati : “ Icyo ababwira cyose mugikore . ”
43002006	Aho hari intango esheshatu zibajwe mu mabuye zashyiriweho umuhango wa kiyahudi wo kwihumanura , buri ntango ikuzuzwa n'ibibindi bivoma nka bine cyangwa bitanu .
43002007	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nimwuzuze izo ntango amazi . ” Barazuzuza bageza ku rugara .
43002008	Hanyuma arababwira ati : “ Noneho nimudahe mushyīre umusangwa mukuru . ” Baramushyīra .
43002009	Umusangwa mukuru asogongera ayo mazi yamaze guhinduka divayi ntiyamenya aho iturutse , icyakora abahereza bari badashye amazi bo bari bahazi . Nuko ahamagara umukwe
43002010	aramubwira ati : “ Ubusanzwe umuntu wese abanza gutanga divayi nziza , hanyuma abantu bamara guhaga , akazana itari nziza nk'iya mbere , naho wowe wagumanye inziza kugeza magingo aya ! ”
43002011	Icyo gitangaza kimuranga Yezu yagikoze i Kana ho muri Galileya , kiba icya mbere yakoze kigaragaza ikuzo rye . Ni cyo cyatumye abigishwa be bamwemera .
43002012	Hanyuma aramanuka agera i Kafarinawumu , we na nyina n'abavandimwe be n'abigishwa be bahamara igihe gito .
43002013	Umunsi wa Pasika y'Abayahudi wegereje , Yezu ajya i Yeruzalemu .
43002014	Ageze mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana ahasanga abacuruzaga inka n'intama n'inuma , n'abari bicaye bavunja amafaranga .
43002015	Abohekanya imigozi ayigira nk'ikiboko bose abamenesha mu rugo rw'Ingoro , yirukanamo n'intama n'inka zabo , asandaza amafaranga y'abavunjaga ahirika n'ameza yabo .
43002016	Abwira abacuruzaga inuma ati : “ Nimuzivane hano ! Inzu ya Data ntimukayigire isoko ! ”
43002017	Abigishwa be bibuka ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Ishyaka ngirira Ingoro yawe rirambaga . ”
43002018	Noneho Abayahudi baramubaza bati : “ Uratanga kimenyetso ki kitwemeza ko wemerewe gukora bene ibyo ? ”
43002019	Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Nimusenye iyi ngoro , nzongera nyubake mu minsi itatu . ”
43002020	Abayahudi bati : “ Dorere , iyi Ngoro yubatswe mu myaka mirongo ine n'itandatu , nawe ngo wakongera kuyubaka mu minsi itatu ? ”
43002021	Icyakora ingoro yavugaga ni umubiri we .
43002022	Aho amariye kuzuka mu bapfuye , abigishwa be bibutse ko ibyo yari yarabivuze , maze bemera Ibyanditswe kandi bemera ijambo Yezu yari yavuze .
43002023	Igihe Yezu yari i Yeruzalemu mu minsi mikuru ya Pasika , abantu benshi bamwemejwe n'ibitangaza babonye akora .
43002024	Nyamara Yezu ntiyabagirira icyizere , kuko we yari azi abantu bose .
43002025	Byongeye kandi ntiyari akeneye gusiganuza ibyerekeye abantu , kuko yari asanzwe azi imigambi ya buri muntu .
43003001	Mu ishyaka ry'Abafarizayi harimo umuntu witwaga Nikodemu , akaba umwe mu bayobozi b'Abayahudi .
43003002	Nijoro asanga Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mwigisha , tuzi ko uri umwigisha watumwe n'Imana tubyemejwe n'ibitangaza ukora . Nta wabasha kubikora Imana itari kumwe na we . ”
43003003	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ndakubwira nkomeje ko umuntu utavutse ubwa kabiri atabasha kubona ubwami bw'Imana . ”
43003004	Nikodemu aramubaza ati : “ Umuntu yabasha ate kuvuka kandi akuze ? Mbese yabasha gusubira mu nda ya nyina akongera kuvuka ? ”
43003005	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ndakubwira nkomeje ko umuntu utabyawe n'amazi na Mwuka w'Imana , atabasha kwinjira mu bwami bwayo .
43003006	Ikibyarwa n'umubiri kiba ari umubiri , naho ikibyarwa na Mwuka kiba ari umwuka .
43003007	Ntutangazwe n'uko nakubwiye nti : ‘ Mugomba kuvuka ubwa kabiri . ’
43003008	Umuyaga uhuhira aho ushaka , ukumva uhuha ariko ntumenye aho uva cyangwa aho ujya . Ni na ko bimera ku muntu wese wabyawe na Mwuka . ”
43003009	Nikodemu aramubaza ati : “ Ibyo bishoboka bite ? ”
43003010	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Ukaba uri umwigisha mu Bisiraheli ntumenye ibyo ?
43003011	Ndakubwira nkomeje ko tuvuga ibyo tuzi kandi tugahamya ibyo twiboneye , nyamara ntimwemera ibyo duhamya .
43003012	Nababwiye ibiba ku isi ntimwabyemera , none se nimbabwira ibiba mu ijuru muzabyemera mute ?
43003013	Nta wigeze azamuka ngo ajye mu ijuru , keretse uwamanutse ava mu ijuru ari we Mwana w'umuntu .
43003014	Kandi nk'uko Musa yashyize inzoka hejuru ari mu butayu akayimanika ku giti , ni ko n'Umwana w'umuntu agomba gushyirwa hejuru ,
43003015	kugira ngo umwizera wese ahabwe ubugingo buhoraho . ”
43003016	Imana yakunze cyane abantu bo ku isi yose , ku buryo yatanze Umwana wayo w'ikinege kugira ngo umwizera wese adapfa burundu , ahubwo ahabwe ubugingo buhoraho .
43003017	Imana ntiyatumye Umwana wayo ku isi ngo acire iteka abo ku isi , ahubwo kwari ukugira ngo abakize .
43003018	Uwizera Umwana w'Imana ntiyigera acirwa iteka , naho utamwizera aba amaze kuricirwa kuko atizeye Umwana w'ikinege w'Imana .
43003019	Dore igituma abantu bacirwa iteka : ni uko urumuri rwaje ku isi maze abantu bikundira umwijima kuruta umucyo , kuko ibyo bakora ari bibi .
43003020	Umuntu wese ukora ibibi yanga umucyo , kandi ntaza ahabona kugira ngo ibyo akora bitagawa .
43003021	Nyamara ukora iby'ukuri ajya ahabona , kugira ngo ibyo yakoze bigaragare ko byakozwe uko Imana ishaka .
43003022	Hanyuma y'ibyo Yezu ajyana n'abigishwa be mu ntara ya Yudeya , bamaranayo iminsi abatiza abantu .
43003023	Yohani na we yabatirizaga ahitwa Enoni hafi y'i Salimu , kuko hari amazi menshi abantu bakaza kuhabatirizwa .
43003024	Ubwo Yohani yari atarafatwa ngo afungwe .
43003025	Nuko abigishwa ba Yohani bajya impaka n'undi Muyahudi ku byerekeye imihango yo kwihumanura .
43003026	Basanga Yohani baramubwira bati : “ Mwigisha , wa wundi wari kumwe nawe hakurya ya Yorodani , uwo wahamyaga uwo ari we , dore na we arabatiza kandi abantu bose baramusanga . ”
43003027	Yohani arabasubiza ati : “ Nta cyo umuntu abasha kwiha kirenze icyo Imana yamugeneye .
43003028	Mwebwe ubwanyu mwambera abagabo b'ibyo navuze nti : ‘ Jyewe sindi Kristo ahubwo ndi uwatumwe kumubanziriza . ’
43003029	Umukwe ni we nyir'umugeni , naho uherekeza umukwe amuhagarara iruhande akamutega amatwi maze akanyurwa no kumva ijwi rye . Nguko uko ibyishimo byanjye bisendereye .
43003030	We agomba gukuzwa naho jye ngaca bugufi . ”
43003031	Uturuka mu ijuru asumba byose , naho uturuka ku isi ni uw'isi kandi avuga iby'isi . Uturuka mu ijuru we asumba byose ,
43003032	ibyo yiboneye kandi yiyumviye ni byo ahamya , ariko nta wemera ibyo ahamya .
43003033	Icyakora uwemera ibyo ahamya aba yemeje ko ibyo Imana ivuga ari ukuri .
43003034	Uwatumwe n'Imana avuga ubutumwa bwayo , kuko Imana itanga Mwuka wayo itazigama .
43003035	Umwana w'Imana akundwa na Se kandi Se yamweguriye byose .
43003036	Uwemera Umwana w'Imana aba abonye ubugingo buhoraho , naho utamwumvira ntazabona ubwo bugingo , ahubwo Imana izagumya imurakarire .
43004001	Abafarizayi bumva ko Yezu yunguka abigishwa , kandi ko abatiza abantu benshi kuruta Yohani —
43004002	nyamara si Yezu wabatizaga ahubwo ni abigishwa be .
43004003	Nuko rero Yezu ava muri Yudeya asubira muri Galileya .
43004004	Kugira ngo agereyo yagombaga kwambukiranya intara ya Samariya .
43004005	Nuko agera mu nkengero z'umujyi wa Sikara muri iyo ntara , hafi y'isambu Yakobo yari yarahaye umuhungu we Yozefu .
43004006	Aho hari iriba rya Yakobo . Nuko Yezu yicara ku iriba kuko yari yananiwe kubera urugendo . Icyo hari hari nko mu masaa sita .
43004007	Umunyasamariyakazi aza kuvoma , Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mpa amazi yo kunywa . ”
43004008	Icyo gihe abigishwa be bari bagiye mu mujyi guhaha . .
43004009	Aramusubiza ati : “ Ko uri Umuyahudi nkaba ndi Umunyasamariyakazi , ushobora ute kunsaba icyo kunywa ? ” Yavuze atyo kubera ko Abayahudi badasangira n'Abanyasamariya .
43004010	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Iyaba wari uzi ubuntu Imana igira n'ugusabye amazi uwo ari we , wajyaga kumusaba akaguha amazi y'ubugingo ! ”
43004011	Umugore aramubaza ati : “ None se mutware , ko nta kivomesho ufite iriba rikaba ari rirerire , ayo mazi y'ubugingo wayakura he ?
43004012	Mbese waba uruta sogokuruza Yakobo waduhaye iri riba , akanywa amazi yaryo we n'abana be n'amatungo ye ? ”
43004013	Yezu aramusubiza ati : “ Unywa kuri aya mazi wese arongera akagira inyota ,
43004014	naho uzanywa ku mazi nzamuha ntazongera kugira inyota ukundi . Ahubwo ayo mazi nzamuha azaba isōko idudubiza muri we , imuhesha ubugingo buhoraho . ”
43004015	Umugore aramubwira ati : “ Nyakubahwa , mpa kuri ayo mazi ntazongera kugira inyota ngo ngaruke hano kuvoma ! ”
43004016	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Genda uhamagare umugabo wawe maze ugaruke hano . ”
43004017	Umugore aramusubiza ati : “ Nta mugabo mfite . ” Yezu ati : “ Ushubije neza ko nta mugabo ufite ,
43004018	kuko washatse abagabo batanu kandi n'uwo mubana ubu akaba atari uwawe . Ibyo ubivuze ukuri . ”
43004019	Umugore aramubwira ati : “ Nyakubahwa , mbonye ko uri umuhanuzi .
43004020	Ba sogokuruza basengeraga Imana kuri uriya musozi , naho mwebwe Abayahudi mukemeza ko ari i Yeruzalemu abantu bagomba kuyisengera . ”
43004021	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mugore , nyemera . Igihe kizagera abantu babe batagisengera Imana Data , haba kuri uriya musozi haba n'i Yeruzalemu .
43004022	Mwe musenga uwo mutazi , naho twe dusenga uwo tuzi kuko agakiza kava mu Bayahudi .
43004023	Igihe kigiye kuza ndetse ubu kirageze , maze abasenga by'ukuri bazasenge Data mu kuri bayobowe na Mwuka , kuko abasenga batyo ari bo Data ashaka .
43004024	Imana ni Mwuka , abayisenga bagomba kuyisenga mu kuri bayobowe na Mwuka . ”
43004025	Umugore aramubwira ati : “ Nzi ko Mesiya , uwo bita Kristo agiye kuza . Naza azatubwira byose . ”
43004026	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Ni jye tuvugana . ”
43004027	Uwo mwanya abigishwa be baraza , batangazwa no gusanga aganira n'umugore . Nyamara ntihagira n'umwe umubaza ati : “ Uramushakaho iki ? Kuki muvugana ? ”
43004028	Nuko umugore asiga ikibindi aho ajya mu mujyi , maze abwira abantu ati :
43004029	“ Nimuze murebe umuntu wambwiye ibyo nakoze byose ! Aho ntiyaba ari we Kristo ? ”
43004030	Basohoka mu mujyi bagana aho ari .
43004031	Hagati aho abigishwa bari babwiye Yezu bati : “ Mwigisha , akira ufungure . ”
43004032	Arabasubiza ati : “ Mfite ibyokurya mutazi . ”
43004033	Nuko abigishwa barabazanya bati : “ Ese haba hari uwamuzaniye icyo afungura ? ”
43004034	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Ifunguro ryanjye ni ugukora ibyo Uwantumye ashaka no kurangiza umurimo we .
43004035	Mbese ntimuvuga ko hasigaye amezi ane , igihe cy'isarura kikaba kigeze ? None rero reka mbabwire : nimwubure amaso murebe imirima . Dore imyaka imaze kwera itegereje gusarurwa .
43004036	Umusaruzi arahembwa imbuto azirundarundire ubugingo buhoraho ; bityo umubibyi n'umusaruzi barishimira hamwe .
43004037	Baca umugani w'ukuri ngo : ‘ Habiba umwe hagasarura undi . ’
43004038	Nabohereje gusarura ibyo mutaruhiye . Abandi bararushye naho mwe mubonera inyungu mu miruho yabo . ”
43004039	Benshi mu Banyasamariya bo muri uwo mujyi bemera Yezu , bashingiye ku ijambo rya wa mugore wahamyaga ati : “ Yambwiye ibyo nakoze byose . ”
43004040	Abanyasamariya ni ko kumusanga baramwinginga ngo agumane na bo , maze ahamara iminsi ibiri .
43004041	Nuko barushaho kumwemera ari benshi kubera ibyo yababwiye .
43004042	Babwira uwo mugore bati : “ Noneho ntitukimwemejwe n'ibyo watubwiye gusa , ahubwo natwe twamwiyumviye tumenya koko ko ari we Mukiza w'abantu bo ku isi yose . ”
43004043	Iyo minsi ibiri ishize , Yezu arahava ajya muri Galileya .
43004044	Yari yarivugiye ko umuhanuzi atubahwa mu gihugu cy'iwabo .
43004045	Nyamara ageze muri Galileya abaho bamwakira neza , kuko na bo bari baragiye i Yeruzalemu mu minsi mikuru ya Pasika , bakibonera ibyo yakozeyo byose .
43004046	Nuko Yezu asubira i Kana ho muri Galileya , aho yari yarahinduriye amazi divayi . I Kafarinawumu hari umutware w'ibwami wari ufite umwana w'umuhungu urwaye .
43004047	Uwo mutware yumvise ko Yezu yavuye muri Yudeya akagera muri Galileya , aramusanga amusaba kumanuka ngo ajye i Kafarinawumu amukirize umwana wari ugiye gupfa .
43004048	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Ntimuteze kunyemera mutabonye ibimenyetso n'ibitangaza . ”
43004049	Uwo mutware w'ibwami aramubwira ati : “ Databuja , manuka uze iwanjye umwana wanjye atarapfa ! ”
43004050	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Genda , umwana wawe arakize . ” Uwo mugabo yizera ijambo Yezu amubwiye aragenda .
43004051	Akiri mu nzira ataha ahura n'abagaragu be , bamusanganiza inkuru y'uko umwana we yakize .
43004052	Ababaza igihe yoroherewe maze baramusubiza bati : “ Ejo isaa saba ni bwo umuriro yari afite wazimye . ”
43004053	Se w'uwo mwana asanga ko ari cyo gihe Yezu yari yamubwiriyeho ati : “ Umwana wawe arakize . ” Nuko yemera Yezu we n'abo mu rugo rwe bose .
43004054	Icyo kiba icya kabiri mu bitangaza Yezu yakoze bimuranga , yagikoze avuye muri Yudeya ageze muri Galileya .
43005001	Nyuma y'ibyo haba umunsi mukuru w'Abayahudi , maze Yezu ajya i Yeruzalemu .
43005002	I Yeruzalemu hafi y'Irembo ry'Intama hari ikizenga mu giheburayi cyitwa Betesida , kizengurutswe n'amabaraza atanu .
43005003	Muri ayo mabaraza habaga haryamye abarwayi benshi cyane , barimo impumyi n'abacumbagira n'ibirema . [ Babaga bategereje ko amazi yibirindura ,
43005004	kuko rimwe na rimwe umumarayika yamanukaga mu kizenga , maze agatuma amazi yibirindura . Amazi akimara kwibirindura , umurwayi wakijyagamo bwa mbere yakiraga indwara iyo ari yo yose . ]
43005005	Aho hari umuntu wari ufite ubumuga amaranye imyaka mirongo itatu n'umunani .
43005006	Yezu amubonye arambaraye aho , amenye n'igihe amaze ameze atyo aramubaza ati : “ Mbese urifuza gukira ? ”
43005007	Umurwayi aramusubiza ati : “ Nyakubahwa , simfite umuntu wo kunshyira mu kizenga igihe amazi yibirinduye , kuko iyo ngerageje kujyamo undi aba yamaze kuntangamo . ”
43005008	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Byuka ufate akarago kawe maze ugende ! ”
43005009	Muri ako kanya uwo murwayi arakira , afata akarago ke maze aragenda . Ibyo byabaye ku munsi w'isabato .
43005010	Nuko Abayahudi babwira uwari umaze gukira bati : “ Ni ku isabato , ntukwiye gutwara akarago kawe . ”
43005011	Arabasubiza ati : “ Uwankijije ni we wambwiye ati : ‘ Fata akarago kawe ugende . ’ ”
43005012	Baramubaza bati : “ Uwo muntu ni nde wakubwiye ngo ‘ Fata akarago kawe ugende ? ’ ”
43005013	Ariko uwo mugabo ntiyari azi uwamukijije uwo ari we , kuko Yezu yari yigendeye anyuze mu kivunge cy'abantu bari aho .
43005014	Hanyuma Yezu aza kumubona mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , aramubwira ati : “ Dore wakize ntuzongere gukora icyaha ukundi , utazabona ishyano riruta irya mbere . ”
43005015	Uwo muntu aragenda amenyesha Abayahudi yuko burya ari Yezu wamukijije .

43006001	Ibyo birangiye Yezu avayo afata hakurya y'ikiyaga cya Galileya , ari na cyo cyitwa Tiberiya .

43008011	Na we aramusubiza ati : “ Nta we Mwigisha . ” Nuko Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Nanjye nta teka nguciriyeho genda , uhereye ubu ntuzongere gukora icyaha . ” ]
43008012	Yezu arongera arababwira ati : “ Ni jye rumuri rw'isi . Unkurikira ntazagenda mu mwijima , ahubwo azaba afite umucyo w'ubugingo . ”

43008015	Mwebwe mwigira abacamanza mushingiye ku byo mureba , naho jye nta muntu ncira urubanza .
43008016	Icyakora nubwo nagira uwo nducira , naba nshingiye ku kuri kuko mba ntari jyenyine , ahubwo mba ndi kumwe na Data wantumye .
43008017	Ndetse no mu Mategeko yanyu handitswe ko igihamijwe n'abantu babiri kiba ari icy'ukuri .
43008018	Ni jye uhamya ibinyerekeyeho kandi na Data wantumye arabihamya . ”
43008019	Nuko baramubaza bati : “ So ari he ? ” Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Jye ntimunzi kandi na Data ntimumuzi . Iyo mumenya muba mwaramenye na Data . ”
43008020	Ibyo byose Yezu yabivuze igihe yigishirizaga mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , aho baturiraga amaturo , kandi ntihagira n'umwe umufata kuko igihe cye cyari kitaragera .
43008021	Yongera kubabwira ati : “ Ndagiye kandi muzanshaka , nyamara muzarinda mupfa mukiri mu byaha . Aho ngiye ntimubasha kujyayo . ”

43008024	Ni cyo gitumye mbabwira ko muzarinda mupfa mukiri mu byaha . Koko rero nimutemera uwo ndi we , muzarinda mupfa mukiri mu byaha . ”
43008025	Baramubaza bati : “ Uri nde ? ” Yezu arabasubiza ati : “ Ni nk'uko nabibabwiye kuva mbere .
43008026	Mfite byinshi nabavugaho nkabacira urubanza , ariko Uwantumye ni uw'ukuri kandi ibyo namwumvanye ni byo byonyine mbwira ab'isi . ”
43008027	Ntibasobanukiwe ko yababwiraga ibyerekeye Imana Se .

43008029	Uwantumye ari kumwe nanjye , ntiyansize jyenyine kuko nkora ibimushimisha iteka . ”

43008050	Si jye wishakira icyubahiro , hari undi ukinshakira ni we wadukiranura .

43008055	Ntimwigeze kumumenya ariko jyewe ndamuzi . Ndetse mvuze ko ntamuzi mba mbaye umubeshyi nkamwe . Ariko rero ndamuzi kandi amabwiriza ye ndayakurikiza .

43008059	Bahita bafata amabuye ngo bamutere , ariko Yezu abaca mu myanya y'intoki maze asohoka mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana .
43009001	Yezu akigenda abona umuntu wavutse ari impumyi .
43009002	Abigishwa be baramubaza bati : “ Mwigisha , ni nde wakoze icyaha cyatumye uyu muntu avuka ari impumyi ? Mbese ni we wagikoze , cyangwa ni ababyeyi be ? ”

43009004	Dukwiriye gukora umurimo w'Uwantumye hakibona . Dore bugiye kwira kandi iyo bwije nta muntu ushobora gukora .
43009005	Igihe nkiri ku isi ndi urumuri rw'isi . ”

43009010	Baramubaza bati : “ Wahumutse ute ? ”

43009012	Baramubaza bati : “ Uwo muntu ari hehe ? ” Ati : “ Simpazi . ”
43009013	Uwahoze ari impumyi bamushyīra Abafarizayi .

43009015	Ni yo mpamvu Abafarizayi na bo bamubajije uko yahumūtse , arabasubiza ati : “ Yansīze akondo ku maso , ndiyuhagira maze ndahumūka . ”

43009018	Ariko Abayahudi bo banga kwemera ko uwo mugabo yahoze ari impumyi none akaba areba , bageza n'aho batumiza ababyeyi be .
43009019	Barababaza bati : “ Mbese koko uyu ni umwana wanyu ? Ese muremeza ko yavutse ari impumyi ? None se byagenze bite kugira ngo arebe ? ”

43009021	Naho rero igituma ubu ngubu areba ntitukizi , n'uwamuhumuye ntitumuzi . Nimumwibarize , ni mukuru abasha kwivugira . ”
43009022	Ababyeyi be bavuze batyo kubera gutinya abakuru b'Abayahudi , kuko bari baranogeje inama yuko umuntu wese uzemeza ko Yezu ari Kristo , bazamuca mu rusengero rwabo .
43009023	Ni cyo cyatumye ababyeyi be bavuga bati : “ Ni mukuru nimumwibarize . ”
43009024	Noneho bahamagara uwahoze ari impumyi ngo agaruke , maze baramubwira bati : “ Ngaho tanga Imana ho umugabo ko uvuga ukuri ! Twe tuzi ko uwo muntu ari umunyabyaha . ”
43009025	Na we arabasubiza ati : “ Niba ari umunyabyaha simbizi . Icyo nzi ni kimwe , ni uko nahoze ndi impumyi none nkaba ndeba . ”
43009026	Nuko baramubaza bati : “ Ese yakugenje ate ? Yaguhumūye ate ? ”

43009035	Yezu yumvise ko bamuciye mu nsengero aramushaka . Amubonye aramubaza ati : “ Mbese wemera Umwana w'umuntu ? ”

43010001	“ Ndababwira nkomeje ko uwinjira mu rugo rw'intama atanyuze mu irembo ahubwo akuririra ahandi , aba ari umujura n'umwambuzi . .
43010002	Naho rero uwinjiriye mu irembo aba ari umushumba w'intama ,
43010003	umuraririzi aramwugururira . Intama zumva ijwi ry'umushumba maze agahamagara ize mu mazina , akazahura .
43010004	Iyo zose zigeze inyuma y'irembo , azijya imbere zikamukurikira kuko ziba zaramenyereye ijwi rye .

43010006	Icyo ni ikigereranyo Yezu yabahaye ariko bo ntibamenya icyo yashakaga kubabwira .
43010007	Yezu yungamo ati : “ Ndababwira nkomeje ko ari jye rembo ry'intama .
43010008	Abaje mbere yanjye bose bari abajura n'abambuzi , ariko intama ntizabitaho .
43010009	Ni jye rembo , uwinjira ari jye anyuzeho azarokoka . Azajya yinjira asohoke kandi abone urwuri .
43010010	Umujura azanwa gusa no kwiba no kwica no kurimbura . Jyewe nazanywe no kugira ngo intama zibone ubugingo , ndetse busendereye .
43010011	“ Ni jye mushumba mwiza . Umushumba mwiza yemera gupfira intama ze .
43010012	Naho umucancuro w'ingirwamushumba utari nyir'intama , abona impyisi ije agatererana intama agahunga . Nuko impyisi ikazisumira ikazitatanya .
43010013	Igituma yihungira ni uko ari umucancuro , intama ntizimushishikaze .
43010014	Ni jye mushumba mwiza . Uko Data anzi nanjye nkamumenya , ni ko nzi intama zanjye na zo zikamenya , ndetse nemera kuzipfira . Ni jye mushumba mwiza . Uko Data anzi nanjye nkamumenya , ni ko nzi intama zanjye na zo zikamenya , ndetse nemera kuzipfira .

43010016	Mfite n'izindi ntama zitari izo muri uru rugo , na zo ngomba kuzitarura . Zizumva ijwi ryanjye maze hazabe umukumbi umwe uragiwe n'umushumba umwe .
43010017	“ Igituma Data ankunda , ni uko nemera gutanga ubuzima bwanjye kugira ngo nzabusubirane .
43010018	Nta wubunyaga , ni jye ubutanga ku bushake bwanjye . Mfite ubushobozi bwo kubutanga n'ubwo kubusubirana . Ayo ni yo mabwiriza nahawe na Data . ”
43010019	Ayo magambo yatumye Abayahudi bongera kwicamo ibice .
43010020	Benshi muri bo baravugaga bati : “ Yahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani . Kuki mukimutega amatwi ? ”

43010022	I Yeruzalemu hari iminsi mikuru yo kwibuka Itahwa ry'Ingoro y'Imana , hakaba ari mu mezi y'imbeho .
43010023	Yezu yagendagendaga mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , munsi y'ibaraza ryitwa irya Salomo .

43010026	ariko ntimubyemera kuko mutari abo mu ntama zanjye .

43010035	Tuzi ko Ibyanditswe bidakuka . Ba bantu babwiwe Ijambo ryayo , Imana ubwayo ni yo yabise imana .

43010042	Nuko abantu benshi bari aho bemera Yezu .
43011001	Umuntu witwa Lazaro wari utuye i Betaniya yafashwe n'indwara . I Betaniya aho ni ho Mariya n'umuvandimwe we Marita babaga .

43011026	Kandi uriho wese unyizera ntazigera apfa . Mbese ibyo urabyemera ? ”
43011027	Marita aramusubiza ati : “ Yee ndabyemera , Nyagasani . Namaze kwemera ko ari wowe Kristo , Umwana w'Imana wagombaga kuza ku isi . ”
43011028	Amaze kuvuga atyo ajya guhamagara umuvandimwe we Mariya , aramwongorera ati : “ Umwigisha yaje kandi aragushaka . ”

43011031	Abayahudi bari baje gusura Mariya babonye asohotse yihuta , baramukurikira bibwira ko agiye kuririra ku mva .

43015016	Si mwe mwantoranyije , ahubwo ni jye wabatoranyije , mbatuma kujya kwera imbuto kandi ngo izo mbuto zanyu zigumeho , kugira ngo icyo muzasaba Data cyose mu izina ryanjye azakibahe .
43015017	Icyo mbategetse rero ni ugukundana .
43015018	“ Ab'isi nibabanga mumenye ko ari jye babanje kwanga .

43016001	“ Ibyo nabibabwiriye kugira ngo hatagira ikibacogoza .

43016005	Ariko ubu ngiye gusanga Uwantumye , kandi rero muri mwe ntawe umbaza ati : ‘ Urajya he ? ’

43016007	Nyamara ndababwira ukuri : icyabagirira akamaro ni uko ngenda , kuko nintagenda wa Mujyanama atazaza muri mwe , ariko ningenda nzamuboherereza .

43016011	Azabemeza ibyerekeye urubanza kuko umutware w'iyi si yamaze kurucirwa .
43016012	“ Ndacyafite byinshi nababwira ariko ubu ntimwabasha kubyihanganira .
43016013	Mwuka werekana ukuri naza azabayobora mu kuri kose , kuko atazavuga ibyo yihangiye , ahubwo azavuga ibyo azaba yumvise kandi azanabamenyesha ibizaza .
43016014	Azanyubahiriza kuko azahabwa ku byanjye akabibamenyesha .
43016015	Ibyo Data afite byose ni ibyanjye , ni cyo gitumye mbabwira nti : ‘ Mwuka azahabwa ku byanjye maze abibamenyeshe ’ .
43016016	“ Hasigaye igihe gito mwe kumbona hanyuma mu kindi gihe gito mukazambona . ”
43016017	Nuko bamwe mu bigishwa be barabazanya bati : “ Ibyo se ni ibiki atubwiye ngo hasigaye igihe gito twe kumubona hanyuma mu kindi gihe gito tukazamubona , kandi ngo kuko agiye kwa Se ? ”

43016019	Yezu amenye ko bashaka kumubaza ni ko kugira ati : “ Ese murabazanya kuri iryo jambo navuze nti : ‘ Hasigaye igihe gito mwe kumbona hanyuma mu kindi gihe gito mukazambona ? ’
43016020	Ndababwira nkomeje ko muzarira muboroge , naho ab'isi bo bazishima . Muzababara ariko akababaro kanyu kazahinduka ibyishimo .
43016021	Iyo umugore aramukwa arababara kuko agejeje igihe , ariko yamara kubyara ntabe acyibuka uburibwe kubera ibyishimo , kuko isi iba yungutse umuntu .

43016027	Erega Data ubwe asanzwe abakunda , kuko munkunda mukaba mwaremeye ko navuye ku Mana !
43016028	Naturutse kwa Data nza ku isi , kandi ubu ngiye kuva ku isi nsubire kwa Data . ”

43016033	Ibyo mbibabwiriye kugira ngo mugire amahoro mukomora kuri jye . Ku isi muzagira amakuba , ariko nimuhumure isi narayitsinze ! ”
43017001	Yezu amaze kuvuga atyo , yubura amaso areba ku ijuru aravuga ati : “ Data , igihe kirageze . Hesha Umwana wawe ikuzo kugira ngo na we aguheshe ikuzo .
43017002	Wamuhaye ububasha ku bantu bose , ni ukugira ngo abo wamuhaye bose abaheshe ubugingo buhoraho .
43017003	Kandi ubugingo buhoraho ngubu : ni uko bakumenya wowe Mana y'ukuri wenyine bakamenya n'uwo watumye Yezu Kristo .
43017004	Naguhesheje ikuzo ku isi ndangiza umurimo wampaye gukora .
43017005	Noneho Data , umpe kubana nawe mfite rya kuzo twari dusangiye isi itararemwa .
43017006	“ Abantu wampaye ubakuye mu b'isi nabagaragarije uwo uri we . Bari abawe maze urabampa kandi bakurikije ijambo ryawe .
43017007	None bazi ko ibyo wampaye byose ari wowe biturukaho ,
43017008	kuko ubutumwa wampaye nabubagejejeho bakabwakira . Bazi badashidikanya ko naturutse kuri wowe kandi bemera ko ari wowe wantumye .
43017009	“ Ni bo nsabira sinsabira ab'isi , ahubwo nsabira abo wampaye kuko ari abawe .
43017010	Ibyanjye byose ni ibyawe , n'ibyawe byose ni ibyanjye kandi ikuzo ryanjye ryagaragariye kuri bo .
43017011	Kuva ubu sinkiri ku isi ariko bo baracyayiriho , naho jye nje iwawe . Data uzira inenge , ubarindishe ububasha wampaye , kugira ngo babe umwe nk'uko natwe turi umwe .
43017012	Nkiri kumwe na bo , ububasha wampaye ni bwo bwatumye mbagumana nkabarinda , ntihagire n'umwe muri bo ubura uretse wa wundi wagombaga kurimbuka , kugira ngo bibe nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga .

43017014	Nababwiye ijambo ryawe , ab'isi barabanga babaziza ko atari abayo nk'uko nanjye ntari uwayo .

43017018	Nk'uko wantumye ku isi ni ko nanjye mbatumye ku isi .

43017026	Narabakumenyesheje kandi nzakomeza kubikora , kugira ngo urukundo wankunze rube muri bo nanjye mbe muri bo . ”
43018001	Yezu amaze gusenga atyo , ajyana n'abigishwa be bambuka umugezi wa Kedironi . Hakurya yaho hari ubusitani , maze Yezu n'abigishwa be babujyamo .

43018003	Nuko Yuda ajyayo ayoboye igitero cy'abasirikari n'abarinzi b'Ingoro y'Imana , batumwe n'abakuru bo mu batambyi hamwe n'Abafarizayi . Bari batwaye imuri n'amatara n'intwaro .

43019001	Ni bwo Pilato ategetse ko bafata Yezu ngo bamukubite .

43019020	Abayahudi benshi basoma iryo tangazo , kuko aho Yezu yari abambwe hari hafi y'Umurwa , kandi itangazo ryari ryanditswe mu giheburayi no mu kilatini no mu kigereki .

43019023	Abasirikari bamaze kubamba Yezu ku musaraba , bafata imyambaro ye bayigabanyamo imigabane ine , buri wese abona uwe hasigara ikanzu ye gusa . Iyo kanzu ntiyari ifite uruteranyirizo , ahubwo yari iboshywe yose kuva hejuru kugeza hasi .

43019031	Kuko wari umunsi w'imyiteguro y'isabato , Abayahudi basaba Pilato kubavuna amaguru ngo babamanure , kugira ngo imirambo yabo itaguma ku misaraba ku isabato , kandi iyo sabato ari umunsi mukuru .
43019032	Nuko abasirikari baraza , bavuna amaguru y'umuntu wa mbere n'ay'uwa kabiri bari babambanywe na Yezu ,
43019033	ariko bageze kuri Yezu basanga amaze gupfa , ntibirirwa bamuvuna amaguru .
43019034	Ahubwo umwe mu basirikari amutoboza icumu mu rubavu , muri ako kanya havamo amaraso n'amazi .
43019035	Uwabyiboneye ni we ubihamya kandi ibyo ahamya ni iby'ukuri . Uwo azi ko ibyo avuga ari ukuri kugira ngo namwe mubyemere .
43019036	Ibyo bintu byabereyeho kugira ngo bibe nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Nta gufwa rye na rimwe rizavunwa . ”
43019037	Kandi ahandi havuga ngo : “ Bazitegereza uwo batoboye . ”
43019038	Hanyuma y'ibyo haza uwitwa Yozefu ukomoka mu mujyi wa Arimateya , wari umwigishwa wa Yezu rwihishwa abitewe no gutinya Abayahudi . Nuko asaba Pilato uburenganzira bwo gutwara umurambo wa Yezu , Pilato aramwemerera maze araza arawujyana .
43019039	Nikodemu wigeze gusanga Yezu nijoro na we araza , azana imibavu ivanze n'amakakama ahumura neza , ipima nk'ibiro mirongo itatu .
43019040	Bombi bajyana umurambo wa Yezu , bawuhambira mu myenda hamwe n'iyo mibavu nk'uko Abayahudi babigenza bahamba .
43019041	Hafi y'aho yabambwe hari ubusitani burimo imva nshya itigeze ihambwamo .
43019042	Kubera ko wari umunsi w'imyiteguro y'isabato kandi iyo mva ikaba yari bugufi , baba ari ho bashyingura Yezu .
43020001	Ku cyumweru ari wo munsi wa mbere , Mariya w'i Magadala aza ku mva bwenda gucya , abona ibuye ryavanywe ku mva .
43020002	Nuko ariruka asanga Simoni Petero na wa mwigishwa wundi Yezu yakundaga , arababwira ati : “ Bavanye databuja mu mva kandi ntituzi aho bamushyize . ”
43020003	Petero ahagurukana na wa mwigishwa wundi bajya ku mva .

43020005	Arunama abona imyenda irambitse aho , ariko ntiyinjiramo .

43020012	maze abona abamarayika babiri bambaye imyambaro yera bicaye aho umurambo wa Yezu wari uri , umwe yicaye aho umutwe wari uri undi aho ibirenge byari biri .
43020013	Baramubaza bati : “ Wa mugore we , urarizwa n'iki ? ” Arabasubiza ati : “ Ni uko batwaye umurambo wa databuja , kandi sinzi aho bawushyize . ”
43020014	Amaze kuvuga atyo ahindukiye ngo arebe inyuma , abona Yezu ahagaze aho ariko ntiyamenya ko ari we .
43020015	Yezu aramubaza ati : “ Wa mugore we , urarizwa n'iki ? Urashaka nde ? ” Mariya akeka ko ari ushinzwe ubusitani , ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Nyabuneka , niba ari wowe watwaye umurambo , mbwira aho wawushyize maze nywujyane . ”
43020016	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Mariya we . ” Mariya arahindukira amubwira mu kinyarameya ati : “ Rabuni ! ” ( Bisobanurwa ngo “ Mwigisha ” ) .
43020017	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Wishaka kungumana kuko ntarazamuka ngo njye kwa Data ! Ahubwo genda usange abavandimwe banjye , ubabwire ko ngiye kuzamuka nkajya kwa Data ari we So , nkajya ku Mana yanjye ari yo Mana yanyu . ”
43020018	Mariya w'i Magadala aragenda abwira abigishwa ati : “ Niboneye Nyagasani ! ” Nuko abatekerereza ibyo yamubwiye .
43020019	Nuko kuri uwo munsi bugorobye , ku cyumweru ( ari wo munsi wa mbere ) , abigishwa ba Yezu bari bateraniye mu nzu , bakinze inzugi babitewe no gutinya Abayahudi . Yezu araza ahagarara hagati yabo arababwira ati : “ Nimugire amahoro ! ”
43020020	Amaze kuvuga atyo abereka ibiganza bye no mu rubavu rwe . Abigishwa babonye Nyagasani barishima cyane .
43020021	Ababwira ubwa kabiri ati : “ Nimugire amahoro ! Uko Data yantumye ni ko nanjye mbatumye . ”
43020022	Amaze kuvuga atyo abahumekeraho ati : “ Nimwakire Mwuka Muziranenge !
43020023	Abo muzababarira ibyaha bose bazaba babibabariwe , kandi abo mutazabibabarira bazaba batabibabariwe . ”
43020024	Ariko Tomasi witwaga Didimo umwe mu bigishwa cumi na babiri , ntiyari kumwe na bo igihe Yezu yazaga .
43020025	Nuko abandi bigishwa baramubwira bati : “ Twabonye Nyagasani ! ” Tomasi arababwira ati : “ Nintabona imyenge y'imisumari mu biganza bye ngo nshyiremo urutoki , kandi ngo nshyire n'ikiganza mu rubavu rwe sinzabyemera . ”
43020026	Nuko iminsi umunani ishize na bwo abigishwa ba Yezu bari muri ya nzu , noneho na Tomasi ari kumwe na bo . Yezu aza inzugi zikinze , ahagarara hagati yabo aravuga ati : “ Nimugire amahoro ! ”
43020027	Abwira Tomasi ati : “ Shyira urutoki aha ngaha , witegereze ibiganza byanjye kandi ushyire n'ikiganza cyawe mu rubavu rwanjye . Nuko ureke gushidikanya ahubwo unyemere ! ”
43020028	Tomasi aramusubiza ati : “ Mwami wanjye ! Mana yanjye ! ”
43020029	Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Unyemejwe n'uko umbonye . Hahirwa abanyemera kandi batambonye . ”
43020030	Yezu ari kumwe n'abigishwa be yakoze n'ibindi bitangaza byinshi bimuranga , bitanditswe muri iki gitabo .
43020031	Ariko ibi byandikiwe kugira ngo mwemere yuko Yezu ari Kristo Umwana w'Imana , kandi ngo nimumwizera muherwe ubugingo muri we .
43021001	Nyuma y'ibyo Yezu yongera kubonekera abigishwa be ku nkombe z'ikiyaga cya Tiberiya . Dore uko byagenze :
43021002	abari bahari ni Simoni Petero na Tomasi witwaga Didimo , na Natanayeli ukomoka i Kana ho muri Galileya na bene Zebedeyi bombi , n'abandi bigishwa ba Yezu babiri .
43021003	Simoni Petero arababwira ati : “ Ngiye kuroba . ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Reka tujyane ! ” Nuko baragenda bajya mu bwato , barara ijoro ariko ntibagira icyo bafata .
43021004	Mu gitondo cya kare Yezu yari ku nkombe , ariko abigishwa ntibamenya ko ari we .
43021005	Nuko arababaza ati : “ Yemwe , hari icyo mwafashe ? ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Habe na busa ! ”
43021006	Arababwira ati : “ Nimuterere umutego iburyo bw'ubwato murayafata . ” Nuko babigenza batyo , maze ntibabasha gukurura umutego kubera ubwinshi bw'amafi bari bafashe .
43021007	Wa mwigishwa Yezu yakundaga abwira Petero ati : “ Ni Nyagasani ! ” Simoni Petero yumvise ko ari Nyagasani , ahita akenyera kuko yari yiyambuye , maze arasimbuka agwa mu mazi .
43021008	Abandi bigishwa baza mu bwato , bagera ku nkombe bakurura umutego wuzuye amafi . Ntibari kure y'inkombe bari nko muri metero ijana .
43021009	Bageze imusozi bahasanga amakara yaka , yokejweho ifi n'umugati .
43021010	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nimuzane ku mafi mumaze gufata . ”
43021011	Simoni Petero asubira mu bwato , akurura wa mutego wuzuye amafi manini ijana na mirongo itanu n'atatu , kandi nubwo yari menshi atyo umutego ntiwacika .
43021012	Yezu arababwira ati : “ Nimuze mufungure ! ” Nta n'umwe mu bigishwa be wubahutse kumubaza ati : “ Uri nde ? ” Bari bamenye ko ari Nyagasani .
43021013	Yezu araza afata umugati arawubahereza , abahereza n'amafi .
43021014	Ubwo bwari ubwa gatatu Yezu abonekera abigishwa be amaze kuzuka .
43021015	Nuko bamaze gufungura Yezu abaza Simoni Petero ati : “ Simoni mwene Yohani , urankunda kuruta aba ? ” Aramusubiza ati : “ Yego Nyagasani , uzi ko ngukunda . ” Yezu ati : “ Ragira abana b'intama banjye ! ”
43021016	Yongera kumubaza ubwa kabiri ati : “ Simoni mwene Yohani , urankunda ? ” Aramusubiza ati : “ Yego Nyagasani , uzi ko ngukunda . ” Yezu ati : “ Ragira intama zanjye uziteho ! ”
43021017	Yongera kumubaza ubwa gatatu ati : “ Simoni mwene Yohani , urankunda ? ” Petero aterwa agahinda n'uko Yezu amubajije ubwa gatatu ati : “ Urankunda ? ” Ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Nyagasani , uzi byose , uzi ko ngukunda . ” Yezu aramubwira ati : “ Ragira intama zanjye !
43021018	Ndakubwira nkomeje ko igihe wari ukiri umusore , warikenyezaga ukajya aho wishakiye , ariko numara gusaza uzajya urambura amaboko undi muntu agukenyeze , kandi akujyane aho udashaka . ”
43021019	Yavugiye atyo kugira ngo yerekane urwo Petero azapfa rugahesha Imana ikuzo . Amaze kuvuga atyo aramubwira ati : “ Nkurikira ! ”
43021020	Petero akebutse abona wa mwigishwa Yezu yakundaga abakurikiye . Uwo ni umwe wari wegamye mu gituza cya Yezu cya gihe bari ku meza , akamubaza ati : “ Nyagasani , ni nde uri bukugambanire ? ”
43021021	Petero amubonye abaza Yezu ati : “ Naho se Nyagasani , uyu we bite ? ”

43021023	Nuko iyo nkuru ikwira mu bavandimwe yuko uwo mwigishwa atazapfa . Ariko Yezu ntiyavugaga ko atazapfa , ahubwo yaravuze ati : “ Niba nshaka ko abaho kugeza aho nzazira bigutwaye iki ? ”
43021024	Uwo mwigishwa ni we ubwe uhamya ibyo , ni na we wabyanditse kandi tuzi ko ibyo ahamya ari ukuri .

44001001	Kuri Tewofili , Mu gitabo cyanjye cya mbere narondoye ibintu byose Yezu yakoze n'ibyo yigishije , kuva agitangira umurimo we

44002001	Umunsi mukuru wa Pentekote ugeze bose bari bakoraniye hamwe .

44002015	Erega aba bantu ntibanyoye nk'uko mubyibwira . Dore ni mu gitondo haracyari isaa tatu !

44003001	Umunsi umwe saa cyenda , ari cyo gihe cyo gusenga , Petero na Yohani bagiye mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana .
44003002	Hariho umuntu wavutse ari ikirema bahekaga buri munsi , bakamushyira ku irembo ry'Ingoro y'Imana ryitwa “ Irembo ry'Igikundiro ” , kugira ngo asabirize amafaranga abazaga mu rugo rw'Ingoro .
