44007033	Nuko Nyagasani aramubwira ati : ‘ Kuramo inkweto kuko uhagaze ahantu nitoranyirije .
44007034	Nabonye uko ubwoko bwanjye bukoreshwa agahato mu Misiri , numva no gutaka kwabwo . None ndamanutse ngo mbutabare . Nuko rero ngwino ngutume mu Misiri . ’
44007035	“ Musa uwo bene wabo bari baramwanze bamubaza bati : ‘ Ni nde wakugize umutware cyangwa umucamanza wacu ? ’ Nyamara ni we Imana yohereje kubabera umutware n'umutabazi , imutumyeho umumarayika wamubonekereye muri cya gihuru .
44007036	Musa ni we wabavanye mu Misiri akora ibitangaza , atanga n'ibimenyetso muri icyo gihugu , ku Nyanja Itukura no mu butayu mu gihe cy'imyaka mirongo ine .
44007037	Ni we wabwiye Abisiraheli ati : ‘ Imana izabatumaho umuhanuzi umeze nkanjye ukomoka muri mwe . ’
44007038	Musa uwo ni we wari mu ikoraniro ry'Abisiraheli mu butayu , yari hamwe na ba sogokuruza , akaba ari hamwe na none na wa mumarayika bavuganaga ku musozi wa Sinayi . Ni na we wahaherewe amagambo y'ubugingo ngo ayadushyikirize .
44007039	“ Ariko ba sogokuruza banga kumwumvira baramuhinda , ndetse bifuza kwisubirira mu Misiri .
44007040	Babwira Aroni bati : ‘ Turemere imana zo kutuyobora , kuko Musa wa muntu wadukuye mu Misiri tutazi icyamubayeho . ’
44007041	Ubwo ni bwo bacuze ishusho y'ikimasa bagitambira igitambo , bityo bishimira ikintu bakuye mu bukorikori bwabo .
44007042	Nuko Imana irabazibukira , irabareka ngo basenge inyenyeri nk'uko byanditswe mu gitabo cy'abahanuzi ngo ‘ Mwa Bisiraheli mwe , ya myaka mirongo ine mwamaze mu butayu sinigeze mbaka ibitambo n'amaturo .
44007043	Nyamara mwahetse ihema ry'ikigirwamana Moleki n'ishusho y'inyenyeri y'ikigirwamana Refani , ni yo mashusho mwaremeye kuramya . Nuko rero nzatuma mujyanwa ho iminyago babarenze i Babiloni . ’
44007044	“ Mu butayu ba sogokuruza bari bafite Ihema rihamya Isezerano Imana yagiranye na bo , rya rindi yari yategetse Musa gushinga akurikije urugero yamweretse .
44007045	Hanyuma ba sogokuruza bahererekanya iryo Hema kugeza mu gihe cya Yozuwe , aba ari we ubayobora baza kwigarurira iki gihugu Imana imaze kucyirukanamo amahanga , rirahaguma kugeza mu gihe cya Dawidi .
44007046	Dawidi uwo yatonnye ku Mana , asaba uburenganzira bwo kubakira Imana ya Yakobo Inzu .
44007047	Nyamara ni Salomo wayubakiye iyo Nzu .
44007048	“ Ariko Usumbabyose ntaba mu mazu yubatswe n'abantu , nk'uko byavuzwe n'umuhanuzi ati :
44007049	‘ Ijuru ni intebe yanjye ya cyami , naho isi ni akabaho nkandagizaho ibirenge . None se muzanyubakira nzu ki ? Ni hehe mubona ko natura ?
44007050	Mbese si jye waremye ibyo byose ? ’
44007051	“ Yemwe bantu b'ibyigomeke ! Yemwe bantu batagira umutima kandi b'ibipfamatwi ! Muri kimwe na ba sokuruza , muhora murwanya Mwuka Muziranenge !
44007052	Mbese hari umuhanuzi n'umwe ba sokuruza batatoteje ? Ese ntibishe n'abahanuye kuza kwa ya Ntungane ? None namwe ni yo mwagambaniye murayica .
44007053	Mwahawe Amategeko y'Imana muyashyikirijwe n'abamarayika , nyamara ntimwayakurikiza . ”
44007054	Abari aho bumvise ibyo Sitefano avuze , bicwa n'uburakari bamuhekenyera amenyo .
44007055	Naho Sitefano yuzura Mwuka Muziranenge , ahanga amaso mu ijuru abona ikuzo ry'Imana na Yezu ahagaze iburyo bwayo .
44007056	Aravuga ati : “ Dore ndareba ijuru rikinguye , n'Umwana w'umuntu ahagaze iburyo bw'Imana . ”
44007057	Baherako bavuza induru barasakuza cyane , baziba amatwi bamwiroheraho icyarimwe ,
44007058	baramukurubana bamuvana mu mujyi maze bamutera amabuye . Abamushinjaga basigira imyitero yabo umusore witwaga Sawuli .
44007059	Bakimutera amabuye Sitefano arasenga ati : “ Nyagasani Yezu , nyakira . ”
44007060	Nuko arapfukama avuga aranguruye ati : “ Nyagasani , ubababarire iki cyaha . ” Akimara kuvuga atyo araca .
44008001	Ibyo kwica Sitefano Sawuli yari abishyigikiye . Uwo munsi Abakristo b'i Yeruzalemu batangira gutotezwa bikomeye . Uretse Intumwa , bose batatanira mu ntara ya Yudeya n'iya Samariya .
44008002	Abantu bubahaga Imana bashyingura Sitefano kandi baramuririra cyane .
44008003	Naho Sawuli we agumya kuyogoza Umuryango wa Kristo . Yavaga mu rugo akajya mu rundi , agakurubana abagabo n'abagore akabata muri gereza .
44008004	Abatatanye bagenda hose bamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza .
44008005	Filipo we ajya mu mujyi wo muri Samariya , atangariza abaho ibya Kristo .
44008006	Rubanda bitondera ibyo Filipo avuga , bose bagahuza umutima mu kubyumva no kureba ibitangaza yakoraga .
44008007	Ingabo za Satani zavaga mu bantu benshi zomongana , kandi abamugaye benshi n'abacumbagiraga bagakira .
44008008	Nuko muri uwo mujyi hakaba ibyishimo byinshi .
44008009	Muri uwo mujyi kandi hari umugabo witwaga Simoni wari usanzwe aragura agatangaza Abanyasamariya , akiyita umuntu w'akataraboneka .
44008010	Nuko abantu bose bakamurangarira , abakuru n'abato bavuga bati : “ Uyu muntu arimo ububasha bw'Imana , ubwo bita Indahangarwa . ”
44008011	Bamuhugiraho kuko bari bamaze igihe batangazwa n'ubupfumu bwe .
44008012	Bamaze kwemera Ubutumwa bwiza Filipo yabazaniye yerekeye ubwami bw'Imana na Yezu Kristo , abagabo n'abagore barabatizwa .
44008013	Nuko Simoni na we yemera izo nyigisho arabatizwa , yihambira kuri Filipo . Abonye ibimenyetso atanze n'ibitangaza bikomeye akoze arumirwa .
44008014	Intumwa za Kristo zari i Yeruzalemu zumvise ko abo muri Samariya bemeye Ijambo ry'Imana , ziboherereza Petero na Yohani .
44008015	Bagezeyo barabasabira ngo bahabwe Mwuka Muziranenge ,
44008016	kuko ari nta n'umwe muri bo yari yamanukiraho , ariko gusa bari barabatijwe mu izina rya Nyagasani Yezu .
44008017	Petero na Yohani bamaze kubarambikaho ibiganza , abo bantu bahita bahabwa Mwuka Muziranenge .
44008018	Simoni abonye uko abo Intumwa za Kristo zirambitseho ibiganza bahawe Mwuka Muziranenge , azanira amafaranga Petero na Yohani arababwira ati :
44008019	“ Mumpe nanjye ubwo bushobozi , kugira ngo uwo nzarambikaho ibiganza ahabwe Mwuka Muziranenge . ”
44008020	Petero aramubwira ati : “ Uragapfana n'amafaranga yawe ! Ubonye ngo utekereze ko wagura impano y'Imana amafaranga !
44008021	Ntaho uhuriye n'ibi ngibi , nta n'icyo byakungura kuko imigambi yawe itagororokeye Imana .
44008022	Nuko rero wihane ubwo bugome bwawe maze usabe Nyagasani , urebe ko yakubabarira uwo mugambi wagize .
44008023	Erega ndasanga umazwe n'ishyari kandi wahambiranye n'ubuhemu ! ”
44008024	Simoni ni ko gusubiza ati : “ Munsabire Nyagasani , kugira ngo hatagira ikimbaho mu byo mumaze kuvuga . ”
44008025	Petero na Yohani bamaze kwemeza abantu ibyo biboneye no kubabwira ijambo rya Nyagasani , basubira i Yeruzalemu . Bari mu nzira bamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza mu mirenge myinshi yo muri Samariya .
44008026	Umumarayika wa Nyagasani abwira Filipo ati : “ Haguruka ugende werekeje mu majyepfo , ufate umuhanda utakiri nyabagendwa uva i Yeruzalemu ugana i Gaza . ”
44008027	Nuko Filipo arahaguruka aragenda , ahura n'Umunyetiyopiya wari icyegera cya Kandake umwamikazi w'Abanyetiyopiya , ari na we ugenga imari ye yose . Yari yaragiye i Yeruzalemu gusenga Imana .
44008028	Mu gihe yari mu nzira ataha , yari yicaye mu igare rye asoma igitabo cy'umuhanuzi Ezayi .
44008029	Mwuka w'Imana abwira Filipo ati : “ Egera uriya mugabo wicaye mu igare mugendane . ” .
44008030	Filipo ariruka maze yumva wa mugabo asoma igitabo cy'umuhanuzi Ezayi , aramubaza ati : “ Mbese aho ibyo usoma urabyumva ? ”
44008031	Undi aramusubiza ati : “ Nkabyumva nte se ntabonye unsobanurira ? ” Nuko asaba Filipo kurira ngo bicarane mu igare .
44008032	Ibyo yasomaga mu Byanditswe byari ibi ngo :
44008033	Bamucishije bugufi ntihagira umurengera . Ni nde uzamenyekanisha urubyaro rwe ko nta cyo yasize ? Koko yakuwe ku isi . ”
44008034	Uwo mugaragu w'umugabekazi abaza Filipo ati : “ Mbese ni nde umuhanuzi yavuzeho ibyo ngibyo ? Ni we wivugaga , cyangwa ni undi muntu yavugaga ? ”
44008035	Filipo ahera kuri ibyo byanditswe , amubwira Ubutumwa bwiza bwerekeye Yezu .
44008036	Bagikomeje uwo muhanda baza guhita ahantu hari amazi . Wa mugabo ni ko kugira ati : “ Dore amazi hano ! None se nabuzwa n'iki kubatizwa ? ” [
44008037	Filipo aramusubiza ati : “ Niba wemera Yezu n'umutima wawe wose , ushobora kubatizwa . ” Na we ati : “ Nemeye Yezu Kristo ko ari Umwana w'Imana . ” ]
44008038	Nuko ategeka guhagarika igare , we na Filipo bombi baramanuka bajya mu mazi , Filipo aramubatiza .
44008039	Bavuye mu mazi Mwuka wa Nyagasani ajyana Filipo , uwo mugaragu w'umugabekazi ntiyongera kumubona . Nuko akomeza urugendo rwe yishimye .
44008040	Filipo agiye kubona asanga ari ahitwa Azoto , maze agenda yamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza mu mijyi yose kugeza aho yagereye i Kayizariya .
44009001	Sawuli we nta kindi yahozaga ku rurimi kitari ugukangisha abigishwa ba Nyagasani ko bicwa . Nuko ajya ku Mutambyi mukuru ,
44009002	amusaba inzandiko zo gushyikiriza abakuru b'insengero z'Abayahudi z'i Damasi , kugira ngo nabonayo abayobotse inzira ya Yezu , baba abagabo cyangwa abagore , bose abafate abazane i Yeruzalemu .
44009003	Ari mu nzira agenda agiye kugera i Damasi , agiye kubona abona agoswe n'umucyo uvuye mu ijuru .
44009004	Yitura hasi , yumva ijwi ry'umuhamagara ati : “ Sawuli ! Sawuli ! Untotereza iki ? ”
44009005	Arabaza ati : “ Uri nde Nyagasani ? ” Yumva usubiza ati : “ Ndi Yezu uwo utoteza .
44009006	Ariko haguruka ujye mu mujyi , uzahabwirirwa icyo ugomba gukora . ”
44009007	Abagabo bagendanaga na Sawuli bari bahagaze badakoma . Bumvaga ijwi ariko ntibabone uvuga .
44009008	Sawuli arabaduka , maze abumbuye amaso ntiyabona . Nuko baramurandata bamujyana i Damasi .
44009009	Amarayo gatatu atareba , atarya kandi atanywa .
44009010	I Damasi rero hakaba umwigishwa wa Kristo witwaga Ananiya . Nyagasani aramubonekera aramuhamagara ati : “ Ananiya ! ” Undi arasubiza ati : “ Karame Nyagasani . ”
44009011	Nyagasani aramubwira ati : “ Haguruka ujye ku muhanda witwa Ugororotse , ugere kwa Yuda ubazeyo umuntu witwa Sawuli ukomoka i Tarisi . Ubu arasenga .
44009012	Amaze kubonekerwa abona umuntu witwa Ananiya yinjira , akamurambikaho ibiganza kugira ngo ahumuke . ”
44009013	Ananiya arasubiza ati : “ Nyagasani , numvise benshi bavuga iby'uwo mugabo , ukuntu yagiriye nabi intore zawe z'i Yeruzalemu .
44009014	None dore yaje ino ahawe uburenganzira n'abakuru bo mu batambyi , kugira ngo afate abantu bose basenga mu izina ryawe . ”
44009015	Ariko Nyagasani abwira Ananiya ati : “ Genda kuko uwo muntu ari igikoresho nitoranyirije kugira ngo amenyekanishe mu mahanga , no mu bami bayo no mu rubyaro rwa Isiraheli .
44009016	Nanjye nzamwereka uburyo bwose azagomba kubabazwa ari jye ahorwa . ”
44009017	Nuko Ananiya aragenda . Ageze mu nzu arambika ibiganza kuri Sawuli , aramubwira ati : “ Muvandimwe Sawuli , Nyagasani wakubonekeye uri mu nzira uza ino , akuntumyeho kugira ngo uhumuke kandi wuzuzwe Mwuka Muziranenge . ”
44009018	Muri ako kanya utuntu dusa n'udushishwa dutunguka ku maso ye , tugwa hasi maze abona yongeye kureba . Arahaguruka arabatizwa .
44009019	Amaze kurya , abona intege . Sawuli amarana iminsi n'abigishwa ba Kristo bari i Damasi .
44009020	Ahita atangira kwamamaza ibya Yezu mu nsengero z'Abayahudi , avuga ko ari we Mwana w'Imana .
44009021	Abamwumvaga bose baratangaraga , bakabaza bati : “ Mbese uyu si we watsembaga abasenga mu izina rya Yezu b'i Yeruzalemu ? None se kandi ntiyazanywe hano no kugira ngo abafate abajyane , abashyikirize abakuru bo mu batambyi ? ”
44009022	Nyamara Sawuli arushaho kunguka ububasha , agatsinda impaka Abayahudi bari batuye i Damasi , abemeza ko Yezu ari we Kristo .
44009023	Hashize iminsi myinshi Abayahudi bajya inama yo kwica Sawuli .
44009024	Nyamara Sawuli amenya uwo mugambi wabo . Barindaga amarembo y'umujyi ijoro n'amanywa kugira ngo babone uko bamwica .
44009025	Ariko abigishwa be bamucikisha nijoro , bamwururukiriza ku rukuta rw'umujyi bamumanuriye mu gitebo .
44009026	Sawuli ageze i Yeruzalemu agerageza kwifatanya n'abigishwa ba Kristo . Nyamara bose baramutinya ntibamushira amakenga , kuko batemeraga ko yabaye umwigishwa we koko .
44009027	Nuko Barinaba aramujyana amushyikiriza Intumwa za Kristo , azitekerereza uko Sawuli yabonekewe na Nyagasani mu nzira akavugana na we . Ababwira n'uburyo Sawuli yigishije mu izina rya Yezu i Damasi , ashize amanga .
44009028	Nuko Sawuli agumana na bo , akagendagenda hose i Yeruzalemu nta cyo yikanga , ari na ko atangaza ibya Nyagasani ashize amanga .
44009029	Yaganiraga n'Abayahudi bavugaga ikigereki ndetse akajya impaka na bo , ariko bo bagashaka kumwica .
44009030	Abavandimwe babimenye baramuherekeza bamugeza i Kayizariya , maze bamwohereza i Tarisi .
44009031	Ubwo abagize Umuryango wa Kristo bari bafite amahoro muri Yudeya hose , no muri Galileya no muri Samariya . Bityo barakomera bagumya kubaha Nyagasani , bariyongera bafashijwe na Mwuka Muziranenge .
44009032	Ubwo Petero yagendagendaga igihugu cyose , igihe kimwe ajya gusura intore z'Imana zari zituye i Lida .
44009033	Ahasanga umugabo witwa Eneya , wari umaze imyaka umunani atava mu buriri kubera ubumuga .
44009034	Petero aramubwira ati : “ Eneya , Yezu Kristo aragukijije , haguruka wisasire . ” Uwo mwanya arahaguruka .
44009035	Abaturage bose b'i Lida n'abo mu kibaya cya Sharoni babibonye , bayoboka Nyagasani .
44009036	I Yope hari umwigishwakazi wa Kristo witwaga Tabita ( mu kigereki ni Doruka , risobanurwa ngo “ ingeragere ” ) . Uwo mugore yahoraga agira neza kandi agafasha abakene .
44009037	Muri iyo minsi aza gufatwa n'indwara maze arapfa . Bamaze kūhagira umurambo , bawuryamisha mu cyumba cyo mu nzu yo hejuru .
44009038	Abigishwa ba Kristo b'i Yope bumvise yuko Petero ari i Lida bugufi bw'i Yope , bamutumaho abagabo babiri baramwinginga bati : “ Nyamuneka , ntutindiganye kuza iwacu ! ”
44009039	Nuko Petero arahaguruka ajyana na bo . Ahageze bamujyana muri cya cyumba cyo hejuru . Abapfakazi bose bari bamukikije barira , bamwereka amakanzu n'amakote Doruka yabadodeye akiriho .
44009040	Nuko Petero arabaheza bose maze arapfukama arasenga . Ni ko kugana ku murambo aravuga ati : “ Tabita , haguruka ! ” Tabita abumbura amaso , maze abonye Petero areguka aricara .
44009041	Petero amufata ukuboko aramuhagurutsa , ahamagaza intore z'Imana zarimo ba bapfakazi , amubashyikiriza ari muzima .
44009042	Iyo nkuru imenyekana i Yope hose , bituma abantu benshi bemera Nyagasani .
44009043	Nuko Petero amara iminsi myinshi i Yope , acumbitse ku mukannyi witwa Simoni .
44010001	I Kayizariya hāri umuntu witwaga Koruneli , akaba n'umukapiteni mu mutwe w'ingabo z'Abanyaroma zaturutse mu Butaliyani .
44010002	Yari umuntu wubaha Imana akayitinya , we n'abo mu rugo rwe bose . Yagiriraga ubuntu bwinshi abakene kandi yambazaga Imana ubudasiba .
44010003	Nuko umunsi umwe nk'isaa cyenda z'amanywa aza kubonekerwa . Yibonera umumarayika w'Imana yinjira iwe . Aramubwira ati : “ Koruneli ! ”
44010004	Agira ubwoba bwinshi atumbira uwo mumarayika , aravuga ati : “ Karame Nyagasani . ” Umumarayika aramubwira ati : “ Amasengesho yawe n'ubuntu ugirira abakene byageze ku Mana mu ijuru , birayishimisha .
44010005	Nuko rero ohereza abantu i Yope nonaha , utumize umuntu uhari witwa Simoni wahimbwe Petero .
44010006	Acumbitse mu rugo rw'umukannyi witwa Simoni , utuye ku nyanja . ”
44010007	Hanyuma umumarayika bavuganaga arigendera . Nuko Koruneli ahamagara abagaragu babiri bo mu rugo rwe , n'umwe mu basirikari bamukoreraga wari umuntu wubaha Imana .
44010008	Amaze kubatekerereza ibyo byose abohereza i Yope .
44010009	Bukeye bwaho bakiri mu nzira , bageze hafi y'umujyi wa Yope , Petero ni bwo yuriraga ajya hejuru y'inzu gusenga , ubwo hari mu masaa sita .
44010010	Atangira gusonza ashaka kurya . Mu gihe bategura ibyokurya , agira atya aratwarwa .
44010011	Abona ijuru rikingutse , ikintu kimeze nk'umwenda munini urambuye , gifashwe ku mitwe ine , kimanuka kiza ku isi .
44010012	Muri cyo harimo amoko yose y'amatungo n'inyamaswa n'ibikururuka hasi n'inyoni .
44010013	Yumva ijwi ry'umubwira ati : “ Petero , haguruka ubage urye ! ”
44010014	Ariko Petero aravuga ati : “ Oya Nyagasani ! Sinigeze kurya ikintu cyose kitaribwa cyangwa gihumanye . ”
44010015	Yumva iryo jwi ry'umubwira ubwa kabiri ati : “ Ibyo Imana yahumanuye ntukabyite ibihumanye ! ”
44010016	Biba bityo gatatu , cya kintu giherako gisubizwa mu ijuru .
44010017	Nuko Petero acyibaza ku byo yeretswe ngo amenye icyo bishaka kuvuga , aboherejwe na Koruneli bari bayoboje aho urugo rwa Simoni ruherereye , baba bageze ku muryango .
44010018	Barahamagara barabaza bati : “ Mbese hari umushyitsi uri hano witwa Simoni Petero ? ”
44010019	Mu gihe Petero atekereza ku byo yeretswe , ni bwo Mwuka amubwiye ati : “ Dore hano hari abantu batatu bagushaka .
44010020	None haguruka umanuke , ujyane na bo utagira icyo wishisha kuko ari jye wabohereje . ”
44010021	Ubwo Petero aramanuka asanga abo bagabo , arababwira ati : “ Uwo mushaka ni jye . Muragenzwa n'iki ? ”
44010022	Baramusubiza bati : “ Twatumwe n'umukapiteni Koruneli . Ni umuntu w'intungane , wubaha Imana kandi ashimwa cyane n'ubwoko bwose bw'Abayahudi . Yabwiwe n'umwe mu bamarayika baziranenge kugutumira iwe ngo yumve icyo umubwira . ”
44010023	Petero ni ko kubinjiza mu nzu arabacumbikira . Bukeye , arahaguruka ajyana na bo . Abavandimwe bamwe b'i Yope baramuherekeza .
44010024	Bukeye bwaho Petero agera i Kayizariya , asanga Koruneli abategereje ari kumwe na bene wabo , n'incuti ze z'amagara yari yatumiye .
44010025	Petero agiye kwinjira mu nzu Koruneli aramusanganira , yikubita hasi imbere ye aramuramya .
44010026	Ariko Petero aramwegura agira ati : “ Haguruka ! Nanjye ndi umuntu nkawe . ”
44010027	Yinjirana na Koruneli mu nzu bavugana , asanga hateraniye abantu benshi .
44010028	Arababwira ati : “ Muzi neza ko nta Muyahudi wemererwa n'idini kugirana umubano n'abanyamahanga , haba no kugera mu ngo zabo . Nyamara Imana yanyeretse ko nta muntu nkwiriye kunena cyangwa ngo mufate nk'uhumanye .
44010029	Ni na yo mpamvu mumaze kuntumira , nahise nza n'umutima ukunze . None ndababaza icyo mwantumiriye . ”
44010030	Koruneli aravuga ati : “ Ejo bundi buriya nko muri aya masaha , mbese nk'isaa cyenda , nari ndi mu nzu nsenga . Ngiye kubona mbona umugabo wambaye imyenda irabagirana ahagaze imbere yanjye .
44010031	Aravuga ati : ‘ Koruneli ! Imana yumvise amasengesho yawe , kimwe n'ubuntu ugirira abakene birayishimisha .
44010032	Nuko none ohereza abantu i Yope , utumire uwitwa Simoni wahimbwe Petero . Ubu acumbitse kwa Simoni w'umukannyi utuye ku nyanja . ’
44010033	Mperako rero ngutumaho , nawe ugize neza ko uje . Ubu twese turi hano imbere y'Imana , kugira ngo twumve ibintu byose Nyagasani yagutumye kutubwira . ”
44010034	Nuko Petero aratangira aravuga ati : “ Ni ukuri mbonye ko Imana ifata abantu bose kimwe .
44010035	Yemera uwo mu bwoko bwose uyubaha agakora ibitunganye .
44010036	Imana yoherereje urubyaro rwa Isiraheli Ubutumwa bwiza bw'amahoro abonerwa muri Yezu Kristo , ari we Mutegetsi wa bose .
44010037	Muzi ibyabaye muri Galileya bigakwira no mu ntara yose ya Yudeya , Yohani amaze kwamamaza ibyerekeye kubatizwa .
44010038	Muzi n'ibya Yezu w'i Nazareti , ukuntu Imana yamusutseho Mwuka Muziranenge , ikamuha n'ububasha akagenda hose agirira abantu neza , akiza abo Satani yatwazaga igitugu bose bitewe n'uko Imana yari kumwe na we .
44010039	Kandi rero ni twe bagabo b'ibyo yakoze byose , i Yeruzalemu n'ahandi mu gihugu cy'Abayahudi . Baramwishe bamubambye ku musaraba .
44010040	Ariko Imana imuzura ku munsi wa gatatu imuha kwiyerekana .
44010041	Ntiyiyereka rubanda rwose , ahubwo yiyereka abagabo Imana yatoranyije mbere ngo bahamye ibye , abo ni twe twasangiye na we amaze kuzuka .
44010042	Nuko adutegeka kwamamaza ibye muri rubanda , no kwemeza ko ari we washyizweho n'Imana kuba umucamanza w'abazima n'abapfuye .
44010043	Abahanuzi bose bemeje ibya Yezu , bavuga ko kubera ububasha bwe buri wese umwizera ababarirwa ibyaha bye . ”
44010044	Petero akivuga ibyo Mwuka Muziranenge amanukira ku bumvaga amagambo ye bose .
44010045	Abemeye Yezu bo mu Bayahudi bari bavanye i Yope na Petero , batangazwa cyane no kubona abo mu yandi mahanga Imana ibagabira impano ari yo Mwuka Muziranenge ,
44010046	kuko bumvaga bavuga indimi zindi kandi baha Imana ikuzo . Petero aravuga ati :
44010047	“ Aba bantu bahawe Mwuka Muziranenge nk'uko natwe twamuhawe . None se hari uwabima amazi ngo be kubatizwa ? ”
44010048	Nuko ategeka ko babatizwa mu izina rya Yezu Kristo , maze basaba Petero kugumana na bo nibura iminsi mike .
44011001	Intumwa za Kristo n'abavandimwe bari muri Yudeya yose bumva ko n'abatari Abayahudi bakiriye Ijambo ry'Imana .
44011002	Nuko Petero agarutse i Yeruzalemu abavugaga ko gukebwa ari ngombwa bamugisha impaka , baramunegura bati :
44011003	“ Ubonye ngo uragenderera abatakebwe ukanasangira na bo ? ”
44011004	Petero abatekerereza uko byagenze kose abikuye ruhande ati :
44011005	“ Nari mu mujyi w'i Yope nsenga maze ndabonekerwa . Mbona ikintu cyamanukaga gisa n'umwenda munini urambuye , gifashwe ku mitwe ine . Kiva mu ijuru kingera iruhande .
44011006	Nkirungurutsemo mbona amatungo n'ibikoko n'ibikururuka hasi n'inyoni .
44011007	Nuko numva ijwi ry'umbwira ati : ‘ Petero , haguruka ubage urye ! ’
44011008	Ndamusubiza nti ‘ Oya Nyagasani ! Sinigeze nkoza mu kanwa ikintu cyose kitaribwa cyangwa gihumanya ! ’
44011009	Nongera kumva iryo jwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru ati : ‘ Icyo Imana yahumanuye ntukacyite igihumanya . ’
44011010	Ibyo bisubirwamo gatatu , hanyuma ibyo bintu byose bisubizwa mu ijuru .
44011011	Ako kanya abagabo batatu bantumweho baraza baturutse i Kayizariya , baba bageze ku nzu nari ncumbitsemo .
44011012	Mwuka ambwira kujyana na bo nta kugingimiranya . Abo bavandimwe batandatu b'i Yope turajyana , twinjira mu nzu ya Koruneli .
44011013	Adutekerereza ukuntu yabonye umumarayika ageze iwe , akamubwira ati : ‘ Ohereza umuntu i Yope , utumize Simoni wahimbwe Petero .
44011014	Azakubwira uburyo wowe n'abo mu rugo rwawe mwese mwakizwa . ’
44011015	Ngitangira kuvuga Mwuka Muziranenge aramanuka abajyaho , nk'uko natwe yatujeho rugikubita .
44011016	Ni bwo nibutse icyo Nyagasani yigeze kuvuga ati : ‘ Yohani yabatirishije amazi , ariko mwebwe muzabatirishwa Mwuka Muziranenge . ’
44011017	None rero niba Imana yarabagabiye impano imwe n'iyo natwe twahawe cya gihe twemeraga Nyagasani Yezu Kristo , ndi nde wo kurwanya imigambi yayo ? ”
44011018	Babyumvise batyo bahita batuza , maze basingiza Imana bati : “ Erega n'abatari Abayahudi Imana yabashoboje kwihana kugira ngo bagire ubugingo buhoraho ! ”
44011019	Abemera Kristo batatanijwe n'amakuba yabaye igihe Sitefano yicwaga . Bamwe muri bo bagiye muri Fenisiya , abandi muri Shipure n'abandi Antiyokiya , batangariza Ijambo ry'Imana Abayahudi bonyine .
44011020	Nyamara bamwe muri abo bigishwa ba Kristo bakomokaga muri Shipure no muri Sirene , bageze Antiyokiya bavugana n'abatari Abayahudi , babagezaho Ubutumwa bwiza bwerekeye Nyagasani Yezu .
44011021	Ububasha bwa Nyagasani bwari kuri bo , bigatuma abantu benshi bamwemera bakamuyoboka .
44011022	Iyo nkuru igera ku itorero rya Kristo ry'i Yeruzalemu , maze bohereza Barinaba Antiyokiya .
44011023	Agezeyo abona ukuntu Imana yahaye abo bantu umugisha biramushimisha , ni ko kubihanangiriza ngo bakomere kuri Nyagasani babikuye ku mutima .
44011024	Barinaba yari umuntu mwiza wuzuye Mwuka Muziranenge no kwizera Kristo . Bityo abantu benshi biyongera ku bemeraga Nyagasani .
44011025	Barinaba aherako ajya i Tarisi gushaka Sawuli .
44011026	Amubonye bagarukana Antiyokiya . Bamara umwaka wose mu itorero rya Kristo ryaho , bigisha abantu benshi . Abigishwa ba Kristo b'i Antiyokiya ni bo babaye aba mbere mu kwitwa “ Abakristo ” .
44011027	Icyo gihe habonetse abahanuzi bavuye i Yeruzalemu , bajya Antiyokiya .
44011028	Umwe muri bo witwaga Agabo akoreshejwe na Mwuka w'Imana , arahaguruka ahanura ko ku isi yose hagiye gutera inzara ikomeye ( koko ni ko byabaye ku ngoma y'umwami w'i Roma witwa Kilawudiyo ) .
44011029	Noneho abigishwa ba Kristo bakurikije uko umuntu wese yifite , biyemeza kugira icyo batanga cyo gufasha abavandimwe bari batuye muri Yudeya .
44011030	Babigenza batyo izo mfashanyo baziha Barinaba na Sawuli , na bo bazishyikiriza abakuru b'Umuryango wa Kristo i Yeruzalemu .
44012001	Muri icyo gihe Umwami Herodi atangira kugirira nabi abantu bamwe bo mu Muryango wa Kristo .
44012002	Ategeka ko bicisha inkota Yakobo mwene se wa Yohani .
44012003	Abonye ko ibyo bishimishije Abayahudi , ariyongeza afatisha na Petero . Ibyo byabaye mu minsi mikuru Abayahudi baryagamo imigati idasembuye .
44012004	Amaze kumufata amushyira muri gereza . Ategeka amatsinda ane y'abasirikari bane bane ngo bajye bakuranwa kumurinda . Yashakaga kuzamushyira mu ruhame nyuma y'iminsi mikuru ya Pasika .
44012005	Nuko Petero arindirwa muri gereza . Ariko ab'Umuryango wa Kristo bakomeza kumusabira ku Mana bashyizeho umwete .
44012006	Herodi araye ari bumujyane gucirwa urubanza , Petero yari asinziriye azirikishijwe iminyururu ibiri , ari hagati y'abarinzi babiri . Hari n'abandi barinzi ku rugi rwa gereza .
44012007	Nuko umumarayika wa Nyagasani aratunguka , maze umucyo ukwira muri iyo nzu . Uwo mumarayika akomanga Petero mu rubavu , aramukangura aramubwira ati : “ Byuka bwangu ! ” Iminyururu ihita imuva ku maboko iragwa .
44012008	Umumarayika aramubwira ati : “ Kenyera ushyiremo n'inkweto ! ” Abigenza atyo . Umumarayika ni ko kumubwira ati : “ Ifubike umwitero wawe unkurikire ! ”
44012009	Petero aramukurikira bava aho . Ariko ntiyari azi ko ibyo umumarayika akoze ari ibimubayeho koko , ahubwo yibwiraga ko arota .
44012010	Banyura ku barinzi ba mbere no ku ba kabiri , bagera ku rugi rw'icyuma rwo ku irembo ryerekera mu mujyi . Rugira rutya rurabikingurira barasohoka , banyura umuhanda umwe wo mu mujyi . Ako kanya umumarayika amusiga aho .
44012011	Nuko Petero agaruye umutima aravuga ati : “ Noneho menye by'ukuri ko Nyagasani yohereje umumarayika we , akankiza amaboko ya Herodi n'imigambi yose y'Abayahudi . ”
44012012	Amaze kumenya neza aho ari , ajya kwa Mariya nyina wa Yohani bitaga Mariko , aho abantu benshi bari bateraniye basenga .
44012013	Petero akomanga ku rugi rwo ku irembo , maze umukobwa w'umuja witwaga Roda ajya kumva uwo ari we .
44012014	Amenya ijwi rya Petero maze ibyishimo bimubuza kumukingurira , ahubwo asubirayo yiruka abwira abandi ko Petero ahagaze ku rugi .
44012015	Baramubwira bati : “ Wasaze ! ” Ariko ababwira akomeje ko ari iby'ukuri . Bo rero baravuga bati : “ Si we , ni umumarayika we ! ”
44012016	Nyamara Petero akomeza gukomanga . Bigeza aho baza gukingura , baramubona barumirwa .
44012017	Arabacecekesha maze abatekerereza uko Nyagasani yamukuye muri gereza . Nyuma arababwira ati : “ Mubimenyeshe Yakobo n'abandi bavandimwe . ” Nuko Petero arasohoka yigira ahandi hantu .
44012018	Bukeye haba impagarara nyinshi mu basirikari , bibaza ibyabaye kuri Petero .
44012019	Herodi amushakisha hose ariko ntiyamubona . Ni bwo yategetse ko babaza abarinzi b'imbohe , hanyuma bakabica . Birangiye Herodi ava muri Yudeya amara iminsi i Kayizariya .
44012020	Herodi yari arakariye cyane abaturage b'i Tiri n'i Sidoni . Nuko bo bahuza inama baramusanga , maze bashaka amaboko kuri Bulasito umutware w'abanyanzu b'Umwami , basaba umwami amahoro kuko bahahiraga mu gihugu cye .
44012021	Ku munsi wagenwe Herodi yambara imyambaro ya cyami , yicara ahirengeye maze afata ijambo aganirira rubanda .
44012022	Nuko batera hejuru bati : “ Erega si umuntu uvuga , ahubwo ni imwe mu mana ! ”
44012023	Ako kanya umumarayika wa Nyagasani aramukubita agwa inyo arapfa , kuko yari yihaye icyubahiro gikwiye Imana .
44012024	Nyamara ijambo ry'Imana rirushaho kwamamara .
44012025	Barinaba na Sawuli barangije umurimo wabo bava i Yeruzalemu basubira Antiyokiya , bari kumwe na Yohani witwaga Mariko .
44013001	Mu itorero rya Kristo rya Antiyokiya , habaga abahanuzi n'abigisha , ari bo Barinaba na Simeyoni uwo bitaga Rukara , na Lukiyo wo muri Sirene , na Manaheni wari wareranywe n'Umutware Herodi na Sawuli .
44013002	Igihe basengaga Nyagasani bigomwe kurya , Mwuka Muziranenge arababwira ati : “ Nimuntoranyirize Barinaba na Sawuli bajye gukora umurimo nabahamagariye . ”
44013003	Nuko bigomwa kurya barasenga , hanyuma babarambikaho ibiganza barabohereza .
44013004	Barinaba na Sawuli batumwe na Mwuka Muziranenge bajya i Selukiya , aho bafata ubwato bagana kuri Shipure .
44013005	Bageze ku cyambu cya Salamina , bavuga ijambo ry'Imana mu nsengero z'Abayahudi . Yohani Mariko na we yari kumwe na bo abafasha .
44013006	Bambukiranya ikirwa cyose bagera i Pafo , bahasanga umupfumu w'Umuyahudi wahanuraga ibinyoma witwaga Bariyezu .
44013007	Yabaga kwa Serugiyo Pawulo , Umunyaroma w'umunyabwenge wategekaga icyo kirwa . Uwo mutegetsi atumiza Barinaba na Sawuli , kuko yashakaga kumva Ijambo ry'Imana .
44013008	Uwo mupfumu Eluma ( ni ko Bariyezu yitwa mu Kigereki ) arabarwanya , agerageza kuyobya umutegetsi ngo atemera Kristo .
44013009	Nyamara Sawuli ari we Pawulo yuzuye Mwuka Muziranenge , ahanga ijisho uwo mupfumu aramubwira ati :
44013010	“ Yewe mwana wa Satani , mwanzi w'ubutungane bwose wuzuye uburiganya n'amahugu , uzageza he gusiba amayira ajya kuri Nyagasani ?
44013011	None dore Nyagasani abanguye ukuboko ngo agukubite , urafatwa n'ubuhumyi umare iminsi utareba izuba . ” Ako kanya Eluma aba nk'uri mu mwijima , arahumagurika ashaka abamurandata .
44013012	Wa mutegetsi abonye ibibaye atangazwa n'inyigisho za Nyagasani , maze aramwemera .
44013013	Pawulo n'abo bari kumwe binjirira mu bwato i Pafo , bafata hakurya i Periga ho muri Pamfiliya , Yohani Mariko we abasiga aho yisubirira i Yeruzalemu .
44013014	Bo bava i Periga barakomeza , maze bataha Antiyokiya ho muri Pisidiya . Ku munsi w'isabato binjira mu rusengero baricara .
44013015	Bamaze gusoma mu gitabo cy'Amategeko n'Abahanuzi , abayobozi b'urusengero babatumaho bati : “ Bavandimwe , turagira ngo mugire icyo mubwira abantu bacu , niba hari ufite ijambo ryo kubahugura . ”
44013016	Pawulo arahaguruka arambura ukuboko abasaba gutuza , arababwira ati : “ Bisiraheli n'abandi mwese mwubaha Imana , nimunyumve .
44013017	Imana y'uyu muryango wa Isiraheli yatoranyije ba sogokuruza ibagira ubwoko bukomeye , igihe bari abasuhuke mu gihugu cya Misiri , nyuma ibakuzayo ukuboko kwayo gukomeye .
44013018	Nuko imara imyaka mirongo ine yihanganira ingeso zabo igihe bari mu butayu .
44013019	Imana imaze kurimbura amahanga arindwi mu gihugu cya Kanāni , ikigabira abantu bayo kiba igihugu cyabo bwite ,
44013020	bakimaramo imyaka magana ane na mirongo itanu . “ Nyuma y'ibyo ibaha abacamanza bo kubategeka kugeza mu gihe cy'umuhanuzi Samweli .
44013021	Ubwo ni bwo basabye umwami wo kubategeka , Imana ibaha Sawuli mwene Kishi wo mu muryango wa Benyamini , abategeka imyaka mirongo ine .
44013022	Imana imaze kumukuraho ishyiraho Dawidi kugira ngo ababere umwami , iramuhamya iti : ‘ Niboneye Dawidi mwene Yese , umuntu unogeye uzakora ibyo nshaka byose . ’
44013023	Yezu ukomoka kuri Dawidi uwo , ni we Imana yagize Umukiza w'Abisiraheli nk'uko yabisezeranye .
44013024	Nuko Yezu atarasesekara aho , Yohani yatangarizaga Abisiraheli bose ko bagomba kwihana ngo babatizwe .
44013025	Nuko Yohani ajya kurangiza umurimo we abaza abantu ati : ‘ Muragira ngo ndi nde ? Sindi uwo mukeka . Ahubwo dore hari uje ankurikiye , ntibinankwiriye kumukuramo inkweto . ’
44013026	“ Bavandimwe , rubyaro rwa Aburahamu n'abandi bo muri mwe mwubaha Imana , ubu Butumwa bw'agakiza ni twe bwagenewe .
44013027	Abatuye i Yeruzalemu n'abategetsi babo ntibasobanukiwe Yezu uwo ari we , ntibanasobanukiwe ibyo abahanuzi bahanuye kuri we kandi bisomwa mu nsengero buri sabato . Nyamara babisohoje ubwabo igihe bamuciraga urwo gupfa .
44013028	Nubwo batabonye impamvu yo kumwicisha , basabye Pilato kumwica .
44013029	Bamaze gukora nk'uko byanditswe kuri we kose , bamumanura ku musaraba yabambweho bamushyira mu mva .
44013030	Ariko Imana iramuzura .
44013031	Amara iminsi myinshi abonekera abo bari baragendanye kuva i Galileya kugera i Yeruzalemu , ubu ni bo bagabo bo guhamya ibyo muri rubanda .
44013032	None tubazaniye inkuru nziza : icyo Imana yasezeranyije ba sogokuruza ,
44013033	yarakidukoreye twebwe abana babo ubwo yazuraga Yezu , nk'uko byanditswe muri zaburi ya kabiri ngo
44013034	Imana yavuze kandi ko izamuzura mu bapfuye , kugira ngo atazasubira ukundi mu mva ngo abore , ibivuga itya iti : ‘ Nzabaha ibyiza bitagira amakemwa kandi bidahinyuka , ibyo nasezeraniye Dawidi . ’
44013035	Ni cyo gituma no mu yindi zaburi havuga ngo ‘ Ntuzemera ko ugutunganiye abora . ’
44013036	Dawidi we yakoze ibyo Imana ishaka mu gihe cye , maze arasaza ashyingurwa hamwe na ba sekuruza arabora .
44013037	Ariko uwo Imana yazuye ntiyigeze abora .
44013038	Noneho bavandimwe , mumenye ko ari ku bwa Yezu uwo mwagejejweho iyo nkuru yo kubabarirwa ibyaha . Ku bwe kandi buri wese muri mwe umwemera agirwa intungane imbere yImana ku byamushinjaga byose , kandi bitari kubashobokera mwishingikirije ku Mategeko ya Musa . Noneho bavandimwe , mumenye ko ari ku bwa Yezu uwo mwagejejweho iyo nkuru yo kubabarirwa ibyaha . Ku bwe kandi buri wese muri mwe umwemera agirwa intungane imbere yImana ku byamushinjaga byose , kandi bitari kubashobokera mwishingikirije ku Mategeko ya Musa .
44013039	
44013040	Muririnde rero kugira ngo ibyavuzwe nabahanuzi bitababaho bagira bati :
44013041	‘ Mwa banyagasuzuguro mwe , nimwitegereze , nimutangare maze mwipfire ! Muri iki gihe cyanyu ngiye gukora igitangaza , ntimuzacyemera nubwo hagira ukibabwira . ’ ”
44013042	Pawulo na Barinaba basohotse mu rusengero , abo bantu babasaba kuzongera kubabwira bene ayo magambo ku isabato itaha .
44013043	Iteraniro rimaze gusezererwa , benshi bo mu Bayahudi n'abandi bemeye idini yabo bakurikira Pawulo na Barinaba , ni ko kuvugana na bo babatera umwete wo gukomeza kwishingikiriza ku buntu Imana igira .
44013044	Ku isabato yakurikiyeho , hafi y'abantu bose batuye umujyi barakorana ngo bumve Ijambo ry'Imana .
44013045	Abayahudi babonye icyo kivunge cy'abantu ishyari rirabashengura , ni ko guhinyura ibyo Pawulo yavugaga baranamusebya .
44013046	Nuko Pawulo na Barinaba babasubiza bashize amanga bati : “ Byari bikwiriye ko ari mwe mubanza kubwirwa Ijambo ry'Imana . Ariko kuko muryanze kandi mukabona ko mudakwiriye ubugingo buhoraho , dore twisangiye ab'andi mahanga .
44013047	Ni na ko Nyagasani yadutegetse ati :
44013048	Abatari Abayahudi babyumvise baranezerwa , bishimira Ijambo rya Nyagasani . Abari bagenewe ubugingo buhoraho bose bemera Kristo .
44013049	Ijambo rya Nyagasani rikwira muri icyo gihugu cyose .
44013050	Ariko Abayahudi boshya abagore bubaha Imana b'abanyacyubahiro n'abantu bakomeye bo mu mujyi , bateza abantu gutoteza Barinaba na Pawulo , bageza aho babirukana mu ntara yabo .
44013051	Na bo bahungura umukungugu wo mu birenge byabo , barawubasigira maze bīgira mu mujyi witwa Ikoniyo .
44013052	Abigishwa ba Kristo bo mu mujyi wa Antiyokiya basigaye buzuye ibyishimo na Mwuka Muziranenge .
44014001	Ni ko byagenze bageze Ikoniyo , Pawulo na Barinaba binjiye mu rusengero rw'Abayahudi , maze bavugana na bo ku buryo Abayahudi n'abatari Abayahudi benshi cyane bemeye Kristo .
44014002	Ariko Abayahudi bari banze kumwemera bateye imidugararo mu batari Abayahudi , babatera kumerera nabi abo bavandimwe .
44014003	Nuko Pawulo na Barinaba bahamara igihe kitari gito bavuga ibya Nyagasani bashize amanga , na we abaha gukora ibitangaza no gutanga ibimenyetso byemeza ibyo bavugaga byerekeye ubuntu bw'Imana .
44014004	Abatuye uwo mujyi bicamo ibice , bamwe bajya ku ruhande rw'Abayahudi , abandi ku rw'Intumwa za Kristo .
44014005	Nuko Abayahudi n'abatari bo bajya inama n'abatware babo , kugira ngo bagirire nabi Pawulo na Barinaba babatere amabuye .
44014006	Abo babimenye bahungira mu mijyi ya Lisitira na Derube yo muri Likawoniya , no mu karere gahereranye na yo .
44014007	Aho ngaho bakomeza kuhatangaza inkuru nziza ya Kristo .
44014008	I Lisitira hari umugabo wari waravutse aremaye ibirenge , ntiyigera abasha gutambuka .
44014009	Yicaye aho atega Pawulo amatwi . Pawulo amwitegereje abona yizeye gukira indwara ,
44014010	amubwira mu ijwi riranguruye ati : “ Haguruka uhagarare wemye ! ” Arabaduka aragenda .
44014011	Aho hari imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu , babonye icyo Pawulo yakoze barangurura amajwi , bavuga mu rurimi rwo muri Likawoniya bati : “ Imana zifite ishusho y'abantu zatumanukiye ! ”
44014012	Barinaba bamwita Zewu , na Pawulo bamwita Herume , kuko ari we wakundaga gufata ijambo .
44014013	Ingoro ya ya mana yabo Zewu yari inyuma y'umujyi . Nuko umutambyi wayo azana ku irembo ibimasa bitatse indabyo , kubera ko we na rubanda bashakaga gutura ibitambo izo Ntumwa za Yezu .
44014014	Ariko Barinaba na Pawulo bumvise ibyo bashaka kubakorera , bahita bashishimura imyambaro yabo kubera umubabaro , biroha muri iyo nteko y'abantu bakōmēra bati :
44014015	“ Mwa bagabo mwe , ibyo ni ibiki mushaka gukora ? Natwe turi abantu nkamwe . Tubazaniye Ubutumwa bwiza ngo mureke ibyo bintu bitagira akamaro , muhindukirire Imana nzima yaremye ijuru n'isi n'inyanja n'ibirimo byose .
44014016	Mu bihe byashize yaretse amahanga yose akora ibyo yishakiye .
44014017	Nyamara ntiyareka gutanga ibimenyetso bihamya ukugira neza kwayo : kubavubira imvura no kubaha umusaruro mu gihe gikwiriye , no kubahaza ibibatunga n'ibibashimisha . ”
44014018	Nubwo izo Ntumwa za Kristo zavuze zityo , ntibyazoroheye kubuza iyo mbaga y'abantu kuzitura ibitambo .
44014019	Bigeze aho haza Abayahudi bamwe bavuye muri Antiyokiya no muri Ikoniyo , bigarurira abo bantu bose , batera Pawulo amabuye ngo bamwice . Nyuma bamukururira inyuma y'umujyi batekereza ko yapfuye .
44014020	Ariko igihe abigishwa ba Kristo bamukikije , arahaguruka asubira mu mujyi . Bukeye ajyana na Barinaba i Derube .
44014021	Pawulo na Barinaba bamamaza inkuru nziza ya Yezu i Derube , maze bahabona abigishwa benshi . Hanyuma basubira i Lisitira na Ikoniyo na Antiyokiya ho muri Pisidiya .
44014022	Bakomeza abigishwa ba Kristo baho , babatera umwete kugira ngo bakomere ku kwizera Kristo bababwira bati : “ Ni ngombwa ko tunyura mu makuba menshi ngo tubone kwinjira mu bwami bw'Imana . ”
44014023	Batoranya abakuru muri buri koraniro ry'Umuryango wa Kristo , bamaze gusenga no kwigomwa kurya babaragiza Nyagasani bari baremeye .
44014024	Bambukiranya akarere kose ka Pisidiya , bagera mu ntara ya Pamfiliya .
44014025	Bamaze kubwira ab'i Periga Ijambo ry'Imana , baramanuka bagera ahitwa Ataliya ,
44014026	bavayo bafata ubwato bagana Antiyokiya ho muri Siriya , aho ba bavandimwe bari barabaragirije Imana , ngo ibagirire ubuntu bwo kubashoboza gukora uwo murimo bari barangije .
44014027	Bagezeyo bakoranya itorero rya Kristo ryaho ryose , baritekerereza ibyo Imana yabakoresheje byose , n'uburyo yugururiye irembo abatari Abayahudi ngo binjire mu bemera Kristo .
44014028	Nuko bamarana igihe kitari gito n'abigishwa ba Kristo .
44015001	Abantu bamwe bavuye muri Yudeya basanga abavandimwe bo mu mujyi wa Antiyokiya , barabigisha bati : “ Ntimubasha gukizwa niba mudakebwe mukurikije umuhango twasigiwe na Musa . ”
44015002	Pawulo na Barinaba babyumvise bajya impaka na bo zitoroshye , barabavuguruza . Noneho abo bavandimwe batoranya Pawulo na Barinaba hamwe n'abandi bo muri bo , ngo bajye i Yeruzalemu kugisha inama Intumwa za Kristo n'abakuru ku byerekeye icyo kibazo .
44015003	Nuko ab'itorero rya Kristo babaha ibyo kubafasha mu rugendo , bambukiranya intara za Fenisiya na Samariya bagenda bavuga ukuntu abatari Abayahudi bahindukiriye Imana , iyo nkuru inyura abavandimwe bose .
44015004	Bageze i Yeruzalemu bakirwa n'itorero rya Kristo ryaho n'Intumwa za Kristo n'abakuru , babatekerereza ibyo Imana yabakoresheje .
44015005	Ariko bamwe bo mu ishyaka ry'Abafarizayi bari bemeye Kristo , barahaguruka baravuga bati : “ Abo banyamahanga bagomba gukebwa no gutegekwa gukurikiza Amategeko ya Musa . ”
44015006	Intumwa za Kristo n'abakuru bakoranywa no gusuzuma icyo kibazo .
44015007	Bamaze umwanya bajya impaka , Petero arahaguruka arababwira ati : “ Bavandimwe , muzi yuko kera Imana yantoranyije muri mwe ngo ntangaze Ubutumwa bwayo bwiza mu banyamahanga , kugira ngo babwumve babwemere .
44015008	Ariko Imana yo izi imitima y'abantu itanga icyemezo ko yemeye abo banyamahanga , igihe yabahaga Mwuka Muziranenge nk'uko natwe yamuduhaye .
44015009	Nta tandukaniro Imana yashyize hagati yacu na bo , ahubwo yatunganyije imitima yabo kubera ko bayizeye .
44015010	None rero kuki mushaka kugerageza Imana , mukorera abo bigishwa ba Kristo umutwaro tutabashije kwikorera natwe ubwacu , habe n'ababyeyi bacu ?
44015011	Ahubwo twemera ko ari twe ari na bo , twese twakijijwe kubera ubuntu Nyagasani Yezu Kristo yatugiriye . ”
44015012	Iryo teraniro ryose riraceceka , ryumva Barinaba na Pawulo baritekerereza ibimenyetso Imana yatanze n'ibitangaza yabakoresheje mu banyamahanga .
44015013	Bamaze kuvuga Yakobo afata ijambo ati : “ Bavandimwe , nimunyumve .
44015014	Simoni Petero yadutekerereje ukuntu Imana yagendereye abanyamahanga rugikubita , ibatoranyamo abo kuba abantu bayo ,
44015015	ibyo bikaba bihuje n'ibyavuzwe n'abahanuzi nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo
44015016	‘ Nyuma yibyo nzagaruka , nzavugurura ingoma ya Dawidi imeze nkinzu yasenyutse , ahasenyutse nzahasana nyihagarike .
44015017	Abantu bazacika ku icumu bazansanga , amahanga yose yahoze ari ayanjye azansanga . ’ Uko ni ko Nyagasani avuga ,
44015018	wabitangaje kuva kera kose . ”
44015019	Yakobo arakomeza ati : “ Ndemeza ko tutashyira amananiza ku banyamahanga bahindukirira Imana .
44015020	Ahubwo tubandikire kugira ngo birinde ibyahumanijwe kubera ko byatuwe ibigirwamana , birinde n'ubusambanyi no kurya inyama z'ibyanizwe , birinde no kunywa amaraso .
44015021	Erega kuva kera kose , mu mijyi yose Musa afite abatangaza Amategeko ye , bakayasomera mu nsengero buri sabato ! ”
44015022	Nuko Intumwa za Kristo n'abakuru n'ab'Umuryango we bose biyemeza kwitoramo bamwe ngo babohereze Antiyokiya , bajyanye na Pawulo na Barinaba . Batoranyije Yuda witwaga Barisaba na Silasi , abagabo babiri b'imena mu bavandimwe .
44015023	Babaha urwandiko ruvuga ruti :
44015024	Twumvise ko bamwe muri twe babaroshyemo amagambo yo kubakura imitima , kandi tutigeze tubatuma .
44015025	None twese twahuje umugambi wo gutoranya abo kubatumaho . Bazanye na Barinaba na Pawulo dukunda cyane ,
44015026	bahaze amagara yabo kugira ngo bakorere Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
44015027	Ngabo rero Yuda na Silasi ni bo tubatumyeho , ngo mubonane imbonankubone babibwirire ibyo tubandikiye .
44015028	Byanogeye Mwuka Muziranenge kimwe natwe kutabashyiraho umutwaro urenze aya mategeko ya ngombwa :
44015029	mwirinde kurya inyama zatuwe ibigirwamana nizibyanizwe , no kunywa amaraso ndetse no gusambana . Nimureka gukora ibyo muzaba mugenje neza . Tubasezeyeho . ”
44015030	Nuko abari batumwe berekeza iya Antiyokiya , bagezeyo bakoranya ab'itorero rya Kristo babashyikiriza urwandiko .
44015031	Bamaze kurubasomera , abantu bose bishimira ubwo butumwa bubakomeza .
44015032	Yuda na Silasi ubwabo bari abahanuzi , ni ko kuvugana n'abo bavandimwe byinshi bibahugura bikanabakomeza .
44015033	Bamarana na bo iminsi , hanyuma babasezeraho basubira ku babatumye , abo bavandimwe bamaze kubifuriza urugendo ruhire . [
44015034	Icyakora Silasi yiyemeza kuguma aho . ]

44015036	Hashize iminsi Pawulo abwira Barinaba ati : “ Reka dusubireyo dusure abavandimwe bo mu mijyi yose aho twatangaje Ijambo rya Nyagasani , turebe uko bameze . ”
44015037	Ubwo Barinaba yashakaga ko bajyana na Yohani witwaga Mariko ,
44015038	ariko Pawulo asanga atari byiza kujyana na we kuko yigeze kubatererana muri Pamfiliya , ntagumane na bo ngo barangize umurimo .

44015041	Anyura muri Siriya na Silisiya akomeza amatorero ya Kristo .
44016001	Nuko Pawulo agera i Derube hanyuma ajya i Lisitira . Aho hari hatuye umwigishwa wa Kristo akitwa Timoteyo , nyina akaba Umuyahudikazi wemera Yezu naho se akaba Umugereki .
44016002	Yashimwaga n'abavandimwe b'i Lisitira n'abo muri Ikoniyo .
44016003	Pawulo yifuzaga kujyana na we , maze aramukeba kubera Abayahudi bari aho hantu , kuko bose bari bazi ko se wa Timoteyo ari Umugereki .
44016004	Uko banyuraga mu mujyi , bagezaga ku baho ibyemezo byafashwe n'Intumwa za Kristo hamwe n'abakuru bari i Yeruzalemu , kandi bakabasaba kubikurikiza .
44016005	Bituma amatorero akomera ku kwemera Kristo kandi akiyongera uko bukeye .
44016006	Nuko bambukiranya intara ya Furujiya n'iya Galati , kuko Mwuka Muziranenge yari yababujije kuvuga Ijambo ry'Imana mu ntara ya Aziya .
44016007	Bageze ku mbibi za Misiya bagerageza kujya mu ntara ya Bitiniya , ariko Mwuka wa Yezu ntiyabakundira .
44016008	Bamaze kwambukiranya Misiya , baramanuka bagera i Tirowa .
44016009	Muri iryo joro Imana yereka Pawulo umugabo wo mu ntara ya Masedoniya . Uwo mugabo aramwinginga ati : “ Ambuka uze muri Masedoniya udutabare ” .
44016010	Pawulo akimara kubonekerwa twahise dushaka uko twakomeza ngo tujye muri Masedoniya , kuko byagaragaraga ko ari Imana iduhamagariye kujya kubwira abaho Ubutumwa bwayo bwiza .
44016011	Nuko tuva i Tirowa mu bwato , twahuranya inyanja dufata i Samotirasi , bukeye turakomeza tugera i Neyapoli .

44016013	Ku munsi w'isabato tuva mu mujyi tujya ku mugezi , ahantu twatekerezaga ko abantu basengera . Nuko turicara tuganira n'abagore bari bahakoraniye .
44016014	Umwe muri bo witwaga Lidiya wo mu mujyi wa Tiyatira , yari umucuruzi w'imyenda itukura ihenda . Yari asanzwe asenga Imana maze adutega amatwi , kuko Nyagasani yamuhaye umutima wo kwita ku byo Pawulo yavugaga .
44016015	Amaze kubatizwa we n'urugo rwe rwose , ahita atwinginga ati : “ Niba mubona ko nayobotse Nyagasani koko , nimuze mbacumbikire . ” Nuko araduhata turabyemera .
44016016	Umunsi umwe twagiye ha hantu basengeraga , duhura n'umukobwa w'umuja wahanzweho n'ingabo ya Satani yamuteraga kuvuga ibizaba . Yaheshaga ba shebuja amafaranga menshi abwira abantu ibizababaho .
44016017	Akomeza kudukurikira twe na Pawulo arangurura ati : “ Aba bantu ni abagaragu b'Imana Isumbabyose , kandi barabarangira inzira ibageza ku gakiza . ”
44016018	Amara iminsi myinshi abigenza atyo . Pawulo bimaze kumurembya , arahindukira abwira iyo ngabo ya Satani ati : “ Mu izina rya Yezu Kristo ndagutegetse ngo ‘ Muvemo ! ’ ” Ako kanya imuvamo .
44016019	Ba shebuja b'uwo mukobwa babonye ko nta nyungu bakimutezeho , bafata Pawulo na Silasi babakurubana ku kibuga cyo mu mujyi rwagati , imbere y'abategetsi .
44016020	Babashyikiriza abacamanza bakuru barababwira bati : “ Aba bantu baratera imvururu mu mujyi wacu . Ni Abayahudi
44016021	kandi barigisha imigenzo tudashobora kwemera cyangwa gukurikiza , kuko turi Abanyaroma . ”
44016022	Rubanda na bo barabahagurukira . Nuko abacamanza babahubuzamo imyambaro , maze batanga itegeko ryo kubakubita .
44016023	Bamaze kubahaza inkoni babaroha muri gereza , bategeka umurinzi kubarinda cyane .
44016024	Na we abonye ko ahawe itegeko rikomeye rityo , abashyira muri gereza rwagati amaguru ayahambiriye ho ingiga .
44016025	Mu gicuku Pawulo na Silasi basengaga baririmba basingiza Imana , izindi mfungwa zibateze amatwi .
44016026	Nuko muri ako kanya habaho umutingito w'isi ukomeye , imfatiro za gereza zirajegajega . Inzugi zose zihita zikinguka , iminyururu ya bose iradohoka .
44016027	Umurinzi wa gereza arakanguka . Abonye ko inzugi za gereza zikinguye , akura inkota ngo yisogote kuko yibwiye ko imfungwa zacitse .
44016028	Ariko Pawulo avuga aranguruye ijwi ati : “ Wikwigirira nabi ! Twese turahari . ”

44016030	Nyuma arabasohokana arababaza ati : “ Batware , ngomba gukora iki kugira ngo nkizwe ? ”
44016031	Baramusubiza bati : “ Wizere Nyagasani Yezu , urakizwa wowe n'abawe . ”
44016032	Nuko bamubwira Ijambo rya Nyagasani , we n'abo mu rugo rwe bose .

44016038	Abaporisi bajya kumenyesha abacamanza ayo magambo , na bo bumvise ko Pawulo na Silasi ari Abanyaroma , bibatera ubwoba .
44016039	Ni bwo baje kubasaba imbabazi , nyuma barabarekura maze babasaba kubavira mu mujyi .

44017001	Banyura Amfipoli na Apoloniya bagera i Tesaloniki , aho hari urusengero rw'Abayahudi .
44017002	Nuko Pawulo yinjira mu rusengero , nk'uko yari amenyereye . Yikurikiranya amasabato atatu ajya impaka n'abantu , ashingiye ku Byanditswe abibasobanurira ,
44017003	abitanga ho umugabo ko Kristo yagombaga kwicwa , kandi akazuka akava mu bapfuye . Yungamo ati : “ Yezu uwo mbabwira ni we Kristo . ”
44017004	Bamwe mu Bayahudi bemera ibyo avuze bifatanya na Pawulo na Silasi , ndetse n'Abagereki benshi bubahaga Imana babigenza batyo , kimwe n'abagore b'abanyacyubahiro batari bake .
44017005	Ariko Abayahudi ishyari rirabasya , maze bakoranya abantu babi b'ibirara basanze mu isoko , barema inteko bateza imidugararo mu mujyi . Biroha mu nzu ya Yasoni bashaka Pawulo na Silasi , kugira ngo babagabize igitero .

44017011	Abantu baho barushaga ubupfura ab'i Tesaloniki , kuko bakiriye Ijambo ry'Imana bafite ubwuzu , buri munsi bagasuzuma Ibyanditswe kugira ngo barebe yuko ibyo Pawulo avuga ari ukuri .
44017012	Benshi muri bo bemeye Yezu , no mu Bagereki abagore b'abanyacyubahiro , ndetse n'abagabo batari bake na bo biba bityo .

44017020	Koko bimwe mu byo uvuga ni inzaduka kuri twe , none turifuza kumenya icyo bivuga . ”

44017023	Ubwo nagendagendaga mu mujyi wanyu nkareba n'ibyo musenga , nabonye urutambiro rwanditsweho ngo ‘ Urutambiro rwagenewe imana itazwi . ’ Iyo Mana musenga mutayizi ni yo nje kubamenyesha .
44017024	Imana yaremye isi n'ibiyiriho byose , ari yo Mugenga w'ijuru n'isi , ntitura mu ngoro zubatswe n'abantu .

44017026	Yakomoye ku muntu umwe amoko yose , iyatuza ku isi yose . Ni na yo yashyizeho ibihe by'ibiba n'isarura , kimwe n'ingabano z'aho abantu bagomba gutura .
44017027	Imana yabigize ityo kugira ngo ahari nibayishakashaka bayibone . Erega n'ubundi ntiri kure ya buri muntu muri twe !
44017028	Umwe yigeze kuvuga ati :
44017029	None rero ubwo dukomoka ku Mana , ntitugomba gutekereza ko imeze nkigishushanyo cyizahabu cyangwa icyifeza cyangwa icyamabuye cyakomotse ku bukorikori nubwenge byabantu .

44017031	kuko yashyizeho umunsi wo gucira isi yose imanza zitabera , ikoresheje umuntu yatoranyije . Kumuzura akava mu bapfuye byabereye abantu bose icyemezo cyabyo . ”
44017032	Pawulo avuze ibyo kuzuka kw'abapfuye bamwe bahita bamugira urw'amenyo , abandi bati : “ Ibyo uzaba ubitubwira ikindi gihe . ”

44017034	Ariko abantu bamwe bifatanya na we bemera Kristo . Muri bo hakaba umujyanama wa rwa rukiko rwa Areyopago witwa Diyoniziyo , n'umugore witwa Damari n'abandi .
44018001	Nyuma y'ibyo Pawulo ava Atene ajya i Korinti .
44018002	Ahasanga Umuyahudi witwa Akwila ukomoka muri Ponto , wari umaze igihe gito avanye n'umugore we Purisila mu Butaliyani , kuko umwami w'i Roma witwa Kilawudiyo
44018003	kandi kubera ko bari bahuje umwuga wo kuboha amahema , aguma iwabo bakorana uwo murimo .

44018006	Bo baramurwanya baranamusebya , Pawulo aherako akunguta imyambaro ye arababwira ati : “ Amaraso yanyu arabahame ! Jye ndi umwere . Uhereye ubu nigiriye mu banyamahanga . ”
