44018015	Naho ubwo ari impaka zishingiye ku nyigisho no ku mazina no ku mategeko yanyu bwite , nimubyirangirize . Sinshaka kuba umucamanza wa bene ibyo ! ”
44018016	Nuko abirukana mu rukiko .
44018017	Bose basumira Sositeni umuyobozi w'urusengero rw'Abayahudi , bamukubitira imbere y'urukiko . Ariko Galiyo ntiyabyitaho na busa .
44018018	Pawulo yamaze indi minsi myinshi i Korinti . Hanyuma asezera ku bavandimwe , afata ubwato agana muri Siriya , ari kumwe na Purisila na Akwila . Atarava i Kenkireya abanza kwiyogoshesha , kubera umuhigo yahize .
44018019	Bageze Efezi Pawulo ahasiga Purisila na Akwila , we yinjira mu rusengero ajya impaka n'Abayahudi .
44018020	Bamusaba kuhatinda ntiyabakundira ,
44018021	ahubwo abasezeraho ati : “ Imana nibishaka muzabona ngarutse . ” Nuko afata ubwato ava Efezi .
44018022	Ageze i Kayizariya ava mu bwato , ajya kuramutsa ab'itorero rya Kristo ry'i Yeruzalemu , hanyuma ajya Antiyokiya .
44018023	Ahamaze igihe arahava akomeza urugendo , anyura mu ntara za Galati na Furujiya , akomeza abigishwa ba Kristo bose .
44018024	Icyo gihe Umuyahudi witwa Apolo ukomoka Alegisanderiya , yageze Efezi . Yari umugabo uzi kuvuga akaba n'umuhanga mu Byanditswe .
44018025	Yari yarigishijwe Inzira ya Nyagasani kandi akavuga ibyerekeye Yezu , akabyigisha uko biri ahimbawe ari mu birere . Nyamara kandi yari asobanukiwe gusa ibyerekeye ukubatiza kwa Yohani .
44018026	Apolo uwo atangira kuvugira mu rusengero ashize amanga . Purisila na Akwila bamaze kumwumva bamujyana imuhira , maze bamusobanurira inzira y'Imana kugira ngo arusheho kuyimenya neza .
44018027	Hanyuma igihe Apolo yiyemeje kujya muri Akaya , abavandimwe bo mu mujyi wa Efezi bamuteye inkunga , bandikira abigishwa ba Kristo bo muri Akaya ngo bazamwakire neza . Agezeyo agirira akamaro kenshi abemeye Yezu babikesha ubuntu bw'Imana .
44018028	Yagishaga Abayahudi impaka mu ruhame akabatsinda , atanga Ibyanditswe ho umugabo yuko Yezu ari Kristo .
44019001	Igihe Apolo yari i Korinti Pawulo anyura mu gihugu rwagati , maze agera Efezi ahasanga bamwe mu bigishwa ba Kristo .
44019002	Ni ko kubabaza ati : “ Mbese mwahawe Mwuka Muziranenge igihe mwemeraga Yezu ? ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Uretse kumuhabwa , habe ngo twigeze no kumva ko Mwuka Muziranenge abaho ! ”
44019003	Pawulo ni ko kubabaza ati : “ Mwabatijwe mute ? ” Baramusubiza bati : “ Twabatijwe uko Yohani yabatizaga . ”
44019004	Pawulo ati : “ Yohani yabatizaga ababaga bihannye bakareka ibyaha byabo , kandi akabwira Abisiraheli kwemera uwari ugiye kuzaza nyuma ye ari we Yezu . ”
44019005	Bamaze kumva ibyo , ni ko kubatizwa mu izina rya Nyagasani Yezu .
44019006	Pawulo ngo abarambikeho ibiganza Mwuka Muziranenge ahita abazaho , ni bwo batangiye kuvuga indimi zindi no guhanura .
44019007	Abo bagabo bose bari nka cumi na babiri .
44019008	Pawulo ahamara amezi atatu , akajya yinjira mu rusengero akavuga ashize amanga , ajya impaka n'abantu abemeza ibyerekeye ubwami bw'Imana .
44019009	Ariko bamwe muri bo barinangira banga kumvira , basebereza Inzira ya Nyagasani imbere y'iyo mbaga nyamwinshi . Nuko Pawulo abavamo ajyana n'abigishwa ba Kristo , maze buri munsi akigishiriza mu ishuri rya Tirano .
44019010	Amara imyaka ibiri abigenza atyo , ku buryo Abayahudi n'abatari Abayahudi bose bari batuye mu ntara ya Aziya , bumvise Ijambo rya Nyagasani .
44019011	Imana yakoreshaga Pawulo ibitangaza bihambaye .
44019012	Ndetse n'udutambaro cyangwa imyenda byabaga byarakoze ku mubiri we iyo byakozwaga ku barwayi , bakiraga indwara zabo n'ingabo za Satani zibarimo zikamenengana .
44019013	Hari Abayahudi bamwe bari bafite akamenyero ko kugenda igihugu bamenesha ingabo za Satani mu bantu . Na bo bagerageza kuzimenesha bakoresheje izina rya Yezu , buri wese akazibwira ati : “ Mu izina rya Yezu uwo Pawulo agenda atangaza , mbategetse kuva muri uwo murwayi . ”
44019014	Abagenzaga batyo ni abahungu barindwi ba Seva , wari Umutambyi mukuru w'Abayahudi .
44019015	Nyamara ingabo ya Satani irabasubiza iti : “ Yezu ndamuzi na Pawulo nzi uwo ari we , ariko se mwe muri ba nde ? ”
44019016	Nuko uwo muntu wari uhanzweho arabasimbukira , abarusha amaboko bose arabanesha , arabahondagura kugeza ubwo baturumbutse mu nzu ye barahunga , batumbuje kandi bavirirana .
44019017	Abayahudi n'abatari Abayahudi bari batuye Efezi babimenye bashya ubwoba bose , maze Nyagasani Yezu arogera .
44019018	Nuko benshi mu bari bamaze kwemera Yezu baraza , barerura bemera ku mugaragaro ibyaha bakoze .
44019019	Abakoraga iby'ubupfumu batari bake bakoranya ibitabo byabo , maze babitwikira imbere ya rubanda . Babaze agaciro k'ikiguzi cy'ibyo bitabo , basanga gahwanye n'igihembo cy'imibyizi ibihumbi mirongo itanu .
44019020	Bityo inkuru za Nyagasani zikomeza kwamamara n'imbaraga , zirahama .
44019021	Nyuma y'ibyo Pawulo ayobowe na Mwuka yiyemeza kujya i Yeruzalemu , anyuze muri Masedoniya no muri Akaya . Ni bwo avuze ati : “ Nimara kugerayo nzaba nkwiriye no kugera i Roma . ”
44019022	Nuko yohereza muri Masedoniya babiri mu bafasha be Timoteyo na Erasito , ariko we asigara akanya mu ntara ya Aziya .
44019023	Icyo gihe ni bwo mu mujyi wa Efezi habyutse imvururu zitoroshye kubera Inzira ya Nyagasani .
44019024	Hari umucuzi witwa Demeteriyo , wacuraga mu ifeza udushusho tw'ingoro y'imanakazi Aritemi . Uwo mwuga wari umukungahaje we n'abo bakoranaga .
44019025	Ni bwo akoranyije abo bakozi n'abandi bakoraga bene uwo mwuga , arababwira ati : “ Mwa bagabo mwe , muzi yuko amaronko yacu ava muri ubu bucuruzi .
44019026	None muriyumvira kandi mukirebera ibyo Pawulo uriya avuga , ngo imana zakozwe n'abantu si imana na gato ! Ni na ko yemeje rubanda nyamwinshi akabayobya , atari ino Efezi gusa ahubwo no mu ntara ya Aziya hafi ya hose .
44019027	Ibyago si uko ubucuruzi bwacu bwahinyuka gusa , ahubwo ndetse n'ingoro y'imanakazi yacu ikomeye Aritemi yata agaciro , na yo ubwayo igasuzugurika kandi ari yo isengwa n'abo muri Aziya kimwe n'abo ku isi yose . ”
44019028	Abantu babyumvise bahita barakara cyane , barangurura amajwi bati : “ Aritemi y'Abanyefezi iraganje ! ”
44019029	Umujyi wose uravurungana , igitero gisumira Gayo na Arisitariko , abagabo babiri bo muri Masedoniya bagendanaga na Pawulo , kibakurubana kibaganisha mu kibuga cy'ikinamico .
44019030	Pawulo na we yashakaga kwiroha muri icyo kivunge , ariko abigishwa ba Kristo ntibamukundira .
44019031	Ndetse na bamwe bo mu bategetsi b'incuti ze bamutumaho , bamusaba kudahinguka ku kibuga .
44019032	Ikoraniro riravurungana , bose barasakabaka umwe avuga ibye undi ibye , ndetse abenshi mu bari aho ntibari bazi impamvu ibakoranyije .
44019033	Abayahudi batambutsa uwitwa Alegisanderi , bamaze kumutekerera ibyo ari buvuge . Nuko arambura ukuboko ngo abacecekeshe , abone kugira icyo asobanurira rubanda .
44019034	Bamenye ko ari Umuyahudi , bavugira icyarimwe barangurura amajwi bati : “ Aritemi y'Abanyefezi iraganje ! ” Bamara amasaha abiri basakuza batyo .
44019035	Umunyamabanga w'umujyi amaze kubacecekesha , ahita abwira rubanda ati : “ Yemwe Banyefezi , ni nde utazi ko umujyi wacu wa Efezi ari wo murinzi w'ingoro y'imanakazi Aritemi , n'uw'ishusho yayo yamanutse mu ijuru ?
44019036	Nta muntu n'umwe wabasha kubihakana . Kubera iyo mpamvu mugomba gutuza mukareka guhubuka .
44019037	Erega mwazanye hano aba bantu batarigeze basahura ingoro , cyangwa ngo batuke imanakazi yacu !
44019038	Niba rero Demeteriyo na bagenzi be bafite uwo barega , inkiko ziriho n'abacamanza ntibabuze , aho ni ho bagomba kuburanira .
44019039	Niba hari n'ikindi mufite kubaza kizatunganywa n'inama rusange ,
44019040	kuko ibyabaye uyu munsi byatuma turegwa ubugome . Mwumve namwe ko iyi midugararo idafite ishingiro , none se twakwireguza iki ? ”
44019041	Amaze kuvuga atyo asezerera iyo mbaga .
44020001	Iyo midugaruro irangiye Pawulo akoranya abigishwa ba Kristo , abarema umutima maze abasezeraho yerekeza muri Masedoniya .
44020002	Agenderera uturere twose tw'iyo ntara , abwira abantu amagambo menshi yo kubakomeza . Hanyuma agera mu Bugereki
44020003	ahamara amezi atatu . Igihe ashatse gufata ubwato ngo ajye muri Siriya , atahura ko Abayahudi bafite imigambi yo kumugirira nabi , ni bwo yiyemeje guhindukira ngo anyure muri Masedoniya .
44020004	Sopateri mwene Piro w'i Beroya aramuherekeza , kimwe na Arisitariko na Sekundo b'i Tesaloniki , na Gayo w'i Derube na Timoteyo , kandi yari aherekejwe na Tukiko na Tirofimo bo muri Aziya .
44020005	Abo baratubanjirije badutegerereza i Tirowa .
44020006	Naho twe iminsi mikuru y'imigati idasembuye irangiye dufatira ubwato i Filipi , maze nyuma y'iminsi itatu tubasanga i Tirowa tuhamara iminsi irindwi .
44020007	Buri bucye ari icyumweru ari wo munsi wa mbere , duteranira hamwe kugira ngo dusangire . Pawulo wari uraye ari bugende yigisha abavandimwe , akomeza no kuganira na bo ageza mu gicuku .
44020008	Mu cyumba cyo mu nzu yo hejuru twari dukoraniyemo hakaga amatara menshi .
44020009	Umusore umwe witwa Utiko yari yicaye mu idirishya igihe Pawulo yigishaga , bishyize kera uwo musore arahunyiza maze ibitotsi biramutwara , ahanuka mu nzu y'igorofa ya gatatu yidimba hasi bahararura uwapfuye .
44020010	Pawulo aramanuka amwubararaho , amufata mu maboko aravuga ati : “ Mwikuka umutima ni muzima ! ”
44020011	Birangiye Pawulo asubira mu igorofa afata umugati , arawumanyura arafungura . Akomeza kwigisha burinda bucya maze aragenda .
44020012	Naho uwo musore bamujyana imuhira ari mutaraga , amahoro ari yose .
44020013	Twe dufata ubwato tugenda mbere ya Pawulo twerekeza ahitwa Aso , aho twajyaga kumuvana . Yari ateganyije kujyayo anyuze inzira y'ubutaka .
44020014	Nuko adusanze Aso tumushyira mu bwato , tujyana i Mitulene .
44020015	Bukeye turahava tugera ahateganye n'ikirwa cyitwa Kiyo . Ku munsi ukurikiyeho turambuka tugera i Samo , maze bukeye bwaho tugera i Mileto .
44020016	Pawulo yari yaragennye gukomezanya n'ubwato atanyuze Efezi , kugira ngo adatinda muri Aziya . Yari afite ubwira bwo kugera i Yeruzalemu , kugira ngo bishobotse yizihirizeyo umunsi mukuru wa Pentekote .
44020017	Pawulo ari i Mileto atumiza abakuru b'itorero rya Kristo rya Efezi .
44020018	Bamugezeho arababwira ati : “ Muzi uko nabanye namwe igihe cyose kuva nagera muri Aziya .
44020019	Nakoreye Nyagasani niyoroshya ku buryo bwose , mu marira no mu bigeragezo naterwaga n'ubugambanyi bw'Abayahudi .
44020020	Nta cyo nabakinze mu byo nagombaga kubabwira byabagirira akamaro , byose narabibamenyesheje mbigishiriza mu ruhame no mu ngo zanyu .
44020021	Nihanangirije Abayahudi n'abatari Abayahudi ko bakwiriye kwihana bakagarukira Imana , kandi bakemera Umwami wacu Yezu .
44020022	None ubu ngiye i Yeruzalemu mpaswe na Mwuka , ibizambaho ngezeyo simbizi .
44020023	Icyakora muri buri mujyi , Mwuka Muziranenge agenda anyemeza ko ingoyi n'amakuba bintegererejeyo .
44020024	Nyamara ku bwanjye nta cyo bimbwira kubaho cyangwa gupfa , icya ngombwa ni ugushyika aho dusiganirwa kugera , nkanonosora umurimo nahawe na Nyagasani Yezu , ari wo gutangaza Ubutumwa bwiza bw'ubuntu Imana igira .
44020025	“ Nagenze muri mwe ntangaza ibyerekeye ubwami bw'Imana , ariko ubu nzi yuko nta n'umwe muri mwe uzongera kunca iryera .
44020026	Ni cyo gitumye uyu munsi mbemeza ko ndi umwere , nta maraso y'umuntu uwo ari we wese ambarwaho ,
44020027	kuko nta cyo nabakinze cyerekeye imigambi yose y'Imana ngo ndeke kukibamenyesha .
44020028	Mwite ku mibereho yanyu no ku y'umukumbi wose mwaragijwe na Mwuka Muziranenge . Muragire itorero ry'Imana yaguze amaraso y'Umwana wayo .
44020029	Nzi yuko nimara kugenda impyisi z'ibirura zizabageramo , ntizibabarire umukumbi w'Imana .
44020030	No muri mwe ubwanyu hazaduka abantu bavuga ibifutamye , kugira ngo bayobye abigishwa ba Kristo babigarurire .
44020031	Murabe maso rero kandi mwibuke ko namaze imyaka itatu , ijoro n'amanywa ndatuza kuburira umuntu wese muri mwe , birimo n'amarira .
44020032	“ Ubu rero mbaragije Nyagasani n'inyigisho zerekeye ubuntu bwe . Ni we ufite ububasha bwo kububaka ubugingo , no kubaha ku munani yabikiye abantu bose yagize intore ze .
44020033	Nta kintu cy'umuntu wese nigeze ndarikira , cyaba ifeza cyangwa izahabu cyangwa umwambaro .
44020034	Namwe ubwanyu muzi ko ari aya maboko nakoresheje kugira ngo nimare ubukene , mbumare n'abo twari kumwe .
44020035	Mu byo nakoze byose naberetse ko tugomba gushishikara dutyo , kugira ngo tugoboke abatishoboye twibuka ibyo Nyagasani Yezu yavuze ati : ‘ Gutanga kuzana ihirwe kuruta guhabwa ’ ” .
44020036	Pawulo amaze kuvuga atyo , we n'abo bari kumwe bose barapfukama , arasenga .
44020037	Bose baraturika bararira , bamugwa ku ijosi baramusoma .
44020038	Icyabashenguraga cyane ni uko yababwiye ko batazongera kumuca iryera . Nuko baramuherekeza bamugeza ku bwato .
44021001	Tumaze kubiyaka turagenda dufata ubwato , turaromboreza twerekeza i Kosi . Bukeye bwaho tugera i Rode , tuhava tujya i Patara .
44021002	Tuhasanga ubundi bwato bwambuka bugana muri Fenisiya , turabwurira buratujyana .
44021003	Tugeze ahareba ikirwa cya Shipure , duhita tugana mu majyepfo hacyo twerekeza muri Siriya . Duhagarara i Tiri kuko ari ho ubwato bwagombaga gupakururira imitwaro .
44021004	Tuhasanze abigishwa ba Kristo tuhamara iminsi irindwi . Bo bayobowe na Mwuka babwira Pawulo kutajya i Yeruzalemu .
44021005	Nyamara iyo minsi irangiye , turahava dukomeza urugendo . Bose hamwe n'abagore n'abana babo baraduherekeza baturenza umujyi , maze dupfukama ku nkombe y'inyanja turasenga .
44021006	Nuko dusezeranaho twe twurira ubwato , naho bo basubira iwabo .
44021007	Dukomeza urugendo rwacu tuvuye i Tiri , twururukira i Putolemayida turamutsa abavandimwe baho , dusibira iwabo umunsi umwe .
44021008	Bukeye turahava tujya i Kayizariya kwa Filipo , wari ushinzwe kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza akaba umwe muri ba bandi barindwi , turahaguma .
44021009	Yari afite abakobwa bane b'abāri bahanuraga .
44021010	Tuhamaze iminsi umuhanuzi umwe witwa Agabo arahinguka , aturutse muri Yudeya .
44021011	Aza aho turi afata umukandara wa Pawulo , awibohesha amaguru n'amaboko aravuga ati : “ Mwuka Muziranenge aravuze ngo ‘ Uku ni ko nyir'uyu mukandara Abayahudi bazamubohera i Yeruzalemu , maze bamugabize abanyamahanga ! ’ ”
44021012	Tubyumvise twe n'abantu bari bahari , twinginga Pawulo ngo ye kujya i Yeruzalemu .
44021013	Ariko Pawulo arasubiza ati : “ Ni iki gitumye murira , ko ibyo ari ukunshengura ? Siniteguye kuboherwa i Yeruzalemu byonyine , ahubwo niteguye no gupfirayo mpōrwa Nyagasani Yezu . ”
44021014	Tutabashije kubimwemeza , turamwihorera tugira tuti : “ Ibyo Nyagasani ashaka bibe . ”
44021015	Iyo minsi ishize duhambira ibintu tujya i Yeruzalemu .
44021016	Bamwe mu bigishwa ba Kristo b'i Kayizariya baraduherekeza , badushakira icumbi kwa Munasoni wakomotse muri Shipure , wabaye umwigishwa kuva kera .
44021017	Tugeze i Yeruzalemu abavandimwe baho batwakirana ubwuzu .
44021018	Bukeye bwaho Pawulo ajyana natwe kwa Yakobo n'abakuru b'Umuryango wa Kristo bose bari bahari .
44021019	Pawulo arabaramutsa , abatekerereza ku buryo burambuye ibyo Imana yamukoresheje mu banyamahanga .
44021020	Babyumvise bahita basingiza Imana . Nuko babwira Pawulo bati : “ Muvandimwe , urabona ukuntu Abayahudi bemeye Yezu ari ibihumbi byinshi , kandi dore bose barwanira ishyaka Amategeko .
44021021	Ariko rero babwiwe ko wigisha Abayahudi bose batuye mu mahanga kuzinukwa inyigisho za Musa , ngo be kujya batuma abana babo bakebwa , cyangwa ngo bakurikize imihango yacu .
44021022	Biragenda bite rero ko batabura kumva ko waje ?
44021023	Noneho ukore ibyo tukubwira . Dore dufite abagabo bane muri twe bahize umuhigo .
44021024	Ubajyane ufatanye na bo umuhango wo kwihumanura , kandi ubishyurire amafaranga kugira ngo babone kogoshwa . Bityo abantu bose bazamenya ko ibyo bakumviseho bidafite ishingiro , ahubwo yuko nawe ubwawe ujya witondera ayo Mategeko .
44021025	Naho ku byerekeye abemeye Kristo bo mu mahanga , twamaze kuboherereza urwandiko rw'ibyo twemeje : twababwiye kwirinda kurya ibyatuwe ibigirwamana no kunywa amaraso no kurya inyama z'ibinizwe , kandi ngo birinde ubusambanyi . ”
44021026	Bukeye Pawulo ajyana ba bagabo bane maze atangira umuhango wo kwihumanura ari kumwe na bo , hanyuma ajya mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana kwemeza igihe iminsi yo kwihumanura izarangirira , ari yo yo gutanga ituro kuri buri muntu muri bo .
44021027	Ya minsi irindwi iri hafi kurangira , Abayahudi bamwe bo mu ntara ya Aziya babonye Pawulo mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , bahita batera imvururu muri rubanda maze bafata Pawulo .
44021028	Barangurura amajwi bati : “ Yemwe Bisiraheli , nimutabare ! Uyu ni wa muntu ugenda hose yigisha abantu bose aturwanya twebwe Abisiraheli , arwanya n'Amategeko ataretse n'iyi Ngoro . Ndetse yinjije n'abanyamahanga mu rugo rw'Ingoro , kugira ngo ahumanye aha hantu heguriwe Imana ! ”
44021029	Icyatumye bavuga batyo ni uko bari babonye Pawulo mu mujyi ari kumwe na Tirofimo wa Efezi , bagakeka ko yamuzanye mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana .
44021030	Umujyi wose uravurungana , abantu baza biruka baturuka impande zose . Bafata Pawulo baramukurubana , bamuvana mu rugo rw'Ingoro bahita bakinga inzugi zayo .
44021031	Igihe igitero cyageragezaga kumwica , inkuru iba yasakaye kuri Komanda w'abasirikari b'Abanyaroma , yuko umujyi wa Yeruzalemu wose wavurunganye .
44021032	Muri ako kanya afata abasirikari hamwe n'abatware babo , amanuka yiruka agana kuri icyo gitero cy'abantu . Babonye Komanda n'abasirikari be , bahita bareka gukubita Pawulo .
44021033	Nuko Komanda araza afata Pawulo , ategeka ko bamubohesha iminyururu ibiri . Hanyuma arabaza ati : “ Uyu muntu ni nde kandi yakoze iki ? ”
44021034	Rubanda barasakabaka , bamwe bavuga kimwe abandi ikindi . Komanda ntiyabasha kugira icyo amenya kubera urusaku , ni ko gutegeka abasirikari kujyana Pawulo mu kigo cyabo .
44021035	Bamugejeje ku ngazi z'amabuye , abasirikari baramuterura babitewe n'ukuntu rubanda bari barubiye .
44021036	Ikivunge cy'abantu benshi kimuhombokaho basakabaka bati : “ Ntakabeho ! ”
44021037	Igihe bagiye kumwinjiza mu kigo cy'abasirikari , Pawulo abaza Komanda ati : “ Mbese wanyemerera kugira icyo nkubwira ? ” Aramusubiza ati : “ Ese uzi ikigereki ?
44021038	Aho si wowe wa Munyamisiri wateje imyivumbagatanyo hambere aha , ukajyana abantu ibihumbi bine b'inyeshyamba mu butayu ? ”
44021039	Pawulo ni ko gusubiza ati : “ Jyewe ndi Umuyahudi ukomoka i Tarisi , umujyi w'ikirangirire wo muri Silisiya . Ndakwinginze ureke ngire icyo mbwira aba bene wacu . ”
44021040	Komanda aramwemerera . Nuko Pawulo ahagarara ku ngazi , arambura ukuboko ngo abacecekeshe , abantu bose ngo ce ! Ababwira mu giheburayi , ati :
44022001	“ Bavandimwe namwe babyeyi , nimwumve uko niregura ! ”
44022002	Bumvise avuze mu giheburayi barushako guceceka . Nuko aravuga ati :
44022003	“ Ndi Umuyahudi ukomoka i Tarisi muri Silisiya , ariko narerewe muri uyu murwa wa Yeruzalemu . Nigiye kuri Gamaliyeli , anyigisha Amategeko ya ba sogokuruza ayakuye ruhande , kandi ndwanira Imana ishyaka nk'uko namwe murirwana uyu munsi .
44022004	Natoteje abantu bayobotse iyi nzira ya Yezu kugeza ubwo mbica . Naboshye abagabo n'abagore mbashyira muri gereza .
44022005	Umutambyi mukuru n'abakuru b'imiryango ni bo ntanze ho abagabo . Ndetse bampaye n'inzandiko nshyikiriza abavandimwe bacu b'i Damasi , maze njya gufata ab'aho kugira ngo mbabohe mbazane i Yeruzalemu bahanwe .
44022006	“ Nuko ku manywa y'ihangu ndi hafi kugera i Damasi , ntungurwa n'umucyo mwinshi uvuye mu ijuru urangota .
44022007	Nikubita hasi maze numva ijwi ry'umbaza ati : ‘ Sawuli , Sawuli , untotereza iki ? ’
44022008	Ndasubiza nti : ‘ Uri nde Nyagasani ? ’ Arambwira ati : ‘ Ndi Yezu w'i Nazareti uwo utoteza . ’
44022009	Abantu twari kumwe babonye umucyo ariko ntibumva ijwi ry'uwo twavuganaga .
44022010	Ndabaza nti : ‘ Nyagasani , nkore iki ? ’ Ni ko kunsubiza ati : ‘ Haguruka ujye i Damasi , aho ni ho bazakubwira ibyo Imana yakugeneye gukora byose . ’
44022011	Kubera ko wa mucyo ukomeye wampumye amaso , abo twari kumwe bagombye kundandata bangeza i Damasi .
44022012	“ Muri uwo mujyi hari umugabo akitwa Ananiya . Yari umuntu wubaha Imana akurikije amategeko yacu , kandi agashimwa n'Abayahudi bose bari bahatuye .
44022013	Aransanga ampagarara iruhande arambwira ati : ‘ Sawuli muvandimwe , humuka ! ’ Ako kanya ndahumuka ndamubona .
44022014	Nuko aravuga ati : ‘ Imana ya ba sogokuruza yamaze kugutoranya ngo umenye ibyo ishaka , ubone na ya Ntungane Yezu kandi wiyumvire ijambo riva mu kanwa kayo ,
44022015	kuko uzayibera umugabo kugira ngo ubwire abantu bose ibyo wabonye n'ibyo wumvise .
44022016	None se kandi utegereje iki ? Haguruka wambaze Nyagasani , ubatizwe wuhagirwe ibyaha byawe . ’
44022017	“ Nuko ngaruka i Yeruzalemu , maze igihe ndi mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana nsenga ndabonekerwa ,
44022018	mbona Nyagasani ambwira ati : ‘ Ihutire kuva i Yeruzalemu , kuko abaho batazemera ibyo uhamya binyerekeyeho . ’
44022019	Ndasubiza nti : ‘ Nyagasani , bazi ko najyaga mu nsengero zose ngafunga kandi ngakubita abakwemera .
44022020	Ndetse n'igihe Sitefano wahamyaga ibyawe yicwaga , nanjye nari mpari nshyigikiye icyo gikorwa , ndetse ndinda n'imyambaro y'abamwicaga . ’
44022021	Nyagasani arambwira ati : ‘ Genda kuko nzagutuma ku bo mu mahanga ya kure . ’ ”
44022022	Bagumya kumutega amatwi kugeza ubwo avuze iryo jambo , ni ko kurangurura amajwi bati : “ Uwo mugabo nimumwice ! Ntakabeho ! ”
44022023	Igihe bariho basakabaka bazunguza imyitero yabo , ari na ko batumura umukungugu mu kirere ,
44022024	Komanda w'abasirikari ategeka ko bajyana Pawulo mu kigo cyabo , ababwira kumukubita ibiboko ngo yemere kuvuga icyaha cyatumye abantu bamuha induru .
44022025	Igihe babohaga Pawulo kugira ngo bamukubite , abaza umukapiteni wari uhagaze aho ati : “ Mbese umuntu ufite ubwenegihugu bw'Umunyaroma , mwemererwa kumukubita kandi ataratsindwa n'urubanza ? ”
44022026	Uwo mukapiteni abyumvise asanga Komanda , aramubaza ati : “ Murabigenza mute , ko uriya muntu ngo afite ubwenegihugu bw'Umunyaroma ? ”
44022027	Komanda asanga Pawulo aramubaza ati : “ Mbwira , ese koko ufite ubwenegihugu bw'Umunyaroma ? ” Na we ati : “ Ndabufite . ”
44022028	Komanda aravuga ati : “ Jyewe nishyuye amafaranga menshi kugira ngo mpabwe ubwenegihugu . ” Pawulo ati : “ Jyewe narabuvukanye ! ”
44022029	Ako kanya abari bagiye kumukubita barigendera . Komanda na we agira ubwoba , amaze kumenya ko Pawulo ari Umunyaroma none akaba yamushyize ku ngoyi .
44022030	Bukeye bwaho Komanda ashatse kumenya neza impamvu Abayahudi barega Pawulo , amukura ku ngoyi maze ategeka ko abakuru bo mu batambyi baterana , hamwe n'abajyanama bose b'urukiko rw'ikirenga . Hanyuma azana Pawulo amuhagarika imbere yabo .
44023001	Pawulo ahanga amaso abagize urukiko rw'ikirenga , maze aravuga ati : “ Bavandimwe , kugeza uyu munsi nta kibi umutima undega imbere y'Imana . ”
44023002	Ananiya Umutambyi mukuru ategeka abari bahagaze iruhande rwa Pawulo kumukubita ku munwa .
44023003	Pawulo aramubwira ati : “ Nawe Imana izagukubita , wa rukuta rusīze ingwa we ! Ubonye ngo wicazwe no kuncira urubanza ukurikije Amategeko , maze ukanyuranya na yo utegeka ko bankubita ! ”
44023004	Abari bahagaze iruhande rwe baravuga bati : “ Ese uratuka Umutambyi mukuru w'Imana ? ”
44023005	Pawulo arabasubiza ati : “ Bavandimwe , ntabwo nari nzi ko ari Umutambyi mukuru kuko Ibyanditswe bigira biti : ‘ Ntukavuge nabi umutware w'ubwoko bwawe . ’ ”
44023006	Pawulo amenye ko bamwe muri bo ari Abasaduseyi abandi ari Abafarizayi , ni ko kuvugira imbere y'urukiko aranguruye ati : “ Bavandimwe , ndi Umufarizayi , nkomoka mu Bafarizayi . Icyatumye nshyirwa mu rubanza , ndahōrwa ko niringira yuko abapfuye bazazuka . ”
44023007	Avuze atyo habyuka impaka hagati y'Abafarizayi n'Abasaduseyi , maze iyo nteko isubiranamo .
44023008	Abasaduseyi bavugaga ko abapfuye batazazuka , ntibemere ko habaho abamarayika cyangwa izindi ngabo zo mu ijuru , ibiri amambu Abafarizayi bakemera ibyo byose .
44023009	Haba urusaku rwinshi , bamwe mu bigishamategeko bo mu ishyaka ry'Abafarizayi , barabihagurukira bati : “ Nta kibi tubonye kuri uyu muntu . Ahari aho umumarayika cyangwa indi ntumwa yo mu ijuru yavuganye na we koko ! ”
44023010	Haba intonganya zikaze ku buryo Komanda yatinye ko bari butanyaguze Pawulo . Ni cyo cyatumye ategeka abasirikari be ngo bamanuke , bamuvane muri abo bantu bamujyane mu kigo cy'abasirikari .
44023011	Mu ijoro rikurikiyeho Nyagasani abonekera Pawulo , aramubwira ati : “ Komera ! Nk'uko wabaye umugabo ugahamya ibyanjye i Yeruzalemu , ni ko ugomba no kuzabihamya i Roma . ”
44023012	Bukeye mu gitondo Abayahudi bamwe bahuza inama , barahira ko batazagira icyo barya cyangwa ngo banywe batabanje kwica Pawulo .
44023013	Abari bahuje uwo mugambi bari abantu barenga mirongo ine .
44023014	Basanga abakuru bo mu batambyi n'abakuru b'imiryango barababwira bati : “ Twarahiye twivuma ko tutazagira icyo dukoza mu kanwa tutabanje kwica Pawulo .
44023015	None rero mwebwe n'abagize urukiko rw'ikirenga , nimutume kuri Komanda mumusabe kubazanira Pawulo , musa nk'aho mufite ibindi mwifuza kumenya kuri we . Natwe rero turaba twiteguye kumwica atarahagera . ”
44023016	Mwishywa wa Pawulo yumvise ubwo bugambanyi , ni ko kwinjira mu kigo cy'abasirikari abibwira Pawulo .
44023017	Na we ahamagara umwe mu bakapiteni aramubwira ati : “ Geza uyu musore kwa Komanda kuko hari icyo ashaka kumumenyesha . ”
44023018	Nuko aramujyana amushyikiriza Komanda , aravuga ati : “ Imbohe Pawulo yantumiye , ansaba kubazanira uyu musore ngo afite icyo ashaka kubamenyesha . ”
44023019	Komanda ni ko kumufata ukuboko , amujyana ahiherereye aramubaza ati : “ Ni iki ushaka kumenyesha ? ”
44023020	Aramubwira ati : “ Abayahudi biyemeje kubasaba ngo ejo muzabazanire Pawulo mu rukiko , bitwaje ko hari ibindi bifuza kumenya kuri we .
44023021	Ntimuzamubahe rero kuko abantu barenga mirongo ine bo muri bo bamwubikiye . Barahiye ko batazagira icyo barya cyangwa ngo banywe batabanje kumwica . Ubu bategereje ko muri bukore icyo basabye . ”
44023022	Komanda yihanangiriza uwo musore ati : “ Ntugire umuntu n'umwe uhingukiriza ibyo umenyesheje ! ” Nuko aramusezerera .
44023023	Nuko Komanda ahamagara abakapiteni babiri arababwira ati : “ Nimutegure abasirikari magana abiri bo kujya i Kayizariya , n'abahetswe n'amafarasi mirongo irindwi , n'izindi ngabo magana abiri zitwaje amacumu maze bahaguruke isaa tatu y'ijoro .
44023024	Mutegure n'amafarasi yo guheka Pawulo , bamushyikirize umutegetsi Feliki nta kimuhungabanyije . ”
44023025	Nuko Komanda yandika urwandiko ruteye rutya :
44023026	“ Jyewe Kilawudiyo Lusiya , ndabaramutsa Nyakubahwa Mutware Feliki .
44023027	Uyu muntu yafashwe nAbayahudi biyemeza kumwica . Nuko menye ko afite ubwenegihugu bwUmunyaroma , mpururana nabasirikari ndamugoboka .
44023028	Nashatse kumenya icyo bamurega mujyana imbere yabanyarukiko rwabo .
44023029	Uretse ko bamurega ibyerekeye amategeko yabo , nasanze nta cyo yakoze cyo kumwicisha , habe nicyo gutuma ashyirwa ku ngoyi .
44023030	Maze kumenya ko Abayahudi bamuciriye igico niyemeza kumuboherereza . Nuko ntumiza abamurega ngo bazabagezeho ibirego . [ Mbasezeyeho . ] ”
44023031	Nuko abasirikari bakora uko bategetswe , bajyana Pawulo muri iryo joro bamugeza mu mujyi wa Antipatiri .
44023032	Bukeye bwaho abasirikari bagenza amaguru basubira mu kigo cyabo i Yeruzalemu , naho abahetswe n'amafarasi bakomeza kujyana Pawulo .
44023033	Bageze i Kayizariya baha Umutegetsi Feliki urwandiko , banamushyikiriza Pawulo .
44023034	Feliki amaze gusoma urwandiko abaza Pawulo intara akomokamo . Amenye ko akomoka muri Silisiya ,
44023035	aramubwira ati : “ Nzaba numva ibyawe abakurega nibamara kuza . ” Nuko ategeka ko barindira Pawulo mu ngoro ya Herodi .
44024001	Iminsi itanu ishize Umutambyi mukuru Ananiya agera i Kayizariya , ari kumwe na bamwe mu bakuru b'imiryango y'Abayahudi n'uwo kubaburanira witwaga Teritulo . Basanga Umutegetsi Feliki bamuregera Pawulo .
44024002	Pawulo baramuhamagara , maze Teritulo atangira kumurega ati : “ Nyakubahwa Feliki , aya mahoro menshi dufite ni mwebwe tuyakesha , kandi uguteganya kwanyu ni ko dukesha kuvugurura imitegekere y'igihugu cyacu .
44024003	Aho turi hose ntidusiba kubyakiriza yombi , tubibashimira cyane .
44024004	Ariko kugira ngo ntabatwarira igihe , ndabasaba ngo mutwihanganire nk'uko mubisanganywe mwumve ibyo dufite kubabwira muri make .
44024005	Uyu muntu twasanze ari macinya , acumba urugomo mu Bayahudi bo ku isi yose , kandi ni umuntu w'imena mu gice cyadutse cy'Abanyanazareti .
44024006	Ndetse yagerageje guhumanya Ingoro y'Imana , ni cyo cyatumye tumufata . [ Twashatse kumucira urubanza ruhuje n'amategeko yacu ,
44024007	nyamara Komanda Lusiya araza amutwaka byo kuturusha amaboko ,
44024008	maze ategeka abamuregaga kubasanga . ] Mumwibarije mushobora kumenya neza ko tutamubeshyera . ”
44024009	Abayahudi na bo baryungamo , bemeza yuko ibyo byose ari ukuri .
44024010	Umutegetsi Feliki arembuza Pawulo amuha ijambo . Pawulo ni ko kugira ati : “ Nzi yuko umaze imyaka myinshi ucira imanza abaturage b'iki gihugu , ni yo mpamvu nishimiye kwiregura imbere yawe .
44024011	Nk'uko ushobora kubyigenzurira , iminsi ntirarenga cumi n'ibiri kuva aho ngiriye i Yeruzalemu njyanywe no gusenga Imana .
44024012	Abayahudi ntibigeze basanga hari uwo tujya impaka mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , cyangwa ngo basange nteza imvururu mu bantu , haba mu nsengero cyangwa mu murwa aho ari ho hose .
44024013	Nta n'ubwo yewe bashobora kukubonera ibimenyetso by'ibyo ubu bandega .
44024014	Nyamara icyo niyemerera imbere yawe ni uko nkorera Imana ya ba sogokuruza , nkaba ngendera mu Nzira aba bita iy'ubuyobe . Nemera rwose ibyanditswe byose mu Mategeko no mu bitabo by'abahanuzi .
44024015	Mpuje n'aba kwiringira Imana ko abantu bose bazazurwa , uhereye ku ntungane ukageza ku bahemu .
44024016	Ni cyo gituma iteka nihatira kugira umutima utandega ikibi imbere y'Imana n'abantu .
44024017	“ Namaze imyaka myinshi mu mahanga , hanyuma ngaruka i Yeruzalemu nzaniye abantu bacu imfashanyo z'abakene n'amaturo yo gutura Imana .
44024018	Nkiri muri ibyo bansanga mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana maze kwihumanura , nta bantu benshi turi kumwe nta n'urusaku .
44024019	Ariko hari Abayahudi bamwe bo mu ntara ya Aziya bari bahari , ni bo bari bakwiriye kuza kukundegaho iyo bambonaho ikibi .
44024020	Cyangwa aba bantu nibavuge icyaha bansanganye igihe nari mpagaze mu rukiko rw'ikirenga ,
44024021	uretse iri jambo navugiye muri bo ndanguruye nti : ‘ Ubu munshyize mu rubanza kuko nemera ko abapfuye bazazuka ! ’ ”
44024022	Nuko Feliki wari uzi neza iby'Inzira ya Yezu , asibiza urubanza avuga ati : “ Komanda Lusiya naza ni bwo nzarangiza ibyanyu ” .
44024023	Ategeka umukapiteni kuba afunze Pawulo , ariko ngo areke yishyire yizane kandi ye kubuza incuti ze kumuha icyo akeneye .
44024024	Hashize iminsi Feliki azana n'umugore we Durusila w'Umuyahudikazi . Atumira Pawulo maze amutega amatwi ngo amubwire kwemera Kristo Yezu icyo ari cyo .
44024025	Igihe Pawulo asobanuye ibyerekeye imibereho itunganye no kumenya kwifata , n'umunsi Imana izaciraho imanza , Feliki agira ubwoba maze aravuga ati : “ Ba ugejeje aho wigendere , ninongera kubona igihe nzagutumira . ”
44024026	Icyakora kandi yiringiraga ko Pawulo azamuha ruswa , ni yo mpamvu yahoraga amutumira kenshi ngo baganire .
44024027	Imyaka ibiri ishize , Umutegetsi Feliki asimburwa na Porikiyo Fesito . Nuko Feliki ashatse kunezeza Abayahudi asiga Pawulo ku ngoyi .
44025001	Fesito amaze iminsi itatu ageze mu butware bwe , ava i Kayizariya ajya i Yeruzalemu .
44025002	Abatambyi bakuru n'abandi bakuru b'Abayahudi bamuregera Pawulo , binginga Fesito
44025003	kubagirira neza ngo amutumire aze i Yeruzalemu , kuko bari biteguye kumwubikira ngo bamutsinde mu nzira .
44025004	Nuko Fesito arabasubiza ati : “ Pawulo azagumya gufungirwa i Kayizariya , nanjye nzajyayo vuba . ”
44025005	Yongera kubabwira ati : “ Muzareke tujyaneyo n'abakuru muri mwe , maze barege uwo muntu niba hari ikibi yakoze . ”
44025006	Fesito amara iminsi itarenze umunani cyangwa icumi i Yeruzalemu , maze asubira i Kayizariya . Bukeye ajya mu rukiko ategeka ko bazana Pawulo .
44025007	Ahageze Abayahudi bavuye i Yeruzalemu baramukikiza , maze batangira kumurega ibirego byinshi kandi bikomeye batabasha kubonera ibimenyetso .
44025008	Nuko Pawulo ariregura ati : “ Nta cyaha nakoze haba ku Mategeko y'Abayahudi , cyangwa ku Ngoro y'Imana cyangwa se ku mwami w'i Roma . ”
44025009	Ariko Fesito ashatse kwikundisha Abayahudi abaza Pawulo ati : “ Mbese urashaka kujya i Yeruzalemu ngo mbe ari ho nkemurira urubanza rw'ibi bakurega ? ”
44025010	Pawulo aramusubiza ati : “ Hano ndi ni mu rukiko rw'umwami w'i Roma , ni ho nkwiriye gucirirwa urubanza . Nta cyo nafudikiye Abayahudi nawe urabizi neza .
44025011	Niba narishe amategeko , cyangwa se niba narakoze icyaha cyanyicisha sinanga gupfa . Ariko rero niba nta na kimwe nakoze mu byo aba bandega , nta muntu ushobora kubangabiza . Njuririye umwami w'i Roma ! ”
44025012	Nuko Fesito amaze kuvugana n'abajyanama be , aramusubiza ati : “ Ubwo ujuririye umwami w'i Roma uzamusanga ! ”
44025013	Hashize iminsi Umwami Agiripa na Berenike bajya i Kayizariya kuramutsa Fesito .
44025014	Bahamaze iminsi Fesito atekerereza umwami ibya Pawulo agira ati : “ Hari umugabo Feliki yasize afunze .
44025015	Nageze i Yeruzalemu abatambyi bakuru n'abakuru b'imiryango y'Abayahudi baramundegera , bansaba kumucira iteka .
44025016	Ariko mbasubiza ko atari umuco w'Abanyaroma gucira umuntu iteka , atabanje guhangana n'abamurega ngo yiregure .
44025017	Igihe nazaga twarazanye na bo maze sinakerereza urubanza , bwarakeye mpita njya mu rukiko mpamagaza uwo muntu .
44025018	Abamuregaga bahagurutse ntibagira ikirego na kimwe bamurega mu bibi nakekaga .
44025019	Ahubwo bari bafite ibyo bapfa na we byerekeye idini yabo n'umuntu witwa Yezu wapfuye , Pawulo we akemeza ko ariho .
44025020	Bitewe n'uko ntabashije kumenya uko nasuzuma izo mpaka zabo , ni ko kubaza Pawulo ko yakunda kujya i Yeruzalemu ngo aburanireyo ibyo bamurega .
44025021	Nuko Pawulo ahita ajurira ashaka ko ibye bizarangizwa na nyir'icyubahiro umwami w'i Roma , ni bwo ntegetse ko afungwa kugeza ubwo nzamwohereza ku mwami . ”
44025022	Agiripa ni ko kubwira Fesito ati : “ Nanjye nakunda kwiyumvira uwo muntu . ” Na we ati : “ Ejo uzamwumva . ”
44025023	Nuko bukeye Agiripa na Berenike binjirana ishema ryinshi mu rukiko , bashagawe n'abasirikari bakuru n'abagabo b'ibikomerezwa bo muri uwo mujyi . Fesito ategeka ko bazana Pawulo .
44025024	Nuko Fesito aravuga ati : “ Mwami Agiripa , namwe mwese abari hano , uyu muntu mureba aha ni we Abayahudi bose b'ino n'ab'i Yeruzalemu bandegeye , basakabaka bavuga ko adakwiriye kubaho !
44025025	Ariko nasanze ari nta kintu yakoze gikwiriye kumwicisha , kandi kubera ko na we yajuririye Nyiricyubahiro , niyemeza kumwohereza i Roma .
44025026	Icyakora nta kirego na kimwe cy'ukuri mbonye nakwandikira umwami w'i Roma . Ngicyo igitumye muzana imbere yanyu , cyane cyane imbere yawe Mwami Agiripa , kugira ngo nimumara kumubaza mbone icyo nandika ,
44025027	kuko nasanze nta cyo bivuze kohereza umuntu w'imfungwa ntagaragaje neza icyo aregwa . ”
44026001	Nuko Agiripa abwira Pawulo ati : “ Ngaho iregure . ” Pawulo arambura ukuboko atangira kwiregura ati :
44026002	“ Mwami Agiripa , nshimishijwe no kuba ndi imbere yawe uyu munsi , kugira ngo niregure ku byo Abayahudi bandeze byose ,
44026003	cyane cyane kuko usanzwe uzi neza imico y'Abayahudi n'ibyo bajyaho impaka . Ni cyo gitumye ngusaba ngo wihanganire kunyumva .
44026004	“ Abayahudi bose bazi imibereho yanjye uhereye mu buto bwanjye , kuva mbere mba mu gihugu cyacu ndetse n'igihe nari i Yeruzalemu .
44026005	Banzi kuva kera , babishatse bashobora guhamya ko nahoze ndi Umufarizayi , ni ukuvuga uwo mu ishyaka ry'abakurikiza idini yacu ku buryo bukataje .
44026006	None ubu ndaregwa ko nizera ibyo Imana yasezeraniye ba sogokuruza .
44026007	Iryo sezerano ni ryo imiryango yacu cumi n'ibiri ikomoka kuri Isiraheli yizera kuzahabwa , ari na cyo gituma ishishikarira gusenga Imana ijoro n'amanywa . None Nyagasani , kwizera iryo sezerano ni ibyo Abayahudi bandega !
44026008	Kuki mwihandagaza muvuga muti : ‘ Ntibishoboka ko Imana yazura abapfuye ? ’
44026009	“ Nanjye ubwanjye natekerezaga ko ngomba kurwanya ibya Yezu w'i Nazareti uko nshoboye kose .
44026010	Ni na byo nakoze i Yeruzalemu : benshi mu ntore z'Imana nabashyize muri gereza mpawe uburenganzira n'abakuru bo mu batambyi , kandi n'igihe babaga baciriwe urwo gupfa narabishyigikiraga .
44026011	Kenshi mu nsengero zose nabahanishaga bikomeye , nkabahatira no gutuka Kristo . Nakabyaga kubarakarira ku buryo mbatoteza kugeza no mu mijyi yo mu mahanga .
44026012	“ Ni cyo cyatumye njya i Damasi abatambyi bakuru bampaye uburenganzira n'amabwiriza .
44026013	Nuko rero Mwami Agiripa , ndi mu nzira ngenda ku manywa y'ihangu , ngiye kubona mbona umucyo uturutse mu ijuru ukaze kuruta uw'izuba , urangota kimwe n'abo twagendanaga .
44026014	Twese twikubita hasi maze numva ijwi ry'umbwira mu Giheburayi ati : ‘ Sawuli , Sawuli ! Urantotereza iki ? Uribabariza ubusa — “ Nta nduru irwana n'ingoma ! ” ’
44026015	Nuko ndabaza nti : ‘ Uri nde Nyagasani ? ’ Na we aransubiza ati : ‘ Ndi Yezu uwo utoteza .
44026016	Ariko byuka uhagarare . Igituma nkubonekeye ni ukugira ngo nkugire umugaragu wanjye n'umugabo wo guhamya ibyo ubonye kuri jye , kimwe n'ibyo nzakwereka .
44026017	Nzagutabara ngukize Abayahudi n'abanyamahanga ngutumyeho .
44026018	Ngutumye kubahumura amaso kugira ngo ubahindure , bave mu mwijima bagere mu mucyo , bave no mu bushobozi bwa Satani bagarukire Imana , kugira ngo nibanyemera bababarirwe ibyaha , kandi bahabwe ku munani wagenewe abantu Imana yagize intore zayo . ’
44026019	“ Kubera iyo mpamvu Mwami Agiripa , nta cyari kumbuza kumvira ibyo neretswe biturutse mu ijuru .
44026020	Nuko mbanziriza i Damasi , maze ngera i Yeruzalemu no mu ntara yose ya Yudeya ndetse no mu yandi mahanga , nemeza abaho bose kwihana ngo bahindukirire Imana , maze bakore ibikwiranye no kwihana .
44026021	Ni cyo cyatumye Abayahudi bamfata igihe nari mu rugo rw'Ingoro y'Imana , bakagerageza kunyica .
44026022	No kugeza uyu munsi Imana iracyantabara , nkaba mpagaritswe aha no kubyemeza aboroheje n'abakomeye . Nta bindi mvuga bitari ibyo abahanuzi na Musa bavuze ko bizaba :
44026023	ko Kristo yagombaga kubabazwa agapfa maze akaba ubimburiye abandi kuzuka , akava mu bapfuye ngo atangaze ko ari we rumuri rumurikira Abayahudi ndetse n'amahanga yose . ”
44026024	Pawulo amaze kwiregura atyo Fesito ariyamirira ati : “ Pawulo , wasaze ! Wize byinshi none biragushajije ! ”
44026025	Pawulo aramusubiza ati : “ Nyakubahwa Fesito , sindi umusazi ahubwo ibyo mvuga ni iby'ukuri , kandi ni iby'umuntu ushyira mu gaciro .
44026026	Ibyo byose Umwami Agiripa arabizi , ni na cyo kintera kumubwira ntishisha . Ndemeza ko nta na kimwe muri ibyo atazi kuko bitakozwe rwihishwa .
44026027	Mwami Agiripa , mbese wemera ibyanditswe n'abahanuzi ? Nzi ko ubyemera ! ”
44026028	Nuko Agiripa abwira Pawulo ati : “ Mbese uragira ngo muri aka kanya gato unyemeze kuba Umukristo ? ”
44026029	Pawulo aramusubiza ati : “ Kaba ari akanya gato cyangwa kanini , ndasaba Imana ngo uretse wowe gusa , ahubwo n'abanyumva none mwese mumere nkanjye , ukuyeho izi ngoyi ndiho gusa ! ”
44026030	Umwami n'Umutegetsi Fesito na Berenike n'abandi bari bicaranye na bo barahaguruka .
44026031	Bagitirimuka aho baravugana bati : “ Uyu muntu nta cyaha yakoze cyo kumwicisha , habe n'icyo kumufungisha . ”
44026032	Nuko Agiripa abwira Fesito ati : “ Uyu muntu yajyaga kurekurwa iyo atajuririra umwami w'i Roma . ”
44027001	Bamaze kwemeza ko dufata ubwato tukajya mu Butaliyani , bashinga Pawulo n'izindi mbohe umukapiteni witwa Yuli wo mu mutwe w'abasirikari bita uw'umwami w'i Roma .
44027002	Twurira ubwato buvuye Aduramiti , bwari bugiye kujya mu byambu byo mu ntara ya Aziya , maze turagenda . Tujyana na Arisitariko ukomoka i Tesaloniki muri Masedoniya .
44027003	Bukeye duhagarara i Sidoni , Yuli agirira Pawulo neza amuha uruhusa rwo gusura incuti ze , kugira ngo zimuhe icyo akeneye .
44027004	Tuvuye aho tugenda dukikiye ikirwa cya Shipure , ku buryo kidukingira umuyaga waduturukaga imbere .
44027005	Tuhavuye tunyura mu nyanja ihereranye n'intara za Silisiya na Pamfiliya , maze turambuka turasuka i Mira ho mu ntara yitwa Lisiya .
44027006	Aho ngaho umukapiteni ahabona ubundi bwato buturutse Alegisanderiya bujya mu Butaliyani , maze arabutwuriza .
44027007	Tumara iminsi itari mike tugenda buhoro , tugera ahateganye n'umujyi w'i Kinida bitugoye . Umuyaga utubujije gukomeza , ni bwo dukikiye ikirwa cya Kireti , ahateganye na Salumoni kugira ngo kidukingire umuyaga .
44027008	Tumaze kuhakikira bituruhije , tugera ku cyambu cyitwa Myaromyiza hafi y'umujyi wa Lasaya .
44027009	Turahatinda ndetse turenza umunsi w'Abayahudi wo kwigomwa kurya , ku buryo gukomeza urugendo mu bwato kwari ukwigerezaho . Pawulo ni ko kubaburira ati :
44027010	“ Mwa bagabo mwe , ndabona uru rugendo rurimo ingorane : ubwato kimwe n'imitwaro buhetse bizangirika , si byo gusa natwe bishobora kuduhitana . ”
44027011	Ariko umukapiteni aho kwita ku cyo Pawulo avuga , akurikiza inama y'umutware w'abasare na nyir'ubwato .
44027012	Icyo cyambu nticyari kiboneye ku buryo bari kuhamara amezi y'imbeho n'umuyaga , ni cyo cyatumye abenshi bahuza inama yo kuvayo , biringira kugera ahitwa Fenike , kugira ngo baharangirize ayo mezi y'imbeho . Fenike ni icyambu cyo muri Kireti cyerekeje aho imiyaga ituruka , uwo mu majyepfo y'iburengerazuba n'uwo mu majyaruguru y'iburengerazuba .
44027013	Bumvise umuyaga woroshye uva mu majyepfo utangiye guhuha , bibwira ko bashyikiriye icyo bashakaga , ni ko kuzitura ubwato bagenda bakikiye ikirwa cya Kireti ahegereye inkombe .
44027014	Ariko bidatinze ishuheri y'umuyaga witwa “ Majyaruguru y'iburasirazuba ” , itangira guhuha ituruka ku kirwa .

44027016	Igihe twanyuraga mu majyepfo y'akarwa kitwa Kawuda , twabonye aho twikinga umuyaga akanya gato . Aho ni ho twashoboye kwiyegereza akato kaziritse ku bwato bwacu ariko bituruhije .
44027017	Abasare barakūriza bagashyira mu bwato , maze bazengurutsa ubwato imigozi ikomeye , barabuhambira kugira ngo butajegajega . Nuko barekurira mu mazi ingiga nsikabwato kugira ngo bugende buhoro , ibyo babitewe no gutinya kurigita mu musenyi usaya , ahagana ku nkombe za Libiya . Nuko ubwato butwarwa n'umuyaga .
44027018	Dukomeza guteraganwa bikomeye n'inkubi y'umuyaga , ku buryo bukeye bwaho batangiye kuroha mu nyanja imitwaro ubwato bwari bwikoreye , kugira ngo bwe kuremererwa .
44027019	Ku munsi wa gatatu , abasare ubwabo bafata ibikoresho by'ubwato na byo barabiroha .
44027020	Twamaze iminsi myinshi tutareba izuba n'inyenyeri , umuyaga n'umuhengeri bikomeza guhōrera kugeza ubwo tutari twiringiye ko hari ubasha kurokoka .
44027021	Bari bamaze iminsi batarya . Pawulo ni ko guhagarara hagati yabo arababwira ati : “ Mwa bagabo mwe , byajyaga kuba byiza iyo muza kunyumva ntimuve muri Kireti , ntimwari kugera muri aya makuba no guhomba ibintu bingana bitya .
44027022	Ariko ubu bwo ndabagira inama yatuma musubiza umutima mu nda , kuko ari nta n'umwe muri mwe uzagira icyo aba keretse ubwato .
44027023	Iri joro nabonekewe n'umumarayika w'Imana niyeguriye kandi nkorera ,
44027024	arambwira ati : ‘ Pawulo , witinya ! Ni ngombwa ko ugera imbere y'umwami w'i Roma kandi dore Imana ikugiriye neza , igusezeranyije kugukiza wowe n'aba bose mufatanyije urugendo . ’
44027025	Kubera iyo mpamvu rero mwa bagabo mwe , nimukomere ! Nizeye Imana , bizaba nk'uko nabibwiwe .
44027026	Icyakora hari ikirwa ubwato buzagomba kudusukaho . ”
44027027	Mu ijoro rya cumi na kane , igihe tugitwarwa n'imbaraga z'umuyaga mu Nyanja ya Mediterane rwagati , nko mu gicuku abasare bibwira ko bari hafi kugera imusozi .
44027028	Bamanurira mu mazi umugozi uziritseho icyuma kugira ngo bapime uko hareshya , basanga ari metero mirongo itatu n'indwi z'ubujyakuzimu . Bicumye gato bongera gupima , babona ari metero makumyabiri n'umunani .
44027029	Batinya ko ubwato bwasekura ku ntaza , ni ko kumanurira mu mazi ibitsikabwato bine by'ibyuma bifashwe n'imigozi , ngo ahari byafata hasi bikabuhagarika , maze basaba Imana ko bucya vuba .

44027034	Ndabasabye rero nimufungure , kugira ngo mubone kubaho . Erega nta n'umwe muri mwe uzagira icyo aba , habe no gupfuka agasatsi na kamwe ! ”
44027035	Amaze kuvuga atyo afata umugati , ashimira Imana imbere yabo bose , arawumanyura atangira gufungura .
44027036	Bose bagarura agatima na bo barafungura .
44027037	Abari mu bwato twese twari magana abiri na mirongo irindwi na batandatu .
44027038	Umuntu wese amaze guhaga bajugunya ingano zasigaye mu nyanja , kugira ngo borohereze ubwato .
44027039	Bumaze gucya abasare ntibamenya ahantu bitegeye aho ari ho , ariko babonye ikigobe gifite inkuka z'umusenyi , biyemeza ko bishobotse ari ho bomorera ubwato .
44027040	Bazitura bya byuma bihagarika ubwato birokera mu mazi , bahambura n'imigozi yari iziritse ingashya zerekeza ubwato , bazamura umwenda w'imbere ubugendesha kugira ngo umuyaga ubusunike bagane ku nkombe .

44028001	Tumaze guhonoka icyo cyago tumenya yuko ikirwa tugezeho cyitwa Malita .
44028002	Abaturage baho batwakira neza bitangaje , baducanira umuriro kuko imvura yagwaga hariho n'imbeho .

44028005	Ariko Pawulo akungutira iyo nzoka mu muriro , we ntiyagira icyo aba na mba .

44028008	Se wa Pubuliyo yari mu kirago ari indembe , arwaye amacinya ahinda n'umuriro . Pawulo ajya kumureba , amaze gusenga amurambikaho ibiganza aramukiza .

44028018	Basuzumye ibyo ndegwa basanga nta cyo nakoze cyo kunyicisha , bashaka kundekura .

44028020	Ngicyo icyatumye mbatumiza kugira ngo tuganire . Koko nashyizwe kuri iyi ngoyi mpōrwa Uwo Abisiraheli bizera kuzabona . ”
44028021	Baramusubiza bati : “ Ntabwo twigeze tubona urwandiko ruturutse i Yudeya rukuvuga , ndetse nta n'umwe mu bavandimwe bacu bavuyeyo wigeze akubaraho ikibi .
44028022	Icyakora turashaka kumenya icyo utekereza , kuko tuzi yuko icyo gice urimo hose bakigaya . ”
44028023	Basezerana na we umunsi bazongera guterana , uwo munsi ugeze haza benshi bamusanga aho acumbitse . Pawulo ahera mu gitondo ageza nimugoroba arabasobanurira . 44028024	Bamwe bemezwa n'ibyo avuze , abandi ntibabyemera .

44028026	‘ Genda ubwire abo bantu uti : Kumva muzumva ariko ntimuzasobanukirwa , kureba muzareba ariko ntimuzabona .

44028028	Pawulo yungamo ati : “ Nuko none mumenye ko ab'andi mahanga bagejejweho aka gakiza kava ku Mana , bo bazakakira ! ” [

44028031	Yatangazaga ubwami bw'Imana kandi akigisha ibyerekeye Nyagasani Yezu Kristo , nta nkomyi nta n'umususu .
45001001	Ni jye Pawulo ubandikiye , jyewe umugaragu wa Kristo Yezu . Imana yampamagariye kuba Intumwa yayo , intoranyiriza kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwayo bwiza .
45001002	Ubwo Butumwa Imana yabusezeranye kuva mbere mu Byanditswe yatugeneye , itumye abahanuzi bayo .
45001003	Buvuga ibyerekeye Umwana wayo Yezu Kristo Umwami wacu . 45001005	Ku bw'uwo Imana yangiriye ubuntu ngo mbe Intumwa yayo , nemeze abo mu mahanga yose ibya Kristo kugira ngo bamwemere , bityo bamwumvire .

45001011	Mbega ukuntu nifuza kubabona , kugira ngo ngire impano ya Mwuka w'Imana mbagezaho yo kubakomeza !
45001012	Ndifuza kuba muri mwe ngo muterwe inkunga no kwemera Kristo kwanjye , nanjye nyiterwe n'ukwanyu .
45001013	Bavandimwe , sinabahisha ko kenshi nafashe umugambi wo kuza iwanyu , ariko kugeza ubu nkagira impamvu zibimbuza . Nifuzaga ko umurimo wanjye wakwera imbuto iwanyu , bityo nkaba nungutse abemera Kristo muri mwe kimwe no mu yandi mahanga nagezemo .
45001014	Koko nahawe inshingano yo kugeza Ubutumwa bwiza ku bantu bose , baba abasirimu cyangwa abanyamusozi , baba abanyabwenge cyangwa abaswa .
45001015	Ni cyo gituma nshaka namwe kubagezaho Ubutumwa bwiza , mwebwe abari i Roma .
45001016	Erega kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza ntibintera isoni , kuko ari bwo bubasha Imana ikoresha ngo ikize uwemera Kristo wese , uhereye ku Bayahudi ukageza no ku bandi .
45001017	Ubwo Butumwa ni bwo buhishura uburyo Imana iha abantu kuyitunganira babikesha kwemera Kristo , bigatuma bagenda barushaho kumwizera . Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo “ Utunganiye Imana abitewe no kuyizera azabaho ” .
45001018	Uhereye mu ijuru , Imana yahishuye uburakari iterwa n'ubugome bwose bw'abantu bayisuzugura bakagira nabi , bagapfukirana ukuri bitewe n'ubwo bugome bwabo .
45001019	Erega ibyo umuntu ashobora kumenya ku byerekeye Imana bimaze kubagaragarira , kuko Imana ubwayo yabibagaragarije !
45001020	Kuva isi yaremwa , ibitaboneka by'Imana — ni ukuvuga ububasha buhoraho bwayo n'ubumana bwayo — abantu babibona mu byo yaremye ku buryo busobanutse . Nta cyo rero bafite bakwireguza .
45001021	Nubwo bazi Imana , ntibayihaye ikuzo kandi ntibayishimiye nk'uko biyikwiye . Ahubwo ibitekerezo byabo byabaye imburamumaro , kandi ukujijwa kw'imitima yabo kwatumye bahera mu mwijima .
45001022	Barirase ngo ni abanyabwenge , nyamara babaye ibicucu .
45001023	Ikuzo ry'Imana idapfa bariguranye amashusho y'abantu bapfa , n'ay'inyoni n'ay'inyamaswa n'ay'ibikurura inda .

45001025	Ukuri kw'Imana bakuguranye ibinyoma , maze baramya kandi bagakorera ibyaremwe babisimbuza Imana Rurema , ari iyo ikwiye gusingizwa iteka ryose . Amina .
45001026	Ni cyo gituma Imana yabaretse bakagengwa n'irari ritesha agaciro , bigeza aho abagore babo bakoresha imibiri yabo ku buryo bunyuranye n'ubwo yaremewe .
45001027	Abagabo na bo biba bityo bareka kubana n'abagore bashakanye uko Imana yabigennye , ahubwo barararikirana ubwabo bigeza aho bakora ibizira umugabo ku wundi , maze babona mu mibiri yabo ingaruka ikwiranye n'ubuyobe bwabo .
45001028	Bibwiraga ko atari ngombwa kumenyana n'Imana , ni cyo cyatumye na yo ibareka ngo bagire ibitekerezo bigoramye , bakore n'ibidakwiye .
45001029	Buzuye ubugome bw'uburyo bwose , hamwe n'ubugizi bwa nabi n'irari ry'ibintu n'urugomo . Bigwizamo ishyari n'ubwicanyi , amakimbirane n'ubutiriganya n'amatiku , gukwiza amagambo
45001030	no gusebanya . Ni abanzi b'Imana n'abanyagasuzuguro n'abirasi , barirarira bagahimba ibibi ntibumvire ababyeyi ,
45001031	barangwaho ubujiji n'ubuhemu , ni indashoboka nta n'impuhwe bagira .
45001032	Bazi iteka ry'Imana rivuga ko ibyaha nk'ibyo bikwiye guhanishwa urupfu , nyamara ntibabikora gusa ahubwo banashima ababikora .
45002001	Wowe uwo uri we wese wigira umucamanza w'abandi , nta cyo ufite wakwireguza . Erega igihe unegura abandi nawe uba wineguye , kubera ko ibyo bakora ari ibyo nawe ukora !
45002002	Koko kandi tuzi ko Imana icira urubanza abagenza batyo ishingiye ku kuri .
45002003	Ese wowe wigira umucamanza w'abakora bene ibyo kandi ukora nka bo , ukeka ko uzarokoka urubanza rw'Imana ?
45002004	Cyangwa wirengagiza ineza yayo isesuye n'ubugwaneza n'ukwihangana kwayo ? Mbese ntuzi ko ikugirira neza ityo kugira ngo wihane ?
45002005	Ibiri amambu winangiye umutima , ntiwemera guhanwa . Ni cyo gituma urushaho kwikururira uburakari bw'Imana , kuri wa munsi izahishura imanza zayo zitabera .
45002006	Ubwo ni bwo izagirira umuntu wese ibikwiranye n'ibyo yakoze .
45002007	Abazaba baravunwe no gukora neza bagaharanira ikuzo n'icyubahiro no kudapfa , izabaha ubugingo buhoraho .
45002008	Naho abatera amahane bagahakana ukuri bakiyegurira ubugome , izabagirira umujinya n'uburakari .
45002009	Umugizi wa nabi uwo ari we wese azagubwaho n'amakuba n'ishavu , bibanzirize ku Bayahudi bigere no ku batari Abayahudi .
45002010	Naho abagiraneza bose bazahabwa ikuzo n'icyubahiro n'amahoro , bibanzirize ku Bayahudi bigere no ku batari Abayahudi ,
45002011	kuko Imana ifata abantu bose kimwe .
45002012	Abacumura bose batazi Amategeko bazapfa batazize ayo mategeko , naho abacumura bose bazi ayo mategeko bazacirwa urubanza rushingiye kuri yo .
45002013	Koko rero abumva Amategeko si bo ntungane ku Mana , keretse abayakurikiza gusa .
45002014	Abanyamahanga ntibazi Amategeko , nyamara iyo bayumviye bayabwirijwe n'imitima yabo , baba bibereye itegeko ubwabo kandi nta mategeko basanganywe .
45002015	Bityo ibikorwa byabo byerekana ko amategeko y'Imana yanditswe mu mitima yabo , n'imitima yabo na yo irabihamya , kimwe n'ibitekerezo byabo bibabwira biti : “ Wakoze nabi ” , cyangwa biti : “ Wakoze neza ” .
45002016	Ni ko bizamera ku munsi Imana izaca urubanza rw'ibihishwe mu mitima y'abantu ikoresheje Kristo Yezu — ni na ko Ubutumwa bwiza nahawe bubyemeza .
45002017	Noneho wowe witwa Umuyahudi , wishingikiriza ku Mategeko kandi ukarata Imana yawe ,
45002018	uzi icyo Imana ishaka kandi wigishijwe n'Amategeko yayo guhitamo ibyiza .
45002019	Wowe wemeza ko uri umurandasi w'impumyi n'urumuri ruboneshereza abari mu mwijima ,
45002020	ukaba n'umwigisha w'injiji n'umwarimu w'abana , uzi ko muri ayo Mategeko ufite ubumenyi n'ukuri nya byo .
45002021	None se ubwo bimeze bityo , kuki wigisha abandi ntiwiyigishe ? Ubuzanya kwiba kandi ukiba !
45002022	Ubwiriza kudasambana kandi ugasambana ! Uvuga ko wanga ibigirwamana urunuka kandi ugasahura ingoro zabyo !
45002023	Urata Amategeko kandi ugasuzuguza Imana uyacaho !
45002024	Nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga , “ Ni mwebwe mutuma abatari Abayahudi batuka Imana . ”
45002025	Niba ukurikiza Amategeko gukebwa biba bigufitiye akamaro , ariko niba uyarengaho ni nk'aho waba utigeze ukebwa .
45002026	Naho rero umuntu utigeze akebwa agakurikiza ibiri mu Mategeko byose , mbese Imana ntizamufata nk'aho yaba yarakebwe ?
45002027	Ndetse utigeze akebwa umubiri ariko agakurikiza amategeko y'Imana , uwo azagucira urubanza wowe uca kuri ayo mategeko , nubwo ufite inyandiko yayo kandi warakebwe .
45002028	Koko rero ikibonekera amaso gusa si cyo kiranga Umuyahudi nyakuri , kandi gukebwa umubiri gusa si ko gukebwa nyakuri .
45002029	Ahubwo Umuyahudi nyakuri arangwa n'ibiri mu mutima we , akaba yarakebwe ku mutima bigizwe na Mwuka w'Imana , bitavuye ku Mategeko yanditswe . Uwo nguwo aba adashaka gushimwa n'abantu , ahubwo ngo ashimwe n'Imana .
45003001	None se kuba Umuyahudi birushije iki kutaba we ? Mbese gukebwa byo bifite kamaro ki ?
45003002	Ku buryo bwose ni kanini ! Icya mbere Abayahudi ni bo bashinzwe amabwiriza y'Imana .
45003003	None se naho bamwe muri bo baba barabaye abahemu , ubuhemu bwabo bwatuma Imana ireka kuba indahemuka ?
45003004	Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ni ngombwa kumenya ko Imana ari inyakuri , naho umuntu wese yaba umubeshyi . Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
45003005	None rero niba ubugome bwacu bushyira ku mugaragaro ubutungane bw'Imana , ibyo se ni ukuvuga iki ? Bibaye bityo igihe Imana irakaye ikaduhana , mbese iba iturenganyije ? ( Ibyo mbivuze nk'uko abantu babivuga . )
45003006	Ntibikanavugwe ! None se Imana iramutse irenganya , yazashobora ite gucira abantu bose urubanza ?
45003007	Icyakora niba ikinyoma cyanjye gituma ukuri kw'Imana kurushaho kugaragara bikayihesha ikuzo , kuki jyewe nkigomba guhōrwa icyaha cyanjye ?
45003008	Niba ari uko bimeze , ni kuki tutakora ikibi kugira ngo kivemo icyiza , nk'uko bamwe batubeshyera ngo ni ko tuvuga ? Abo ngabo bazacirwa urubanza rubakwiriye .
45003009	Bite rero ? Twebwe Abayahudi se hari icyo turusha abandi ? Nta na gito . Nk'uko tumaze kubigaragaza , Abayahudi kimwe n'abatari Abayahudi , ibyaha ni byo bibagenga bose .
45003010	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
45003011	nta numwe usobanukiwe , nta numwe wambaza Imana .
45003012	Bose bayiteshutseho , bose uko bangana ni imburamumaro , ntawe ukora ibikwiye , habe numwe ! ”
45003013	“ Bafite akarimi gashyanuka , ariko bikingirije ubwicanyi . ” “ Ibyo bavuga bimera nkubumara bwincira . ”
45003014	“ Amagambo yabo yuzuyemo imivumo no gukariha . ”
45003015	“ Bihutira kumena amaraso ,
45003016	aho banyuze hasigara ari amatongo numubabaro ,
45003017	ntibamenya imigenzereze yamahoro . ”
45003018	“ Ntibigera batinya Imana . ”
45003019	Tuzi ko ibyo Amategeko y'Imana avuga byose abibwira abagengwa na yo , kugira ngo hatagira ubona icyo yireguza , kandi ngo abari ku isi bose bashyirwe mu rubanza imbere y'Imana .
45003020	Ngiyo impamvu nta muntu n'umwe uba intungane imbere y'Imana , yitwaje ko akurikiza amategeko yayo . Icyo Amategeko abereyeho ni ukumenyesha umuntu ko yacumuye .
45003021	Ubu ariko Imana yagaragaje uburyo igira abantu intungane imbere yayo , Amategeko atabigizemo uruhare . Ubwo buryo bwemejwe n'Amategeko n'ibyanditswe n'abahanuzi .
45003022	Ibagira intungane babikesha kwemera Yezu Kristo . Ibigirira abamwizera bose nta kurobanura .
45003023	Koko bose bakoze ibyaha , ntibagera ku kigero cy'ikuzo ry'Imana .
45003024	Ariko none Imana yabahereye ubuntu kuba intungane imbere yayo , babikesha gucungurwa na Kristo Yezu .
45003025	Ni we Imana yagennye ngo abere abantu icyiru ku bwamaraso yabameneye babikesha kumwizera . Kwari ukwerekana ubutabera bwayo igihe yihanganiraga abantu , ntibahanire ibyaha bari barakoze mbere . No muri iki gihe yerekanye ubutabera bwayo , kugira ngo itaretse kuba intabera , igire intungane umuntu wese wizera Yezu . Ni we Imana yagennye ngo abere abantu icyiru ku bwamaraso yabameneye babikesha kumwizera . Kwari ukwerekana ubutabera bwayo igihe yihanganiraga abantu , ntibahanire ibyaha bari barakoze mbere . No muri iki gihe yerekanye ubutabera bwayo , kugira ngo itaretse kuba intabera , igire intungane umuntu wese wizera Yezu .

45003027	None se haracyari impamvu yatuma abantu birata ? Nta n'imwe . Kubera iki ? Barata se ko bakora ibyategetswe n'Amategeko ? Oya , ahubwo barata ko bizera Yezu .
45003028	Koko rero dusanga umuntu agirwa intungane imbere y'Imana kuko yizera Kristo , bidaturutse ku gukora ibitegekwa n'Amategeko .
45003029	Cyangwa se Imana yaba ari iy'Abayahudi bonyine ? Ese ntabwo ari n'iy'abatari Abayahudi ? Koko ni iyabo na bo ,
45003030	kuko Imana ari imwe rukumbi . Abayahudi bakebwe izabagira intungane imbere yayo kuko bemeye Kristo , n'abatigeze bakebwa na bo ni uko ibonye ko bamwemeye .
45003031	Ibyo se bivuga ko ukwemera Kristo gutuma dutesha Amategeko agaciro ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ahubwo kudutera kuyashyigikira rwose .
45004001	Twavuga iki se kuri Aburahamu umukurambere wacu ? Mbese byamugendekeye bite ?
45004002	Niba yaragizwe intungane n'ibikorwa bye afite icyo yirata , ariko nta cyo yakwirata imbere y'Imana .
45004003	Mbese Ibyanditswe bivuga iki ? Biravuga ngo : “ Aburahamu yizeye Imana bituma abarwa nk'intungane . ”
45004004	Uwakoze umurimo igihembo ahabwa ntaba agiherewe ubuntu , ahubwo baba bamwishyuye ibyo yakoze .
45004005	Naho udashingira ku byo akora , ahubwo akizera Imana igira abanyabyaha intungane , uwo nguwo ukwizera kwe kuzatuma abarwa nk'intungane .
45004006	Ni uko Dawidi avuga ibyerekeye amahirwe y'umuntu Imana ibara nk'intungane , bidashingiye ku byo akora . Yaravuze ati :
45004007	“ Hahirwa abantu Imana yababariye ibicumuro , ikabahanaguraho ibyaha byabo .
45004008	Hahirwa umuntu Nyagasani atabaraho icyaha . ”
45004009	Mbese ayo mahirwe Dawidi avuga agenewe abantu bakebwe gusa , cyangwa agenewe n'abatakebwe ? Nk'uko tumaze kuvuga , ukwizera kwa Aburahamu kwatumye Imana imubara nk'intungane .
45004010	Ariko se byabaye ryari ? Ese ni mbere cyangwa nyuma y'ugukebwa kwe ? Si nyuma ahubwo ni mbere .
45004011	Nyuma yaho Imana yahaye Aburahamu ikimenyetso cyo gukebwa . Kwari ukugaragaza ko yari yaramufashe nk'intungane imbere yayo , kubera ko yari yarayizeye atarakebwa . Bityo Aburahamu yabaye umubyeyi w'abizera Imana bose batakebwe , na yo ikababara nk'intungane .
45004012	Ubusanzwe kandi ni umubyeyi w'abakebwe bidatewe n'uko bakebwe , ahubwo ari uko bakurikiza urugero rwo kwizera Imana sogokuruza Aburahamu yari afite atarakebwa .
45004013	Imana yasezeranyije Aburahamu ko we cyangwa urubyaro rwe bazahabwa isi ho umunani . Ntiyahawe iryo sezerano kubera ko yumviye Amategeko y'Imana , ahubwo ni ubutungane bwe buvuye ku kuyizera .
45004014	Niba abakurikiza amategeko ari bo bonyine bahabwa umunani , ukwizera Imana nta cyo kwaba kukimaze kandi n'Isezerano ryayo ryaba ritaye agaciro .
45004015	Koko Amategeko y'Imana akururira umuntu uburakari bwayo , ariko aho batazi amategeko nta waregwa ko atayumviye .
45004016	None rero abizera Imana ni bo bahabwa umunani yabasezeranyije , kugira ngo babe bawuhawe ku buntu kandi ngo urubyaro rwose rwa Aburahamu rwemererwe kuwuhabwa . Urwo rubyaro ntirugizwe gusa n'abakurikiza Amategeko , rugizwe kandi n'abizera Imana kimwe n'uko Aburahamu yayizeraga . Ni we mukurambere wacu twese .
45004017	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Nzaguha gukomokwaho n'amahanga menshi . ” Ni umukurambere wacu imbere y'Imana yizeye ari yo Mana izura abapfuye , n'ibitariho ikabibeshaho .
45004018	Aburahamu yizeye Imana bituma yiringira , kandi nta cyariho cyatera umuntu kwiringira . Bityo aba umukurambere w'amahanga menshi . Ni na ko Imana yari yaramubwiye iti “ Urubyaro rwawe ni ko ruzangana . ”
45004019	Yari amaze imyaka nk'ijana umubiri we umeze nk'uwapfuye na Sara akaba yari yaracuze , nyamara ntiyacogoye mu kwizera Imana .
45004020	Ntabwo yigeze ashidikanya ibyo Imana yamusezeranyije , ahubwo yakomejwe no kuyizera kandi arayisingiza .
45004021	Yemejwe rwose ko Imana ifite ububasha bwo gukora icyo yasezeranye .
45004022	Ngiyo impamvu Imana yamubaze nk'intungane kubera ko yayizeye .
45004023	Kandi si we wenyine Ibyanditswe bivugaho iri jambo ngo : “ Imana yamubaze nk'intungane ” ,
45004024	ahubwo natwe biratureba kuko Imana izatubara nk'intungane , kubera ko twizeye iyazuye Yezu Umwami wacu mu bapfuye .
45004025	Yashyikirijwe abamwica azira ibyaha byacu , maze arazuka ngo tugirwe intungane imbere y'Imana .
45005001	Nuko rero ubwo ukwemera Kristo kwatugize intungane imbere y'Imana , tubana amahoro na yo tubikesha Yezu Kristo Umwami wacu .
45005002	Ni we watugejeje kuri ubu buntu bw'Imana dushingiyeho kubera kumwizera . Noneho dufite ishema kuko twiringira kuzahabwa ku ikuzo ry'Imana .
45005003	Si ibyo gusa ahubwo dufite n'ishema ry'amakuba yacu kuko tuzi ko amakuba atera kwihangana ,
45005004	kwihangana na ko kukadutera gutsinda ibitugerageza , kubitsinda na ko kukadutera kwiringira Imana .
45005005	Uyiringira kandi ntabwo azakorwa n'isoni , kuko urukundo rw'Imana rwasakajwe mu mitima yacu bitewe na Mwuka Muziranenge twahawe .
45005006	Koko rero ku gihe Imana yateganyije twe tukiri abanyantege nke , Kristo yapfiriye abatubaha Imana .
45005007	Birakomeye kubona umuntu wemera gupfira intungane , icyakora ahari hari uwakwiyemeza gupfira umunyangeso nziza .
45005008	Ariko Imana yatweretse ukuntu idukunda , igihe Kristo yadupfiraga tukiri abanyabyaha .
45005009	Noneho ubwo twagizwe intungane imbere y'Imana n'amaraso ye , tuzarushaho gukizwa uburakari bwayo tubikesha Kristo .
45005010	Igihe twari tukiri abanzi b'Imana ni bwo yiyunze na twe ikoresheje urupfu rw'Umwana wayo , none rero ubwo twunzwe na yo n'urupfu rwe , tuzarushaho gukizwa no kubaho kwe .
45005011	Ikindi kandi , dusigaye duterwa ishema n'Imana kubera Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo waduhaye kwiyunga na yo .
45005012	Ibyaha byazanywe ku isi n'umuntu umwe ari we Adamu , kandi ni byo byazanye urupfu . Bityo urupfu rugera ku bantu bose kuko bose bakoze ibyaha .
45005013	No mu gihe Imana yari itaratanga Amategeko ibyaha byahoze ku isi , icyakora ntawashoboraga kubihanirwa igihe nta mategeko ahari .
45005014	Nyamara kuva mu gihe cya Adamu kugeza mu cya Musa , urupfu rwari rufite ubushobozi ku bantu , ndetse no ku batari barakoze icyaha gihwanye n'igicumuro cya Adamu . Adamu ni ishusho y'uwagombaga kuza .
45005015	Icyakora igicumuro cya Adamu nta wakigereranya n'impano Imana itanga . Ni ukuri igicumuro cy'umuntu umwe cyateje rubanda rwose urupfu . Nyamara ubuntu bw'Imana mbega ukuntu buhebuje , kimwe n'impano igabira abantu bayikesha umuntu umwe Yezu Kristo , ikarushaho gusakara muri rubanda !
45005016	Impano y'Imana kandi nta wayigereranya n'icyaha cya wa muntu umwe Adamu . Urubanza rwaje nyuma y'icyaha cy'umwe ruzanira abantu gucirwa iteka , naho impano y'Imana yatanzwe nyuma y'ibicumuro byinshi izanira abantu gutunganira Imana .
45005017	Koko rero igicumuro cy'umuntu umwe cyatumye urupfu ruganza mu bantu , bitewe na wa muntu . Ni na ko rero abagiriwe ubuntu busesuye , bakagabirwa impano yo gutunganira Imana , bazarushaho kuganza mu bugingo buhoraho babikesha umuntu umwe ari we Yezu Kristo .
45005018	Nuko rero nk'uko igicumuro cy'umuntu umwe cyatumye bose baba abo gucirwa iteka , ni na ko umurimo utunganye wakozwe n'umuntu umwe uhesha bose ubutungane bubageza ku bugingo .
45005019	Koko rero nk'uko kutumvira Imana k'umuntu umwe kwatumye rubanda baba abanyabyaha , ni na ko kumvira k'umuntu umwe kuzahesha rubanda gutunganira Imana .
45005020	Amategeko yo yazanywe no kugira ngo ibicumuro bigwire , ariko aho ibyaha byagwiriye , ubuntu Imana igira bwarushijeho gusākara .
45005021	Noneho nk'uko ibyaha byaganje mu bantu bibageza mu rupfu , ni na ko ubuntu bw'Imana buganza bushingiye ku butungane , kugira ngo bubageze ku bugingo buhoraho ku bwa Yezu Kristo Umwami wacu .
45006001	Ubwo bimeze bityo tuvuge iki ? Mbese tugumye gukora ibyaha kugira ngo ubuntu Imana itugirira bugwire ?
45006002	Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ese ko twapfuye ku byerekeye ibyaha twashobora dute kugumya kubikora ?
45006003	Mbese muyobewe ko twese ababatirijwe kuba umwe na Kristo Yezu , twabatirijwe kuba umwe na we mu rupfu rwe ?
45006004	Ni ukuvuga ko igihe twabatizwaga twahambanywe na we , kwari ugupfa nk'uko na we yapfuye , kugira ngo nk'uko Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye ku bw'ikuzo ry'Imana Data , abe ari ko natwe tubaho dufite ubugingo bushya .
45006005	Koko rero ubwo twabaye umwe na we , dupfuye nk'uko yapfuye , tuzaba umwe na we na none tuzutse nk'uko yazutse .
45006006	Tumenye neza ibi ngibi : umuntu twari we kera yabambanywe na Kristo ku musaraba , kugira ngo kamere yacu ikunda ibyaha itsembwe tureke rwose kuba mu buja bw'ibyaha ,
45006007	kuko uwapfuye aba atakigengwa n'ibyaha .
45006008	Ubwo twapfanye na Kristo , twizeye kandi ko tuzabanaho na we .
45006009	Tuzi neza ko Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye . Nuko rero ntagipfa , urupfu nta bubasha rukimufiteho .
45006010	Ubwo yapfaga yapfuye rimwe ku bw'ibyaha , naho uko abaho ubu ngubu ariho ku bw'Imana .
45006011	Namwe ni uko , mujye mwemera ko mwapfuye ku byaha , mukaba muriho ku bw'Imana mubikesha kuba muri Kristo Yezu .
45006012	Nuko rero ibyaha ntibikaganze mu mibiri yanyu izapfa , ngo bitume mukurikiza ibyo irarikira .
45006013	Ingingo z'imibiri yanyu ntimukazigabize ibyaha ngo zibe ibikoresho by'ubugome . Ahubwo mwiyegurire Imana kubera ko mwavuye ikuzimu mukaba bazima , muyegurire n'ingingo zanyu ngo zibe ibikoresho byayo zikora ibiyitunganiye .
45006014	Ibyaha ntibikabaganze kuko mutakigengwa n'Amategeko , ahubwo mugengwa n'ubuntu Imana ibagirira .
45006015	Ibyo se ni ukuvuga iki ? Mbese tujye dukora ibyaha kubera ko tutakigengwa n'Amategeko , tukaba tugengwa n'ubuntu Imana itugirira ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe !
45006016	Mbese ntimuzi ko iyo mwiyeguriye umuntu kugira ngo ababere Shobuja kandi mumwumvire , icyo gihe muba mwishyize mu buja bw'uwo muntu mwemeye kumvira ? Byaba ari ibyaha mwiyeguriye bizabageza ku rupfu , kwaba ari ukumvira Imana bizabageza ku butungane .
45006017	Dushimire Imana . Mwahoze mu buja bw'ibyaha , ariko none mwakurikije urugero rw'inyigisho mwahawe mubikuye ku mutima .
45006018	Imana yabakuye ku ngoyi y'ibyaha ibagira abagaragu b'ubutungane .
45006019	Ibyo ndabibabwira ntanga ingero ku bisanzwe mu bantu , kubera intege nke zanyu . Nk'uko kera mwari mwaratanze ingingo z'imibiri yanyu kugira ngo zibe abaja b'ubwomanzi n'ibicumuro bibyara ibindi , na none abe ari ko muzitanga kugira ngo zibe abagaragu b'ubutungane bubageza ku buziranenge .
45006020	Igihe mwari mu buja bw'ibyaha ntimwagengwaga n'ubutungane .
45006021	Mbese ibyo mwakoraga kera byabamariye iki , ko ubu mugira n'isoni zo kubyibuka ? Koko kandi ibyo bikorwa bigeza umuntu ku rupfu .
45006022	Ariko none mwakuwe ku ngoyi y'ibyaha muba abagaragu b'Imana , bituma mugira ibikorwa bibaganisha ku buziranenge , amaherezo bikazabahesha ubugingo buhoraho .
45006023	Ibihembo by'ibyaha ni urupfu , ariko impano y'Imana ni ubugingo buhoraho duherwa muri Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu .
45007001	Bavandimwe , ubwo musanzwe muhugukiwe n'Amategeko ntimwabura kumva ibyo ngiye kubabwira . Mbese muyobewe ko Amategeko agenga umuntu igihe akiriho gusa ?
45007002	Itegeko rigenga abashakanye rishinga umugore kubana n'umugabo we igihe cyose akiriho , ariko iyo umugabo amaze gupfa , umugore ntaba akigengwa n'iryo tegeko .
45007003	Ni cyo gituma umugore wishyingira undi mugabo uwe akiriho , yitwa umusambanyi . Ariko niba umugabo we amaze gupfa uwo mugore ntaba akigengwa n'iryo tegeko , ku buryo ashyingiwe undi mugabo ntiyaba umusambanyi .
45007004	Bavandimwe , namwe ni uko . Kuba umwe na Kristo mu rupfu rwe byatumye mupfa mu ruhande rw'Amategeko , kugira ngo mube ab'undi ari we Kristo wazutse mu bapfuye . Kwari ukugira ngo tugwize ibikorwa bishimisha Imana .
45007005	Koko rero tukigengwa na kamere yacu , irari ryo gukora ibyaha ryakangurwaga n'Amategeko , rigakora ibyaryo mu mitima yacu , rigatuma tugwiza ibikorwa bizana urupfu .
45007006	Naho ubu ntitukigengwa n'Amategeko , kuko twapfuye mu ruhande rw'ibyari bitugize imfungwa . Noneho dusigaye dukorera Imana ku buryo bushya dushobozwa na Mwuka , ntitukiyikorera ku buryo bushaje tuyoborwa n'Amategeko yanditswe .
45007007	Ibyo se tubivugeho iki ? Ese Amategeko tuyite icyaha ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ahubwo iyo Amategeko atakinyereka sinari kumenya icyaha icyo ari cyo . Sinari kumenya irari , iyo hataba itegeko rivuga ngo : “ Ntukifuze ibyo abandi batunze . ”
45007008	Icyakora ibyaha byishingikirije ku Mategeko bintera irari ry'uburyo bwose . Koko hatabayeho amategeko ibyaha ntibyabaho .
45007009	Kera ntaramenya icyitwa itegeko nari muzima . Ariko haje Amategeko ibyaha birampagurukana ,
45007010	bityo ndapfa . Amabwiriza y'Imana yari agenewe kuzana ubugingo , jyewe yanzaniye urupfu .
45007011	Bityo ibyaha byishingikirije kuri ayo mabwiriza , biranshuka , bibona urwaho biranyica .
45007012	Ni ukuvuga ko Amategeko y'Imana atagira inenge , n'amabwiriza yayo nta nenge , anyuze mu kuri kandi ni meza rwose .
45007013	None se ibyiza nk'ibyo byanzaniye urupfu ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ahubwo ibyaha ni byo byarunzaniye . Byitwaje ibyiza binteza urupfu kugira ngo byigaragaze ukuntu ari bibi . Uko ni ko amabwiriza y'Imana yatumye ibyaha bimbera ibyaha ku buryo bukabije .
45007014	Tuzi ko Amategeko aturuka ku Mana , nyamara jyewe ndi umuntu ugengwa na kamere yanjye , naraguzwe mba inkoreragahato y'ibyaha .
45007015	Sinsobanukirwa ibyo nkora kuko ibyo nshaka gukora ntabikora , ahubwo ibyo nanga nkaba ari byo nkora .
45007016	Noneho ubwo nkora ibyo ntashaka , mba nemeye ko Amategeko ari meza .
45007017	Bityo rero si jye ubikora , ahubwo ni ibyaha binyaritsemo .
45007018	Nzi rero ko muri jye , ni ukuvuga muri kamere yanjye , nta cyiza kimbamo . Ubushake bwo gukora ibyiza ndabufite , ariko kubikora simbishobora .
45007019	Ibyiza nshaka simbikora , naho ibibi ntashaka akaba ari byo nkora .
45007020	Ubwo rero nkora ibyo ntashaka si jye ubikora , ahubwo ni ibyaha binyaritsemo .
45007021	Dore uko nasanze bigenda : igihe nshaka gukora ibyiza , ibibi bintanga imbere .
45007022	Mu mutima wanjye Amategeko y'Imana aranshimisha ,
45007023	ariko muri kamere yanjye nsangamo ibindi bintegeka birwana intambara n'amategeko yemewe n'umutima wanjye . Ibyaha ni byo bitegeka kamere yanjye bikangira imfungwa .
45007024	Mbega ngo ndagatora ! Ni nde wankiza uyu mubiri wigaruriwe n'urupfu ?
45007025	Imana ishimirwe ko izabikora , ibinyujije kuri Yezu Kristo Umwami wacu . Noneho dore uko bingendekera : mu mutima nkurikiza Amategeko y'Imana , ariko kandi ku bwa kamere ndi inkoreragahato y'ibyaha bintegeka .
45008001	Ubu rero abari muri Kristo Yezu nta teka bacirwa ,
45008002	kuko gutegekwa na Mwuka w'ubugingo buri muri Kristo Yezu kwankuye mu buja bwo gutegekwa n'ibyaha n'urupfu .
45008003	Ibyo Amategeko atashoboye bitewe n'intege nke za kamere y'umuntu , Imana yarabikoze . Yohereje Umwana wayo bwite afite kamere imeze nk'iy'abantu b'abanyabyaha , kugira ngo abe igitambo cy'ibyaha byabo . Ni ko gutsinda burundu ibyaha biri muri kamere y'umuntu ,
45008004	kugira ngo tugirwe intungane rwose nk'uko Amategeko ashaka , twebwe abatayoborwa na kamere yacu , ahubwo tuyoborwa na Mwuka w'Imana .
45008005	Abayoborwa na kamere yabo baharanira ibyo kamere yabo ishaka , naho abayoborwa na Mwuka baharanira ibyo Mwuka ashaka .
45008006	Guharanira ibyo kamere ishaka bibyara urupfu , naho guharanira ibyo Mwuka ashaka bibyara ubugingo n'amahoro .
45008007	Ni yo mpamvu abaharanira ibyo kamere yabo ishaka ari abanzi b'Imana , ntibumvira Amategeko y'Imana , nta n'ubwo bashobora kuyumvira .
45008008	Abagengwa na kamere yabo ntibabasha gushimisha Imana .
45008009	Mwebwe rero ntabwo mugengwa na kamere yanyu , ahubwo mugengwa na Mwuka kubera ko Mwuka w'Imana abatuyemo . Udafite Mwuka wa Kristo ntabwo aba ari uwe .
45008010	Ariko niba Kristo ari muri mwe , nubwo imibiri yanyu ari iyo gupfa kubera ibyaha , nyamara Mwuka abahesha ubugingo kuko yabagize intungane imbere y'Imana .
45008011	Niba kandi Mwuka w'Imana yazuye Yezu mu bapfuye abatuyemo , iyo Mana yazuye Kristo Yezu izabeshaho n'imibiri yanyu ipfa , ikoresheje Mwuka wayo utuye muri mwe .
45008012	Bityo rero bavandimwe , twahawe inshingano atari kamere yacu iyidushinze , ngo tubeho uko ishaka .
45008013	Niba mubaho uko kamere yanyu ishaka muzapfa , naho niba muheshwa na Mwuka gutsinda imigirire muterwa na kamere yanyu muzabaho .
45008014	Koko rero abayoborwa na Mwuka w'Imana ni bo bana b'Imana .
45008015	Mwuka mwahawe si uwo kubashyira mu buja ngo musubire mu bwoba . Ahubwo Mwuka mwahawe ni uwo kubagira abana b'Imana , agatuma dutakambira Imana tuti : “ Aba . ” ni ukuvuga ngo : “ Data . ”
45008016	Mwuka ubwe ni we utwemeza mu mitima ko turi abana b'Imana .
45008017	Ubwo turi abana bayo rero , ni natwe yageneye umunani . Koko Imana izaduha umunani , ndetse tuzawuhānwa na Kristo . Ubwo dufatanyije na we imibabaro , tuzahabwa ikuzo hamwe na we .
45008018	Ndatekereza ko imibabaro yacu yo muri iki gihe ntaho ihuriye n'ikuzo Imana izaduhishurira .
45008019	Ibyaremwe byose bitegereje n'ubwuzu bwinshi igihe Imana izahishura abana bayo .
45008020	Koko rero ibyaremwe byose byahawe kugengwa n'ibitagira umumaro , atari ku bushake bwabyo ahubwo ari uko Imana yiyemeje ko biba bityo . Nyamara biracyafite kwiringira
45008021	ko bizavanwa mu buja bw'uko kononekara , kugira ngo byishyire byizane , kandi bihabwe ikuzo uko bigenewe abana b'Imana .
45008022	Tuzi ko na n'ubu ibyaremwe byose biniha , bikanababazwa nk'umugore uri ku nda .
45008023	Si byo byonyine , natwe dufite Mwuka ho umusogongero , turanihira mu mutima dutegereje kugirwa abana b'Imana , no gukizwa kw'imibiri yacu .
45008024	Twarakijijwe ariko hari ibyo tucyiringiye . Iyo ubonye ikintu uba utacyiringira kuzakibona . Ni nde wavuga ko yiringiye kubona ikintu kandi amaze kugishyikira ?
45008025	Ariko ubwo twiringira ibyo tutarabona bidutera kubitegereza twihanganye .
45008026	Bityo Mwuka adusanga dufite intege nke akatwunganira . Koko ntituzi gusenga nk'uko bikwiye , ariko Mwuka ubwe adusabira ku Mana na we aniha , kandi uko aniha nta wabona uko abivuga .
45008027	Nyamara Imana ireba mu mitima izi imigambi ya Mwuka , kuko asabira intore zayo ibihuje n'ibyo ishaka .
45008028	Tuzi kandi ko byose bifatanyiriza hamwe kuzanira ibyiza abakunda Imana , abo yahamagaye nk'uko yabyiyemeje .
45008029	Abo yamenye kuva kera yabageneye kumera nk'Umwana wayo , kugira ngo abe ari we uba impfura mu bavandimwe benshi .
45008030	Abo yageneye ibyo yarabahamagaye , abo yahamagaye yabagize intungane imbere yayo , abo yagize intungane yabahaye n'ikuzo .
45008031	None se ibyo twabivugaho iki ? Ubwo Imana itwemera ni nde uzaturwanya ?
45008032	Ubwo itimanye Umwana wayo bwite , ahubwo ikamushyikiriza abamwica ari twe twese azira , izabura ite kuduhāna byose na we ?
45008033	Ni nde uzarega abo Imana yitoranyirije ? Nta we kuko yo ibita abere .
45008034	Ni nde wabaciraho iteka ? Nta we kuko Kristo Yezu ari we wapfuye ndetse akazuka , ubu akaba ari iburyo bw'Imana adusabira .
45008035	Ni nde uzadutandukanya n'urukundo rwa Kristo ? Ese amakuba yabishobora , cyangwa ishavu , cyangwa ugutotezwa , cyangwa inzara , cyangwa ubukene , cyangwa akaga , cyangwa urupfu ?
45008036	Ni ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
45008037	Ariko muri ibyo byose turushaho gutsinda tubikesha uwadukunze .
45008038	Koko rero ndemeza ko nta kizadutandukanya nurukundo rwe , ari urupfu cyangwa ubuzima , ari abamarayika cyangwa ibinyabutware bigenga isi , ari ibyubu cyangwa ibizaza , ari ibinyabubasha , ari ibyo mu ijuru cyangwa ibyikuzimu , ari nikindi cyaremwe icyo ari cyo cyose , nta na kimwe kizabasha kudutandukanya nurukundo rwImana rugaragarira muri Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu . Koko rero ndemeza ko nta kizadutandukanya nurukundo rwe , ari urupfu cyangwa ubuzima , ari abamarayika cyangwa ibinyabutware bigenga isi , ari ibyubu cyangwa ibizaza , ari ibinyabubasha , ari ibyo mu ijuru cyangwa ibyikuzimu , ari nikindi cyaremwe icyo ari cyo cyose , nta na kimwe kizabasha kudutandukanya nurukundo rwImana rugaragarira muri Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu .

45009001	Ibyo mbabwira ni ukuri , ndi uwa Kristo sinabeshya . Mbyemejwe kandi n'umutima wanjye , uyoborwa na Mwuka Muziranenge .
45009002	Mbega ukuntu mfite agahinda kenshi kandi nkababara ubutitsa !
45009003	Rwose nakwifuza kuba ari jye uvumwa n'Imana nkaba natandukana na Kristo , mbigirira abavandimwe banjye duhuje ubwoko .
45009004	Ni bo muryango wa Isiraheli Imana yagize abana bayo , ikanabaha ku ikuzo ryayo . Yagiranye amasezerano na bo ibashinga Amategeko , ibaha kuyisenga uko ishaka kandi ibasezeranya ibyiza .
45009005	Ba sekuruza ni bo na Kristo akomokaho , ukurikije igisekuru cy'abantu . Imana Isumbabyose iragasingizwa iteka ryose . Amina .
45009006	Nyamara si ukuvuga ko Imana yashēshe ibyo yari yarasezeranye , kuko abakomoka kuri Isiraheli atari ko bose ari Abisiraheli nyakuri .
45009007	Kandi abakomoka kuri Aburahamu si ko bose ari urubyaro rwe nyakuri . Ahubwo Imana yaramubwiye iti : “ Izaki ni we uzakomokwaho n'urubyaro nagusezeranyije . ”
45009008	Ibyo bivuga ko abakomotse kuri Aburahamu ku buryo busanzwe atari bo bitwa abana b'Imana , keretse abavutse ku buryo bw'amasezerano yayo ni bo bonyine bitwa urubyaro rwe .
45009009	Koko rero iri ni ryo sezerano Imana yahaye Aburahamu , ngo : “ Undi mwaka iki gihe nzagaruka , kandi Sara azaba yarabyaye umwana w'umuhungu . ”
45009010	Si ibyo gusa hari na Rebeka wabyaye abana babiri , bombi bakaba bafite se umwe ari we sogokuruza Izaki .
45009011	Nyamara kandi Imana ifite ibyo ikurikiza mu gutoranya abantu bidaturutse ku bikorwa byabo , ahubwo biturutse kuri yo ubwayo yabihamagariye . Ni yo mpamvu igihe abana bimpanga ba Rebeka bari bataravuka , bataranakora icyiza cyangwa ikibi , Imana yamubwiye iti : “ Gakuru azaba umugaragu wa Gato . ” Nyamara kandi Imana ifite ibyo ikurikiza mu gutoranya abantu bidaturutse ku bikorwa byabo , ahubwo biturutse kuri yo ubwayo yabihamagariye . Ni yo mpamvu igihe abana bimpanga ba Rebeka bari bataravuka , bataranakora icyiza cyangwa ikibi , Imana yamubwiye iti : “ Gakuru azaba umugaragu wa Gato . ”
