45009013	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Nikundiye Yakobo , naho Ezawu mwigizayo . ”
45009014	None se ibyo twabivugaho iki ? Ese Imana yaba irenganya ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe !
45009015	Yabwiye Musa iti : “ Ngirira imbabazi n'impuhwe uwo nshatse . ”
45009016	Ibyo rero ntabwo biterwa n'ubushake bw'umuntu cyangwa n'umwete we , ahubwo bituruka ku Mana nyir'imbabazi .
45009017	Ni na ko mu Byanditswe Imana yabwiye Umwami wa Misiri iti : “ Ngiki icyatumye ngushyiraho : ni ukugira ngo nerekanire muri wowe imbaraga zanjye , kandi bitume menyekana ku isi yose . ”
45009018	Ni ukuvuga rero ko Imana igirira imbabazi uwo ishaka , kandi ikanangira umutima w'uwo ishaka .
45009019	Noneho rero wabaza uti : “ Ubwo ari uko bimeze , ni iki Imana ikigaya abantu ? Mbese ubundi hari uwaca ku bushake bwayo ? ”
45009020	Wowe muntu , uri iki kugira ngo ugishe Imana impaka ? Ese ikibumbano cyabaza uwakibumbye kiti : “ Kuki wambumbye utya ? ”
45009021	Ese umubumbyi si we ufite ubushobozi bwo kugena icyo ibumba riri bukore , mu mutege umwe waryo agakoramo urwabya rugenewe imirimo y'icyubahiro , n'urundi rugenewe imirimo isuzuguritse ?
45009022	Ni na ko Imana yihitiyemo kwerekana uburakari bwayo no kugaragaza ububasha bwayo . Nyamara yiyemeje kwihanganira cyane abikururiragaho uburakari byayo bagenewe kurimbuka .
45009023	Ibyo kwari ukugaragaza ukuntu ikuzo ryayo risesuye ku bo ishaka kugirira imbabazi , abo uhereye kera yari yarateguriye kuzagira uruhare kuri iryo kuzo .
45009024	Abo kandi ni twebwe Imana yahamagaye , itadutoranyije mu Bayahudi gusa , ahubwo idutoranyije no mu yandi mahanga .
45009025	Ni na ko Imana yavuze mu gitabo cyanditswe na Hozeya iti :
45009026	Kandi ahantu bababwiriraga ngo ‘ Ntimuri ubwoko bwanjye ’ , ni ho bazitirwa abana bImana nzima . ”
45009027	Ezayi na we yavuze aranguruye ibyerekeye Abisiraheli ati : “ Nubwo Abisiraheli bangana numusenyi wo ku nyanja , agace gato kazaba gasigaye ni ko kazarokoka ,
45009028	Nyagasani ntazatinda gusohoza ijambo rye mu isi ku buryo bunonosoye . ”
45009029	Ni byo Ezayi yari yarahanuye mbere ati : “ Iyo Nyagasani Nyiringabo atadusigira nibura urubyaro ruke , tuba twararimbutse nkumujyi wa Sodoma , tuba twararimbutse nkumujyi wa Gomora . ”
45009030	None se ibyo twabivugaho iki ? Ni uko abatari Abayahudi batigeze bashaka gutunganira Imana , bagizwe intungane babikesha kwizera Kristo .
45009031	Ibiri amambu Abisiraheli bashakashakaga amategeko yatuma batunganira Imana , nyamara ntabwo bageze ku ntego Amategeko yari agamije .
45009032	Kubera iki se ? Kubera ko ubwo butungane batabukuraga ku kwemera Kristo , ahubwo biringiraga kubuheshwa n'ibikorwa byabo . Basitaye kuri rya buye risitaza
45009033	ryavuzwe mu Byanditswe ngo :
45010001	Bavandimwe , icyo nifuriza Abisiraheli mbikuye ku mutima ni uko bakizwa , ni na byo mbasabira ku Mana .
45010002	Ndahamya rwose ko bafite ishyaka ryo gukorera Imana , ariko ni ishyaka ridashingiye ku kuyimenya .
45010003	Ntibasobanukiwe uburyo Imana igira abantu intungane , ahubwo bashaka ubwabo buryo bwo kwigira intungane , bagasuzugura ubutungane Imana itanga .
45010004	Erega Kristo ni we wanonosoye ibyo Amategeko yari agamije , kugira ngo umwizera wese Imana imugire intungane !
45010005	Musa ubwe yanditse ibyerekeye gutunganira Imana bivuye ku Mategeko agira ati : “ Uzayumvira azabeshwaho na yo . ”
45010006	Nyamara dore icyo avuga ku byerekeye ubutungane buvuye ku kwizera : “ Ntukibaze uti : ‘ Ni nde washobora kuzamuka mu ijuru ? ’ ( ari ukugira ngo ajye kumanurayo Kristo ) ,
45010007	cyangwa ngo wibaze uti : ‘ Ni nde washobora kumanuka ikuzimu ? ’ ( ari ukugira ngo azamureyo Kristo amuvana mu bapfuye . ) ”
45010008	Ahubwo aravuga ati : “ Ijambo ry'Imana urarifite , warifashe mu mutwe ndetse ushobora kuritondagura . ” Ni ryo jambo twamamaza rikubwira kwizera Kristo ,
45010009	ngo nubyivugira n'umunwa wawe ko Yezu ari Nyagasani , ukemera mu mutima wawe ko Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye uzakizwa .
45010010	Koko rero kubyemera mu mutima bituma Imana ikugira intungane , naho kubyivugira n'umunwa bigatuma ukizwa .
45010011	Ibyanditswe bigira biti : “ Nta n'umwe umwizera uzakorwa n'isoni . ”
45010012	Bityo Umuyahudi n'utari Umuyahudi nta kurobanura , bose bafite Nyagasani umwe usendereza ibyiza bye ku bamwambaza bose .
45010013	Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Umuntu wese uzatakambira Nyagasani azakizwa . ”
45010014	None se bamwiyambaza bate batabanje kumwemera ? Kandi bamwemera bate batigeze bamwumva ? Mbese bamwumva bate hatabonetse umuntu umwamamaza ?
45010015	Ikindi kandi abantu bamwamamaza bate ntawe ubatumye ? Ni yo mpamvu Ibyanditswe bigira biti : “ Mbega ukuntu ari byiza kubona abazanye Inkuru nziza ! ”
45010016	Ariko si bose bumviye ubwo Butumwa bwiza . Ni na ko Ezayi yavuze ati : “ Nyagasani , ni nde wemeye ibyo yatwumvanye ? ”
45010017	Bityo abantu bemera Kristo bamaze kumva ubutumwa , kandi ubwo butumwa ni ukubwirwa ibyerekeye Kristo .
45010018	Noneho ndabaza . Mbese abantu ntibumvise ubwo butumwa ? Yee , barabwumvise . Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo :
45010019	Ndabaza rero . Mbese Abisiraheli ntibabisobanukiwe ? Erega mbere Musa yari yaravuze ati : “ Nzabaharika abanyamahanga mbatere gufuha , nzabarakaza ntonesha abanyabwengebuke ! ”
45010020	Ndetse Ezayi yageze naho yerura ati : “ Abatanshakaga barambonye , abatagize icyo bambaza ndabiyeretse . ”
45010021	Ariko ku byerekeye Abisiraheli agira ati : “ Nirizaga umunsi nteze amaboko ngo nakire abantu bibyigomeke batanyumvira . ”
45011001	None rero ndabaza . Mbese Imana yaba yaraciye ubwoko bwayo ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Nanjye ubwanjye ndi Umwisiraheli ukomoka kuri Aburahamu , mu muryango wa Benyamini .
45011002	Imana ntiyatereranye ubwoko bwayo yitoranyirije kuva kera . Mbese ntimuzi icyo Ibyanditswe bivuga , aho Eliya yaregaga Abisiraheli ku Mana ? Yaravuze ati :
45011003	“ Nyagasani , bishe abahanuzi bawe basenya intambiro zawe , ni jye usigaye jyenyine none nanjye barampigira kunyica . ”
45011004	Ariko se Imana yamushubije iki ? Yaravuze iti : “ Nisigiye abantu ibihumbi birindwi batarapfukamira ikigirwamana Bāli . ”
45011005	No muri iki gihe na bwo , agace gato kitwa Abasigaye , Imana yakagiriye ubuntu irakitoranyiriza .
45011006	Kwari ukubagirira ubuntu koko itabitewe n'ibikorwa byabo , kuko bitabaye bityo ubuntu igira bwaba butakiri ubuntu .
45011007	Ibyo se ni ukuvuga iki ? Icyo Abisiraheli bashakaga nta bwo bakibonye . Abakibonye ni abo Imana yatoranyije , naho abandi bose barinangiye .
45011008	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Imana yabahaye imitima ihuramye n'amaso atabona n'amatwi atumva kugeza n'ubu . ”
45011009	Dawidi na we ati :
45011010	Amaso yabo ahume atsiratsize , uteze imigongo yabo guhora ihetamye . ”
45011011	Nuko rero ndabaza . Mbese igihe Abisiraheli basitaraga kwari ukugwa burundu ? Ibyo ntibikanavugwe ! Ahubwo gucumura kwabo kwatumye agakiza kagera ku banyamahanga , kugira ngo bitere Abisiraheli ishyari .
45011012	None se ubwo gucumura kwabo kwakungahaje abatuye isi , gucogora kwabo kugakungahaza abanyamahanga , hazacura iki nibaramuka basubiye byuzuye mu byabo ?
45011013	Noneho reka mbabwire mwebwe abatari Abayahudi : ni jye Ntumwa Kristo yatumye ku batari Abayahudi , mfite ishema ry'umurimo yanshinze .
45011014	Icyampa nkabona uko ntera bene wacu b'Abayahudi kugira ishyari ngo mbakizemo bamwe !
45011015	Koko rero ubwo guhēzwa kwabo kwatumye rubanda rutari Abayahudi bungwa n'Imana , hazacura iki igihe Abayahudi ubwabo bazayigarukira ? Bazamera nk'abazutse mu bapfuye !
45011016	Igihe bafata igisate cy'umugati ho umuganura bakagitura Imana , byerekana ko uwo mugati wose na wo ari uwayo . Kandi igihe imizi y'igiti yegurirwa Imana , amashami na yo aba ari ayayo .
45011017	Urubyaro rwa Isiraheli rugereranywa n'igiti cy'umunzenze cyakonzweho amashami . Wowe utari Umuyahudi ugereranywa n'ishami ry'umunzeze wo mu gasozi ryagemetswe aho ayo mashami yakonzwe , bityo nawe ukaba ufite uruhare ku byo imizi itungisha icyo giti .
45011018	Nuko rero we kwirata ngo wigambe ku mashami . None se wakwirata iki ? Si wowe ushyigikiye imizi , ahubwo imizi ni yo igushyigikiye .
45011019	Ahari aho wakwibwira uti : “ Amashami yarakonzwe kugira ngo ngemekwe . ”
45011020	Yee , ni byo . Icyo ayo mashami yazize ni uguhemuka kwayo . Naho wowe ikiguhagaritse ni ukuyoboka Kristo kwawe . Ntukirate rero , ahubwo utinye Imana .
45011021	Koko ubwo Imana itababariye abagereranywa n'amashami kamere , nawe ntizakubabarira .
45011022	Zirikana rero kugira neza kw'Imana n'igitsure cyayo , abayivuyeho yabagiriye igitsure naho wowe ikugirira neza . Icyakora ni ngombwa ko uguma muri ubwo buntu ikugirira , bitabaye bityo nawe ni uko , uzakondwa nka ya mashami .
45011023	Naho Abayahudi nibareka ubuhemu bwabo , bazaba nk'amashami yakonzwe nyuma akagemekwa aho yahoze mbere , kuko Imana ifite ububasha bwo kongera kubagemeka .
45011024	Wowe utari Umuyahudi , uri nk'ishami kamere ryavuye ku munzenze wa mu gasozi , maze ku buryo bunyuranye n'imihingire isanzwe y'ibiti , ugemekwa ku munzenze w'umuterano . None se ko Abayahudi ari bo mashami kamere y'uwo munzenze w'umuterano , babura bate kugemekwa ku munzenze wabo bwite ?
45011025	Koko rero bavandimwe , sinshaka ko muyoberwa iri banga hato mutibeshya ko muri abanyabwenge , ni uko igice kimwe cy'Abisiraheli cyinangiye . Ibyo bizakomeza kugeza igihe abanyamahanga bazemera Kristo byuzuye .

45011027	Ngiryo Isezerano nzagirana na bo nimbakuraho ibyaha . ”
45011028	Ku byerekeye Ubutumwa bwiza , Abayahudi babaye abanzi b'Imana mwe bibagirira akamaro . Naho ku byerekeye gutoranya kw'Imana , ni abatoni bayo kubera ba sekuruza .
45011029	Koko Imana ntabwo yisubiza ibyo yahaye abantu , cyangwa ngo yivuguruze iyo yabahamagaye .
45011030	Namwe kera mwanze kumvira Imana , none ubu yabagiriye imbabazi bitewe n'uko Abayahudi banze kuyumvira .
45011031	Ubu ni ko biri kuri bo , babaye intumvira kugira ngo mwe mumaze kugirirwa imbabazi , ubu na bo bazigirirwe .
45011032	Imana yagize abantu bose imbohe babitewe no kutayumvira , kugira ngo ibone uko igirira bose imbabazi .
45011033	Mbega ukuntu Imana ari umukungu wa byose ! Mbega ukuntu ubwenge bwayo n'ubumenyi bwayo biturenze ! Ibyo yiyemeza ni amayobera rwose , kandi imigenzereze yayo nta wayimenya .
45011034	Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
45011035	“ Ni nde wigeze abanza kugira icyo amuha , ngo na we abe amwituye ? ”
45011036	Erega byose bikomoka ku Mana , byose bibeshwaho na yo , byose bigenewe kuba ibyayo ! Nihorane ikuzo iteka ryose . Amina .
45012001	Bavandimwe , kubera ko Imana yabahaye imbabazi ndabihanangiriza ngo mwitange , maze mube ibitambo bizima byeguriwe Imana biyishimisha . Uko ni ko kuyikorera kubakwiriye .
45012002	Ntimugakurikize imibereho y'ab'iki gihe , ahubwo mureke Imana ivugurure ibitekerezo byanyu mube muhindutse rwose . Ni bwo muzashobora kumenya neza ibyo Imana ishaka , kugira ngo muhitemo ibyiza biyishimishije kandi bitunganye rwose .
45012003	Kubera ubuntu Imana yangiriye ndabwira buri wese muri mwe nti : “ Uramenye we kwitekerezaho birenze urugero uriho , ahubwo ushyire mu gaciro wiyoroheje ukurikije urugero Imana yaguhaye rwo kuyizera .

45012005	Uko ni ko nubwo turi benshi muri Kristo twabaye umubiri umwe , twese duhurijwe hamwe buri muntu akaba urugingo rwa mugenzi we .
45012006	Dufite kandi impano zitandukanye Imana yatugabiye buri wese iye . Uwahawe guhanura ngo avuge ibyo yeretswe , nakoreshe iyo mpano ashingiye ku kwizera yahawe n'Imana .

45013001	Buri muntu niyemere kugengwa n'abategetsi kuko nta butegetsi buriho butaturutse ku Mana , n'abategetsi bariho ni yo yabubahaye .

45013004	Erega abategetsi ni abagaragu b'Imana , bashyiriweho kugutera gukora neza ! Icyakora nukora nabi ugomba kubatinya , kuko ububasha bwo guhana batabuherewe ubusa . Koko rero ni abagaragu b'Imana bashyiriweho guhana inkozi z'ibibi nk'uko uburakari bwayo buri .

45014009	Ni cyo cyatumye Kristo apfa akazuka , kugira ngo abe umwami w'abariho n'abapfuye .

45014016	Ikibabereye cyiza ntikigatere abantu gutukana .

45014020	Ntugasenye umurimo w'Imana bitewe n'ibyo urya . Koko nta byokurya bizira , ariko ikibi ni uko umuntu yarya ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose cyagusha undi mu cyaha .

45016017	Bavandimwe , ndabihanangirije ngo mwirinde abaca ibice mu bavandimwe , kandi bakababangamira bagaca ukubiri n'inyigisho mwahawe , bene abo ngabo mubagendere kure .
45016018	Koko rero abameze batyo ntibakorera Umwami wacu Kristo , ahubwo bakorera inda zabo . Bakoresha akarimi keza n'amagambo yo kuryoshyaryoshya , bakayobya abafite imitima yoroshye .

45016020	Imana yo sōko y'amahoro , ntizatinda kujanjagurira Satani munsi y'ibirenge byanyu . Umwami wacu Yezu nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .

45016023	Gayo uncumbikiye arabatashya , ni we wakira itorero rya Kristo rikoranira iwe . Erasito umubitsi w'uyu mujyi n'umuvandimwe Kwaruto , na bo barabatashya . [

46001001	Jyewe Pawulo wahamagawe ngo mbe Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko Imana yabishatse , n'umuvandimwe Sositeni ,
46001002	turabandikiye mwebwe ab'itorero ry'Imana riri i Korinti , mwebwe ntore zayo mubikesha kuba muri Kristo Yezu . Imana yabahamagaye ngo mube abayo , hamwe n'abantu bose bambaza Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo aho bari hose — ni Umwami wacu akaba n'uwabo .
46001003	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
46001004	Mpora nshimira Imana yanjye kubera mwebwe , nyishimira ubuntu yabagiriye ibinyujije kuri Kristo Yezu .

46001010	Bavandimwe , ndabinginze mu izina ry'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo ngo mwese mwumvikane , kandi mwe kwicamo ibice , ahubwo mushyire hamwe muhuje ibitekerezo n'imigambi .
46001011	Bavandimwe , abo kwa Kilowe bambwiye amakuru yanyu ko muri mwe hari amakimbirane .
46001012	Dore icyo mvuga ni iki : buri wese avuga ibye umwe ati : “ Ndi uwa Pawulo , ” undi ati : “ Jyewe ndi uwa Apolo , ” naho undi ati : “ Jyewe ndi uwa Petero , ” n'undi ati : “ Jyeweho ndi uwa Kristo . ”
46001013	Ese Kristo yaciwemo ibice byinshi ? Mbese Pawulo ni we wababambiwe ku musaraba ? Mbese ni mu izina rya Pawulo mwabatijwe ?
46001014	Ndashimira Imana ko nta n'umwe muri mwe nabatije uretse Krisipo na Gayo ,
46001015	bityo nta wavuga ko yabatijwe mu izina ryanjye .
46001016	Koko nabatije na Sitefana n'abo mu rugo rwe , ariko uretse abo sinzi ko hari undi nabatije .
46001017	Erega Kristo ntiyantumye kubatiza ahubwo yantumye gutangaza Ubutumwa bwiza , ntakoresheje amagambo y'ubwenge bw'abantu kugira ngo urupfu rwa Kristo ku musaraba rutaba impfabusa .
46001018	Ubutumwa bwerekeye umusaraba wa Kristo ku bazimiye ni ubupfu , naho kuri twebwe abakizwa ni ububasha bw'Imana ,
46001019	kuko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
46001020	Mbese umunyabwenge bimumariye iki ? Ese umwigishamategeko bimumariye iki ? Mbese intyoza mu mpaka ziki gihe yo biyimariye iki ? Mbese aho ubwenge bwiyi si Imana ntiyabuhinduye ubupfu ?
46001021	Imana mu bwenge bwayo ntiyakunze ko abantu bayimenya bayobowe n'ubwenge bwabo bwite . Ahubwo yishimiye gukoresha ubupfu bw'ubutumwa tuvuga kugira ngo ikize abemera Kristo .
46001022	Abayahudi basaba ibitangaza byo kubemeza , naho Abagereki bagashaka ubwenge .
46001023	Nyamara twebweho dutangaza ibya Kristo wabambwe ku musaraba , Abayahudi ibyo birabashegesha , naho Abagereki bibabera ubupfu .
46001024	Nyamara ku bantu Imana yahamagaye , baba Abayahudi cyangwa Abagereki , Kristo ni ububasha bw'Imana n'ubwenge bwayo ,
46001025	kuko ubupfu bw'Imana burusha abantu ubwenge , n'intege nke z'Imana zirusha abantu imbaraga .
46001026	Bavandimwe , nimwibaze uko mumeze mwebwe abo Imana yahamagaye . Ukurikije uko abantu babibona si benshi muri mwe b'abanyabwenge , si benshi bakomeye , si benshi b'imfura .
46001027	Ahubwo Imana yatoranyije ibyo abantu bita ubupfu kugira ngo ikoze isoni abanyabwenge , yatoranyije ibyo abantu bita ibinyantege nke kugira ngo ikoze isoni abakomeye .
46001028	Yatoranyije ibyo abantu bahinyura n'ibyo basuzugura , ndetse n'ibyo bibwira ko ari ubusa kugira ngo ihindure ubusa ibyo bibwira ko bifite akamaro ,
46001029	ari ukugira ngo hatagira umuntu n'umwe wishyira hejuru imbere y'Imana .
46001030	Imana ubwayo ni yo yabahaye kuba muri Kristo Yezu , ni we utubera ubwenge buva ku Mana n'ubutungane n'ubuziranenge n'ugucungurwa .
46001031	Bityo nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga : “ Ushaka kwirata yirate Nyagasani . ”
46002001	Bavandimwe , igihe nazaga iwanyu nje kubahishurira amabanga y'Imana , sinakoresheje amagambo y'akarimi keza cyangwa ay'ubwenge .
46002002	Ndi kumwe namwe niyemeje kutagira ikindi nibandaho , keretse kubamenyesha Yezu Kristo , cyane cyane Yezu Kristo wabambwe ku musaraba .
46002003	Igihe nazaga iwanyu nari mfite intege nke , ndetse ntinya mpinda umushyitsi .
46002004	Mu nyigisho zanjye no mu byo nabatangarizaga , ntabwo nigeze mbashukisha amagambo y'ubwenge buhanitse , ahubwo naberetse ububasha bwa Mwuka w'Imana .
46002005	Ibyo nabikoreye kugira ngo ukwemera Kristo kwanyu kutaba gushingiye ku bwenge bw'abantu , ahubwo kube gushingiye ku bubasha bw'Imana .
46002006	Icyakora abakuze mu bya Mwuka ni bo twigisha ubwenge , ariko ubwo bwenge si ubw'iyi si cyangwa ubw'ibinyabutware bigenga iyi si byagenewe kurimbuka .
46002007	Ubwenge tubabwira bwo ni ubw'Imana , ni ibanga ryahishwe abantu kuva kera kose , Imana ikabugenera kuduhesha ikuzo .
46002008	Nta n'umwe muri bya binyabutware bigenga iyi si wamenye ubwo bwenge , kuko iyo biza kubumenya ntibyari kubamba Nyagasani Nyir'ikuzo .
46002009	Ahubwo nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ,
46002010	Ibyo Imana yabiduhishuriye ikoresheje Mwuka wayo . Burya Mwuka wImana agenzura byose ndetse namayobera yImana .
46002011	Ni nde wamenya ibyo umuntu atekereza uretse umutima wuwo muntu nyine ? Nta we . Ni na ko rero nta wamenya ibyo Imana itekereza uretse Mwuka wayo .
46002012	Twebwe si umwuka wiyi si twahawe ahubwo ni Mwuka uturuka ku Mana , kugira ngo tumenye impano Imana itugabira ku buntu .
46002013	Ibyo ntitubivuga mu magambo twigishijwe nubwenge bwabantu , ahubwo tubivuga uko tubyigishijwe na Mwuka wImana . Uko ni ko dusobanurira ibya Mwuka abasanzwe bamufite .
46002014	Umuntu ugengwa na kamere ntasobanukirwa ibyerekeye Mwuka w'Imana , ndetse abyita ubupfu . Ntabasha kubimenya kuko bigenzurwa n'ufite Mwuka w'Imana wenyine .
46002015	Umuntu ufite Mwuka w'Imana agenzura byose , nyamara we nta wumugenzura .

46003001	Bavandimwe , sinabashije kuvugana namwe nk'ubwira abafite Mwuka w'Imana . Ahubwo navuganye namwe nk'uvugana n'abantu b'isi , bakiri bato mu bya Kristo .
46003002	Nabatungishije amata , sinabagaburira ibyokurya bikomeye kuko mwari mutarabibasha , ndetse n'ubu ntimurabibasha .
46003003	Muracyifata nk'ab'isi . Mbese ubwo ishyari n'amakimbirane bikirangwa muri mwe , ntibigaragara ko mwifata nk'ab'isi mukagengwa na kamere yanyu nk'abantu bose ?
46003004	Igihe umwe muri mwe avuga ati : “ Jye ndi uwa Pawulo ” , undi ati : “ Jyewe ndi uwa Apolo ” , ntibiba byerekana ko mukimeze nk'ab'isi ?
46003005	Mbese ye , Apolo ni nde ? Ese Pawulo we ni nde ? Twembi turi abagaragu b'Imana batumye mwemera Kristo . Buri wese muri twe akora umurimo yiherewe na Nyagasani .
46003006	Jyewe nateye imbuto Apolo arazivomera , ariko Imana ni yo yatumye zikura .
46003007	Utera imbuto nta cyo ari cyo , uzivomera na we nta cyo ari cyo , Imana yonyine ni yo ituma zikura .
46003008	Utera imbuto n'uzivomēra barahwanye , bombi Imana izabahemba ibihwanye n'umurimo bakoze .
46003009	Twe dufatanya gukora umurimo w'Imana , naho mwe muri umurima wayo . Ikindi kandi muri inzu y'Imana .
46003010	Kubera ubuntu Imana yangiriye , nagenje nk'umwubatsi w'umuhanga nshyiraho urufatiro , undi muntu arwubakaho . Icyakora buri muntu niyitondere uburyo yubaka kuri urwo rufatiro .
46003011	Nta muntu ubasha gushyiraho urundi rufatiro , rutari urwashyizweho ari rwo Yezu Kristo .
46003012	Kuri urwo rufatiro umuntu ashobora kurwubakishaho izahabu cyangwa ifeza , cyangwa amabuye y'agaciro , cyangwa agakoresha ibiti , cyangwa ibyatsi cyangwa ibikenyeri .
46003013	Uko byaba kose , ibikorwa bya buri muntu bizashyirwa ahagaragara ku munsi Imana izaciraho imanza . Kuri uwo munsi bizamenyekana birangwe n'umuriro , umuriro ni na wo uzasuzuma akamaro k'ibikorwa bya buri muntu .
46003014	Umuntu azahembwa niba ibikorwa bye birokotse uwo muriro .
46003015	Nyamara icyo yubatse nigikongorwa n'umuriro azaba ahombye , ariko we ubwe azakizwa nk'uwiyatse umuriro .
46003016	Mbese ntimuzi yuko muri Ingoro y'Imana , na Mwuka wayo akaba atuye muri mwe ?
46003017	Nuko rero umuntu usenya Ingoro y'Imana na we Imana izamuhindura ivu , kuko iyo ngoro yayigize iyayo kandi iyo Ngoro ni mwebwe .
46003018	Ntihakagire uwishuka . Nihagira umuntu muri mwe wibwira ko ari umunyabwenge uko ab'iki gihe babibona , abanze yemere kuba umupfu kugira ngo abone kuba umunyabwenge nyakuri .
46003019	Erega ubwenge bw'iyi si ku Mana ni ubupfu , nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
46003020	Biravuga kandi ngo : “ Nyagasani azi ibyo abanyabwenge batekereza , azi ko nta kamaro bifite . ”
46003021	Bityo ntihagire uwiratana abantu kuko byose ari ibyanyu ,
46003022	yaba Pawulo cyangwa Apolo cyangwa Petero , yaba isi cyangwa ubugingo cyangwa urupfu , byaba ibyo muri iki gihe cyangwa ibyo mu gihe kizaza byose ni ibyanyu ,
46003023	kandi mwebwe muri aba Kristo , na Kristo ni uwImana .
46004001	Abantu bajye badufata nk'abagaragu ba Kristo , bashinzwe amabanga y'Imana .
46004002	Icya ngombwa ku muntu washinzwe umurimo ni ukuba indahemuka .
46004003	Jye nta cyo bimbwiye munciriye urubanza , cyangwa se nduciriwe n'urukiko rusanzwe . Jyewe ubwanjye nta rubanza nicira .
46004004	Mu by'ukuri nta cyo umutima wanjye unshinja , nyamara si byo byemeza ko ndi intungane , ahubwo ni Nyagasani wenyine uncira urubanza .
46004005	Ni cyo gituma mutagomba kugira uwo mucira urubanza igihe kitaragera . Mutegereze ko Nyagasani azaza agashyira ahabona ibihishwe mu mwijima , kandi akagaragaza ibyo abantu bibwira . Ubwo ni bwo Imana izaha umuntu wese ishimwe rimukwiriye .
46004006	Bavandimwe , ibyo nivuzeho ubwanjye n'ibyo navuze kuri Apolo , nabivugaga ari mwe mbigirira kugira ngo mukurikize urugero rwacu , mumenye icyo iri jambo rivuga ngo : “ Ntimukarenge ku Byanditswe ” . Nuko ntimukirate mubogamira ku ruhande rw'umwe ngo murwanye undi .
46004007	Ese koko ni nde wakurutishije abandi ? Ese hari icyo ufite utahawe n'Imana ? Niba kandi waragihawe kuki wirata nk'aho utagihawe ?
46004008	Ubu ga mumaze kurengwa ! Mumaze kuba abakungu ! Erega mubaye nk'abami twe tutabirimo ! Icyampa ngo mube abami koko kugira ngo natwe twimikanwe namwe !
46004009	Twebwe Intumwa za Kristo nsanga Imana yaradushyize mu mwanya w'inyuma , dusa n'abaciriwe urwo gupfa . Twashyizwe ku karubanda dushungerwa n'ab'isi , imbere y'abamarayika n'abantu .
46004010	Twebwe turi abapfu kubera Kristo , naho mwe muri we mwifata nk'abanyabwenge . Twebwe turi abanyantegenke naho mwe muri abanyambaraga . Mwebwe murubahwa naho twebwe tugasuzugurwa .
46004011	Kugeza n'ubu turasonza tukagira inyota , twambara ubusa tukagirirwa nabi kandi tuzerera hose ,
46004012	tukaruha dukoresha amaboko yacu . Baradutuka tukabasabira umugisha , baradutoteza tukihangana ,
46004013	baradusebya tukabavugisha neza . Kugeza n'ubu baduhinduye nk'icyavu cy'iyi si , mbese batugize nk'ibishingwe bose bajugunye .
46004014	Ibyo simbyandikira kubakoza isoni , ahubwo ni ukubaburira nk'abana banjye nkunda .
46004015	Nubwo muri Kristo mwagira ababarera ibihumbi icumi uwababyaye ni umwe , ni jye wababereye so muri Kristo kubera Ubutumwa bwiza nabagejejeho .
46004016	Ndabinginze rero nimukurikize urugero nabahaye .
46004017	Ni cyo gituma mbatumyeho Timoteyo , umwana wanjye nkunda kandi w'indahemuka kuri Nyagasani . Azabibutsa imibereho yanjye nkesha Kristo , nk'uko mbyigisha aho njya hose mu matorero yose .
46004018	Bamwe muri mwe bibwiye yuko ntazagaruka kubasura bibatera ubwirasi .
46004019	Nyamara Nyagasani nabishaka nzaza iwanyu vuba . Ubwo ni bwo nzirebera ububasha abo birasi bafite atari ukumva amagambo yabo gusa ,
46004020	kuko ubwami bw'Imana atari amagambo gusa , ahubwo bufite ububasha .
46004021	Mbese icyo mwifuza ni iki ? Ese ni uko naza iwanyu nzanye inkoni yo kubahana , cyangwa se ko naza mfite umutima w'urukundo n'ubugwaneza ?
46005001	Inkuru yamamaye hose yuko muri mwe hari ubusambanyi , ndetse ubusambanyi bukabije butaboneka no mu batazi Imana . Bavuga ko umwe muri mwe atunze muka se !
46005002	Mbese muracyirata iki noneho ? Ahubwo ga mwari mukwiriye kubabara , kandi umuntu wakoze ibyo agakurwa muri mwe .
46005003	Jyewe rero nubwo mutakimbona mumenye ko tukiri kumwe , kandi mu izina ryUmwami wacu Yezu namaze gucira urubanza uwakoze ibyo ngibyo nkaho mpari . Noneho ubwo muzakoranira hamwe nanjye nzaba nifatanyije namwe , muzakoreshe ububasha bwUmwami wacu Yezu , Jyewe rero nubwo mutakimbona mumenye ko tukiri kumwe , kandi mu izina ryUmwami wacu Yezu namaze gucira urubanza uwakoze ibyo ngibyo nkaho mpari . Noneho ubwo muzakoranira hamwe nanjye nzaba nifatanyije namwe , muzakoreshe ububasha bwUmwami wacu Yezu ,
46005004	
46005005	mushyikirize uwo muntu Satani kugira ngo umubiri we upfe , ariko ubugingo bwe buzakizwe ku munsi Nyagasani azaziraho .
46005006	Ubwirasi bwanyu si bwiza . Mbese ntimuzi wa mugani ngo “ Agasemburo gake gatubura ifu yose ? ”
46005007	Nimwitunganye mwivanemo umusemburo wa kera kugira ngo mumere nk'umugati mushya udasembuwe , ni na ko muri . Koko kandi Kristo yatanzwe ho igitambo , ari we mwana w'intama wacu ugenewe umunsi mukuru wa Pasika .
46005008	Bityo rero twizihize uwo munsi mukuru , tudakoresha umusemburo wa kera w'ubugome n'ubugizi bwa nabi , ahubwo dukoreshe umugati udasembuwe w'ukuri utarangwaho uburyarya .
46005009	Mu rwandiko nabandikiye nababwiye kutifatanya n'abasambanyi .
46005010	Sinashakaga kuvuga abantu b'iyi si b'abasambanyi , cyangwa se b'abanyamururumba cyangwa ibisambo , cyangwa abasenga ibigirwamana . Kugira ngo umuntu yitandukanye n'abo bose agomba kuva ku isi .
46005011	Ahubwo nabandikiye yuko mutagomba kwifatanya n'umuntu wiyita umuvandimwe muri Kristo , kandi akaba ari umusambanyi cyangwa umunyamururumba , cyangwa usenga ibigirwamana cyangwa utukana , cyangwa umusinzi cyangwa igisambo . Ndetse n'umuntu nk'uwo ntimukanasangire .
46005012	Mbese birandeba gucira urubanza abatari aba Kristo ? Imana ni yo izabacira urubanza . Ahubwo abo muri mwe ni bo mukwiriye gucira urubanza , nkuko byanditswe ngo : “ Muzakure inkozi zibibi muri mwe . ” Mbese birandeba gucira urubanza abatari aba Kristo ? Imana ni yo izabacira urubanza . Ahubwo abo muri mwe ni bo mukwiriye gucira urubanza , nkuko byanditswe ngo : “ Muzakure inkozi zibibi muri mwe . ”

46006001	Muri mwe hagize ugira icyo apfa na mugenzi we wemera Kristo , yahangara ate kumurega ku bacamanza basanzwe baca urwa kibera , aho gusanga intore z'Imana ngo zibunge ?
46006002	Mbese ntimuzi yuko intore z'Imana zizacira ab'isi urubanza ? Ese niba ari mwe muzacira ab'isi urubanza , mwananirwa mute guca imanza zoroheje ?
46006003	Ntimuzi se ko n'abamarayika tuzabacira imanza , nkanswe kuzicira abantu b'iki gihe bafite ibyo bapfa ?
46006004	Igihe mufite imanza nk'izo , kuki muzegurira abantu b'imburamumaro bari mu muryango wa Kristo ?
46006005	Mbivugiye kubakoza isoni . Ese ni ukuvuga yuko nta munyabwenge n'umwe uri muri mwe wabasha kunga abavandimwe ?
46006006	Ese atanabaho birakwiriye koko ko umuntu aburanya umuvandimwe we , kandi bagacirwa urubanza n'abatemera Kristo ?
46006007	Erega izo manza mufitanye zirerekana ko ibyaha byabatsinze rwose ! Kuki ahubwo mutakwemera kurenganywa ? Kuki mutakwemera guhuguzwa ibyanyu ?
46006008	Ibiri amambu ni mwe murenganya , mugahuguza abandi kandi ari abavandimwe banyu !
46006009	Mbese ntimuzi yuko abarenganya abandi batazabona umunani mu bwami bw'Imana ? Ntimukibeshye . Inkozi z'ibibi n'abasenga ibigirwamana , abasambanyi b'ingaragu cyangwa abubatse n'abasambana bahuje igitsina ,
46006010	abajura n'abanyamururumba n'abasinzi n'abatukana n'ibisambo , abo bose nta munani bazagira mu bwami bw'Imana .
46006011	Bamwe muri mwe ni ko mwari mumeze ariko ubu mwamaze kuhagirwa , mugirwa intore z'Imana , muba n'intungane , mubikesheje Nyagasani Yezu Kristo na Mwuka w'Imana yacu .
46006012	“ Byose mbifitiye uburenganzira ” ( ni ko bamwe bavuga ) . Ni koko nyamara si ko byose bimfitiye akamaro . Yee , byose mbifitiye uburenganzira ariko nta na kimwe kizantegeka .
46006013	“ Ibyokurya bigenewe inda , n'inda igenewe ibyokurya ” ( ni ko bavuga ) . Yee , nyamara Imana izabitsemba byombi . Umubiri ntiwagenewe ubusambanyi , ahubwo wagenewe guhesha Nyagasani ikuzo kandi Nyagasani akaba ari we uwugenga .
46006014	Imana yazuye Nyagasani Yezu , natwe izatuzura ikoresheje ububasha bwayo .
46006015	Mbese ntimuzi yuko imibiri yanyu ari ingingo z'umubiri wa Kristo ? None se nafata ingingo z'umubiri wa Kristo nkazigira iz'indaya ? Ntibikabeho !
46006016	Cyangwa se ntimuzi yuko umuntu wifatanya n'indaya , we na yo baba babaye umubiri umwe ? Koko kandi Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Bombi bazaba babaye umuntu umwe . ”
46006017	Nyamara uwifatanya na Nyagasani aba abaye umwe na we mu by'ubugingo .
46006018	Mugendere kure ubusambanyi . Ibindi byaha byose umuntu akora biba bidakorewe mu mubiri , ariko usambana aba acumuye ku mubiri we .
46006019	Mbese ntimuzi yuko imibiri yanyu ari ingoro za Mwuka Muziranenge utuye muri mwe , mwahawe n'Imana ? Ntimuri abanyu bwite ngo mwigenge ,
46006020	kuko mwacunguwe mutanzweho ikiguzi . Kubera iyo mpamvu rero , mukoreshe imibiri yanyu ibyo guhesha Imana ikuzo .
46007001	Ku byerekeye ibyo mwambajije mu rwandiko rwanyu , icyiza ni uko umuntu atarongora .
46007002	Ariko kubera ko ubusambanyi bwabaye gikwira , ibyiza ni uko umugabo wese agira uwe mugore , n'umugore wese akagira uwe mugabo .
46007003	Umugabo ntakwiriye kwiyima umugore we , n'umugore na we ni uko ntakwiriye kwiyima umugabo we .
46007004	Umugore ntiyigenga ku mubiri we , ugengwa n'umugabo we , n'umugabo na we ni uko ntiyigenga ku mubiri we , ugengwa n'umugore we .
46007005	Ntihakagire uwiyima undi , keretse mubyumvikanyeho mugahāna igihe kugira ngo mubone uko musenga nta kibarogoya . Ariko hanyuma mwongere kubonana kugira ngo mutananirwa kwifata , Satani akabaca urwaho akabashuka .
46007006	Ibyo mbabwiye ndabibemereye gusa si itegeko ntanze .
46007007	Nakwifuza yuko abantu bose bamera nkanjye , ariko umuntu wese afite impano ye bwite yahawe n'Imana , umwe iye undi iye .
46007008	Abatarashaka bo muri mwe kimwe n'abapfakazi , ndababwira yuko icyiza ari uko bakomeza kumera nkanjye .
46007009	Ariko abadashoboye kwifata nibashyingiranwe , kuko kurongorana biruta kwicwa n'irari .
46007010	Dore itegeko ku bashyingiranywe , ariko si jye uribategeka ahubwo ni Nyagasani : umugore ntagatandukane n'umugabo we .
46007011	Icyakora aramutse atandukanye na we ntagashake undi mugabo , cyangwa se ajye yiyunga n'umugabo we . Umugabo na we ntakirukane umugore we .
46007012	Ku bandi dore icyo mvuga ku giti cyanjye , si Nyagasani ubivuga : umuvandimwe wese abaye afite umugore utemera Kristo , umugore we akaba yemera kugumana na we , uwo mugabo ntakamwirukane .
46007013	Bityo kandi n'umugore wo muri mwe aramutse afitwe n'umugabo utemera Kristo , umugabo we akemera kugumana na we , uwo mugore ntagatandukane n'umugabo we .
46007014	Erega umugabo utemera Kristo aba yeguriwe Imana bitewe n'umugore we , n'umugore utemera Kristo aba yeguriwe Imana bitewe n'umugabo we ! Bitabaye bityo abana banyu baba bafite imiziro , nyamara atari ko biri kuko na bo beguriwe Imana .
46007015	Nyamara kandi utemera Kristo ashatse gutandukana n'uwo bashakanye nagende . Bibaye bityo uwo muvandimwe aba atakigengwa n'amategeko , kuko Imana yabahamagariye kuba mu mahoro .
46007016	Mbese wa mugore we , ubwirwa n'iki ko uzakiza umugabo wawe ? Cyangwa se wa mugabo we , ubwirwa n'iki ko uzakiza umugore wawe ?
46007017	N'ubundi umuntu akomeze kuba nk'uko Imana yamugeneye , uko yari ari igihe Imana yamuhamagaraga . Uko ni ko ntegeka amatorero yose ya Kristo .
46007018	Niba umuntu yarahamagawe n'Imana yaramaze gukebwa ntakīgire nk'aho atakebwe , kandi niba yarahamagawe atarakebwa ntakirirwe akebwa .
46007019	Ari ugukebwa , ari ukudakebwa byose nta cyo bimaze . Icy'ingenzi ni ukumvira amategeko y'Imana .
46007020	Umuntu wese nagume uko yari ari igihe Imana yamuhamagaraga .
46007021	Mbese wowe igihe Imana yaguhamagaraga wari inkoreragahato ? Ibyo nta cyo bigutwaye , ariko ubonye uburyo bwatuma uvanwa mu buja nakubwira iki ?
46007022	Uwahamagawe na Nyagasani ari inkoreragahato aba avanywe mu buja na Nyagasani . Bityo rero n'uwahamagawe yigenga , aba ari umugaragu wa Kristo .
46007023	Imana yarabacunguye ibatangaho ikiguzi , ntimugasubire mu buja bw'abantu .
46007024	Nuko rero bavandimwe , umuntu wese nagumane n'Imana uko yari ari igihe yamuhamagaraga .
46007025	Ku byerekeye ingaragu , nta tegeko Nyagasani yampaye rizerekeye ariko ndabaha inama , kandi kuko Nyagasani yangiriye imbabazi , ndi umuntu mushobora kwizera .
46007026	Kubera ingorane zo muri iki gihe , ndasanga ibyiza ari uko umuntu yagumya kuba ingaragu .
46007027	Niba usanzwe ufite umugore ntugashake gutandukana na we . Niba uri ingaragu ntugashake kurongora .
46007028	Icyakora nubwo warongora ntiwaba ukoze icyaha , n'umukobwa w'inkumi ashyingiwe nta cyaha aba akoze . Ariko abubatse bazagira amakuba bakiriho , ni na yo nashakaga kubarinda .
46007029	Bavandimwe , dore icyo nshaka kuvuga : hasigaye igihe gito . Kuva ubu abafite abagore nibamere nk'abatabafite .
46007030	Abarira nibamere nk'abatarira , abanezerewe nibamere nk'abatanezerewe , abaguzi nibamere nk'abadafite icyo batunze ,
46007031	n'abatunze iby'iyi si ntibagatwarwe na byo , kuko iyi si uko iteye igenda ishiraho .
46007032	Icyo mbifuriza ni uko mudahagarika umutima . Ingaragu iharanira ibya Nyagasani , igira ngo ibone uko imushimisha .
46007033	Naho umuntu warongoye aharanira iby'isi kugira ngo abone uko ashimisha umugore we .
46007034	Bene uwo aba afite imitima ibiri . Umugore udafite umugabo cyangwa umukobwa w'inkumi , aharanira ibya Nyagasani agira ngo amwiyegurire wese , umubiri n'umutima . Naho umugore ufite umugabo aharanira iby'isi , agira ngo abone uko ashimisha umugabo we .
46007035	Ibyo mbivugiye kubafasha si ukubahata . Ndagira ngo mwifate uko bikwiye , mubone uko mwegukira Nyagasani nta nkomyi .
46007036	Igihe umusore yasabye umukobwa , akumva ko yamurangaranye kuko yatinze kumurongora , umukobwa akaba agumiwe nashaka bashyingiranwe — nta cyaha azaba akoze .
46007037	Ariko niba uwo musore ntawe umuhase , akiyemeza kutarongora kandi akaba ashobora gukomera ku cyo yiyemeje , aretse uwo mukobwa yaba akoze neza kurutaho .
46007038	Nuko rero urongoye umukobwa yasabye aba akoze neza , naho utamurongoye aba arushijeho gukora neza .
46007039	Umugore aba ahambiriwe ku mugabo we igihe cyose uwo mugabo akiriho . Ariko aramutse apfuye uwo mugore aba afite uburenganzira bwo gushyingirwa uwo ashaka wese , apfa kuba umuyoboke wa Nyagasani .
46007040	Ariko uko jyewe mbibona , yarushaho kugubwa neza agumye uko ari , kandi ndibwira ko mbivuze nyobowe na Mwuka w'Imana .
46008001	Ibyerekeye inyama zaterekerejwe ibigirwamana , tuzi ko twese “ tujijutse ” ( nk'uko muvuga ) . Nyamara kujijuka gutera kwikuza , naho urukundo rurubaka .
46008002	Uwibwira ko hari icyo ajijutseho , aba atarakimenya uko bikwiye .
46008003	Nyamara umuntu ukunda Imana amenywa na yo .
46008004	None se biremewe kurya inyama zaterekerejwe ibigirwamana ? Tuzi yuko ku isi ibigirwamana byose ari ubusa , kandi yuko Imana ari imwe rukumbi .
46008005	Nubwo hariho ibyo bita imana ku isi cyangwa mu ijuru — kandi koko hariho ibyitwa “ imana ” byinshi n'ibyitwa “ abatware ” byinshi -
46008006	nyamara twebwe dufite Imana imwe rukumbi ari yo Mubyeyi ibintu byose bikomokaho , akaba ari na yo twaremewe . Dufite kandi Umutware umwe gusa Yezu Kristo watumye ibintu byose bibaho , ari na we dukesha ubuzima .
46008007	Ariko ibyo ngibyo abantu bose ntibabisobanukiwe . Hariho abantu bamwe basanganywe akamenyero ko gusenga ibigirwamana , ku buryo iyo bariye inyama bibwira ko zaterekerejwe ikigirwamana , maze kubera intege nke zabo bakumva umutima ubarega ko bahumanye .
46008008	Ibyokurya si byo byatugeza ku Mana . Iyo tutariye ibyokurya ibi n'ibi nta cyo duhomba , n'iyo tubiriye nta cyo twunguka .
46008009	Nyamara mwirinde , kugira ngo ubwo burenganzira bwanyu butagusha mu cyaha abanyantegenke .
46008010	Koko se umuntu w'umunyantegenke akubonye wowe “ ujijutse ” urīra mu ngoro y'ikigirwamana , ntibyamutera kurya inyama zaterekerejwe kandi umutima we utabimwemerera ?
46008011	Nuko rero uwo muvandimwe w'umunyantegenke Kristo yapfiriye azaba azize “ kujijuka ” kwawe .
46008012	Nimucumura mutyo ku bavandimwe banyu , mukanakomeretsa imitima yabo isanzwe idakomeye , muzaba mucumuye no kuri Kristo .
46008013	Kubera iyo mpamvu rero , niba hari ibyokurya byagusha umuvandimwe wanjye mu cyaha , sinzarya inyama bibaho kugira ngo ntamugusha .
46009001	Mbese simfite uburenganzira bwo kwishyira nkizana ? Ese sindi Intumwa ya Kristo ? Mbese siniboneye Yezu Umwami wacu ? Ese mwebwe ntimuri ikimenyetso kigaragaza umurimo Nyagasani yampaye gukora ?
46009002	Nubwo ku bw'abandi ntaba Intumwa ye , ku bwanyu ho ngomba kuba yo . Ni mwe cyemezo kiranga ko ndi Intumwa ya Kristo mbihawe na Nyagasani .
46009003	Dore uko niregura ku bangenza .
46009004	Mbese simfite uburenganzira bwo gutungwa n'umurimo nkora ?
46009005	Ese simfite uburenganzira bwo kugendana n'umugore wemera Kristo twashakanye , nk'izindi Ntumwa za Nyagasani n'abavandimwe be na Petero ?
46009006	Cyangwa se ni jye na Barinaba twenyine tugomba gukorera ibidutunga ?
46009007	Ni nde waba umusirikari akitunga ? Ni nde watera ibiti by'imizabibu ntarye imbuto zabyo ? Ni nde waragira ubushyo bw'inka ntanywe amata ?
46009008	Mwe kugira ngo ibyo ndabivuga nshingiye ku bintu bisanzwe mu bantu gusa . Erega n'Amategeko ya Musa ni ko abivuga !
46009009	Muri ayo Mategeko handitswe ngo “ Ntimugahambire umunwa w'ikimasa igihe gihonyōra ingano . ” Mbese ni ukuvuga ko Imana yita ku bimasa gusa ?
46009010	Mbese aho si twebwe cyane cyane yabivugiye ? Ni koko byanditswe ku bwacu , kuko uhinga n'uhura bombi baba bafite icyo biringira kuzakura ku musaruro .
46009011	Twabibye muri mwe imbuto za Mwuka w'Imana , none se byaba bikabije dusaruye ku byo mwe mutunze ?
46009012	Niba abandi bafite uburenganzira bwo kugira icyo bababonaho , ubwo se ntitububarusha ? Nyamara ntitwakoresheje ubwo burenganzira . Ahubwo twihanganiye byose , kugira ngo tudakoma mu nkokora Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo .
46009013	Mbese ntimuzi yuko abakora mu Ngoro y'Imana iyo Ngoro ari yo ibatunga , n'abatamba ibitambo bakabihabwaho umugabane ?
46009014	Ni na ko Nyagasani yategetse ngo abamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza batungwe na bwo .
46009015	Nyamara jyewe sinagize icyo nitwaza na kimwe muri ibyo ngibyo , kandi ibi simbyandikiye kugira ngo ngire icyo ndonka . Ikiruta ni uko napfa ! Ntawe uteze kunyambura ishema niratana .
46009016	Kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza ntibyambera impamvu yo kwirata kuko ngomba kubikora byanze bikunze , ntabikoze naba ngushije ishyano .
46009017	Iyo mba nkora uyu murimo ari jye wawihitiyemo , nagombaga kuwuhemberwa . Ariko ubwo atari jye biturukaho , ni ngombwa ko nkora umurimo Imana yanshinze .
46009018	None se igihembo cyanjye ni ikihe ? Ni ukwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza ku buntu , ntiriwe nkoresha bwa burenganzira bwo gutungwa n'ubwo Butumwa .
46009019	Nubwo nishyira nkizana , nigize inkoreragahato ya bose ngo ndusheho kwigarurira benshi , kugira ngo mbageze kuri Kristo .
46009020	Iyo ndi mu Bayahudi , mba nk'Umuyahudi kugira ngo nigarurire Abayahudi . Iyo ndi mu batwarwa n'Amategeko mba nk'utwarwa na yo ( nubwo jye ndatwarwa n'Amategeko ) , kugira ngo nigarurire abatwarwa na yo .
46009021	Iyo ndi mu batazi Amategeko , nanjye mba nk'utayazi kugira ngo nigarurire abatayazi — ibyo simbivugiye yuko ntazi Amategeko y'Imana , kuko Kristo ari we Tegeko ringenga .
46009022	Iyo ndi mu banyantegenke , mba umunyantegenke kugira ngo nigarurire abanyantegenke . Nigira nk'uko buri wese ameze , kugira ngo ibyo ari byo byose nkizemo bamwe .
46009023	Ibyo byose mbikora kubera Ubutumwa bwiza ngira ngo mbugireho uruhare .
46009024	Mbese ntimuzi yuko mu mikino , iyo abantu basiganwa , biruka bose , ariko umwe akaba ari we wegukana ikamba ho igihembo ? Nuko rero namwe nimwiruke kugira ngo muzaryegukane .
46009025	Abarushanwa mu mikino bose bamenya kwifata ku buryo bwose . Bo babikorera kugira ngo begukane ikamba rishira vuba , ariko twebwe tubikorera kuzegukana ikamba ridashira . .
46009026	Ni yo mpamvu nanjye niruka ntameze nk'utazi iyo agana , ngasa nk'ukina umukino wo guterana amakofi ariko simpushe .
46009027	Ahubwo mbabaza umubiri wanjye nkawukoresha agahato , kugira ngo ntazamara kwigisha abandi naho jye ngasigara ntemewe .
46010001	Bavandimwe , sinshaka ko muyoberwa ukuntu ba sogokuruza bose bagendaga bayobowe na cya gicu , kandi bose bakambuka ya nyanja .
46010002	Bose babatirijwe muri cya gicu no muri ya nyanja , kugira ngo babe umwe na Musa .
46010003	Bose basangiye bya byokurya byavuye ku Mana ,
46010004	bose banasangiye cya kinyobwa cyavuye ku Mana , kuko banyweraga kuri rwa rutare rwavuye ku Mana rwagendanaga na bo , kandi urwo rutare rwari Kristo .
46010005	Ariko benshi muri bo ntibashimishije Imana , ni cyo cyatumye intumbi zabo zinyanyagira mu butayu .
46010006	Ibyo byabaye kugira ngo bitubere icyitegererezo cyo kutuburira , kugira ngo tutararikira ibibi nka bo .
46010007	Ntimukaramye kandi ibigirwamana nk'uko bamwe muri bo babigenje , ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Abantu baricara bararya baranywa , barangije barahaguruka barakina . ”
46010008	Byongeye kandi ntitugasambane nk'uko bamwe muri bo basambanye , bigatuma abantu ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitatu muri bo bapfira umunsi umwe .
46010009	Nta n'ubwo dukwiriye kugerageza Nyagasani , nk'uko bamwe muri bo bamugerageje bakamarwa na za nzoka .
46010010	Ntimukitotombe nk'uko bamwe muri bo babigenje , umumarayika w'umurimbuzi akabamara .
46010011	Ibyabaye kuri abo bantu kwari ukugira ngo bibere abandi icyitegererezo , byandikiwe kutuburira kubera ko tugeze mu bihe by'imperuka .
46010012	Nuko rero uwibwira ko ahagaze yirinde atagwa .
46010013	Ntimwigeze muhura n'ikigeragezo na kimwe kidasanzwe mu bantu . Imana ni indahemuka , ntabwo izatuma mugeragezwa n'ibiruta ibyo mwabasha gutsinda . Ahubwo nimugeragezwa izabashoboza kubyihanganira , ibacire n'akanzu ngo mubone uko mubyivanamo .
46010014	Bityo rero ncuti nkunda , mwirinde gusenga ibigirwamana .
46010015	Ndabibabwira kuko muzi ubwenge , namwe nimusuzume ibyo mvuga .
46010016	Mbese cya gikombe cy'umugisha dushimira Imana tukakinyweraho , si ko gusangira amaraso ya Kristo ? Naho se wa mugati tumanyura tukawuryaho , si ko gusangira umubiri wa Kristo ?
46010017	Umugati turyaho ni umwe , bityo nubwo twe turi benshi turi umubiri umwe , kuko twese dusangira umugati umwe .
46010018	Nimurebere ku rubyaro rwa Isiraheli . Mbese abarya ku byatambiwe ku rutambiro rweguriwe Imana , ntibaba bagize ubusābane na yo ?
46010019	Mbese ndashaka kuvuga ko ibigirwamana bifite akamaro , cyangwa se ko ibitambo byabiterekerejwe bifite akamaro ?
46010020	Oya . Icyo mvuga ni uko abatura ibyo bitambo atari Imana babitura , ahubwo babitura ingabo za Satani . Sinshaka ko mugirana ubusābane n'ingabo za Satani .
46010021	Ntimushobora kubangikanya kunywera ku gikombe cya Nyagasani , no kunywera ku cy'ingabo za Satani . Ntimushobora kandi kubangikanya kurīra ku meza ya Nyagasani , no kurīra ku meza y'ingabo za Satani .
46010022	Cyangwa se tuba dushaka kwikorereza ugufuha kwa Nyagasani ? Mbese tumurusha amaboko ?
46010023	“ Byose tubifitiye uburenganzira ” ( ni ko bamwe bavuga ) . Ni koko , nyamara si ko byose bifite akamaro . Yee , byose tubifitiye uburenganzira , ariko si ko byose byubaka ubugingo bw'umuntu .
46010024	Ntihakagire uwishakira inyungu ye bwite , ahubwo ayishakire abandi .
46010025	Mujye murya ibyaguriwe mu ibagiro byose mutiriwe mubaza , kugira ngo imitima yanyu itabacira urubanza ,
46010026	kuko isi n'ibiyuzuye byose ari ibya Nyagasani .
46010027	Nihagira umuntu utemera Kristo ubararikira gusangira na we mukemera kujyayo , mujye murya ibyo abagaburiye byose mutiriwe mubaza kugira ngo imitima yanyu itabacira urubanza .
46010028	Ariko hagize ubabwira ati : “ Izi nyama ni izaterekerejwe ibigirwamana ” , ntimukazirye kubera ko abibabwiye no kubera gutinya gushinjwa n'umutima .
46010029	Umutima mvuga si uwanyu , ahubwo ni uwa wa wundi . Ikindi rero , kuki uburenganzira mfite bwo kwishyira nkizana bwanegurwa n'undi ufite umutima umushinja ?
46010030	Ubwo nshimira Imana ibyo ndya , kuki abantu bakwiha kunsebya kandi nabishimiye Imana ?
46010031	Ari ukurya ari ukunywa , cyangwa ari ugukora ikindi kintu cyose , mujye mubikorera guhesha Imana ikuzo .
46010032	Mujye mwifata ku buryo mutabera imbogamizi Abayahudi , cyangwa abatari Abayahudi ndetse n'Umuryango w'Imana .
46010033	Jyewe ubwanjye , ngerageza gushimisha abantu bose muri byose ntita ku nyungu zanjye bwite , ahubwo nita ku za bose kugira ngo bakizwe .
46011001	Nuko rero nimukurikize urugero nabahaye , nk'uko nanjye nkurikiza urwa Kristo .
46011002	Ndabashimira ko muhora munyibuka , kandi mukaba mukomeye ku mabwiriza nabashyikirije .
46011003	Nyamara ndashaka ko musobanukirwa yuko Kristo ari we mutwe ugenga buri mugabo , naho umugabo akaba umutwe ugenga umugore we , n'Imana ikaba umutwe ugenga Kristo .
46011004	Nuko rero umugabo witwikira umutwe igihe asenga cyangwa ahanura ngo avuge ibyo ahishuriwe , aba asuzuguye umutwe we ( ari wo Kristo ) .
46011005	Naho umugore utitwikiriye umutwe igihe asenga cyangwa ahanura , aba asuzuguye umutwe we ( ari wo mugabo we ) . Uwo mugore aba ahwanye n'uwo bogoshe bakamumora .
46011006	Atitwikiriye umutwe , ashatse yaniyogoshesha . Ariko ubwo biteye isoni ko umugore yiyogoshesha cyangwa ko yimoza , niyitwikire umutwe .
46011007	Umugabo ntagomba kwitwikira umutwe kuko ari ishusho y'Imana , akagaragaza ikuzo ryayo . Naho umugore agaragaza ikuzo ry'umugabo we .
46011008	Umugabo ntiyakomotse ku mugore , ahubwo umugore ni we wakomotse ku mugabo .
46011009	Umugabo ntiyaremewe umugore , ahubwo umugore yaremewe umugabo .
46011010	Ni cyo gituma kubera abamarayika bamureba , umugore agomba kwitwikira umutwe ngo bibe ikimenyetso cy'uko agengwa n'umugabo we .
46011011	Nyamara imbere ya Nyagasani umugore ntiyakwigenga ku mugabo we , n'umugabo ntiyakwigenga ku mugore we , baba magirirane .
46011012	Nk'uko umugore yakomotse ku mugabo ni na ko umugabo abyarwa n'umugore , ariko ibintu byose bikomoka ku Mana .
46011013	Namwe nimumbwire : ese birakwiriye ko umugore asenga Imana atitwikiriye umutwe ?
46011014	Mbese umuco w'abantu ubwawo ntutwigisha ko bitera isoni kugira ngo umugabo agire umusatsi muremure ,
46011015	naho umugore yawugira bikamuhesha icyubahiro ? Byongeye kandi , umugore yaherewe umusatsi muremure kugira ngo umubere umwambaro w'umutwe .
46011016	Hagize umuntu ushaka kubigiramo impaka , amenye ko yaba twe yaba amatorero y'Imana , twese nta wundi muco twemera utari uwo .
46011017	Mu mabwiriza akurikira sindi bubashime , kuko amakoraniro mugira adatuma mukora neza , ahubwo atuma mukora nabi .
46011018	Bwa mbere numva yuko iyo mukoranye mwicamo uduce , kandi nkaba nemera ko bimwe ari byo .
46011019	Koko ni ngombwa ko haba ibice muri mwe , kugira ngo abemewe n'Imana muri mwe bagaragare .
46011020	Iyo mukoraniye hamwe ntabwo ari igaburo rya Nyagasani muba musangiye ,
46011021	kuko igihe mufungura umuntu wese atanguranwa kurya , ugasanga bamwe bishwe n'inzara naho abandi bafite umurengwe .
46011022	Mbese nta ngo mufite ngo abe ari zo muriramo , abe ari na zo munyweramo ? Cyangwa se murashaka gusuzugura Umuryango w'Imana , mugakoza isoni abadafite shinge na rugero ? None se muragira ngo mbabwire iki ? Ese mbashime ? Ashwi sinabibashimira .
46011023	Nabashyikirije amabwiriza nahawe na Nyagasani ari yo aya : Nyagasani Yezu mu ijoro yagambaniwemo yafashe umugati .
46011024	Amaze gushimira Imana arawumanyura , aravuga ati : “ Uyu ni umubiri wanjye ubatangiwe , mujye mukora mutya kugira ngo munyibuke . ”
46011025	Bamaze gufungura afata n'igikombe , aravuga ati : “ Iki gikombe ni Isezerano rishya Imana igiranye n'abayo , rikaba ryemejwe n'amaraso yanjye . Igihe cyose mukinywereyeho mujye mukora mutya kugira ngo munyibuke .
46011026	Koko rero igihe cyose murya uyu mugati , mukanywera kuri iki gikombe , muba mutangaza iby'urupfu rwa Nyagasani kugeza ubwo azaza . ”
46011027	Bityo rero umuntu wese urya umugati wa Nyagasani , cyangwa akanywera ku gikombe cye ku buryo budakwiye , aba acumuye ku mubiri n'amaraso bya Nyagasani .
46011028	Nuko rero umuntu wese abanze yisuzume , abone kurya uwo mugati no kunywera kuri icyo gikombe ,
46011029	kuko urya uwo mugati kandi akanywera kuri icyo gikombe atitaye ku mubiri wa Nyagasani , bizamukururira igihano cy'Imana .
46011030	Ni na cyo gituma benshi muri mwe ari abanyantegenke n'abarwayi , ndetse bamwe bakaba barapfuye .
46011031	Tubanje kwisuzuma ubwacu ntitwashyirwa mu rubanza .
46011032	Igituma Nyagasani adushyira mu rubanza ubu akanaduhana , ni ukugira ngo tutazahanwa kimwe n'ab'isi .
46011033	Nuko rero bavandimwe , igihe mukoraniye hamwe kugira ngo musangire mujye murindirana .
46011034	Nihagira usonza arye iby'iwe , kugira ngo gukorana kwanyu kutabakururira gucirwaho iteka n'Imana . Ibisigaye nzabitunganya nje .
46012001	Bavandimwe , sinshaka ko mwayoberwa ibyerekeye impano za Mwuka .
46012002	Muzi yuko igihe mwari mutaremera Kristo , mwari mwaratwawe mutabizi ngo musenge ibigirwamana bitavuga .
46012003	Ni cyo gituma mbamenyesha yuko nta muntu uyoborwa na Mwuka w'Imana wavuga ati : “ Yezu navumwe ! ” Nta wavuga kandi ati : “ Yezu ni Nyagasani ” , atabiheshejwe na Mwuka Muziranenge .
46012004	Hariho impano z'uburyo bwinshi , nyamara Mwuka uzitanga ni umwe .
46012005	Hariho uburyo bwinshi bwo gukorera Imana , nyamara Nyagasani ukorerwa ni umwe .
46012006	Hariho imikorere y'uburyo bwinshi , nyamara Imana ikorera byose muri bose ni imwe .
46012007	Mwuka w'Imana yigaragariza mu mpano aha buri muntu , kugira ngo bigirire bose akamaro .
46012008	Mwuka aha umwe kuvuga ijambo ry'ubwenge , undi uwo Mwuka akamuha kuvuga ijambo ry'ubumenyi .
46012009	Undi uwo Mwuka akamuha kwizera Imana , undi uwo Mwuka umwe akamuha impano zo gukiza indwara .
46012010	Undi akamuha gukora ibitangaza , undi akamuha guhanura ngo avuge ibyo ahishuriwe , undi akamuha kugenzura uvuga niba avugishwa n'ingabo za Satani cyangwa na Mwuka w'Imana . Undi akamuha kuvuga mu ndimi zindi , undi akamuha gusobanura izo ndimi .
46012011	Byongeye kandi Mwuka ukora ibyo byose ni umwe rukumbi , agaba impano uko ashaka kuri buri muntu .
46012012	Umubiri w'umuntu ni umwe , ariko ukagirwa n'ingingo nyinshi nubwo ari nyinshi , izo ngingo zose zikaba zigize umubiri umwe . Ni ko bimeze no kuri Kristo .
46012013	Twaba Abayahudi cyangwa se abatari Abayahudi , twaba inkoreragahato cyangwa se abishyira bakizana , twese twabatirijwe muri Mwuka umwe ngo tube ingingo z'umubiri umwe , kandi twese twahawe kunywera ku isōko imwe ari yo Mwuka w'Imana .
46012014	Koko rero umubiri ntugizwe n'urugingo rumwe gusa , ahubwo ugizwe na nyinshi .
46012015	Ikirenge kivuze kiti “ Ubwo ntari ikiganza sindi urugingo rw'umubiri , ” si byo byatuma kitaba rwo .
46012016	N'ugutwi kuvuze kuti : “ Ubwo ntari ijisho sindi urugingo rw'umubiri , ” si byo byatuma kutaba rwo .
46012017	Mbese iyo umubiri wose ujya kuba ijisho , umuntu yari kumva ate ? Iyo umubiri wose ujya kuba ugutwi , umuntu yari guhumurirwa ate ?
46012018	Ubusanzwe Imana yashyizeho buri rugingo mu mwanya warwo uko ishaka .
46012019	Mbese iyo zose zijya kuba urugingo rumwe , umubiri wari kubaho ute ?
46012020	Ubusanzwe hariho ingingo nyinshi , ariko umubiri ni umwe .
46012021	Ijisho ntiryabwira ikiganza riti : “ Singukeneye ! ” n'umutwe ntiwabwira ibirenge uti : “ Simbakeneye ! ”
46012022	Ahubwo ingingo z'umubiri zigaragara ko ari inyantege nke ni zo zikenerwa cyane .
46012023	Ingingo zo ku mubiri dukeka ko zisuzuguritse ni zo twubaha kuruta izindi , kandi izidashyirwa ku mugaragaro ni zo twitaho cyane ,
46012024	naho iziteye neza ntizikeneye kwitabwaho . Imana yahuje ingingo z'umubiri ku buryo yarushijeho guha icyubahiro ingingo zari zikibuze ,
46012025	kugira ngo ingingo z'umubiri zitiremamo ibice , ahubwo kugira ngo zose ziterane inkunga .
46012026	Iyo urugingo rumwe rubabaye zose zibabarana na rwo , naho iyo rumwe ruhawe icyubahiro , izindi na zo zirishima .
46012027	Nuko rero mwese hamwe mugize umubiri wa Kristo , kandi buri muntu ni urugingo rwawo .
46012028	Dore abo Imana yashyizeho mu Muryango wayo : ubwa mbere yashyizeho Intumwa za Kristo , ubwa kabiri abahanuzi bavuga ibyo bahishuriwe , ubwa gatatu abigisha , hanyuma ishyiraho abakora ibitangaza , abafite impano zo gukiza indwara , abafasha abandi , abayobozi n'abavuga indimi zindi .
46012029	Mbese bose ni ko ari intumwa za Kristo ? Ese ni ko bose ari abahanuzi ? Mbese ni ko bose ari abigisha ? Ese bose ni ko bakora ibitangaza ?
46012030	Mbese ni ko bose bafite impano zo gukiza indwara ? Ese bose ni ko bavuga indimi zindi ? Cyangwa se ni ko basobanura izo ndimi ?
46012031	Nuko rero nimuharanire impano zisumba izindi . Nanjye kandi ndabarangira inzira ihebuje .
46013001	Nubwo navuga indimi z'abantu n'iz'abamarayika ariko singire urukundo , naba meze nk'ingoma inihira cyangwa inzogera irangīra .
46013002	Kandi nubwo nagira impano yo guhanura , nkamenya amabanga yose no gusobanukirwa ibintu byose , ndetse nkagira ukwizera guhagije kwatuma ntegeka imisozi ngo ive aho iri ariko singire urukundo , nta cyo naba ndi cyo .
46013003	Nubwo natanga ibyo ntunze byose ngo bihabwe abakene , ndetse nanjye ubwanjye nkitanga ngo ntwikwe ariko singire urukundo , nta cyo byamarira .
46013004	Urukundo rurihangana rukagira neza , urukundo ntirugira ishyari , ntirwirarira kandi ntirwihimbaza .
46013005	Urukundo ntirukoza isoni , ntirwikanyiza , ntirwivumbura , ntirugira inzika ,
46013006	ntirwishimira ibibi abandi bakora , ahubwo rwishimira ukuri .
46013007	Urukundo rwihanganira byose , muri byose rukemera Imana , rukiringira kandi rukiyumanganya .
46013008	Urukundo ruzahoraho . Impano yo guhanura izakurwaho , iyo kuvuga indimi zindi izarangira , iy'ubumenyi izakurwaho .
46013009	Koko rero ubumenyi bwacu ni igicagate , n'uguhanura kwacu ni igicagate .
46013010	Ariko nihaza ibyuzuye , ibicagase bizakurwaho .
46013011	Nkiri umwana navugaga nk'umwana , ngatekereza nk'umwana nkibwira nk'umwana . Ariko aho mariye gukura iby'ubwana ndabireka .
46013012	Ibyo tureba ubu bimeze nk'ibiboneka mu ndorerwamo itabona neza , ariko icyo gihe tuzarebana duhanganye . Ubu ibyo nzi ni igicagate , ariko icyo gihe nzaba mbizi byimazeyo nk'uko Imana inzi .
46013013	Ubu rero hagumyeho ibi uko ari bitatu : ukwemera Kristo , ukwiringira n'urukundo , ariko ikibiruta byose ni urukundo .
46014001	Noneho mushishikarire kugira urukundo . Mwifuze kandi impano za Mwuka , ariko cyane cyane impano yo guhanura ngo muvuge ibyo muhishuriwe n'Imana .
46014002	Uvuga indimi zindi ntaba abwira abantu , ahubwo aba abwira Imana kuko nta wumva icyo avuga . Aba avuga amabanga akesha Mwuka .
46014003	Nyamara umuntu uhanura aba abwira abantu amagambo yo kubaka ubugingo bwabo no kubakomeza no kubahumuriza .
46014004	Umuntu uvuga indimi zindi aba yubaka ubugingo bwe wenyine , ariko uhanura aba yubaka ubw'Umuryango w'Imana .
46014005	Nakwifuza ko mwese muvuga indimi zindi , ariko cyane cyane nakunda ko muhanura kuko uhanura arusha agaciro uvuga indimi zindi , keretse uzivuga aramutse azisobanuye kugira ngo byubake ubugingo bw'Umuryango w'Imana .
46014006	Ni ko se bavandimwe , ndamutse nje iwanyu mvuga indimi zindi byabamarira iki ? Nta cyo keretse mbabwiye ibyo Imana yampishuriye cyangwa ibyo yampaye kumenya , cyangwa ibyo yantumye kubahanurira cyangwa kubigisha .
46014007	Dutange urugero ku bintu bivuzwa nk'imyironge , cyangwa ibicurangwa nk'inanga . Mbese iyo bavugije umwironge cyangwa bagacuranga , wamenya ute indirimbo iyo ari yo niba amajwi yayo adasobanutse ?
46014008	Ikindi , uvuza ihembe narivuza binyuranyije no gutabaza , ni nde uzitegura kujya ku rugamba ?
46014009	No kuri mwe ni uko bimeze , mbese nimuvuga ururimi rundi ibyo muvuze bizamenyekana bite ? Muzamera nk'abagosorera mu rucaca .
46014010	Indimi zo ku isi nubwo ari nyinshi cyane , nta na rumwe rutagira icyo rusobanura .
46014011	Nyamara ntasobanukiwe icyo umuntu avuze , mba mbaye umunyamahanga kuri we , na we bikaba bityo .
46014012	None rero ubwo namwe muhirimbanira kugira impano za Mwuka , muharanire cyane cyane izakubaka ubugingo bw'Umuryango w'Imana .
46014013	Ni yo mpamvu uvuga ururimi rundi agomba gusaba Imana ngo imuhe no kurusobanura .
46014014	Nuko rero iyo nsenga mu rurimi rundi , mba nsenga mvugishwa na Mwuka ubwenge bwanjye bwihagarariye .
46014015	None se mbigenze nte ? Rimwe nzajya nsenga mvugishwa na Mwuka , ubundi nsenge ntekereza ibyo mvuga . Rimwe nzajya ndirimba ndirimbishwa na Mwuka , ubundi ndirimbe ntekereza ibyo ndirimba .
46014016	Mbese uramutse ushimiye Imana uvugishijwe na Mwuka , mu ikoraniro hakaba haje umuntu utaramenyera ibyanyu , yabasha ate kwikiriza ati : “ Amina ” kandi atazi ko ushimiye Imana ?
46014017	Yee , waba ushimiye Imana neza ariko uwo muntu nta cyo biba bimwunguye .
46014018	Ndashimira Imana ko mwese mbarusha kuvuga indimi zindi .
46014019	Ariko mu ikoraniro nakunda kuvuga amagambo atanu yumvikana kugira ngo nigishe abandi , kuruta kuvuga amagambo ibihumbi n'ibihumbi mu rurimi rundi .
46014020	Bavandimwe , ntimukabe abana mu mitekerereze yanyu , icyakora ku byerekeye ubugizi bwa nabi mube nk'abana bato koko , naho mu mitekerereze mube nk'abantu bakuze .
46014021	Mu gitabo cy'Amategeko handitse ibyo Nyagasani yavuze ngo
46014022	Nuko rero kuvuga indimi zindi ni ikimenyetso kitagenewe abemera Kristo ahubwo cyagenewe abatamwemera , naho guhanura si ikimenyetso cy'abatamwemera ahubwo ni icy'abamwemera .
46014023	Mbese ikoraniro ryose riramutse rivugiye icyarimwe mu ndimi zindi , hakinjira abantu batamenyereye ibyo cyangwa batemera Kristo , ntibabita abasazi ?
46014024	Nyamara bose baramutse bahanuye , hakinjira utemera Kristo cyangwa utamenyereye ibyanyu , azumva bose bamwemeza ibyaha bye , bose bamucira n'urubanza .
46014025	Ibihishwe mu mutima we bizashyirwa ahagaragara , maze yikubite hasi aramye Imana avuge ati : “ Koko Imana iri kumwe namwe . ”
46014026	None se bavandimwe , bikwiye kumera bite ? Igihe mukoraniye hamwe umwe afite indirimbo , undi inyigisho , undi ibyo ahishuriwe , undi ibyo kuvuga mu rurimi rundi , undi ibyo kurusobanura . Byose bibereho kubaka ubugingo bw'Umuryango w'Imana .
46014027	Hagize abavuga indimi zindi havuge babiri cyangwa batatu gusa , kandi bavuge umwe umwe ndetse habeho n'usobanura ibyo bavuze .
46014028	Ariko nihabura usobanura ntihakagire uvuga ururimi rundi mu ikoraniro , ahubwo urufite niyibwire mu mutima , abwire n'Imana .
46014029	Naho abahanura havuge babiri cyangwa batatu , abandi bagenzure ibyo bavuze .
46014030	Igihe umwe avuga undi akagira icyo ahishurirwa n'Imana , uwavugaga abe aretse .
46014031	Mwese mubasha guhanura ariko mubikore umwe umwe , kugira ngo mwese bibigishe kandi bibakomeze .
46014032	Abahanura ni bo bagenga impano bahawe .
46014033	Imana si iy'imivurungano ahubwo ni iy'amahoro . Nk'uko bisanzwe mu matorero yose y'intore za Kristo ,
46014034	abagore bajye bacecekera mu makoraniro . Ntibafite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga , ahubwo bemere gutegekwa nk'uko n'Amategeko abivuga .
46014035	Baramutse bafite icyo bashaka kubaza , babarize abagabo babo imuhira kuko biteye isoni ko umugore avugira mu ikoraniro .
46014036	Mbese muribwira ko Ijambo ry'Imana ari mwe rikomokaho , cyangwa ko ari mwe ryagezeho mwenyine ?
46014037	Niba muri mwe hari umuntu utekereza ko ari umuhanuzi cyangwa ko ayoborwa na Mwuka , amenye ko ibi mbandikiye ari itegeko rya Nyagasani .
46014038	Ariko nihagira umuntu utita kuri ibyo , namwe ntimukamwiteho .
46014039	Bityo rero bavandimwe , muharanire iyo mpano yo guhanura , kandi ntimukagire uwo mubuza kuvuga indimi zindi .
46014040	Nyamara byose bikorwe uko bikwiye muri gahunda .
46015001	Bavandimwe , ndashaka kubibutsa Ubutumwa bwiza nabagejejeho , mukabwakira mukabukomeraho
46015002	Ubwo Butumwa ni bwo bubahesha agakiza niba mubukomeyeho nk'uko nabubabwiye , naho ubundi ukwizera kwanyu kwaba ari impfabusa .
46015003	Ubutumwa bw'ingenzi nabanje kubagezaho ni ubu : Kristo yapfuye azize ibyaha byacu nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga .
46015004	Yarahambwe maze ku munsi wa gatatu arazuka , nk'uko byari byaranditswe .
46015005	Abonekera Petero , abonekera na za Ntumwa ze cumi n'ebyiri .
46015006	Nyuma abonekera icyarimwe abavandimwe basāga magana atanu , bamwe muri bo barapfuye ariko abenshi na n'ubu baracyariho .
46015007	Hanyuma abonekera Yakobo , abonekera n'Intumwa ze zose .
46015008	Nuko nyuma y'abo bose nanjye arambonekera , kandi meze nk'uwavutse atagejeje igihe .
46015009	Koko ni jye muto mu Ntumwa za Kristo , ndetse sinkwiriye kwitwa Intumwa ye kuko natoteje abo mu Muryango w'Imana .
46015010	Nyamara ubuntu nagiriwe n'Imana ni bwo bwatumye mba uko ndi uku , kandi ubwo buntu ntibwapfuye ubusa . Ahubwo nashishikariye gukora kurusha abo bose , ariko atari jye wikoresha ahubwo ari bwa buntu bw'Imana .
46015011	Nuko rero yaba jye cyangwa bo , ubwo ni bwo Butumwa dutangaza kandi ni na bwo mwemeye .
46015012	None se ubwo byamamazwa ko Kristo yazutse , abo muri mwe bavuga ko abapfuye batazazuka babiterwa n'iki ?
46015013	Niba abapfuye batazazuka , ni ukuvuga ko Kristo na we atazutse .
46015014	Byongeye kandi niba Kristo atazutse , Ubutumwa twamamaza bwaba ari ubusa kandi ibyo mwizera na byo byaba ari ubusa .
46015015	Ndetse natwe twaba tubaye nk'abahimbiye Imana , kuko twahamije ko yazuye Kristo kandi atari ko biri niba koko abapfuye batazazuka .
46015016	Niba abapfuye batazazuka , Kristo na we ntiyazutse .
46015017	Ikindi kandi niba Kristo atarazutse mwaba mwizeye ubusa , mwaba mukiri mu byaha byanyu .
46015018	Ndetse n'abapfuye bizeye Kristo baba bararimbutse .
46015019	Niba kwiringira Kristo bidufitiye akamaro tukiriho gusa , twaba turi abantu bo kugirirwa impuhwe kurusha abandi bose .
46015020	Ariko mu by'ukuri Kristo yarazutse , atubera umuganura w'abapfuye bazazuka .
46015021	Nk'uko urupfu rwazanywe n'umuntu umwe , ni na ko kuzuka kw'abapfuye kwazanywe n'umuntu umwe .
46015022	Nk'uko abo mu rubyaro rwa Adamu bose bapfa , ni ko abo muri Kristo bose bazabaho .
46015023	Buri wese azabigeraho mu rwego rwe . Habanje umuganura wo kuzuka ari we Kristo , noneho abayobotse Kristo bazabona kuzuka igihe azaba aje .
46015024	Nyuma hazaza imperuka , Kristo atsembe ibyitwa ibinyabutware n'ibinyabushobozi n'ibinyabubasha , maze abone gushyikiriza Imana Se ubwami .
46015025	Kristo agomba kwima ingoma , Imana na yo izamutsindira abanzi bose ibashyire munsi y'ibirenge bye .
46015026	Umwanzi uzaheruka gutsembwa ni urupfu .
46015027	Koko kandi Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Imana yamuhaye kugenga ibintu byose . ” Icyakora igihe bivugwa ko Imana yamuhaye kugenga byose , birumvikana ko yo itabibarirwamo .
46015028	Noneho ubwo Umwana w'Imana azaba amaze kwegurirwa byose , ni ho na we aziyegurira Iyamweguriye byose , bityo Imana igenge byose ku buryo bwuzuye .
46015029	Bitabaye bityo twibaze kuri ba bandi babatirizwa abamaze gupfa . Niba koko abapfuye batazazuka , baterwa n'iki kubabatirizwa ?
46015030	Natwe kandi ni iki gituma duhara amagara yacu buri gihe ?
46015031	Buri munsi mpora mpanganye n'urupfu — bavandimwe , ibyo ni ko biri mbitewe n'ishema muntera kubera Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
46015032	Biba byaramariye iki kurwana n'inyamaswa muri Efezi , iyo nza guharanira inyungu yo kuri iyi si gusa ? Yemwe , niba abapfuye batazazuka dukurikize ya mvugo ngo : , “ Nimureke twirire kandi twinywere kuko ejo tuzapfa . ”
46015033	Ntihakagire ubayobya : “ Kubana n'ababi byonona ingeso nziza ” ( nk'uko umwe yavuze ) .
46015034	Mwisubireho mwifate uko bikwiye , mureke gucumura . Erega bamwe muri mwe ntibamenye Imana , ibyo mbivugiye kubakoza isoni !
46015035	Ahari hari uwabaza ati : “ Abapfuye bazurwa bate ? Bazazukana imibiri iteye ite ? ”
46015036	Mbega ubupfu ! Icyo utera nticyamera kitabanje gupfa .
46015037	Kandi rero urwo utera ntirusa n'icyo ruzera hanyuma , ahubwo ni urubuto bubuto , rwaba ingano cyangwa urundi rwose .
46015038	Ariko buri rubuto iyo rumaze guterwa , Imana iruha ishusho yarugeneye , rumwe ukwarwo urundi ukwarwo uko amoko y'imbuto angana .
46015039	No ku bifite umubiri n'amaraso ni ko biri : icyitwa umubiri cyose si kimwe . Umuntu agira umubiri usa ukwawo , n'inyamaswa ikagira umubiri usa ukwawo , inyoni na yo ni uko n'ifi na yo ni uko .
46015040	Hari ibyaremwe byo mu ijuru n'ibindi byo ku isi . Ubwiza bw'ibyo mu ijuru buteye ukwabwo , n'ubw'ibyo ku isi buteye ukwabwo .
46015041	Izuba rifite ukurabagirana kwaryo , ukwezi kukagira ukwako , n'inyenyeri zikagira ukwazo . Ndetse inyenyeri ntizihwanyije kurabagirana .
46015042	Ni na ko bimera mu kuzuka kw'abapfuye . Umubiri ushyirwa mu butaka ni umurambo wo kubora , ariko uzazuka utakiri uwo kubora .
46015043	Ushyirwa mu butaka usuzuguritse ariko uzazukana ikuzo , ushyirwa mu butaka ufite intege nke ariko uzazukana imbaraga ,
46015044	ushyirwa mu butaka ari umubiri upfa ariko uzazuka ari umubiri utangwa na Mwuka . Ubwo habaho imibiri ipfa , habaho n'imibiri itangwa na Mwuka .
46015045	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Umuntu wa mbere Adamu aba muzima ” , naho Adamu wa nyuma ( Kristo ) yabaye Mwuka utanga ubugingo .
46015046	Ufite umubiri utangwa na Mwuka si we wabanje , ahubwo habanje ufite umubiri upfa , haheruka ufite umubiri utangwa na Mwuka .
46015047	Adamu wa mbere yaremwe mu gitaka agizwe n'igitaka , naho Adamu wa kabiri yavuye mu ijuru .
46015048	Abafite imibiri ivanywe mu gitaka bateye nka wa mukurambere wabo wavanywe mu gitaka , naho abafite ubugingo bwo mu ijuru bateye nka wa Muntu wavuye mu ijuru .
46015049	Noneho rero nk'uko twagiranye isano na wa muntu w'igitaka , ni ko tuzagirana isano na wa Muntu w'ijuru .
46015050	Nuko bavandimwe , icyo nshaka kuvuga ni iki : umubiri n'amaraso ntibibasha guhesha umuntu umugabane ku bwami bw'Imana , kandi ibibora ntibyamuhesha umugabane ku bitabora .
46015051	Reka mbabwire ibanga : ntituzapfa twese . Ariko ubwo impanda yimperuka izavuga tuzahinduka twese , kandi bizaba mu kanya gato nkako guhumbya . Impanda izavuga abapfuye bahite bazurwa batagifite imibiri ibora , natwe duhindurwe . Reka mbabwire ibanga : ntituzapfa twese . Ariko ubwo impanda yimperuka izavuga tuzahinduka twese , kandi bizaba mu kanya gato nkako guhumbya . Impanda izavuga abapfuye bahite bazurwa batagifite imibiri ibora , natwe duhindurwe .
46015052	
46015053	Ni ngombwa ko twebwe abafite imibiri ibora twambikwa itazabora , kandi ko twebwe abafite imibiri ipfa twambikwa itazapfa .
46015054	Ndetse twebwe ab'imibiri ipfa ikabora , nitumara kwambikwa idapfa ntinabore ni bwo bizaba nk'uko rya jambo ryanditse ngo :
46015055	“ Wa rupfu we , ugutsinda kwawe kuri he ? Wa rupfu we , urubori rwawe ruri he ? ”
46015056	Koko kandi ibyaha ni byo rubori rwurupfu , naho igituma ibyaha bituganza kikaba Amategeko .
46015057	Ariko Imana ishimirwe ko iduha gutsinda kubera Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
46015058	Bityo rero bavandimwe nkunda , nimukomere . Ntimugire ikibahungabanya . Murusheho gushishikarira gukorera Nyagasani , muzi ko muri we imvune zanyu atari impfabusa .
46016001	Ibyerekeye imfashanyo zo kunganira intore z'Imana , mugenze nk'uko nategetse amatorero ya Kristo yo muri Galati .
46016002	Ku munsi wa mbere ari ho ku cyumweru , buri muntu wese muri mwe ajye agira icyo azigama akurikije amikoro ye agishyire iruhande , kugira ngo igihe nzaba nje mutazaba ari bwo muhugira mu byo guterateranya imfashanyo .
46016003	Ningera iwanyu rero nzaha abantu mwatoranyije inzandiko zo kubasohoza , bajyane imfashanyo zanyu i Yeruzalemu .
46016004	Nibiba ngombwa ko nanjye ngenda tuzajyana .
46016005	Nzaza iwanyu nyuze muri Masedoniya , kuko ari ho nzanyura .
46016006	Birashoboka ko natinda iwanyu wenda nkaba naharangiriza amezi y'imbeho , kugira ngo mumfashe gukomeza urugendo rwanjye aho nzajya hose .
46016007	Sinifuza kubonana namwe huti huti ngo nkomeze urugendo . Nizeye kuzamara iwanyu iminsi , Nyagasani nabishaka .
46016008	Nzaguma ino muri Efezi kugeza mu gihe cya Pentekote .
46016009	Hano nugururiwe amarembo kugira ngo mpakore umurimo munini w'ingirakamaro , icyakora abandwanya ni benshi .
46016010	Timoteyo naza muzamwakire ku buryo atagira icyo yishisha ari iwanyu , kuko na we akorera Nyagasani nkanjye .
46016011	Nuko rero ntihazagire umusuzugura , ahubwo muzamufashe akomeze urugendo rwe amahoro angereho , kuko jye n'abandi bavandimwe tumutegereje .
46016012	Ibyerekeye umuvandimwe Apolo , namusabye nkomeje ngo azazane iwanyu n'abandi bavandimwe ariko ntashaka na busa kuza ubungubu , icyakora nabona uburyo azaza .
46016013	Mube maso mwishingikirije ku uwo twemera , mube abagabo b'intwari kandi mukomere .
46016014	Icyo mukora cyose mugikorane urukundo .
46016015	Ikindi bavandimwe , muzi ko aburugo rwa Sitefana ari bo babimburiye abandi bo muri Akaya kwemera Kristo , bakitangira kunganira intore zImana . Ndabinginze mwemere kugengwa na bene abo , kimwe nabandi bafatanyije umurimo numuruho . Ikindi bavandimwe , muzi ko aburugo rwa Sitefana ari bo babimburiye abandi bo muri Akaya kwemera Kristo , bakitangira kunganira intore zImana . Ndabinginze mwemere kugengwa na bene abo , kimwe nabandi bafatanyije umurimo numuruho .
46016016	
46016017	Byaranshimishije kubona Sitefana na Foritunato na Akayiku baje , bankoreye icyo mwajyaga gukora iyo muhaba .
46016018	Ari jye ari namwe baturemye agatima . Mujye mushima abameze batyo .
46016019	Abo mu matorero ya Kristo yo muri Aziya barabaramutsa . Akwila na Purisila hamwe n'itorero rikoranira mu rugo rwabo , barabaramutsa mu izina rya Nyagasani .
46016020	Abavandimwe bose barabaramutsa . Namwe muramukanye muhoberana ku buryo butagira amakemwa .
46016021	Jyewe Pawulo ndabatashya . Ibi ni jye ubyiyandikiye n'ukwanjye kuboko .
46016022	Nihagira udakunda Nyagasani avumwe ! “ Marana ta ” , ni ukuvuga ngo : “ Ngwino Nyagasani . ”
46016023	Nyagasani Yezu nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .
46016024	Ni jye ubakunda mwese ku bwa Kristo Yezu .
47001001	Jyewe Pawulo , Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko Imana yabishatse , hamwe n'umuvandimwe Timoteyo , turabandikiye mwebwe itorero ry'Imana riri i Korinti , hamwe n'intore zayo zose ziri muri Akaya yose .
47001002	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
47001003	Dushimire Imana , Se w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo . Ni yo mubyeyi nyir'impuhwe , ni Imana ihumuriza abayo uko byamera kose .
47001004	Ni yo iduhumuriza mu makuba yacu yose , kugira ngo natwe dushobore guhumuriza abandi bayafite bose , tubahumuriza uko natwe Imana yaduhumurije .
47001005	Bityo rero nk'uko imibabaro ya Kristo itugeraho bikabije , ni na ko iduhumuriza bihebuje ikoresheje Kristo .
47001006	Igihe twe tubabazwa ni ukugira ngo mwe Imana ibahumurize inabakize , kandi igihe Imana iduhumuriza ni ukugira ngo namwe ibahumurize , ibashoboze kwihanganira iyo mibabaro dusangiye .
47001007	Ntidutezuka kwiringira Imana ku bwanyu , tuzi ko dusangiye guhumurizwa na yo kimwe n'uko dusangiye imibabaro .
47001008	Bavandimwe , turashaka ko mumenya amakuba twagiriye mu ntara ya Aziya . Yari menshi bikabije , ntiyari ayo kwihanganirwa ku buryo twihebye , ntitwaba tukiringiye kubaho .
47001009	Ubirebye twabaye nk'abaciriwe urwo gupfa , kwari ukugira ngo tutizera ububasha bwacu ahubwo twizere Imana izura abapfuye .
47001010	Ni yo yaturokoye urupfu rukomeye , rutyo rwose izanaturokora . Erega ni yo twiringiye , izongera iturokore
47001011	kuko namwe mufatanyije natwe mukaba mudusabira ! Bityo kubera amasengesho y'abantu benshi , Imana izatugirira ubuntu bitume benshi bayishimira ku bwacu .
47001012	Ngiki ikidutera ishema : ni uko umutima wacu utwemeza ko twabaye kuri iyi si cyane cyane muri mwe , twiyoroheje tutaryarya kandi tubikesha Imana . Ibyo ntitwabitewe n'ubwenge bw'abantu , ahubwo twabitewe n'ubuntu Imana itugirira .
47001013	Mu nzandiko zacu nta bindi tubandikira , bitari ibyo musoma kandi mukabisobanukirwa . Ariko nubwo ubu mwabisobanukirwa buhoro , niringiye ko iherezo muzabisobanukirwa neza . Bityo umunsi Umwami wacu Yezu azaza , tuzagira ishema ku bwanyu nkuko namwe muzarigira ku bwacu . Mu nzandiko zacu nta bindi tubandikira , bitari ibyo musoma kandi mukabisobanukirwa . Ariko nubwo ubu mwabisobanukirwa buhoro , niringiye ko iherezo muzabisobanukirwa neza . Bityo umunsi Umwami wacu Yezu azaza , tuzagira ishema ku bwanyu nkuko namwe muzarigira ku bwacu .
47001014	
47001015	Kuko nari nizeye ibyo nagize umugambi wo kuba ari mwe mbanza gusura , kugira ngo Imana ibagirire ubuntu ubwa kabiri .
47001016	Nari nafashe umugambi wo kunyura iwanyu njya mu ntara ya Masedoniya , no kongera kubareba mvayo ngo mumfashe gukomeza urugendo rwanjye rwo kujya muri Yudeya .
47001017	Mbese muribwira yuko igihe nateganyaga ibyo nabikoze mpubutse ? Cyangwa muribwira yuko mfata imigambi nk'ab'isi , ku buryo mbasha kuvuga nti : “ Yego nzaza ” , hanyuma nti : “ Oya sinzaza ” ?
47001018	Imana ni yo ntanze ho umugabo : ntabwo twabarimanganyije tuti : “ Yego ” , kandi ngo : “ Oya ” .
47001019	Koko rero Kristo Yezu Umwana w'Imana twamamaje iwanyu — jye na Silasi na Timoteyo — ntabwo icyarimwe yaba “ Yego ” na “ Oya ” , ahubwo we nta kindi kimuvamo kitari “ Yego ” .
47001020	“ Yego ” ya Kristo ni yo cyemezo cy'amasezerano y'Imana uko angana , natwe rero akaduha kwikiriza tuti : “ Amina ” kugira ngo duheshe Imana ikuzo .
47001021	Twebwe namwe , Imana ubwayo ni yo idushoboza gukomera kuri Kristo . Ni na yo yadutoranyije ngo dukore umurimo wayo ,
47001022	kandi ikadushyiraho ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko turi abayo , mu mitima yacu ikaduha Mwuka wayo ho umusogongero w'ibyiza tuzahabwa .
47001023	Imana ni yo ntanzeho umugabo — niba mbeshya ibimpōre . Icyatumye ntongera kuza i Korinti kwari ukugira ngo ntabaremerera .
47001024	Erega si twe tubagenga ku byerekeye ibyo kuyoboka Kristo — musanzwe mukomeye kuri we ! Ahubwo dukorana namwe kugira ngo mugire ibyishimo .
47002001	Koko niyemeje kutagaruka iwanyu kugira ngo ntongera kubatera agahinda .
47002002	None se ndamutse mbateye agahinda , jye ni ba nde bantera ibyishimo ? Ese si mwebwe kandi ari mwe nateye agahinda ?
47002003	Burya icyatumye mbandikira kwari ukugira ngo ningera iwanyu , ndaterwa agahinda n'abantu bagombaga kunshimisha . Mpamya ko igihe jye nishimye , namwe mwese muba mwishimye .
47002004	Koko nabandikiye ndi mu makuba menshi kandi mfite umutima uhagaze , ndetse mbogoza amarira menshi atari ukugira ngo mbatere agahinda , ahubwo ari ukugira ngo mbereke ukuntu mbakunda cyane .
47002005	Niba hariho umuntu wagize uwo atera agahinda , si jye yagateye ahubwo ni mwe mwese — cyangwa se ntakabije ni bamwe muri mwe .
47002006	Igihano abenshi muri mwe bahanishije uwo muntu kirahagije .
47002007	Ndetse ahasigaye mugomba kubabarira uwo muntu , mukamuhumuriza kugira ngo aticwa n'agahinda gakabije .
47002008	Ndabinginze rero mumwereke ko mumukunda .
47002009	Burya icyatumye mbandikira kwari ukugira ngo mbasuzume , ndebe ko mwumvira muri byose .
47002010	Iyo mubabariye umuntu , nanjye mba mubabariye . Koko kandi niba jye naragize icyo mubabarira — habaye impamvu ituma mubabarira — mba narabikoze ku bwanyu , Kristo ni we ntanze ho umugabo .
47002011	Bityo tuba tudahaye Satani urwaho rwo kutugusha mu mutego : erega ntituyobewe imigambi ye !
47002012	Igihe nageraga i Tirowa njyanywe no kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo , nasanze Nyagasani yaranyugururiye amarembo .
47002013	Icyakora nahagaritswe umutima cyane no gusanga umuvandimwe wanjye Tito adahari , ni ko kubasezeraho njya muri Masedoniya .
47002014	Ariko Imana ishimwe yo iturangaza imbere , turi mu myiyereko y'ugutabaruka kwa Kristo . Ni yo ituma tugaragaza ibya Kristo ahantu hose , kugira ngo impumuro nziza yo kumumenya ikwire .
47002015	Koko rero turi nk'imibavu ihumura neza Kristo atura Imana , impumuro yayo ikagera ku bantu bakizwa no ku bahabye .
47002016	Ku bahabye ni impumuro y'urupfu ibibutsa ko bazapfa , ku bakizwa ni impumuro y'ubugingo ibibutsa ko bazabaho . Ese ubwo ni nde washobora gukora uwo murimo ?
47002017	Twebwe ntitumeze nk'abantu benshi bafata Ijambo ry'Imana nk'igicuruzwa mu isoko . Ahubwo turivuga tutaryarya dutumwe n'Imana , turi imbere yayo muri Kristo .
47003001	Mbese ibyo bivuga ko twongeye kwiyogeza ? Cyangwa se dukeneye inzandiko zo kudusohoza kuri mwe , cyangwa izo twabaka tukazitwaza nk'uko bamwe babigenza ?
47003002	Mwebwe ubwanyu ni mwe rwandiko rwanditswe ku mitima yacu , ruzwi na bose rugasomwa na bose .
47003003	Biragaragara ko muri urwandiko rwanditswe na Kristo akarudushinga . Urwo rwandiko ntirwanditswe hakoreshejwe wino , ahubwo rwanditswe hakoreshejwe Mwuka w'Imana nzima . Ibyo rwanditsweho si amabuye abaje , ahubwo ni imitima y'abantu .
47003004	Ibyo ni byo twemeza tubitewe no kwizera Imana tubikesha Kristo .
47003005	Ntitwakwibwira ko hari icyo dushobora gukora ubwacu , ahubwo ibyo dukora byose Imana ni yo ibidushoboza .
47003006	Ni yo yatugize abagaragu bayo ngo dukorere Isezerano rishya ridashingiye ku Mategeko yanditswe , ahubwo rishingiye kuri Mwuka . Amategeko yanditswe aricisha , naho Mwuka akabeshaho .
47003007	Ayo Mategeko inyuguti zayo zanditswe ku mabuye abaje . Nyamara kandi yaje aherekejwe n'ikuzo ry'Imana , ku buryo Abisiraheli batashoboye kwitegereza mu maso ha Musa , kubera iryo kuzo rirabagirana kandi ari ikuzo rishira . Ubwo Amategeko yari afite umurimo wo guteza abantu urupfu , kandi akaba afite ikuzo ringana rityo ,
47003008	mbega ukuntu umurimo wa Mwuka uzarushaho kugaragaza ikuzo ry'Imana !
47003009	Ubwo Amategeko afite umurimo wo gucira abantu iteka kandi akaba afite ikuzo , mbega ukuntu umurimo utuma abantu batunganira Imana urushaho kugira ikuzo risesuye !
47003010	Ni ukuri ibyahoranye ikuzo nta kuzo bigifite , ubigereranyije n'ibisigaye bifite ikuzo risesuye .
47003011	Koko rero , ubwo ibyamaze akanya gato bigashira byahawe ikuzo , mbega ukuntu ibizahoraho bizarushaho kurihabwa !
47003012	Noneho ubwo dufite ibyo twiringira bingana bityo , ni cyo gituma dushira amanga cyane .
47003013	Ntitumeze nka Musa witwikiraga igitambaro mu maso , kugira ngo Abisiraheli batabona rya kuzo rishira .
47003014	Nyamara ibitekerezo byabo byahumiye ku mirari . No kugeza magingo aya cya gitambaro baracyacyitwikira mu maso , igihe basomerwa Isezerano rya Kera . Erega uri muri Kristo wenyine ni we kivanwaho !
47003015	Rwose no kugeza uyu munsi iyo umuntu abasomera igitabo cya Musa , cya gitwikirizo kiba kibambītse ku mitima yabo .
47003016	Ariko nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga : “ Iyo umuntu ahindukiriye Nyagasani , icyo gitwikirizo gikurwaho . ”
47003017	Nyagasani uvugwa aha ni Mwuka kandi aho Mwuka wa Nyagasani ari , ni ho haba kwishyira ukizana by'ukuri .
47003018	Twebwe twese rero dutwikuruwe mu maso turabagirana ikuzo rya Nyagasani . Bityo tugumya guhindurwa kugira ngo duse na we , tugahabwa ikuzo rigenda ryiyongera ubutitsa . Ibyo Mwuka wa Nyagasani ni we ubikora .
47004001	Koko rero Imana yatugiriye imbabazi idushinga uyu murimo , ni cyo gituma tudacogora .
47004002	Ahubwo twazinutswe ibiteye isoni byose bikorwa rwihishwa , ntitucyifata nk'abariganya cyangwa ngo duhindagure Ijambo ry'Imana . Ahubwo tugaragariza buri muntu ukuri kw'Imana , kugira ngo aturebereho agire umutima unyuzwe imbere yayo .
47004003	Nyamara rero niba Ubutumwa bwiza twashinzwe butwikiriwe , abazimiye ni bo baba babuhishwe .
47004004	Abo ntibemera ubwo Butumwa kuko imana mbi y'ab'iki gihe yabahumye imitima , kugira ngo batabona urumuri rw'Ubutumwa bwiza buranga ikuzo rya Kristo , ari we shusho y'Imana .
47004005	Erega si twe twiyamamaza ahubwo ni Kristo twamamaza , twerekana ko ari we Nyagasani naho twebwe tukaba abagaragu banyu ku bwa Yezu .
47004006	Imana yavuze iti : “ Umucyo ubandurire mu mwijima , ” ni na yo yatumye urumuri rwayo rubandurira mu mitima yacu kugira ngo ikuzo ryayo tubonera mu maso ha Kristo , turimenye ritumurikire .
47004007	Icyakora ubukungu bwo kumenya ibyo tubutwaye tumeze nk'ibibindi bimeneka ubusa . Ni ukugira ngo ububasha buhebuje budukoreramo bwe kutwitirirwa , ahubwo bumenyekane ko ari ubw'Imana .
47004008	Tubabazwa ku buryo bwose nyamara ntibiduca intege , duhura n'ingorane nyamara ntitwiheba ,
47004009	turatotezwa nyamara Imana ntidutererana , dukubitwa hasi nyamara ntibiduhitana .
