47004010	Iteka tugendana urupfu rwa Yezu mu mibiri yacu , kugira ngo ubugingo bwe bugaragarire muri yo .
47004011	Koko rero duhora twicwa duhōrwa Yezu , kugira ngo ubugingo bwe bugaragarire muri iyi mibiri yacu ipfa .
47004012	Bityo twe ni urupfu rutubungamo naho mwe ni ubugingo .
47004013	Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Nizeye Imana ni cyo gituma mvuga ibyayo . ” Natwe ni uko dufite bene uko kwizera , ni cyo gituma tuvuga ibyayo .
47004014	Tuzi ko Imana yazuye Nyagasani Yezu , natwe izatuzurana na we , maze idukoranyirize imbere yayo hamwe namwe .
47004015	Ibyo byose biba ku bwanyu kugira ngo ubuntu Imana igira busenderezwe muri benshi , butume abayishimira biyongera maze bagwize ikuzo ryayo .
47004016	Ni cyo gituma tudacogora . Koko imibiri yacu igenda isaza , naho mu mitima yacu duhindurwa bashya buri munsi .
47004017	Nuko rero amakuba y'akanya gato duhura na yo muri iki gihe , nta cyo avuze uyagereranyije n'ikuzo ry'akataraboneka rizahoraho iteka dutegurirwa n'ayo makuba .
47004018	Noneho ntitwibanda ku bigaragara ahubwo twibanda ku bitagaragara , kuko ibigaragarira amaso bimara igihe gito naho ibitagaragara bihoraho iteka ryose .
47005001	Koko rero aka kazu k'ingando dutuyemo ari ko mubiri , tuzi ko nigasenyuka mu ijuru dufite inzu idasenyuka tuzabamo , itubatswe n'abantu ahubwo yubatswe n'Imana .
47005002	Igihe tukigatuyemo turaniha tubitewe no kwifuza cyane gutwikirwa n'iyo nzu yacu yo mu ijuru
47005003	maze nitumara gutwikirwa na yo tuzasangwe tutambaye ubusa .
47005004	Koko rero twebwe abakiri muri aka kazu k'ingando , duhora tuniha nk'abantu bikoreye imitwaro iremereye . Si uko dushaka kwamburwa uyu mubiri usanzwe , ahubwo twifuza kwambikwa umubiri tuzaherwa mu ijuru , kugira ngo uyu upfa uzimangatanywe n'ubugingo buhoraho .
47005005	Ibyo ni byo Imana ubwayo yaduteganyirije , ndetse yaduhaye Mwuka wayo ho umusogongero w'ibyo yatugeneye .
47005006	Ni cyo gituma tuba indacogora . Tuzi ko igihe tukiri iwacu mu mubiri , tuba turi kure ya Nyagasani .
47005007	Tugenda tuyoborwa n'ukwizera , tutayoborwa n'ibigaragarira amaso .
47005008	Ni koko turi indacogora . Icyo twahitamo ni ukwimuka , tukavanwa muri uyu mubiri tugataha kwa Nyagasani .
47005009	Icyo tugamije rero ni ukumushimisha , twaba tugituye muri uyu mubiri cyangwa tuwimutsemo .
47005010	Koko rero twese tugomba kuzitaba urukiko kugira ngo ducirwe urubanza na Kristo , umuntu wese yiturwe ibikwiriye ibyiza cyangwa ibibi azaba yarakoze agituye mu mubiri .
47005011	Noneho tuzi gutinya Nyagasani icyo ari cyo , ni cyo gituma dukora uko dushoboye ngo twemeze abantu ibye . Uko tumeze kose Imana iratuzi imbere n'inyuma , nkaba niringira ko namwe mwamenye imbere n'inyuma .
47005012	Ntabwo ari ukongera kubiyogezaho , ahubwo dushaka kubaha impamvu mwashingiraho mukaturata , kugira ngo mubone icyo musubiza ba bandi barata iby'inyuma gusa , bidafite ishingiro mu mutima .
47005013	Niba turi abasazi ( nk'uko bavuga ) , twasaze ku bw'Imana , ariko niba dushyira mu gaciro ni mwe bifitiye akamaro .
47005014	Koko urukundo rwa Kristo ni rwo rubiduhatira . Twemera ko uwapfiriye abantu bose ari umwe , bityo rero bose bakaba barapfuye .
47005015	Ikindi yapfiriye bose kugira ngo abakiriho be gukomeza kubaho bishimisha , ahubwo babeho bashimisha Kristo wabapfiriye maze akazuka .
47005016	Bityo kuva ubu nta muntu tucyemera dushingiye kuri kamere y'abantu . Ndetse nubwo kera na Kristo twamwemeraga dutyo , ubu si ko tukimwemera .
47005017	Erega iyo umuntu ari muri Kristo aba icyaremwe gishya , ibya kera biba bishize byose bikaba bihindutse bishya .
47005018	Ibyo byose Imana ni yo yabikoze . Yiyunze na twe ikoresheje Kristo , nyuma idushinga umurimo wo kubwira abantu ngo biyunge na yo .
47005019	Koko rero Imana yari muri Kristo igihe yiyungaga n'abantu bo ku isi yose , bityo ntiyaba ikibabaraho ibicumuro byabo . Natwe idushinga kubwira abantu ngo biyunge na yo .
47005020	Koko turi intumwa za Kristo , ndetse Imana ubwayo ni yo ibahamagara ari twe ikoresheje . Turabinginga mu izina rya Kristo , nimwiyunge n'Imana .
47005021	Kristo utarigeze akora icyaha Imana yamubazeho ibyaha byacu , kugira ngo muri we tubarweho ubutungane bwayo .
47006001	Noneho ubwo dukorana n'Imana , turabinginga kugira ngo ubuntu yabagiriye bwe gupfa ubusa .
47006002	Koko rero ubwayo yaravuze iti : “ Mu gihe gikwiye narakumvise , ku munsi w'agakiza naragutabaye . ”
47006003	Twirinda kugira uwo twabangamira ku buryo bwose , kugira ngo umurimo dukora utagawa .
47006004	Ahubwo dukora byose twerekana ko turi abagaragu b'Imana , twihanganira cyane amakuba n'ingorane n'ibyago .
47006005	Twarakubiswe dushyirwa muri gereza , dutezwa imidugararo , twarakoze twiyuha akuya , twaraye tudasinziriye ndetse akenshi ntiturye .
47006006	Turangwa n'imibereho izira amakemwa no kumenya ukuri no kwihangana no kugira neza . Turangwa kandi na Mwuka Muziranenge n'urukundo ruzira uburyarya ,
47006007	n'ukuri twamamaza n'ububasha Imana iduha . Imyifatire itunganye ni yo ntwaro turwanisha , kandi ni na yo ngabo dukinga .
47006008	Rimwe abantu baduha icyubahiro ubundi bakadukoza isoni rimwe bakadusebya ubundi bakadushimagiza . Batwita abanyabinyoma nyamara kandi turi abanyakuri .
47006009	Dusa n'abatazwi nyamara dore tuzwi n'umuhisi n'umugenzi . Dusa n'abagiye gupfa , nyamara dore turiho . Bajya baduhana nyamara ntibatwice .
47006010	Duterwa ishavu nyamara tugahorana ibyishimo . Turi abakene nyamara tugakenura benshi . Dusa n'abatagira na mba nyamara dufite byose .
47006011	Yemwe bagenzi bacu b'i Korinti , twababwije ukuri kose kandi turabirundurira .
47006012	Mu mibanire yacu namwe si twe twizigamye ahubwo ni mwe .
47006013	Nuko rero ndababwira nk'umubyeyi ubwira abana be , namwe nimutwirundurire nk'uko twabibagiriye .
47006014	Ntimukifatanye n'abatemera Kristo . Mbese ubutabera n'ubugome byahurira he ? Ese umucyo wasābana ute n'umwijima ?
47006015	Cyo nimumbwire : Kristo yahuza inama ate na Satani ? Cyangwa uwemera Kristo aba ahuriye ku ki n'utamwemera ?
47006016	Mbese Ingoro y'Imana yayisangira ite n'ibigirwamana ? Erega ingoro y'Imana nzima ni twebwe , nk'uko ubwayo yivugiye iti : “ Nzatura hagati muri bo ngendane na bo , nzaba Imana yabo na bo babe ubwoko bwanjye . ”
47006017	Ni cyo gituma Nyagasani avuga ati :
47006018	Nzababera So , namwe mumbere abahungu nabakobwa . Uko ni ko Nyagasani Ushoborabyose avuga . ”
47007001	Ncuti nkunda , ayo masezerano ni twe yahawe . Bityo rero nimucyo twiyeze , twivaneho ikintu cyose gishobora kuduhumanya imibiri cyangwa imitima , twihatire kuba abaziranenge rwose tubitewe no gutinya Imana .
47007002	Nimuduhe umwanya mu mitima yanyu . Dore nta muntu twafudikiye , nta n'uwo twayobeje cyangwa ngo tumurye imitsi .
47007003	Ibyo simbivuze ari ukubacira urubanza . Nk'uko nabivuze mbere , muri inkoramutima zacu , ku buryo nta cyadutandukanya namwe ; twiteguye kubana namwe , cyangwa gupfana namwe .
47007004	Mbafitiye icyizere cyinshi kandi koko muntera ishema ryinshi . No mu makuba yose twagize Imana irushaho kumpumuriza , ngasābwa n'ibyishimo .
47007005	Koko rero igihe twageraga mu ntara ya Masedoniya , nta gahenge twigeze tugira ahubwo twagize ingorane impande zose , abanzi baduteraga baturutse hirya no hino tukagira n'inkeke ku mutima .
47007006	Ariko Imana ihumuriza abashobewe yaraduhumurije tubonye Tito aje .
47007007	Ukuza kwe si ko kwaduhumurije konyine , ahubwo no kumva ko namwe mwamuhumurije byaturemye agatima . Yatubwiye ukuntu munkumbuye n'ishavu mufite , atubwira n'uko mundwanira ishyaka . Ibyo byatumye ndushaho kugira ibyishimo .
47007008	Nubwo urwandiko nabandikiye rwaba rwarabateye agahinda , sinicuza ko narwanditse . Nari ngiye kubyicuza igihe mbonye ukuntu rwabateye agahinda akanya gato .
47007009	Ariko ubu ndishimye atari uko nabateye agahinda , ahubwo ari uko ako gahinda kabateye kwihana . Erega ako ni agahinda gahuje n'ibyo Imana ishaka ! Bityo nta kibi mwahuye na cyo kiduturutseho .
47007010	Burya agahinda gahuje n'ibyo Imana ishaka gatera umuntu kwihana kakamugeza ku gakiza , agahinda nk'ako nta mpamvu yo kukicuza . Naho agahinda gasanzwe ko muri iyi si kageza umuntu ku rupfu .
47007011	Mbega ibyiza mwazaniwe n'agahinda gahuje n'ibyo Imana ishaka ! Mbega umwete kabateye wo kwita ku byabaye ngo mwiregure ! Mbega ukuntu kabateye kurakara no guhagarika umutima ! Mbega ibyifuzo n'ishyaka kabateye ngo mwemere guhana uwagize nabi ! Muri byose mwagaragaje ko muri abere muri urwo rubanza .
47007012	Nuko rero igihe nabandikiraga rwa rwandiko , sinabitewe n'uwacumuye cyangwa n'uwacumuweho , ahubwo kwari ukugira ngo imbere y'Imana ishyaka mudufitiye ribagaragarire .
47007013	Uko mwifashe bamaze kurubasomera byaraduhumurije . Erega si uguhumurizwa gusa ahubwo twarushijeho kwishima , tubonye ukuntu Tito yari anezerewe kubera ko mwese mwamuremye agatima .
47007014	Nari naramuratiye ibyanyu , none koko ntimwankojeje isoni . Nk'uko buri gihe twababwizaga ukuri , ni na ko ibigwi byanyu twaratiye Tito byabaye iby'ukuri .
47007015	Ni icyo cyatumye arushaho kubakunda , cyane cyane iyo yibutse uko mwumviye ibyo yababwiye n'uburyo mwamwakiriye mutinya kandi muhinda umushyitsi .
47007016	Nshimishijwe n'uko nshobora kubagirira icyizere muri byose .
47008001	Bavandimwe , turifuza kubamenyesha ubuntu Imana yagiriye amatorero yayo yo mu ntara ya Masedoniya .
47008002	Koko bagize amakuba menshi yo kubagerageza , nyamara ibyishimo byabo bisesuye byatumye batanga cyane batizigama , nubwo ari abakene bikabije .
47008003	Ndahamya ko batanze uko bashoboye , ndetse ibirenze uko bashoboye ari ntawe ubahase .
47008004	Batwinginze bakomeje ngo bagire uruhare mu gikorwa cyo kugoboka intore za Kristo z'i Yeruzalemu .
47008005	Nuko bakora ibirenze ibyo twari twizeye , ariko rero nk'uko Imana ishaka babanje kwitanga ubwabo , biyegurira Nyagasani nyuma natwe baratwiyegurira .
47008006	Ni cyo cyatumye twinginga Tito kuza iwanyu , kugira ngo arangize icyo gikorwa cyo kugira ubuntu yari yaratangiye muri mwe .
47008007	Musanzwe mushoboye ibintu byose mukanahebuza , ari ukwizera Kristo no kumwamamaza , ari ukumenya ukuri no kugira umwete muri byose ndetse no kudukunda , bityo ndifuza ko munahebuza muri icyo gikorwa cyo kugira ubuntu .
47008008	Si itegeko mbashyizeho ahubwo nagira ngo , mpereye ku mwete abandi bafite ndebe ko urukundo rwanyu ari urw'ukuri .
47008009	Koko rero muzi ubuntu Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo yagize : nubwo yari umukungu yigize umukene ku bwanyu , kugira ngo ubukene bwe bubagire abakungu .
47008010	Reka mbabwire icyo ntekereza kuri ibyo , ni cyo cyababera cyiza . Umwaka ushize ni mwe mwabaye aba mbere kugira icyo mutanga , si ibyo gusa , ni mwe mwabaye aba mbere kwiyemeza gutanga .
47008011	Umva rero nimurangize icyo gikorwa mwatangiye . Nk'uko mwacyiyemeje mufite ubwuzu , mube ari ko mukirangiza mutanga uko mufite .
47008012	Koko rero iyo umuntu atanganye ubwuzu , Imana yemera ituro rye uko arifite itamutezeho icyo adafite .
47008013	Ntabwo ngamije kubakenesha kugira ngo mbone uko nkenura abandi . Oya , ndagira ngo mube magirirane .
47008014	Kuri ubu mufite ibibasagutse , nuko rero nimubikenuze abakennye , maze igihe muzaba mukennye na bo bafite ibibasagutse , bazabibakenuza bityo na none mukaba mubaye magirirane .
47008015	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Uwatoraguye byinshi nta cyo yasaguye , n'uwatoraguye bike nta cyo yahombye . ”
47008016	Imana ishimwe ko yatumye Tito agira umwete wo kubafasha , nk'uko nanjye nywubagirira .
47008017	Icyo twamusabye yemeye kugikora , ndetse ishyaka ryinshi yari abafitiye ryamuteye kuza iwanyu abyiyemeje ubwe .
47008018	Tumutumanye n'umuvandimwe ushimwa n'amatorero yose ya Kristo , kubera ko yamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza .
47008019	Byongeye kandi uwo muvandimwe yatoranyijwe n'amatorero , ngo aduherekeze mu rugendo tuzajyamo rwo gusohoza uwo murimo w'ubuntu twashinzwe . Ibyo tubikorera guhesha Nyagasani ikuzo , no kugaragaza ubwuzu dufite bwo gufasha abandi .
47008020	Twirinda ko hagira umuntu udutera urubwa , akemanga uburyo ducunga iyo mari nyinshi twashinzwe .
47008021	Icyo duharanira si ugukora ibitunganiye Nyagasani gusa , ahubwo ni ugukora n'ibigaragarira abantu ko ari byiza .
47008022	Tubatumanye n'undi muvandimwe wacu , ni umuntu twagerageje kenshi no mu buryo bwinshi dusanga agira umwete wo gufasha abandi . Ubu ho arushijeho kuwugira kubera icyizere cyinshi abafitiye .
47008023	Tito we ni mugenzi wanjye dufatanyije umurimo tubakorera . Naho abo bavandimwe bacu bamuherekeje ni intumwa z'amatorero ya Kristo , na bo bakorera guhesha Kristo ikuzo .
47008024	Ngaho rero nimubagaragarize urukundo rwanyu , mubereke n'impamvu zaduteraga kurata ibigwi byanyu maze bimenyekane mu matorero .
47009001	Ntabwo rwose ari ngombwa ko mbandikira ku byerekeye igikorwa cyo kugoboka intore z'Imana zo muri Yudeya .
47009002	Nzi ko mugira ubwuzu bwo gufasha abandi , ndetse nabaratiye abo muri Masedoniya ngira nti : “ Kuva mu mwaka ushize abavandimwe bacu bo muri Akaya biteguye gutanga imfashanyo . ” None iryo shyaka ryanyu ryemeje abenshi muri bo kugira icyo bakora .
47009003	Mboherereje abo bavandimwe kugira ngo ibyo bigwi twabavuze tubashimagiza bitaba impfabusa .
47009004	Naho ubundi nzanye n'abo muri Masedoniya bagasanga nta cyo mwari mwategura , twakorwa n'isoni kandi namwe mwarushaho kumwara kubera icyizere twari tubafitiye .
47009005	Ni cyo cyatumye mbona ko ari ngombwa gusaba abo bavandimwe ngo bambanzirize kuza iwanyu , kugira ngo batunganye ibyerekeye imfashanyo mwiyemeje gutanga . Nuko rero nzasange mwarayiteguye , bityo bigaragare ko mwatanganye ubwuzu mudahatwa .
47009006	Muzirikane iri jambo : “ Ubiba nkeya azasarura nkeya , naho ubiba nyinshi azasarura nyinshi . ”
47009007	Buri muntu wese akwiriye gutanga icyo yiyemeje , atinuba kandi adahatwa kuko Imana ikunda umuntu utanga anezerewe .
47009008	Koko rero ku buryo bwose Imana ibasha kubagirira ubuntu busesuye , kugira ngo muri byose n'igihe cyose mube mwihagije , ndetse munasagure ibyo gukoresha imirimo myiza yose .
47009009	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga , ngo :
47009010	Imana iha umuhinzi imbuto zo kubiba , ikanamuha ibyokurya byo kumutunga , namwe izabaha imbuto zo kubiba inazigwize , kugira ngo zirumbuke umusaruro mwinshi wo kugira neza kwanyu .
47009011	Izabagwiriza ubukungu bwuburyo bwose kugira ngo muzashobore gutanga mutizigama , maze bitume benshi bashimira Imana , bitewe nimfashanyo zanyu tuzaba tubashyikirije .
47009012	Akamaro kuwo murimo mukora si ako gukenura intore zImana gusa , ahubwo unatuma abashimira Imana barushaho kwiyongera .
47009013	Kuzirikana ibyo byose mwabakoreye bituma basingiza Imana , babonye ukuntu muyumvira , mugatangaza Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo . Bayisingiza kandi kubera ko mugira ubuntu , mugasangira ibyanyu na bo ndetse nabantu bose .
47009014	Bityo bazabasabira babafitiye urukumbuzi , bitewe nubuntu bwImana buhebuje bababonanye .
47009015	Imana ishimwe kubera impano itagereranywa yatugabiye .
47010001	Jyewe Pawulo ndabinginga nkoresheje ubugwaneza no kugira neza bya Kristo . Bavuga ko iyo turi kumwe mba nk'intama , twaba tutari kumwe nkaba nk'intare .
47010002	Ndabasaba nkomeje rero kugira ngo ninza iwanyu mutazantera gukara . Koko kandi sinzabura gukara , nimbonana na ba bandi bavuga ko tugenza nk'ab'isi .
47010003	Nubwo turi abantu ntabwo turwana kimwe n'abantu b'isi .
47010004	Intwaro turwanisha ntizacuzwe n'abantu ahubwo ni intwaro zikomeye twahawe n'Imana , zibasha gusenya ibigo ntamenwa . Zisenya impaka ,
47010005	zikanahirika inkuta ndende zose zashyiriweho gutambamira abantu ngo batamenya Imana . Bityo imigambi yose yo kugomera Kristo tukayinesha , maze ba nyirayo tukabamugandurira .
47010006	Nuko rero ubwo muzaba mwumviye byimazeyo , twiteguye kuzahana uwanga kumvira uwo ari we wese .
47010007	Mwebwe mufata ibintu mushingiye ku byo mureba gusa . Umuntu wese wiyumvamo ko ari uwa Kristo niyongere yibaze , amenye ko natwe turi Abakristo kimwe na we .
47010008	Nyagasani yaduhaye ubushobozi bwo kubaka ubugingo bwanyu atari ubwo kubusenya . Ubanza ahari narakabije kwiratana ubwo bushobozi nyamara nta pfunwe binteye .
47010009	Sinshaka ko mutekereza ko inzandiko mbandikira ari izo kubatera ubwoba .
47010010	Nyamara hariho abavuga bati : “ Inzandiko za Pawulo ni iz'igitsure , zirimo amagambo akaze . Nyamara iyo turi kumwe , usanga acishije make n'ibyo avuga ari ubusa . ”
47010011	Uvuga atyo wese ndagira ngo amenye neza ko ibyo tuvuze mu nzandiko tutari kumwe , nta ho bitandukaniye n'ibyo tuzakora tugeze iwanyu .
47010012	Koko rero ntitwahangara kwireshyeshya cyangwa ngo twigereranye n'abo bantu biyogeza . Ni abapfu rwose kuko bishyiriraho igipimo bakacyigeraho , bigereranya ubwabo !
47010013	Naho twebwe ntitwirata ngo turenze urugero . Ahubwo tugarukira ku rugero ari zo mbibi Imana yadushingiye , kandi namwe muri muri izo mbibi .
47010014	Ubwo ari twe twabanje kubagezaho Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo , turamutse tuje iwanyu ntituba turenze imbibi twahawe .
47010015	Ntiturenga izo mbibi ngo twiratane umurimo wakozwe n'abandi . Ahubwo twiringiye ko muzakomeza gutera imbere mu kwizera Kristo , natwe umurimo dukora muri mwe ukarushaho kwiyongera , tutarenze izo mbibi .
47010016	Nyuma ni bwo tuzageza Ubutumwa bwiza no mu bihugu biri hirya y'icyanyu . Na bwo ntituziratana umurimo tuzasanga warakozwe n'abandi aho Imana yabakebeye .
47010017	Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Ushaka kwirata yirate Nyagasani . ”
47010018	Uwiyogeza si we ushimwa , ahubwo hashimwa uwogezwa na Nyagasani .
47011001	Yewe , icyampa mukihanganira ubusazi bwanjye ho gato ! Nyamuneka nimunyihanganire !
47011002	Erega mbafuhira nk'uko Imana ibafuhira . Nabatanze mumeze nk'umugeni wirinze , ngo mbashyingire umugabo umwe rukumbi ari we Kristo .
47011003	Ariko nk'uko Eva yashutswe n'amayeri ya ya nzoka , ndatinya ko namwe mwashukwa ibitekerezo byanyu bikangirika , maze mugateshuka umurava [ no kubonera ] mukesha Kristo .
47011004	Dore nawe iyo hadutse umuntu akamamaza muri mwe Yezu wundi utari uwo twamamaje , cyangwa akabaha umwuka wundi utari Mwuka w'Imana mwahawe , cyangwa akabagezaho ubutumwa bundi butari Ubutumwa bwiza twabagejejeho , uwo muntu muramureka akabigarurira !
47011005	Ndibwira ko bene izo “ ntumwa ” z'akataraboneka nta cyo jye zindusha .
47011006	Nubwo wenda mu magambo ntari intyoza , ariko rero mu bumenyi sindi umuswa . Ibyo twabibagaragarije neza ku buryo bwose .
47011007	Nabagejejeho Ubutumwa bwiza nta gihembo mbaka , nicishije bugufi kugira ngo mwe mushyirwe hejuru . Mbese icyo ni icyaha ?
47011008	Natungwaga n'amatorero ya Kristo y'ahandi — kwari nko kuyasahura kugira ngo mwebwe mbone uko mbakorera .
47011009	Iyo nagiraga icyo nkenera igihe nari iwanyu , nta muntu n'umwe nigeze ndushya ngira icyo mwaka . Abavandimwe baturutse muri Masedoniya ni bo bamaze ubukene bwose nari mfite . Bityo ku buryo bwose nirinze kubarushya kandi nzakomeza kubyirinda .
47011010	Nshingiye ku kuri kwa Kristo kundimo , ntawe uzambuza kwiratana ibyo ngibyo mu karere kose ka Akaya .
47011011	Ese ibyo mbivugiye iki ? Mbese ni uko ntabakunda ? Imana ni yo izi uko mbakunda .
47011012	Nzakomeza kugenza uko nsanzwe ngenza , kugira ngo ba bandi biyita intumwa za Kristo babure urwitwazo bajya bashaka rwo kwirata ko ari intumwa kimwe natwe .
47011013	Bene abo ni ingirwantumwa zikora ibinyuranye n'ibyo zivuga , zikihindura nk'Intumwa za Kristo .
47011014	Ibyo kandi si igitangaza , kuko na Satani ubwe ajya yihindura nk'umumarayika urabagirana .
47011015	Ntabwo ibyo rero ari ibikomeye kubona n'abakozi be bihindura nk'abagaragu b'Imana nyir'ubutungane . Iherezo baziturwa ibihwanye n'ibyo bakora .
47011016	Ndabisubiramo : ntihagire umuntu unyita umusazi . Ariko rero mushatse kubikora , ngaho nimwihanganire ubusazi bwanjye mureke nirate ho gato .
47011017	Ibyo ngiye kuvuga simbikuye kuri Nyagasani , ahubwo ubusazi bwanjye ni bwo buntinyuye kwirata !
47011018	Benshi birata nk'ab'isi , none rero reka nanjye nirate .
47011019	Mwebwe muzi ubwenge , ni ukuri mukunda kwihanganira abasazi !
47011020	Dore namwe mwihanganira umuntu ubashyira mu buja cyangwa akabarya imitsi , akabariganya akanabasuzugura , cyangwa akabakubita inshyi .
47011021	Twe twabaye ibigwari ntitwabagirira dutyo — yewe , kubivuga binteye isoni ! Niba hari umuntu wahangara kugira icyo yirata naze duhige — na none ibyo mbivuze nk'umusazi .
47011022	Mbese za ngirwantumwa ni Abaheburayi ? Nanjye ndi we . Ese ni Abisiraheli ? Nanjye ndi we . Ese ni urubyaro rwa Aburahamu ? Nanjye ni uko .
47011023	Ese ni abagaragu ba Kristo ? Noneho reka mvuge nk'uwataye umutwe ! Jyewe ndi we kubarusha . Uti kuki ? Nabarushije gukora nshishikaye cyane , nabarushije gufungwa kenshi , nabarushije gukubitwa ibiboko byinshi bikabije , ndetse nabarushije no kuba nenda gupfa hato na hato .
47011024	Ibihe bitanu Abayahudi bankubise ibiboko mirongo itatu n'icyenda .
47011025	Ibindi bihe bitatu nakubiswe inkoni n'abasirikari b'Abanyaroma . Igihe kimwe natewe amabuye bashaka kuyanyicisha . Ibihe bitatu ubwato nagenderagamo bwaramenetse ndarohama . Hari n'ubwo naraye mu nyanja rwagati bukeye nirirwamo .
47011026	Mu ngendo nyinshi najyagamo nagiye ngira akaga gatewe n'inzuzi zuzuye , agatewe n'abambuzi , agatewe na bene wacu b'Abayahudi n'agatewe n'abatari Abayahudi . Yewe , nagiriye akaga mu mijyi no mu cyaro no mu nyanja . Ndetse nagize n'akaga gatewe n'abiyita abavandimwe kandi atari bo .
47011027	Narakoze cyane niyuha akuya . Kenshi nagize ibimbuza kugoheka . Nagize inzara n'inyota ndetse akenshi mbura n'icyo ndya . Nagiye mbura ibyo nambara maze imbeho ikantunda .
47011028	Uretse ibyo n'ibindi ntavuze , uko bukeye n'uko bwije mporana inkeke , mpagaritse umutima kubera amatorero yose ya Kristo .
47011029	Iyo hagize ucika intege bituma nanjye ncika intege . Iyo hagize uteshuka agakora icyaha biranshegesha .
47011030	Niba ari ngombwa ko nirata reka nirate intege nke zanjye .
47011031	Imana Se w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo yogahora isingizwa iteka , izi ko ntabeshya .
47011032	Ubwo nari i Damasi umutegetsi washinzwe umujyi n'Umwami Areta , yashyize abarinzi ku marembo y'umujyi ngo bamfate .
47011033	Nuko Abakristo baho banshyira mu gitebo bancisha mu idirishya ryo mu rukuta rw'umujyi , ndahunga murokoka ntyo .
47012001	Ni ngombwa ko nirata nubwo ari nta cyo bimaze . Noneho reka mvuge ibyerekeye ibyo neretswe n'ibyo nahishuriwe na Nyagasani .
47012002	Hari umuntu wa Kristo nzi wazamuwe , akagezwa mu ijuru rya gatatu hashize imyaka cumi n'ine . Icyakora sinzi neza ko yari ahari koko cyangwa niba kwari ukuherekwa gusa , Imana yonyine ni yo ibizi .
47012003	Nzi ko uwo muntu yazamuwe akagezwa muri paradiso . Na none sinzi neza ko yari ahari koko cyangwa niba kwari ukuherekwa gusa , Imana yonyine ni yo ibizi . Uko biri kose yahumviye amagambo arenze uko umuntu yayasobanura , ndetse birabujijwe no kuyasubiramo . Nzi ko uwo muntu yazamuwe akagezwa muri paradiso . Na none sinzi neza ko yari ahari koko cyangwa niba kwari ukuherekwa gusa , Imana yonyine ni yo ibizi . Uko biri kose yahumviye amagambo arenze uko umuntu yayasobanura , ndetse birabujijwe no kuyasubiramo .
47012004	
47012005	Umuntu nk'uwo ni we nakwiratana koko , naho jyewe ubwanjye nta kindi nakwiratana keretse intege nke zanjye .
47012006	Nyamara nshatse kugira icyo niratana sinaba mbaye umusazi , kuko naba mvuga iby'ukuri . Ariko noneho ndifashe , kugira ngo hatagira untekerezaho ibirenze ibyo abona nkora cyangwa ibyo yumva mvuga .
47012007	Koko kandi kugira ngo ntavaho nirata mbitewe n'uko nahishuriwe ibitangaje gutyo , nashyizwe igisa n'ihwa mu mubiri wanjye kimpanda kikambera nk'intumwa ya Satani yo kumpoza ku nkoni , kugira ngo ne kwikuza .
47012008	Ibihe bitatu nasabye Nyagasani kunkiza icyo cyago ,
47012009	maze na we akansubiza ati : “ Ubuntu ngira buraguhagije , kuko ububasha bwanjye bugwira ahiganje intege nke . ” Noneho rero nzajya nishimira cyane kwiratana intege nke zanjye , kugira ngo ububasha bwa Kristo bugume kuri jye .
47012010	Ni cyo gituma nishimira kugira intege nke n'ubukene , ngatukwa ngatotezwa , nkagira ingorane ari Kristo nzira . Erega iyo mbaye umunyantegenke ni bwo mba mfite imbaraga !
47012011	Yemwe , nabaye umusazi koko ariko ni mwe mwabimpatiye , kandi rero ari mwe mwagombaga kunyogeza . Nubwo ari nta cyo ndi cyo , ariko za ntumwa mwita akataraboneka nta cyo zindushije .
47012012	Ibimenyetso biranga Intumwa ya Kristo Imana yampaye kubitanga muri mwe nta gucogora na busa ni byo ibi : kwerekana ibimenyetso no gukora ibitangaza n'ibindi bikorwa by'ububasha .
47012013	Mbese ni iki nakoreye andi matorero ya Kristo , mwebwe sinkibakorere uretse ko mwebwe ntashatse kubarushya ? Ibyo niba ari ukubahemukira mubimbabarire .
47012014	Ubu niteguye kuzaza iwanyu ubwa gatatu kandi nta bwo nzabarushya ngira icyo mbasaba . Si ibyanyu nshaka ahubwo ni mwebwe ubwanyu . Erega abana si bo bakwiye kuzigama ibyo gukenura ababyeyi babo , ahubwo ababyeyi ni bo bakwiye kubikorera abana babo .
47012015	Jyewe rero nashimishwa no gutanga ibyo mfite byose ku bwanyu , ndetse nanjye ubwanjye nkitanga byimazeyo . Mbese koko mwabasha kunkunda urumamo , kandi jye mbakunda bigeze aho ?
47012016	Noneho mwambwira muti : “ Koko ntiwaturuhije nyamara wabaye inyaryenge , uradushuka utugusha mu mutego waduteze ! ”
47012017	None se hari inyungu nabashatsemo maze nkayituma umwe mu bo naboherereje ?
47012018	Nasabye Tito kuza iwanyu mutumana na wa muvandimwe . Mbese Tito hari inyungu yabashatsemo ? Ese ntimwabonye ko twembi twifata kimwe tukanyura inzira imwe ?
47012019	Mbese mwibwiye ko tumaze igihe kingana gitya tubireguraho ? Si ko biri ahubwo imbere y'Imana tuvuga ibyo Kristo ashaka . Ncuti dukunda , ibyo byose twabibabwiriye kugira ngo byubake ubugingo bwanyu .
47012020	Ndatinya ko ninza iwanyu nzasanga mutameze nk'uko nshaka , kandi namwe mugasanga ntameze nk'uko mushaka . Ndatinya ko nzasanga mufitanye amakimbirane n'ishyari , uburakari no gutera amahane , ngasanga munegurana munafitanye amazimwe no gusuzugurana , ndetse n'imivurungano .
47012021	Ndatinya ko ningaruka iwanyu Imana yanjye izankoza isoni imbere yanyu . Koko kandi nzagomba kuririra benshi muri ba bandi bacumuye mbere , bakaba baranze kwisubiraho ngo bareke za ngeso zabo zo kwiyandarika n'ubusambanyi n'ubwomanzi .
47013001	Ubu ni ubwa gatatu ngiye kuzaza iwanyu kubasura . Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Ikirego cyose ntigishobora kwemerwa keretse gihamijwe n'abagabo babiri cyangwa barenzeho . ”
47013002	Ubwo nazaga kubasura ubwa kabiri narababuriye , n'ubu tutari kumwe ndaburira ba bandi bacumuye mbere kimwe n'abandi bose , ningaruka nta n'umwe nzababarira .
47013003	Ibyo bizababera icyemezo mushaka ko ari Kristo umvugisha . Ku bibareba Kristo si umunyantegenke , ahubwo agira ububasha muri mwe .
47013004	Koko rero yabambwe ku musaraba afite intege nke , ariko ubu ariho kubera ububasha bw'Imana . Natwe ni uko dusangiye na we izo ntege nke , nyamara kubera ububasha bw'Imana tuzabanaho na we tubakorere .
47013005	Nimwigerageze ubwanyu , mwisuzume murebe niba koko mugikomeye ku uwo twemera . Mbese ntimwasobanukiwe ko Kristo ari muri mwe koko ? Ni ko biri keretse niba mwarasuzumwe mugatsindwa .
47013006	Ndiringira ko muzamenya ko twebweho tutatsinzwe n'isuzumwa .
47013007	Tujya dusaba Imana kugira ngo mwe kugira ikibi mukora . Ntitubasabira dutyo kugira ngo twe tuboneke ko twatsinze , ahubwo ni ukugira ngo mwebwe mukore ibyiza mutsinde nubwo twe twaba nk'abatsinzwe .
47013008	Nta cyo tubasha gukora cyabangamira ukuri kw'Imana , ahubwo turagushyigikira .
47013009	Koko rero twishimira ibihe tugiramo intege nke mwe mugakomera . Ni yo mpamvu duhora tubasabira kugira ngo mube indakemwa .
47013010	Dore ikinteye kubandikira ibyo byose kandi tutari kumwe , ni ukugira ngo ubwo nzaba ndi iwanyu ntazagomba kubahana bikomeye , nkoresheje ubushobozi Nyagasani yampaye bwo kubaka ubugingo bwanyu simbusenye .
47013011	Ahasigaye bavandimwe , murabeho . Mube indakemwa , muterane inkunga muhuze imitima , mube amahoro . Bityo Imana yo sōko y'amahoro n'urukundo izabana namwe .
47013012	Muramukanye muhoberana ku buryo buzira amakemwa . Intore z'Imana z'ino zose zirabatashya .
47013013	
47013014	Ubuntu Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo abagirira , n'urukundo rw'Imana n'ubusābane mukesha Mwuka Muziranenge , bihorane namwe mwese .
48001001	Jyewe Pawulo utagizwe Intumwa n'abantu cyangwa ngo bicishwe ku muntu runaka , ahubwo nkaba naragizwe Intumwa na Yezu Kristo ubwe n'Imana Se yamuzuye mu bapfuye ,
48001002	mfatanyije n'abavandimwe bose turi kumwe , ndabandikiye mwebwe abo mu matorero ya Kristo yo mu ntara ya Galati .
48001003	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
48001004	Kristo yaradupfiriye kugira ngo adukize ibyaha byacu , maze aturokore ibibi by'iki gihe cya none nk'uko Imana Data yabishatse .
48001005	Imana nihabwe ikuzo iteka ryose . Amina .
48001006	Ntangajwe n'ukuntu mwihutiye kureka Imana yabahamagaye ibitewe n'ubuntu mwagiriwe na Kristo , maze mukemera ubundi butumwa .
48001007	Mu by'ukuri nta bundi butumwa bwiza bubaho , ahubwo ni abantu bahagurukiye kubatera imidugararo , bashaka guhindagura Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo .
48001008	Ariko hagize undi ubagezaho ubutumwa buciye ukubiri n'ubwo twabagejejeho , yaba uwo muri twe cyangwa umumarayika uvuye mu ijuru , Imana imuvume !
48001009	Nk'uko twari twarabivuze na none nongeye kubisubiramo , hagize umuntu ubagezaho ubutumwa buciye ukubiri n'ubwo mwakiriye , Imana imuvume !
48001010	Mbese ubu naba nshaka gushimwa n'abantu cyangwa gushimwa n'Imana ? Ese ubu mparanira kunezeza abantu ? Oya . Iyo mba nkigamije kunezeza abantu sinajyaga kuba umugaragu wa Kristo .
48001011	Bavandimwe , ndabamenyesha ko Ubutumwa bwiza nabatangarije rwose budakomoka ku bantu .
48001012	Nta muntu n'umwe wigeze abungezaho , nta n'umwe wabunyigishije , ahubwo nabuhishuriwe na Yezu Kristo .
48001013	Mwumvise amatwara nari mfite kera nkiri mu idini ya kiyahudi . Muzi ko natotezaga Umuryango w'Imana bikabije , mparanira kuwutsemba .
48001014	Nateraga imbere mu by'idini ya kiyahudi kurusha benshi bo muri bene wacu b'Abayahudi b'urungano , nkarwana ishyaka bihambaye nshyira imbere imihango twasigiwe na ba sogokuruza .
48001015	Nyamara Imana yo yantoranyije ntaravuka ikampamagara ibitewe n'ubuntu bwayo , yishimiye
48001016	kumpishurira Umwana wayo kugira ngo mwamamaze mu batari Abayahudi . Ni ko guhaguruka nta we niriwe ngisha inama ,
48001017	habe no kujya i Yeruzalemu ngo mbaze abantanze kuba Intumwa ya Kristo , ahubwo nerekeje muri Arabiya nyuma nsubira i Damasi .
48001018	Hashize imyaka itatu mbona kujya i Yeruzalemu gusura Petero , marana na we ibyumweru bibiri .
48001019	Nta yindi Ntumwa ya Kristo nigeze kubona , uretse Yakobo umuvandimwe wa Nyagasani Yezu .
48001020	Ibyo mbandikiye ni ukuri , Imana ni yo ntanze ho umugabo .
48001021	Hanyuma nagiye mu ntara ya Siriya n'iya Silisiya .
48001022	Icyo gihe abo mu matorero ya Kristo yo muri Yudeya bari bataranca iryera .
48001023	Bari barumvise gusa inkuru ngo : “ Wa wundi wadutotezaga asigaye yamamaza ubutumwa bwemeza abantu Kristo , kandi ari bwo yarwanyaga . ”
48001024	Nuko ibyambayeho bibatera gusingiza Imana .
48002001	Nyuma y'imyaka cumi n'ine nsubira i Yeruzalemu hamwe na Barinaba , na Tito turamujyana .
48002002	Icyanteye kujyayo ni uko Imana yari yabimpishuriye . Nuko nihererana n'abitwaga abayobozi baho , mbasobanurira ibyerekeye Ubutumwa bwiza ngeza ku batari Abayahudi . Kwari ukugira ngo ntaba nararuhiye ubusa cyangwa ngo ejo ntazaruhira ubundi .
48002003	Yewe na Tito wamperekeje utari Umuyahudi , habe ngo ahatirwe gukebwa .
48002004	Icyakora aba yarakebwe bitewe na bamwe biyita abavandimwe , bacengeye muri twe rwihishwa . Abo bari bagendereye kugenzura ukwishyira ukizana dufite muri Kristo Yezu , kugira ngo badushyire mu buja .
48002005	Nta bwo twigeze tubabererekera na gato , kugira ngo ukuri k'Ubutumwa bwiza kugume muri mwe kudahinyutse .
48002006	Ku byerekeye ba bandi bitwa abayobozi — icyo bari cyo nta cyo bindebaho , kuko Imana itita ku busumbane bw'abantu — abo ngabo nta kintu gishya bantegetse .
48002007	Ahubwo na bo babonye ko Imana yanshinze umurimo wo kugeza Ubutumwa bwiza ku batari Abayahudi , nk'uko yawushinze Petero mu Bayahudi .
48002008	Koko Imana yampaye ububasha bwo kuba Intumwa yayo ku batari Abayahudi , kimwe n'uko yabuhaye Petero ngo abe Intumwa ku Bayahudi .
48002009	Yakobo na Petero na Yohani bitwa inkingi z'Umuryango w'Imana , bamaze kuzirikana ubwo buntu Imana yangiriye , jye na Barinaba badukora mu ntoki . Icyo kiba ikimenyetso cy'ubufatanye , kugira ngo twe tujye mu batari Abayahudi , naho bo bagume mu Bayahudi .
48002010	Icyo badusabye gusa ni ukwibuka abakene kandi nanjye ibyo nashishikariye kubikora .
48002011	Icyakora ubwo Petero yazaga Antiyokiya namurwanyije ku mugaragaro , kuko yari yigayishije .
48002012	Mbere y'uko abantu baturutse kwa Yakobo bahagera , Petero yasangiraga n'abatari Abayahudi . Aho baziye yigira nyoni nyinshi , areka gukomeza gusangira na bo kuko yatinyaga abavugaga ko gukebwa ari ngombwa .
48002013	N'abandi Bayahudi batangira kugenza nka we , ku buryo na Barinaba yakurikije urwo rugero rw'uburyarya .
48002014	Nuko mbonye ko badakurikiza ukuri k'Ubutumwa bwiza , ni ko kubwira Petero mu ruhame nti : “ Niba wowe w'Umuyahudi warifataga nk'abatari bo ugata umurongo w'idini ya kiyahudi , ubu se bishoboka bite ko wahatira abatari Abayahudi kwifata nk'Abayahudi ? ”
48002015	Twebwe turi Abayahudi kavukire , ntituri “ abavamahanga b'abanyabyaha . ”
48002016	Nyamara tuzi ko umuntu atagirwa intungane no gukora ibyategetswe n'Amategeko , ahubwo agirwa intungane imbere y'Imana no kwemera Kristo Yezu . Ndetse natwe twemeye Kristo Yezu kugira ngo tugirwe intungane tubitewe no kumwemera , tutabitewe no gukora ibyategetswe n'Amategeko . Erega nta muntu ugirwa intungane abitewe no gukora ibyategetswe n'Amategeko !
48002017	Ariko rero niba dushaka kugirwa intungane tubikesha Kristo , kandi tukaboneka ko natwe turi abanyabyaha , byaba se bivuga ko Kristo ari we utuma abantu bakora ibyaha ? Ntibikabeho !
48002018	Nanjye nsubiye kugengwa n'Amategeko , byasa no kongera kubaka ibyo namaze gusenya , bityo na none nkaba nigize uwica amategeko .
48002019	Ku byerekeye kugengwa n'Amategeko , jye narapfuye mu ruhande rw'Amategeko , kugira ngo noneho mbeho ngengwa n'Imana .
48002020	Nabambanywe na Kristo ku musaraba ku buryo atari jye ukiriho , ahubwo ari Kristo uriho muri jye . Imibereho yanjye yo muri iki gihe nyikesha kwizera Umwana w'Imana , wankunze akampfira .
48002021	Sinirengagiza ubuntu bw'Imana , kuko niba ari Amategeko ahesha umuntu gutunganira Imana , noneho urupfu rwa Kristo rwaba rubaye impfabusa .
48003001	Yemwe mwa Banyagalati b'abapfu mwe , ni nde wabaroze ? Abantu mwamenyeshejwe neza ukuntu Kristo yabambwe ku musaraba , mukaba nk'ababyiboneye !
48003002	Ndifuza ko munsubiza iki kibazo cyonyine : mbese mwahawe Mwuka w'Imana kubera ko mwakoze ibyategetswe n'Amategeko , cyangwa ni uko mwumvise Ubutumwa bwiza mukabwemera ?
48003003	Bishoboka bite ko muba abapfu bigeze aho ? Ibyo mwatangiye mubishobojwe na Mwuka w'Imana , none murashaka kubyirangiriza n'imbaraga zanyu ?
48003004	Noneho ga bya bindi byose mwanyuzemo byabaye impfabusa ? Ese birashoboka ?
48003005	Mbese Imana ibaha Mwuka wayo igakora ibitangaza muri mwe , ibiterwa n'uko mukora ibyategetswe n'Amategeko ? Cyangwa ni uko mwumvise Ubutumwa bwayo mukabwemera ?
48003006	Ibyanditswe bivuga ko “ Aburahamu yizeye Imana bituma abarwa nk'intungane . ”
48003007	Bityo rero mumenye ko abizera Imana ari bo rubyaro nyakuri rwa Aburahamu .
48003008	Ibyanditswe byateganyije kandi ko n'abatari Abayahudi Imana izabagira intungane , ibitewe n'uko bayizeye . Ni cyo gituma Aburahamu yarabwiwe iyo nkuru nziza mbere y'igihe , ngo “ Amahanga yose azaguherwamo umugisha . ”
48003009	Nuko rero abizera Imana bose baherwa umugisha hamwe na Aburahamu wayizeraga .
48003010	Nyamara abishingikiriza ku kumvira Amategeko baba biteje umuvumo , kuko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Havumwe umuntu wese udahora akurukiza ibyanditswe byose mu gitabo cy'Amategeko . ”
48003011	Biragaragara rwose ko nta muntu watunganira Imana abitewe no kumvira Amategeko , kuko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Utunganiye Imana abitewe no kuyizera azabaho . ”
48003012	Naho Amategeko yo ntaho ahuriye no kwizera Imana . Ahubwo nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga , umuntu ukurikiza Amategeko azabeshwaho na yo .
48003013	Kristo yadukijije umuvumo uterwa n'Amategeko igihe yahindukaga ikivume ku bwacu , nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Umuntu wese umanitswe ku giti aba yaravumwe . ”
48003014	Ibyo kwari ukugira ngo abatari Abayahudi baherwe muri Kristo umugisha Imana yasezeranyije Aburahamu , no kugira ngo duhabwe Mwuka Imana yadusezeranyije tubikesha kwizera Kristo .
48003015	Bavandimwe , reka mfate urugero rusanzwe mu mibereho y'abantu : iyo umuntu agiranye n'undi isezerano rihamye , ntawe ushobora kurikura cyangwa ngo agire icyo aryongeraho .
48003016	Ngibyo rero . Aburahamu ni we Imana yahaye amasezerano we n'urubyaro rwe . Ibyanditswe ntibivuga “ abazamukomokaho ” , nk'aho ari abantu benshi bavugwa . Ahubwo bivuga “ urubyaro rwe ” , kugira ngo bisobanuke ko bigenewe umuntu umwe rukumbi ari we Kristo .
48003017	Icyo nshaka kuvuga ni iki : Imana yagiranye Isezerano na Aburahamu irarikomeza , maze Amategeko ashingwa nyuma y'imyaka magana ane na mirongo itatu . Ntibishoboka rero ko ayo Mategeko asesa rya Sezerano ngo ribe impfabusa .
48003018	Niba rero ari ukumvira Amategeko bihesha abantu umunani w'Imana , bityo baba batakiwuheshwa na rya sezerano . Nyamara Aburahamu we Imana yamugiriye ubuntu ishingiye ku Isezerano ryayo .
48003019	None se kuki Amategeko yatanzwe ? Yongeweho nyuma kugira ngo ibicumuro by'abantu bigaragare , kugeza igihe wa wundi ukomoka kuri Aburahamu aziye , ari we wagenewe Isezerano ry'Imana . Amategeko yatanzwe anyujijwe ku bamarayika , maze agezwa ku bantu acishijwe ku muntu w'umuhuza .
48003020	Icyakora nta muhuza wakenerwa iyo atari uguhuza abantu babiri , naho Imana yo ni imwe rukumbi .
48003021	Noneho se Amategeko acisha ukubiri n'amasezerano y'Imana ? Ntibikabeho ! Koko iyo haza kubaho Amategeko ahesha umuntu ubugingo , bityo yajyaga kuyumvira akaba intungane .
48003022	Ariko Ibyanditswe bivuga ko ibiriho byose bizitiwe n'ibyaha , kugira ngo abemeye Yezu Kristo bahabwe ibyasezeranyijwe babikesha kumwizera .
48003023	Mbere y'uko igihe cyo kwemera Kristo kigera , twari tuzitiwe kandi turinzwe n'Amategeko , kugeza igihe Imana ihishuriye agakiza duheshwa no kwemera Kristo .
48003024	Bityo Amategeko yashyiriweho kuturera kugeza igihe Kristo aziye , kugira ngo dutunganire Imana tubikesha kumwemera .
48003025	Ariko ubu igihe cyo kwemera Kristo kirasohoye , nta bwo rero tukirerwa n'Amategeko .
48003026	Koko mwese muri abana b'Imana mubiheshejwe no kwemera Kristo ,
48003027	kuko mwese mwabatirijwe kuba muri Kristo , ku buryo Kristo ababera nk'umwambaro .
48003028	Nuko rero nta tandukaniro riba riri hagati y'Umuyahudi n'utari Umuyahudi , hagati y'inkoreragahato n'uwishyira akizana , no hagati y'umugabo n'umugore , kuko muri Kristo Yezu mwese muri umwe .
48003029	Ubwo rero muri aba Kristo , muri urubyaro rwa Aburahamu . Bityo mukaba abo Imana yasezeranyije umunani .
48004001	Icyo nshaka kuvuga ni uko ugenewe guhabwa umunani mu bya se , igihe akiri umwana nta cyo aba arusha umugaragu w'inkoreragahato , nubwo ari we uzaba umutware wa byose .
48004002	Ahubwo agumya kugengwa n'abamurera n'abashinzwe ibintu bye , kugeza igihe se yategetse .
48004003	Natwe igihe twari nk'abana , burya twakoreshwaga agahato n'ibinyabutware bigenga iyi si .
48004004	Ariko igihe cyagenwe kigeze Imana yohereje Umwana wayo , abyarwa n'umugore kandi avuka agengwa n'Amategeko ,
48004005	kugira ngo acungure abari bakigengwa n'Amategeko , bityo tugirwe abana b'Imana .
48004006	Koko muri abana bayo ndetse Imana yashyize mu mitima yacu Mwuka w'Umwana wayo , utuma tuyitakambira tuti : “ Aba ! ” ni ukuvuga ngo : “ Data ! ”
48004007	Bityo wowe ntukiri inkoreragahato ahubwo uri umwana w'Imana , kandi ubwo uri umwana wayo iguteganyirije umunani yageneye abana bayo .
48004008	Kera mutaramenya Imana , mwari inkoreragahato z'ibyitwa “ imana ” bitari Imana nyakuri .
48004009	None ubwo mumaze kumenya Imana ndetse ikirutaho na yo ikaba ibazi , bishoboka bite ko mwashaka gusubira mu buja bwa bya binyabutware by'ibitindi bitagira icyo bishoboye ?
48004010	Musigaye muziririza iminsi runaka kimwe n'amezi n'ibihe n'imyaka !
48004011	Mfite impungenge ku bwanyu ko ahari ibyo nabakoreye byose naba naravunikiye ubusa .
48004012	Bavandimwe , ndabinginze ngo mumere nkanjye nk'uko nanjye nigize nkamwe . Burya nta kibi mwigeze munkorera .
48004013	Muzi ko icyatumye bwa mbere mbona uburyo bwo kubagezaho Ubutumwa bwiza ari uko nari ndwaye .
48004014	Iyo ndwara yanjye yababereye ikigeragezo , ariko ntimwigeze munsuzugura cyangwa ngo mbatere ishozi . Ahubwo mwanyakiriye nk'aho ndi umumarayika utumwe n'Imana , ndetse mwanyakiriye nk'aho ndi Yezu Kristo ubwe .
48004015	None se bwa bwuzu mwari mufite bwagiye he ? Koko ndahamya ko iyo biba ibishoboka , muba mwarinogoyemo amaso mukayanyihera .
48004016	Mbese ubu mpindutse umwanzi wanyu kuko mbabwiza ukuri ?
48004017	Ba bantu babafitiye ishyaka ariko si ishyaka ryiza , icyo bashaka ni ukudutandukanya kugira ngo abe ari bo mugirira ishyaka .
48004018	Si bibi kugira ishyaka iyo ari ishyaka ryo gukora ibyiza , mukarigira igihe cyose atari igihe ndi muri mwe gusa .
48004019	Bana banjye , nk'uko umubyeyi uri ku nda ababazwa n'ibise , ni ko nanjye ibyanyu bimbabaza kugeza igihe Kristo agaragariye muri mwe .
48004020	Iyaba nari nshoboye kuba hamwe namwe ubu , ngo nongere mbibabwire ku bundi buryo . Ibyanyu bimpagaritse umutima !
48004021	Yemwe abashaka kugengwa n'Amategeko , cyo nimumbwire . Mbese ntimwumva icyo Amategeko avuga ?
48004022	Ibyanditswe bivuga ko Aburahamu yari afite abahungu babiri , umwe yavutse ku muja we Hagari , undi ku mugore we Sara utigeze mu buja .
48004023	Uw'umugore w'umuja yavutse ku buryo busanzwe , naho uw'umugore utigeze mu buja we yavutse bishingiye ku Isezerano ry'Imana .
48004024	Ibyo ni ikigereranyo . Abo bagore bombi bagereranywa n'Amasezerano abiri Imana yagiranye n'abantu bayo . Rimwe muri yo ryatangiwe ku musozi wa Sinayi ribyara abana b'ubuja , ni ryo rigereranywa na Hagari .
48004025	Hagari we ashushanya wa musozi wa Sinayi wo muri Arabiya , kandi akaba agereranywa na Yeruzalemu isanzwe iri mu buja , yo n'abayituye bose .
48004026	Naho aba Yeruzalemu yo mu ijuru barishyira bakizana , kandi ni yo mama utubyara .
48004027	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga biti :
48004028	Bavandimwe , nk'uko Izaki yavutse ni ko namwe mwavutse bishingiye ku Isezerano ry'Imana .
48004029	Nk'uko byabaye icyo gihe , umwana wavutse ku buryo busanzwe agatoteza uwabyawe ku bwa Mwuka , na n'ubu ni ko biri .
48004030	Ariko se Ibyanditswe bibivugaho iki ? Biravuga biti : “ Irukana uriya muja n'umuhungu we ! Umuhungu w'umuja ntagomba kugabana umunani n'uw'umugore utigeze aba umuja . ”
48004031	Nuko rero bavandimwe , twe ntituri abana b'umuja , ahubwo turi ab'umugore utigeze mu buja .
48005001	Ni na ko Kristo yadukuye mu buja kugira ngo twishyire twizane . Nuko rero muhagarare kigabo , mwirinde mudasubira mu buja .
48005002	Nimunyumve . Jyewe Pawulo ndabivuga nkomeje , nimwiyemeza gukebwa Kristo nta cyo azaba abamariye .
48005003	Na none kandi ndabamenyesha ko umuntu wese wiyemeza gukebwa , aba aniyemeje kumvira Amategeko yose iyo ava akagera .
48005004	Mwebwe rero abashaka kugirwa intungane imbere y'Imana mwitwaje kumvira Amategeko , muba mwitandukanyije na Kristo bityo mukaba mwivukije ubuntu bw'Imana .
48005005	Kugirwa intungane imbere y'Imana bidutera gutegereza ibyo twiringiye kuzabona , tubikesha kwizera Kristo tubishobojwe na Mwuka .
48005006	Iyo umuntu ari muri Kristo Yezu , ari ugukebwa ari ukudakebwa byose nta cyo bimaze . Igifite akamaro ni ukwizera kugaragazwa n'ibikorwa by'urukundo .
48005007	Ko mwateraga imbere neza , none se ni nde wababangamiye akabatesha gukurikiza ukuri ?
48005008	Iyo rukuruzi ntituruka ku Mana ibahamagara .
48005009	N'ubundi bavuga ko “ agasemburo gake gatubura ifu yose ” .
48005010	Jyewe niringiye Nyagasani ku bwanyu , anyemeza ko mutazafata undi mugambi . Nyamara ubatera imidugararo , uwo ari we wese Imana izamuhana .
48005011	Naho jyewe rero bavandimwe , bibaye ari ukuri ko ncyamamaza ibyerekeye umuhango wo gukebwa , naba se kandi ngitoterezwa iki ? Ari uko bimeze umusaraba wa Kristo namamaza nta we waba ukibangamiye .
48005012	Iyaba abo babatera imidugararo bari bishahuye bikarangira !
48005013	Naho mwe bavandimwe , Imana yabahamagariye kwishyira mukizana . Nyamara uko kwishyira mukizana ntimukwiye kubigira urwitwazo rwo gukora ibyo kamere yanyu irarikiye . Ahubwo buri wese akorere mugenzi we abitewe n'urukundo .
48005014	Koko rero Amategeko yose abumbiye muri iri rimwe ngo : “ Ujye ukunda mugenzi wawe nk'uko wikunda . ”
48005015	Ariko nimuryana mugacagagurana , mwirinde naho ubundi mwamarana !
48005016	Reka mbabwire : nimureke Mwuka w'Imana abayobore , bityo ntimuzaba mugikora ibyo kamere yanyu irarikira .
48005017	Kamere y'umuntu yifuza ibyo Mwuka yanga , Mwuka na we akifuza ibyo kamere yanga . Ni ibintu bibiri bihabanye ku buryo mutakora ibyo mwishakiye .
48005018	Naho niba muyoborwa na Mwuka , ntabwo muba mukigengwa n'Amategeko .
48005019	Dore ibibi kamere y'umuntu imukoresha : gusambana , kwiyandarika n'ubwomanzi
48005020	gusenga ibigirwamana no kuroga , kwangana , amakimbirane , gufuha , kurakara no gutera amahane kwitandukanya n'abandi no kwicamo ibice ,
48005021	ishyari , ubusinzi , umurengwe n'ibindi bisa bityo . Nk'uko nigeze kubibabwira na none ndabamenyesha hakiri kare ko abakora bene ibyo , nta munani bazahabwa mu bwami bw'Imana .
48005022	Nyamara imbuto ziva kuri Mwuka ni izi : urukundo , ibyishimo , amahoro , kwihangana , kugira neza , imico myiza , kudahemuka ,
48005023	kugwa neza no kumenya kwifata . Bene ibyo nta mategeko abibuza .
48005024	Aba Kristo Yezu babambye kamere yabo ku musaraba , hamwe n'ingeso mbi zayo n'irari ryayo .
48005025	Niba ari Mwuka uduha ubugingo nitureke atuyobore .
48005026	Ntitukabe abirasi ahubwo twirinde kurakaranya no kugirirana ishyari .
48006001	Bavandimwe , niba umuntu afashwe acumura , mwebwe abayoborwa na Mwuka mumugarure ku murongo , ariko mubikorane ubugwaneza . Erega nawe ubwawe wirinde uwo uri we wese , kuko nawe washobora kugwa mu bishuko .
48006002	Mwakirane ibibaremereye , bityo muzaba mwumviye itegeko rya Kristo byuzuye .
48006003	Umuntu wibwira ko akomeye kandi nta cyo ari cyo aba yibeshya .
48006004	Ahubwo umuntu wese niyigenzure ubwe mu byo akora . Niba hari icyo afite kwirata , agikore ku giti cye atigereranya ku bandi ,
48006005	kuko buri wese azibarizwa ibyo azaba yarakoze .
48006006	Uwigishwa Ijambo ry'Imana ajye asangira ibyo atunze byose n'urimwigisha .
48006007	Ntimukibeshye , Imana ntikinishwa . Imbuto umuntu abiba ni zo azasarura .
48006008	Ubiba imbuto z'ibishimisha kamere ye , azasarura urupfu . Naho ubiba imbuto z'ibishimisha Mwuka w'Imana , azasarura ubugingo buhoraho .
48006009	Ntitukarambirwe gukora ibyiza , kuko nitudacogora tuzasarura igihe kigeze .
48006010	Nuko rero igihe cyose tubonye uburyo tujye tugirira neza abantu bose , ariko cyane cyane abo dusangira kwemera Kristo .
48006011	Dore izi nyuguti nini ni jye ubwanjye uziyandikiye n'ukwanjye kuboko !
48006012	Abashaka gushimwa n'abantu ku mpamvu z'imigenzo igaragara ni bo babahatira gukebwa . Intego yabo ni imwe nsa : ni ukugira ngo badatotezwa bazira umusaraba wa Kristo .
48006013	Nyamara kandi abo bantu nubwo bakebwa , ubwabo ntibumvira Amategeko . Barashaka gusa ko mukebwa kugira ngo babone uko birata uwo muhango ukorewe imibiri yanyu .
48006014	Naho jye nta kindi ngomba kwiratana kitari umusaraba w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo . Uwo musaraba ni wo utuma isi imbera nk'iwubambweho , nanjye nkabera isi nk'uwubambweho .
48006015	Ku bwanjye gukebwa cyangwa kudakebwa nta cyo bimaze , igifite akamaro ni uko umuntu yaremwa ukundi gushya .
48006016	Abagenza batyo bakurikiza uwo mugambi , ndetse ab'umuryango wose w'Imana , Imana nibahe amahoro n'imbabazi .
48006017	Ahasigaye ntihakagire uwongera kundushya , kuko inkovu mfite ku mubiri ziranga ko ndi uwa Yezu .
48006018	Bavandimwe , Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo nagumye kubagirira ubuntu . Amina .
49001001	Jyewe Pawulo Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko Imana yabishatse , ndabandikiye mwebwe intore z'Imana [ zo mu mu mujyi wa Efezi ] z'indahemuka muri Kristo Yezu .
49001002	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
49001003	Nihasingizwe Imana Se w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo . Muri Kristo yadusenderejeho imigisha yose ya Mwuka , iyiduhereye “ ahantu ho mu ijuru ” .
49001004	Isi itararemwa Imana yadutoranyirije muri Kristo , kugira ngo tube intore zayo tudafite umugayo imbere yayo . Kubera urukundo rwayo ,
49001005	Imana yari yariyemeje kutugira abana bayo tubiheshejwe na Yezu Kristo , nk'uko yabishatse ikabyishimira .
49001006	Tuyishime rero kubera ikuzo ry'ubuntu bwayo yatugabiye mu Mwana wayo ikunda !
49001007	Muri we twacungujwe amaraso yamennye ku bwacu , bityo Imana itubabarira ibicumuro ikurikije ubuntu bwayo butagira urugero .
49001008	Ubwo buntu yabudusesuyeho buduhesha ubwenge n'ubumenyi bwuzuye .
49001009	Yatumenyesheje ibanga ry'ubushake bwayo , ikurikije ibyiza yari yarateganyije muri Kristo ,
49001010	kugira ngo igeze byose ku gihe yagennye , isohoze umugambi wayo wo kwegurira Kristo ibintu byose abibere Umutware , ari ibiri mu ijuru cyangwa ibiri ku isi .
49001011	Muri we Imana yaradutoranyije ngo tube umwihariko wayo , ikurikije imigambi yayo yo gukora byose uko ishaka .
49001012	Kwari ukugira ngo twebwe ababanje kwiringira Kristo dushimishe Imana , tuyiheshe n'ikuzo .
49001013	Muri we kandi mwebwe mwumvise Ijambo ry'ukuri , ari ryo Butumwa bwiza bubazanira agakiza . Muri we na none mumaze kubwemera , Imana yabashyizeho ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko muri abayo bwite , ni cyo Mwuka Muziranenge yabasezeranyije .
49001014	Ni na we musogongero w'umunani tuzahabwa , ubwo Imana izacungura burundu abo yagize abayo , kugira ngo biyiheshe ishimwe n'ikuzo .
49001015	Ni cyo gituma nanjye , aho mariye kumva ukuntu mwizera Nyagasani Yezu n'urukundo mukunda intore z'Imana zose ,
49001016	ntahwema gushimira Imana kubera mwebwe .
49001017	Uko nsenze ndabibuka nkabasabira ngo Imana y'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo , ari yo Data nyir'ikuzo , ibahe Mwuka utanga ubwenge kugira ngo ayibahishurire muyimenye neza .
49001018	Abahumure imitima musobanukirwe ibyo kwiringirwa Imana yabahamagariye , kandi mumenye ukuntu umunani yateganyirije intore zayo ufite ikuzo ritagira urugero ,
49001019	mumenye kandi ububasha bwayo bukomeye butagereranywa ikoresha muri twe abayizera . Ubwo ni bwo bushobozi budukoreramo , ari na bwo mbaraga zayo
49001020	yakoresheje muri Kristo , ubwo yamuzuraga mu bapfuye ikamushyira iburyo bwayo ku ntebe ya cyami , “ ahantu ho mu ijuru ” .
49001021	Yahaye Kristo gusumba bihanitse ibinyabutware byose n'ibinyabushobozi n'ibinyabubasha n'ibinyabutegetsi , ndetse n'izina ryose rishobora kuvugwa atari muri iki gihe gusa , ahubwo no mu bihe bizaza .
49001022	Imana yeguriye Kristo ibintu byose ibishyira munsi y'ibirenge bye , imuha kugenga Umuryango wayo ku buryo bwose ngo awubere umutwe ,
49001023	na wo umubere umubiri . Ni wo rero cyuzuzo cya Kristo , nk'uko muri we ibintu byose na byo biba byuzuye ku buryo bwose .
49002001	Namwe mwari mwarapfuye muzize ibicumuro n'ibyaha byanyu .
49002002	Ni byo mwabagamo , mukurikije imigenzereze y'iyi si , mukurikije n'Umugenga w'ibinyabutware byo mu kirere , ari we mwuka ukorera mu bantu batumvira Imana .
49002003	Natwe twese twabarirwaga muri abo , igihe twari tugikurikiza ibyo kamere yacu irarikira , tugakora iby'umubiri n'ibitekerezo byacu byifuza . Ku byerekeye kamere yacu , twari abo kurakaza Imana kimwe n'abandi bose .
49002004	Nyamara Imana yuje imbabazi , kubera urukundo rwinshi yadukunze ,
49002005	yadusanze twarapfuye tuzize ibicumuro byacu , maze iduha ubugingo hamwe na Kristo — erega mwakijijwe n'ubuntu bwayo !
49002006	Yatuzuranye na Kristo idushyira hamwe na we ku ntebe ya cyami “ ahantu ho mu ijuru ” , turi muri Kristo Yezu .
49002007	Kwari ukugira ngo mu bihe bizaza yerekane ubutunzi buhebuje bw'ubuntu bwayo , ikoresheje ineza itugirira muri Kristo Yezu .
49002008	Koko mwakijijwe n'ubuntu kuko mwizeye Kristo , ntibyakomotse muri mwe ahubwo ni impano y'Imana .
49002009	Ntibyakomotse kandi ku bikorwa byanyu , kugira ngo hatagira umuntu ubyiratana .
49002010	Imana ni yo yaduhanze ituremera muri Kristo Yezu , kugira ngo dukore ibyiza yaduteganyirije kera ngo tujye tugenza dutyo .
49002011	Mwebwe abanyamahanga , abo Abayahudi bita “ abatakebwe ” , bo bakirata kwa gukebwa kwabo ko ku mubiri , mwibuke rero
49002012	uko kera mwari mumeze . Mwariho mudafite Kristo nta sano mufitanye n'Abisiraheli , nta ruhare mufite ku byasezeranywe bishingiye ku Isezerano Imana yagiranye n'ubwoko bwayo . Mwari ku isi nta Mana mufite , nta cyo mwiringiye na busa .
49002013	Mwari kure yayo , ariko ubu muri Kristo Yezu mwigijwe hafi n'amaraso yamennye kubera mwe .
49002014	Kristo ni we mahoro yacu , abari babiri yatugize umwe , atanga umubiri we ngo akureho urwangano , ari rwo rusika rwadutandukanyaga .
49002015	Yavanyeho Amategeko hamwe n'amabwiriza n'imigereka yayo , kugira ngo muri we Umuyahudi n'utari Umuyahudi , bombi abagire umuntu umwe mushya . Uko ni ko yazanye amahoro .
49002016	Ku bw'urupfu rwe rwo ku musaraba , abo bombi yabunze n'Imana abagira umubiri umwe , bityo atsemba urwangano rwari hagati yabo .
49002017	Yaraje atangaza inkuru nziza y'amahoro , ayibwira mwebwe mwari kure y'Imana n'Abayahudi bari bugufi bwayo .
49002018	Ubu twese ni we utuma twegera Imana Data tubikesha Mwuka umwe .
49002019	Bityo rero ntimukiri abanyamahanga n'abimukira , ahubwo musangiye ubwenegihugu n'intore z'Imana , mukaba muri inzu yayo .
49002020	Mwubatswe nk'amabuye ku rufatiro rugizwe n'Intumwa za Kristo n'abahanuzi , Kristo Yezu akababera ibuye nsanganyarukuta .
49002021	Muri we ibuye ryose rifungana n'irindi inzu ikajya ejuru , ikaba Ingoro yeguriwe Nyagasani .
49002022	Bityo muri we namwe mwubakwa hamwe , kugira ngo mube inzu Imana ituramo ku buryo bwa Mwuka .
49003001	Ni cyo gituma jyewe Pawulo ndi imbohe mpōrwa Kristo Yezu , kubera mwebwe abatari Abayahudi .
49003002	Mwaba mwarumvise umurimo Imana yanshinze kubakorera , ibitewe n'ubuntu bwayo .
49003003	Yampishuriye ibanga ryayo irimenyesha neza . Namaze kubyandika mu magambo make ,
49003004	muyasomye mubasha kwiyumvira ukuntu nasobanukiwe iryo banga rya Kristo .
49003005	Ni ibanga ritigeze rimenyeshwa abantu ba kera , ariko ubu Imana yarihishuriye intore zayo z'Intumwa n'abahanuzi , ikoresheje Mwuka wayo .
49003006	Iryo banga ni uko kubera Ubutumwa bwiza , abanyamahanga kimwe n'Abisiraheli bafite uruhare ku munani w'Imana , bakaba ingingo z'umubiri umwe kandi bagasangira ibyo yasezeranye muri Kristo Yezu .
49003007	Kubera ubuntu yangiriye n'impano yangabiye , nashinzwe umurimo wo kwamamaza ubwo Butumwa mbikesha ububasha bwayo butwarira muri jye .
49003008	Jyewe urutwa n'uworoheje cyane mu ntore z'Imana , yangiriye ubwo buntu bwo gutangariza abatari Abayahudi iyo nkuru nziza , yerekeye ubukungu buboneka muri Kristo burenze ubwenge bw'umuntu ,
49003009	no gusobanurira abantu bose uko umugambi w'Imana ugomba gusohozwa . Uwo mugambi ni ibanga Imana Umuremyi wa byose yazigamye uhereye kera kose ,
49003010	kugira ngo ubu imenyeshe ibinyabutware n'ibinyabushobozi “ by'ahantu ho mu ijuru ” , ubwenge bwayo bw'ingeri nyinshi ikoresheje Umuryango wayo .
49003011	Ni uko Imana yabikoze ikurikije umugambi wayo uhoraho , yateganyirije muri Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu .
49003012	Ni na we uduhesha uburenganzira bwo kwegera Imana nta cyo twishisha , bitewe n'icyizere tumufitiye .
49003013	Ni cyo gituma mbasaba kudacogozwa n'amakuba ndimo kubera mwe , kuko ari yo abazanira inyungu .
49003014	Ni yo mpamvu mpfukamira Imana Data ,
49003015	uwo imiryango yose yo mu ijuru no ku isi ishingiyeho .
49003016	Ndayisaba ngo ikurikije ubwinshi bw'umutungo w'ikuzo ryayo , ibahe ububasha mukomezwe umutima mubikesha Mwuka wayo ,
49003017	kugira ngo Kristo ature muri buri muntu bitewe n'uko amwizera . Ndasaba kandi ngo mushorere imizi mu rukundo rwe murwubakeho ,
49003018	maze hamwe n'izindi ntore z'Imana zose , muhabwe ububasha bwo gusobanukirwa ubugari n'umurambararo by'urukundo rwa Kristo , ndetse n'ubujyakuzimu n'ubuhagarike bwarwo .
49003019	Ni bwo muzamenya urwo rukundo rwe rurenze ubwenge bw'umuntu , bityo mwuzuzwe kamere yose y'Imana ibasenderemo .
49003020	Nuko rero Imana ibasha gukora ibirenze kure ibyo twasaba , ndetse n'ibyo twakwibwira byose ibigirishije ububasha bwayo bukorera muri twe ,
49003021	nihabwe ikuzo mu Muryango wayo no muri Kristo Yezu iteka ryose , uko ibihe bihaye ibindi . Amina .
49004001	Noneho jyewe imbohe ihōrwa Nyagasani , ndabinginga mujye mugenza uko bikwiye mukurikije ibyo Imana yabahamagariye .
49004002	Mwicishe bugufi rwose , mwiyoroshye kandi mwihangane , mugire n'urukundo rubatera kwihanganirana .
49004003	Muharanire kugumana ubumwe butangwa na Mwuka w'Imana , amahoro abe ari yo mugozi ubafatanya .
49004004	Umubiri wa Kristo ni umwe , Mwuka na we ni umwe nk'uko icyo mwiringira ari kimwe , ari na cyo Imana yabahamagariye .
49004005	Nyagasani ni umwe , ukuri twemera ni kumwe , ukubatiza na ko ni kumwe ,
49004006	kandi Imana ni imwe ari yo Mubyeyi wa bose , igenga bose , igakoresha bose kandi ikaba muri bose .
49004007	Buri muntu muri twe yagabiwe impano imukwiye , bikurikije ubuntu Kristo agira .
49004008	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
49004009	Ariko iryo jambo “ yazamukaga ” rivuga iki ? Ese si ukuvuga se ko yabanje kumanuka akagera ikuzimu ?
49004010	Uwamanutse ni na we wazamutse ajya hejuru yamajuru yose , kugira ngo yuzure ibyaremwe byose .
49004011	Nuko aha bamwe kuba Intumwa ze , abandi ngo babe abahanuzi , abandi ngo babe abatangaza Ubutumwa bwiza , naho abandi ngo babe abashumba nabigisha .
49004012	Abigenza atyo kugira ngo intore zImana zitegurirwe gukora umurimo wayo , maze zubake Umubiri wa Kristo .
49004013	Bityo igihe nikigera , twese tuzashyike ku rugero rwubumwe buva ku kwemera Umwana wImana no kumumenya byuzuye , kugira ngo tube abantu bahamye bageze ku rugero rwuzuye rwa Kristo .
49004014	Ubwo ntituzaba tukiri abana ngo duteraganwe hirya no hino nimiyaga ibonetse yose , ari yo myigishirize yabantu bashukana biyubikije uburyarya buyobya .
49004015	Ahubwo nituvuga ukuri tubitewe nurukundo tuzakura ku buryo bwose , twunze ubumwe na Kristo ari we Mutwe wUmubiri .
49004016	Umutwe ni wo ugenga ingingo zumubiri zose , ugatuma zihurizwa hamwe zigahuza imikorere , zibikesha imitsi iwukomeza ikawutunga , bityo buri rugingo rugakora umurimo rugenewe , maze umubiri wose ugakura ukiyubaka . Byose biterwa nurukundo .
49004017	Ibi ni byo mvuga kandi nemeza mbikomora kuri Nyagasani : nimureke kugenza nk'abatazi Imana bakurikiza ibitekerezo byabo bitagira umumaro ,
49004018	kandi n'ubwenge bwabo bwararindagiye . Baciye ukubiri n'ubugingo buva ku Mana , kubera ubujiji bwabo n'imitima inangiye .
49004019	Bataye isoni biroha mu bwomanzi , bigeza aho birundurira mu kwiyandarika k'uburyo bwose kuzanwa no kurarikira .
49004020	Naho mwebwe uko si ko mwamenyeshejwe Kristo .
49004021	Ni iby'ukuri , ibye mwarabyumvise mwigishwa uko ateye , bikurikije ukuri kubonerwa muri Yezu .
49004022	Noneho nimwiyambure kamere yanyu ya kera yagengaga imigenzereze mwari mufite , kuko iyo kamere igenda ibonona kubera ibyifuzo byayo bishukana .
49004023	Ahubwo muhindurwe bashya mu bugingo no mu bitekerezo .
49004024	Mwambare kamere nshya mumere nk'uko Imana ishaka , iyo kamere irangwa n'ubutungane n'ubuziranenge bikomoka ku kuri .
49004025	Ni cyo gituma mugomba kwiyambura n'ibinyoma , umuntu wese ajye abwiza mugenzi we ukuri , kuko twese turi ingingo z'umubiri umwe .
49004026	Kandi nimurakara ntibikabatere gukora icyaha , ndetse izuba ntirikarenge mukirakaye !
49004027	Ntimugahe Satani urwaho .
49004028	Uwibaga ntakongere kwiba , ahubwo yihatire gukora ibyiza akoresheje amaboko ye , kugira ngo abone icyo afashisha uje akennye .
49004029	Ntimukagire ijambo ribi na rimwe muvuga , ahubwo mujye muvuga ijambo ryose ryakubaka ubugingo bw'abandi nk'uko babikeneye , kugira ngo rigirire akamaro abaryumva .
49004030	Ntimugashavuze Mwuka Muziranenge Imana yabahaye ho ikimenyetso kibaranga , kugeza ku Munsi wo gucungurwa .
49004031	Mwamaganire kure icyitwa ukwishaririza , uburakari n'umujinya , intonganya no gusebanya , kimwe n'ubugome bw'uburyo bwose .
49004032	Ahubwo mugirirane impuhwe n'ineza , mubabarirane nk'uko namwe Imana yabababariye muri Kristo .
49005001	Kuko muri abana b'Imana ikunda cyane , mujye mukurikiza icyitegererezo cyayo .
49005002	Mujye mugenza nk'uko Kristo yadukunze , akitanga ngo atubere ituro n'igitambo bifite impumuro nziza ishimisha Imana .
49005003	Muri intore z'Imana , bityo rero ubusambanyi no kwiyandarika kose cyangwa irari ry'ibintu , ntibikigere bivugwa muri mwe .
49005004	Ntimukavuge amagambo ateye isoni cyangwa amateshwa , cyangwa amahomvu ahubwo mujye muvuga ibishimisha Imana .
49005005	Mumenye ibi : umusambanyi wese n'ukora ibiteye isoni n'umunyamururumba ( ni cyo kimwe no gusenga ibigirwamana ) , abo bose nta munani bazagira mu bwami bwa Kristo n'ubw'Imana .
49005006	Ntihakagire umuntu ubashukisha amagambo y'imburamumaro , kuko ibimeze bityo ari byo bituma Imana irakarira abatayumvira .
49005007	Nuko rero muramenye ntimugafatanye na bo .
49005008	Kera mwahoze mu mwijima , ariko none ubu muri mu mucyo kubera Nyagasani . Nuko rero mujye mugenza nk'abari mu mucyo koko .
49005009	Erega umucyo ni wo sōko y'ingeso nziza zose n'ubutungane n'ukuri !
49005010	Mushishoze maze mumenye ibishimisha Nyagasani .
49005011	Ntimukagire uruhare mu bikorwa by'imburamumaro bikorerwa mu mwijima , ahubwo mujye mubishyira ahagaragara .
49005012	Erega ibyo bakora rwihishwa no kubivuga biteye isoni !
49005013	Nyamara ibintu byose iyo bishyizwe ahagaragara , biboneka neza uko biteye
49005014	kuko umucyo utuma byose biboneka . Ni cyo gituma bivugwa ngo :
49005015	Muzirikane rero imigenzereze yanyu mutagenza nk'injiji , ahubwo mugenze nk'abanyabwenge ,
49005016	mukoresha neza igihe mufite kuko iyi minsi ari mibi .
49005017	Noneho rero , ntimukabe abapfu , ahubwo mujye mumenya neza ibyo Nyagasani ashaka .
49005018	Ntimugasinde inzoga kuko zitera kwiyandarika , ahubwo mwuzure Mwuka w'Imana .
49005019	Mubwirane zaburi n'indirimbo z'ibisingizo n'izahimbwe zikomoka kuri Mwuka , muririmbire Nyagasani kandi mumucurangire mubikuye ku mutima .
49005020	Igihe cyose mujye mushimira Imana Data ibintu byose , mu izina ry'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
49005021	Mujye mwubahana mubitewe no gutinya Kristo .
49005022	Bagore , mwubahe abagabo mwashakanye nk'uko mwubaha Nyagasani .
49005023	Umugabo ni we mutwe akagenga umugore we , nk'uko Kristo ari umutwe akagenga umubiri we , ari wo Muryango abereye Umukiza .
49005024	Nuko rero abagore bagomba kubaha abagabo bashakanye ku buryo bwose , nk'uko Umuryango wa Kristo umwubaha .
49005025	Bagabo , mukunde abagore mwashakanye nk'uko Kristo yakunze Umuryango we akawupfira .
49005026	Kwari ukugira ngo awiyegurire , aweze awuhagije amazi akoresheje Ijambo rye ,
49005027	uwo Muryango ari wo Mugeni we , awishyingire ufite ikuzo , nta kizinga , nta munkanyari , cyangwa ikindi cyose gisa gityo , ahubwo uboneye udafite inenge .
49005028	Uko ni ko abagabo bagomba gukunda abagore bashakanye , nk'uko bakunda imibiri yabo . Ukunda umugore we aba yikunze .
49005029	Nta muntu wanga umubiri we bibaho , ahubwo arawugaburira , akawukundwakaza nk'uko Kristo agirira Umuryango we ,
49005030	kandi ni twe ngingo z'uwo Mubiri we .
49005031	Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Ni cyo gituma umugabo azasiga se na nyina akabana n'umugore we akaramata , bombi bakaba umuntu umwe . ”
49005032	Iryo ni ibanga rikomeye , ariko jye ndemeza ko rireba Kristo n'Umuryango we .
49005033	Icyakora namwe rirabareba . Umugabo wese muri mwe akunde umugore we nk'uko yikunda , kandi n'umugore na we yubahe umugabo we .
49006001	Bana , mujye mwumvira ababyeyi banyu kuko ari byo bikwiriye aba Nyagasani .
49006002	“ Ujye wubaha so na nyoko ” — ni ryo tegeko rya mbere ririmo Isezerano —
49006003	“ bityo uzagubwa neza kandi urame ku isi . ”
49006004	Namwe babyeyi , ntimukarakaze abana banyu ahubwo mubarere neza , mubamenyereza kandi mubagezaho inyigisho za Nyagasani .
49006005	Mwebwe nkoreragahato , mujye mwumvira ba shobuja bo ku isi mubikuye ku mutima nk'abakorera Kristo , mutinya kandi muhinda umushyitsi .
49006006	Ntimugakorere ijisho nk'abashaka gushimisha abantu , ahubwo mukore uko Imana ishaka mubikuye ku mutima nk'abagaragu ba Kristo .
49006007	Imirimo y'agahato mukoreshwa muyikorane umutima ukunze nk'abakorera Nyagasani , atari nk'abakorera abantu .
49006008	Muzirikane ko icyiza cyose umuntu akora , yaba inkoreragahato cyangwa uwigenga , azagihemberwa na Nyagasani .
49006009	Namwe bakoresha , mugirire mutyo abo mukoresha mureke kubashyiraho iterabwoba . Muzirikane ko ari mwe ari n'abo mukoresha , mufite Shobuja umwe uba mu ijuru , ufata abantu bose kimwe .
49006010	Ahasigaye mushake amaboko kuri Nyagasani no ku bubasha bwe bukomeye .
49006011	Mwitwaze intwaro z'Imana kugira ngo mubashe guhagarara kigabo , mudatsinzwe n'uburiganya bwa Satani
49006012	kuko ibyo turwana na byo atari abantu , ahubwo ni ibinyabutware n'ibinyabushobozi , ni ibihangange bitegeka iyi si y'umwijima , ari byo za ngabo zigira nabi ziba “ ahantu ho mu ijuru ” .
49006013	Ni cyo gituma mukwiye gufata intwaro zose z'Imana . Bityo igihe cy'iminsi mibi muzabashe guhangana na wa Mwanzi , maze byose birangiye mube muhagaze mudatsinzwe .
49006014	Nuko rero nimuhagarare kigabo , mukenyeye ukuri mwambaye n'ikoti ry'icyuma rikingiriza igituza , ari ryo butungane .
49006015	Naho mu birenge mube mwambaye inkweto , ari zo mwete wo gutangaza Ubutumwa bwiza bw'amahoro .
49006016	Muhore mwitwaje ingabo ari yo kwizera Kristo , kugira ngo mubashe kuzimya ya myambi yose yaka umuriro iraswa na Sekibi .
49006017	Mwambare ingofero y'icyuma ari yo gakiza , kandi mwitwaze inkota muhabwa na Mwuka ari yo Jambo ry'Imana .
49006018	Byose mubikore musenga ku buryo bwose mwinginga Imana . Ibihe byose muyambaze muvugishwa na Mwuka . Mugumye kuba maso , mushishikarire gusabira intore z'Imana zose .
49006019	Nanjye mujye munsabira kugira ngo uko mbumbuye umunwa , Imana impe amagambo akwiriye ngo menyeshe abantu ibanga ry'Ubutumwa bwiza nta mususu .
49006020	No kuri iyi ngoyi ubwo Butumwa ni bwo mpagarariye . Munsabire kugira ngo mbuvuge nshize amanga , uko bikwiye .
49006021	Tikiko umuvandimwe nkunda n'umugaragu w'indahemuka wa Nyagasani , azabagezaho amakuru yanjye yose ngo mumenye ibyo nkora .
49006022	Ni na yo mpamvu muboherereje , kugira ngo mumenye uko tumerewe kandi abakomeze .
49006023	Amahoro n'urukundo hamwe n'ukwizera , bikomoka ku Mana Data no kuri Nyagasani Yezu Kristo , bibe ku bavandimwe bose .
49006024	Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo nagumye kugirira ubuntu abantu bose bamukunda urukundo rudatezuka .
50001001	Jyewe Pawulo na Timoteyo abagaragu ba Kristo Yezu , turabaramukije mwebwe ntore z'Imana ziri muri Kristo Yezu zo mu mujyi wa Filipi , hamwe n'abayobozi b'itorero ry'Imana n'abadiyakoni baryo .
50001002	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
50001003	Nshimira Imana yanjye igihe cyose mbibutse ,
50001004	iteka iyo nsenze mbasabira mwese nezerewe ,
50001005	mbitewe n'uruhare mufite kimwe nanjye rwo kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza kuva bigitangira kugeza n'ubu .
50001006	Ndemeza ko Imana yatangiye uwo murimo mwiza muri mwe izawukora , ikawunonosora kugeza umunsi Kristo Yezu azaza .
50001007	Sinabura kubagiraho mwese ibitekerezo nk'ibyo kuko mbahoza ku mutima . Mwese mufite uruhare ku buntu Imana yangiriye , haba ubu ndi ku ngoyi cyangwa igihe nari ngifite uburenganzira bwo kurwanira Ubutumwa bwiza , kugira ngo bushinge imizi muri mwe .
50001008	Imana ni yo ntanze ho umugabo ko mbakumbuye mwese , mbitewe n'urukundo rwa Kristo Yezu rundimo .
50001009	Icyo mbasabira kandi ni ukugira ngo urukundo rwanyu rurusheho kugwira ngo mumenye byose , musobanukirwe byose ,
50001010	kugira ngo mushobore gusuzuma ibintu , mumenye ikirushije ibindi gutungana . Bityo muzabe mudafite amakemwa cyangwa umugayo umunsi Kristo azaza ,
50001011	ahubwo muzabe mwareze imbuto z'ubutungane , zihesha Imana ikuzo n'ishimwe mubikesha Yezu Kristo .
50001012	Bavandimwe , ndashaka kubamenyesha ko ibyambayeho byatumye Ubutumwa bwiza butera imbere ,
50001013	ku buryo abo mu ngoro y'umwami w'i Roma bose , ndetse na rubanda rwose bamenye ko nafunzwe mpōrwa Kristo .
50001014	Ikindi kandi izi ngoyi zanjye zatumye abenshi mu bavandimwe bakomera kuri Nyagasani , maze barushaho kuvuga Ijambo ry'Imana bashize amanga .
50001015	Icyakora bamwe batangaza ibyerekeye Kristo babitewe n'ishyari n'amakimbirane , ariko abandi bakabikora babikuye ku mutima .
50001016	Abo babiterwa n'urukundo bazirikana ko nashinzwe kurwanira Ubutumwa bwiza .
50001017	Naho ba bandi batangaza ibya Kristo , babiterwa no gushaka kwishyira imbere n'izindi mpamvu zitaboneye , bibwira ko binyongerera imibabaro yo kuba ku ngoyi .
50001018	Mbese bitwaye iki ? Baba babiterwa n'urwitwazo cyangwa n'ukuri , uko biri kose Kristo aramamazwa . Ibyo biranshimisha kandi bizakomeza kunshimisha .
50001019	Icyo nzi cyo ni uko bizamviramo agakiza , mbikesha amasengesho yanyu no gufashwa na Mwuka wa Yezu Kristo .
50001020	Dore icyo mfitiye amatsiko kandi niringiye kuzabona : nta kizatuma nkorwa n'isoni . Ahubwo ubu nk'uko bisanzwe nzakomeza kuvuga nshize amanga , kugira ngo naho nabaho cyangwa napfa , imibereho yanjye iheshe Kristo ikuzo ryinshi .
50001021	Ku bwanjye kubaho ni Kristo , naho gupfa byambera inyungu .
50001022	Nyamara niba kubaho kwanjye kwatuma nkomeza gukora umurimo w'ingirakamaro , sinzi icyo nahitamo .
50001023	Mpeze hagati nk'ururimi . Kimwe cyo ndifuza gutabaruka ngo nibanire na Kristo , ndetse ni cyo cyambera cyiza bihebuje ,
50001024	nyamara mwebwe icyarushaho kubagirira akamaro ni uko nagumya kubaho .
50001025	Icyo nemeza kandi nzi neza ni uko nzagumya kubaho no kubana namwe mwese , kugira ngo mutere imbere kandi mwishimire Kristo Yezu mwemeye ,
50001026	maze muri we ishema ryanyu risesure kubera jyewe kuko nzaba ngarutse muri mwe .
50001027	Gusa mujye mukora ibikwiranye n'Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo , kugira ngo ndamutse nje kubasura cyangwa ntaje , nzumve ko mukomeye , muhuje umugambi , mushyize hamwe gushishikarira kwizera Kristo mubikesha Ubutumwa bwiza .
50001028	Ntimugaterwe ubwoba n'ababarwanya , ni cyo kizabera abo bantu icyemezo kivuye ku Mana ko bazarimbuka , naho mwe kibabere icyemezo ko muzakizwa .
50001029	Koko kandi Imana yabagiriye ubuntu ni yo ibaha gukorera Kristo , atari ukumwemera gusa , ariko kandi ibaha no kubabazwa ari we muhōrwa .
50001030	Iyo ntambara murwana ni iyo mwasanze ndwana , kandi nk'uko mwabyumvise na n'ubu ndacyayirwana .
50002001	Mbese mwahawe gukomera kuri Kristo ? Ese urukundo rwe rujya rubarema agatima ? Mbese Mwuka we yabahaye gushyira hamwe ? Ese mugirirana impuhwe n'ibambe ?
50002002	Nuko rero mugire amatwara amwe , mukundane kimwe , muhuze umutima n'inama , ni bwo muzatuma ibyishimo byanjye bisendera .
50002003	Ntimukagire icyo mukora mubiterwa no kwishyira imbere cyangwa kwikuza , ahubwo mujye mwiyoroshya , umuntu wese yibwire ko mugenzi we amuruta .
50002004	Umuntu wese yirinde kuzirikana ibye gusa , ahubwo ajye azirikana n'iby'abandi .
50002005	Mujye mugira amatwara nk'aya Kristo Yezu .
50002006	We nubwo yari asanzwe afite kamere yImana , ntiyigeze yibwira ko guhwana na yo ari ikintu cyo kugundīrwa .
50002007	Ahubwo yaretse ibye byose , ahinduka nkumuntu , ndetse afata kamere yinkoreragahato . Yabonetse ameze nkumuntu ,
50002008	yicisha bugufi arumvira , ntiyanga no gupfa , ndetse apfa abambwe ku musaraba .
50002009	Ni cyo cyatumye Imana imushyira hejuru cyane , imuha nikuzo risumba iryabandi bose ,
50002010	kugira ngo mu ijuru no ku isi ndetse nikuzimu , bose bapfukamire Yezu bamuramye ,
50002011	bose bamwogeze mu ruhame , bemeze ko Yezu Kristo ari we Nyagasani , ngo biheshe Imana Se ikuzo .
50002012	Mwebwe abo nkunda cyane , iteka mwumviraga Imana , nimukomeze rero kuyumvira atari igihe turi kumwe gusa , ahubwo n'ubu tutari kumwe . Mujye mushyira agakiza kanyu mu bikorwa mutinya kandi muhinda umushyitsi ,
50002013	kuko Imana ari yo ubwayo itwarira muri mwe kugira ngo mushake kandi mukore ibyo yagambiriye .
50002014	Mukore byose mutinuba kandi mutagirana impaka ,
50002015	kugira ngo mube abana b'Imana batagira umugayo , baboneye , batagira amakemwa , batuye mu bantu b'iki gihe b'abahemu n'abagizi ba nabi , mubabere nk'imuri zimurikira isi ,
50002016	mubagezaho Ijambo ry'ubugingo . Ibyo bizantera kubiratana ku munsi Kristo azaza , byerekane ko ntirukiye ubusa cyangwa ngo mvunikire ubundi .
50002017	Ahari amaraso yanjye azagomba gusukwa ku gitambo mutura Imana , ari wo murimo muyikorera mubitewe no kwemera Kristo . Bibaye bityo nzabyishimira ngo namwe mwese mwishimane nanjye .
50002018	Namwe ni uko nimwishime , kugira ngo nanjye nishimane namwe .
50002019	Nyagasani Yezu nabishaka niringiye ko bidatinze nzashobora kubatumaho Timoteyo , kugira ngo angezeho inkuru yanyu impumurize .
50002020	Ni we wenyine mfite duhuje kubakunda , kandi wita by'ukuri ku byanyu .
50002021	Abandi bose baharanira inyungu zabo bwite , aho guharanira iza Yezu Kristo .
50002022	Muzi ko Timoteyo yerekanye ko ari ingirakamaro , akorana nanjye umurimo w'Ubutumwa bwiza nk'uko umwana akorana na se .
50002023	Ni we rero niringiye kuzabatumaho nimara kumenya aho ibyanjye byerekeye .
50002024	Ubundi kandi ndemeza ko Nyagasani nabishaka , ntazatinda kuza iwanyu .
50002025	Nabonye ko ari ngombwa kubatumaho umuvandimwe Epafurodito dufatanyije umurimo , kandi turi kumwe ku rugamba . Ni intumwa yanyu mwohereje kugira ngo ankorere kuko nari mukeneye .
50002026	Yari abakumbuye mwese kandi ababajwe cyane n'uko mwumvise ko arwaye .
50002027	Koko yari arwaye yenda gupfa , ariko Imana ikinga ukuboko . Si we wenyine yabigiriye , nanjye yarabingiriye kugira ngo ne kwicwa n'agahinda kageretse ku kandi .
50002028	Ni yo mpamvu ndushaho kumva ari ngombwa kumuboherereza , kugira ngo nimumubona muzongere kwishima , bityo nanjye nshire agahinda .
50002029	Muramwakire rero mwishimye nk'umuvandimwe muri Nyagasani , kandi umuntu wese nk'uwo mujye mumwubaha .
50002030	Erega yari agiye gupfa azize umurimo wa Kristo , yigerejeho ngo yuzuze ibyo mutari kunshoborera ubwanyu !
50003001	Ahasigaye bavandimwe , mwishimire muri Nyagasani . Sindambirwa kubandikira ibintu mbisubiramo , igihe bibafitiye akamaro .
50003002	Mwirinde za mbwa ari zo bagizi ba nabi , bakunda ibyo kwikebagura .
50003003	Ahubwo ni twe twakebwe by'ukuri twe dusenga Imana tubikesha Mwuka wayo , tukirata Kristo Yezu wenyine aho kwiyemera ubwacu .
50003004	Jyewe mfite impamvu zatuma niyemera ubwanjye . Haramutse hagize uwibwira ko afite impamvu zo kwiyemera , jyewe namuhiga .
50003005	Umva nawe : nakebwe ku munsi wa munani . Ndi Umwisiraheli kavukire wo mu muryango wa Benyamini , ndi n'Umuheburayi butwi . Ku byerekeye gukurikiza Amategeko ndi Umufarizayi ,
50003006	naho ku byerekeye ishyaka , natotezaga Umuryango wa Kristo . Ku byerekeye ubutungane buzanwa n'Amategeko , nari inyangamugayo .
50003007	Nyamara ibyari bimfitiye inyungu , mbibara ko ari igihombo kubera Kristo .
50003008	Ndetse ibintu byose mbibara ko ari igihombo , iyo mbigereranyije n'ubukungu buhebuje buzanwa no kumenya Kristo Yezu Umwami wanjye . Kubera we nemeye guhara ibyo nitaga inyungu zanjye byose , maze mbibara nk'amazirantoki kugira ngo nunguke Kristo ,
50003009	kandi mpore muri we ntiratana ubutungane buzanwa no gukurikiza Amategeko , ahubwo nirata ubutungane buzanwa no kwizera Kristo , ari bwo Imana itanga bushingiye ku kumwemera .
50003010	Icyo ngamije ni ukumenya Kristo n'ububasha bwo kuzuka kwe , no gusangira na we kubabazwa nkamera nka we mu rupfu rwe ,
50003011	bityo nkaba niringiye kuzazurwa mu bapfuye .
50003012	Si ukuvuga ko namaze kugera kuri ibyo cyangwa ngo mbe naramaze kuba indakemwa , ahubwo ndacyahatana kugira ngo mbishyikire nk'uko nanjye Kristo Yezu yanshyikiriye .
50003013	Bavandimwe , sintekereza ko namaze kubishyikira . Oya , ahubwo icyo nkora ni kimwe , nibagirwa ibyahise maze nkihatira gusingira ibiri imbere .
50003014	Ndaharanira kugera aho dutanguranwa ngo negukane igihembo Imana imfitiye mu ijuru , mbikesha Kristo Yezu ari na byo yampamagariye .
50003015	Twese rero ab'indakemwa nitubifate dutyo , kandi niba hari ibyo bamwe muri mwe bafashe ukundi Imana izabibahishurira .
50003016	Uko biri kose dukomereze aho tugeze twe gucogora .
50003017	Bavandimwe , mwese mugenze nkatwe kandi abakurikiza icyitegererezo twabahaye mube ari bo muhanga amaso .
50003018	Nabibabwiye kenshi n'ubu nongeye kubibabwira mbogoza amarira : abenshi babaye abanzi b'umusaraba wa Kristo .
50003019	Iherezo ryabo ni ukurimbuka kuko imana yabo ari inda , ibiteye isoni bakora bikaba ari byo birata , bahoza umutima ku by'isi .
50003020	Naho twe iwacu ni mu ijuru , aho Umukiza dutegereje azava ari we Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
50003021	Azahindura iyi mibiri yacu yoroheje ayigire nk'uwe ufite ikuzo , akoresheje ububasha butuma ashobora kwigarurira ibintu byose .
50004001	Nuko rero bavandimwe nkunda kandi nkumbuye , mwebwe kamba natsindiye kandi nishimira , nimuhagarare kigabo bakundwa , mukomere muri Nyagasani .
50004002	Ewodiya na Sintike , ndabinginze , nimuhurize imitima kuri Nyagasani .
50004003	Kandi nawe mugenzi wanjye dufatanyije umurimo ndagusaba gufasha abo bagore , kuko bafatanyije nanjye kurwanira Ubutumwa bwiza , bo na Kilementi n'abandi twakoranye amazina yabo akaba yanditswe mu gitabo cy'ubugingo .
50004004	Mugumye kwishimira muri Nyagasani . Reka mbisubiremo , nimwishime .
50004005	Ineza yanyu imenywe n'abantu bose . Nyagasani ari hafi kugaruka .
50004006	Ntimukagire ikibahagarika umutima , ahubwo igihe cyose mumenyeshe Imana ibyo mukeneye muyisaba , muyinginga kandi muyishimira .
50004007	Bityo amahoro y'Imana asumba kure ubwenge bw'umuntu , arindire imitima yanyu n'ibitekerezo byanyu muri Kristo Yezu .
50004008	Ahasigaye bavandimwe , icyitwa ingeso nziza cyose n'igikwiye gushimwa cyose , ni iby'ukuri n'ibikwiye icyubahiro , ibitunganye n'ibiboneye , ibikundwa n'ibivugwa neza abe ari byo muhoza ku mutima .
50004009	Ibyo nabigishije rero n'ibyo nabagejejeho , ibyo mwanyumvanye n'ibyo mwambonanye , ibyo byose mube ari byo mukora , kandi Imana itanga amahoro izabana namwe .
50004010	Nishimiye cyane muri Nyagasani kuko noneho mwongeye kunzirikana . Erega n'ubundi mwaranzirikanaga , ariko mukabura uko mubingaragariza !
50004011	Ibyo simbivugishwa n'ubukene , kuko uko ndi kose nimenyereje kunyurwa n'ibyo mfite .
50004012	Nzi kubaho gikene nzi no kubaho gikungu . Aho ndi hose n'uko byamera kose namenyereye guhaga no gusonza , menyera kugira ibisagutse no kugira bike .
50004013	Mbashishwa byose na Kristo untera imbaraga .
50004014	Nyamara mwagize neza ubwo mwifatanyaga nanjye mu makuba nagize .
50004015	Banyafilipi , igihe nari mvuye muri Masedoniya ngitangira kuhatangaza Ubutumwa bwiza , muzi ko ari mwe muryango wa Kristo wonyine wagize uruhare ku byo nungukaga no ku byo nahombaga
50004016	Nkiri i Tesaloniki ni mwe mwanyoherereje ibyo nari nkeneye , ndetse si rimwe gusa mwabikoze .
50004017	Erega ntabwo ari imfashanyo zanyu nkurikiranye , ahubwo nifuza ko mwebwe murushaho kunguka .
50004018	Ubundi kandi ibyo mwanyoherereje narabishyikiriye ndetse birasaguka . Ibyo nari nkeneye byose ndabifite , kuva igihe Epafurodito yangezagaho ibyo mwamumpereye . Ni ituro rifite impumuro nziza , ni igitambo Imana yemera kandi yishimira .
50004019	Namwe Imana yanjye ntizabura kubahundazaho ibyo kubakenura byose , nk'uko umutungo wayo uhebuje uri muri Kristo Yezu ungana .
50004020	Nuko ikuzo ribe iry'Imana Data uko ibihe bihaye ibindi . Amina .
50004021	Mudutahirize intore z'Imana zose ziri muri Kristo Yezu . Abavandimwe bose turi kumwe barabatashya .
50004022	Intore z'Imana z'ino zose zirabatashya , cyane cyane izo mu rugo rw'umwami w'i Roma .
50004023	Nyagasani Yezu Kristo nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .
51001001	Jyewe Pawulo Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko Imana yabishatse , n'umuvandimwe Timoteyo ,
