51001002	turabaramukije mwebwe ntore z'Imana z'i Kolosi Kristo yagize abavandimwe b'indahemuka . Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro , [ ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo ] .
51001003	Iyo tubasabira duhora dushimira Imana Se w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo ,
51001004	kuko twumvise ko mwemeye Kristo Yezu mugakunda n'intore z'Imana ,
51001005	mubitewe no kwiringira ibyo mwabikiwe mu ijuru . Ibyo mwabimenyeshejwe n'inyigisho z'ukuri z'Ubutumwa bwiza mwumvise mbere .
51001006	Ubwo Butumwa bwamaze kugera ku isi yose , bwera imbuto z'ibyiza mu bantu butera imbere . Uko ni ko biri muri mwe kuva aho mwumviye ubuntu Imana igira , mukabusobanukirwa by'ukuri .
51001007	Ibyo mwabyigishijwe na mugenzi wacu Epafura dukunda kandi dufatanyije umurimo , ni we mugaragu udahemuka wa Kristo ukora mu mwanya wanyu .
51001008	Ni na we watubwiye urukundo rwanyu mukomora kuri Mwuka w'Imana .
51001009	Ni cyo cyatumye natwe kuva aho tubyumviye , tudahwema kubasabira . Twinginga Imana ngo ibagwizemo kumenya ibyo ishaka , ibahaye ubwenge no gusobanukirwa bikomoka kuri Mwuka .
51001010	Bityo muzashobora kujya mugenza uko Nyagasani ashaka kugira ngo mumushimishe iteka , mwere imbuto z'imigirire myiza y'uburyo bwose kandi mukure mu kumenya Imana .
51001011	Turabasabira ngo muhabwe ububasha ku buryo bwose nk'uko imbaraga z'ikuzo ryayo zingana , kugira ngo mushobore kwihanganira byose mwe gucogora . Bityo mujye munezerwa
51001012	mushimira Imana Data , yabahesheje uruhare ku munani yageneye intore zayo zigengwa n'umucyo .
51001013	Ni yo yatubohoye ituvana mu butware bw'umwijima , itujyana mu bwami bw'Umwana wayo ikunda .
51001014	Ni we dukesha gucungurwa ari ko kubabarirwa ibyaha .
51001015	Kristo ni ishusho y'Imana itarebwa n'amaso . Ni na we Mwana wayo w'impfura wabimburiye ibyaremwe byose kubaho .
51001016	Ni we Imana yakoresheje irema ibintu byose , ari ibyo mu ijuru n'ibyo ku isi , ari ibyo amaso areba n'ibyo atareba , ari ibinyabwami cyangwa ibinyabutegetsi , cyangwa ibinyabutware cyangwa ibinyabushobozi . Byose byaremwe na we kandi ni we byaremewe .
51001017	Yariho mbere ya byose , ni na we uhuriza hamwe byose akabikomeza .
51001018	Ikindi kandi ni we mutwe ugenga umubiri we , ari wo Muryango w'Imana . Ni we shingiro rya byose , ni na we wabimburiye bose kuzuka kugira ngo afate umwanya w'ibanze muri byose .
51001019	Koko Imana yishimiye ko ibyuzuye muri yo byose biba mu Mwana wayo ,
51001020	maze yunga ibintu byose na yo ikoresheje uwo Mwana wayo , ari ibyo ku isi ari n'ibyo mu ijuru , izana amahoro bitewe n'amaraso yamenewe ku musaraba .
51001021	Kera namwe mwahoze kure y'Imana muri abanzi bayo , kubera ibyo mwatekerezaga n'ibibi mwakoraga .
51001022	Ariko ubu Imana yiyunze namwe ikoresheje urupfu rw'Umwana wayo , watanze umubiri we ho igitambo kugira ngo ibaheshe guhagarara imbere yayo mudafite inenge , nta n'amakemwa cyangwa umugayo .
51001023	Icyakora mukomere ku byo twemera , mubyishingikirizeho mutajegajega , ari nta kibatesha kwiringira Ubutumwa bwiza mwumvise . Ubwo ni Ubutumwa bwatangarijwe abo ku isi yose , ari bwo jyewe Pawulo nahawe kwamamaza .
51001024	Ubu nishimiye ko mbabazwa ari mwe nzira , ni na byo bimpesha kuzuza mu buzima bwanjye ibibuze ku mibabaro ya Kristo , mbigirira umubiri we ari wo Muryango w'Imana .
51001025	Nabaye umugaragu wawo , ntumwe n'Imana kurangiza umurimo yampaye wo kubagezaho Ijambo ryayo .
51001026	Iryo ni ibanga ryahishwe abantu bose kuva kera kose , ariko ubu Imana yarigaragarije intore zayo .
51001027	Iryo banga Imana yageneye amahanga yose , yiyemeje kumenyesha intore zayo ukuntu rifite ikuzo risendereye . Iryo banga ni Kristo uri muri mwe , ubizeza kuzahabwa ku ikuzo ry'Imana .
51001028	Ni we twamamaza tukaburira buri muntu tukamwigisha , dukoresheje ubwenge bwose kugira ngo tubone uko tumushyikiriza Imana , ari indakemwa muri Kristo .
51001029	Ibyo ni byo mparanira nshishikaye , mbikesha ububasha bwa Kristo butwarira muri jye .
51002001	Ndifuza ko mumenya ukuntu mbarwanira inkundura , mwebwe n'ab'i Lawodiseya ndetse n'abandi bose batigeze banca iryera .
51002002	Ni ukugira ngo yaba mwe cyangwa bo , mwese mukomere mwibumbire mu rukundo , bityo mukungahazwe no gusobanukirwa mudashidikanya . Ni bwo muzamenya neza ibanga ry'Imana ari ryo Kristo .
51002003	Muri we ni ho habitswe ubwenge n'ubumenyi bwose .
51002004	Ibyo mbibabwiriye kugira ngo hatagira ubashukisha amagambo y'ubucakura .
51002005	N'ubwo tutari kumwe bwose mbahozaho umutima , nkishimira kubona ukuntu mukora byose ku murongo , mugakomezwa no kwizera Kristo .
51002006	Nuko rero nk'uko mwakiriye Kristo Yezu akababera Nyagasani , mube ari ko mugumya gutera imbere muri we .
51002007	Mushore imizi muri we , ubugingo bwanyu bwubakwe kuri we , mukomeye ku byo twemera nk'uko mwabyigishijwe , byose mubikore mushimira Imana bisesuye .
51002008	Muramenye ntihakagire ubatwaza igitugu , abashukisha icurabwenge ry'imburamumaro rishingiye ku migenzo karande no ku binyabutware bikorera ku isi , ridashingiye kuri Kristo .
51002009	Erega ibyuzuye mu Mana byose biba muri Kristo wabaye umuntu !
51002010	Namwe muruzuye kuko mumufite , we ugenga ibinyabutware n'ibinyabushobozi byose .
51002011	Kubera Kristo kandi mwarakebwe bitari bimwe byo ku mubiri , ahubwo mwakebwe mu mutima ku buryo bwa Mwuka , abakuraho imigirire mibi ishingiye kuri kamere yanyu .
51002012	Igihe mwabatizwaga mwahambanywe na Kristo , maze muzuranwa na we kubera kwizera ububasha bw'Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye .
51002013	Kera mwari mwarapfuye muzize ibyaha byanyu no kudakebwa nk'Abayahudi , maze Imana ibazurana na Kristo . Yatubabariye ibicumuro byacu byose ,
51002014	isibanganya urwandiko rutondagura imyenda twashinjwaga n'amategeko , irukuzaho kurumanika ku musaraba wa Yezu .
51002015	Bityo Imana yanyaze bya binyabutware na bya binyabushobozi , ibikoza isoni ku mugaragaro , yerekana ko Kristo abitsinze burundu .
51002016	Nuko rero ntihagire ubashyiraho amategeko y'ibyo murya n'ibyo munywa , cyangwa y'ibyerekeye iminsi mikuru , cyangwa imboneko z'amezi cyangwa amasabato .
51002017	Ibyo byose ni ibimenyetso biranga ibizaza , naho icy'ukuri bishushanya ni Kristo .
51002018	Ibihembo mwagombaga kwegukana ntimukere kubivutswa n'abantu bishimira kwigira nk'abicisha bugufi , bagasenga abamarayika , bakirata ukuntu babonekerwa bidasanzwe . Bene abo baba bishyira imbere babitewe n'ibitekerezo bya kamere yabo bitagira ishingiro ,
51002019	bityo bakaba batifatanyije na Kristo ari we mutwe ugenga umubiri . Umutwe ni wo utuma umubiri wose uhuza imikorere kandi ukagaburirwa , ukoresheje imitsi n'ingingo kugira ngo ukure uko Imana ishaka .
51002020	Ubwo mwapfanye na Kristo ntimukiri ku ngoyi ya bya binyabutware bikorera ku isi . None se kuki mucyifata nk'aho muri ab'isi ? Kuki mukomeza kugengwa n'amategeko nk'aya ,
51002021	ngo : “ Ntugafate iki ! Ntugasogongere kiriya ! Ntukanakore kuri kino ! ”
51002022	Erega ibyo byose igihe umaze kubikoresha biba birangiye ! Ni amategeko n'inyigisho by'abantu gusa .
51002023	Ni ukuri bene ibyo wagira ngo bishingiye ku bwenge , kuko byemeza umuntu kwihimbira uburyo bwo gusenga no kwicisha bugufi no kubabaza umubiri . Nyamara nta mumaro bifite wo gucubya irari rya kamere y'umuntu .
51003001	Imana yabazuranye na Kristo , none rero nimuharanire ibyo mu ijuru aho Kristo ari , yicaye iburyo bw'Imana ku ntebe ya cyami .
51003002	Muhoze imitima ku byo mu ijuru atari ku byo ku isi ,
51003003	kuko mwapfanye na Kristo kandi ubugingo bwanyu bukaba bwarahishwe hamwe na we mu Mana .
51003004	Ubugingo bwanyu nyakuri ni Kristo , ubwo azagaragara rero namwe muzagaragara muri hamwe na we , mufite ikuzo .
51003005	Nuko rero nimwice imigirire yanyu ifitanye isano n'iby'isi , nk'ubusambanyi no gukora ibiteye isoni , n'irari n'ibyifuzo bibi , n'umururumba uhwanye no gusenga ibigirwamana .
51003006	Ibyo ni byo bitera Imana kurakarira [ abatayumvira ] .
51003007	Namwe ubwanyu mwagenzaga mutyo kera mukigengwa n'ibyo bibi .
51003008	Ariko ubu mugomba kuzinukwa ibi byose : uburakari n'umujinya , ubugome n'ibitutsi no kuvuga ibigambo bibi .
51003009	Ntimukabeshyane kuko mwiyambuye kamere yanyu ya kera n'imigirire yayo ,
51003010	mukambara kamere nshya . Iyo kamere nshya igenda ivugururirwa kugira ishusho y'Iyayiremye , kugira ngo mushobore kuyimenya byuzuye .
51003011	Aho rero haba hatakivugwa umunyamahanga cyangwa Umuyahudi , uwakebwe cyangwa utakebwe , Umusiti n'umunyeshyamba , inkoreragahato cyangwa uwigenga , ahubwo Kristo ni byose muri bose .
51003012	Naho mwebwe abo Imana yitoranyirije ikabagira abantu bayo b'inkoramutima , mwambare impuhwe no kugira neza , kwicisha bugufi no kugwa neza no kwihangana .
51003013	Igihe umuntu agize icyo apfa na mugenzi we , mwihanganirane kandi mubabarirane . Mubabarirane nk'uko Nyagasani yabababariye .
51003014	Hejuru ya byose kandi mwambare urukundo ho umwitero . Ni na rwo mugozi ubafatanya bihebuje .
51003015	Mureke amahoro ya Kristo agenge imitima yanyu , ayo ni yo mwahamagariwe kugira ngo mube ingingo zigize umubiri umwe , kandi muhore mushimira Imana .
51003016	Inyigisho za Kristo zibacengere rwose zibakungahaze , mugire n'ubwenge bwo kwigishanya no kugirana inama . Muririmbire Imana zaburi n'indirimbo z'ibisingizo n'izahimbwe zikomoka kuri Mwuka , muyishima cyane bibavuye ku mutima .
51003017	Ibyo muvuga byose n'ibyo mukora byose , mubikore mu izina rya Nyagasani Yezu mushima Imana Se , mubinyujije kuri we .
51003018	Bagore , mwubahe abagabo mwashakanye nk'uko bikwiriye abari muri Nyagasani .
51003019	Bagabo , mukunde abagore mwashakanye kandi ntimukabamerere nabi .
51003020	Bana , mujye mwumvira ababyeyi banyu ku buryo bwose , kuko ari byo Nyagasani yishimira .
51003021	Babyeyi , abana banyu ntimukababuze epfo na ruguru kugira ngo badacika intege .
51003022	Namwe nkoreragahato , mujye mwumvira ba shobuja bo ku isi ku buryo bwose , atari ugukorera ijisho ngo mubashimishe , ahubwo mubikore mubikuye ku mutima mutinya Shobuja mukuru , ari we Nyagasani .
51003023	Ibyo mukora byose mubikorane umutima ukunze , atari abantu mukorera , ahubwo mukorera Shobuja uwo .
51003024	Muzirikane ko Shobuja uwo azabagororera kubaha umunani . Koko kandi Kristo ni we Shobuja mukorera .
51003025	Ukora ibibi wese bizamugaruka kuko Imana ifata abantu bose kimwe .
51004001	Namwe abafite abo mukoresha mubahe ibibakwiriye n'ibibatunganiye , mwibuka ko namwe mufite Shobuja mu ijuru .
51004002	Mwese mugumye gusenga mubihugukiye , mushimira Imana .
51004003	Natwe mudusabire kugira ngo Imana itwugururire amarembo , idushoboze kujya kuvuga ubutumwa bwayo ari bwo banga ryerekeye Kristo , ni ryo bampōye banshyira kuri iyi ngoyi .
51004004	Munsabire ngo mvuge ibyaryo uko bikwiye , mbishyire ku mugaragaro .
51004005	Murajye mwitondera uko mwifata ku batazi Kristo , mukoreshe neza igihe mufite ngo mubabwire ibye .
51004006	Muhorane imvugo y'ineza ifitiye abantu akamaro , bityo muzamenya uko musubiza umuntu wese ugize icyo ababaza .
51004007	Tikiko umuvandimwe nkunda cyane azababwira ibyanjye byose . Ni umufasha wanjye w'indahemuka , dufatanyije umurimo wa Nyagasani .
51004008	Nguwo ndamuboherereje ngo abamenyeshe uko tumerewe , maze abakomeze .
51004009	Azanye na Onezimo ukomoka muri mwe , na we ni umuvandimwe nkunda cyane w'indahemuka . Bazabatekerereza iby'ino byose .
51004010	Arisitariko dufunganywe , na Mariko mwene se wabo wa Barinaba ngo mutahe . Mwabwiwe ibyerekeye Mariko , nagera iwanyu muzamufate neza .
51004011	Yezu witwa Yusito na we arabatashya . Mu Bayahudi bemeye Kristo , abo ni bo bonyine dufatanyije umurimo w'ibyerekeye ubwami bw'Imana kandi baramfashije cyane .
51004012	Epafura ukomoka muri mwe arabatashya , na we ni umugaragu wa Kristo Yezu . Iteka ashishikarira kubasabira kugira ngo mukomere mube indakemwa , mumenye mudashidikanya ibyo Imana ishaka byose .
51004013	Ndahamya rwose yuko abavunikira , mwebwe n'ab'i Lawodiseya n'ab'i Hiyerapoli .
51004014	Umuganga Luka dukunda cyane , hamwe na Dema barabatashya .
51004015	Mundamukirize abavandimwe b'i Lawodiseya na Nimfa , n'itorero rya Kristo rikoranira iwe .
51004016	Nimumara gusoma uru rwandiko , muzarwoherereze ab'itorero rya Kristo ry'i Lawodiseya , kugira ngo na bo barusome , namwe muzasome urwo nandikiye ab'i Lawodiseya nirubageraho .
51004017	Muzabwire Arikipo muti : “ Itondere wa murimo wahawe gukorera Nyagasani , uzawurangize neza . ”
51004018	Jyewe Pawulo ndabatashya . Ibi ni jye ubyiyandikiye n'ukwanjye kuboko . Mujye mwibuka ingoyi ndiho . Nyagasani nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .
52001001	Jyewe Pawulo hamwe na Silasi na Timoteyo , turabandikiye mwebwe abari mu Mana Data no muri Nyagasani Yezu Kristo , mugize itorero rya Kristo ry'i Tesaloniki . Imana nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro .
52001002	Uko dusenze turabazirikana , ntiduhwema kubashimira Imana mwese ,
52001003	twibuka iteka imbere y'Imana Data ibikorwa byiza muterwa no kwemera Kristo , n'imvune muterwa n'urukundo no kwihangana kwanyu gukomoka ku kwiringira Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
52001004	Bavandimwe mukundwa n'Imana , tuzi neza ko ari yo yabatoranyije .
52001005	Koko rero twabagejejeho Ubutumwa bwiza atari amagambo gusa , ahubwo twabubagejejeho bufite ububasha buherekejwe na Mwuka Muziranenge , tubwemeza bidasubirwaho . Muzi ko imyifatire yacu muri mwe yari igendereye kubazanira ibyiza .
52001006	Namwe mwakurikije urugero rwacu n'urwa Nyagasani . Nubwo mwari mu makuba menshi , Ijambo ry'Imana mwaryakiranye ibyishimo bituruka kuri Mwuka Muziranenge .
52001007	Bityo mwabereye urugero abemera Kristo bose bo mu ntara ya Masedoniya n'iya Akaya .
52001008	Koko rero Ijambo rya Nyagasani ryavuye muri mwe ntiryasakaye muri Masedoniya no muri Akaya gusa , ahubwo inkuru ivuga iby'ukwizera Imana kwanyu yamamaye ahantu hose , ku buryo nta cyo twakwirirwa tubivugaho .
52001009	Abantu bose usanga bavuga ukuntu mwatwakiriye , n'ukuntu mwahindukiriye Imana mukareka ibigirwamana , kugira ngo mukorere Imana nzima kandi y'ukuri ,
52001010	igihe mugitegereje Umwana wayo Yezu yazuye mu bapfuye . Ni we uzava mu ijuru aje kudukiza uburakari bw'Imana bwegereje .
52002001	Bavandimwe , muzi neza ko tutaje iwanyu tuzanywe n'ubusa .
52002002	Twari tuvuye i Filipi , aho bari baratugiriye nabi bakadutuka nk'uko mubizi . Ariko nubwo baturwanyije cyane , Imana yaduhaye kubagezaho Ubutumwa bwayo bwiza dushize amanga .
52002003	Koko imyigishirize yacu ntishingiye ku buyobe , cyangwa ku mpamvu mbi cyangwa ku mayeri .
52002004	Ahubwo tuvuga uko Imana ibishaka kuko yatugerageje , ikabona kudushinga Ubutumwa bwiza . Ntiduharanira gushimisha abantu , ahubwo duharanira gushimisha Imana yo igenzura ibiri mu mitima yacu .
52002005	Nk'uko mubizi ntabwo twigeze tubabwira amagambo yo kubacacura , nta n'ubwo twigeze tugira igitekerezo cyo kubashakaho inyungu . Imana ni yo dutanze ho umugabo .
52002006	Nta na rimwe kandi twigeze dushaka kwihesha ikuzo ku bantu , haba kuri mwe cyangwa ku bandi .
52002007	Nyamara kandi twashoboraga kwitwaza ko turi Intumwa za Kristo tukabategeka kudukorera . Ibiri amambu , ubwo twazaga iwanyu twariyoroheje , tumera nk'uko umubyeyi ashyashyanira abana be .
52002008	Kubera ubwuzu twari tubafitiye , uretse no kubagezaho Ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana , twari no guhara amagara yacu ari mwebwe tubigiriye . Rwose mwari mwatubereye incuti magara .
52002009	Bavandimwe , muribuka imvune n'umunaniro twagize . Igihe twabatangarizaga Ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana twakoraga ijoro n'amanywa , kugira ngo hato hatagira n'umwe muri mwe tubera umutwaro .
52002010	Imana ubwayo namwe abemera Kristo , ni mwe dutanze ho abagabo b'imyifatire yacu myiza muri mwe , nta makemwa , nta buhemu nta n'umugayo .
52002011	Murabizi twitaga kuri buri wese muri mwe , nk'uko se w'abana abitaho .
52002012	Twarabakomeje , turabahumuriza kandi turabihanangiriza , ngo mujye mugenza uko bikwiriye abo Imana ihamagara ngo babe mu bwami bwayo bufite ikuzo .
52002013	Dore indi mpamvu ituma natwe tudahwema gushimira Imana : igihe twabamenyeshaga Ijambo ryayo ntabwo mwaryakiriye nk'ijambo ry'abantu , ahubwo mwemeye ko ari Ijambo ry'Imana kandi ni ryo koko , ni na ryo rigira imbaraga muri mwebwe abemera Kristo .
52002014	Bavandimwe , mwakurikije urugero rw'abo mu matorero y'Imana yo muri Yudeya bari muri Kristo Yezu , uko bagiriwe nabi n'Abayahudi ni ko namwe mwagiriwe nabi na bene wanyu .
52002015	Abayahudi ni bo bishe Nyagasani Yezu n'abahanuzi , natwe baradutoteza . Ntabwo bashimisha Imana , ni abanzi b'abantu bose .
52002016	Batubuza kwigisha abatari Abayahudi ngo na bo bakizwe , bityo bakagwiza umubare w'ibyaha bakomeje gukora kuva kera kose . Amaherezo ariko uburakari bw'Imana bwabagezeho .
52002017	Naho twebwe bavandimwe , twamaze igihe gito dutandukanye namwe ariko tukabahozaho umutima . Ni cyo cyatumye dukora uko dushoboye kose kugira ngo tubonane imbonankubone , kuko twari tubakumbuye cyane .
52002018	Ni na yo mpamvu twifuje kuza iwanyu . Ndetse jyewe Pawulo ni kenshi nagize uwo mugambi , ariko Satani aratuzitira .
52002019	Mwebwe muri mu badutera kwiringira no kwishima , muri n'ikamba ryo gutsinda tuziratana imbere y'Umwami wacu Yezu , ubwo azaba aje .
52002020	Koko rero ni mwebwe muduhesha ishema n'umunezero .
52003001	Noneho ubwo tutagishoboye kwihanganira kutamenya amakuru yanyu , twasanze ibyiza ari uko twebwe twasigara mu mujyi wa Atene twenyine .
52003002	Ni ko kuboherereza Timoteyo , umuvandimwe wacu dufatanyije umurimo w'Imana wo kwamamaza Ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo . Twamuboherereje kugira ngo abashyigikire kandi abatere inkunga , kugira ngo murusheho kwizera Kristo ,
52003003	hatagira n'umwe muri mwe uteshuka kubera amakuba turimo . Muzi kandi ko ibyo ari ibyo Imana yatugeneye .
52003004	Ubwo twari kumwe twabamenyesheje mbere y'igihe ko tugiye gutotezwa , kandi muzi ko ari ko byagenze .
52003005	Ni yo mpamvu ntashoboye kwihangana , noneho nkabatumaho Timoteyo kugira ngo amenyere aho mugeze mu kwizera Kristo . Natinyaga ko wa Mushukanyi yaba yarabayobeje maze tukaba twaravunikiye ubusa .
52003006	Ubu Timoteyo amaze guhindukira aturuka iwanyu , yatuzaniye inkuru nziza y'ukuntu mwizera Kristo n'iy'urukundo rwanyu . Yatubwiye ko muhora mutwibuka , mudufitiye ubwuzu n'urukumbuzi kimwe n'uko natwe tubakumbura .
52003007	Ni yo mpamvu bavandimwe , ukwizera Kristo kwanyu kwadukomeje mu ngorane zose no mu makuba twagize .
52003008	Ubu ngubu rero turumva tuguwe neza kubera ko mugikomeye kuri Nyagasani .
52003009	Twabashimira Imana dute ? Twayitura dute umunezero mwinshi duterwa namwe imbere yayo ?
52003010	Ijoro n'amanywa dusaba Imana cyane rwose ngo iduhe kongera kubonana , kandi tubaheshe ibyo mugikeneye mu kwizera Kristo kwanyu .
52003011	Imana Data ubwayo ifatanyije n'Umwami wacu Yezu , nidushakire akayira kagera iwanyu .
52003012	Nyagasani nabagwirize ndetse abasesekarize urukundo mukundana n'urwo mufitiye abantu bose , nk'uko natwe tubakunda .
52003013	Nabakomeze imitima maze muzabe mudafite inenge cyangwa umugayo imbere y'Imana Data , igihe Umwami wacu Yezu azaba aje , ashagawe n'intore ze zose .
52004001	Ahasigaye bavandimwe , turabasaba tubinginga mu izina rya Nyagasani Yezu ngo mujye mugenza nk'uko twabigishije , kugira ngo mushimishe Imana . Koko kandi musanzwe mubikora , noneho nimurusheho .

52004007	Erega Imana ntiyaduhamagariye kwiyandavuza , ahubwo yaraduhamagaye ngo tube abaziranenge !

52004013	Bavandimwe , twifuza ko mutayoberwa ibyerekeye abamaze gupfa , kugira ngo mudashavura nk'abandi badafite icyo biringiye .
52004014	Nk'uko twemera ko Yezu yapfuye kandi akazuka , ni na ko twemera ko abapfuye bamwizera , Imana izabazurana na we .
52004015	Iri jambo tubabwira ni iryo twatumwe na Nyagasani : twebwe abazaba bakiriho aje , ntabwo tuzabanziriza abazaba barapfuye .
52004016	Ahubwo tuzumva itegeko twumve n'ijwi ry'umumarayika mukuru , twumve n'impanda y'Imana noneho Nyagasani ubwe amanuke avuye mu ijuru , maze abapfuye bizera Kristo babanze bazuke .
52004017	Nyuma natwe abazaba bakiriho duhite tuzamuranwa na bo mu bicu , dusanganire Nyagasani mu kirere maze tuzabane na we iteka ryose .
52004018	Nuko rero mubwirane ayo magambo , kugira ngo abahumurize .
52005001	Bavandimwe , ntimukeneye ko tubandikira ibyerekeye ibihe n'iminsi ibyo bizabera .
52005002	Ubwanyu muzi neza ko umunsi wa Nyagasani uzabatungura nk'umujura wa nijoro .
52005003	Igihe bazaba bavuga bati : “ Ni amahoro , hari umutekano ” , ni bwo icyorezo kizabatungura nk'uko ibise bitungura umubyeyi utwite , maze babure aho bahungira .
52005004	Nyamara mwebwe bavandimwe , ntabwo muri mu mwijima ku buryo uwo munsi wabatungura nk'umujura ,
52005005	kuko mwese muri ab'umucyo , muri ab'amanywa . Ntituri ab'ijoro , ntituri n'ab'umwijima .
52005006	Nuko rero twe gusinzira nk'abandi , ahubwo tube maso kandi twirinde muri byose .
52005007	Abasinzira basinzira nijoro , kandi abasinda basinda nijoro .
52005008	Twebwe rero turi ab'amanywa , ntitugategekwe n'inda tujye twirinda muri byose . Tujye twambara ikoti ry'icyuma rikingiriza igituza ari ryo ukwizera n'urukundo , kandi twambare n'ingofero y'icyuma ari yo kwiringira agakiza .
52005009	Erega Imana ntiyatugeneye kuzagubwaho n'uburakari bwayo ! Ahubwo yatugeneye guhabwa agakiza dukesha Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo ,
52005010	wadupfiriye kugira ngo tuzabane na we ubwo azaza , yasanga tukiriho cyangwa twarapfuye .
52005011	Noneho rero muhumurizanye , kandi muterane inkunga nk'uko musanzwe mubigenza .
52005012	Bavandimwe , turabasaba kuzirikana abo muri mwe bavunwa no kubayobora , bakabakosora babishinzwe na Nyagasani .
52005013	Nimububahe cyane kandi mubakunde kubera umurimo bakora . Namwe kandi mubane amahoro .
52005014	Bavandimwe , turabihanangiriza ngo mucyahe imburamukoro , mutinyure abanyabwoba kandi mukomeze abanyantegenke , bose mujye mubihanganira .
52005015	Muramenye he kugira uwitura undi inabi , ahubwo muhore mushaka kugirirana neza , ndetse abantu bose mubagirire neza .
52005016	Mwishime iteka ,
52005017	musenge ubutitsa ,
52005018	mushimire Imana uko byamera kose , kuko ari byo ibashakaho mwebwe abari muri Kristo Yezu .
52005019	Ntimugacubye Mwuka w'Imana ,
52005020	ntimugasuzugure ibyahanuwe .
52005021	Mugenzure byose , ibyiza mubigumane ,
52005022	maze mwirinde icyitwa ikibi cyose .
52005023	Imana ubwayo yo sōko y'amahoro ibagire abayo rwose , irinde buri wese uko ari kose : umwuka n'ubuzima n'umubiri , maze Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo naza azasange mutariho umugayo .
52005024	Imana ibahamagara ni indahemuka , izabikora nta kabuza .
52005025	Bavandimwe , natwe mudusabire .

52005028	Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo nagumye kubagirira ubuntu !
53001001	Jyewe Pawulo hamwe na Silasi na Timoteyo , turabandikiye mwebwe abari mu Mana Data no muri Nyagasani Yezu Kristo , mugize itorero rya Kristo ry'i Tesaloniki .
53001002	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
53001003	Bavandimwe , twabura dute kubashimira Imana ubutitsa ? Koko birakwiye kuko murushaho gutera imbere mu kwizera Kristo , kandi n'urukundo mufitanye rukiyongera .
53001004	Ni yo mpamvu mu matorero y'Imana turata ibyanyu , tuvuga uko mwihangana mukizera Kristo , nubwo mutotezwa mukanahura n'amakuba y'uburyo bwose .
53001005	Ibyo ni byo byerekana ko Imana idaca urwa kibera . Ni cyo kizatuma mubarwa mu bakwiye ubwami bwayo , ari na bwo babahōra bakabagirira nabi .
53001006	Imana ni intabera , ababateza amakuba izabitura amakuba ,
53001007	namwe abababazwa ibiture kuruhukana natwe . Ni ko bizamera igihe Nyagasani Yezu azahishurwa avuye mu ijuru , ashagawe n'abamarayika be yahaye ububasha .
53001008	Azaza mu muriro ugurumana yihōrere ku batazi Imana , ntibumvire Ubutumwa bwiza bw'Umwami wacu Yezu .
53001009	Bazahabwa igihano cyo kurimbuka bajyanwe kure ya Nyagasani , batandukanywe n'ikuzo rye n'ububasha bwe .
53001010	Ni ko bizamera kuri wa munsi Nyagasani azaza guheshwa ikuzo n'intore ze no gutangarirwa n'abamwemeye bose — muri abo namwe murimo , kuko mwemeye ibyo twahamije hagati muri mwe .
53001011	Ngiyo impamvu ituma duhora tubasabira kugira ngo Imana ibone ko mukwiye ibyo yabahamagariye . Turayisaba kurambura ukuboko kwayo ngo isohoze imigambi myiza yose mwagize , kimwe n'ibikorwa byiza muheshwa no kwizera Kristo .
53001012	Bityo Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo aherwe ikuzo muri mwe , kandi namwe muriherwe kuri we , mubikesha ubuntu mugirirwa n'Imana yacu na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
53002001	Bavandimwe , ku byerekeye kuza k'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo no ku byerekeye uko tuzateranira imbere ye , turabasabye
53002002	ntimuzakurwe umutima cyangwa ngo muterwe ubwoba no kumva ko umunsi wo kuza kwa Nyagasani wageze , naho hagira uvuga ko yabihishuriwe na Mwuka cyangwa ko hari uwabitangaje , cyangwa se ko ari twe twabyanditse .
53002003	Ntihazagire ubashuka na gato . Ibyo bitaraba hagomba kuzabanza kubaho abantu benshi beguka ku Mana , noneho uwitwa “ Umugome Gica ” wagenewe kurimbuka agahishurwa .
53002004	Uwo ni we urwanya icyo abantu bita imana cyose n'icyo basenga cyose , akishyira hejuru yabyo ku buryo yicara mu Ngoro y'Imana , akigira Imana .
53002005	Mbese ntimwibuka ko tukiri kumwe nabibabwiye ?
53002006	Ubu kandi muzi igihagaritse ibyo byose icyo ari cyo . Ni ukugira ngo azahishurwe igihe cye kigeze .
53002007	Koko rero amayobera y'ubugome yatangiye gukora ibyayo . Icyakora haracyariho ubuzitiye kugeza igihe azavanwaho .
53002008	Ubwo ni bwo wa Mugome azahishurwa , noneho igihe Nyagasani Yezu azaba aje amwicishe umwuka wo mu kanwa ke , amutsembeshe ukurabagirana kwe .
53002009	Uwo Mugome azaza akoreshwa n'imbaraga za Satani ngo atange ibimenyetso , akore ibitangaza n'ibindi bikorwa by'ububasha by'uburyo bwose byo kuyobya abantu .
53002010	Azakoresha ubuhemu bw'uburyo bwose kugira ngo ashuke abagenewe kurimbuka , bazira kudakunda ukuri kwari kubarokora .
53002011	Ni yo mpamvu Imana iboherereza ubuyobe bukaze butuma bemera ibinyoma .
53002012	Bityo abazaba bataremeye ukuri ahubwo bakishimira ubugome , bazatsindwe n'urubanza .
53002013	Bavandimwe mukundwa na Nyagasani , nta cyatubuza guhora dushimira Imana kubera mwebwe . Ni mwe Imana yatoranyije ngo mube aba mbere bo guhabwa agakiza mubikesha Mwuka wabeguriye Imana , mubikesha kandi kwemera ukuri .
53002014	Ni byo yabahamagariye ikoresheje Ubutumwa bwiza twabagejejeho , kugira ngo muhabwe ikuzo ry'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
53002015	Bityo rero bavandimwe , nimuhagarare kigabo , mukomere ku nyigisho twabagejejeho mu magambo no mu nzandiko .
53002016	Nyagasani Yezu Kristo nabakomeze , afatanyije n'Imana Data yadukunze ikadutera inkunga iteka , ikadutera no kwiringira ibyiza kubera ubuntu itugirira .
53002017	Nibakomeze rero , ibahe n'imbaraga mu byiza byose mukora kandi muvuga .
53003001	Ahasigaye rero bavandimwe , mudusabire kugira ngo Ijambo rya Nyagasani rikomeze ryamamare , rihabwe ikuzo nk'uko bigenda iwanyu .
53003002	Mudusabire kandi kugira ngo Imana idukize abagome n'abagizi ba nabi . Erega si ko bose bemera Kristo !
53003003	Ariko Nyagasani ni indahemuka , azabakomeza kandi abarinde Sekibi .
53003004	Ni Nyagasani utuma tubagirira icyizere , ibyo tubashinga murabikora kandi muzakomeza kubikora .
53003005	Nyagasani nabayobore abageze ku rukundo rw'Imana , no ku kwihangana gutangwa na Kristo .
53003006	Bavandimwe , mu izina rya Nyagasani Yezu Kristo turabihanangiriza kwitandukanya n'umuvandimwe wese w'umunebwe , udakurikiza inyigisho twabahaye .
53003007	Mwebwe ubwanyu muzi neza ukuntu mugomba gukurikiza urugero rwacu . Igihe twari kumwe ntabwo twabaye abanebwe ,
53003008	nta muntu twigeze twaka ibyo kudutunga ku busa . Ahubwo ijoro n'amanywa twarakoze , tugira imvune n'umunaniro kugira ngo tutagira n'umwe turushya .
53003009	Si uko tutari tubifitiye uburenganzira , ahubwo twashatse kubaha urugero mukurikiza .
53003010	Koko rero igihe twari iwanyu twarababwiye tuti : “ Udashaka gukora ntakarye . ”
53003011	None twumva ko muri mwe hari abanebwe batagira icyo bakora , ahubwo bakivanga mu by'abandi .

53003014	Nihagira utumvira amabwiriza yacu akubiye muri uru rwandiko , mumumenye mwitandukanye na we bitume akorwa n'isoni .
53003015	Icyakora ntimukamufate nk'umwanzi , ahubwo mujye mumuhana bya kivandimwe .
53003016	Nyagasani we sōko y'amahoro , ubwe abe ari we ubaha amahoro iteka ku buryo bwose . Nyagasani nabane namwe mwese .
53003017	Jyewe Pawulo ndabatashya . Ibi ni jye ubyiyandikiye n'ukwanjye kuboko . Ni wo mukono njya nshyira ku nzandiko zanjye zose . Uko ni ko nandika .
53003018	Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo nagumye kubagirira ubuntu mwese .
54001001	Jyewe Pawulo Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko byategetswe n'Imana Umukiza wacu na Kristo Yezu twiringira ,
54001002	ndakwandikiye Timoteyo mwana wanjye nibyariye muri Kristo twemera . Imana Data ikugirire ubuntu iguhe n'imbabazi n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu .
54001003	Nk'uko nabigusabye igihe najyaga mu ntara ya Masedoniya , ugume Efezi kugira ngo ubuze abantu bariyo gukwiza inyigisho ziyobya .
54001004	Ubabuze no kwihambira ku bitekerezo bitagira ishingiro , no ku bisekuruza bitagira iherezo . Ibyo bizana impaka gusa , aho guteza imbere imigambi y'Imana twemezwa no kwizera Kristo .
54001005	Intego mfite ngushinga ibyo ni ukugira ngo bagire urukundo rukomoka ku mutima uboneye utabarega ikibi , no kwizera Kristo kuzira uburyarya .
54001006	Bamwe bahushije iyo ntego , bahera mu magambo y'amahomvu .
54001007	Bashaka kuba abigisha b'Amategeko , nyamara batazi neza ibyo bavuga n'ibyo bemeza abantu bihandagaje .
54001008	Turabizi koko Amategeko ni meza , igihe umuntu ayakoresha uko bikwiye .
54001009	N'ubundi tuzi ko Amategeko atashyiriweho intungane , ahubwo dore abo yashyiriweho : abagome n'ibigande , abatubaha Imana n'abanyabyaha , abahakana Imana n'abasuzugura ibyayo , abica ba se na ba nyina kimwe n'abicanyi bose ,
54001010	abasambanyi basanzwe n'abasambana n'abo bahuje igitsina , abacuruza abantu n'ababeshyi n'abarahira ibinyoma , mbese abakora ibintu byose binyuranye n'inyigisho zishyitse .
54001011	Izo ni zo nyigisho zihuje n'Ubutumwa nashinzwe , bwerekeye ikuzo ry'Imana nyir'ugusingizwa .
54001012	Ndashimira Umwami wacu Kristo Yezu watumye mbasha kumukorera , akangirira icyizere , bityo akanshinga umurimo we .
54001013	Nari umuntu ukunda gutuka Imana , ngatoteza abayoboke bayo nkaba n'umunyarugomo . Ariko Imana yarambabariye kuko ibyo nabiterwaga n'ubujiji , kubera ko ntemeraga Kristo .
54001014	Ubuntu Umwami wacu agira bwaransābye , kimwe n'ukwizera n'urukundo tubonera muri Kristo Yezu .
54001015	Iri jambo ni iry'ukuri kandi rikwiye kwemerwa na bose : Kristo Yezu yazanywe ku isi no gukiza abanyabyaha , kandi mu banyabyaha ni jye wa mbere .
54001016	Ariko icyatumye Imana ingirira imbabazi , ni ukugira ngo muri jye umunyabyaha wa mbere Kristo Yezu yerekane ukwihangana kwe kuzuye , bityo mbere urugero abazamwizera bose bagahabwa ubugingo buhoraho .
54001017	Umwami uhoraho ari we Mana imwe rukumbi , idapfa kandi itarebwa n'amaso , ahabwe icyubahiro n'ikuzo iteka ryose . Amina .
54001018	Timoteyo mwana wanjye , dore ibyo ngushinze bihuye n'ibyabanje guhanurwa kuri wowe . Ubyiteho bitume urwana intambara nziza ,
54001019	ukomere kuri Kristo twemera ufite umutima utakurega ikibi . Uwo mutima bamwe banze kuwumvira bareka kwizera Kristo , bamera nk'abigungiye mu matongo .
54001020	Muri abo hari Himeneyo na Alegisanderi , nabeguriye Satani ngo bibigishe kutazongera gutuka Imana .
54002001	Mbere ya byose ndabihanangiriza ngo mu masengesho yanyu mujye musabira abantu bose , mwinginga Imana kandi muyishimira ku bwabo .
54002002	Mujye musabira abami n'abandi bategetsi bose kugira ngo tugire amahoro n'ituze , maze tubeho twubaha Imana kandi turi inyangamugayo .
54002003	Ngibyo ibyiza bishimisha Imana Umukiza wacu ,
54002004	ishaka ko abantu bose bakizwa kugira ngo babashe kumenya ukuri byuzuye .

54002006	witanze agapfa ngo abere incungu abantu bose . Icyo ni icyemezo cy'uko Imana ishaka ko bose bakizwa , cyatanzwe igihe kigeze .
54002007	Ku bw'ibyo nashyiriweho kuba umuvugizi wa Kristo , nkaba n'Intumwa ye ngo nigishe abatari Abayahudi ibyerekeye Kristo twemera n'ukuri kwe — ndavuga ukuri simbeshya .
54002008	Ndashaka ko ahantu hose abagabo bajya basenga barambuye amaboko , bafite imitima iboneye kandi badafite umujinya cyangwa impaka .
54002009	N'abagore ni uko bajye bambara uko bikwiye , birimbishe nk'abanyamutima badashira isoni , atari ukuboha imisatsi no kwambara imikufi y'izahabu , cyangwa amasaro y'agahebuzo cyangwa imyambaro y'igiciro gihanitse .
54002010	Ahubwo umurimbo wabo ube ibikorwa byiza bikwiriye abagore bubaha Imana .
54002011	Abagore bajye biga batuje kandi bubaha ku buryo bwose .
54002012	Sinemera ko abagore bigisha cyangwa ngo bategeke abagabo , ahubwo bakwiriye kugira ituze .
54002013	N'ubundi Adamu ni we waremwe mbere , Eva akurikiraho .

54002015	Nyamara umugore azakirizwa mu ibyara nakomera kuri Kristo twemera , akagira urukundo , akiyegurira Imana kandi akaba umunyamutima .
54003001	Iri jambo ni iry'ukuri : niba umuntu yifuza kuba umuyobozi w'Umuryango w'Imana , aba yifuje umurimo mwiza .
54003002	Umuyobozi w'Umuryango w'Imana agomba kuba umuntu w'inyangamugayo , akaba n'umugabo ufite umugore umwe , udategekwa n'inda , ushyira mu gaciro kandi wiyubaha . Agomba kuba umuntu ukunda kwakira abagenzi , uzi kwigisha ,
54003003	utari umunywi w'inzoga cyangwa umurwanyi . Ahubwo agomba kuba umunyamahoro , wirinda amahane kandi udakunda ifaranga .
54003004	Agomba kuba azi kuyobora neza abo mu rugo rwe bwite , no kumenyereza abana be guhora bubaha ababyeyi ku buryo bwose bukwiye .
54003005	None se unanirwa kuyobora urugo rwe bwite yashobora ate kwita ku Muryango w'Imana ?
54003006	Umuyobozi w'Umuryango wayo ntakwiriye kuba umuntu wemeye Kristo vuba ngo atigira ishyano ryose , bityo agacirwa iteka nk'irya Satani .
54003007	Na none kandi agomba kuba umuntu n'abatemera Kristo bavuga neza , kugira ngo atagawa akagwa mu mutego wa Satani .
54003008	Abadiyakoni na bo ni uko , bagomba kuba abantu biyubaha , bataryarya , batari abanywi b'inzoga kandi badafite umururumba w'inyungu .
54003009	Bagomba gukomera ku mabanga ya Kristo twemera , bafite imitima iboneye itabarega ikibi .
54003010	Na bo kandi bajye babanza bageragezwe , hanyuma niba nta cyo bagawa babone gukora uwo murimo w'ubudiyakoni .
54003011	Abadiyakonikazi na bo bagomba kuba ari abantu biyubaha , bakirinda gusebanya no gutegekwa n'inda , ahubwo nibabe indahemuka ku buryo bwose .
54003012	Umudiyakoni wese agomba kuba umugabo ufite umugore umwe , uyobora neza abana be n'abandi bo mu rugo rwe .
54003013	Abakora uwo murimo neza bibahesha umwanya mwiza , bigatuma bavuga bashize amanga uko bemera Kristo Yezu .
54003014	Nkwandikiye ibyo niringiye kuzaza kugusura vuba .
54003015	Icyakora nindamuka ntinze , uru rwandiko ruzakumenyesha uko umuntu agomba kwifata mu rugo rw'Imana , ni ukuvuga mu Muryango w'Imana nzima ari wo nkingi ishyigikiye ukuri kwayo .
54003016	Nta wabihakana , ibanga ryo kubaha Imana rirakomeye . Uwo rivuga
54004001	Mwuka w'Imana avuga yeruye ko mu minsi y'imperuka bamwe bazimūra Kristo , bayoboke inyigisho ziyobya zikwizwa n'ingabo za Satani .
54004002	Bazaba bayobejwe n'uburyarya bw'abanyabinyoma bafite imitima ihuramye , ku buryo itakibashinja ibibi bakora .
54004003	Bazabuza abantu gushakana no kurya bimwe na bimwe kandi Imana ari yo yabiremye , kugira ngo abayoboke bayo basobanukiwe ukuri babirye bayishimira .
54004004	Erega ibyo Imana yaremye byose ni byiza , kandi nta na kimwe kigomba gutabwa iyo bacyakiranye ishimwe ,
54004005	kuko kiba cyejejwe n'Ijambo ry'Imana no gusenga !
54004006	Niwumvisha abavandimwe ibyo ngibyo uzaba ubaye umugaragu mwiza wa Yezu Kristo , bizagaragara ko utungwa n'amagambo ya Kristo twemera , n'inyigisho nziza wakurikije .
54004007	Naho ibitekerezo by'abakecuru bitagira ishingiro kandi bihakana Imana , ujye ubigendera kure ahubwo wimenyereze kubaha Imana .
54004008	Imyitozo ngororamubiri ifite akamaro ariko gake , naho kubaha Imana byo bigira akamaro ku buryo bwose , bitanga icyizere cyo guhabwa ubugingo bw'ubu n'ubw'igihe kizaza .
54004009	Iri jambo ni iry'ukuri kandi rikwiye kwemerwa na bose :
54004010	igituma twemera kuvunika tugahirimbana , ni uko twiringiye Imana nzima yo Mukiza w'abantu bose cyane cyane abemera Kristo .
54004011	Ngibyo ibyo ugomba kwemeza abantu no kubigisha .
54004012	Ntihakagire ugusuzugura ngo ni uko uri muto . Ahubwo ubere urugero abemera Kristo mu mivugire no mu myifatire , no mu rukundo no mu kwemera Kristo , no mu kugira umutima uboneye .
54004013	Igihe ugitegereje ko nza wihatire gusomera abantu Ibyanditswe , no kubakomeza no kubigisha .
54004014	Ntukirengagize impano ikurimo wahawe n'Imana ubikesha ibyahanuwe , igihe abakuru b'Umuryango w'Imana bakurambikagaho ibiganza .
54004015	Ngibyo ibyo ugomba kuzirikana ukabyitaho . Ni bwo bizagaragarira bose ko utera imbere .
54004016	Wirinde ubwawe , witondere n'ibyo wigisha ubyizirikeho . Nugenza utyo uzahabwa agakiza wowe n'abagutega amatwi .
54005001	Ntugacyahe umusaza ahubwo ujye umuhugura nk'aho ari so , n'abasore ubahugure nk'aho ari abavandimwe bawe .
54005002	Abakecuru ubahugure nk'aho ari ababyeyi bawe , abāri na bo nk'aho ari bashiki bawe ubafitiye umutima uboneye rwose .
54005003	Wubahe abapfakazi bamwe ba nyamwigendaho .
54005004	Naho niba umupfakazi afite abana cyangwa abuzukuru , nibabanze bagaragaze mu rugo rwabo bwite uko bubaha Imana , biture ababyeyi babo ineza babagiriye . Ibyo ni byo bishimisha Imana .
54005005	Umupfakazi nyamwigendaho kandi nyakujya yiringira Imana gusa , ntahwema kuyisenga no kuyiyambaza ijoro n'amanywa .
54005006	Naho umupfakazi wibera mu mudamararo , we ku Mana aba apfuye ahagaze .
54005007	Ibyo ubibashinge kugira ngo babe inyangamugayo .
54005008	Niba umuntu atita kuri bene wabo cyane cyane abo mu rugo rwe , uwo aba yarahakanye Kristo twemera ndetse aba arutwa n'abatemera Kristo .
54005009	Ntihakagire umugore uzandikwa mu mubare w'abapfakazi atarageza ku myaka mirongo itandatu y'ubukuru , kandi atarashatswe n'umugabo umwe gusa .
54005010	Agomba kuba azwi ho ibikorwa byiza ari byo ibi : kurera abana be neza , kwakira neza abagenzi , koza ibirenge by'intore z'Imana , kugoboka imbabare , mbese kugira ibikorwa byiza by'uburyo bwose .
54005011	Abapfakazi bakiri bato ntukabashyire mu mubare w'abandi , kuko iyo irari ryabo ribateye kureka Kristo bongera gushaka abandi bagabo .
54005012	Bityo bakaba batsindwa n'urubanza rwo kureka ibyo bari biyemeje mbere .
54005013	Byongeye kandi bimenyereza kuzerera imihana , bakaba imburamukoro . Si ibyo gusa ahubwo bahinduka n'abanyamazimwe , bakajya bivanga mu bitabareba , bakavuga ibidakwiye .
54005014	Ni cyo gituma nshaka ko abapfakazi bakiri bato bongera gushyingirwa bakabyara , bakayobora ingo zabo , bityo bakima abanzi b'Imana urwaho rwo gusebya abayo .
54005015	Koko hari bamwe muri bo bamaze guteshuka bagakurikira Satani .
54005016	Nihagira umugore wemera Kristo akaba afite abapfakazi muri bene wabo , ajye abafasha kugira ngo byorohereze Umuryango w'Imana , ubone uko ugoboka abapfakazi nyamwigendaho .
54005017	Abakuru bayobora neza Umuryango w'Imana bakwiye guhembwa incuro ebyiri , cyane cyane abavunwa no kwamamaza Ijambo ry'Imana no kwigisha abandi .
54005018	N'ubundi Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Ntimugahambire umunwa w'ikimasa igihe gihonyōra ingano ” , kandi ngo : “ Umukozi akwiye guhemberwa umurimo akora . ”
54005019	Ntukemere ibyo barega umukuru w'Umuryango w'Imana , keretse ashinjwa n'abagabo babiri cyangwa batatu .
54005020	Abacumura ujye ubahanira mu ruhame kugira ngo abandi batinye .
54005021	Ndakwihanangiriza ntanze Imana ho umugabo , ndetse na Kristo Yezu n'abamarayika bayo bayishagara , ukurikize ayo mabwiriza utagize aho ubogamira , cyangwa ngo uce urwa kibera .
54005022	Ntukihutire kugira uwo urambikaho ibiganza ngo abe umukozi w'Imana . Ntukifatanye n'abandi gukora ibyaha , ahubwo wowe ubwawe ugumye kugira umutima uboneye .
54005023	Reka kunywa amazi gusa , ahubwo ujye ukoresha ka divayi gake kubera igifu cyawe no guhora urwaragurika .
54005024	Ibyaha by'abantu bamwe byigaragaza mbere y'uko bacirwa urubanza , naho iby'abandi bikagaragara hanyuma .
54005025	Bityo n'ibikorwa byiza na byo byigaragaza mbere y'igihe , kandi naho bitagaragara ako kanya ntibishobora guhora bihishwe .
54006001	Abagizwe inkoreragahato bose nibemere ko ba shebuja bakwiye kubahwa rwose , kugira ngo hatagira utuka Imana cyangwa inyigisho zacu .
54006002	Abafite ba shebuja bemera Kristo ntibakabasuzugure , bitwaza ko ari abavandimwe babo muri Kristo . Ahubwo barusheho gukora bavunika , kuko abafashwa n'umurimo wabo mwiza ari abo bakunda bahuje kwemera Kristo . Dore ibyo ugomba kwigisha no kugiramo abandi inama :
54006003	nihagira uwigisha ibindi bidahuje n'amagambo ashyitse y'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo n'inyigisho zinogeye Imana ,
54006004	uwo ni umwirasi utagira icyo azi , urwaye indwara yo kujya impaka no guterana amagambo . Ibyo ni byo bibyara ishyari n'amakimbirane , gusebanya no gukekera abandi ibibi ,
54006005	n'impaka z'urudaca mu bantu bafite ubwenge bwononekaye bakamyemo ukuri . Bibwira ko uwubaha Imana aba yikurikiraniye inyungu .
54006006	Icyakora koko kubaha Imana iyo gufatanyije no kunyurwa n'ibyo ufite , bizana inyungu ikomeye .
54006007	Erega nta cyo twazanye ku isi , kandi nta n'icyo tuzabasha kuyivanaho !
54006008	Ariko ubwo dufite ibyokurya n'ibyo kwambara nitunyurwe na byo .
54006009	Naho abararikira ubukungu bagwa mu mutego , bagashukwa n'irari ryinshi ry'ubupfu rikabangiza . Ni cyo gituma bahomba byose bakarimbuka .
54006010	Koko gukunda amafaranga ni yo nkomoko y'ibibi byose . Kuyararikira kwatumye bamwe bateshuka bareka Kristo twemera , bakubitana n'ububabare bwinshi .
54006011	Naho wowe muntu w'Imana , ibyo byose ujye ubigendera kure . Uharanire gutunganira Imana no kuyubaha , kuba indahemuka no kugira urukundo , kudacogora no kwiyoroshya .
54006012	Ujye urwana intambara nziza , urwanire Kristo twemera maze usingire ubugingo buhoraho . Ngibyo ibyo wahamagariwe ukabyemeza neza mu ruhame , abantu benshi bakabibera abagabo .
54006013	Imana ibeshaho byose ni yo ntanze ho umugabo , na Kristo Yezu wabaye umugabo w'iby'ukuri yemera imbere ya Ponsiyo Pilato , na we mutanze ho umugabo yuko ngushinze ibi ngibi :
54006014	ujye ukurikiza ibyo wategetswe nta makemwa , nta n'umugayo kugeza igihe Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo azaba aje .
54006015	Imana nyir'ugusingizwa kandi ishobora byose , yo Mwami ugenga abami ikaba n'Umutegetsi ugenga abategetsi , izabikora igihe cyabyo kigeze .
54006016	Ni yo yonyine ihoraho ituye mu mucyo utegerwa , nta muntu wigeze ayibona kandi ntawe ubasha kuyibona . Ikuzo n'ububasha buhoraho bibe ibyayo . Amina .
54006017	Abakungu b'iki gihe cya none ubihanangirize , kugira ngo birinde gusuzugura no kwiringira ubukungu bushira vuba . Ahubwo biringire Imana yo iduhundazaho ibintu byose ngo tubikoreshe tubyishimira .
54006018	Ubihanangirize kandi bajye bakora neza , ubukungu bwabo bube ibikorwa byiza , bahore biteguye gutanga ku byabo batitangiriye itama .
54006019	Bityo bazaba bafite ifatizo ry'ubukungu bwiza babikiye igihe kizaza , kugira ngo basingire ubugingo nyakuri .
54006020	Nuko rero Timoteyo , urinde icyo washinzwe , ugendere kure y'amagambo y'amanjwe y'abatitaye ku Mana na kure y'impaka z'ingirwabumenyi .
54006021	Bamwe bitwaje ubwo bumenyi bituma bateshuka kuri Kristo twemera . Nyagasani nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .
55001001	Jyewe Pawulo Intumwa ya Kristo Yezu nk'uko Imana yabishatse , ikanshinga kumenyekanisha isezerano ry'ubugingo duherwa muri Kristo Yezu ,
55001002	ndakwandikiye Timoteyo mwana wanjye nkunda . Imana Data ikugirire ubuntu , iguhe n'imbabazi n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Kristo Yezu Umwami wacu .
55001003	Ndashimira Imana nkorera mfite umutima utandega ikibi , nk'uko ba sogokuruza babigenzaga . Mpora nkwibuka ijoro n'amanywa uko nsenze .
55001004	Iyo nibutse amarira yawe nifuza cyane kongera kukubona , kugira ngo ngire ibyishimo bihebuje .
55001005	Ndibuka ukwizera Kristo kwawe kuzira uburyarya . Uko kwizera ni ko nyogokuru wawe Lowisi yari afite uhereye mbere , nyuma nyoko Unise na we agira uko kwizera , kandi sinshidikanya ko nawe ari ko ufite .
55001006	Ni yo mpamvu nkwibutsa ngo umere nk'uwatsa umuriro , ukangure impano ikurimo Imana yaguhaye igihe nakurambikagaho ibiganza .
55001007	Koko rero umwuka Imana yaduhaye si uwo kutugira abanyabwoba , ahubwo ni Mwuka uduha ububasha n'urukundo no kumenya kwifata .
55001008	Ntukagire isoni zo guhamya Umwami wacu , kandi ntugaterwe isoni n'uko mfunzwe bamumpōra . Ahubwo wemere kugirirwa nabi kimwe nanjye kubera Ubutumwa bwiza , Imana ibigushoboje .
55001009	Ni yo yadukijije , iduhamagarira kuba intore zayo bidatewe n'ibikorwa byacu , ahubwo bitewe n'umugambi wayo n'ubuntu yatugiriye . Kuva mbere na mbere Imana yatugiriye ubwo buntu muri Kristo Yezu .
55001010	Ariko noneho bwashyizwe ku mugaragaro , igihe Umukiza wacu Kristo Yezu yazaga . Ni we watsembye ubushobozi bw'urupfu , maze ahishura ubugingo budashira akoresheje Ubutumwa bwiza .
55001011	Ubwo Butumwa ni bwo nashinzwe gutangaza ngo mbubere intumwa n'umwigisha .
55001012	Ni na yo mpamvu ituma mbabazwa ntyo . Nyamara ntibinkoza isoni kuko nzi uwo nizeye , kandi nkaba nzi neza ko afite ububasha bwo kurinda ibyo yanshinze , kugeza kuri wa munsi Kristo azazaho .
55001013	Inyigisho zishyitse wanyumvanye uzifate ho urugero uzajya ukurikiza , bityo ukomere kuri Kristo Yezu umwizeye kandi ufite urukundo .
55001014	Ibyiza washinzwe ubirinde ufashijwe na Mwuka Muziranenge uba muri twe .
55001015	Nk'uko ubizi abo mu ntara ya Aziya bose barantereranye , barimo Figelo na Erimogene .
55001016	Nyagasani nagirire neza urugo rwa Onesiforo , kuko yampumurije kenshi ntaterwe isoni n'ingoyi ndiho .
55001017	Ahubwo akigera i Roma yanshatse ashyizeho umwete maze arambona .
55001018	Ntawe ukurusha kumenya ibyiza yangiriye turi Efezi . Kuri wa munsi Nyagasani azamugirire imbabazi , zitangwa na Nyagasani ubwe .
55002001	Wowe rero mwana wanjye , uhagarare kigabo ubishobojwe n'ubuntu Kristo Yezu akugirira .
55002002	Ibyo wanyumvanye hari abahamya benshi , nawe ubishinge abantu b'indahemuka bazashobora kubyigisha abandi .
55002003	Ujye ufatanya nanjye kwihanganira amagorwa , nk'uko bikwiye umusirikari mwiza wa Kristo Yezu .
55002004	Nta musirikari wagira ibindi ahugiramo ngo abe akinejeje uwamwohereje ku rugamba .
55002005	Igihe kandi abantu barushanwa , nta wahembwa ikamba rigenewe abatsinze , keretse akurikije amategeko y'irushanwa .
55002006	Umuhinzi kandi ni we ubanza kuganura ku byo yavunikiye .
55002007	Uzirikane ibyo mvuze , Nyagasani azaguha kubisobanukirwa byose .
55002008	“ Ujye wibuka Yezu Kristo , wazutse mu bapfuye , kandi ukomoka kuri Dawidi ” , nkuko Ubutumwa bwiza namamaza bubivuga .
55002009	Ubwo Butumwa ni bwo mpōrwa , ngashyirwa no ku ngoyi nkumugizi wa nabi . Nyamara Ijambo ryImana ryo ntirishyirwa ku ngoyi .
55002010	Ni yo mpamvu nihanganira byose kubera abo Imana yitoranyirije , kugira ngo na bo bahabwe agakiza kabonerwa muri Yezu Kristo hamwe nikuzo rihoraho .
55002011	Iri jambo ni iryukuri : “ Niba twarapfanye na we , na none tuzabanaho na we .
55002012	Nitugumya kwihangana , tuzimana ingoma na we . Nitumwihakana , na we azatwihakana .
55002013	Niyo twamuhemukira we ahora ari indahemuka , kuko atabasha kwica Isezerano . ”
55002014	Ibyo byose ujye ubyibutsa abantu bose , ubihanangirize utanze Imana ho umugabo , ngo birinde amagambo atera impaka kuko nta cyo amaze , uretse gusenya abayumva .
55002015	Ujye wihatira kwishyīra Imana nk'umukozi ushimwa , utagomba guterwa isoni n'umurimo ayikorera , ahubwo ujye uvuga Ijambo ryayo ry'ukuri uko riri .
55002016	Naho amagambo y'amanjwe y'abatemera Imana ujye uyagendera kure , kuko abayasamarira barushaho kutayubaha .
55002017	Inyigisho zabo zimunga abantu nk'igisebe cy'umufunzo . Muri abo harimo Himeneyo na Fileto .
55002018	Barateshutse bareka ukuri , bavuga ko izuka ry'abapfuye ryarangiye . Bityo bagatesha bamwe Kristo bemeraga .
55002019	Nyamara haracyariho ifatizo rikomeye ryashyizweho n'Imana , rirangwa n'iri jambo ngo : “ Nyagasani azi abe ” , kandi ngo : “ Uvuga ko ari uwa Nyagasani wese nareke gukora ibibi . ”
55002020	Mu nzu nini ntihaba ibikoresho by'izahabu n'iby'ifeza gusa , haba hari n'ibindi byakozwe mu biti no mu ibumba . Bimwe bigenerwa imirimo y'icyubahiro , ibindi imirimo isuzuguritse .
55002021	Uwiboneza rero akimaraho ibyo bibi , azaba igikoresho kigenewe imirimo y'icyubahiro , cyeguriwe nyira cyo kikamugirira akamaro , kandi gikwiranye n'ibikorwa byiza byose .
55002022	Irari rya gisore ujye urigendera kure , ahubwo ushishikarire kuba intungane n'indahemuka no kugira urukundo n'amahoro , ufatanyije n'abandi biyambaza Nyagasani bataryarya .
55002023	Naho impaka ziterwa n'ubujiji n'amanjwe ujye uzirinda , kuko uzi ko zibyara amahane .
55002024	Erega ntibikwiye ko umugaragu wa Nyagasani agira amahane , ahubwo akwiriye kuba umugwaneza kuri bose , ushoboye kwigisha kandi wihangana .
55002025	Agomba kwigisha abamurwanya afite ubugwaneza . Ahari Imana yazabemeza kwihana bagasobanukirwa neza ukuri kwayo ,
55002026	bityo bakabasha kwisubiraho maze bakigobotora mu mitego y'umwanzi Satani , wabagize imbohe ze ngo bakore ibyo ashaka .
55003001	Umenye neza ko mu minsi y'imperuka hazaza ibihe bikomeye .
55003002	Abantu bazaba bikunda , bakunda ifaranga , birata , bikuza , batuka Imana , batumvira ababyeyi . Bazaba ari indashima , batubaha Imana ,
55003003	badakunda ababo , batagira impuhwe , babeshyerana , bahubuka . Bazaba ari abanyarugomo n'abanzi b'ibyiza ,
55003004	abagambanyi n'ibyihebe n'abikakaza . Bazaba bakunda ibibanezeza aho gukunda Imana .
55003005	Bazigira nk'abubaha Imana , ariko bahinyura ububasha bitera . Abo bose ujye ubagendera kure .
55003006	Bamwe muri bo bakunda gusesera mu mazu , bakigarurira ingirwabagore zashenguwe n'ibyaha , zigengwa n'irari ry'uburyo butari bumwe .
55003007	Ni abantu bahora biga iby'Imana , ariko ntibigere bamenya ukuri kwayo .
55003008	Nk'uko Yane na Yambure barwanyije Musa , ni na ko abo bantu barwanya ukuri . Ni abantu bafite ubwenge bwononekaye , kandi ukwemera Kristo kwabo kwarahinyutse .
55003009	Ariko rero nta ho bizabageza kuko ubupfu bwabo buzagaragarira bose , nk'uko byagenze kuri Yane na Yambure .
55003010	Ariko wowe wakurikije neza ibyo nigisha n'uko nifata n'ibyo ngamije . Uzi kandi ukwizera kwanjye n'ukwihangana kwanjye , urukundo rwanjye n'ukudacogora kwanjye .
55003011	Uzi n'ukuntu natotejwe , ndetse n'amakuba nagiriye mu mujyi wa Antiyokiya n'uwa Ikoniyo n'uw'i Lisitira . Mbega ngo ndatotezwa ! Nyamara ibyo byose Nyagasani yarabinkijije .
55003012	Erega n'ubundi abashaka bose guhora bubaha Imana , kubera Kristo Yezu ni ukuri bazatotezwa !
55003013	Naho abagizi ba nabi n'abashukanyi bazarushaho kuba babi , bayobye abandi na bo bagire ababayobya .
55003014	Ariko wowe ukomere ku byo wigishijwe ukiyemeza ko ari iby'ukuri , kandi ukaba uzi neza ababikwigishije .
55003015	Uhereye mu buto bwawe wamenye Ibyanditswe Imana yatugeneye , bibasha kukumenyesha ubwenge bwo kukugeza ku gakiza , ubikesha kwizera Kristo Yezu .
55003016	Ibyo Byanditswe byose byahumetswe n'Imana , kandi bifite akamaro ko kwigisha umuntu ukuri no kwamagana ibibi , gukosora umuntu no kumumenyereza gutunganira Imana ,
55003017	kugira ngo umuntu w'Imana abe ashyitse kandi atunganyirijwe rwose gukora ibyiza byose .
55004001	Ndakwihanangiriza ntanze Imana ho umugabo , hamwe na Kristo Yezu uzacira imanza abazima n'abapfuye , no kubera ukuza kwe aje kwima ingoma ye ,
55004002	utangaze Ijambo ry'Imana , urivuge mu gihe cyiza no mu gihe gikomeye . Ukosore abantu , ubacyahe , ubahugure ufite kubihanganira no kubigisha ubutitsa .
55004003	Koko igihe kizaza abantu bamwe be kwihanganira inyigisho zishyitse , ahubwo bakurikize ibyifuzo byabo bwite . Bityo bazikoranyirizaho abigisha benshi bababwira ibihuje n'ibyo bashaka kumva .
55004004	Bazajya bica amatwi ngo batumva ukuri , ahubwo bahindukirire ibitekerezo by'imburamumaro .
55004005	Nyamara wowe uramenye , uko byaba kose ujye wirinda muri byose , wihanganire kubabazwa , ukore umurimo wo gutangaza Ubutumwa bwiza , bityo urangize umurimo washinzwe n'Imana .
55004006	Naho jyewe dore ubu ngiye gutangwa ho igitambo . Igihe cyanjye cyo kwitarura kirageze .
55004007	Narwanye intambara nziza , nageze aho dusiganirwa kugera kandi Kristo twemera namukomeyeho .
55004008	Ahasigaye nteganyirijwe ikamba ry'ubutungane , iryo Nyagasani azangororera we mucamanza utabera , umunsi azazaho . Si jye jyenyine azariha , ahubwo azariha n'abantu bose bazaba bafitiye ubwuzu kumubona aje .
55004009	Wihatire kungeraho vuba ,
55004010	kuko Dema yantereranye abitewe no gukunda iby'iyi si . Yigiriye i Tesaloniki , Kiresensi ajya mu ntara ya Galati , naho Tito ajya mu ya Dalumatiya .
55004011	Luka wenyine ni we turi kumwe . Uzaze unzaniye Mariko kuko angirira akamaro mu murimo .
55004012	Tikiko namutumye Efezi .
55004013	Uzaze unzaniye igishura nasize i Tirowa kwa Karupo , hamwe n'ibitabo cyane cyane iby'imizingo y'uruhu .
55004014	Umucuzi Alegisanderi yankoreye ibibi byinshi . Nyagasani azamugirira ibikwiranye n'ibyo yakoze .
55004015	Nawe umwirinde kuko yarwanyije inyigisho zacu bikomeye .
55004016	Mu iburana ryanjye rya mbere nta wamperekeje , bose barantereranye . Imana ntizabibahōre .
55004017	Nyagasani we twari kumwe , bityo ampa ububasha ngo ntangaze Ubutumwa bwiza mu batari Abayahudi bose babwumve . Bityo yangobotoye nk'umvanye mu rwasaya rw'intare .
55004018	Nyagasani azandokora ibibi byose bangirira , hanyuma azangeze mu bwami bwe bwo mu ijuru . Nahabwe ikuzo uko ibihe bihaye ibindi . Amina .
55004019	Tashya Purisila na Akwila , kimwe n'ab'urugo rwa Onesiforo .
55004020	Erasito yagumye i Korinti , naho Tirofimo namusize i Mileto arwaye .
55004021	Uzagerageze kuza mbere y'amezi y'imbeho . Ubulo na Pudensi na Lino na Kilawudiya n'abavandimwe bose ngo mutahe .
55004022	Nyagasani abane nawe . Nagumye kubagirira ubuntu mwese .
56001001	Jyewe Pawulo umugaragu w'Imana nkaba n'Intumwa ya Yezu Kristo , natumwe ku bo Imana yitoranyirije ngo mbageze ku kwizera Kristo no kumenya ukuri guhuje no kūbaha Imana ,
56001002	kugira ngo biringire kuzabona ubugingo buhoraho Imana itabeshya yasezeranye kuva kera kose .
56001003	Mu gihe kigenwe igaragaza Ubutumwa bwayo , maze inshinga umurimo wo kubutangaza nkurikije itegeko ry'iyo Mana Umukiza wacu .
56001004	Ndakwandikiye Tito mwana wanjye by'ukuri , bitewe no kwemera Kristo dusangiye . Imana Data nikugirire ubuntu , iguhe n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Kristo Yezu Umukiza wacu .
56001005	Icyatumye nkurekera i Kireti ni ukugira ngo utunganye ibyasigaye bitari ku murongo , no gushyira abakuru b'itorero ry'Imana muri buri mujyi ukurikije amabwiriza naguhaye .
56001006	Buri wese muri bo agomba kuba indakemwa akaba n'umugabo ufite umugore umwe , abana be bakaba bemera Kristo , batarangwaho kuba ibyomanzi cyangwa ibyigomeke .
56001007	Erega n'ubundi umuyobozi w'Umuryango w'Imana agomba kuba indakemwa , kubera ko ashinzwe ibintu byayo ! Ntakwiye kuba mudakurwakwijambo cyangwa umunyamujinya , cyangwa umunywi w'inzoga cyangwa umurwanyi , cyangwa se umuntu wiruka ku nyungu zishingiye ku buhemu .
56001008	Agomba kuba umuntu ukunda kwakira abashyitsi , kandi agakunda n'icyitwa icyiza cyose . Agomba kuba ashyira mu gaciro , ari intungane n'inyangamugayo kandi azi kwifata .
56001009	Agomba kuba akomeye ku magambo adahinyuka ahuje n'ibyo yigishijwe . Ubwo ni bwo azashobora gukomeza abandi akoresheje inyigisho zishyitse , kandi agatsinda abamugisha impaka .
56001010	Koko rero hariho benshi b'ibyigomeke bavuga amagambo y'amanjwe kandi babeshya , cyane cyane Abayahudi bihambira ku muhango wo gukebwa .
56001011	Ni ngombwa kubacecekesha , kuko hari ingo bageramo bakazisenya rwose bigisha ibidakwiye , babiterwa no guharanira inyungu zishingiye ku buhemu .
56001012	Umuhanuzi umwe wo mu Banyakireti ubwabo yaravuze ati : “ Abanyakireti iteka ni ababeshyi , ni inyamaswa zuzuye ubugome , ni inda nsa kandi ni inkorabusa . ”
56001013	Ibyo ahamya ni ukuri . Ni cyo gituma ukwiye kubacyaha ukomeje , kugira ngo bemere Kristo ku buryo bushyitse ,
56001014	bareke kwihambira ku bitekerezo bidafite ishingiro by'Abayahudi no ku mabwiriza y'abantu bacurika ukuri .
56001015	Abatunganye nta kitabatunganira , naho abanduye imitima batemera Kristo nta na kimwe kibatunganira , ubwenge bwabo buba bwononekaye n'imitima yabo iba itakibashinja ikibi .
56001016	Bemeza ko bazi Imana , nyamara ibyo bakora bikabavuguruza . Ni indashoboka n'intumvira , nta cyiza na kimwe wabashinga gukora .
56002001	Wowe ujye wemeza abantu imyifatire ihuye n'inyigisho ziboneye .
56002002	Abasaza ubabwire ngo be gutegekwa n'inda , ahubwo biyubahe , bashyire mu gaciro , bemere Kristo ku buryo bushyitse , bagire n'urukundo kandi be gucogora .
56002003	Abakecuru na bo ni uko , ubabwire bifate uko bikwiye abantu bubaha Imana . Ntibabe abanyamazimwe cyangwa abaja b'inzoga . Ahubwo bajye bigisha abandi ibyiza .
56002004	Bamenyereze abagore bakiri bato gukunda abagabo babo n'abana babo ,
56002005	babigishe kuba abanyangesonziza no kutiyandarika , no gukorera ingo no kugira umutima , no kwemera kugengwa n'abagabo bashakanye kugira ngo hatagira utuka Ijambo ry'Imana .
56002006	Abasore na bo ubihanangirize utyo , kugira ngo mu byo bakora byose bajye bashyira mu gaciro . Nawe witange ho urugero rwibikorwa byiza . Mu kwigisha abantu ube indakemwa kandi wiyubahe . Abasore na bo ubihanangirize utyo , kugira ngo mu byo bakora byose bajye bashyira mu gaciro . Nawe witange ho urugero rwibikorwa byiza . Mu kwigisha abantu ube indakemwa kandi wiyubahe .
