56002008	Ibyo ubabwira bibe bishyitse kandi bitagayitse , kugira ngo abaturwanya bamware babure ikibi batuvugaho .
56002009	Abagaragu b'inkoreragahato bemere kugengwa na ba shebuja ku buryo bwose babashimisha , batabavuguruza
56002010	kandi nta cyo babība . Ahubwo babe indahemuka rwose , kugira ngo baheshe agaciro inyigisho z'Imana Umukiza wacu ku buryo bwose .
56002011	Erega ubuntu bw'Imana bwamaze kugaragara , ni bwo sōko y'agakiza ku bantu bose !
56002012	Ubwo buntu butwigisha kuzinukwa imico mibi yo kutubaha Imana no kurarikira iby'isi , kugira ngo muri ibi bihe bya none tumenye kwifata , tugire n'imibereho itunganye yo kubaha Imana .
56002013	Ni na ko dukwiye kumera tugitegereje umunsi muhire dufitiye ubwuzu , ubwo Yezu Kristo ari we Mana yacu ikomeye n'Umukiza azaza afite ikuzo .
56002014	Ni we witanze kugira ngo aducungure , atuvane mu bugome bwose kandi ngo atweze , atugire abantu be bwite bafite ishyaka ryo gukora ibyiza .
56002015	Ibyo ni byo ugomba kumenyesha abakumva , ubakomeze kandi ubacyahe , ukoresheje ubushobozi bwose wahawe . Ntihakagire n'umwe ugusuzugura .
56003001	Ujye wibutsa Abakristo bose kwemera kugengwa n'abatware n'abandi bafite ubushobozi , no kubumvira no guhora biteguye gukora ikintu cyose cyiza .
56003002	Ntibakagire uwo basebya , ahubwo birinde amahane biyoroshye iteka , babere bose abagwaneza .
56003003	Burya natwe twahoze turi abapfu n'indakoreka turi mu buyobe . Twari mu buja bw'irari ribi n'ubw'umudamararo ku buryo butari bumwe . Twari abagome n'abanyeshyari , twangwa natwe twangana .
56003004	Ariko igihe kigeze , Imana Umukiza wacu igaragaza ubuntu igirira abantu n'urukundo ibakunda ,
56003005	ni ko kudukiza , itabitewe n'uko twakoze ibiyitunganiye , ahubwo ibitewe n'imbabazi zayo . Yadukirishije kutwuhagira , iduha kuvuka ubwa kabiri no guhindurwa bashya na Mwuka Muziranenge .
56003006	Mwuka uwo Imana yamudusakajeho itaziganya , ikoresheje Yezu Kristo Umukiza wacu .
56003007	Kwari ukugira ngo tuyitunganire kubera ubuntu yatugiriye , duhabwe n'umunani ari wo bugingo buhoraho twiringiye kuzahabwa .
56003008	Iryo jambo ni iry'ukuri . Ndashaka ko wita ukomeje kuri izo ngingo , kugira ngo abantu bose bafitiye Imana icyizere bashishikarire bihebuje gukora ibyiza . Ibyo nta ko bisa , ni na byo bifitiye abantu akamaro .
56003009	Naho impaka z'amanjwe n'ibyerekeye ibisekuruza , n'intonganya n'imburanya zishingiye ku Mategeko ujye ubigendera kure . Nta kamaro bifite , nta n'aho bigeza umuntu .
56003010	Umuntu uca ibice mu ba Kristo , numara kumuburira ubwa mbere n'ubwa kabiri umwigizeyo .
56003011	Urabizi umuntu nk'uwo aba yariyandaritse , ni umunyabyaha , ibibi akora ni byo bimushinja .
56003012	Nimara kugutumaho Aritema cyangwa Tikiko , uzagerageze kunsanga i Nikopoli kuko ari ho niyemeje kumara amezi y'imbeho .
56003013	Gira umwete wo gutegura urugendo rwa Apolo n'urwa Zena umuhanga mu kuburanira abantu , kugira ngo batazagira icyo babura .
56003014	Abantu bacu nibimenyereze gushishikarira ibikorwa byiza kugira ngo babone uko bagoboka abandi , bityo be kuba imburamumaro .
56003015	Abo turi kumwe bose baragutashya . Tashya abadukunda dusangiye kwemera Kristo . Nyagasani nagumye kubagirira ubuntu mwese .
57001001	Jyewe Pawulo waboshywe mpōrwa Yezu Kristo , jye n'umuvandimwe Timoteyo , turakuramutsa ncuti yacu Filemoni dusangiye umurimo ,
57001002	tutibagiwe na mushiki wacu Afiya na Arikipo , dufatanyije kuba ku rugamba kimwe n'itorero rya Kristo rikoranira mu rugo rwawe .
57001003	Imana Data nibagirire ubuntu , ibahe n'amahoro , ifatanyije na Nyagasani Yezu Kristo .
57001004	Filemoni , igihe cyose nsenze ndakuzirikana ngashimira Imana yanjye ,
57001005	kuko numva bavuga ukuntu wizera Nyagasani Yezu , ugakunda n'intore z'Imana zose .
57001006	Ndasaba Imana ngo ukwizera Kristo dusangiye kukugirire akamaro , gutume urushaho gusobanukirwa ibyiza byose duheshwa na we .
57001007	Muvandimwe , urukundo rwawe rwanteye ibyishimo , rundema n'agatima kuko wahumurije intore z'Imana .
57001008	Ubusanzwe rero mfite uburenganzira mpabwa na Kristo , bwo kugutegeka gukora ibikwiriye nta cyo nishisha .
57001009	Nyamara kuko ngukunda mpisemo ahubwo kubigusaba . Jyewe Pawulo , ubu ugeze mu zabukuru nkaba ndi n'imfungwa mpōrwa Kristo Yezu ,
57001010	ndakwinginga ku byerekeye Onezimo . Ni umwana wanjye nibyariye ndi ku ngoyi .
57001011	Uwari warakubereye imburamumaro , ubu atubereye twembi ingirakamaro .
57001012	Ndamukoherereje rero nguwo ni ubura bwanjye .
57001013	Mba narahisemo kumwigumanira hano ngo ankorere mu mwanya wawe , ndi ku ngoyi mpōrwa Ubutumwa bwiza .
57001014	Nyamara nta cyo nashatse gukora utakinyemereye , kugira ngo ineza wagira uyigire ku bwende bwawe atari uko ubihatiwe .
57001015	Ubirebye , Onezimo yaba yaratandukanye nawe by'akanya gato , kugira ngo uzamwakire mubane iteka
57001016	atakiri umugaragu w'inkoreragahato , ahubwo arenze kuba umugaragu , abaye umuvandimwe w'inkoramutima . Jyewe ubwanjye ni ko mubona ndetse cyane , ariko wowe uzarushaho kumubona utyo kubera imibanire isanzwe no kubera kuba umwe muri Nyagasani .
57001017	Niba rero wumva ko turi umwe , umwakire nk'aho ari jye wakiriye .
57001018	Niba kandi yaragufudikiye cyangwa hari icyo agomba kukwishyura , ube ari jye ubibaraho .
57001019	Ibi ni jye Pawulo ubyiyandikiye n'ukwanjye kuboko , nzamwishyurira . Siniriwe nkwibutsa umwenda nawe undimo . Erega uwo mwenda ni wowe ubwawe !
57001020	Nyabuneka muvandimwe , ungirire ubwo buntu kubera Nyagasani , bityo uraba ufatanyije na Kristo kundema agatima .
57001021	Nkwandikiye niringiye ko uzanyumvira , ugakora ibyo ngusabye ndetse ukarushaho .
57001022	Si ibyo gusa , muntegurire n'icumbi kuko niringira ko Imana yumvise amasengesho yanyu , ikazangarura muri mwe .
57001023	Epafura tubohanywe duhōrwa Kristo Yezu aragutashya ,
57001024	kimwe na Mariko na Arisitariko , na Dema na Luka dufatanyije umurimo .
57001025	Nyagasani Yezu Kristo nagumye kubagirira ubuntu .
58001001	Kera Imana yamenyesheje ba sogokuruza ibyayo kenshi no ku buryo bwinshi , ibatumyeho abahanuzi .
58001002	Ariko ubu tugeze mu gihe cy'imperuka , yatumenyesheje ibyayo idutumyeho Umwana wayo . Uwo ni we yateganyije guha byose ho umunani , kandi ni na we yakoresheje kurema byose .
58001003	Uwo Mwana w'Imana ni we urabagirana ho ikuzo ryayo , ni na we ubonekwaho n'imiterere yayo nyakuri . Ni we ushyigikiye ibintu byose kubera ububasha bw'ijambo rye . Arangije umurimo wo kweza abantu akabahanaguraho ibyaha , yicaye mu ijuru ku ntebe ya cyami iburyo bw'Imana nyir'ubuhangange .
58001004	Imana yahaye uwo Mwana wayo gusumba kure abamarayika , nk'uko izina yahawe risumba iryabo .
58001005	Koko nta mumarayika n'umwe Imana yigeze ibwira iti :
58001006	Nyamara kandi igihe Imana yoherezaga impfura yayo ku isi , yaravuze iti : “ Abamarayika bose bImana nibamuramye . ”
58001007	Ku byerekeye abamarayika yaravuze iti : “ Igira abamarayika bayo imiyaga , abo bagaragu bayo ibagira ibirimi byumuriro . ”
58001008	Naho ku byerekeye Umwana wayo iravuga iti : “ Mana , ingoma yawe ihoraho iteka ryose , abantu bawe ubategekesha ubutabera .
58001009	Ukunda ubutungane ukanga ubugome , ni yo mpamvu Imana ari yo Mana yawe yagusīze amavuta , yakurobanuye muri bagenzi bawe , igusendereza ibyishimo .”
58001010	Na none iti : “ Nyagasani , mbere na mbere wahanze isi , ijuru na ryo ni umurimo wintoki zawe .
58001011	Ibyo bizashiraho ariko wowe uzahoraho , byose bizasaza nkumwambaro .
58001012	Uzabizingazinga nkuzingazinga umwenda , bizahindurwa nkuko imyambaro ihinduranywa . Ariko wowe uzahora uri uko wahoze , ntuzigera ugira iherezo . ”
58001013	Nta mumarayika numwe Imana yigeze ibwira iti : “ Icara ku ntebe ya cyami iburyo bwanjye , nanjye nzahindura abanzi bawe nkakabaho ukandagizaho ibirenge . ”
58001014	None se abamarayika ni iki ? Bose ni ingabo zo mu ijuru zikorera Imana , zatumwe gufasha abagenewe guhabwa agakiza ho umunani .
58002001	Ni cyo gituma tugomba kwita cyane ku byo twumvise , kugira ngo tutayoba tukagenda buheriheri .
58002002	Ubutumwa bwavuzwe n'abamarayika bwari bukaze , ku buryo ababucumuyeho ntibabwumvire , bahawe igihano kibakwiriye .
58002003	None se twebwe tuzarokoka dute niba twirengagiza agakiza gakomeye gatyo ? Ibyerekeye ako gakiza byabanje gutangazwa na Nyagasani , maze ababyumvise batwemeza ko ari ukuri .
58002004	Imana na yo ishyigikira ibyo bemeje itanga ibimenyetso , ikora ibitangaza n'ibindi bikorwa by'ububasha bitari bimwe , inagaba impano za Mwuka Muziranenge uko ishatse .
58002005	Erega si abamarayika Imana yahaye kugenga isi izabaho , ari na yo tuvuga !
58002006	Ahubwo mu Byanditswe hari uwavuze ati : Igihe Imana yeguriraga umuntu ibintu byose nta na kimwe yasize . Nyamara kugeza ubu ntiturabona koko umuntu agenga byose .
58002007	Habuzeho gato ngo umuntu umugire nkabamarayika , wamutamirije ikamba ryikuzo nicyubahiro ,
58002008	byose urabimuha kugira ngo abigenge . ” Igihe Imana yeguriraga umuntu ibintu byose nta na kimwe yasize . Nyamara kugeza ubu ntiturabona koko umuntu agenga byose .
58002009	Ahubwo Yezu ni we tubona , yacishijwe bugufi , abamarayika bamusumba ho gato . Kwari ukugira ngo anyure mu rupfu , abigiriye abantu bose — ubwo ni bwo buntu Imana yagize . Ariko none yambitswe ikuzo n'icyubahiro nk'ikamba , abitewe n'urupfu yapfuye .
58002010	Imana yaremye byose ibigira ibyayo . Byari bikwiye rero ko itunganya Yezu bidasubirwaho imucishije mu mibabaro , kuko ari we wagenewe kuyobora abantu ku gakiza . Kwari ukugira ngo Imana igeze ku ikuzo ryayo abantu benshi yagize abana bayo .
58002011	Ari Yezu ugeza abantu ku Mana ari n'abo ayigezaho , bose bafite inkomoko imwe . Ni cyo gituma Yezu atagira isoni zo kuvuga ko ari abavandimwe be .
58002012	Nuko akabwira Imana ati :
58002013	Akongera akavuga ati : “ Imana ni yo nzaba mfitiye icyizere ” , kandi ati : “ Dore ndi hano hamwe nabana Imana yampaye . ”
58002014	Ubwo rero abo yagize abana bayo bahūzwa no kugira umubiri n'amaraso , Yezu na we ubwe yabihuriyeho na bo . Kwari ukugira ngo kubera urupfu rwe anyage Satani ubushobozi , we wagengaga imbaraga z'urupfu ,
58002015	maze avane mu buja ababubayemo kuva bakivuka babitewe no gutinya urupfu .
58002016	Erega si abamarayika yaje kugoboka , ahubwo ni urubyaro rwa Aburahamu !
58002017	Kubera iyo mpamvu yagombaga guhinduka , akamera nk'abavandimwe be ku buryo bwose , kugira ngo abe Umutambyi mukuru udahemuka kandi ugira imbabazi , ahagararire abantu imbere y'Imana , ahongerere ibyaha byabo kugira ngo bababarirwe .
58002018	Nuko rero abasha kugoboka abageragezwa , kubera ko na we yageragejwe akababazwa .
58003001	Bavandimwe , Imana yarabatoranyije ibahamagarira guhabwa umugabane w'ibyiza by'ijuru . Nuko rero nimuzirikane Yezu , uwo Imana yagize Intumwa yayo n'Umutambyi mukuru , kandi akaba ari we dukesha kwemera ibyayo mu ruhame .
58003002	Ni indahemuka ku Mana yamuhamagariye uwo murimo , kimwe na Musa wabaye indahemuka mu byo yamushinze byose .
58003003	Nk'uko umwubatsi ahabwa icyubahiro kirenze icy'inzu yubatse , ni na ko Yezu akwiye guhabwa ikuzo risumba irya Musa .
58003004	Inzu yose igira uwayubatse , naho Imana ni yo mwubatsi wa byose .
58003005	Musa yabaye indahemuka , ari umugaragu wo gukorera inzu yose y'Imana , ashinzwe kugaragaza ibyari kuzavugwa na yo .
58003006	Naho Kristo we yabaye indahemuka , ari Umwana wayo ushinzwe gutegeka inzu yayo . Iyo nzu ni twe niba dukomeye ku byo twiringiye dushize amanga [ kugeza ku iherezo ] .
58003007	Ni cyo gituma mu Byanditswe Mwuka Muziranenge avuga ati :
58003008	ntimunangire imitima nka cya gihe cyimyivumbagatanyo , wa munsi mwangeragezaga mu butayu ,
58003009	ubwo ba sokuruza bangeragezaga bampinyuza , nubwo bari biboneye ibyo nakoze .
58003010	Ni cyo cyatumye ndakarira abicyo gihe imyaka mirongo ine . Ni ko kuvuga nti : ‘ Bahora bateshuka , ntibagenza uko nshaka . ’
58003011	Nuko ndahirana uburakari nti : ‘ Ntibateze kwinjira aho kuruhukira nagennye . ’ ”
58003012	Bavandimwe , muramenye ntihakagire n'umwe muri mwe wagira umutima mubi utizera bigatuma yimūra Imana nzima .
58003013	Ahubwo mukomezanye buri munsi mu gihe cyose hacyitwa “ uyu munsi ” , kugira ngo hatagira uwo ibyaha bishuka akinangira .
58003014	Twahawe gukorana na Kristo , niba tukimufitiye icyizere twatangiranye kuzageza ku iherezo .
58003015	Dore uko Ibyanditswe bibivuga :
58003016	Ni ba nde bumvise ijwi ryImana nyamara bakivumbagatanya ? Ni ba bandi bose bavuye mu Misiri bayobowe na Musa !
58003017	Ni ba nde se Imana yarakariye imyaka mirongo ine ? Ni ba bandi bacumuye , imirambo yabo igakwira mu butayu !
58003018	Ni ba nde se kandi Imana yarahiye ko batazinjira ha hantu ho kuruhukira yagennye ? Ni ba bandi banze kuyumvira !
58003019	Tubona kandi ko batabashije kuhinjira , bitewe nuko batizera Imana .
58004001	Haracyariho Isezerano ryo kwinjira aho kuruhukira Imana yagennye . Nuko rero twitonde , hato hatazaboneka n'umwe muri mwe waryivutsa .
58004002	Erega natwe twabwiwe Ubutumwa bwiza nk'uko ba bandi ba kera babubwiwe ! Bo nta cyo bwabamariye , kuko igihe babwumvaga batabwemeye ngo bizere Imana .
58004003	Naho twebwe abayizeye , twinjira aho kuruhukira yagennye . Aho ni ha handi yavuze iti :
58004004	koko kandi , hari aho Ibyanditswe bivuga ibyerekeye umunsi wa karindwi biti : “ Ku munsi wa karindwi , Imana iruhuka imirimo yose yari yakoze . ”
58004005	Aho na none Ibyanditswe birongera biti : “ Ntibazinjira aho kuruhukira nagennye . ”
58004006	Aba mbere bagejejweho Ubutumwa bwiza ntibinjiye aho hantu kubera kutumvira Imana kwabo . Bityo haracyari umwanya wabandi bashaka kuhinjira .
58004007	Ni cyo gituma Imana yongeye gushyiraho umunsi , ari wo “ uyu munsi . ” Bitinze cyane yongeye kubivuga nka mbere , ikoresheje Dawidi wavuze ati : “ Uyu munsi nimwumva icyo Imana ibabwira , ntimwinangire imitima . ”
58004008	Koko kandi iyo Yozuwe aza kubageza aho baruhukira , Imana ntiyari kuzashyiraho undi munsi .
58004009	Nuko rero haracyariho isabato ari cyo kiruhuko kigenewe abantu b'Imana ,
58004010	kuko uwinjiye aho kuruhukira Imana yagennye aba aruhutse imirimo ye , nk'uko Imana yaruhutse iyayo .
58004011	Nuko rero twihatire kwinjira aho hantu ho kuruhukira , kugira ngo hatagira n'umwe ukurikiza urugero rwa ba bandi batumviye Imana , maze akīvutsa icyo kiruhuko .
58004012	Ijambo ry'Imana ni rizima kandi rifite imbaraga , rirusha gutyara inkota zose zifite ubugi impande zombi . Ricengera mu muntu rikagera mu mahuriro y'ubuzima n'umwuka , no ku y'ingingo n'umusokoro , kandi rigatahura ibyo umutima utekereza n'ibyo ugamije .
58004013	Mu byaremwe byose nta cyo Imana ihishwa . Ahubwo byose bitwikuruwe nk'ibyambitswe ubusa imbere yayo , yo tuzamurikira ibyo twakoze .
58004014	Nuko rero ubwo dufite Umutambyi mukuru ukomeye , wagiye mu ijuru akagera imbere y'Imana , ari we Yezu Umwana w'Imana , nimucyo dukomere ku byo twemera kandi twamamaza .
58004015	Umutambyi mukuru dufite ntananirwa kubabarana natwe mu ntege nke zacu , ndetse yageragejwe ku buryo bwose nkatwe uretse ko nta cyaha yakoze .
58004016	Nuko rero nidushire umususu twegere intebe ya cyami y'Imana igira ubuntu , kugira ngo duhabwe imbabazi tugirirwe n'ubuntu , bitume dutabarwa mu gihe gikwiye .
58005001	Umutambyi mukuru wese atoranywa mu bantu kandi agahagararira abantu imbere y'Imana . Umurimo we ni ugusohoza amaturo n'ibitambo kubera ibyaha byabo .
58005002	Abasha korohera no gufata neza injiji n'abakunda kuyoba , kuko na we ubwe agira ibimutera intege nke .
58005003	Kubera iyo mpamvu ntagomba guhongerera ibyaha bya rubanda gusa , ahubwo agomba no guhongerera ibyaha bye bwite .
58005004	Nta muntu washobora kwiha icyubahiro cyo kuba Umutambyi mukuru , ahubwo agihabwa n'Imana yabimutoranyirije nk'uko byagenze kuri Aroni .
58005005	Kristo na we ntiyihaye ikuzo ryo kuba Umutambyi mukuru , ahubwo yarihawe n'Imana yamubwiye iti :
58005006	Na none hari ahandi Imana yavuze iti : “ Uri umutambyi iteka ryose , mu buryo bwa Melikisedeki .”
58005007	Mu gihe Yezu yari akiri ku isi yasenze yinginga , aniha cyane , abogoza n'amarira , atakambira Imana ifite ububasha bwo kumukiza urupfu . Nuko iramwumva kubera ko yayiyeguriye .
58005008	Nubwo yari Umwana w'Imana , yigishijwe kuyumvira n'imibabaro yagize .
58005009	Nuko amaze kuba indakemwa , yabereye abamwumvira bose isōko y'agakiza gahoraho .
58005010	Imana ni ko kumugira Umutambyi mukuru mu buryo bwa Melikisedeki .
58005011	Hari byinshi twavuga kuri ibyo nyamara birakomeye kubisobanura , kuko musigaye muri intumva .
58005012	Urebye igihe mumaze mwari mukwiye kuba abigisha b'abandi , ariko namwe muracyakeneye kwigishwa iby'ifatizo byerekeye inyigisho ziva ku Mana . Aho gutungwa n'ibiryo bikomeye , muracyakeneye amata .
58005013	Umuntu ugitungwa n'amata gusa aba akiri umwana , aba ataraca akenge ku byo gutunganira Imana .
58005014	Naho abantu bakuze bo batungwa n'ibiryo bikomeye , kuko baba baragize akamenyero ko gutandukanya ikibi n'icyiza .
58006001	Nuko rero twe kugarukira gusa ku nyigisho z'ibanze zerekeye Kristo , ahubwo dutere imbere dusingire izikwiriye abakuze . Twe kwirirwa tugaruka ku mahame y'ishingiro ari yo aya : kwihana ibikorwa bitagira umumaro no kwizera Imana ,
58006002	inyigisho zerekeye kubatiza kutari kumwe no kurambikwaho ibiganza , kuzuka kw'abapfuye n'urubanza rw'iteka .
58006003	Tuzatera imbere dutyo Imana nibishaka .
58006004	Nimwibaze ku bantu Imana yigeze kumurikira bagasogongera ku mpano yayo iva mu ijuru , kandi bagahabwa kuri Mwuka Muziranenge bakanumva uburyohe bwIjambo ryImana , bakibonera ibikorwa byububasha bwayo biranga ibihe bishya bizaza , nyamara bakarenga bagahakana Kristo bari bemeye . Abameze batyo nta washobora kubagarura ngo bihane , kuko bo ubwabo baba barongeye kubamba Umwana wImana bakamukoza isoni ku mugaragaro . Nimwibaze ku bantu Imana yigeze kumurikira bagasogongera ku mpano yayo iva mu ijuru , kandi bagahabwa kuri Mwuka Muziranenge bakanumva uburyohe bwIjambo ryImana , bakibonera ibikorwa byububasha bwayo biranga ibihe bishya bizaza , nyamara bakarenga bagahakana Kristo bari bemeye . Abameze batyo nta washobora kubagarura ngo bihane , kuko bo ubwabo baba barongeye kubamba Umwana wImana bakamukoza isoni ku mugaragaro . Nimwibaze ku bantu Imana yigeze kumurikira bagasogongera ku mpano yayo iva mu ijuru , kandi bagahabwa kuri Mwuka Muziranenge bakanumva uburyohe bwIjambo ryImana , bakibonera ibikorwa byububasha bwayo biranga ibihe bishya bizaza , nyamara bakarenga bagahakana Kristo bari bemeye . Abameze batyo nta washobora kubagarura ngo bihane , kuko bo ubwabo baba barongeye kubamba Umwana wImana bakamukoza isoni ku mugaragaro .
58006005	
58006006	
58006007	Iyo imvura ihamije umurindi ubutaka bugasoma , bukera imyaka ifitiye ababuhinze akamaro , Imana iba ibuhaye umugisha .
58006008	Nyamara iyo bumeze amahwa n'ibitovu nta cyo buba bumaze , buba busigaje kuvumwa amaherezo bukazatwikwa .
58006009	Nyamara ncuti dukunda , nubwo tuvuga dutyo turahamya rwose ko mwebweho mukunda ibyiza by'ingenzi bihuje n'agakiza .
58006010	Imana ntirenganya , nta n'ubwo izibagirwa ibikorwa byanyu n'ukuntu mwagaragaje ko muyikunda , ubwo mwagobokaga intore zayo na n'ubu mukaba mukizigoboka .
58006011	Icyo twifuza ni uko buri wese akomeza uwo mwete kugeza ku iherezo , kugira ngo ibyo mwiringiye bibe binonosowe .
58006012	Mwe kuba abanebwe ahubwo mwigane abizera Imana bakihangana , bikabahesha umunani yabasezeranyije .
58006013	Ubwo Imana yahaga Aburahamu Isezerano yageretseho indahiro yo kurishyigikira , ndetse irahira izina ryayo ubwayo kuko nta wundi uyisumba yari kurahira .
58006014	Iravuga iti : “ Nzaguha umugisha , kandi nzagwiza abazagukomokaho . ”
58006015	Nuko rero Aburahamu amaze gutegereza yihanganye , ashyikira ibyo Imana yamusezeranyije .
58006016	Ubusanzwe abantu barahira izina ry'ubarusha gukomera , iyo ndahiro ikababera icyemezo cyo gukemura impaka hagati yabo .
58006017	Bityo Imana yashatse kwereka abafite uruhare ku byo yasezeranye , ko icyo yiyemeje kitazigera gihinduka . Ni cyo cyatumye igereka indahiro ku Isezerano .
58006018	Ibyo byombi ni ibintu bidahinduka kandi Imana yabivuze ntibasha kubeshya . Ni na byo bidukomeza cyane twebwe abamaze kuyīsunga , tugasingira ibyo twiringiye kuzahabwa .
58006019	Kwiringira ibyo ni ko gukomeza imitima yacu , nk'uko umugozi uzirika ubwato ukabukomeza ngo budatwarwa . Ni ikiziriko kidacika , kitarekura , gicengera hirya y'umwenda ukingirije cya Cyumba kizira inenge cyane .
58006020	Aho ni ho Yezu yatubanjirije kwinjira ngo tubone kumukurikira . Yabaye Umutambyi mukuru iteka ryose mu buryo bwa Melikisedeki .
58007001	Melikisedeki uwo yari umwami w'i Salemu akaba n'umutambyi w'Imana Isumbabyose . Ubwo Aburahamu yatabarukaga atsinze ba bami , Melikisedeki ni we wamusanganiye amusabira umugisha .
58007002	Nuko Aburahamu amutura kimwe cya cumi cy'ibyo yari yagaruje byose . Iryo zina Melikisedeki risobanura ngo : “ Umwami nyir'ubutungane . ” Byongeye kandi akaba n'umwami w'i Salemu , ari byo bivuga : “ Umwami w'amahoro . ”
58007003	Melikisedeki uwo nta kizwi ku byerekeye se na nyina habe n'igisekuru , nta kizwi no ku byerekeye ivuka rye cyangwa urupfu rwe . Agereranywa n'Umwana w'Imana , ahora ari umutambyi iteka ryose .
58007004	Nimwirebere namwe ukuntu uwo muntu akomeye ! Dore nawe Sogokuruza Aburahamu yamutuye kimwe cya cumi cy'ibyo yari yanyaze ku rugamba !
58007005	Abo mu rubyaro rwa Levi ni bo beguriwe umurimo wo gusohoza ibitambo , ni na bo bonyine Amategeko yashinze kwaka rubanda kimwe cya cumi , ni ukuvuga bene wabo nubwo abo bose na bo bari bakomotse kuri Aburahamu .
58007006	Naho Melikisedeki we ntabwo ari uwo mu rubyaro rwa Levi , nyamara kandi Aburahamu yamutuye kimwe cya cumi cy'ibyo yari afite . Yahesheje Aburahamu umugisha ari we wari warahawe amasezerano n'Imana .
58007007	Nta wahakana ko uhesha abandi umugisha aruta uwuhabwa .
58007008	Bityo urubyaro rwa Levi ruhabwa kimwe cya cumi kandi ari abantu bapfa , nyamara Melikisedeki wagihawe Ibyanditswe bivuga ko ahoraho .
58007009	Ubirebye , Levi – ukomokwaho nurubyaro ruhabwa kimwe cya cumi – na we ubwe yaragitanze . Dore impamvu : nubwo yari ataravuka hari ukuntu yari mu mubiri wa sekuruza Aburahamu , igihe Melikisedeki yazaga kumusanganira akakira ituro rye . Ubirebye , Levi – ukomokwaho nurubyaro ruhabwa kimwe cya cumi – na we ubwe yaragitanze . Dore impamvu : nubwo yari ataravuka hari ukuntu yari mu mubiri wa sekuruza Aburahamu , igihe Melikisedeki yazaga kumusanganira akakira ituro rye .
58007010	
58007011	Umurimo w'abatambyi bakomokaga kuri Levi ni wo wari ishingiro ry'Amategeko yahawe Abisiraheli . Nuko rero iyo abo batambyi bajya kunonosora umurimo wabo , ntibiba byarabaye ngombwa ko habaho umutambyi wundi ukurikije umurongo wa Melikisedeki , aho gukurikiza uwa Aroni .
58007012	Koko kandi iyo umurongo w'abatambyi uhindutse , ni ngombwa ko Amategeko ubwayo ahinduka .
58007013	Uvugwaho ibyo byose ni Umwami wacu Yezu kandi rero ni uwo mu wundi muryango , nta wo muri uwo muryango wigeze guhabwa umurimo wubutambyi . Birazwi ko Umwami wacu akomoka mu muryango wa Yuda , kandi Musa nta cyo yigeze awuvugaho ku byerekeye ubutambyi . Uvugwaho ibyo byose ni Umwami wacu Yezu kandi rero ni uwo mu wundi muryango , nta wo muri uwo muryango wigeze guhabwa umurimo wubutambyi . Birazwi ko Umwami wacu akomoka mu muryango wa Yuda , kandi Musa nta cyo yigeze awuvugaho ku byerekeye ubutambyi .
58007014	
58007015	Ngiyi impamvu irushaho kubigaragaza neza : ni uko habonetse undi mutambyi umeze nka Melikisedeki .
58007016	Ntiyagizwe umutambyi bikurikiza amabwiriza agenga igisekuru cy'abantu , ahubwo bikurikiza ububasha afite bwo kubaho ubuziraherezo .
58007017	Ibyanditswe bivuga ibye biti : “ Uri umutambyi iteka ryose mu buryo bwa Melikisedeki . ”
58007018	Nuko imitegekere ya kera iba ivuyeho , kuko nta bushobozi nta n'umumaro yari ifite .
58007019	Erega Amategeko nta cyo yanonosoraga ! Ahubwo haje ibindi turushaho kwiringira byo kutwegereza Imana .
58007020	Ikindi kandi byaje bigeretsweho n'indahiro y'Imana , naho abandi batambyi bashyirwagaho nta ndahiro nk'iyo .
58007021	Nyamara Yezu yagizwe Umutambyi hageretsweho indahiro , igihe Imana yagiraga iti :
58007022	Ni yo mpamvu Yezu yatubereye umwishingizi wIsezerano ryImana riruta iryo yagiranye nabayo kera .
58007023	Si byo byonyine , abatambyi basanzwe babaye benshi cyane bitewe n'uko babuzwaga n'urupfu guhora ku murimo .
58007024	Naho Yezu we ni Umutambyi uhoraho iteka , ntawe uzigera amuzungura kuri uwo murimo .
58007025	Ni cyo gituma abasha gukiza byimazeyo abegera Imana banyuze kuri we , kuko abereyeho iteka kubavugira kuri yo .
58007026	Nuko rero Yezu ni we Mutambyi mukuru twari dukeneye , ntagira inenge cyangwa amakemwa cyangwa umugayo . Yatandukanyijwe n'abanyabyaha ashyirwa mu ijuru ahasumba byose .
58007027	We rero si kimwe n'abandi batambyi bakuru , kuko atari ngombwa buri munsi ko abanza gutura igitambo cyo guhongerera ibyaha bye , ngo abone guhongerera ibyaha bya rubanda . Igitambo yagisohoje rimwe rizima , ubwo yitangagaho igitambo .
58007028	Abatambyi bakuru Amategeko ashyiraho na bo ni abanyantegenke . Nyamara nyuma y'ayo Mategeko , Imana yashyizeho undi mutambyi igerekaho n'indahiro . Uwo ni Umwana wayo yagize Umutambyi mukuru w'indakemwa iteka ryose .
58008001	Mu byo tuvuga ijambo ry'ingenzi ni iri : dufite Umutambyi mukuru umeze utyo , wicaye mu ijuru iburyo bw'intebe ya cyami y'Imana nyir'ubuhangange .
58008002	Ashinzwe umurimo w'ubutambyi aheguriwe Imana , ni ukuvuga mu Ihema nyakuri ritashyizweho n'umuntu , ahubwo ryashyizweho na Nyagasani .
58008003	Umutambyi mukuru wese ashyirirwaho gusohoza amaturo n'ibitambo . Ni ngombwa rero ko n'uyu wacu agira icyo atura .
58008004	Iyo aza kuba ku isi ntabwo yari kuba umutambyi , kuko hasanzwe hari abandi bagenewe gusohoza amaturo bakurikije Amategeko .
58008005	Umurimo ukorwa n'abo batambyi ni ikigereranyo kiranga ibikorerwa mu ijuru . Ni cyo cyatumye Imana yihanangiriza Musa , igihe yari agiye gushinga rya Hema ry'ibonaniro , iramubwira iti : “ Itegereze neza igishushanyombonera werekewe kuri uyu musozi , muzakore ibintu byose migikurikije . ”
58008006	Naho ubu umurimo Yezu ashinzwe usumbye kure uw'abo bandi , kuko ari umuhuza w'Isezerano rishya . Ni Isezerano rihebuje irya kera kuba ryiza kandi rishingiye ku byasezeranyijwe bihebuje .
58008007	Iyo Isezerano rya mbere ritaza kugira inenge , ntibyari kuba ngombwa kurisimbuza irindi rya kabiri .
58008008	Ni yo mpamvu Imana igaya abantu bayo ibabwira iti :
58008009	Ntabwo rizaba rimeze nkirya kera nagiranye na ba sekuruza , igihe nabafataga akaboko nkabavana mu Misiri . Nyamara ntibitaye kuri iryo Sezerano , ni na cyo gituma nanjye ntabitayeho . Ni jye Nyagasani ubivuze .
58008010	Noneho ngiri Isezerano nzagirana nAbisiraheli nyuma yicyo gihe : nzashyira amategeko yanjye mu bwenge bwabo , nzayandika mu mitima yabo . Nzaba Imana yabo , na bo bazaba abantu banjye . Ni jye Nyagasani ubivuze .
58008011	Nta numwe muri bo uzagomba kwigisha mugenzi we cyangwa umuvandimwe we ati : ‘ Menya Nyagasani ’ , kuko bose bazamenya uhereye ku muto ukageza ku mukuru .
58008012	Nzabababarira ibicumuro byabo , ibyaha byabo sinzabyibuka ukundi . ”
58008013	Ubwo Imana yavugaga ko iryo Sezerano ari rishya , kwari ukuvuga ko irya mbere rigizwe irya kera , kandi rero ikintu cyiswe icya kera kiba gishaje , kikaba cyenda kuvaho burundu .
58009001	Mu Isezerano rya mbere harimo amabwiriza agenga kuramya Imana kw'abayo , n'Ingoro bayisengeramo ku isi .
58009002	Ihema ryarashinzwe , icyumba cya mbere cyaryo cyitwa “ Icyumba kizira inenge ” . Aho habaga igitereko cy'amatara n'ameza yashyirwagaho imigati yatuwe Imana .
58009003	Hagakurikiraho umwenda ukingiriza icyumba cya kabiri cyitwa “ Icyumba kizira inenge cyane ” .
58009004	Ni ho habaga igicaniro cy'izahabu batwikiragaho imibavu , kandi hakaba n'Isanduku y'Isezerano yometsweho izahabu impande zose . Muri iyo Sanduku habagamo urwabya rukozwe mu izahabu rurimo manu , hakabamo na ya nkoni ya Aroni yamezeho udushibu , hakabamo na bya bisate by'amabuye byanditsweho Amategeko ashingiyeho rya Sezerano .
58009005	Hejuru y'iyo Sanduku hari amashusho y'abakerubi . Amababa yabo yatwikiraga aho bahongereraga ibyaha . Icyakora iki si cyo gihe cyo kurondora ibyo byose mu magambo arambuye .
58009006	Byose bimaze gutegurwa bityo , buri gihe abatambyi binjiraga mu cyumba cya mbere cy'Ihema , kugira ngo bakore imirimo ibagenewe .
58009007	Naho mu cyumba cya kabiri , Umutambyi mukuru wenyine ni we wahinjiraga rimwe mu mwaka gusa . Nabwo ntiyahinjiraga atajyanye amaraso y'ibitambo , ngo ayature Imana ho icyiru cy'ibyaha bye n'ibya rubanda byakozwe kubera ubujiji .
58009008	Bityo rero Mwuka Muziranenge yerekanaga ko hataraboneka inzira igeza mu Cyumba kizira inenge cyane , mu gihe hakiriho rya Hema rya mbere .
58009009	Ibyo bishushanya iby'iki gihe turimo . Byerekana ko amaturo n'ibitambo bihora biturwa Imana bitabasha guhindura ababitura indakemwa , ku buryo bagira imitima itabarega ikibi .
58009010	Bishingiye ku byokurya n'ibyokunywa , no ku mihango itari imwe yo guhumanura . Ni imihango igaragara gusa , yashyizweho kugeza igihe Imana yategekeye ko byose bivugururwa .
58009011	Ariko Kristo ahingutse , yaje ari Umutambyi mukuru uzaduhesha ibyiza mu bihe bizaza . Ihema akoreramo ni indashyikirwa kandi ni ingirakamaro kurusha irisanzwe . Ntiryakozwe n'abantu , si n'iryo mu byaremwe tubona .
58009012	Ubwo Kristo yinjiraga rimwe na rizima mu Cyumba kizira inenge cyane , ntiyabiheshejwe n'amaraso y'ibitambo by'amasekurume y'ihene cyangwa ibimasa , ahubwo yabiheshejwe n'amaraso ye bwite ngo abone kuducungura iteka ryose .
58009013	Ubusanzwe amaraso y'amasekurume y'ihene n'ay'impfizi , kimwe n'ivu ry'ishashi iyo biminjagiwe ku muntu wahumanye , bituma umubiri we uhumanuka .
58009014	Ubwo bimeze bityo , mbega ukuntu amaraso ya Kristo azarushaho kuduhumanura ! Kubera Mwuka uhoraho yihaye Imana ho igitambo kidafite inenge . Amaraso ye ni yo azaduhumanura , adukize ibikorwa bituzanira urupfu turegwa n'imitima yacu , kugira ngo dukorere Imana nzima .
58009015	Ni cyo gituma Kristo aba umuhūza ku byerekeye Isezerano rishya Imana yagiranye n'abayo , ari ryo murage mushya . Bityo abo Imana yahamagaye bashobora kuragwa umunani uhoraho yasezeranyije abantu bayo . Ibyo babikesha urupfu rwa Kristo rwababereye incungu , ngo bave mu byaha bakoze mu gihe bagengwaga na rya Sezerano rya mbere .
58009016	Iyo habaye icyemeza uko umurage wateganyijwe , ni ngombwa guhinyuza ko nyir'ukuraga yapfuye .
58009017	Erega umurage ugira agaciro igihe nyir'ukuraga amaze gupfa , nta cyo uba uvuze igihe akiriho !
58009018	Ni cyo gituma Isezerano rya mbere ry'Imana na ryo ritari kugerwaho hatabanje kumenwa amaraso .
58009019	Musa yabanje guha rubanda rwose amabwiriza yose , akurikije Amategeko yari yarahawe . Ni ko gufata amaraso y'ibimasa n'ay'amasekurume y'ihene hamwe n'amazi , ayamisha ku gitabo cy'Amategeko no kuri rubanda rwose , akoresheje umushandiko w'uduti tubigenewe n'ubwoya bw'intama butukura .
58009020	Ni ko kuvuga ati : “ Aya ni amaraso ahamya Isezerano Imana yagiranye namwe ngo muryubahirize . ”
58009021	Kandi na rya Hema n'ibikoresho byose by'imihango yo kuramya Imana , na byo Musa abimishaho amaraso .
58009022	Ndetse ukurikije Amategeko , hafi ibintu byose bigomba guhumanurwa hakoreshejwe amaraso , kandi hatamenwe amaraso ntihabaho kubabarirwa ibyaha .
58009023	Nuko ubwo bya bindi bishushanya ibyo mu ijuru byagombaga guhumanurwa na bene ibyo bitambo , ibyo mu ijuru nyir'izina biba bikeneye guhumanurwa n'ibitambo birushaho kubonera .
58009024	Erega Kristo ntiyinjiye mu Cyumba kizira inenge cyubatswe n'abantu , gishushanya gusa icyo mu ijuru ! Ahubwo yagiye mu ijuru nyir'izina , ubu ni ho ari aduhagarariye imbere y'Imana .
58009025	Ubusanzwe Umutambyi mukuru yinjira mu Cyumba kizira inenge cyane uko umwaka utashye , atuye amaraso atari aye . Naho Kristo we ntiyahinjijwe hato na hato no kwitanga ho igitambo .
58009026	Iyo biba bityo yari kubabazwa akicwa incuro nyinshi kuva isi yaremwa . Ariko muri iki gihe giheruka ibindi yabonetse rimwe rizima , yitanga ho igitambo cyo kumaraho ibyaha .
58009027	Umuntu wese agenewe gupfa rimwe gusa , nyuma yabyo agacirwa urubanza .
58009028	Ni na ko Kristo yatambwe rimwe rizima , yigeretseho ibyaha by'abantu benshi . Ahasigaye azagaruka ubwa kabiri atazanywe no gukuraho ibyaha , ahubwo azaniye abamutegereje agakiza .
58010001	Amategeko ni nk'igishushanyo gusa cy'imigisha tuzahabwa , ntabwo ari iyo migisha nyir'izina . Nta na rimwe rero yabasha guhindura indakemwa abaza kuramya Imana . Nta n'ubwo bya bitambo bihora ari bimwe byabikora , nubwo babitamba hato na hato buri mwaka .
58010002	Iyo biza kugenda bityo , mbese ntibaba bararekeye aho kubitamba ? Baba barejejwe rimwe rizima , bakaba batagifite imitima ibashinja ibyaha .
58010003	Ibiri amambu , umumaro w'ibyo bitambo ni ukwibutsa abantu ibyaha byabo buri mwaka .
58010004	Erega amaraso y'ibimasa n'ay'amasekurume y'ihene ntabwo abasha kuvanaho ibyaha !
58010005	Ni cyo gituma Kristo aje ku isi yabwiye Imana ati :
58010006	Ibitambo bikongorwa nibyo guhongerera ibyaha si byo bigushimisha .
58010007	Nuko ndavuga nti : ‘ Dore ndaje , Mana , nzanywe no gukora ibyo ushaka , nkuko byanditswe kuri jye mu muzingo wigitabo cyAmategeko . ’ ”
58010008	Yabanje kuvuga ati : “ Ibitambo namaturo , ari ibitambo bikongorwa numuriro cyangwa ibyo guhongerera ibyaha , si byo washatse kandi si byo bigushimisha ” , kandi ibyo bitambo yavuze ari byo biturwa nkuko Amategeko abiteganya .
58010009	Ahita yungamo ati : “ Dore ndaje . Mana , nzanywe no gukora ibyo ushaka . ” Ni ko gukuraho bya bitambo bya mbere abisimbuza igitambo kindi gishya .
58010010	Kubera ubwo bushake bwayo , tweguriwe Imana tuba intore zayo , tubikesha igitambo Yezu Kristo yatuye rimwe rizima ari cyo mubiri we .
58010011	Umutambyi wese ahora ahagurutswa no gukora umurimo we , agatamba ibitambo bya buri munsi bitabasha na gato kuvanaho ibyaha .
58010012	Naho Kristo we amaze gusohoza igitambo kimwe gikuraho ibyaha ku buryo budasubirwaho , yicaye ku ntebe ya cyami iburyo bw'Imana .
58010013	Kuva ubwo ategereje ko Imana igira abanzi be nk'akabaho akandagizaho ibirenge .
58010014	Bityo bitewe n'igitambo cye kimwe , Kristo yamaze kugira indakemwa abo ahindura intore z'Imana .
58010015	Mwuka Muziranenge na we ni ko abitwemeza . Abanza kugira ati :
58010016	“ Ngiri Isezerano nzagirana na bo nyuma yicyo gihe , nzashyira amategeko yanjye mu mitima yabo , nzayandika mu bwenge bwabo . Ni jye Nyagasani ubivuze . ”
58010017	Arongera ati : “ Ibyaha byabo nibicumuro byabo sinzabyibuka ukundi . ”
58010018	Koko kandi iyo habayeho kubabarirwa ibyaha , ntibiba bikiri ngombwa kubitambira ibitambo .
58010019	Noneho bavandimwe , dufite uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri cya Cyumba kizira inenge cyane nta cyo twishisha , tubikesha amaraso Yezu yatumeneye .
58010020	Yaduciriye inzira nshya igeza mu bugingo . Iyo nzira inyura mu mwenda ukingirije cya Cyumba , ni ukuvuga ko inyura mu mubiri we .
58010021	Ikindi kandi dufite Umutambyi mukuru ukomeye , ushinzwe inzu y'Imana .
58010022	Nuko rero nimucyo twegere Imana tutaryarya kandi tuyizeye tudashidikanya , imitima yacu yejejwe ngo ibe itakiturega ikibi , n'imibiri na yo yuhagiwe n'amazi asukuye .
58010023	Dukomeze kuvuga ku mugaragaro ibyo twiringiye tudahungabana , kuko Imana yaduhaye amasezerano ari indahemuka .
58010024	Twite kandi kuri bagenzi bacu , duterane umwete wo gukundana no kugira neza .
58010025	Twirinde kubura mu materaniro , nk'uko bamwe babigize akamenyero . Ahubwo turusheho gukomezanya , kubera ko umunsi wa Nyagasani wegereje nk'uko mubireba .
58010026	Nidukomeza gukora ibyaha nkana kandi twaramaze kumenya ukuri , nta gitambo kiba kikiriho cyo guhongerera ibyaha .
58010027	Ahubwo ikiba gisigaye ni ugutegerezanya ubwoba urubanza rw'Imana , n'umuriro ukaze uzatsemba abayirwanya .
58010028	Umuntu wese wishe Amategeko ya Musa agashinjwa n'abagabo babiri cyangwa barenzeho , agomba kwicwa nta mbabazi .
58010029	Mwibaze namwe rero uko bizamera ku muntu uzaba yaratesheje agaciro Umwana w'Imana , akandavuza amaraso ahamya Isezerano ryayo ari na yo yamugize intore yayo , agatuka na Mwuka ugira ubuntu ! Mbega igihano gikomeye umuntu wagize atyo azaba akwiye !
58010030	Koko kandi tuzi neza uwavuze ati : “ Guhōra ni ukwanjye , ni jye uzītura . ” Kandi akongera ati : “ Nyagasani azacira abantu be urubanza . ”
58010031	Biteye ubwoba gutabwa muri yombi n'Imana nzima !
58010032	Mwibuke ibyababayeho mu bihe bya mbere . Muri iyo minsi mukimara kumurikirwa n'Imana , mwaratewe mubona ibibababaza byinshi maze iyo ntambara muyīfatamo kigabo .
58010033	Rimwe kwari ugutukwa no kugirirwa nabi ku mugaragaro . Ubundi kandi kwari ukwifatanya n'abagirirwa bene ibyo .
58010034	Koko kandi mwababaranye n'abari mu minyururu , kandi mwemera ko ibyanyu bisahurwa ndetse murabyishimira . Mwitwaje ko mufite ubukungu buhebuje kandi buhoraho .
58010035	Nuko rero kuvuga mushize amanga ntimukabitezukeho , kuko ari byo bizabahesha ingororano ikomeye .
58010036	Icyo mukeneye ni ukwihangana kugira ngo mukore ibyo Imana ibashakaho , mubone kwegukana ibyo yasezeranye .
58010037	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga biti :
58010038	Umuntu untunganiye azabeshwaho no kunyizera , ariko nasubira inyuma sinzamwishimira . ”
58010039	Twe rero ntituri mu basubira inyuma bakajya kurimbuka , ahubwo turi mu bizeye Imana bakazegukana ubugingo .
58011001	Kwizera Imana ni ukwemera ko umaze guhabwa ibyo wiringiye kuzabona , kandi ni ukumenya udashidikanya ko ibyo utareba biriho .
58011002	Uko kwizera ni ko kwatumye aba kera bashimwa n'Imana .
58011003	Kwizera Imana bitwumvisha ukuntu yavuze maze ijuru n'isi bikabaho , ku buryo ibyo abantu bareba byakomotse ku bitagaragara .
58011004	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Abeli ayitura igitambo kiyishimishije kiruta icya Kayini . Ni na ko kwatumye yemerwa ko atunganiye Imana , na yo igashima amaturo ye . Nubwo yapfuye uko kwizera kwe gutuma na n'ubu akivuga .
58011005	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Henoki yimurwa ku isi atagombye gupfa , ntihagira uwongera kumuca iryera kuko Imana yamujyanye . Kandi byanditswe ko atarimurwa yari yarayinogeye .
58011006	Icyakora nta wabasha kunogera Imana atayizera , kuko uyisanga wese agomba kwemera ko ibaho kandi ko igororera abayishaka .
58011007	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Nowa yita ku byo yaburiwe na yo ku byerekeye ibigiye kuzaba , nubwo yari atarabibona . Nuko yubaka ubwato bunini , we n'umuryango we bari kuzahungiramo umwuzure . Bityo ibyo Nowa yakoze byatumye ab'isi batsindwa n'urubanza , maze Imana imuha umugabane ku butungane iha abayizera .
58011008	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Aburahamu ayumvira igihe yamuhamagaraga , akimukira mu gihugu yari kuzahabwa ho umunani . Nuko agenda atazi iyo ajya .
58011009	Kwizera Imana kwanatumye Aburahamu aba nk'umushyitsi muri icyo gihugu Imana yamusezeranyije . Aba mu mahema kimwe na Izaki na Yakobo , na bo basezeranyijwe uwo munani kimwe na we .
58011010	Erega Aburahamu yari ategereje kuzatura mu murwa wahanzwe n'Imana ubwayo , kandi wubatswe na yo ku mfatiro zikomeye !
58011011	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Sara abasha gusama inda , n'ubwo yari ageze mu zabukuru kandi ari n'ingumba . Impamvu ni uko yizeye ko Imana itazabura gukora ibyo yasezeranye kuko ari indahemuka .
58011012	Bityo rero umukambwe umwe na we wasaga n'uwapfuye , akomokwaho n'abantu banganya ubwinshi n'inyenyeri zo ku ijuru n'umusenyi wo ku nkombe z'inyanja .
58011013	Abo bose bapfuye bagifitiye Imana icyizere . Bari batarahabwa ibyo yabasezeranyije , icyakora babireberaga kure bakabyishimira . Bemeraga ku mugaragaro ko ari abashyitsi n'abagenzi kuri iyi si .
58011014	Abavuga batyo baba beruye ko bashaka igihugu cyabo bwite .
58011015	Iyo baza rero gukumbura igihugu bari baravuyemo , bari bagifite uburyo bwo gusubirayo .
58011016	Ahubwo bifuzaga igihugu kirusha icyo kuba cyiza , ari icyo mu ijuru . Ni cyo gituma Imana idakorwa n'isoni zo kwitwa Imana yabo , ndetse yabateguriye umurwa bazaturamo .
58011017	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Aburahamu atura Izaki ho igitambo , ubwo yamusuzumaga ngo irebe ko yayumvira . Aburahamu yemeye gutanga uwo mwana we w'ikinege , kandi ari we yari yarahawe ho amasezerano .
58011018	Imana yari yaramubwiye iti : “ Izaki ni we uzakomokwaho n'urubyaro nagusezeranyije . ”
58011019	Aburahamu yibwiraga ko nubwo umuntu yaba apfuye , Imana ibasha kumuzura . Ubigereranyije rero yagaruriwe Izaki nk'uzutse .
58011020	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Izaki aha Yakobo na Ezawu umugisha ku byo bazahabwa bwanyuma .
58011021	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Yakobo atarapfa aha umugisha abahungu bombi ba Yozefu . Yabikoze yishingikirije inkoni ye , asingiza Imana .
58011022	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Yozefu ajya kwitārūra , ahanura ko urubyaro rwa Isiraheli ruzava mu Misiri , agena n'ibyerekeye amagufwa ye .
58011023	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye ababyeyi ba Musa bamuhisha amezi atatu amaze kuvuka . Babonye ko ari umwana mwiza ntibatinya kurenga ku itegeko ry'umwami wa Misiri .
58011024	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Musa ubwo yari amaze gukura , yanga kwitwa umuhungu w'umukobwa w'umwami wa Misiri .
58011025	Ahubwo yiyemeza kugirirwa nabi hamwe n'ubwoko bw'Imana , abirutisha ibyishimo by'igihe gito yaterwa no gukora ibyaha .
58011026	Yasangaga ko guteshwa agaciro nka Kristo ari ubukungu buruta kure umutungo wose w'igihugu cya Misiri , kuko yari arangamiye ingororano yari kuzahabwa .
58011027	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Musa ava mu Misiri , adatinya uburakari bw'umwami waho . Ntiyatezuka kuko yari arangamiye Imana itaboneka nk'uyiruzi .
58011028	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwamuteye kandi gushyiraho umuhango wa Pasika , maze ategeka ko basīga amaraso ku miryango , kugira ngo uwazaga gutsemba abana b'impfura bose atagira icyo atwara Abisiraheli .
58011029	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye Abisiraheli bambuka Inyanja Itukura , ari nko kunyura ku butaka bwumutse . Nyamara Abanyamisiri babigerageje bararohama .
58011030	Kwizera Imana ni ko kwatumye inkuta z'umujyi wa Yeriko ziritagurika , Abisiraheli bamaze kuzizenguruka iminsi irindwi .
58011031	Kwizera Imana ni na ko kwatumye ya ndaya yitwa Rahabu idapfana n'abatumvira Imana , kubera ko yakiriye abatasi neza .
58011032	Nongere mvuge iki se kandi ? Igihe cyambana gito , nshatse kurondora ibya Gideyoni na Baraki na Samusoni , na Yefute na Dawidi na Samweli ndetse n'abahanuzi .
58011033	Kubera ukwizera Imana kwabo bigaruriye ibihugu , bashinga ubutabera maze basingira ibyo Imana yari yarabasezeranyije . Babumbye iminwa y'intare ,
58011034	bazimya umuriro ugurumana , barokoka ubugi bw'inkota . Mu mwanya w'intege nke bahabwa imbaraga . Ku rugamba ntihagira ubahangara , ahubwo bahashya ibitero by'abanyamahanga .
58011035	Abagore bahabwa ababo bazuwe mu bapfuye . Abandi bishwe urubozo ntibemera kurengerwa , kugira ngo bazazuke bahabwe ubugingo buhebuje .
58011036	Bamwe bahawe urw'amenyo bakubitwa ibiboko , naho abandi baboheshwa iminyururu barohwa muri gereza .
58011037	Bamwe bicishijwe guterwa amabuye , abandi gukererwamo kabiri , naho abandi bicishwa inkota . Bazereraga bambaye impu z'intama n'iz'ihene badafite gifasha , batotezwa kandi bagirirwa nabi .
58011038	Yemwe , n'isi ntiyari ikwiye ko bayibamo ! Bazereraga ahadatuwe no mu misozi , bakibera mu buvumo no mu masenga .
58011039	Abo bose Imana yarāse ukwizera kwabo , nyamara bapfuye batarahabwa ibyo yabasezeranyije .
58011040	Erega natwe Imana yaduteganyirije ibyiza bihebuje , ku buryo abo batari kugirwa indakemwa byuzuye tutari hamwe na bo !
58012001	Natwe rero ubwo tuzengurutswe n'imbaga ingana ityo y'abahamije ibyo bizera , tureke ibitubuza gutambuka n'ibyaha bikunda kutuganza , maze twihatire kwiruka turangize gusiganwa twateganyirijwe tudacogoye .
58012002	Duhange Yezu amaso we nkomoko y'ukwizera kwacu , akaba ari na we ukunonosora . Yihanganiye kubambwa ku musaraba ntiyita ku isoni bimutera , kuko yazirikanaga ibyishimo abikiwe . Ubu yicaye iburyo bw'intebe ya cyami y'Imana .
58012003	Nuko nimumwibuke , muzirikane ukuntu yihanganiye kurwanywa bene ako kageni n'abanyabyaha , kugira ngo mudacogora mugacika n'intege .
58012004	Erega mu ntambara muhanganye n'ibyaha , ntimuragera aho kumena amaraso yanyu !
58012005	Kandi rero mwibagiwe ya magambo yo kubakomeza Imana yababwiye nk'ubwira abana be iti :
58012006	Koko rero Nyagasani acyaha uwo akunda , uwo yemera wese ko ari umwana we ni we acishaho umunyafu . ”
58012007	Noneho mwihanganire guhanwa nImana , kuko ari uko ibafata nkabana bayo . Mbese ye , wabona umwana udahanwa na se ?
58012008	Niba rero mudahanwa nkuko umwana wese ahanwa na se , ntimuba muri abana bImana nyakuri , ahubwo muba mubaye ibibyarirano .
58012009	Ba data batubyaye ku buryo busanzwe ko baduhanaga tukabubaha , ubwo se Data watubyaye ku buryo bwa Mwuka , ntitugomba kurushaho kwemera kugengwa na we ngo tubeho ?
58012010	Ba data baduhanaga uko babyumvaga na bwo byigihe gito , naho uguhana kwImana Data bidufitiye akamaro ko kugira ngo tugire uruhare ku buziranenge bwayo .
58012011	Nta muntu uhanwa ngo muri ako kanya bimushimishe , ahubwo biramubabaza . Nyamara ababyitoje amaherezo bibabyarira amahoro nubutungane .
58012012	Kubera iyo mpamvu nimukomeze amaboko ananiwe n'amavi adandabirana .
58012013	Muhange inzira zigororotse , kugira ngo ucumbagira ukuguru kwe kudahuhuka ahubwo gukire .
58012014	Mwihatire kubana n'abantu bose mu mahoro no kuba abaziranenge , kuko nta n'umwe utari we uzabona Nyagasani .
58012015	Murabe maso kugira ngo hatagira ucogora ngo yivutse ubuntu Imana igira . Ntihakagire umuntu uba nk'umuzi mubi ushibuka ukēra imbuto zisharira , maze agateza impagarara mu bantu , akanduza rubanda .
58012016	Ntihakagire umuntu uba umusambanyi , cyangwa usuzugura iby'Imana nka Ezawu . Ezawu uwo yari umwana w'impfura , maze ubutware bwe bw'umwana w'impfura abugurana igaburo rimwe .
58012017	Muzi ko bitinze yashatse ko se amuraga umugisha umukwiye maze ntawuhabwe . Ntiyari agishoboye guhindura ibyo yari yarakoze nubwo yabishatse arira .
58012018	Mwe rero ntimuri nk'Abisiraheli ba kera , ngo mube mwegereye umusozi wa Sinayi umuntu yakoza intoki . Aho ni ho babonaga umuriro ugurumana n'umwijima w'icuraburindi , bakumva n'umuyaga w'ishuheri
58012019	n'impanda zivuga n'ijwi rirangīra . Abumvise iryo jwi basabye bakomeje ko ritongera kuvuga rwose .
58012020	Ntibabashaga kwihanganira kumva ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru agira ati : “ Uzakora kuri uyu musozi wese azicishwa amabuye , niriba n'itungo muzarigenze mutyo . ”
58012021	Ibyo babonaga byari biteye ubwoba koko , ku buryo na Musa yavuze ati : “ Ndatinye cyane , ndahinda umushyitsi . ”
58012022	Ahubwo mwegereye umusozi Siyoni n'umurwa w'Imana , nzima ari wo Yeruzalemu yo mu ijuru , n'abamarayika ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakoraniye mu mwidagaduro .
58012023	Mwegereye n'imbaga y'abana b'impfura b'Imana amazina yabo akaba yanditswe mu ijuru . Mwegereye kandi Imana umucamanza wa bose , n'abapfuye ari intungane bagizwe indakemwa .
58012024	Ndetse mwegereye na Yezu Umuhuza w'Imana n'abagengwa n'Isezerano rishya , n'amaraso ye yamishwe adusabira ibyiza kurusha aya Abeli .
58012025	Muramenye ntimwange kumva uvuga ! Abanze kumva uwababuriye ku isi ntibanze no guhanwa . Twe rero byaba bikabije . Twazahungira he igihano niba twirengagiza utuburira wo mu ijuru ?
58012026	Cya gihe ijwi ry'Imana ryatigishije isi , na n'ubu ni yo ituburira , iti : “ Hasigaye rimwe gusa , sintigise isi yonyine , ahubwo nzatigisa n'ijuru . ”
58012027	Iryo jambo ngo : “ Hasigaye rimwe … ” , rigaragaza ko ibyaremwe byose bizatigiswa bikavanwaho , kugira ngo hagumeho ibidashobora guhungabanywa n'umutingito .
58012028	Dushimire Imana rero ko yaduhaye ubwami budashobora guhungabanywa . Bityo tuyisenge uko ishaka , tuyubaha kandi tuyitinya .
58012029	Erega Imana yacu ni nk'umuriro ukongora !
58013001	Ntimuhweme gukundana bya kivandimwe .
58013002	Ntimukibagirwe no kwakira abashyitsi . Erega hari bamwe babikoze , basanga bakiriye abamarayika batabizi !
58013003	Muzirikane abanyururu nk'aho mufunganywe na bo . Mwibuke n'abagirirwa nabi , muzirikane ko namwe mufite umubiri .
58013004	Gushyingiranwa kubahwe n'abantu bose , kandi he kugira uwo mu bashakanye wandavuza uburiri bwabo asambana , kuko ibyomanzi n'abasambanyi Imana izabacira urubanza .
58013005	Ntimugatwarwe n'inyota y'ifaranga ahubwo munyurwe n'ibyo mufite , kuko Imana yavuze iti : “ Sinzabasiga , nta n'ubwo nzabatererana na gato . ”
58013006	Ni cyo gituma tuvuga nta cyo twishisha tuti :
58013007	Mujye mwibuka abayobozi banyu babagejejeho Ijambo ry'Imana . Muzirikane uko babayeho n'uko bapfuye , maze mukurikize urugero rwo kwizera Imana kwabo .
58013008	Yezu Kristo uko yari ari ejo na none ni ko ari , ni na ko azahora iteka ryose .
58013009	Ntimugateshwe inzira n'inyigisho zitari zimwe z'inzaduka . Icyiza ni uko imitima yacu yatungwa n'ubuntu Imana igira , aho gutungwa n'ibyokurya twategetswe n'amategeko kandi nta cyo bimarira abayakurikiza .
58013010	Twe dufite urutambiro rundi , abatambyi bakora mu Ihema risanzwe ntibemerewe kurya ku bitambirwa kuri rwo .
58013011	Ubusanzwe Umutambyi mukuru ajyana amaraso y'amatungo atuwe Imana mu Cyumba kizira inenge cyane , akayatanga ho impongano y'ibyaha , naho inyama zigatwikirwa inyuma y'inkambi .
58013012	Ni cyo gituma Yezu yaraguye inyuma y'irembo rya Yeruzalemu , kugira ngo rubanda abegurire Imana akoresheje amaraso ye bwite .
58013013	Noneho rero nimucyo dusohoke tumusange inyuma y'inkambi , twemeye guteshwa agaciro nka we .
58013014	Erega nta mujyi uhoraho dufite hano ku isi , ahubwo twifuza umujyi uteganyijwe kuzaboneka !
58013015	Nuko rero ntiduhweme gutura Imana ibitambo by'ishimwe tubikesha Yezu . Ni ukuvuga ngo tujye tuyogeza mu ruhame , bibe ari byo bisesekara ku minwa yacu .
58013016	Ntimukibagirwe kugira neza no gusangira ibyo mufite , kuko bene ibyo ari byo bitambo bishimisha Imana .
58013017	Mwumvire ababayobora kandi mwemere kugengwa na bo , kuko ari bo bashinzwe ubugingo bwanyu bakazabubazwa n'Imana . Mubumvire kugira ngo babakorere bishimye batinuba , kuko babakoreye binuba mwe nta kamaro byabagirira .
58013018	Mukomeze kudusabira . Turahamya ko nta kibi imitima yacu iturega , kuko kwifata neza igihe cyose ari icyo dushaka .
58013019	Ndabinginze murusheho kunsabira , kugira ngo Imana ingarure iwanyu bidatinze .
58013020	Umwami wacu Yezu ari we mushumba mukuru wintama , Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye kubera amaraso ye ahamya Isezerano ryayo ridakuka . Iyo Mana itanga amahoro ibashoboze ibyiza byose , kugira ngo mukore ibyo ishaka . Nuko isohoze muri twe umurimo uyishimisha ikoresheje Yezu Kristo . Ikuzo ribe irye iteka ryose . Amina . Umwami wacu Yezu ari we mushumba mukuru wintama , Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye kubera amaraso ye ahamya Isezerano ryayo ridakuka . Iyo Mana itanga amahoro ibashoboze ibyiza byose , kugira ngo mukore ibyo ishaka . Nuko isohoze muri twe umurimo uyishimisha ikoresheje Yezu Kristo . Ikuzo ribe irye iteka ryose . Amina .

58013022	Bavandimwe , ibyo nanditse byo kubakomeza ndabasaba kubyitaho . Erega uru rwandiko ntabwo ari rurerure !
58013023	Mumenye kandi ko umuvandimwe wacu Timoteyo yafunguwe . Naramuka angezeho vuba tuzazana kubasura .
58013024	Muramutse ababayobora bose , kimwe n'intore zose za Nyagasani . Abavandimwe bo mu Butaliyani barabatashya .
58013025	Nyagasani nagumye kubagirira ubuntu mwese .
59001001	Jyewe Yakobo umugaragu w'Imana n'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo , ndabaramukije ab'imiryango cumi n'ibiri batataniye mu mahanga .
59001002	Bavandimwe , igihe mugezweho n'ibigeragezo by'uburyo bwose mujye mubyishimira .
59001003	Mumenye ko iyo ukwizera Imana kwanyu kugeragejwe bibatera kwihangana .
59001004	Mureke ukwihangana kurangize umurimo wako , kugira ngo mube indakemwa , mushyitse , nta cyo mubuze .
59001005	Niba muri mwe hari ubuze ubwenge nasabe Imana ibumuhe , kuko iha bose itītangira kandi idacyurira umuntu .
59001006	Ariko asabe yizeye ari nta cyo ashidikanya , kuko ushidikanya yagereranywa n'umuhengeri wo mu kiyaga , umuyaga ukoza hirya no hino .
59001007	Umuntu nk'uwo ntakībwire ko hari icyo Nyagasani yamuha ,
59001008	kuko ari nyamujyiryanino uhindagurika mu byo akora byose .
59001009	Umuvandimwe woroheje ajye yishimira ko Imana imushyira ejuru ,
59001010	n'umukungu na we ajye yishimira ko Imana imucisha bugufi , kuko iherezo azahita nk'ururabyo rwo ku gasozi .
59001011	Izuba rirarasa maze ryakara rikumisha ibyatsi , indabyo zigahunguka n'ubwiza bwazo bukayoyoka . Uko ni ko umukungu azayoyokana n'ibyo ahirimbanamo .
59001012	Hahirwa umuntu wihanganira ibimugerageza , kuko Imana nibona ko atsinze izamuhemba ikamba ry'ubugingo yasezeranyije abayikunda .
59001013	Igihe umuntu ashutswe ngo akore icyaha ntakavuge ati : “ Imana ni yo inshutse ” , kuko Imana idashukwa ngo ikore ibibi cyangwa na yo ngo igire uwo ishuka .

59001016	Bavandimwe nkunda , ntimukayobe !

59002007	Ese si bo batuka rya zina ryiza mwitiriwe ?
59002008	Ahubwo muba mukoze neza iyo mukurikije Itegeko ry'ubwami bw'Imana , nk'uko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo : “ Ujye ukunda mugenzi wawe nk'uko wikunda . ”

60001001	Jyewe Petero Intumwa ya Yezu Kristo , ndabandikiye mwebwe abo Imana yitoranyirije , mu basuhuke batataniye mu ntara za Ponto na Galati , na Kapadokiya na Aziya na Bitiniya .
60001002	Imana Data yabatoranyije ikurikije umugambi yagize kuva kera , Mwuka abagira intore zayo kugira ngo mwumvire Yezu Kristo , mwezwe n'amaraso yabameneye . Imana nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro bisesuye .
60001003	Nihasingizwe Imana se w'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo , yo yatugiriye imbabazi . Yaduhaye kuvuka ubwa kabiri , tukaba dufite ibyo twiringira bihamye , tubikesha izuka rya Yezu Kristo mu bapfuye .

60001012	Imana yahishuriye abo bahanuzi ko ubutumwa yabashinze atari bo bugenewe , ahubwo ko ari ubwanyu . Ubwo ni bwo Butumwa bwiza mumaze kugezwaho ubu ngubu n'ababubazaniye , bafite ubushobozi bwa Mwuka Muziranenge bohererejwe avuye mu ijuru . Ubwo Butumwa abamarayika na bo babufitiye amatsiko .
