60002016	Mumere nk'abantu bishyira bakizana , nyamara ukwishyira ukizana kwanyu ntimuguhindure urwitwazo rwo gukora ibibi , ahubwo mugenze nk'abagaragu b'Imana .
60002017	Muhe abantu bose agaciro , mukunde abavandimwe banyu , mutinye Imana , muhe Umwami agaciro .
60002018	Bagaragu , mwemere kugengwa na ba shobuja mujye mububaha rwose , ntimwubahe abagwaneza n'ababorohera gusa , ahubwo mwubahe n'abanyamakare .
60002019	Erega bishimisha Imana igihe umuntu yihanganira kugirirwa nabi arengana , abitewe no kumva muri we icyo ishaka !
60002020	None se mwashimwa mute igihe mwihanganiye gukubitwa muhōrwa ibyaha byanyu ? Ariko rero igihe mwakoze neza mukabihōrwa maze mukihangana , ubwo ni bwo muba mushimishije Imana .
60002021	Ibyo ni byo Imana yabahamagariye , kuko Kristo na we yababajwe ku bwanyu , bityo akababera urugero kugira ngo mujye mugenza nka we .
60002022	We nta cyaha yigeze akora , nta n'iby'uburiganya yigeze avuga .
60002023	Yaratutswe ntiyasubiza , bamugiriye nabi ntiyabakangisha , ahubwo yiragiza Imana ica imanza zitabera .
60002024	Kristo ubwe yatwaye ibyaha byacu mu mubiri we , abibambanwa ku musaraba kugira ngo tube dupfuye ku byerekeye ibyaha , maze tubeho dutunganiye Imana . Erega “ Inguma ze ni zo zabakijije !
60002025	Mwari mumeze nk'intama zazimiye ” , ariko none ubu mugarukiye Umushumba wanyu ari we uyobora ubugingo bwanyu .
60003001	Namwe bagore , buri wese yemere kugengwa n'umugabo we , kugira ngo nubwo bamwe baba batemera Ijambo rya Nyagasani , baryemezwe n'imyifatire yanyu mutiriwe mugira icyo muvuga .
60003002	Bazareba gusa imyifatire yanyu itagira amakemwa n'ukuntu mwubaha .
60003003	Umurimbo wanyu ntukabe uw'inyuma nko kuboha imisatsi , kwambara ibyakozwe mu izahabu cyangwa se imyambaro y'akarusho .
60003004	Ahubwo umurimbo wanyu ube uw'imbere mu mutima . Ni umurimbo udasaza w'ubugwaneza n'amahoro , uwo ni wo ufite agaciro gakomeye ku Mana .
60003005	Abagore ba kera biyeguriye Imana bakayiringira ni ko na bo barimbaga , buri wese agengwa n'umugabo we .
60003006	Ni ko na Sara yari ameze , yubahaga Aburahamu akamwita umutware we . Namwe muba mubaye abana be iyo mukora neza , mudaterwa ubwoba n'igikangisho icyo ari cyo cyose .
60003007	Namwe bagabo , buri wese abane n'umugore we amufata neza , kuko abagore badafite imbaraga nk'izanyu . Mujye mubaha agaciro rero kuko muzaherwa hamwe na bo umunani w'ubugingo Imana itanga ku buntu . Mugenze mutyo kugira ngo amasengesho yanyu ye kugira inkomyi .
60003008	Ahasigaye mwese muhuze ibitekerezo , muhuze n'umutima , mukundane bya kivandimwe , mugirirane impuhwe kandi mwicishe bugufi .
60003009	Ntimukiture umuntu inabi yabagiriye cyangwa igitutsi yabatutse , ahubwo mumwiture kumusabira umugisha , kuko namwe Imana yabasezeranyije umugisha wayo igihe yabahamagaraga .
60003010	Ibyanditswe biravuga biti :
60003011	Azibukire ibibi akore ibyiza , ashakashake amahoro ayaharanire .
60003012	Kuko Nyagasani ahoza ijisho ku ntungane , atega amatwi akumva ibyo zisaba . Nyamara arwanya inkozi zibibi . ”
60003013	Mbese ni nde uzabagirira nabi nimugira ishyaka ryo gukora ibyiza ?
60003014	Icyakora nubwo mwababazwa muzira ibikorwa bitunganye , na byo byababera ihirwe . Ntimugatinye abantu kandi ntimugahagarike umutima .
60003015	Ahubwo mwubahe Kristo abe Umugenga w'imitima yanyu . Muhore kandi mwiteguye gusubiza umuntu wese wabasaba gusobanura ibyo mwiringira .
60003016	Ariko mubikorane ubugwaneza no kwicisha bugufi . Mugire umutima utabarega ikibi , kugira ngo abasebya imyifatire myiza mukomora kuri Kristo babe ari bo bakorwa n'isoni .
60003017	Niba Imana ibishaka , ikiruta ni uko mwababazwa muhōrwa ibyiza mukora aho guhōrwa ibibi .
60003018	Kristo na we yapfuye rimwe rizima kubera ibyaha byanyu , we ntungane apfira abagome kugira ngo abageze ku Mana . Igihe yari ku isi baramwishe , maze kubera imbaraga za Mwuka arazuka , aba muzima .
60003019	Yakoresheje Mwuka atangariza ubutumwa bw'Imana abapfuye bagizwe imfungwa .
60003020	Ni zo ba bantu bari baragomeye Imana , na yo ikabihanganira igihe cyose Nowa yubakaga bwa bwato bunini . Muri ubwo bwato hagiyemo abantu bake gusa , ndetse ni umunani bonyine bakijijwe n'amazi .
60003021	Ayo mazi ashushanya kubatizwa ari byo bibakiza namwe muri iki gihe . Si uko yuhagira umuntu imbyiro zo ku mubiri , ahubwo ashushanya ukwiyegurira Imana k'umuntu ufite umutima utamurega ikibi . Ako gakiza mugakesha izuka rya Yezu Kristo
60003022	wagiye mu ijuru akaba ari iburyo bw'Imana , aho yahawe kugenga abamarayika n'ibinyabushobozi n'ibinyabubasha .
60004001	Ubwo Kristo yababajwe mu mubiri , namwe mugire ayo matwara ye muyitwaze nk'intwaro . Umaze kubabazwa mu mubiri aba atandukanye n'ibyaha .
60004002	Bityo igihe mushigaje kubaho mureke gukurikiza ibyo abantu bararikira , ahubwo mujye mukurikiza ibyo Imana ishaka .
60004003	Erega mwamaze igihe gihagije mukora ibyo abatazi Imana baharanira ! Dore ibyo mwabagamo : ubwomanzi n'irari , ubusinzi n'inkera n'ubunywi , kimwe no gushengerera ibigirwamana kandi icyo ari ikizira ku Mana .
60004004	Ubu rero abatazi Nyagasani basigaye babatangarira , babonye ko mutagifatanya na bo gukabya kwiyandarika bityo bakabasebya .
60004005	Nyamara ibyo bazabibazwa na Nyagasani , witeguye gucira imanza abazima n'abapfuye .
60004006	Ni cyo cyatumye Ubutumwa bwiza butangarizwa abapfuye na bo , baciriwe urubanza bakiriho ku isi kugira ngo babeho uko Imana ishaka babikesha Mwuka .
60004007	Iherezo ry'ibintu byose riregereje . Kubera iyo mpamvu mujye mushyira mu gaciro , kandi mwirinde gutegekwa n'inda kugira ngo mubone uko musenga .
60004008	Mbere ya byose mukundane urukundo rudatezuka , kuko urukundo rwibagirwa ibyaha byinshi .
60004009	Mujye mwakira abashyitsi mutinuba .
60004010	Umuntu wese uko Imana yamuhaye impano ajye ayikoresha yunganira abandi , kugira ngo abe umunyabintu ukoresha neza impano izo ari zo zose Imana yamugabiye .
60004011	Nihagira uterura kuvuga , navuge ibyo ahawe n'Imana gusa . Nihagira ukorera abandi , abikorane imbaraga ahabwa n'Imana . Ni bwo Imana izahabwa ikuzo byimazeyo kubera Yezu Kristo . Nahorane icyubahiro n'ubutware iteka ryose . Amina .
60004012	Ncuti nkunda , ntimugatangazwe n'uruganda rukaze rw'ibigeragezo mugomba gucamo ngo mumere nk'abagezweho n'ikintu kidasanzwe .
60004013	Ahubwo mwishimire gufatanya na Kristo imibabaro , kugira ngo igihe ikuzo rye rizahishurwa muzahimbarwe muvuze n'impundu .
60004014	Murahirwa niba babatuka babahōra Kristo , kuko biba byerekana ko Mwuka nyir'ikuzo ari we Mwuka w'Imana , aguma kuri mwe .
60004015	Ntihagire umuntu n'umwe muri mwe uhōrwa ko ari umwicanyi cyangwa umujura , cyangwa umugizi wa nabi cyangwa kazitereyemo !
60004016	Nyamara nahōrwa ko ari umukristo ntibikamutere isoni , ahubwo asingize Imana kubera ko ahōwe iryo zina .
60004017	Koko rero igihe cy'urubanza kirageze kandi rubanjirije kuri twebwe ab'inzu y'Imana . None se ubwo rubanjirije kuri twe , iherezo ry'abatumvira Ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana rizaba irihe ?
60004018	Ni na ko Ibyanditswe bivuga ngo :
60004019	Kubera ibyo abababazwa bahōrwa gukora ibyo Imana ishaka , nibiyegurire Umuremyi wabo windahemuka bagumye bakore ibyiza .
60005001	Abakuru b'itorero rya Kristo bo muri mwe ndabihanangiriza . Nanjye ndi umukuru hamwe namwe , ndi n'umwe mu bagabo bo guhamya ukuntu Kristo yababajwe agapfa , kandi nagenewe kuzahabwa uruhare ku ikuzo rya Kristo rigiye guhishurwa .
60005002	Noneho nimukenure umukumbi w'Imana yabaragije mubikore mutinuba , ahubwo mubikunze nk'uko Imana ishaka , mubikore mutabitewe no kwishakira inyungu ahubwo mubyitangiye .
60005003	Ntimugatwaze igitugu abo mwaragijwe , ahubwo mubere ubushyo urugero rwiza .
60005004	Bityo ubwo Umushumba mukuru azaba ahingutse , muzahembwa ikuzo ari ryo kamba ritangirika ry'abatsinze .
60005005	Namwe basore , mujye mwumvira ababaruta ubukuru . Ndetse mwese mukenyere kwicisha bugufi , buri wese amere nk'uhereza mugenzi we . Ibyanditswe biravuga ngo : “ Imana irwanya abirasi , abiyoroshya ikabahera ubuntu . ”
60005006	Nuko rero mwicishe bugufi imbere y'Imana igira amaboko , kugira ngo izabakuze igihe kigeze .
60005007	Ibibahagarika imitima byose mubiyegurire kuko ibitaho .
60005008	Mwirinde gutegekwa n'inda kandi mube maso , kuko umwanzi wanyu Satani akora hirya no hino nk'intare itontoma ishaka uwo iconshomera .
60005009	Mumurwanye kigabo mwitwaje kwizera Kristo , muzirikana ko ku isi yose hari abavandimwe banyu muhuje imibabaro .
60005010	Ariko nimumara kubabazwa igihe gito , Imana ubwayo igira ubuntu byuzuye izababoneza , ibakomeze ibahe imbaraga no kutajegajega . Erega ni yo yabahamagaye ngo muhabwe ku ikuzo ryayo rihoraho riri muri Kristo !
60005011	Iragahorana ingoma iteka ryose . Amina .
60005012	Mbandikiye aya magambo make mfashijwe na Silasi , uko mbibona ni umuvandimwe w'indahemuka . Nashatse kubatera akanyabugabo , nkanabemeza ko ibyo mbandikiye ari byo buntu nyakuri Imana yabagiriye kugira ngo mubwishingikirizeho .
60005013	Abari i Babiloni batoranyijwe n'Imana kimwe namwe barabatashya , ndetse na Mariko umwana wanjye arabatashya .
60005014	Nimuramukanye muhoberana mu ndamutso y'urukundo . Abari muri Kristo mwese nimugire amahoro .
61001001	Jyewe Simoni Petero umugaragu wa Yezu Kristo n'Intumwa ye , ndabandikiye mwebwe mwahawe kumwizera gufite agaciro kamwe n'ukwacu , mubikesha ubutabera bw'Imana yacu na Yezu Kristo Umukiza .
61001002	Imana nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro bisendereye , mubiheshwa no kuyimenya kimwe no kumenya Umwami wacu Yezu .
61001003	Kubera ububasha bwayo Imana yaduhaye ibya ngombwa byose , kugira ngo tubeho twubaha Imana tubikesha kumenya uwaduhamagaye ngo duhabwe ku ikuzo rye no ku kugira neza kwe .
61001004	Ni cyo cyatumye aduha amasezerano akomeye cyane kandi afite agaciro , kugira ngo nimumara kuyashyikira mugire uruhare kuri kamere y'Imana , bityo mubashe guca ukubiri n'irari ryononnye iyi si .
61001005	Kubera iyo mpamvu murusheho kugira umwete wo kwizera Imana , maze kwizera Imana mukugerekeho kugira neza , kugira neza mukugerekeho ubumenyi ,
61001006	ubumenyi na bwo mubugerekeho kumenya kwifata , kumenya kwifata mukugerekeho kudacogora , kudacogora mukugerekeho kubaha Imana ,
61001007	maze kubaha Imana mukugerekeho kubana kwa kivandimwe , kubana kwa kivandimwe mukugerekeho urukundo .
61001008	Nimugira mutyo byimazeyo bizabarinda kuba abanebwe , cyangwa ingumba mu kumenya Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
61001009	Umuntu utagenza atyo aba ari nk'impumyi ireba ibiyegereye gusa , uwo nguwo akaba yibagiwe ko yejejwe agakurwaho ibyaha bye bya kera .
61001010	Ubwo bimeze bityo bavandimwe , mushishikarire kwemeza abantu ibikorwa byanyu kugira ngo bamenye ko muri abo Imana yahamagaye ikabatoranya . Nimugenza mutyo nta kizabavana kuri Kristo .
61001011	Ahubwo bizabahesha kwakiranwa ubwuzu mu bwami buhoraho bwa Yezu Kristo , ari we Mwami n'Umukiza wacu .
61001012	Ni yo mpamvu nzahora mbibutsa ibyo ngibyo nubwo musanzwe mubizi , kandi mukaba mushinze imizi neza mu kuri mwakiriye .
61001013	Ndibwira ko ari ngombwa guhora mbakangura , nkabibibutsa igihe cyose nkiriho .
61001014	Nzi yuko bidatinze ngiye kwimuka nkava muri uyu mubiri nsembereyemo , ni na ko Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo yansobanuriye .
61001015	Nuko rero nzakora uko nshoboye kose , kugira ngo nimara gupfa muzabashe kujya mwibuka izo nyigisho .
61001016	Igihe twabamenyeshaga uko Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo azaza afite ububasha , si imigani yahimbwe n'abantu twabaciriye , ahubwo twabatekerereje ukuntu twiboneye ubuhangange bwe .
61001017	Icyo gihe Imana Data yamuhaye agaciro n'ikuzo , maze twumva ijwi ry'Imana nyir'ikuzo ry'akataraboneka ivuga iti : “ Uyu ni Umwana wanjye nkunda cyane , ni we nishimira . ”
61001018	Igihe twari kumwe na we mu mpinga ya wa musozi w'Imana , ni bwo twiyumviye iryo jwi rivugira mu ijuru .
61001019	Byongeye kandi turushaho kugirira icyizere ubutumwa bw'abahanuzi . Namwe muzaba mugize neza nimubwitaho , kuko ari nk'itara ryakira ahacuze umwijima , rigakesha ijoro kugeza igihe inyenyeri yo mu rukerera imurikiye imitima yanyu .
61001020	Mbere ya byose mumenye ko ari nta muntu ubasha kwisobanurira ubuhanuzi bwo mu Byanditswe ubwo ari bwo bwose .
61001021	Nta buhanuzi bwigeze kuvugwa ku bushake bw'umuntu habe na rimwe . Ahubwo abahanuzi bavugaga ibyo batumwe n'Imana bayobowe na Mwuka Muziranenge .
61002001	Ariko nk'uko abahanurabinyoma badutse kera muri rubanda , ni ko n'abigishabinyoma bazaduka muri mwe . Bazisuka muri mwe rwihishwa bakwize inyigisho ziyobya kandi zisenya , ndetse bazihakana Umugenga wabo wabacunguye , maze bidatinze bikururireho icyorezo .
61002002	Benshi bazakurikiza ingeso zabo ziteye isoni , bitume abantu basebya inzira y'ukuri Imana ibayobora .
61002003	Kubera irari ryabo abo bigishabinyoma bazababwira amagambo bihimbiye bashaka kurya utwanyu . Nyamara kuva kera urubanza rwabo rwarateguwe , kandi kurimbuka bagenewe kuregereje .
61002004	Abamarayika bakoze ibyaha na bo Imana ntiyabababariye , ahubwo yabaroshye mu nyenga ibafungira mu mwijima baboshye , bategereje gucirwa urubanza .
61002005	Byongeye kandi Imana ntiyababariye abo ku isi yo mu gihe cya kera , ahubwo abayisuzuguraga yabatsembesheje umwuzure , harokoka Nowa gusa watangazaga ibyo gutunganira Imana , hamwe n'abandi barindwi .
61002006	Imijyi ya Sodoma na Gomora na yo Imana yarayihannye , irayitwika iyihindura ivu , kugira ngo bibere urugero abiyemeza gusuzugura Imana .
61002007	Yarokoye Loti w'intungane , wababazwaga n'imibereho iteye isoni y'izo nkozi z'ibibi .
61002008	Erega uwo muntu w'intungane yari aturanye na bo , agahora abareba kandi abumva ! Kubera ko yari intungane , yashengurwaga iminsi yose n'ibikorwa byabo by'ubugome .
61002009	Bityo Nyagasani azi uburyo bwo kuvana abamwubaha mu bigeragezo , no guteganyiriza abagizi ba nabi igihano , ku munsi Imana izaciraho imanza .
61002010	Cyane cyane hazahanwa abakurikiza irari baterwa na kamere yabo yandavuye , bagasuzugura ubutegetsi ubwo ari bwo bwose . Abo bigishabinyoma barahangara cyane kandi barasuzugura . Ntibubaha ibyitwa ibinyakuzo byo mu ijuru , ahubwo barabisebya .
61002011	Nyamara abamarayika nubwo babarusha cyane imbaraga n'ububasha , bo ntibahangara gutuka ibyo binyakuzo ngo babirege kuri Nyagasani .
61002012	Ariko abo bantu batuka ibintu kandi batabizi . Bameze nk'inyamaswa zitagira ubwenge , zavukiye gutegwa no gutsembwaho ! Koko kandi bazatsembwaho kimwe n'inyamaswa .
61002013	Kubera ko bagiriye abandi nabi na bo baziturwa kugirirwa nabi . Bishimira kwiyandarika no ku manywa y'ihangu . Igihe basangira namwe ku munsi mukuru bakoza abantu isoni , bakanabatesha agaciro kuko bashimishwa n'ubutiriganya .
61002014	Batwawe umutima n'abagore gito kandi ntibahwema gukora ibyaha , n'abadakomeye babagusha mu mutego . Bazobereye mu kurarikira ibintu . Ni ibivume !
61002015	Bateshutse inzira iboneye banyura iya Balāmu mwene Bewori , wakunze inyungu zizanwa no gukora ibibi .
61002016	Icyakora yarakangawe kubera icyo cyaha , kuko indogobe ye isanzwe ari itungo ritavuga yavuze nk'umuntu , ibuza uwo muhanuzi gukora iby'ubusazi .
61002017	Abo bantu bameze nk'amasōko yakamye , cyangwa ibihu bitwarwa n'inkubi y'umuyaga . Icyo bagenewe ni ukujugunywa mu mwijima w'icuraburindi .
61002018	Bavuga ibigambo by'ubwirasi bitagira icyo bimara . Bareshya abantu bakoresha irari baterwa na kamere yabo , kugira ngo bagushe mu mutego abamaze igihe gito bitandukanyije n'abanambye mu buyobe .
61002019	Basezeranira abantu kubakura mu buja , nyamara bo ubwabo bari mu buja bw'ingeso zizabatsembaho . Erega umuntu aba mu buja bw'ikintu cyose cyamuganje !
61002020	Ubundi abantu baca ukubiri n'iby'isi byonona ingeso , babishobojwe no kumenya Nyagasani Umukiza wacu Yezu Kristo . Nyamara iyo bibaye bityo , nyuma bakongera kubohwa na byo bigasubira kubaganza , imibereho yabo ya nyuma irusha iya mbere kuba mibi .
61002021	Icyajyaga kubabera cyiza ni ukutigera banyura inzira y'ubutungane kuruta kuyinyura , hanyuma bakayita bakanga itegeko ritagira inenge bari barahawe .
61002022	Bikababera nka wa mugani uvuga ukuri ngo : “ Imbwa isubiye ku birutsi byayo ” , kandi ngo : “ Ingurube yamaze kuhagirwa isubiye kwigaragura mu byondo ” .
61003001	Ncuti nkunda , uru ni urwandiko rwa kabiri mbandikiye . Zombi nazanditse nshaka kubibutsa ibyo mwize , nkabakangurira kubitekerezaho ku buryo buboneye .
61003002	Ndabibutsa ibyavuzwe kera n'abahanuzi batumwe n'Imana , kimwe n'amabwiriza ya Nyagasani Umukiza wacu mwashyikirijwe n'Intumwa yabatumyeho .
61003003	Mbere ya byose mumenye ko mu minsi y'imperuka , hazaduka abakobanyi bakurikiza irari ryabo . Bazabakoba
61003004	bagira bati : “ Mbese ntiyasezeranye ko azaza ? None se ubu ari he ? Ba sogokuruza bacu baritārūye , nyamara kandi ibintu byose bimeze nk'uko byahoze kuva isi ikiremwa . ”
61003005	Abavuga batyo baba biyibagije ko kera Imana yavuze ijambo maze ijuru n'isi bikaremwa . Yaremye isi iyikuye mu mazi kandi ikoresheje amazi .
61003006	Byongeye kandi amazi ni yo yarenze hejuru y'abari ku isi cya gihe akabahitana .
61003007	Na none Ijambo ry'Imana ni ryo ryemeza ko ijuru n'isi by'ubu bibikiwe gutsembwa n'umuriro , umunsi abasuzugura Imana bazacirwa iteka bakarimbuka .
61003008	Ariko ncuti nkunda , hari ikintu kimwe mutagomba kwibagirwa : kuri Nyagasani , umunsi umwe ni nk'imyaka igihumbi , n'imyaka igihumbi ni nk'umunsi umwe .
61003009	Nyagasani ntatinda gushyitsa amasezerano ye nk'uko bamwe babitekereza . Nyamara ni mwe yihanganira , adashaka ko hagira n'umwe urimbuka , ahubwo ashaka ko bose bihana .
61003010	Ku munsi wa Nyagasani azaza atunguranye nk'umujura . Uwo munsi ijuru rizavanwaho urusaku ari rwose , ibirigize bihitanwe n'umuriro maze isi na yo n'ibiyirimo byose bitsembwe .
61003011	Nuko rero ubwo byose bizayoyoka bityo , murumva ukuntu mukwiye kumera . Mbega ukuntu mugomba kuba abaziranenge mukubaha Imana ,
61003012	mutegereza uwo munsi w'Imana mukanawutebutsa ! Uwo munsi ijuru rizagurumana , ibiririmo byose bishongeshwe n'icyokere cy'umuriro .
61003013	Ariko nk'uko Imana yabisezeranye , dutegereje ijuru rishya n'isi nshya , iwabo w'ubutungane .
61003014	None rero ncuti nkunda ubwo mutegereje ibyo , mukwiriye kugira umwete ngo uwo munsi muzasangwe mu mahoro , nta mugayo ubariho cyangwa inenge .
61003015	Mumenye yuko igituma Umwami wacu yihangana atyo , ari ukugira ngo mubone uko mukizwa . Ni na ko Pawulo umuvandimwe wacu dukunda , yabibandikiye akoresheje ubwenge Imana yamuhaye .
61003016	Ni ko yanditse mu nzandiko ze zose , aho yavuze ibyerekeye ibyo ngibyo . Mu nzandiko ze hari amagambo amwe akomeye gusobanurwa , ku buryo abaswa n'abahindagurika bayasobanura amafuti nk'uko bagenza ibindi Byanditswe . Bityo bakizanira icyorezo .
61003017	Nuko rero ncuti nkunda , muraburiwe . Mwirinde gukururwa n'ubuyobe bw'abantu b'indakoreka , butabatesha ibyo mwishingikirijeho .
61003018	Ahubwo mutere imbere mu buntu Imana ibagirira no mu kumenya Yezu Kristo Umwami n'Umukiza wacu . Nahabwe ikuzo none n'iteka ryose . Amina .
62001001	Ibyo tubandikiye ni ibyerekeye Jambo utanga ubugingo , wahozeho kuva mbere na mbere . Uwo twaramwiyumviye , tumwibonera n'amaso yacu , turamwitegereza , tumukozaho n'intoki zacu .
62001002	Koko kandi ubwo bugingo bwaragaragaye turabubona , turi abagabo bo kubuhamya kandi ni na bwo tubatangariza . Ni ubugingo buhoraho bwahoranye n'Imana Data maze ikabutugaragariza .
62001003	Ibyo twabonye kandi twumvise ni byo tubatangariza namwe , kugira ngo mugirane ubumwe natwe . Ubwo bumwe kandi tubufitanye n'Imana Data n'Umwana wayo Yezu Kristo .
62001004	Ibi tubibandikiye kugira ngo tugire ibyishimo bisesuye .
62001005	Ubutumwa twumvanye Yezu Kristo ari na bwo tubatangariza , ni uko Imana ari urumuri kandi ko nta mwijima na mba uba muri yo .
62001006	Niba tuvuga rero ko dufitanye ubumwe na yo ariko tukagendera mu mwijima , tuba tubeshya ntitube dukora ibihuje n'ukuri .
62001007	Ariko niba tugendera mu mucyo nk'uko na yo iba mu mucyo , tuba dufitanye ubumwe kandi amaraso ya Yezu Umwana wayo akatweza akatumaraho icyaha cyose .
62001008	Niba tuvuga ko nta cyaha dufite tuba twishuka kandi nta kuri tuba dufite .
62001009	Nyamara nitwemera ko twakoze ibyaha , Imana yo ni indahemuka n'intabera , ku buryo itubabarira ibyaha byacu kandi ikatweza , ikatumaraho ikibi cyose .
62001010	Niba tuvuga ko tutigeze dukora icyaha , tuba twise Imana umunyabinyoma kandi nta jambo ryayo riba riturangwamo .
62002001	Bana banjye , ibi mbibandikiye kugira ngo mwē gukora ibyaha . Icyakora hagize umuntu ukora icyaha dufite utuvugira ku Mana Data , ni Yezu Kristo w'intungane .
62002002	Ni na we wabaye icyiru cy'ibyaha byacu , ndetse si ibyacu gusa ahubwo n'iby'abantu bo ku isi yose .
62002003	Icyo tumenyeraho ko tuzi Imana ni uko dukurikiza amategeko yayo .
62002004	Uvuga ati : “ Ndayizi ” ariko ntakurikize amategeko yayo , ni umunyabinyoma kandi nta kuri aba afite .
62002005	Ariko umuntu ukurikiza ibyo Imana ivuga , koko urukundo rwayo ruba muri we rwuzuye , ni na cyo tumenyeraho ko turi muri yo .
62002006	Uvuga ko aguma muri yo agomba kugenza nk'uko Kristo yagenzaga .
62002007	Ncuti nkunda , si itegeko rishya mbandikiye , ahubwo ni irya kera mwari musanganywe kuva mbere na mbere . Iryo tegeko rya kera ni ryo Jambo ry'Imana mwumvise .
62002008	Nyamara kandi ni itegeko rishya mbandikiye . Ukuri kwaryo kugaragarira muri Kristo no muri mwebwe , kuko umwijima weyutse n'urumuri nyakuri rukaba rumurika .
62002009	Umuntu wese uvuga ko ari mu mucyo akanga umuvandimwe we , aba akiri mu mwijima n'ubu .
62002010	Ukunda umuvandimwe we aguma mu mucyo , kandi nta kimubamo cyashobora kugusha abandi mu byaha .
62002011	Ariko umuntu wese wanga umuvandimwe we aba ari mu mwijima , kandi agenda mu mwijima , akaba atazi aho yerekera , kuko umwijima uba umuhumye amaso .
62002012	Bana banjye , ndabandikiye kuko mwababariwe ibyaha mubikesha Kristo .
62002013	Mwebwe babyeyi , ndabandikiye kuko muzi Uwahozeho kuva mbere na mbere . Namwe basore , ndabandikiye kuko mwatsinze Sekibi .
62002014	Bana banjye , ndabandikira kuko muzi Imana Data . Mwebwe babyeyi , ndabandikira kuko muzi Uriho kuva mbere na mbere . Namwe basore , ndabandikira kuko muri abanyambaraga , n'Ijambo ry'Imana rikaba riguma muri mwe kandi mukaba mwaratsinze Sekibi .
62002015	Ntimugakunde isi cyangwa ibiri ku isi . Umuntu ukunda iby'isi nta gukunda Imana aba afite .
62002016	Iby'isi ni byo ibi : ibyo umubiri w'umuntu urarikira n'ibintu amaso ye areba akabyifuza , n'ukuntu yirata ibye . Ibyo byose ntibikomoka ku Mana Data , ahubwo bikomoka ku isi .
62002017	Isi iriho irahita kimwe n'irari ryayo , ariko ukora ibyo Imana ishaka ahoraho iteka .
62002018	Bana banjye , iki ni igihe cy'iherezo . Mwigeze kumva ko Umwanzi urwanya Kristo agiye kwaduka . Ndetse n'ubu abarwanya Kristo bamaze guhaguruka ari benshi , ni na cyo tumenyeraho ko ari igihe cy'iherezo .
62002019	Abo bavuye muri twe , icyakora ntibari abacu by'ukuri , kuko iyo baba abacu baba baragumanye natwe , ariko kwari ukugaragaza ko atari abacu uko bangana .
62002020	Naho mwebwe Kristo Muziranenge yabasīze amavuta , ari yo Mwuka we , bituma mwese mumenya ukuri .
62002021	Icyatumye mbandikira rero si uko mutazi ukuri , ahubwo ni uko mukuzi kandi mukaba muzi ko nta kinyoma na kimwe gikomoka ku kuri .
62002022	Ni nde munyabinyoma atari uhakana ko Yezu ari we Kristo ? Uwo ni we mwanzi urwanya Kristo kuko ahakana Imana Data n'Umwana wayo .
62002023	Umuntu wese uhakana Umwana w'Imana aba ahakanye n'Imana Se . Naho uwemera Umwana w'Imana ku mugaragaro , aba yemeye n'Imana Se .
62002024	Ibyo mwumvise kuva mbere na mbere mubigumane , kuko nimubigumana muzaba mugumye no mu Mwana w'Imana no muri Se .
62002025	Dore kandi icyo Kristo ubwe yadusezeranyije , ni ubugingo buhoraho .
62002026	Mbandikiye ibyo kubera abashaka kubayobya .
62002027	Naho mwe Kristo yabasīze amavuta ari yo Mwuka we , bityo Mwuka uwo aguma muri mwe . Ntabwo rero mukenera umuntu wo kubigisha kuko Mwuka abigisha byose , kandi ibyo yigisha ni ukuri si ibinyoma . Nuko rero nk'uko yabigishije , nimugume muri Kristo .
62002028	Na none bana banjye , nimugume muri Kristo kugira ngo tutazagira icyo twishisha ubwo azagaragara , kandi twē kuzakorwa n'isoni imbere ye igihe azaba aje .
62002029	Ubwo muzi ko Kristo ari intungane , mumenye kandi ko umuntu wese ukora ibitunganye aba abaye umwana w'Imana .
62003001	Nimurebe ukuntu Imana Data yadukunze bihebuje , ikaduha kwitwa abana bayo , kandi koko turi bo . Ni cyo gituma ab'isi batatumenya , kuko na yo batayimenya .
62003002	Ncuti nkunda , tumaze kuba abana b'Imana ariko uko tuzamera ntibiragaragara . Icyakora tuzi yuko igihe Kristo azagaragara tuzamera nka we , kuko tuzamureba uko ari .
62003003	Umuntu wese umwiringira atyo , arihumanura akaba aboneye nka Kristo .
62003004	Umuntu wese ukora icyaha aba agandiye itegeko ry'Imana , ndetse gukora icyaha cyose ni ko kugandira itegeko ryayo .
62003005	Muzi yuko Kristo yazanywe ku isi no gukuraho ibyaha , kandi we nta cyaha agira .
62003006	Bityo rero umuntu wese uguma muri Kristo ntakora icyaha , ukora icyaha wese ntaba yaramubonye habe no kumumenya .
62003007	Bana banjye , ntihakagire ubayobya . Ukora ibitunganye aba ari intungane , nk'uko Kristo ari intungane .
62003008	Ukora ibyaha ni uwa Satani , kuko kuva mbere na mbere Satani akora ibyaha . Icyazanye Umwana w'Imana ku isi , ni ukugira ngo atsembe ibikorwa bya Satani .
62003009	Umuntu wese wabaye umwana w'Imana aba atagikora ibyaha , kuko kamere yayo iguma muri we kandi ntaba akibasha gukora ibyaha kuko ari umwana w'Imana .
62003010	Dore itandukaniro riri hagati y'abana b'Imana n'aba Sekibi : umuntu wese udakora ibitunganye kimwe n'udakunda umuvandimwe we , si abana b'Imana .
62003011	Ubutumwa mwumvise kuva mbere na mbere , ni ukugira ngo dukundane .
62003012	Ntitukamere nka Kayini wari uwa Sekibi , maze akica murumuna we . Mbese ni iki cyatumye amwica ? Ni uko yari umugizi wa nabi , naho murumuna we akaba intungane .
62003013	Bavandimwe , ntimugatangazwe n'uko ab'isi babanga .
62003014	Tuzi ko tumaze kuvanwa mu rupfu tukagezwa mu bugingo , kuko dukunda abavandimwe bacu . Udakunda aba akiri mu rupfu .
62003015	Umuntu wese wanga umuvandimwe we aba ari umwicanyi , kandi muzi yuko nta mwicanyi ugira ubugingo buhoraho .
62003016	Dore icyo tumenyeraho urukundo : ni uko Kristo yitanze akadupfira , ni na ko natwe tugomba kwitangira abavandimwe bacu .
62003017	Mbese niba umuntu ari umukungu , akabona umuvandimwe we akennye ntamugirire impuhwe ngo agire icyo amufashisha , yabasha ate kuvuga ko afite urukundo rw'Imana ?
62003018	Bana banjye , urukundo rwacu ntirugahere mu magambo ngo rube ku rurimi gusa , ahubwo rube mu kuri .
62003019	Uko ni ko tuzamenya ko turi ab'ukuri . Ni na ko tuzashobora guhagarara imbere y'Imana , nta cyo twishisha .
62003020	Naho imitima yacu yaba iturega ikibi , Imana iruta kure imitima yacu kandi izi byose .
62003021	Ncuti nkunda , niba imitima yacu itaturega ikibi , tuba dutinyutse guhagarara imbere y'Imana nta cyo twishisha .
62003022	Bityo ikaduha icyo tuyisabye cyose , kuko dukurikiza amategeko yayo tugakora ibiyishimisha .
62003023	Kandi itegeko ryayo ngiri : ni uko twizera Umwana wayo Yezu Kristo , tugakundana nk'uko yabidutegetse .
62003024	Ukurikiza amategeko y'Imana aguma muri yo , na yo ikaguma muri we . Dore icyo dukesha kumenya ko iba muri twe : ni Mwuka wayo yaduhaye .
62004001	Ncuti nkunda , ntimukemere umwuka uwo ari wo wose umuntu avuga ko afite , ahubwo mujye mugenzura murebe niba uwo mwuka ukomoka ku Mana , kuko abahanurabinyoma benshi badutse ku isi .
62004002	Dore ikizabamenyesha ko uwo mwuka ari Mwuka w'Imana : umuntu wese wemeza ku mugaragaro ko Yezu Kristo yaje yigize umuntu , umwuka afite uba ari Mwuka w'Imana .
62004003	Ariko umuntu wese utemera Yezu atyo umwuka afite uba atari Mwuka w'Imana , ahubwo uba ukomoka kuri wa Mwanzi urwanya Kristo , uwo mwigeze kumva ko agiye kuza ubu akaba yaramaze kugera ku isi .
62004004	Mwebwe bana banjye , muri ab'Imana kandi mwatsinze abo bahanurabinyoma , kuko uri muri mwe arusha ubushobozi uri mu b'isi .
62004005	Abo ni ab'isi , ni cyo gituma bavuga ibifitanye isano n'isi abayo bakabumva .
62004006	Twe turi ab'Imana , umuntu uzi Imana aratwumva utari uwayo ntatwumve . Uko ni ko tumenya gutandukanya Mwuka w'ukuri n'umwuka w'ubuyobe .
62004007	Ncuti nkunda , reka dukundane kuko urukundo rukomoka ku Mana , umuntu wese ukunda abandi aba abaye umwana w'Imana kandi aba azi Imana .
62004008	Udakunda ntabwo azi Imana , kuko Imana ari urukundo .
62004009	Dore ukuntu Imana yagaragaje urukundo idukunda : yatumye Umwana wayo w'ikinege ku isi kugira ngo aduheshe ubugingo .
62004010	Urukundo nyarwo nguru : si uko ari twe twakunze Imana , ahubwo ni uko ari yo yadukunze maze ikohereza Umwana wayo kuba icyiru cy'ibyaha byacu .
62004011	Ncuti nkunda , ubwo Imana yadukunze bigeze aho , natwe tugomba gukundana .
62004012	Nta muntu wigeze arabukwa Imana , nyamara niba dukundana Imana iguma muri twe , kandi urukundo rwayo rukaba muri twe rwuzuye .
62004013	Ikitumenyesha ko tuguma muri yo kandi ko na yo iguma muri twe , ni uko yaduhaye Mwuka wayo .
62004014	Natwe twarabyiboneye , none turahamya ko Imana Data yatumye Umwana wayo , kuba Umukiza w'abantu bo ku isi yose .
62004015	Umuntu wese wemeza ku mugaragaro ko Yezu ari we Mwana w'Imana , Imana iguma muri we na we akaguma muri yo .
62004016	Natwe tuzi urukundo Imana idufitiye , kandi urwo rukundo turufitiye icyizere . Imana ni urukundo . Uguma mu rukundo aba aguma mu Mana , na yo ikaguma muri we .
62004017	Bityo urukundo rwayo ruba muri twe rwuzuye , kugira ngo tutazagira icyo twishisha ku munsi wo guca imanza , kuko uko Kristo ameze ari ko natwe turi kuri iyi si .
62004018	Aho urukundo ruri nta bwoba na busa buhaba , ahubwo urukundo rwuzuye ruhashya ubwoba . Erega ufite ubwoba aba yiteze igihano , bityo aba ataragera ku rukundo rwuzuye !
62004019	Igituma twe dukunda ni uko Imana yabanje kudukunda .
62004020	Umuntu navuga ati : “ Nkunda Imana ” ariko akanga umuvandimwe we , aba ari umunyabinyoma . Ese udakunda umuvandimwe we abona , yabasha ate gukunda Imana atabona ?
62004021	Nuko rero ngiri itegeko Kristo yaduhaye : ukunda Imana akunde n'umuvandimwe we .
62005001	Umuntu wese wemera ko Yezu ari Kristo aba abaye umwana w'Imana , kandi umuntu wese ukunda umubyeyi aba akunda n'urubyaro rwe .
62005002	Iyo dukunze Imana tugakora ibyo idutegeka , ubwo ni bwo tumenya ko dukunda abana b'Imana .
62005003	Uku ni ko gukunda Imana : ni ugukurikiza amategeko yayo kandi amategeko yayo ntagoye ,
62005004	kuko uwabaye umwana w'Imana wese atsinda isi kandi insinzi y'isi ngiyi : ni ukwizera Yezu kwacu .
62005005	Mbese ni nde utsinda isi atari uwemera ko Yezu ari Umwana w'Imana ?
62005006	Yezu Kristo ni we waje ku bw'amazi no ku bw'amaraso , atari ku bw'amazi gusa ahubwo ni ku bw'amazi n'amaraso . Mwuka kandi ni we uhamya ibyo , kuko Mwuka ari ukuri .
62005007	Hari ibimenyetso bitatu bibihamya :
62005008	Mwuka n'amazi n'amaraso , kandi ibyo uko ari bitatu birahuje .
62005009	Niba twemera ibyo abantu bahamya , ibyo Imana ihamya byo birabitambutse cyane , kuko yo yahamije ibyerekeye Umwana wayo .
62005010	Bityo rero uwemera Umwana w'Imana umutima we umwemeza ibyo , naho utamwemera aba yise Imana inyabinyoma , kuko aba atemeye ibyo Imana yahamije byerekeye Umwana wayo .
62005011	Icyo yahamije ni iki : Imana yaduhaye ubugingo buhoraho , kandi ubwo bugingo tubuherwa mu Mwana wayo .
62005012	Ufite Umwana w'Imana afite ubwo bugingo , naho udafite Umwana w'Imana nta bugingo afite .
62005013	Ibyo mbibandikiye kugira ngo mumenye ko mufite ubugingo buhoraho , mwebwe abemera Umwana w'Imana .
62005014	Ikidutera kuyizera ntacyo twishisha ni iki : tuzi ko itwumva igihe tuyisabye ikintu gihuje n'uko ishaka .
62005015	Ubwo kandi tuzi ko itwumva igihe tuyisabye ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose , tumenya ko icyo tuyisabye tuba tumaze kugihabwa .
62005016	Nihagira ubona umuvandimwe we akora icyaha kitari icyo kumujyana mu rupfu rw'iteka , namusabire . Imana izamuha ubugingo , niba koko icyo cyaha atari icyo kumujyana mu rupfu . Icyakora icyaha kijyana mu rupfu rw'iteka kibaho . Simvuga ko mwasabira ukora icyo ngicyo .
62005017	Ubugome bwose umuntu agira bumubera icyaha , ariko icyaha cyose si ko kijyana umuntu mu rupfu rw'iteka .
62005018	Tuzi ko uwabaye umwana w'Imana wese adakomeza gukora ibyaha , kuko Yezu Umwana wayo amurinda maze Sekibi ntagire icyo amukoraho .
62005019	Tuzi yuko turi ab'Imana , naho ab'isi bose bagengwa na Sekibi .
62005020	Tuzi kandi ko Umwana w'Imana yaje akaduha umutima wo kumenya Imana Nyirukuri . Ndetse turi umwe na Nyirukuri uwo , tubikesha Umwana we Yezu Kristo . Erega ni we Mana Nyir'ukuri , ni na we Bugingo buhoraho !
62005021	Bana banjye , mwirinde gusenga ibigirwamana .
63001001	Jyewe Umukuru , ndakwandikiye Mubyeyi , wowe mugore watoranyijwe n'Imana hamwe n'abana bawe , mbakunda kubera ukuri kw'Imana dusangiye . Si jye jyenyine ubakunda , ahubwo n'abazi uko kuri bose barabakunda .
63001002	Ikibidutera ni uko kuri kuguma muri twe tukazahorana na ko iteka .
63001003	Imana Data nitugirire ubuntu , iduhe n'imbabazi n'amahoro ifatanyije na Yezu Kristo Umwana wayo , ibyo byose bishingiye ku kuri kwayo no ku rukundo rwayo .
63001004	Nishimiye cyane kubona bamwe mu bana bawe bagendera mu kuri kw'Imana , bakurikije itegeko twahawe n'Imana Data .
63001005	None rero Mubyeyi , ndagusabye ngo twese dukundane ! Iryo si itegeko rishya mbandikiye , ahubwo ni iryo twahawe kuva mbere na mbere .
63001006	Urwo rukundo dore uko ruteye : ni ukugenda dukurikiza amategeko y'Imana , kandi itegeko nyaryo ni rya rindi mwabwiwe kuva mbere na mbere , kugira ngo muhore mugenza mutyo .
63001007	Ku isi hadutse abashukanyi benshi batemera ko Yezu Kristo yaje yigize umuntu . Ugenza atyo ni umushukanyi kandi ni umwanzi urwanya Kristo .
63001008	Mwirinde rero mutazava aho mubura ibyo mwaruhiye , ahubwo muharanire kuzahabwa ingororano yuzuye .
63001009	Umuntu wese udakomeza inyigisho za Kristo akazirengaho , nta Mana afite . Naho ukomeza izo nyigisho ni we uba afite Imana Data , akaba afite n'Umwana wayo .
63001010	Nihagira umuntu uza muri mwe mugasanga atemera izo nyigisho , ntimuzamwakire mu mazu yanyu , ndetse ntimuzanamubwire muti : “ Urakaza neza ! ”
63001011	Erega uwakira bene uwo aba yifatanyije na we mu bibi akora .
63001012	Nubwo mfite byinshi nabandikira , ariko sinshatse kubibamenyesha nkoresheje urupapuro na wino . Ahubwo niringiye kuzaza iwanyu nkabibabwira imbonankubone , kugira ngo twishimane bihagije .
63001013	Abana ba mukuru wawe , na we watoranyijwe n'Imana baragutashya .
64001001	Jyewe Umukuru , ndakwandikiye Gayo ncuti yanjye nkunda kubera ukuri kw'Imana .
64001002	Ncuti nkunda , ndakwifuriza kumererwa neza no kuba mutaraga mu mubiri , nk'uko uri mutaraga mu mutima .
64001003	Koko narishimye cyane , igihe abavandimwe bamwe bazaga bagahamya ukuntu ukomeye ku kuri kw'Imana , kandi ukaba ugenda ukurikiza uko kuri .
64001004	Nta kintu kinezeza nko kumva ko abana banjye bakurikiza ukuri .
64001005	Ncuti nkunda , uri indahemuka mu byo ukorera abavandimwe byose , ndetse nubwo baba ari ab'ahandi .
64001006	Bahamije iby'urukundo rwawe imbere y'umuryango wa Kristo . Nyamuneka , nk'uko bikwiriye abakozi b'Imana , ni byiza ko ubahambirira impamba bagakomeza urugendo rwabo .
64001007	Bahagurutse batumwe na Kristo ntibemera kugira icyo bahabwa n'abatemera Imana yacu .
64001008	Tugomba kunganira bene abo bantu rero , kugira ngo tube dufatanyije na bo kogeza ukuri kw'Imana .
64001009	Nandikiye umuryango wa Kristo w'iwanyu , ariko Diyoterefe ukunda kwiha ubukuru muri mwe ntatwemera .
64001010	Ni cyo gituma ninza nzashyira ahabona ibyo akora n'ukuntu adusebya , akatubeshyera . Si ibyo gusa , yanga no gucumbikira abavandimwe , n'abashaka kubakīra akabibabuza ndetse akanabaca mu Muryango w'Imana .
64001011	Ncuti nkunda , ntugakurikize urugero rw'ibibi abandi bakora , ahubwo ujye ukurikiza urugero rwiza . Ukora ibyiza aba ari uw'Imana , naho ukora ibibi aba atarayibona .
64001012	Demeteriyo we abantu bose bamuvugaho ibyiza , yewe n'ukuri twamamaza na ko kurabihamya ndetse natwe ubwacu turabihamya , kandi uzi ko ibyo duhamya ari ukuri .
64001013	Nari nshigaje byinshi nakwandikira , ariko sinifuje gukoresha wino n'ikaramu .
64001014	Ahubwo niringiye kuzakubona bidatinze maze tuvugane imbonankubone .
64001015	Gira amahoro . Incuti zawe ziragutashya , nawe udutahirize izacu buri muntu ku giti cye .
65001001	Jyewe Yuda umugaragu wa Yezu Kristo , nkaba n'umuvandimwe wa Yakobo , ndabandikiye mwebwe abahamagawe , mugakundwa n'Imana Data kandi mukarindwa na Yezu Kristo .
65001002	Imana ibagirire imbabazi , ibahe amahoro n'urukundo bisesuye .
65001003	Ncuti nkunda , nari nsanzwe mfite ishyaka ryo kubandikira ibyerekeye agakiza dusangiye , none mbonye ko ari ngombwa kubikora ngo mbatere umwete wo kurwanira ibyerekeye Kristo twemera , ibyo Imana yabishinze intore zayo rimwe rizima .
65001004	Hari abantu basuzuguye Imana baseseye muri mwe rwihishwa . Ibyerekeye ubuntu tugirirwa n'Imana yacu babihindura ukundi , kugira ngo bishyigikire ubwomanzi bwabo kandi bagahinyura Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo , ari we databuja umwe rukumbi . Iteka bazacirwa ryanditswe kuva kera .
65001005	Nubwo ibyo byose mubizi , ndashaka kubibutsa ko Nyagasani yarokoye Abisiraheli akabavana mu Misiri , ariko hanyuma agatsemba abatamwemeraga .
65001006	Mwibuke n'abamarayika batagumye mu myanya Imana yabahaye , maze bakivana ahasusurutse . Barindiwe mu mwijima baboheshejwe iminyururu ihoraho iteka , bategereje kuzacirwa urubanza kuri wa munsi ukomeye .
65001007	Mwibuke na Sodoma na Gomora n'imijyi yari ihakikije , ukuntu abaturage baho batwawe n'ubusambanyi no guhuza ibitsina bimwe . Bahawe igihano cy'umuriro w'iteka , kugira ngo bibere bose urugero .
65001008	Na ba bandi ni ko babigenza : bagira inzozi zituma bangiza imibiri yabo , bagasuzugura ubutegetsi ubwo ari bwo bwose , ndetse bagatuka ibyitwa Ibinyakuzo byo mu ijuru .
65001009	Nyamara na Mikayeli Umumarayika mukuru , igihe yajyaga impaka na Satani baburana umurambo wa Musa , ntiyahangaye gucira Satani urubanza amutuka , ahubwo yaravuze ati : “ Nyagasani nagukangare ! ”
65001010	Ariko abo bantu bapfa gutuka icyo batazi cyose , naho ibyo bazi bituruka kuri kamere yabo , kimwe n'inyamaswa zitagira ubwenge , ni na byo biboreka .
65001011	Bazabona ishyano ! Banyuze mu nzira ya Kayini , bakohokera mu buyobe bwa Balāmu ari inyungu bakurikiranye , bagatikirira mu myivumbagatanyo nka Kōra .
65001012	Ni bo baza kwangiza ugusangira kwa kivandimwe mugira , basangira namwe nta cyo bishisha . Ni abashumba birwanaho ubwabo . Ni ibicu bihuherwa n'umuyaga ntibigushe imvura . Ni ibiti bitera imbuto no mu gihe cy'isarura bikumirana , bikanaranduka .
65001013	Ni umuhengeri wo mu nyanja warubiye , ukavundereza ifuro ry'ibiteye isoni bakora . Ni inyenyeri zizerera , zagenewe umwijima w'icuraburindi iteka ryose .
65001014	Henoki uwa karindwi mu masekuruza kuva kuri Adamu , yahanuye iby'abo bantu agira ati : “ Dore Nyagasani azanye n'intore ze ibihumbi n'ibihumbi ,
65001015	aje gucira abantu bose urubanza no gushinja abatubaha Imana bose , ibyo bakoze byose byo kuyisuzugura n'ibitutsi abanyabyaha bayitutse ! ”
65001016	Abo bantu bahora bijujuta kandi binuba , bagengwa n'irari ryabo . Bahora mu magambo y'ubwirasi , kandi bakaryoshyaryoshya abo bashakaho inyungu .
65001017	Nyamara mwebweho ncuti nkunda , mwibuke ibyahanuwe kera n'Intumwa z'Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo .
65001018	Zarababwiye ziti : “ Mu minsi y'imperuka hazaduka abakobanyi , bakurikiza irari ribatera gusuzugura Imana ” .
65001019	Abo ni ba bantu bazana kwicamo ibice , bagengwa na kamere yabo , ntibagengwe na Mwuka w'Imana .
65001020	Ariko mwebweho ncuti nkunda , mugumye mwishingikirize ku byerekeye Kristo twemera bitagira amakemwa , musenge muvugishwa na Mwuka Muziranenge .
65001021	Byongeye kandi muhame mu rukundo rw'Imana , mutegereje ko Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo abageza ku bugingo buhoraho kubera imbabazi ze .
65001022	Abagishidikanya mubagirire impuhwe ,
65001023	mubarokore nk'ababarura mu muriro . Abandi mubagirire impuhwe zivanze n'ubwoba , mwanga ndetse n'imyambaro yabo yandujwe n'imigirire baterwa na kamere yabo .
65001024	Imana ni yo ibasha kubarinda kugwa mu cyaha , ikabazana imbere yayo mufite ikuzo ryayo nta makemwa , muvuza n'impundu .
65001025	Iyo Mana imwe rukumbi yadukirishije Umwami wacu Yezu Kristo , igumane ikuzo n'ubuhangange n'ububasha n'ubushobozi , kuva mbere na mbere na n'ubu n'iteka ryose . Amina .
66001001	Ibi ni ibyahishuwe na Yezu Kristo abihawe n'Imana , kugira ngo yereke abagaragu be ibyenda kubaho . Yabimenyesheje umugaragu we Yohani amutumyeho umumarayika .
66001002	Yohani na we yemeza ijambo ryavuye ku Mana , n'iby'ukuri Yezu Kristo yahamije akurikije ibyo yiboneye .
66001003	Hahirwa umuntu usoma iki gitabo , hahirwa n'abumva amagambo yahanuwe akirimo kandi bagakurikiza ibyanditswemo , kuko igihe byagenewe cyegereje .
66001004	Jyewe Yohani , ndabandikiye mwebwe amatorero arindwi yo mu ntara ya Aziya . Imana nibagirire ubuntu ibahe n'amahoro , yo iriho kandi yahozeho , kandi igiye kuza . Nibikore ifatanyije n'ibyitwa ibinyamwuka birindwi bihora imbere y'intebe yayo ya cyami .
66001005	Ibikore kandi ifatanyije na Yezu Kristo umuhamya w'indahemuka , akaba yarabimburiye abandi kuzuka mu bapfuye , akagirwa umutware w'abami bategeka iyi si . Kristo aradukunda , ni na we watubohoye amena amaraso ye kugira ngo atuvane mu byaha byacu .
66001006	Yatugize kandi abantu bo mu bwami bwe b'abatambyi , kugira ngo dukorere Imana Se . Nahabwe ikuzo n'imbaraga iteka ryose . Amina .
66001007	Dore aje ku bicu , umuntu wese azamubona ndetse n'abatoboye umubiri we bazamubona . Amoko yose yo ku isi azacura imiborogo ku bwe . Koko bizaba bityo ! Amina .
66001008	Nyagasani Imana Ishoborabyose , iriho kandi yahozeho , kandi igiye kuza iravuga iti : “ Ni jyewe Ntangiriro , ni nanjye Herezo . ”
66001009	Ni jye Yohani umuvandimwe wanyu musangiye amakuba duhōrwa Yezu , musangiye kandi ubwami bwe n'ukwihangana duterwa na we . Nari ku kirwa cya Patimo , mpōrwa Ijambo ry'Imana n'iby'ukuri Yezu yahamije .
66001010	Ku munsi wa Nyagasani , Mwuka w'Imana anzaho maze ndabonekerwa , inyuma yanjye numva ijwi rimeze nk'iry'impanda
66001011	ry'uvuga cyane ati : “ Ibyo ureba ubyandike mu muzingo w'igitabo , uwoherereze amatorero arindwi yo muri iyi mijyi : Efezi na Simirina na Perugamo , na Tiyatira na Saridi , na Filadelifiya na Lawodiseya . ”
66001012	Ndahindukira kugira ngo ndebe uwambwiraga , maze mbona hateretswe amatara arindwi akozwe mu izahabu .
66001013	Hagati yayo hari hahagaze usa n'umwana w'umuntu . Yari yambaye ikanzu ndende , igituza cye kizengurutswe n'umukandara w'izahabu .
66001014	Umutwe we n'umusatsi we byereranaga nk'inyange cyangwa nk'urubura , kandi amaso ye yari nk'indimi z'umuriro .
66001015	Ibirenge bye byarabagiranaga nk'umuringa wamazwemo inkamba n'umuriro ugasenwa , kandi ijwi rye ryarangiraga nk'amazi menshi asuma .
66001016	Mu kuboko kwe kw'iburyo yari afite inyenyeri ndwi , naho mu kanwa ke havagamo inkota ityaye . Mu maso he harabagiranaga nk'izuba ryo ku manywa y'ihangu .
66001017	Murabutswe mpita nikubita hasi imbere ye mera nk'uwapfuye . Nuko andambikaho ikiganza cy'iburyo aravuga ati : “ Witinya ! Ni jye Ntangiriro , ni nanjye Herezo .
66001018	Dore ndi muzima , nari narapfuye none ndiho kugeza iteka ryose . Ni jye ufite imfunguzo , nshobora gufunga no gufungura urupfu n'ikuzimu .
66001019	Nuko rero andika ibyo ubonye , ari ibiriho ubu ari n'ibigiye gukurikiraho .
66001020	Ibyerekeye inyenyeri ndwi wabonye mu kiganza cyanjye cy'iburyo , n'amatara arindwi y'izahabu ni ibanga . Dore uko iryo banga risobanura : inyenyeri ndwi ni abamarayika bashinzwe ya matorero arindwi , naho amatara arindwi ni ayo matorero arindwi ubwayo .
66002001	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ryo muri Efezi uti : ‘ Ufashe inyenyeri ndwi mu kuboko kw'iburyo , akanagendera hagati y'amatara arindwi y'izahabu aravuze ngo :
66002002	Nzi ibyo ukora n'ukuntu uvunika ntucogore . Nzi kandi ko utabasha kwihanganira abagizi ba nabi . Wagenzuye abiyita intumwa za Kristo kandi atari zo , maze usanga ko babeshya .
66002003	Koko warihanganye , warababajwe bakumpōra ntiwacika intege .
66002004	Icyakora hari icyo nkugaya , ni uko waretse kunkunda nk'uko wankundaga mbere .
66002005	Nuko rero wibuke aho wavuye ukagwa , maze wihane wongere gukora uko wakoraga mbere . Nibitaba bityo nzaza aho uri , nkure itara ryawe aho riteretse niba utihannye .
66002006	Nyamara hari icyo ngushimira , ni uko wanga imigenzereze y'abayoboke ba Nikola nk'uko nanjye nyanga .
66002007	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! Utsinda wese nzamuha kurya ku mbuto z'igiti cy'ubugingo , kiri mu busitani bw'Imana . ’
66002008	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Simirina uti : ‘ Uw'Intangiriro akaba n'uw'Iherezo , ari na we wari warapfuye none akaba ariho , aravuze ngo :
66002009	Nzi amakuba ugira n'ubukene bwawe , nyamara kandi uri umukungu rwose ! Nzi n'ukuntu utukwa n'abiyita Abayahudi kandi atari bo , ahubwo ari abo mu ikoraniro ry'abasenga Satani .
66002010	Ntutinye uburyo uzababazwa : dore Satani agiye kubagerageza arohe bamwe muri mwe muri gereza , mugirirwe nabi kumara iminsi icumi . Urabe indahemuka rero kugeza ku gupfa , nanjye nzaguha ubugingo buhoraho ubugire ho ikamba .
66002011	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! Utsinda wese ntacyo urupfu rwa kabiri ruzamutwara . ’
66002012	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Perugamo uti : ‘ Ufite inkota ityaye impande zombi aravuze ngo :
66002013	Nzi aho utuye , ni aho Satani ashinze intebe ye ya cyami , ariko ntibyakubujije gukomera kuri jye . Ntiwigeze unyihakana , habe no mu gihe Antipa umuhamya wanjye w'indahemuka yicirwaga iwanyu , aho Satani aganje .
66002014	Icyakora mfite ibyo nkugaya : ni uko iwanyu hari abantu bakurikiza inyigisho za Balāmu , wigishije Balaki kugusha Abisiraheli mu cyaha , barya inyama zaterekerejwe ibigirwamana bakanasambana .
66002015	Iwanyu kandi hari abakurikiza inyigisho z'ubuyobe z'abayoboke ba Nikola .
66002016	Nuko rero wihane . Nibitaba bityo ngiye kuza aho uri bidatinze , mbarwanye nkoresheje inkota iva mu kanwa kanjye .
66002017	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! Utsinda wese nzamugaburira manu ihishwe . Buri wese kandi nzamuha ibuye ryera ryanditsweho izina rishya , ritazwi n'umuntu uwo ari we wese keretse uzaba arihawe . ’
66002018	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Tiyatira uti : ‘ Umwana w'Imana ufite amaso ameze nk'ibirimi by'umuriro , n'ibirenge birabagirana nk'umuringa usenwe aravuze ngo :
66002019	Nzi ibyo ukora n'urukundo ugira , nzi n'uko unyizera n'umurimo unkorera no kwihangana kwawe . Nzi kandi ko ibyo ukora ubu biruta kure ibyo wakoraga mbere .
66002020	Ariko mfite icyo nkugaya : ni uko wa mugore Yezebeli wiyita umuhanuzikazi , umwemerera kwigisha . Ayobya abagaragu banjye abigisha gusambana , no kurya ibyaterekerejwe ibigirwamana .
66002021	Namuhaye igihe cyo kwihana nyamara ntashaka kureka ubusambanyi bwe .
66002022	Ni cyo gituma ngiye kumuheza ku buriri hamwe n'abasambane be , kugira ngo bababazwe bikomeye niba batihannye ngo bareke ibibi bakorana na we .
66002023	Ndetse n'abana be nzabica , bityo amatorero yose y'Imana azamenyeraho ko jyewe nzi kugenzura ibitekerezo n'ibyifuzo by'abantu . Umuntu wese muri mwe nzamwitura ibikwiriye ibyo azaba yarakoze .
66002024	Naho rero abasigaye bo mu muryango w'Imana w'i Tiyatira mwirinze gukurikiza izo nyigisho mbi , nta n'ubwo muzi ibyo bita “ Amabanga akomeye ya Satani . ” Ndabamenyesha ko nta wundi mutwaro mbakoreye ,
66002025	keretse gukomeza ibyo musanganywe kugeza aho nzazira .
66002026	Uzatsinda wese agakomeza gukora ibyo nshaka kugeza ku iherezo , nzamuha ubushobozi bwo gutegeka amahanga
66002027	nkuko nabuhawe na Data . Azayaragiza inkoni yicyuma , ayajanjagure nkujanjagura ikibindi , kandi nzamuha ninyenyeri yo mu rukerera . nkuko nabuhawe na Data . Azayaragiza inkoni yicyuma , ayajanjagure nkujanjagura ikibindi , kandi nzamuha ninyenyeri yo mu rukerera .
