66003001	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Saridi uti : ‘ Ufite ibinyamwuka birindwi biva ku Mana , kandi akaba afite na za nyenyeri ndwi aravuze ngo : Nzi ibyo ukora . Witwa ko uriho nyamara wapfuye uhagaze .
66003002	Kanguka ukomeze ibyo usigaranye na byo byenda gupfa . Ni koko nasanze ibikorwa byawe imbere y'Imana bituzuye .
66003003	Nuko rero ibuka ibyo wigishijwe ukabyumva maze ubyitondere , wihane . Naho nutaba maso nzaza ngutunguye nk'umujura , ntabwo uzamenya igihe nzakugereraho .
66003004	Icyakora i Saridi ufite bamwe batanduje imyambaro yabo . Bazagendana nanjye bambaye imyambaro yera , koko barabikwiriye .
66003005	Utsinda wese azambikwa imyambaro yera , kandi sinzigera mpanagura izina rye mu gitabo cy'ubugingo . Nzemera ko ari uwanjye imbere ya Data n'imbere y'abamarayika be .
66003006	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! ’
66003007	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Filadelifiya uti : ‘ Uwitwa Umuziranenge n'Umunyakuri wasigaranye urufunguzo rw'Umwami Dawidi , wa wundi ufunga ntihagire ufungura , kandi yafungura ntihagire ufunga aravuze ngo :
66003008	Nzi ibyo ukora . Nubwo ufite intege nke nzi ko wakurikije ibyo nigishije , kandi ko utigeze unyihakana . Nuko rero ngukinguriye irembo ngo ngutume , nta muntu n'umwe ubasha kugukoma imbere .
66003009	Bamwe bo mu ikoraniro ry'abasenga Satani babeshya ko ari Abayahudi kandi atari bo , dore ngiye kubakuzanira , bakwikubite imbere , bamenye ko ngukunda .
66003010	Ubwo wakurikije ibyo nigishije ukanāmbaho , nanjye nzakurinda mu bihe by'amakuba agiye kuzakwira isi yose ngo agerageze abayituye .
66003011	Ngiye kuza bidatinze , komeza ibyo ufite rero kugira ngo hatagira ugutwara ikamba wagenewe .
66003012	Utsinda wese nzamugira inkingi mu Ngoro y'Imana yanjye , ntazigera asohokamo ukundi . Nzandika kuri we izina ry'Imana yanjye n'iry'umurwa wayo ari wo Yeruzalemu nshya , igiye kumanuka iturutse mu ijuru ku Mana yanjye . Byongeye kandi nzandika kuri we izina ryanjye rishya .
66003013	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! ’
66003014	“ Andikira umumarayika ushinzwe itorero ry'Imana ry'i Lawodiseya , uti : ‘ Uwitwa Amina , umuhamya w'indahemuka kandi w'umunyakuri , ari na we shingiro ry'ibyo Imana yaremye aravuze ngo :
66003015	Nzi ibyo ukora . Ntukonje kandi ntushyushye . Ubonye iyaba wari ukonje cyangwa ngo ube ushyushye !
66003016	None rero ubwo uri akazuyazi ukaba udakonje ntunashyuhe , ngiye kukuruka !
66003017	Uravuga uti : “ Ndi umukire ndakungahaye , nta cyo nkennye na busa . ” Nyamara ntuzi ukuntu uri umutindi wo kubabarirwa , ntugira shinge na rugero , uri impumyi kandi wambaye ubusa .
66003018	Ni cyo gituma nkugīra inama yo kunguraho izahabu yatunganyijwe n'umuriro , maze ubone kuba umukungu ungureho n'imyambaro yera , kugira ngo uhishe ubwambure bwawe buteye isoni , kandi ungureho n'umuti wo gusīga ku maso , kugira ngo uhumuke urebe .
66003019	Abo nkunda bose ndabacyaha nkabacishaho umunyafu . Nuko rero gira umwete wihane .
66003020	Dore mpagaze ku rugi ndakomanga , unyumva wese agakingura nzinjira iwe nsangire na we , na we kandi asangire nanjye .
66003021	Utsinda nzamuha kwicarana nanjye ku ntebe yanjye ya cyami , nk'uko nanjye natsinze nkicarana na Data ku ntebe ye ya cyami .
66003022	“ ‘ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve icyo Mwuka w'Imana abwira amatorero yayo ! ’ ”
66004001	Hanyuma ngira ntya mbona mu ijuru urugi rukinguye . Uwo nari numvise bwa mbere ijwi rye ryarangiraga nk'iry'impanda , arambwira ati : “ Zamuka uze hano nkwereke ibigiye gukurikiraho . ”
66004002	Ako kanya Mwuka w'Imana anzaho , maze ndabonekerwa , mbona intebe ya cyami y'Imana mu ijuru , mbona n'Uyicayeho
66004003	arabagirana nk'amabuye y'agaciro yitwa yasipi na sarudiyo . Iyo ntebe ya cyami kandi yari izengurutswe n'umukororombya warabagiranaga nk'ibuye rya emerodi .
66004004	Yari izengurutswe kandi n'izindi ntebe za cyami makumyabiri n'enye , zicaweho n'abakuru makumyabiri na bane bambaye imyenda yera , kandi batamirije amakamba y'izahabu .
66004005	Kuri iyo ntebe ya cyami haturukaga imirabyo n'amajwi no guhinda kw'inkuba . Imbere y'iyo ntebe hari hateretswe amatara arindwi yaka umuriro , ari yo binyamwuka by'Imana .
66004006	Imbere y'iyo ntebe hari igisa n'ikiyaga kigizwe n'ikirahuri , kibonerana nk'ibuye ry'isarabwayi . Imbere y'iyo ntebe n'ahayizengurutse hakaba ibyitwa ibinyabuzima bine , byuzuyeho amaso imbere n'inyuma .
66004007	Ikinyabuzima cya mbere cyasaga n'intare , icya kabiri kigasa n'ikimasa , icya gatatu mu maso kigasa n'umuntu , naho icya kane kigasa na kagoma iguruka .
66004008	Buri kinyabuzima cyari gifite amababa atandatu , kandi byose byari byuzuyeho amaso ku nda n'inyuma hose . Ijoro n'amanywa ntibituza kuririmba biti :
66004009	Ibyo binyabuzima bine ni ko bihora biririmba biha ikuzo Imana ihoraho iteka ryose , yicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami , bikayubaha bikanayishimira . Uko bigize bityo kandi
66004010	ba bakuru makumyabiri na bane na bo bikubita imbere y'Iyicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami , bakaramya Ihoraho iteka ryose . Ubwo kandi bakaba banaze amakamba yabo imbere y'iyo ntebe , bakavuga bati :
66004011	“ Nyagasani Mana yacu , ni wowe ukwiye guhabwa ikuzo nicyubahiro nububasha , koko ni wowe waremye ibintu byose . Byaremwe ku bushake bwawe , ni wowe ubibeshaho . ”
66005001	Nuko mbona umuzingo w'igitabo mu kiganza cy'iburyo cy'Iyicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami . Wari wanditswe imbere n'inyuma , kandi ufungishijwe ibimenyetso birindwi .
66005002	Mbona n'umumarayika w'igihangange , warangururaga ijwi abaza ati : “ Ni nde ukwiriye gufungura uyu muzingo w'igitabo , akavanaho ibimenyetso biwufunze ? ”
66005003	Nuko mu ijuru no ku isi ndetse n'ikuzimu , ntihagira n'umwe ubasha gufungura uwo muzingo w'igitabo ngo awurebemo .
66005004	Ndizwa cyane n'uko hatabonetse n'umwe ukwiriye gufungura uwo muzingo w'igitabo ngo awurebemo .
66005005	Umwe muri ba bakuru arambwira ati : “ Wirira ! Dore aratsinze ya ntare yo mu muryango wa Yuda , ari na we gishyitsi cya Dawidi . Ni we ugiye gufungura uwo muzingo w'igitabo , akavanaho ibimenyetso birindwi biwufunze . ”
66005006	Nuko mbona Umwana w'intama ari kuri ya ntebe ya cyami rwagati , azengurutswe na bya binyabuzima bine hamwe na ba bakuru . Yasaga n'uwishwe . Yari afite amahembe arindwi n'amaso arindwi , ari byo bya binyamwuka by'Imana byatumwe na yo ku isi yose .
66005007	Nuko Umwana w'intama araza , yakira uwo muzingo w'igitabo mu kuboko kw'iburyo kw'Iyicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami .
66005008	Amaze kuwakira , bya binyabugingo bine na ba bakuru makumyabiri na bane bikubita imbere y'Umwana w'intama . Buri wese yari afite inanga n'inzabya za zahabu zuzuye imibavu , ari yo masengesho y'intore z'Imana .
66005009	Baririmbaga indirimbo nshya bati :
66005010	Wabagize abantu bubwami bwImana , wabagize nabatambyi ngo bakorere Imana yacu , bityo bazima ingoma bategeke isi . ”
66005011	Ndongera ndareba numva ijwi ry'abamarayika , bari benshi cyane , ibihumbi n'ibihumbi . Bari bazengurutse ya ntebe ya cyami na bya binyabuzima na ba bakuru .
66005012	Bavuga cyane bati : “ Umwana w'intama wishwe ni we ukwiriye guharirwa ububasha n'ubukungu , n'ubwenge n'imbaraga , n'icyubahiro n'ikuzo no gusingizwa . ”
66005013	Nuko numva ibyaremwe byose biri mu ijuru no ku isi n'ikuzimu no mu nyanja , mbese iby'aho byose uko bingana bigira biti :
66005014	Bya binyabuzima bine bikikiriza biti : “ Amina . ” Na ba bakuru bakikubita hasi bakaramya .
66006001	Hanyuma , mbona Umwana w'intama avanyeho kimwe muri bya bimenyetso bifunze wa muzingo w'igitabo , maze numva icya mbere muri bya binyabuzima bine kivuga cyane nk'inkuba ihinda , kigira kiti : “ Ngwino ! ”
66006002	Nuko ngira ntya mbona ifarasi y'igitare . Uwo ihetse yari afite umuheto maze ahabwa n'ikamba . Nuko agenda atsinda kandi agamije gutsinda .
66006003	Umwana w'intama avanaho ikimenyetso cya kabiri . Nuko numva ikinyabuzima cya kabiri kigira kiti : “ Ngwino ! ”
66006004	Nuko indi farasi y'igaju iraza . Uwo ihetse atumwa guteza intambara ku isi , kugira ngo abantu basubiranemo bicane , ahabwa inkota nini .
66006005	Umwana w'intama avanaho ikimenyetso cya gatatu . Nuko numva ikinyabuzima cya gatatu kigira kiti : “ Ngwino ! ” Ngo ngire ntya mbona ifarasi y'umukara . Uwo ihetse yari afite umunzani mu ntoki .
66006006	Maze numva ikimeze nk'ijwi ry'umuntu uvugiye hagati muri bya binyabuzima bine , agira ati : “ Ikiro cy'ingano kigurwe igihembo cy'umubyizi , ibiro bitatu by'ingano zitwa bushoki na byo bigurwe igihembo cy'umubyizi , naho amavuta na divayi ntugire icyo ubikoraho . ”
66006007	Umwana w'intama avanaho ikimenyetso cya kane , maze numva ikinyabuzima cya kane kigira kiti : “ Ngwino ! ”
66006008	Ngo ngire ntya mbona ifarasi y'ikijuju . Uwo ihetse akitwa Rupfu kandi yari akurikiwe n'uwitwa Kuzimu . Bahabwa ubushobozi kuri kimwe cya kane cy'abatuye isi , kugira ngo babicishe inkota n'inzara n'indwara z'ibyorezo , n'inyamaswa z'inkazi .
66006009	Umwana w'intama avanaho ikimenyetso cya gatanu . Nuko mbona munsi y'urutambiro abantu bapfuye , bishwe bahōrwa kwamamaza Ijambo ry'Imana no guhamya ibyayo .
66006010	Bavugaga cyane baranguruye ijwi , bati : “ Databuja , wowe Muziranenge , wowe Munyakuri , uzageza ryari ko watinze gucira urubanza abatuye isi , no guhōrera amaraso yacu bamennye ? ”
66006011	Nuko buri wese ahabwa ikanzu yera , kandi barabwirwa ngo bagende baruhuke ikindi gihe gito , kugeza ubwo umubare w'abagaragu bagenzi babo n'abavandimwe babo uzaba ushyitse , ari bo bagombaga kuzicwa kimwe na bo .
66006012	Mbona Umwana w'intama avanaho ikimenyetso cya gatandatu . Habaho umutingito w'isi ukaze , izuba rihinduka umukara nk'umwambaro ugaragaza akababaro , n'ukwezi guhinduka umutuku nk'amaraso .
66006013	Inyenyeri zihanuka ku ijuru , zigwa ku isi , nk'uko imbuto z'umutini zihanantuka zikiri mbisi , iyo zihuye n'umuyaga ukaze .
66006014	Ijuru rikurwaho nk'uko bazinga umuzingo w'igitabo , n'imisozi yose n'ibirwa byose bikurwa aho byari biri .
66006015	Abami batwara iyi si n'ibikomerezwa byayo , abagaba b'ingabo n'abakungu n'abanyambaraga , abakoreshwa agahato kimwe n'abigenga , bose biroha mu buvumo no mu bitare byo ku misozi ngo bihishe .
66006016	Babwiraga imisozi n'ibitare bati : “ Nimutugweho muduhishe amaso y'Iyicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami , muduhishe n'uburakari bw'Umwana w'intama .
66006017	Uyu ni wo munsi ukaze w'uburakari bwabo . Ni nde uzawurokoka ? ”
66007001	Hanyuma mbona abamarayika bane bahagaze mu mpande enye z'isi . Bari bafashe imiyaga ine ihaturuka , kugira ngo hatagira n'umwe muri yo uhuha ku isi cyangwa ku nyanja , cyangwa ku giti icyo ari cyo cyose .
66007002	Mbona n'undi mumarayika uturutse iburasirazuba , afite ikashe yahawe n'Imana nzima . Nuko arangurura ijwi cyane , abwira ba bamarayika bane bari batumwe kwangiza isi n'inyanja ati :
66007003	“ Ntimwangize isi cyangwa inyanja cyangwa ibiti , kugeza ubwo tuzaba tumaze gutera icyapa mu ruhanga rwa buri mugaragu w'Imana yacu . ”
66007004	Numva ko umubare w'abashyizweho icyo kimenyetso ari ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bo mu miryango yose ikomoka kuri Isiraheli .
66007005	Mu muryango wa Yuda , abashyizweho ikimenyetso ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Rubeni , abagishyizweho ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Gadi , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri .
66007006	Mu muryango wa Ashēri , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Nefutali , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Manase , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri .
66007007	Mu muryango wa Simeyoni , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Levi , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Isakari , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri .
66007008	Mu muryango wa Zabuloni , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri . Mu muryango wa Yozefu , ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri , no mu muryango wa Benyamini , abagishyizweho ni ibihumbi cumi na bibiri .
66007009	Hanyuma ngira ntya mbona imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu batabarika . Bari bakomotse mu mahanga yose no mu miryango yose , mu moko yose no mu bavuga indimi izo ari zo zose . Bari bahagaze imbere y'intebe ya cyami y'Imana n'imbere y'Umwana w'intama , bambaye amakanzu yera kandi bafashe amashami y'imikindo mu ntoki .
66007010	Nuko barangurura ijwi cyane bati : “ Agakiza kava ku Mana yacu yicaye ku ntebe ya cyami , kava no ku Mwana w'intama . ”
66007011	Ubwo abamarayika bose bari bahagaze , bazengurutse ya ntebe na ba bakuru na bya binyabuzima bine . Ni ko kwikubita hasi imbere y'iyo ntebe ya cyami , baramya Imana
66007012	bavuga bati : “ Amina ! Ugusingizwa n'ikuzo , ubwenge n'ugushimirwa , icyubahiro n'ububasha n'imbaraga , ni iby'Imana yacu iteka ryose ! Amina . ”
66007013	Nuko umwe muri ba bakuru arambaza ati : “ Mbese bariya bambaye amakanzu yera ni ba nde kandi baturutse he ? ”
66007014	Ndamusubiza nti : “ Mubyeyi , ni wowe ubizi . ” Arambwira ati : “ Bariya ni abaciye mu makuba akabije . Bameshe amakanzu yabo bayeza mu maraso y'Umwana w'intama .
66007015	Ni yo mpamvu bari imbere y'intebe ya cyami y'Imana , bayikorera ijoro n'amanywa mu Ngoro yayo . Iyicaye kuri iyo ntebe izabacira ingando , ibatwikīre kandi ibarinde .
66007016	Ntibazongera kugira inzara cyangwa inyota , cyangwa ngo bicwe n'izuba cyangwa icyokere cyose .
66007017	Umwana w'intama uri ku ntebe ya cyami rwagati , azababera umushumba abashore ku masōko y'amazi y'ubugingo , kandi Imana izahanagura amarira yose ku maso yabo . ”
66008001	Igihe Umwana w'intama avanyeho ikimenyetso cya karindwi cyari gifunze wa muzingo w'igitabo , numva mu ijuru ngo cee ! Bimara nk'igice cy'isaha .
66008002	Nuko mbona abamarayika barindwi bahagaze imbere y'Imana , bahabwa impanda ndwi .
66008003	Undi mumarayika araza ahagarara iruhande rw'igicaniro , afashe icyotezo cyacuzwe mu izahabu . Ahabwa imibavu myinshi yo kosereza ku gicaniro cy'izahabu kiri imbere y'intebe ya cyami , hamwe n'amasengesho y'intore zose z'Imana .
66008004	Umwotsi w'imibavu uva mu ntoki z'uwo mumarayika , uzamukira imbere y'Imana hamwe n'amasengesho y'intore .
66008005	Hanyuma umumarayika afata icyotezo , acyuzuzamo umuriro wo ku gicaniro awuroha ku isi . Nuko inkuba zirahinda , habaho urusaku , imirabyo irarabya , n'isi iratingita .
66008006	Nuko ba bamarayika barindwi bari bafite impanda bitegura kuzivuza .
66008007	Umumarayika wa mbere avuza impanda , urubura n'umuriro bivanze n'amaraso bihita byiroha ku isi . Kimwe cya gatatu cy'isi yose kirashya , na kimwe cya gatatu cy'ibiti kirashya , ibyatsi byose na byo birashya .
66008008	Umumarayika wa kabiri avuza impanda , igisa n'umusozi munini ugurumana gihita cyiroha mu nyanja . Kimwe cya gatatu cy'inyanja gihinduka amaraso .
66008009	Kimwe cya gatatu cy'ibifite ubuzima byo mu nyanja kirapfa , na kimwe cya gatatu cy'amato kirasenyuka .
66008010	Umumarayika wa gatatu avuza impanda , inyenyeri nini igurumana ihubuka ku ijuru igwira kimwe cya gatatu cy'inzuzi , igwira n'amasōko y'imigezi .
66008011	Iyo nyenyeri yitwa Muravumba . Bityo kimwe cya gatatu cy'amazi kirarura , abantu benshi bicwa no kunywa ayo mazi yahindutse ibamba .
66008012	Umumarayika wa kane avuza impanda , kimwe cya gatatu cy'izuba na kimwe cya gatatu cy'ukwezi na kimwe cya gatatu cy'inyenyeri birakabona , ku buryo kimwe cya gatatu cy'amanywa na kimwe cya gatatu cy'ijoro byacuze umwijima .
66008013	Ngiye kumva numva kagoma imwe yagurukaga iriya kure mu kirere , iravuga cyane iti : “ Mbega ishyano ! Mbega ishyano ! Mbega ishyano abatuye isi bose bazagusha , kubera impanda zigiye kuzavuzwa n'abamarayika batatu basigaye ! ”
66009001	Hanyuma umumarayika wa gatanu avuza impanda , mbona inyenyeri ihanutse ku ijuru igwa ku isi , ihabwa urufunguzo rufungura ikuzimu .
66009002	Imaze kuhafungura havamo umwotsi umeze nk'uw'itanura rinini cyane . Izuba n'ikirere bizimagizwa n'uwo mwotsi uva ikuzimu .
66009003	Muri uwo mwotsi havamo inzige zikwira isi . Izo nzige zihabwa ubushobozi bumeze nk'ubw'igisimba bita indyanishamurizo .
66009004	Zitegekwa kutagira icyo zitwara ibyatsi cyangwa ibiti cyangwa ikimera icyo ari cyo cyose , keretse abantu batateweho ikimenyetso cy'Imana mu ruhanga .
66009005	Izo nzige ntizemererwa kubica burundu , keretse kubica urubozo mu gihe cy'amezi atanu . Uburibwe zabateraga ni nk'ubwo umuntu yumva iyo ariwe n'indyanishamurizo .
66009006	Muri iyo minsi abantu bazahamagara urupfu barubure . Bazifuza gupfa ariko urupfu ruzabahunga .
66009007	Izo nzige zasaga n'amafarasi yiteguye kujya ku rugamba . Ku mitwe yazo wagira ngo zari zambaye amakamba y'izahabu , naho mu maso zari ziteye nk'abantu .
66009008	Zari zifite ubwoya bumeze nk'imisatsi y'abagore itendera mu mugongo , naho amenyo yazo yari nk'ay'intare .
66009009	Wagira ngo zambaye amakoti ya gisirikari akozwe mu cyuma , kandi urusaku rw'amababa yazo rwari nk'urw'amagare menshi akururwa n'amafarasi agiye ku rugamba .
66009010	Zari zifite imirizo irimo urubori , isa n'iy'indyanishamurizo . Muri iyo mirizo ni ho zakuraga ubushobozi bwo kugirira abantu nabi mu gihe cy'amezi atanu .
66009011	Umwami w'izo nzige ni umumarayika ugenga ikuzimu , akitwa Murimbuzi — mu giheburayi ni Abadoni , naho mu kigereki ni Apoliyoni .
66009012	Dore icyago cya mbere kirahise , kigiye gukurikirwa n'ibindi bibiri .
66009013	Umumarayika wa gatandatu aherako avuza impanda , maze numva ijwi riturutse hagati y'amahembe ari mu mfuruka enye z'igicaniro cy'izahabu kiri imbere y'Imana .
66009014	Uwavugaga abwira uwo mumarayika wa gatandatu ufashe impanda ati : “ Bohora ba bamarayika bane baboheye hafi y'uruzi rwitwa Efurati . ”
66009015	Nuko barababohora . Byari bigenwe ko abo bamarayika babohorwa kuri iyo saha y'uwo munsi , muri uko kwezi k'uwo mwaka , kugira ngo bice kimwe cya gatatu cy'abatuye isi bose .
66009016	Mbona n'abasirikari bahetswe n'amafarasi , numva bavuga umubare wabo ko ari miliyoni magana abiri .
66009017	Dore uko neretswe ayo mafarasi n'abahetswe na yo : bari bambaye amakoti ya gisirikari akozwe mu cyuma . Ayo makoti yari umutuku nk'uw'ikara ryaka n'ubururu nka safiro , n'umuhondo nk'amazuku . Imitwe y'amafarasi yasaga n'iy'intare , kandi mu minwa yayo havagamo umuriro n'umwotsi n'amazuku .
66009018	Kimwe cya gatatu cy'abantu cyicwa n'ibyo byorezo bitatu : umuriro n'umwotsi n'ubumara bw'umuhondo byavaga mu minwa ya ya mafarasi .
66009019	Ubushobozi bw'ayo mafarasi bwaturukaga mu minwa yayo no mu mirizo yayo . Imirizo yayo yasaga n'inzoka , yari ifite imitwe yakoreshaga kugira ngo igirire abantu nabi .
66009020	Nyamara abantu bose basigaye batishwe n'ibyo byorezo , ntibīhana ngo bareke ibigirwamana bari barakoze ubwabo . Ntibareka kuramya ingabo za Satani n'ibigirwamana bikozwe mu izahabu no mu ifeza , no mu muringa no mu ibuye no mu giti , kandi bitabona ntibyumve ntibigende ,
66009021	habe ngo banihane ibyaha byabo byo kwica no kuroga , no gusambana no kwiba .
66010001	Nuko mbona undi mumarayika ukomeye amanuka ava mu ijuru . Yari yambaye igicu ho umwenda , kandi umutwe we uzengurutswe n'umukororombya . Mu maso he harabagiranaga nk'izuba , naho amaguru ye yasaga n'inkingi zaka umuriro .
66010002	Mu kiganza cye yari afashe agatabo kabumbuye . Ashinga ikirenge cy'iburyo ku nyanja , naho icy'ibumoso agishinga imusozi .
66010003	Aherako arangurura ijwi cyane avuga nk'intare yomongana . Amaze kurangurura ijwi , inkuba ndwi na zo zirahinda cyane .
66010004	Izo nkuba ndwi ngo zimare kuvuga nitegura kwandika ibyo zivuze . Nuko numva ijwi riturutse mu ijuru ry'uvuga ati : “ Uramenye , ibyo izo nkuba ndwi zivuze ubigire ibanga ntubyandike ! ”
66010005	Wa mumarayika nabonye ahagaze ku nyanja n'imusozi , ashyira ejuru ukuboko kw'iburyo akwerekeza ku ijuru .
66010006	Ni ko kurahira Ihoraho iteka ryose yaremye ijuru n'ibiririmo byose , n'isi n'ibiyiriho byose , n'inyanja n'ibiyirimo byose ati : “ Nta kundi gutegereza !
66010007	Igihe umumarayika wa karindwi azaba agiye kuvuza impanda , Imana izahita isohoza umugambi wayo ubu ukiri ibanga , nk'uko yawumenyesheje abagaragu bayo b'abahanuzi . ”
66010008	Nuko nongera kumva rya jwi nigeze kumva ry'uvugira mu ijuru , arambwira ati : “ Genda ufate ka gatabo kabumbuye , kari mu kiganza cy'umumarayika uhagaze ku nyanja n'imusozi . ”
66010009	Nuko ndagenda nsanga uwo mumarayika musaba kumpa ako gatabo . Arambwira ati : “ Ngako gatware ukarye ukamare , nikagera mu gifu karagusharirira , naho mu kanwa karaba kakuryoheye nk'ubuki . ”
66010010	Nuko mfata ako gatabo ngakura mu kiganza cy'umumarayika , ndakarya ndakamara . Mu kanwa kandyohera nk'ubuki , ariko kageze mu gifu karandurira .
66010011	Nuko numva bambwira ngo : “ Ugomba kongera gutangaza ibyo Imana ikweretse byerekeye abantu b'amoko menshi n'amahanga menshi , n'abavuga indimi zitari zimwe n'abami benshi . ”
66011001	Nyuma mpabwa ikibingo cyo gupimisha , barambwira ngo : “ Haguruka ufate ingero z'Ingoro y'Imana n'iz'urutambiro rwayo , kandi ubarure n'abayisengeramo .
66011002	Icyakora ntufate ingero z'ikigo kizengurutse Ingoro , kuko cyo cyagizwe icy'abanyamahanga . Bazaribata umurwa w'Imana hashire amezi mirongo ine n'abiri .
66011003	Nzatuma abahamya babiri bo guhamya ibyanjye , maze bagende bambaye imyambaro igaragaza akababaro bahanure bavuge ibyo mbatumye , hashire iminsi igihumbi na magana abiri na mirongo itandatu . ”
66011004	Abo bahamya bombi ni bo bya biti by'iminzenze bibiri , ni na bo ya matara abiri ateretswe imbere ya Nyagasani ugenga isi .
66011005	Iyo hagize ushaka kubagirira nabi , umuriro uva mu kanwa kabo ugatwika abanzi babo . Uko ni ko ushaka kubagirira nabi agomba kwicwa .
66011006	Bafite ubushobozi bwo gutegeka ijuru imvura ntigwe , kugeza igihe bazarangiriza guhanura . Bafite n'ubushobozi bwo guhindura amazi amaraso , no guteza isi ibyorezo by'ubwoko bwose igihe cyose babishakiye .
66011007	Nibarangiza guhamya ibyo batumwe igikōko kizava ikuzimu kibatere , kibatsinde maze kibice .
66011008	Nuko imirambo yabo izanama mu muhanda mukuru wa wa mujyi mugari , ha handi Umwami wabo yabambwe ku musaraba . Ku buryo bwo kugereranya , uwo mujyi witwa Sodoma na Misiri .
66011009	Abo mu moko yose n'imiryango yose n'abavuga indimi izo ari zo zose , n'abo mu mahanga yose bazashungera iyo mirambo be kwemera ko ihambwa , hashire iminsi itatu n'igice .
66011010	Abo bahanuzi bombi abatuye isi yose bazabishima hejuru banezezwe n'uko bapfuye , maze bohererezanye impano zo kwishima kuko abo bombi bari bababaje cyane abatuye isi .
66011011	Nyamara iminsi itatu n'igice ishize umwuka w'ubugingo uturutse ku Mana winjira muri bo , maze barahaguruka bahagarara bemye , abababonye bashya ubwoba .
66011012	Abo bahanuzi bumva ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru avuga cyane ati : “ Nimuzamuke muze hano ! ” Baherako bazamukira mu gicu , bajya mu ijuru abanzi babo babareba .
66011013	Muri ako kanya haba umutingito w'isi ukaze maze kimwe cya cumi cy'umujyi kirasenyuka , abantu ibihumbi birindwi bahitanwa na wo . Abasigaye utahitanye bashya ubwoba , maze baha Imana nyir'ijuru ikuzo .
66011014	Dore icyago cya kabiri kirahise . Nyamara , icya gatatu kigiye kuza bidatinze .
66011015	Hanyuma umumarayika wa karindwi avuza impanda . Mu ijuru humvikana amajwi y'abavuga cyane bati : “ Ukwiriye kwima ingoma ngo ategeke iyi si ni Nyagasani Imana yacu hamwe na Kristo yatoranyije , kandi izayigenga iteka ryose . ”
66011016	Nuko ba bakuru makumyabiri na bane bicaye imbere y'Imana ku ntebe zabo za cyami , bikubita hasi baramya Imana
66011017	bavuga bati : “ Nyagasani Mana Ishoborabyose , wowe uriho kandi wahozeho , tugushimiye ko wakoresheje ububasha bukomeye ufite ukima ingoma .
66011018	Abanyamahanga bararakaye , ariko none igihe kirageze ngo uburakari bwawe bugaragare . Ni igihe cyo gucira abapfuye imanza , no kugororera abagaragu bawe b'abahanuzi n'intore zawe zose zigutinya , ari aboroheje ari n'abakomeye . Ni igihe cyo gutsembaho abatsemba isi . ”
66011019	Mu ijuru Ingoro y'Imana iherako irakinguka , Isanduku y'Isezerano iyirimo iraboneka . Imirabyo irarabya , amajwi ararangīra , inkuba zirahinda , isi iratigita hagwa n'urubura rukaze .
66012001	Hanyuma mu ijuru haboneka ikimenyetso gikomeye . Yari umugore wambaye izuba , ushinze ibirenge ku kwezi , kandi mu mutwe akaba yambaye ikamba rigizwe n'inyenyeri cumi n'ebyiri .
66012002	Yari ku nda atakishwa n'ibise byamuryaga .
66012003	Hanyuma ikindi kimenyetso kiboneka mu ijuru . Cyari ikiyoka cya kabutindi cy'urutuku gifite imitwe irindwi n'amahembe icumi , kandi kuri buri mutwe cyari cyambaye ikamba .
66012004	Nuko gikoresha umurizo wacyo nk'umukubuzo , gihanantura ku ijuru kimwe cya gatatu cy'inyenyeri kizijugunya ku isi . Icyo kiyoka gihagarara imbere y'uwo mugore wari ugiye kubyara , cyiteguye kumira bunguri umwana akiva mu nda .
66012005	Uwo mugore abyara umwana w'umuhungu ugomba kuzayobora amahanga yose , ayaragije inkoni y'icyuma . Nuko uwo mwana ahita arahwa ajyanwa ku Mana yicaye ku ntebe yayo ya cyami .
66012006	Uwo mugore ahungira mu butayu ahantu Imana yagennye ko azagaburirwa , hagashira iminsi igihumbi na magana abiri na mirongo itandatu .
66012007	Mu ijuru intambara irarota , Mikayeli n'ingabo z'abamarayika ayobora barwanya cya kiyoka , maze na cyo kirabarwanya gifashijwe n'abamarayika babaye ingabo zacyo .
66012008	Ikiyoka kiratsindwa nticyaba kicyemerewe kuguma mu ijuru , kimwe n'ingabo zacyo .
66012009	Nuko icyo kiyoka cya kabutindi kimeneshwa mu ijuru , ni cyo ya nzoka ya kera yitwa Umwanzi na Satani iyobya abatuye isi bose , maze kirohwa ku isi kimwe n'abamarayika bacyo .
66012010	Numva ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru avuga cyane ati : “ Ubu agakiza k'Imana yacu karasohoye ! Ubu yerekanye ububasha bwayo ngo yime ingoma ! Noneho Kristo Imana yatoranyije yagaragaje ubushobozi bwe , kuko uwaregaga abavandimwe bacu ku Mana yacu ijoro n'amanywa yameneshejwe mu ijuru !
66012011	Uwaregaga abavandimwe bacu baramutsinze babikesha amaraso y'Umwana w'intama n'ijambo ry'ukuri bahamyaga , ku buryo bemeye guhara amagara yabo ntibatinya no gupfa .
66012012	Nuko rero wa juru we n'abagutuyemo , nimwishime ! Naho wa si we nawe wa nyanja we , mugushije ishyano ! Dore Satani arabamanukiye aje arakaye cyane , kuko azi ko igihe cye gisigaye ari gito . ”
66012013	Cya kiyoka kibonye ko kiroshywe ku isi , gitangira guhiga wa mugore wabyaye umwana w'umuhungu .
66012014	Umugore ahabwa amababa abiri nk'aya kagoma nini kugira ngo aguruke , ajye ha hantu yateganyirijwe mu butayu ahungireyo ya nzoka , hashire imyaka itatu n'igice ahagaburirirwa .
66012015	Iyo nzoka ivundereza amazi ameze nk'uruzi , irukurikiza wa mugore kugira ngo rumutembane .
66012016	Nuko isi igoboka umugore , irāsama imira urwo ruzi ruvuye mu kanwa ka cya kiyoka .
66012017	Ikiyoka kirakarira uwo mugore maze kijya kurwanya itsinda ry'abasigaye bamukomokaho , abo ni bo bakurikiza amategeko y'Imana kandi bagakomera ku by'ukuri Yezu yahamije .
66013001	Nuko icyo kiyoka gisigara gihagaze ku musenyi wo ku nyanja . Nyuma mbona igikōko giturumbutse mu nyanja . Cyari gifite imitwe irindwi n'amahembe icumi . Buri hembe ryari ritamirijeho ikamba , naho kuri buri mutwe handitswe izina rituka Imana .
66013002	Icyo gikōko nabonye cyasaga n'ingwe . Amajanja yacyo yasaga n'ay'ikirūra , naho umunwa wacyo ugasa n'uw'intare . Cya kiyoka giha icyo gikōko ububasha bwacyo n'intebe yacyo ya cyami , n'ubushobozi bwacyo bukomeye .
66013003	Mbona umwe muri ya mitwe yacyo usa n'uwari warakomeretse uruguma rwica , ariko urwo ruguma rwari rwarakize . Abatuye isi bose baratangara bakurikira icyo gikōko .
66013004	Nuko bose baramya icyo kiyoka kubera ko cyari cyahaye igikōko ubushobozi . Baramya n'icyo gikōko ubwacyo bavuga bati : “ Mbese ni nde uhwanye n'iki gikōko ? Ni nde wagihangara akakirwanya ? ”
66013005	Icyo gikōko cyemererwa kuvuga amagambo y'ubwirasi atuka Imana , no gukoresha ubushobozi bwacyo hagashira amezi mirongo ine n'abiri .
66013006	Nuko gitangira gutuka Imana , gituka n'izina ryayo n'aho ituye hamwe n'abatuye ijuru bose .
66013007	Icyo gikōko cyemererwa kurwanya intore z'Imana no kuzitsinda , gihabwa ubushobozi bwo kwigarurira imiryango yose n'amoko yose , abavuga indimi izo ari zo zose n'amahanga yose .
66013008	Abatuye isi yose bazakiramya , ni ukuvuga abatanditswe kuva isi ikiremwa mu gitabo cy'ubugingo cy'Umwana w'intama wishwe .
66013009	“ Ufite amatwi yumva ngaho niyumve !
66013010	Ugenewe kuba imfungwa nta kabuza azafungwa , naho ugenewe kwicishwa inkota nta kabuza azicishwa inkota . Ni ngombwa rero ko intore z'Imana zigumya kwihangana zikaba n'indahemuka . ”
66013011	Nuko mbona ikindi gikōko giturumbutse ikuzimu . Cyari gifite amahembe abiri asa n'ay'umwana w'intama , nyamara kikavuga nka cya kiyoka .
66013012	Cyakoreshaga ubushobozi bwose cyahawe na cya gikōko cya mbere , na cyo kigihagarikiye . Cyahatiraga isi n'abayituye kuramya icyo gikōko cya mbere cyakize uruguma rwica .
66013013	Icyo gikōko cya kabiri cyakoraga ibitangaza bikomeye byo kwemeza abantu , kikamanura umuriro mu ijuru ukagwa ku isi abantu babireba .
66013014	Bityo kiyobya abatuye isi kubera ibitangaza cyemerewe gukora , gihagarikiwe na cya gikōko cya mbere . Cyabwiraga abatuye isi ngo bareme ishusho y'icyo gikōko cyakomerekejwe n'inkota , ariko kikarenga kikabaho .
66013015	Icyo gikōko cya kabiri gihabwa ububasha bwo guhumekera kuri iyo shusho y'icya mbere , kugira ngo kiyihe umwuka ibe nzima , ibashe kuvuga no kwicisha abantu bose batemera kuyiramya .
66013016	Nuko aboroheje n'abakomeye , abakire n'abakene , abigenga n'abakoreshwa agahato , bose kibahatira gushyirwa ikimenyetso mu kiganza cy'iburyo no mu ruhanga ,
66013017	kugira ngo hatagira uwemererwa kugira icyo agura cyangwa agurisha adafite icyo kimenyetso , ari cyo zina ry'igikōko cyangwa umubare uranga iryo zina .
66013018	Aha ni ho hagomba ubwenge . Umunyabwenge nafindure umubare w'icyo gikōko kuko uranga izina ry'umuntu . Uwo mubare ni magana atandatu na mirongo itandatu na gatandatu .
66014001	Hanyuma ngira ntya mbona Umwana w'intama ahagaze ku musozi wa Siyoni . Yari kumwe n'abantu ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine , buri wese uruhanga rwe rwanditsweho izina ry'uwo Mwana w'intama n'irya Se .
66014002	Nuko numva ijwi riturutse mu ijuru rimeze nk'amazi menshi asuma , cyangwa nk'inkuba ihinda cyane . Iryo jwi numvaga ryari rimeze kandi nk'iry'abacuranzi bacuranga inanga .
66014003	Abo bantu bari imbere ya ya ntebe ya cyami n'imbere ya bya binyabuzima bine , n'imbere ya ba bakuru baririmba indirimbo nshya . Nta muntu wabashaga kwiga iyo ndirimbo ngo ayimenye , keretse abo ngabo ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bacunguwe bakavanwa ku isi .
66014004	Abo ni abatigeze biyandurisha kuryamana n'abagore , ahubwo barinze ubusore bwabo . Abo ni bo bagenda bashagaye Umwana w'intama aho agiye hose . Ni abacunguwe bavanywe mu bantu , kugira ngo babe umuganura w'Imana n'uw'Umwana w'intama .
66014005	Nta wigeze abumvana ikinyoma na kimwe , koko ni indakemwa .
66014006	Hanyuma mbona undi mumarayika agurukira iriya kure mu kirere cy'ijuru . Yari afite Ubutumwa bwiza buhoraho yahawe ngo abutangarize abatuye isi bose b'amahanga yose , n'imiryango yose n'abavuga indimi izo ari zo zose n'ab'amoko yose .
66014007	Yavugaga cyane ati : “ Nimutinye Imana kandi muyihe ikuzo , kuko igihe cyayo cyo guca imanza kigeze . Nimuramye Iyaremye ijuru n'isi n'inyanja n'amasōko y'amazi . ”
66014008	Umumarayika wa kabiri akurikiraho aravuga ati : “ Babiloni irasenyutse ! Irasenyutse Babiloni , wa mujyi mugari wuhiye amahanga yose ubusambanyi bwawo bukabije nk'uyuhira inzoga . ”
66014009	Umumarayika wa gatatu na we akurikiraho avuga cyane ati : “ Umuntu wese uramya cya gikōko n'ishusho yacyo , agashyirwa ikimenyetso cyacyo mu ruhanga cyangwa mu kiganza ,
66014010	azanywa ku nzoga idafunguye , ari yo burakari bw'Imana yasutse mu gikombe cy'umujinya wayo . Bene uwo azababarizwa mu muriro no mu mazuku , abamarayika b'Imana n'Umwana w'intama babireba .
66014011	Umwotsi w'inkongi bababarizwamo uhora ucumba iteka ryose . Ijoro n'amanywa nta gahenge kazigera kabaho ku baramije cya gikōko n'ishusho yacyo , no ku muntu wese washyizweho ikimenyetso kiriho izina ryacyo . ”
66014012	Ni ngombwa rero ko intore z'Imana zigumya kwihangana zigakurikiza amategeko yayo , zigakomeza kwizera Yezu .
66014013	Nuko numva ijwi ry'uvugira mu ijuru arambwira ati : “ Andika ngo : ‘ Kuva ubu hahirwa abapfa bakinambye kuri Nyagasani ! ’ ” Ibyo ni koko ! Ni na ko Mwuka w'Imana abivuze ati : “ Abo bazaruhuka imvune z'imirimo yabo , kuko bazaherekezwa n'ibyiza bakoze . ”
66014014	Hanyuma ngira ntya mbona igicu cyera . Kuri icyo gicu hari hicaye usa n'umwana w'umuntu . Mu mutwe yari yambaye ikamba ry'izahabu , naho mu kiganza yari afite umuhoro utyaye .
66014015	Undi mumarayika asohoka mu Ngoro y'Imana arangurura ijwi cyane , abwira uwicaye kuri icyo gicu ati : “ Ahura umuhoro wawe usarure , kuko igihe cy'isarura kigeze . Dore imyaka yo ku isi ireze . ”
66014016	Nuko uwicaye kuri cya gicu yahura umuhoro we , asarura iyo myaka yo ku isi .
66014017	Undi mumarayika asohoka mu Ngoro y'Imana iri mu ijuru , na we afite umuhoro utyaye .
66014018	Undi mumarayika na none wahawe ubushobozi bwo kugenga umuriro , aza avuye ku rutambiro rw'Imana . Avuga cyane ahamagara wa wundi ufite umuhoro utyaye ati : “ Turira umuhoro wawe utyaye maze usarure amaseri y'imizabibu yo ku isi , kuko imbuto zayo zihishije . ”
66014019	Uwo mumarayika aturira umuhoro we asarura imizabibu yo ku isi , ayiroha mu muvure mugari havamo inzoga , ari yo burakari bw'Imana .
66014020	Nuko izo mbuto z'imizabibu zengerwa inyuma y'umurwa , maze havamo amaraso asendera ahantu hafite umurambararo ungana n'ibirometero magana atatu , n'ubujyakuzimu bwa metero imwe n'igice .
66015001	Nyuma mbona mu ijuru ikindi kimenyetso gikomeye kandi gitangaje : ni abamarayika barindwi bacigatiye ibyago birindwi by'imperuka , ari ibyo Imana yarangirijemo uburakari bwayo .
66015002	Nuko mbona igisa n'ikiyaga cy'ibirahure bivanzwemo umuriro . Mbona n'abatsinze cya gikōko n'ishusho yacyo , kandi batsinze wa mubare uranga izina ryacyo . Bari bahagaze ku kiyaga cy'ibirahure bafashe inanga bahawe n'Imana .
66015003	Baririmbaga indirimbo ya Musa umugaragu w'Imana , n'indirimbo y'Umwana w'intama bagira bati :
66015004	Nyagasani , ni nde utagutinya ? Ni nde utagusingiza ? Ni wowe Muziranenge wenyine . Amahanga yose azaza akwikubite imbere , azakuramya kuko ibikorwa byawe byubutabera byagaragaye . ”
66015005	Nyuma y'ibyo mbona mu ijuru Ingoro y'Imana irakinguwe , ari ryo Hema rihamya Isezerano yagiranye n'abayo .
66015006	Ba bamarayika barindwi bacigatiye bya byago birindwi basohoka muri iyo Ngoro , bari bakenyeye mu gituza imyenda ikenkemuye kandi irabagirana , bayikenyeje imikandara y'izahabu .
66015007	Kimwe muri bya binyabuzima bine giha ba bamarayika barindwi inzabya ndwi z'izahabu , zuzuye uburakari bw'Imana ihoraho iteka ryose .
66015008	Iyo Ngoro yuzura umwotsi kubera ikuzo ry'Imana n'ububasha bwayo . Nta muntu n'umwe wabashije kwinjira mu Ngoro , kugeza ubwo ibyago birindwi byazanywe n'abamarayika barindwi birangiye .
66016001	Hanyuma numva ijwi rikaze ry'uvugira cyane mu Ngoro y'Imana , abwira ba bamarayika barindwi ati : “ Nimugende musuke ku isi za nzabya ndwi zuzuye uburakari bw'Imana . ”
66016002	Umumarayika wa mbere aragenda asuka urwabya rwe ku isi , ibisebe bibi biryana bihita byaduka ku bantu bashyizweho ikimenyetso cya cya gikōko bakanaramya ishusho yacyo .
66016003	Umumarayika wa kabiri asuka urwabya rwe mu nyanja , amazi ahita ahinduka amaraso nk'ay'umuntu wapfuye , maze ibifite ubuzima byose byo mu nyanja birapfa .
66016004	Umumarayika wa gatatu asuka urwabya rwe mu nzuzi no mu masōko y'amazi , bihita bihinduka amaraso .
66016005	Nuko numva umumarayika ushinzwe iby'amazi agira ati : “ Uri intabera kuko wagennye guca imanza utyo , wowe Muziranenge uriho kandi wahozeho .
66016006	Kubera ko bamennye amaraso y'intore zawe n'ay'abahanuzi bawe , ni cyo gitumye nawe ubaha amaraso ngo abe ari yo banywa , ubakaniye urubakwiye . ”
66016007	Hanyuma numva ijwi ry'uvugira ku rutambiro agira ati : “ Ni koko Nyagasani Mana Ishoborabyose , uca imanza z'ukuri n'ubutabera . ”
66016008	Umumarayika wa kane asuka urwabya rwe ku zuba , rihita rihabwa uburenganzira bwo kotsa abantu bikabije .
66016009	Nuko abantu bababurwa n'icyokere cy'izuba rikaze , maze batuka Imana ifite ububasha kuri ibyo byorezo , nyamara ntibemera kwisubiraho ngo bayihe ikuzo .
66016010	Umumarayika wa gatanu asuka urwabya rwe ku ntebe ya cyami ya cya gikōko , ubwami bwacyo buhita bucura umwijima . Abantu bakanjakanja indimi zabo babitewe no kuribwa cyane ,
66016011	maze batuka Imana nyir'ijuru kubera ububabare n'ibisebe bafite . Nyamara ntibemera kwisubiraho ngo bareke ibibi bakora .
66016012	Umumarayika wa gatandatu asuka urwabya rwe mu ruzi rugari rwa Efurati , amazi yarwo ahita akama kugira ngo abami baturutse iburasirazuba babone inzira .
66016013	Nuko mbona ingabo za Satani eshatu zisa n'ibikeri , zavaga mu kanwa ka cya kiyoka no mu kanwa ka cya gikōko , no mu kanwa ka wa muhanurabinyoma .
66016014	Izo ni zo ngabo za Satani zikora ibitangaza byo kwemeza abantu , zisanga abami bo ku isi yose ngo zibakoranyirize kujya ku rugamba kuri wa munsi ukomeye w'Imana Ishoborabyose .
66016015	Nyagasani aravuga ati : “ Dore ndaje ngutunguye nk'umujura ! Hahirwa umuntu wese uhora ari maso , akagumana imyambaro ye kugira ngo atavaho agenda ari umutumbure , maze agaterwa isoni n'uko bamubona yambaye ubusa . ”
66016016	Izo ngabo za Satani zikoranyiriza abami ahantu hitwa Harimagedoni mu giheburayi .
66016017	Umumarayika wa karindwi asuka urwabya rwe mu kirere , maze mu Ngoro y'Imana kuri ya ntebe ya cyami humvikana ijwi ry'uvuga cyane ati : “ Karabaye ! ”
66016018	Nuko imirabyo irarabya , amajwi ararangira , inkuba zirahinda n'isi iratingita cyane . Kuva abantu baba ku isi ntihigeze habaho umutingito w'isi ukaze nk'uwo .
66016019	Wa mujyi w'icyatwa Babiloni usadukamo gatatu , n'indi mijyi y'amahanga irasenyuka . Uwo mujyi w'icyatwa Imana iwugerera mu kebo kawukwiye , iwuhira inzoga ibirira mu gikombe , ari yo burakari bwayo bukaze .
66016020	Ibirwa byose birahunga , imisozi na yo ntiyongera kuboneka .
66016021	Nuko amahindu manini ava mu ijuru agwira abantu , rimwe rifite uburemere bwaba nk'ibiro mirongo ine . Abantu ni ko gutuka Imana kubera icyo cyorezo cy'amahindu kuko cyari gikabije .
66017001	Hanyuma umwe mu bamarayika barindwi bari bafashe za nzabya ndwi araza arambwira ati : “ Ngwino nkwereke igihano giteganyirijwe indaya kabuhariwe , ari yo wa mujyi w'icyatwa wubatswe ku nkombe z'amazi magari .
66017002	Abami bo ku isi basambanye na yo , kandi abatuye isi basinze ubusambanyi bwayo nk'uwasinze inzoga . ”
66017003	Mwuka w'Imana anzaho maze ndabonekerwa , umumarayika anjyana kure mu butayu . Nuko mbona umugore uhetswe n'igikōko gitukura , cyari cyuzuyeho amazina atuka Imana . Icyo gikōko cyari gifite imitwe irindwi n'amahembe icumi .
66017004	Umugore yari yambaye imyenda y'agaciro y'umutuku wijimye n'itukura tukutuku , kandi yirimbishije ibintu bikozwe mu izahabu , no mu mabuye y'agaciro n'amasaro y'agahebuzo .
66017005	Mu ruhanga rwe hari handitswe izina ry'irigenurano ngo : “ Babiloni y'icyatwa , nyina w'indaya n'ibyo ku isi byose bizira ku Mana . ”
66017006	Nuko mbona ko uwo mugore yasinze amaraso y'intore z'Imana , kimwe n'amaraso y'abishwe bahōrwa guhamya ibya Yezu . Mubonye ntyo ndumirwa !
66017007	Nuko umumarayika arambaza ati : “ Utangajwe n'iki ? Ngiye kugusobanurira amayobera yerekeye uwo mugore n'ayerekeye igikōko kimuhetse , gifite imitwe irindwi n'amahembe icumi .
66017008	Igikōko wabonye cyahozeho kera none ntikikiriho . Ubu kigiye kuva ikuzimu kugira ngo kirimburwe . Abatuye isi batanditswe mu gitabo cy'ubugingo kuva isi ikiremwa , bazatangara babonye icyo gikōko cyigeze kubaho none kikaba kitakiriho , ariko kikazongera kubaho .
66017009	“ Kuri ibyo haragomba ubwenge butuma umuntu asobanukirwa . Ya mitwe irindwi ni yo misozi irindwi wa mugore yicayeho . Ubundi kandi ni yo bami barindwi ,
66017010	abatanu muri bo barahangutse , umwe ni we uri ku ngoma ubu , naho undi ntaraza . Naza azagomba kumara igihe gito .
66017011	Cya gikōko cyahozeho ubu kikaba kitakiriho , ni cyo mwami wa munani . Uwo mwami abarirwa hamwe na ba bandi barindwi kandi agiye kuzatsembwaho .
66017012	“ Amahembe icumi wabonye na yo ni abami icumi bataratangira kwima ingoma , ariko bazahabwa ubushobozi bwo kwima ingoma , bafatanyije na cya gikōko kumara isaha imwe .
66017013	Bose uko ari icumi bahuje umugambi wo kwegurira cya gikōko ububasha n'ubushobozi bwabo .
66017014	Bazarwanya Umwana w'intama , ariko azabatsinda kuko ari we Mutegetsi ugenga abategetsi akaba n'Umwami ugenga abami . Azabatsinda afatanyije n'abo yahamagaye akabatoranya , bakamubaho indahemuka . ”
66017015	Umumarayika arongera arambwira ati : “ Amazi wabonye ha handi ya ndaya yicaye , ni yo moko n'imbaga n'amahanga n'abavuga indimi zitari zimwe .
66017016	Na ya mahembe icumi wabonye kimwe na cya gikōko , bizanga ya ndaya . Bizayicuza ibyo ifite byose , biyisige ari umutumbure . Bizayirya bitapfune inyama zayo , maze biyitwike ikongoke .
66017017	Erega Imana yashyize umugambi wayo mu mitima yabyo , ngo bikore ibyo na yo yagambiriye ! Bityo ayo mahembe azahuriza ku mugambi umwe rukumbi , yegurire cya gikōko ubushobozi bwayo bwa cyami , kugeza ubwo ibyo Imana yavuze bibaye .
66017018	“ Naho umugore wabonye ni wa mujyi w'icyatwa , uganjemo ubwami bufite ubutegetsi ku bami bose bo ku isi . ”
66018001	Hanyuma mbona undi mumarayika amanutse ava mu ijuru . Aza afite ubushobozi burambuye , isi yose imurikirwa n'ikuzo rye .
66018002	Nuko arangurura ijwi cyane agira ati : “ Babiloni irasenyutse ! Irasenyutse Babiloni wa mujyi w'icyatwa ! Usigaye utuwe n'ingabo za Satani , uhindutse isenga ry'intumwa ze zose zihumanya , uhindutse kandi indiri y'ibisiga byose bihumanya kandi bizira .
66018003	Amahanga yose yanyoye inzoga zawo , ari zo busambanyi bwawo bukabije . Abami b'isi bagiye basambana na wo , kandi n'abacuruzi bo ku isi bakungahajwe n'umurengwe wawo utagira akagero . ”
66018004	Hanyuma numva ijwi ry'undi uvugira mu ijuru agira ati : “ Nimusohoke muri Babiloni bantu banjye , kugira ngo mutagira uruhare ku byaha byayo , maze mugasangira na yo ibyorezo biyigenewe .
66018005	Erega ibyaha byayo byarenze ihaniro , kandi Imana ntiyibagiwe ubugome bwa Babiloni !
66018006	Nimuyīture ibihwanye n'ibyo yakoze , akebo yabagereyemo mukayigereremo incuro ebyiri , inzoga ikaze yabahaye muyiyihe irushijeho gukara incuro ebyiri .
66018007	Aho Babiloni iyo yageze yiha ikuzo n'umurengwe , muhageze kuyiteza ububabare n'icyunamo . Dore iribwira iti : ‘ Ndimakajwe , ndi umwamikazi , sindi umupfakazi kandi sinteze kugira uwo ngira mu cyunamo bibaho ! ’
66018008	Ni yo mpamvu ibyorezo biyigenewe , ari byo ndwara zica no gupfusha n'inzara bizayigwira icyarimwe . Izashya ikongoke , kuko Nyagasani Imana yayiciriye urwo rubanza igira amaboko . ”
66018009	Abami b'isi bihaye gusambana n'icyo cyatwa Babiloni bakarengwa , bazarira baboroge babonye umwotsi w'inkongi yayo .
66018010	Bazayitaza kubera gutinya ububabare bwayo bagire bati : “ Mbega ishyano ! Mbega ishyano rikugwiriye , wowe Babiloni mujyi w'icyatwa w'igihangange ! Isaha imwe irahagije kugira ngo akawe kabe gashobotse ! ”
66018011	Abacuruzi bo ku isi na bo baririra uwo mujyi ndetse bawugira mu cyunamo , kuko nta muntu n'umwe ukigira icyo agura ku bicuruzwa byabo .
66018012	Ntawe ukigura izahabu yabo n'ifeza , n'amabuye y'agaciro n'amasaro y'agahebuzo , n'imyenda myiza inoze n'imyenda y'umuhemba , n'itukura tukutuku n'indi yitwa hariri . Nta n'ukigura ibiti byabo by'imbonekarimwe by'amoko atari amwe , kimwe n'ibikozwe mu mahembe y'inzovu , no mu mbaho z'agaciro no mu muringa , no mu butare no mu mabuye yitwa marumari .
66018013	Ntawe ukigura n'ibyitwa sinamomu n'ishangi , n'amarashi n'ububani n'indi mibavu na divayi , kimwe n'amavuta y'iminzenze n'ifu n'ingano . Ndetse ntawe ukigura ibimasa byabo n'intama , amafarasi n'amagare akururwa na yo , n'abantu bacuruzwa cyangwa b'inkoreragahato .
66018014	Abo bacuruzi babwira uwo mujyi bati : “ Ibyo wararikiye kubona byagushizeho , ibyakuryoheraga n'ibyaguteraga kurengwa byose ngo hubi , ntibizongera kuboneka ukundi ! ”
66018015	Abakungahajwe no gucuruza muri uwo mujyi bazawitarura , babitewe no gutinya ububabare bwawo . Bazawugira mu cyunamo baboroge ,
66018016	bavuge bati : “ Mbega ishyano ! Mbega ishyano rigwiriye umujyi w'icyatwa ! Wari wambaye imyenda myiza inoze , n'iy'umuhemba n'itukura tukutuku . Wari urimbishijwe izahabu n'amabuye y'agaciro n'amasaro y'agahebuzo .
66018017	Nyamara isaha imwe irahagije kugira ngo ubukungu bwawo buwushireho ! ” Abayobozi b'amato n'abagenzi atwara , n'abasare bayo n'abandi bose batunzwe n'imirimo yo ku nyanja bari bitaruye uwo mujyi .
66018018	Babonye umwotsi w'inkongi yawo bariyamira cyane bati : “ Nta mujyi wigeze kubaho uhwanye n'uyu w'icyatwa ! ”
66018019	Biyorera umukungugu ku mutwe , bagira mu cyunamo uwo mujyi , baboroga cyane bati : “ Mbega ishyano ! Mbega ishyano uno mujyi ubonye ! Dore ubukungu bwawo ni bwo bwakungahaje bene amato yo mu nyanja ! Nyamara isaha imwe irahagije kugira ngo byose biwushireho ! ”
66018020	Icyakora wowe wa juru we ishime , kuko Babiloni isenyutse . Namwe ntore z'Imana , namwe ntumwa zayo , namwe bahanuzi bayo nimwishime , kuko Imana yayiciriye urubanza rukwiranye n'ibibi yabagiriye .
66018021	Umumarayika w'igihangange aherako aterura ibuye ringana n'urusyo runini cyane , arijugunya mu nyanja aravuga ati : “ Uku ni ko umujyi w'icyatwa Babiloni uzatsembwaho , ntihagire uwongera kuwubona ukundi .
66018022	Muri wowe ntawe uzumva ukundi abacuranzi b'inanga n'abaririmbyi , n'abavuza imyironge n'impanda . Ntawe uzongera kukubarizamo umunyabukorikori uzi umwuga uwo ari wo wose . Muri wowe nta jwi ry'urusyo rizongera kumvikana ukundi .
66018023	Urumuri rw'itara ntiruzakuboneshereza ukundi , kandi muri wowe nta jwi ry'umukwe n'umugeni rizongera kumvikana . Impamvu ni uko abacuruzi bawe bigize ibihangange ku isi , kandi ubupfumu bwawe bwayobeje amahanga yose . ”
66018024	Koko Babiloni yahōwe gutahurwamo amaraso y'abahanuzi n'ay'intore z'Imana , kimwe n'ay'abiciwe kuri iyi si bose .
66019001	Nyuma y'ibyo mu ijuru numva urusaku rw'imbaga nyamwinshi y'abantu bavuga cyane bati : “ Haleluya ! Agakiza n'ikuzo n'ububasha ni iby'Imana yacu .
66019002	Imanza ica ni iz'ukuri n'ubutabera . Yaruciriye ya ndaya kabuhariwe yahumanishije isi ubusambanyi bwayo . Imana yayihōye amaraso y'abagaragu bayo yishe . ”
66019003	Barongera bati : “ Haleluya ! Inkongi y'uwo mujyi ihora icumba iteka ryose ! ”
66019004	Ba bakuru makumyabiri na bane bikubita hasi kimwe na bya binyabuzima bine , baramya Imana yicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami bagira bati : “ Amina . Haleluya ! ”
66019005	Numva ijwi ry'uvugira kuri ya ntebe ya cyami agira ati : “ Nimushime Imana yacu , mwa bagaragu bayo mwese mwe , namwe abayitinya , aboroheje n'abakomeye . ”
66019006	Hanyuma numva ijwi ry'imbaga nyamwinshi rirangira nk'amazi menshi asuma , cyangwa nk'iry'inkuba zihinda cyane . Numva bavuga ngo : “ Haleluya ! Nidushime Nyagasani Imana yacu Ishoborabyose , kuko yimye ingoma .
66019007	Nitunezerwe twitere hejuru tumusingize , kuko igihe cy'ubukwe bw'Umwana w'intama kigeze kandi umugeni we akaba yiteguye .
66019008	Yemerewe kwambara umwenda mwiza unoze , ukenkemuye kandi urabagirana . Uwo mwenda unoze ushushanya ibikorwa bitunganiye Imana by'intore zayo . ”
66019009	Nuko umumarayika arambwira ati : “ Andika ibi : Hahirwa abatumiwe mu bukwe bw'Umwana w'intama . ” Yungamo ati : “ Ubwo ni ubutumwa bw'ukuri buvuye ku Mana . ”
66019010	Mpita mwikubita imbere ngo muramye , ariko arambwira ati : “ Sigaho ! Jye ndi umugaragu w'Imana kimwe nawe , kandi kimwe n'abavandimwe bawe bakomera ku by'ukuri Yezu yahamije , ahubwo uramye Imana . ” Iby'ukuri Yezu yahamije ni byo bikoresha abahanuzi .
66019011	Hanyuma mbona ijuru rikingutse mbona n'ifarasi y'igitare , uwo ihetse akitwa Indahemuka n'Umunyakuri . Ashingiye ku butabera , aca imanza kandi akajya ku rugamba .
66019012	Amaso ye ameze nk'ibirimi by'umuriro , kandi yambaye amakamba menshi mu mutwe . Afite izina rimwanditsweho ritazwi n'undi uwo ari we wese , keretse we wenyine .
66019013	Yambaye ikanzu yinitswe mu maraso kandi yitwa Jambo w'Imana .
66019014	Ingabo zo mu ijuru zari zimukurikiye zihetswe n'amafarasi y'ibitare , kandi zambaye imyenda inoze y'igitare ikenkemuye .
66019015	Mu kanwa ke havamo inkota ityaye azatera amahanga . Azayaragiza inkoni y'icyuma , kandi imbuto z'imizabibu azazengera mu muvure havemo inzoga , ari yo burakari bukaze bw'Imana Ishoborabyose .
66019016	Ku mwambaro we no ku kibero cye handitswe iri zina : “ Umwami ugenga abami n'Umutegetsi ugenga abategetsi ” .
66019017	Nuko mbona umumarayika uhagaze ku zuba . Arangurura ijwi cyane , abwira ibisiga byose byagurukaga iriya kure mu kirere cy'ijuru ati : “ Nimuze mukorane , murye iby'umunsi mukuru wateguwe n'Imana !
66019018	Nimuze murye intumbi z'abami n'iz'abagaba b'ingabo n'iz'ibihangange . Murye intumbi z'amafarasi n'iz'abo yari ahetse . Murye abantu bose , abigenga n'abakoreshwa agahato , aboroheje n'abakomeye ! ”
66019019	Hanyuma mbona cya gikōko , mbona n'abami b'isi n'ingabo zabo , bakoraniye kurwanya Uhetswe n'ifarasi n'ingabo ze .
66019020	Icyo gikōko kirafatwa , kimwe na wa muhanurabinyoma . Ni we wari warakoze ibitangaza byo kumuranga , ahagarikiwe na cya gikōko . Ibyo bitangaza abishukisha abantu bari barashyizweho ikimenyetso cy'igikōko , kandi bakaramya ishusho yacyo . Icyo gikōko kirohwa ari kizima mu kiyaga cyaka umuriro n'amazuku , na wa muhanurabinyoma akirohwamo .
66019021	Ingabo zacyo zo zicishwa inkota iva mu kanwa k'Uhetswe n'ifarasi . Nuko ibisiga byose byijuta intumbi zazo .
66020001	Nuko mbona umumarayika amanuka ava mu ijuru , yari afashe mu ntoki umunyururu munini n'urufunguzo rw'ikuzimu .
66020002	Agira atya asumira cya kiyoka , ari cyo ya nzoka ya kera yitwa Umwanzi cyangwa Satani , maze akibohesha uwo munyururu mu gihe cy'imyaka igihumbi .
66020003	Aherako akiroha ikuzimu arahafunga arahadanangira , kugira ngo icyo kiyoka kidakomeza kuyobya amahanga kugeza ubwo imyaka igihumbi irangiriye . Nyuma yaho kigomba kuzarekurwa igihe gito .
66020004	Mbona n'intebe za cyami zicaweho n'abahawe ubushobozi bwo guca imanza . Mbona n'abantu baciwe imitwe bahōrwa gukomera ku by'ukuri Yezu yahamije , no gutangaza Ijambo ry'Imana . Abo ntibigeze baramya cya gikōko cyangwa ishusho yacyo , kandi ntibigeze bemera gushyirwaho ikimenyetso cyacyo mu ruhanga cyangwa mu kiganza . Nuko barazuka bimana ingoma na Kristo imyaka igihumbi .
66020005	Iryo ryabaye izuka rya mbere . Abapfuye bandi ntibazutse kugeza ubwo imyaka igihumbi irangiye .
66020006	Abahawe umwanya mu izuka rya mbere barahirwa , kandi abo ni umwihariko w'Imana . Urupfu rwa kabiri nta bushobozi rubafiteho , bazaba abatambyi b'Imana na Kristo , kandi bazima ingoma hamwe na we imyaka igihumbi .
66020007	Imyaka igihumbi nishira Satani azarekurwa ave aho yari afungiye ,
66020008	ajye kuyobya abo mu mahanga yo mu mpande zose z'isi ari yo Gogi na Magogi , maze abakoranyirize kujya ku rugamba . Umubare wabo uzaba ungana n'umusenyi wo ku nyanja .
66020009	Nuko baraza bakwira isi yose , maze bazenguruka inkambi z'intore z'Imana n'umurwa wayo ikunda , ariko umuriro umanuka mu ijuru urabatsemba .
66020010	Satani wabayobyaga arohwa mu kiyaga cyaka umuriro kirimo n'amazuku , aho cya gikōko na wa muhanurabinyoma bari bamaze kurohwa . Bazahagorerwa ijoro n'amanywa iteka ryose .
66020011	Nuko mbona intebe ya cyami nini kandi yera de y'Imana , mbona n'Uyicayeho . Isi n'ijuru biyihungira kure birabura rwose .
66020012	Mbona n'abapfuye , abakomeye n'aboroheje bahagaze imbere y'iyo ntebe . Nuko ibitabo birabumburwa . Habumburwa n'ikindi gitabo , ari cyo gitabo cy'ubugingo . Abapfuye bacirwa imanza zishingiye ku byo bakoze , uko byanditswe muri ibyo bitabo .
66020013	Inyanja igarura abapfuye yari ibitse . Urupfu ubwarwo n'ikuzimu bigarura abapfuye byari bibitse . Nuko bose bacirwa imanza zishingiye ku byo bakoze .
66020014	Urupfu n'ikuzimu bijugunywa mu kiyaga cyaka umuriro . Icyo ni cyo rupfu rwa kabiri .
66020015	Umuntu wese batasanze yanditswe mu gitabo cy'ubugingo , na we arohwa mu kiyaga cyaka umuriro .
66021001	Hanyuma mbona ijuru rishya n'isi nshya . Ijuru rya mbere n'isi ya mbere byari byavuyeho , nta n'inyanja yari ikiriho .
66021002	Nuko mbona umurwa w'Imana ari wo Yeruzalemu nshya , umanuka uva mu ijuru ku Mana . Wari uteguwe nk'umugeni warimbishijwe agiye gusanganira umukwe .
66021003	Numva ijwi ry'uvugira kuri ya ntebe ya cyami , avuga cyane ati : “ Ubu Imana ije gutura hagati mu bantu , ibane na bo maze babe abantu bayo . Imana ubwayo izabana na bo [ ibe Imana yabo ] .
66021004	Izahanagura amarira yose ku maso yabo , kandi urupfu ntiruzongera kubaho ukundi . Ntawe uzongera gupfusha cyangwa kuboroga , cyangwa kuribwa kuko ibya mbere bizaba bivuyeho . ”
66021005	Nuko Uwari wicaye kuri ya ntebe ya cyami aravuga ati : “ Dore byose mbihinduye bishya . ” Nuko yungamo ati : “ Andika ibyo kuko ayo magambo ari ay'ukuri , akwiye kugirirwa icyizere . ”
66021006	Arambwira ati : “ Byose birarangiye . Ndi Alufa na Omega , ni ukuvuga intangiriro n'iherezo . Ufite inyota nzamuha kunywa ku mazi y'ubugingo ku buntu .
66021007	Utsinda wese ibyo nzabimuha ho umunani , kandi nzaba Imana ye na we abe umwana wanjye .
66021008	Naho ibigwari n'abahemu n'abakora ibizira ku Mana , abicanyi n'abasambanyi , n'abarozi n'abasenga ibigirwamana kimwe n'ababeshya bose , umugabane wabo uzaba kurohwa mu kiyaga cyaka umuriro kirimo n'amazuku . Ni rwo rupfu rwa kabiri . ”
66021009	Hanyuma haza umwe muri ba bamarayika barindwi , bari bacigatiye za nzabya ndwi zuzuye ibyorezo birindwi biheruka ibindi , arambwira ati : “ Ngwino nkwereke umugeni w'Umwana w'intama . ”
66021010	Mwuka anzaho ndabonekerwa maze umumarayika anjyana mu mpinga y'umusozi muremure cyane , anyereka umurwa w'Imana ari wo Yeruzalemu , umanuka uva mu ijuru ku Mana .
66021011	Warabagiranaga ikuzo ryayo , ukabengerana nk'ibuye ry'agaciro , mbese nk'iryitwa yasipi ribonerana nk'isarabwayi .
66021012	Wari uzengurutswe n'urukuta rurerure kandi rugari , rufite amarembo cumi n'abiri arinzwe n'abamarayika cumi na babiri . Kuri ayo marembo hari handitswe amazina cumi n'abiri y'imiryango cumi n'ibiri ikomoka kuri Isiraheli .
66021013	Iburasirazuba hari amarembo atatu , mu majyaruguru atatu no mu majyepfo atatu , n'iburengerazuba atatu .
66021014	Urukuta rw'uwo murwa rwari rwubatswe ku rufatiro rw'amabuye cumi n'abiri , kandi kuri ayo mabuye hari handitseho amazina y'Intumwa cumi n'ebyiri z'Umwana w'intama .
66021015	Umumarayika twavuganaga yari afite ikibingo cy'izahabu , kugira ngo afate ingero z'umurwa , n'amarembo yawo n'urukuta rwawo .
66021016	Uwo murwa wari mpandenye , umurambararo wawo wanganaga n'ubugari . Nuko umumarayika afata ingero z'umurwa n'icyo kibingo , umurambararo wawo wari ibirometero ibihumbi bibiri na magana abiri , kandi umurambararo n'ubugari n'ubuhagarike byaranganaga .
66021017	Umumarayika afata ingero z'urukuta , rwari metero mirongo itandatu n'eshanu z'ubuhagarike , kandi urugero yakoreshaga ni urwo abantu bari basanzwe bakoresha .
66021018	Urukuta rwari rwubatswe n'amabuye yitwa yasipi , naho umurwa ubwawo wubatswe mu izahabu itavanze , ibonerana nk'ikirahuri .
66021019	Amabuye yari yubatse urufatiro rw'urukuta yari arimbishijwe n'amabuye y'agaciro y'ubwoko butari bumwe . Dore amazina y'amabuye yari agize urufatiro : irya mbere ni yasipi , irya kabiri safiro , irya gatatu agata , irya kane emerodi ,
66021020	irya gatanu onigisi , irya gatandatu saridiyo , irya karindwi kirizolito , irya munani berilo , irya cyenda topazi , irya cumi kirisopuraso , irya cumi na rimwe yakinto , irya cumi na kabiri ametisito .
66021021	Amarembo cumi n'abiri y'umurwa yari agizwe n'amasaro y'agahebuzo cumi n'abiri , buri rembo ryari rikozwe mu isaro rimwe . Umuhanda mugari unyura mu murwa wari ushashwemo izahabu itavanze , ibonerana nk'ikirahuri .
66021022	Muri uwo murwa nta Ngoro nahabonye , kuko Nyagasani Imana Ishoborabyose ari yo Ngoro yawo hamwe n'Umwana w'intama .
66021023	Uwo murwa ntukeneye kuvirwa n'izuba cyangwa ngo umurikirwe n'ukwezi , kuko ikuzo ry'Imana ari ryo riwumurikira , kandi Umwana w'intama akawubera urumuri .
66021024	Amahanga azagenda amurikiwe na rwo , kandi abami b'isi bazahazana ibyiza byabo bihebuje .
66021025	Amarembo y'umurwa azahora akinguye amanywa yose , ndetse ntazigera akingwa kuko nta joro rizahaba .
66021026	Bazahazana ibyiza bihebuje n'ibifite agaciro by'amahanga .
66021027	Ariko nta gihumanya kizinjira muri uwo murwa , cyangwa umuntu wese ukora ibizira ku Mana cyangwa ubeshya . Hazinjira gusa abanditswe mu gitabo cy'ubugingo cy'Umwana w'intama .
66022001	Hanyuma umumarayika anyereka uruzi rw'amazi y'ubugingo , abengerana nk'isarabwayi . Urwo ruzi rwavaga kuri ya ntebe ya cyami y'Imana n'Umwana w'intama ,
66022002	rugatemba hagati mu muhanda mugari w'umurwa . Ku nkombe zombi z'urwo ruzi , hari igiti cy'ubugingo cyera imbuto incuro cumi n'ebyiri mu mwaka , incuro imwe buri kwezi . Ibibabi byacyo bikoreshwa mu kuvura amahanga indwara .
66022003	Nta muvumo uzongera kubaho ukundi . Intebe ya cyami y'Imana n'Umwana w'intama izaba muri uwo murwa , kandi abagaragu bayo bazaza kuyiramya .
66022004	Bazabona mu maso hayo kandi bazandikwaho izina ryayo mu ruhanga .
66022005	Nta joro rizongera kubaho , kandi bazaba batagikeneye urumuri rw'itara cyangwa urw'izuba , kuko Nyagasani Imana azababera urumuri maze bime ingoma iteka ryose .
66022006	Hanyuma umumarayika arambwira ati : “ Ayo magambo ni ay'ukuri kandi akwiye kugirirwa icyizere . Nyagasani Imana ukoresha abahanuzi , ni we watumye umumarayika kwereka abagaragu be ibyenda kubaho bidatinze . ”
66022007	Yezu aravuga ati : “ Dore ngiye kuza bidatinze . Hahirwa abakurikiza ibyahanuwe biri muri iki gitabo . ”
66022008	Ni jyewe Yohani wumvise ibyo kandi ndanabyibonera . Maze kubyumva no kubibona , nikubita imbere y'umumarayika wabinyerekaga ngo muramye .
66022009	Ariko arambwira ati : “ Sigaho ! Jye ndi umugaragu w'Imana kimwe nawe , kandi kimwe n'abavandimwe bawe b'abahanuzi , n'abandi bose bitondera ubutumwa buri muri iki gitabo , ahubwo uramye Imana . ”
66022010	Hanyuma arambwira ati : “ Ubuhanuzi buri muri iki gitabo ntubugire ibanga , kuko igihe ibyo byose byagenewe cyegereje .
66022011	Inkozi y'ibibi yose nigumye ikore ibibi , n'uwanduye umutima agumye yandure , naho intungane igumye ikore ibitunganye , n'umuziranenge agumye abe umuziranenge . ”
66022012	Yezu aravuga ati : “ Dore ngiye kuza bidatinze , nzanye ibihembo kugira ngo mpembe umuntu wese ibikwiranye n'ibyo azaba yarakoze .
66022013	Ndi Alufa na Omega , ni ukuvuga uw'ibanze n'uheruka . Ndi intangiriro n'iherezo .
66022014	“ Hahirwa abamesa amakanzu yabo , bityo bakemererwa kunyura mu marembo bakinjira mu murwa w'Imana , bakarya ku mbuto z'igiti cy'ubugingo .
66022015	Inyuma y'uwo murwa hazasigara abiyandarika n'abarozi , n'abasambanyi n'abicanyi , n'abasenga ibigirwamana n'abakunda kubeshya kandi bakariganya .
66022016	“ Jyewe Yezu natumye umumarayika wanjye ngo abemeze ibyo byerekeye amatorero y'Imana . Ni jye gishyitsi cya Dawidi nkaba mukomokaho , kandi ni jye nyenyeri imurika mu rukerera . ”
66022017	Mwuka n'Umugeni baravuga bati : “ Ngwino ! ” Uwumva ibyo na we navuge ati : “ Ngwino ! ” Ufite inyota na we naze , n'ushaka wese aze , ajyane amazi y'ubugingo ku buntu !
66022018	Ndaburira umuntu wese wumva ibyahanuwe biri muri iki gitabo : nihagira umuntu ugira icyo abyongeraho , Imana izongera ku gihano cye ibyorezo bivugwa muri iki gitabo .
66022019	Nihagira umuntu ugira icyo agabanya ku byahanuwe biri muri iki gitabo , Imana izakuraho umugabane we ku giti cy'ubugingo no ku murwa wayo , nk'uko byanditswe muri iki gitabo .
66022020	Uhamya ukuri kw'ibyo byose aravuga ati : “ Yego , ngiye kuza bidatinze . ” Ni koko birakaba bityo ! Ngwino Nyagasani Yezu .
66022021	Nyagasani Yezu nagumye kugirira bose ubuntu .
